1b1(rnying rgyud): rgyug gdu/ su tA thAg tu byud d+ho ldan glan+d+ra pa ni shrI a sh+tsa nga / mabe na sa mahAt+tad+hA nA ma/ bod ga dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rna
1b2(rnying rgyud): cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa gsang ba rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po zhes byab/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phya ga tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus
1b3(rnying rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po phyogs bcu dang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas/ skye gsung thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje
1b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba gzhan las khyad par du gyur bya mtshan dang dpe byad phran sum tshogs pas smras pa/ bkod pa rgyan gling dkyil 'khyer ldan po brtsegs shing yon tan rin po che'i 'byung
1b5(rnying rgyud): gnas kyis rnam pa shA / tshul sa dgas na sa /
2a1(rnying rgyud): du pa dun du la ma su su // gas du dus sas smra
2a2(rnying rgyud): sug sang 'dra ba'i gnas ga' sngalas da pa na na ga pa gas dang bang
2a3(rnying rgyud): sdug pa tshogs da / rdugs pa rgya tshogs dang / dathob zla tshogs dang/ ga ci 'jam pa snam// dung / rgyas skye bde ba bskyed pa sogs phyogs pa cang ga zigs
2a4(rnying rgyud): mapa kyi rnam par grub na pan nga bzlas pa shA gas / da gzhag pa la nga bdun 'a
2a5(rnying rgyud): gas nga/ /
2b1(rnying rgyud): dang // rnam mala'i mdzod dang/ ngan chen dra ba dang / dkon 'chag mtshan dang / rin can tag dang / rad zang snang ba dang / ma mtha' yas dang / sa kyi dbang phyug dang / chags bzod pa'i 'od dang / dga' bya stan dang /
2b2(rnying rgyud): don thams cad yod pa dang / brtson 'grus shugs can dang / las chen 'phrul las dang / gnod ldan 'dul ba dang / sna tshogs dbang phyug go// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba'i blo gros dang /
2b3(rnying rgyud): mtsho'i sra dbyangs dang / gzi brjid bkod pa dang / 'khor lo rnon po dang / shes sdang ba dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / 'od zer 'phro ba dang / drag shul can dang / dri ma sems dpa' dang / sgyu ma'i sprul pa dang / rin chen
2b4(rnying rgyud): rgyal po dang / dra ba can dang / lag bzangs dang / gser 'od 'phro ba dang / rin chen snye ma dang / chos kyi mtho ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / mun pa sel ba dang / dga' ba'i dbyangs dang / gzhon nu rin chen dang /
2b5(rnying rgyud): rnam par gnon pa dang / gar mkhan dang / zo'i rgya mtsho dang / thogs med bkod pa dang / pad+mo dga' ba dang / sa yi dbang phyug dang / rin chen spangs pa dang / sprin gyi phreng ba dang / yid 'ong me tog dang / ye shes
2b6(rnying rgyud): blon ma dang / stobs pa brtsegs pa dang / kha lo sgyur ba dang / dran pa'i dbang phyug dang / pad+ma'i blo gros dang / las byed pa'i stobs dang / snying po blo gros rnams so// de dag kun kyang rang rang gi btsun mo'i tshogs dang
2b7(rnying rgyud): 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// gzhan yang baid+mo 'gro ba dang / pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / pad+ma sgrogs pa dang / padz+ra bgyod pa dang / pad+ma tshim byed dang / padra 'thor ba dang / pad+ma sdang ba dang / pad+ma dbang byed rnams kyang rang
3a1(rnying rgyud): gi phrin las kyis bkad do// gzhan yang 'jigs byed chen po byams pa'i dbang phyug brtse ba'i dbang phyug dang / pang grol dbang phyug dang / grol ba'i dbang phyug dang / sbyin pa'i dbang
3a2(rnying rgyud): phyag dang / spyod pa'i dbang phyug dang / smra ba'i dbang phyug dang / mthun pa'i dbang phyug kyang rang rang gi reg pa bcas pas 'khor ro// de dag la sogs pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnam par 'byed pa dang / dpyod pa med par
3a3(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po pad+ma chags pa'i stan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
3a4(rnying rgyud): li snyoms par zhugs te/ thugs ka'i dpal be'u la sogs pa'i gnas nams nas/ 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed pa bsdebs/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gastsal bar byas pa dang /
3a5(rnying rgyud): mtshan gyi ltas chen po bco brgyad byung bar gyur to// de nas snod dang bcud du bcas pa'i gsal zhing 'bar bar gyur nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dugyis dam bsngal te/ de dag gis tha
3a6(rnying rgyud): 'phrul rnam par 'khod pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen pos rang gis 'khor lo'i khyams dag tu rko bar byed mdzad de// de yang zhing khams rnam par spong zhing slang 'khor gyi 'khor dang bcas pa 'od zer 'gro ba'i gnas su 'dus so// de ltar
3a7(rnying rgyud): 'chad pa'i rgya chen po'i rnam par rol 'phrul pas rol zhing zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas par gyur nas bzhugs pa las 'khor thams cad kyis the tshom skyes par gyur to// de'i dus na mthun par gleng ba na/ kye sa hol mtshan sna tshogs chos
3b1(rnying rgyud): gi phrin las kyis bkod do// gzhan yang 'jig pa byed chen po byams pa'i dbang phyug brtse ba'i dbang phyug dang / pang grol dbang phyug dang / grol ba'i dbang phyug dang / sbyin pa'i dbang
3b2(rnying rgyud): phyag dang / spyod pa'i dbang phyug dang / smra ba'i dbang phyug dang / mthun pa'i dbang phyug kyang rang rang gi rig pa bcas pas 'khod do// de dag la sogs pa'i 'a khor gyi tshogs rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'byed pa med par
3b3(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po pad+ma chags pa'i sman zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
3b4(rnying rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te/ thugs ka'i dpal be'u la sogs pa'i gnas rnams nas/ 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed pa bkye bas/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsal bar byas pa byung /
3b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan gyi ltas chen po bco brgyad byung bar gyur to// de nas snod dang bcud du bcas pa'i gsal zhing 'bar bar gyur nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dugs dam 'phul te/ de dag gis kyang
3b6(rnying rgyud): 'phrul rnam par 'khod pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen pos rang gis 'khor lo'i khyams dag tu spro bar byed mdzad do// de yang zhing khams rnam par sbyong zhing slar 'khor gyi 'khor dang bcas pa 'od zeng 'gro ba'i gnas su 'dus so// de ltar
3b7(rnying rgyud): 'chad pa'i rgya chen po'i rnam par rol 'phrul pas rol zhing zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas par gyur nas bzhugs pa las 'khor thams cad kyis the tshom skyes par gyur to// de'i dus na mthun par gleng ba ni/ kye ma ho ya mtshan sna tshogs chos/
4a1(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das ma ma na ba nyid byas tang gsum na tshun par ba nas 'dakyil 'khor thams cad thugs mnyam pa nyi tu gtsugs na nas gzigs// rnam par gzigs kun dug pags/ da ltar dag
4a2(rnying rgyud): nas dkyil khor 'di dag bsas pad sgribs ma las 'das par na tshogs rnam par sgros shig/ de tid dngos pa dang ba gzigs nas/ gzigs pa'i mtha' dang / dgangs pa'i mtha' dang / mdzad pa'i mtha' kun la snyoms pa'i
4a3(rnying rgyud): de 'don pa snyoms pa bzugs te/ bkod pa dang / rnam par bkod pa dang / rnam par bshad pa dang / dgongs pa dang / rnam par dgongs pa dang / rol pa dang / ram pa chen po dag mdzad pa dang / sna tshogs mdzad pas rgyun du sgrub
4a4(rnying rgyud): mi byed de/ 'jig rten drug gi rnam pas bsdus pa'i stong gsam gyi dngos po de // sangs rgyas kyi dbul 'khor 'di las gzhan du snang bar mi dgongs so// de'adus dngas dang sa'i khyad par deng / dkyil 'khor bkod pa
4a5(rnying rgyud): ngag kyang rnam par mi gzigs/ kun tu mi gzigs shing dgongs pa yang mi 'azhig go// de dag ni mthar yang mi gnas shing nam mkha' lta zlar bzhugs so// de nas ting nge 'dzin dal grags ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang chos
4a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bur rtogs par 'gyur ro// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje mtshang gyi sgo nas bskul zhing gzhan dag gi don thugs g.yo bar mdzad pa'i khrus gal slong bar mdzad de/ tshul
4a7(rnying rgyud): ban dun gyi gyi hrI// 'dren pa kun kyi rgyud nyid // dam mkha' chu rgyud nyid pas// nam mkha' ge khri'i dkyil 'khor nas// thugs rje chen po'i yamatshan ston// kye ma sa gan pangan kun 'ang // /
4b1(rnying rgyud): sa / sa // das pa nga sa// nga ma
4b2(rnying rgyud): byang ba tog pa'i ting 'dzin lhas thong ba'i sgras thal pa yang dang / mi dmigs dzin pas ma 'das bad da drug/ ba rkyen po la shes byung chub yo// med sargyas thags rnam 'du da 'jug /
4b3(rnying rgyud): na rkyen pa gas dag / hUM skad rjes yang ba/ la ba nas/ mnan pa'i gdus rnams me dag sa/ da byed rnam pa kod 'dum ma // 'byung ba pags ge ba skyed pa sad// lcagasas
4b4(rnying rgyud): leg sa/ brda 'dzin pa'i thogs bcas pas// yid yang grol mi pa ni/ na zhing bsnyen par badzad pad+mo// dge' phyi'i bu rjes dang bar gis/ maud 'di thugs pani par ma'i/
4b5(rnying rgyud): ma dgas pa skyeb 'dug rnams// gas thugs kyis rgya / dod byi kyi bri gzung bar the lam na da/ zhes gsung pag/ dezhin gshegs pa thams
4b6(rnying rgyud): skye grangs pa blan med pa'i gsang ba'i tam chog tshal po'irnadu che pa lasan pa byeng rnam pa 'i la ste nga zhen/ @#/ da sa ga na gang 'kha 'dus pas// dga' ba'i bzhin bzangs rgyas mang dang /
4b7(rnying rgyud): sa nga da pa
5a1(rnying rgyud): chags par rnam par 'gyur// o mngag par rtsal gas/ us can patad panag/ thags nga ba la ba gnas/ gsas 'dapasag khyod pas// thal du ba ban nad dadang // ma migs tha dang/
5a2(rnying rgyud): mkha' las// bkod pa rgya mtsho sbyin phrang bzhin// thugs rje sprul ba'i char chen pos// sna tshogs las brgyad drag par mdzod// de nas gtso bordo rje 'tshang // ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs mdzad do// rang gi mtshan mos rang mdzes pas// rgyal ngolal
5a3(rnying rgyud): gnan gzi brji can// phyag gi 'khor lo rab bkar cing // phyogs rnams kun du gzigs mdzad de// mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings dag na// rdo rje sbrul su mngon gyung nas// gzi ldan pa tshan ma dang // rol pa'i tshal du bzugs mdzang // 'jam
5a4(rnying rgyud): mig chags pa'i bzhin dag gis// 'khor rnams skyong bu'i sngags brjod do// oM Ad+ya d+hu ma hA na prI sha gu chu bi na dza~M ngad ya a~M tha 'ati a la la to// gnyis su med pa'i byang sems kyis// dkyil 'khor stor zhing bsdu bar mdzod// bsod nams ye shes chags
5a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs su// rdo rje gar gyi rol mdzad cing // dga' mchog rdo rje byang chub sems// 'dzum zhing 'khril ba'i 'do'u gnas// dkar 'tshar dag pa'i rang bzhin te// dmar po dbang dang gnyis med par// gsal khyab kun du spros pa las// dkyil 'khor sprul pa
5a6(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas 'thon// zhi 'gog mya ngan 'das pa dang // byang chub mgon gnas lam zhes dang // gnyis med gnyis su sgor mdzad cing // rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bkod// ngo mtshar skal pa rnam par rol// brjid dang bcas pas gar mdzad cing // 'dzam pa
5a7(rnying rgyud): mdzad dang rol pa dang // kun du 'gying dang spyan mdzes bltam// sprin ring bskyod cing bskur ba dang // rdo rje phrar pas g.ya' bas slong // 'dor zhing sum dang 'jog ldeg dang // rnam par rol pa'i gar gyis kyang // rigs kyi phrin las sna tshogs sbal// nam sa
5b1(rnying rgyud): kun tu khyab par mdzad// rnam par rol pa'i bde 'byung bar// byang chub sems sogs zhi zhing gsal// rol pa'i char nyid mngon babs pas// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcun// brtan dang g.yo ba ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas zhing khams dag byas nas//
5b2(rnying rgyud): chub sems tshogs rol pa la// brdeg dang 'khyud dang sdom pa las// sbyor dang bsti ma dang mnyes pa dang // kun du rab dgyes ye shes thig/ sna tshogs snang ba nyi ma'i 'od// yang dag bde la rab gnas mdzod// de 'dus pa'i tshe tshogs pa'o// phyogs bcu kun
5b3(rnying rgyud): nas bzhes mngad de// thabs dang shes rab byin brlabs pa'i// byang sems rnam dag rten gyis mchod// rnga dang sol stan zla sgrogs shing // dbang po mi ma pa'i rol cad dang // gar dbyangs chu drug sna tshogs kun// stong gsum gang bar gsung byas
5b4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan padro ba de yang bde// gzi ldan yum dang bcas par mchod// e ma 'dus pa'i tshogs dbus nas// thugs rdo che mnga' nyi dkyil bzhin// 'khor lo kun skar sgrol mdzad pas// rang gi dkyil 'khor rgyas par ma dang / rdo rje 'chang ba'i gsal
5b5(rnying rgyud): 'debs kyis// dkyil 'khor dag la ldan grub rdzogs// pad+ma'i dpal ldan sems pa che// phrin las ye shes gnas kun spyod// khyod zhabs bsgred pa thugs rje'i stobs// khams gsum ma lus dag pa yi// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mchog/ mgon
5b6(rnying rgyud): po bka' drin mdzad pas legs// de skad gsol btab dgyes par 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po'i gnas la bzhugs// de nas dga' ba'i byang chub sems// sngon gyi rgyud dang lAm bzhi las// sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang // sngon gyi rgyung dang
5b7(rnying rgyud): lam grogs rnams// dgongs shing thugs rje'i ye shes thugs// rang bzhin gnas nas kun dgongs te// phyogs bzhi nas ni bskul bar mdzad// kye kye mchog gsum 'dri ba'i sku// byams pa'i thugs mnga' stsa gsal mdzad// rdo rje rgyal po
6a1(rnying rgyud): chub sems// bdag dgongs 'gro ba 'don chen mdzad// rtsakye yan tan ran chen tshogs// thugs rje mnyam nyid ye shes che// rgyal po 'khor lo byung chub nyid// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs sprul pa'i mdzod// kye kye rnam par dag pa'i sra/
6a2(rnying rgyud): dga' ba rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i gnas// so so'i ye shes sna tshogs 'byed// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// kye kye 'gro ba'i don chen bdag/ btang snyoms mi 'dor sna tshogs dor// bya ba grub pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag
6a3(rnying rgyud): ston// rang dga'i bskum pas g.yo mdzad de// phyogs bzhi byang chub dga' gnas 'jug/ kye ma'i 'gro rnams de bzhin nyid// byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul las// nyon mongs gzung 'dzin sgrib pa yis// rang gi mtha' lam 'ges par byed// 'di dag
6a4(rnying rgyud): thugs rje'i gnas su rung // ye shes gsal ba'i thabs mang pos// thams cad dus gcig bsgral byas nas// rang gi bde chen don skyon mchog/ zhes gsungs pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin// sangs rgyas sras bcas dga' bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa
6a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las thugs rje sprul pa'i rol pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// rdo rje 'chang ba stan lngas langs// bde gshegs bsngags pa rjod byed cing // bskam pas
6a6(rnying rgyud): dbyangs kyis gsol ba btag// kye ma ho mchog gas ma dam tshig sgra// ye shes bla na med pa'i bdag/ byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// rnam 'phrul thugs rje dus nyid pas// rigs kyi 'khor lo dpag med sku// de ring bkra shes phrin samatshogs// thugs
6a7(rnying rgyud): rje chen po yal 'dor na// ci phyir theg chen mchog tu sngags// yang dag zhus pa'i tshig gsan nas// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor gzigs par mdzad// mgon po'i pad+ma'i sku de nyid// gzi ldan yum dang rol mdzad cing // dri med ye shes phyogs gzigs shing /
6b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis mang byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal// theg pa gsang chen cher 'byung ba'i// lam 'di dpal ldan rol mo'i mchog/ sangs rgyas sras bcas sdud mdzad do// gzhan 'phrul gnas tshogs g.yo mdzad cing // stong gsum 'di dag spyad
6b2(rnying rgyud): mdzad cing // ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'jug ste// sku las 'od zer spro bar mdzad// des khyab rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal// ye shes 'od mdangs sems dpa'i sku// gnas lngar gsang ba'i sngags kyis gzhug/ phyag rgya chen po yongs rdzogs sku/
6b3(rnying rgyud): la nas thu ma sngal da // grasas ga nyis ldan gas sa mangs na da tha~Mng ba // donan 'a // ma
6b4(rnying rgyud): gAs ru gzhu 'dzin pa'o// rin chen sna tshogs na bza' dang // phyig rgya'i yum bcas rol pa mdzad// gzhal yas khang pa sgo bzhi dang // rin chen sna tshogs rta 'bas brdzis// dra badra gyed mu tig phreng // b+han d+had+hi la bu sogs kyis sbas// dbus
6b5(rnying rgyud): mi dkyil 'khor cher 'phags pa'i// pho brang ka ba gdung rnams la// pad+mo rdo rje sogs pas smras// 'dod pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs// gnas rnams kun du rin chen khri// 'dra' khor lo zhi zlas mtshan// tshe rol par khyams 'khor ba dang /
6b6(rnying rgyud): rnams kun du pad+ma la// thabs dang shes rab bye brag gis// nyi ma zla brgyud pa'o// de nas pad+mon ma dag kun// dbus kyi gdan la bzhugs mdzad de// dgyes pa'i ga dbyangs bapyong ba'i mthus// thabyas dang shes rab rdzogs par mang /
6b7(rnying rgyud): thugs mchog byang chub sems// mkha' klong rnam par dag pas na// rig pa bde ba chen po'i sku// sna tshogs sna tshogs shar ba de// gsung nyid yi ge 'khor lo'i tshogs// 'bar ba 'od zer rtse lnga pa// cho ga'i yan lag rim bzhin du// thugs
7a1(rnying rgyud): kye mtshan ma dam tshig bya// sngags bcas 'gro zhing 'du ba'i tshul// rgyal po bder gshegs yab yum dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems mdang // las mdzad khro ba yab yum dang // phyag rgya chen po'i skur gyur nas// rigs
7a2(rnying rgyud): la rdengs tsharnams mengs// rang gyi dbul 'khor gnas bzugs shing // dajigs pa'i zil du 'dzo chomag bri min pa// rigs pan bdag kya ma pangs// dzangam par 'phral pa mo// dkyil mi ci na rje
7a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad// byang sems ka ma las rnam 'phrul pa'i// bder gshegs 'od zer snang ba'i sku// zhal rang phyug la sogs pa'i rgyan// gtso bo'i cha lugs ci lta bar// rang 'od yum dang 'khyil bar mdzod/ bkra shis mtshan ldan bde ba la// rAg pad+mo hrI zhes ngas//
7a4(rnying rgyud): sngags mchog yi ge 'bru brgyad de// las kun grub par mdzad pa yin// gang gi pad+ma sha ri dang // b+hu d+ha hU~M gis bsnan byas na// zhi rgyas dbang drag las kun dang // grub chen brgyad kyi tshogs sog rnams// sbyor ba tsam gyis grub 'gyur zhing // yun rengs gnas
7a5(rnying rgyud): pa gnas pa yin// 'byin pa'i dus su gsang sngags la// yi ge dza yis gdags byas nas// nam sde sa swa kI dkyil 'khor sbyor// rigs bdag skra gnas dgyes par bzhugs// thugs je sbal ba'i sgra dang sngags// 'od zer tshogs kyis phul ba mdzod/
7a6(rnying rgyud): dam tshig gsum ston sngags kyi mthus// dgyes chags brtan pas gzi dang ldan// A na ma dag pad+mo bde pa'i dbyings// ye shes byin las gsal ba'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor gsung gsum dmatshig // tid rigs bdag rngub pa che// byin brlabs
7a7(rnying rgyud): 'dor bar mi mdzad pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// gsal mdzad gnyis su med pa'i sku// rang gingo bos gnas pa yin// gtso bo sngags kyis bskul byas te// 'od zer rgyan bcas thugs kar bsdus// yi ge A nas a ba/
7b1(rnying rgyud): dug 'od zer 'phro byas pas// 'gro kun sangs rgyas skur bkod cing // rigs mthun dkyil 'khor sman gsal 'gyur// sngags kyi 'od zer sgrar bcas pas// chos rnams bcu drug dag pa'i dbyings// rang gi gnas su bkod byas pas// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa
7b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis rdzogs// de bzhin kA nasak+Sha yi bar// sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rim bzhin gsal// brtan pa'i yi ge drug dang bcas// dod 'phros thams cad sangs rgyas su// ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas// sngags kyi 'od zer sgrar bcas nas// chos ma
7b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes zag pa myed// slar nyid sku yi gnas zhugs pas// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rdzogs// gzhan yang rin chen sna bdun dang // bkra shis brgyad sogs kun gyis slab// kha~M las rnam 'phrul che mtha' yas// zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar dmar
7b4(rnying rgyud): mdangs// pad+ma sogs dang ral gri 'dzin// chos kyi snang ba'i rgyan gyis bsgrubs// pad+ma rgyan 'bring rang bzhin mchog// shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// gaM las sprul ba'i chas dbang phyug/ dmar ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// bad+ma'i phreng ba
7b5(rnying rgyud): bum pa 'dzin/ dkyil 'khor gnas su bzhugs pa'o// b+h+rUM las sprul po'i chags med 'os// zhal gcig phyag gnyis bya ru'i 'od// pad+ma gnas glegs bam me long 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o// ngaM las sprul pa'i spyan dag/
7b6(rnying rgyud): ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis btsod kyi mdog/ rin chen phreng bas bsil yab 'dzin// byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o// tsaM las sprul pa'i mi bskyod pa// zhal gcig phyag bzhi nu shel mdog/ rdo rje dri la 'dzin 'khyil pa'i tshul/
7b7(rnying rgyud): dpal be'u bum sogs 'od phreng rgyan// tsho las sprul pa'i rta dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa d+yAr+ya// rin chen skye mdung por 'din// lha yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// dzaM las sprul pa'i 'brug sgra ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis gra
8a1(rnying rgyud): gum mdog/ rin chen chag shing 'bru d+d+he 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// ha~M las sprul pa'i dri med dngul// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mar gad mdog/ rin chen pad srungs zla ma tog/ byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la
8a2(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// ta~M las sprul pa'i rin chen dbyangs// zhal gcig phyug bzhi gser gyi mdog/ rin chen dril bu yum dang lnga khril// rin chen mdzod spungs 'khor lo sogs// bru~M las sprul pa'i nam mkha'i mdog/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi sngo skya'i mdangs//
8a3(rnying rgyud): rin chen gling bu pad+mo 'dzin// shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la zhugs// de las sprul pa'i dra ba can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mthing ga'i mdog/ rin chen phreng drang pad+mo 'dzin// lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// trA~M las sprul ba'i dkon mchog
8a4(rnying rgyud): rgyan// zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs// chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyud mangs 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// ni las sprul pa'i rin chen tog/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma ra ta// dgos 'dod gum pa dpag bsam shing // byang
8a5(rnying rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// Ta~M las sprul pa kun du snang // zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog/ 'khor lo dril 'dzin yum dang bum pa 'dzin// gtsug tor dri med rdo rje 'dzin// wa~M las sprul pa'i 'od kyi dpal// zhal gcig phyag ba'i
8a6(rnying rgyud): shel gyi mdog/ 'khor lo dra ba ral gri 'dzin// shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// daM las sprul pa'i dga' dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi nyi ma'i mdangs// 'khor lo rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i mdzod// lce yi dkyil 'khor gnas pa
8a7(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// taM las sprul ba'i cho 'phrul bkod// zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs// nyi ma'i 'od phreng rdo rjes sbas// nub kyi dkyil 'khar gnas la bzhugs// ni las sgrub pa'i rnam par gzugs// zhal gcig phyag panyi sngar pa'i mang
8b1(rnying rgyud): ku sha'i chun po'i a mra'i mdadas// byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// baM las sprul pa'i don yod pa// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ldang rtswa'i mdog/ rgya gram dral bcas yum dang 'khril// rdo rje gdengs pos ral gri 'dzin// pheM las sprul pa'i brtson
8b2(rnying rgyud): 'grus 'khrugs// zhal gcig phyag bzhi kar ti ka/ rgya gram phreng ba rtse gsum 'dzin// shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// bau las sprul pa'i las chen po// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdog/ pad+ma'i phreng ba nor bu 'dzin// lho yi dkyil
8b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor gnas la bzhugs// b+ha~M las sprul pa'i gnod sbyin 'dul// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pad+ma'i mdangs// phyag na rdo rje mche ba 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// maM las sprul pa'i sna tshogs dam// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdangs//
8b4(rnying rgyud): zla ba rin chen dbyug pa 'dzin// byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// bder gshegs rgyal ba de dag kyang // tsakra smar rgyal ma lus dang // mtshan dang dpe byad sna tshogs rgyan// rigs btsun btsun mo mdzes par bya// yang sprul bems pa'i dang /
8b5(rnying rgyud): phyug ni// zhal gcig phrag bzhi gangs ri mdog/ rdo rje gdengs dbyug ralha gri dang // tri shUl thod bcas pad+ma'i lcug/ rngam brjid 'khor bcas yum dang 'khril// drug po'i rgyan cha shar gyi sgo// khwa las sbrul pa rtse ba'i dbang // zhal gcig phyag bzhi
8b6(rnying rgyud): gser gyi mdog/ rin chen dbyug pa pad+mo dang // thod rngu rdo rje myu gu'o// r-i las sprul pa'i rnam grol dbang // zhal gcigu phyag bzhi dmar mdangs gsal// pad+ma dang ni dril bu dang // thong sbrul ras sngon bya nga rje 'dzin// l-i las sprul pa'i 'gro dbang phyug
8b7(rnying rgyud): zhal gcig phyag bzhi ldeng gu'i mdog/ rdo rje n+ya gram bad+mod // gri gug gtun shing phreng ba can// rin chen phreng bas mdzes byas nas// 'khor bcas ngas pa'i mdangs bcas pas// lho la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru// gzhan 'jigs drag po'i las khyis
9a1(rnying rgyud): 'khod// shaM las sprul pa'i byin dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkur dmar 'od// rtse gsum b+han d+ha rin chen 'thal// mi yi thod par mos mtshan// Sha~M las smra ba'i dbang phyug ste// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdangs/
9a2(rnying rgyud): rin chen rtse dgu bzung phreng dang // pad+ma'i lcug ma sdigs mdzub mdzad// sa las sprul ba'i spyod dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi dam rA pA'i mdangs// dbyug brtse gcig pad+ma dang // dgra sta zhags pa phyag na 'dzin// hi las sprul pa'i dbang
9a3(rnying rgyud): phyag ste// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang gu'i skye// ral gri lcags kyu dgra sta dang // me yi phreng ba 'khor lo 'dzin// gzhan 'joms 'jigs pa'i khro bo'i mchog/ rang 'od rigs mthun yum dang rol// drag po'i rgyan tshogs ma lus 'grengs// padz+ra'i 'dabs
9a4(rnying rgyud): bzhen du 'khod// ka las bde ba'i blo gros dang // zhal gcig phyag bzhi nam mkha'i mdangs// yum bcas rdo rje dril bu dang // nam mkha'i mdzod kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang // kha las khang pa rgya mtsho'i sra dbyangs can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pu shar//
9a5(rnying rgyud): rin chen po bang phreng ba dang // rnga yab rdo rje cod pan thogs// g.yas gzi 'jing bkod pa ni// zhal gcig phyag bdi rtswa skegs mdog/ nga dra'i lcag ma thA ba dang // 'khor po yid bzhin tham pa dang // b+ha las spel pa'i 'khor lo gzhon pa ni// zhal gcig
9a6(rnying rgyud): phyag baji ma rA dang // 'khor lo dbyug byam mo thing // rgya gram rin chen phrug ma 'dzin// N+Da lAs shes rab snang ba do// zham gnyi ba rtag bya'i ljid kyi ma ngas// rin chen phung po ta dang // rtse gsum dri la zang bong dkyil 'khor// tshwa las
9a7(rnying rgyud): to// zhal gcig phyag bzhe gser gyi mdog/ rin chen gdugs mdzes nyi ma dang // dbang po longs spyod padri na// ngo las 'od zer 'gro ba can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mdangs dmar gsal// brje 'khor lo mchod sdong du// mu tig lus po rngam tog
9b1(rnying rgyud): dz+ha las sprul pa'i drag shul can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdog/ 'od kyi me phud me 'od dang // ral gri 'bar ba g.yas dang g.yon// ta las sprul pa'i dri ma sel// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dmar s+ya'i mdangs// nyi ma'i phreng ba gA Na TI rde ga/ chos kyi
9b2(rnying rgyud): tsakra rdzogs byed pa'o// tha las snga ma'i 'phrul pa ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa la sha// seng ge rgya mtsho rin chen phreng // rin chen bum pa de bcud bcas// las kyi rin chen rgyal po ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi rA ga'i mdangs// ri bo pad+ma chu dri dang // gser nyang phyo/
9b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i rdzing bu yin// d+ha las 'phros pa'i dra ba can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang gu'i mdo/ rgya gram dril bu 'phro ba dang // b+han d+ha spang yab dzag pa'i rgyun// ta las sprul pa'i lag bzangs ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ka ra ha'i 'od// pad+ma'i rgyal mtshan dkar
9b4(rnying rgyud): dmar mdangs// dri yi gnod pa ku sha'i tshul// tha las gser 'od 'phro ba 'dzin// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mthing ga'i mdog/ glegus bum mdzes pa'i sku gzugs dang // rin chen mdzod dang zla ba'i 'od// Da las rin chen skye ma ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pad
9b5(rnying rgyud): rA ga/ pad+ma'i sdong bu dpag pas ma shing // b+hAn d+ha rtse gsum zla chos gzugs// d+ha las chos kyi mthong ba ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi sna tshogs sku// go cha ye shes sgron ma dang // dpal be'u zur brgyad nor bu tog/ sna tshogs sprin phung ser gra bcas// mche
9b6(rnying rgyud): ba dril bu dang pa 'dzin// b+ha lAs gzhon nu rin chen ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdog/ rgyu gram 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang // 'od zer rtse gsum sngags pa'i bum// sems dpa' chen po de dag rnams// rgyan phreng cha lugs 'od zer dang // yum
9b7(rnying rgyud): gnas 'khril zhing rang gnas kyi// gtso la 'khril pa'i tshul du bzhugs// nyam na las 'phrul pa yi// rdo rje rnam par gnon la sogs// rigs kyi mtshan ma ci bzhin du// pad+ma rA ga rak+Sha mdangs// be'u gser mdog in dra bzhin// pad+madza
10a1(rnying rgyud): rims sogs mtshan// zhal gcig byug pa'i yung dang 'khyil// ngos ma'i phyag mtshan mthun pa'o// rang rtags mtshan ma sna tshogs dang // badra'i lhag mas mchod byam pa'o// me tog 'drab blarna pas kyis sa// rkang 'dogs pa
10a2(rnying rgyud): sa 'byas// rgyung chu sa samyed nga// dam nga ba sa mang dang // don bye tshong ba'i 'a ga// mdzad pa
10a3(rnying rgyud): las mdzod nang gi mtshams// Sha sha sa ha las 'phrul pa'i// pad+mo chem byed la sogs pa'i// zhal gcig phrag gnyid rigs gnyis gzugs// bdug spos me tog dung da de// 'khyi tshul Ni shU la las kyi tshu'o// mchod pas kyi yi mtshams na gnas/
10a4(rnying rgyud): de dag gi gas gas ni/ oM ta ti rA g+ha badz+ra shI riSh+TA swA hA/ oM dz+ra ma dzan par dran mi t+tam tata mdza ng+ge/ rmad tang pa (/ dngus kyi kyi dza phyi'o// oM tsak+Sha A lo kan pa nyaM sa~M b+ha ra dran rje ti ya ti sa ta/ drab phyog su
10a5(rnying rgyud): nga dub sa tu
10a6(rnying rgyud): sAd+hA/ byung gi dkyil 'khor ba'o// oM ma ma a ba lo ka na mA mr-i de b+hod sa twa ma ma hU~M dzA swA hA/ rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa b+h+yo'o// oM ba~M la can ma si ta na ma gu rgya gu ru bo rtis twa b+ha ra bun dzaswA hA/ rigs las sprul pa'i byang chu
10a7(rnying rgyud): myo// oM na ta na tus dzagams da pas rdza brags / te bka/ khrib rnams kyi'o// sa lags rgyal pom 'a ngos// dam pa
10b1(rnying rgyud): gsum gnas nas g.yo mdzad de// rang gi lha la gsal bar mdzod/ de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// bde chen gar gyi dbang phyug gis// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gsal byed pa'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// dkyil 'khrur byin rlabs
10b2(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur zhing // rigs kyi bdag pos gsal bar mdzod// gnas kun mtshan ma yongs dganas// rnam gsum snang ba gnyis med 'gyur// oMn ma sarba t+taSh+Tha ga ta kA ya bA ga tsi t+ta ma hA sho d+hi t+ya su dr-i tre sha shra d+ha so nA khyA hrI hUM/ oM rin chen
10b3(rnying rgyud): rgyan gyi sngags sarba pu ta ku ru rat+na ma ma ku ta/ a a bIr+ya sad ma ma kra a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM AHhU~M swA hA/ oM pad+ma a mo ka sa ma ya shrI ha ha ha tshin d+ha ma ni asmi sha bi ma ma ya hU~M hUM/ sngags gsum gyi gsul bar byed pa'o// oM bi sha tsin d+ha ma ni a ba si
10b4(rnying rgyud): pro da ma ma ku ru sI la la ta si ni bi bud pa paM da hrI hU~M hUM/ rnam par spo ba'i sngags so// oM ma hi la ni bi sha tsakr-i ku ma ta pu ta na ma si la du tri si hUM phaT swa hA/ dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i sngags so// oM aM a a min du she ma la shAn dun d+he ta thA ga ta/
10b5(rnying rgyud): ti pad+ha ku ru AHhU~M swAtwa/ zad pa'i sngags so// oM bad+ma mu khaM pad+ma pa byas po ti dir ya~M gu ru ts+tshar+thA d+h+ri te haM dAr sha swA tra/ snying po'i sngags so// oMn me sra tri b+ho ga gun gu ma le sa~M sA ra hUM phaT sahA/ rig pa mchog gi sngags so// oM ba gr-i gr-I pas pa
10b6(rnying rgyud): u h+ye byi ma hA k+Sha dra ma da a ma d+ha na dza dza/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so// oM pad+mo saM g+ha ga sma ra ta r+ya gA sa ma ye s+t+waM/ gdan gyi sngags so// oM a mu ka si na ma sarba b+ho ga ga ta pU tsa med na da hU~M traM swA hA/ mchod pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra bi lo ku ma la s+yA na
10b7(rnying rgyud): A hA pa sa ha~M ti/ dgyes par bya ba'i sngags so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pa mtshag// rdo rje gsang ba mid 'byung ba'o// spya dang gsung thugs gsang sngags tshe// byin bris brlabs po don pa shad mdzade// bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes mchog
11a1(rnying rgyud): de dag dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul mchog/ dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems// de ni dkyil 'khor snying po mchog/ rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas chen po// thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i tshul// rang bzhin byang chub sems nyid las// rang bzhin ldan su
11a2(rnying rgyud): chen po// 'gro ba'i snang ba dam pa'i mchog/ rang bzhin dgang dri med chos// dkyil 'khor gnas mchog gnyis med pa'o// phung po khams sogs rnam dag sku// e ma'o chos sku mya ngan 'das// e ma'o chos rnams ye shes sku// e ma'o chos kun rnam par 'phrul//
11a3(rnying rgyud): tshe sngags kyi tshul ldan pa'i// dkyil 'khor gsang gsum ngo mtshar che// thabs pa mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis// sngon dang dang / 'brel don 'byung // thabs ma khos pa jol byin bcu rdzogs// bsod nams ye shes dag pa'i thugs// sa dang pa'adas ngon
11a4(rnying rgyud): ta thA ga ta'i byin brlabs dbyings// la la sku dang gsung dang thugs// zab pa de nyid rang gi mthus// gsang gsum gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// ya mtshan chos la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam 'phrul skya la phyag 'tshal lo// byang rngub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes
11a5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud pas dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas 'dzum pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// dga' ba chen po ngo mthor gyis// rgyud gsum
11a6(rnying rgyud): dag tshi ma gur nas// dgyes pa'i dbyangs kyis gsol ba btag/ e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan ci// gnyis mad rol pa la mtshan ci// ji med dag pa pa mtshan che// 'od 'gro 'drab pa mtshang che// byang chub sprin phreng la mtshan che// sangs kyil 'ibyeng pa la
11a7(rnying rgyud): che// 'phrul pa 'byung ba ya mtshan che// khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che// byin brlabs cho 'phrul pa mtshan che// tha brlan mdzad pa mtshan che// 'gog pa rlung mdzad la mtshan che// bdag cag 'khon tshogs 'dus pa rnams// dam tshig can
11b1(rnying rgyud): mdzad// za rog rim pa ci bzhin du// rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'god// de nas bcom ldan pade chen pos// chags pa chen po rdo rje'i sku// su dang gsung thugs gnyis med pa'i// 'khor rnams rab tu sbyang ba'i phyir// rdo rje rgyan gyi ting 'dzin gyis// rang gi dkyil 'khor gas pa
11b2(rnying rgyud): par mdzod// de tshe byang chub sems chen po// 'od zer kun du khyab pa des// dga' ba chen po'i mchod pa yis// gnas kyi mtshan ma gsol bar mdzod// 'du shes med dang 'gog gnas sogs// rang gi rtog pa'i mtha' zhes rnams// dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems//
11b3(rnying rgyud): rin chen chu des dbang bskur nas// rang gi ye shes dbang thob ste// 'gro ba'i don byed nus dang ldan// las la spyod pa'i gnas rnams dang // rang skyob pa yi sems dag gis// thugs rje chen po'i byang chub sems// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di gnyer ro// byang chub
11b4(rnying rgyud): sems kyi mtshan ma yis// 'dus pa'i gnas lnga rig par bya// oM gud+ha badz+ra sa ma s+t+waM/ a la la ho// rdo rje ro langs bsdus pa yis// gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po rnams// rigs kyi dgongs pa ji lta bar// rdo rje gsang ba'i las la gnas// skal bzang dam
11b5(rnying rgyud): tshig chen po ste// de las 'das na rtag par 'gyur// bka' yi bsgo ba'i don chen pos// 'das pa'i 'khor tshogs bsam yas pas// dam tshig thob pas gral 'khod do// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po nyid// dbang thob las mdzad chen po des// bcom ldan 'das la
11b6(rnying rgyud): gtsug gi phyag/ rnal 'byor lugs su byas nas ni// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// mnyam 'gyur gsol ba rab tu gdab// 'di ltar ma byung ngo mtshar khyod// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang phyug che// mngon spyod ya mtshan ston par spyong // bka' yi 'khor
11b7(rnying rgyud): dam pa nyid// smra bas ma yul las rab 'das kyang // dpes mtshon snang ba la brten nas// yi ge ming tshogs la sogs kyis// gsal bar mtshan togo bar mdzod// ston pa dbang phyug dam pa des// gsol ba btang ba'i don dgongs nas// rjod bsam 'das
12a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin las// mnyam par bzhugs nas myi gsung bkrugs// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor phyotshogs kyis// skyobs mchog sed ge chen po la// sogs su btud de phyag 'tshal nas// rmad 'byung mchod pa sna tshogs byas// gsol pad
12a2(rnying rgyud): mchog se ge byed // bdag cig gdas zhabs kyi// rlobs mchog seng gegs nga dag gis// gsol ba ba ma pa don dgang sanas// 'dres pa'i tho tshogs ston cig/ bdag la nas shig dmas par gyis// thar nyid gapa
12a3(rnying rgyud): btab pa'i don// kun gyis mthun pa'i tshig smras pa// mgon po rgyal ba kun gyi mdzod// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras kyi mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' rje btsan la// chos rnams ston pa'i gnas lags na// bcom ldan gsang mchog dam par
12a4(rnying rgyud): gas thugs la sun rgyas ma rtson cing // dgangs marjo bye sangs su sna dzog// rjed pas ga sags // 'a rgyags la bstan du gso pa// gsas dring dbye bar mdzad par rigs// zhus par don nyid khyer gsungs pa//
12a5(rnying rgyud): kun gyi gsang ba'i mdzod// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dngos// sna tshogs sdang zhing gsal bar mdzod// de nyid rdzogs pa'i gsang sngags can// bshad las 'das pa'i don da ni// dgongs don rgyal bas gsung mi mdzod// de ltar ston pa chal mchog
12a6(rnying rgyud): gis// rnam par brjod pa mi mdzad pas// yang dag don gyi snying po nyid// rgya cher bka' ni gsal ba yin// 'dus pa 'khor tshogs rnams nyon cig/ byang chub dam pa'i snying po ni// spa bsam las 'das brjod med pas// tshig tu brjod pa legs ma yin// gnyis
12a7(rnying rgyud): mtha'i rtog pa las gzhan dag// tshig gi snang bas the tshom byed// grol banyid kyis 'ching 'gyur zhes// 'das dang mabyon thams cad dang // de ltar byung ba'i dgongs pa'i don// ma gsungs mi gsung gsung du med// de nas sems dpa' sprang po ni// stob dang thal ba
12b1(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems// kun rdzob bden pa'i tshig dbang du// mtshan ma'i tshig gis rnal 'byor rnams// don dam rtogs dka' 'gro ba'i phyir// rgyal bas tshig skor bgran pa yis// 'dus tshogs 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// stobs mchog seng ge de ltar na// bdag
12b2(rnying rgyud): sngogs ma 'ongs rnal 'byor pas// tshig gi rjes 'brangs don dag tu// gsang ba'i las brjod gsal byed pa// ji lta bu yis mtshon par 'gyur// dpa' po khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras// dbang bskur thob par zhu ba spobs// bcom ldan dbang mchog dam pa la// zhus
12b3(rnying rgyud): shing stobs mchog seng ge khyod// des kyang 'khor gyis zhus pa bzhin// rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa la// phyag 'tshal rmad 'byung mchod rdzas nas// rdo rje tshig tu 'di skad gsol// kye ma ston pa thugs chen po// phyogs bcu rgyal ba kun 'dus pa// byang chub sems
12b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid de// tshig tu brjod pa ma mdzad na// ma 'ongs sgra la brten pa dag/ don la reg par mi 'gyur phyir// mtshon byam tshon par byas nas ni// snying po byang chub don 'di la// dpes mtshon 'thad par grub byed pa// gsang ba de nyid bstan du gsol// de nas
12b5(rnying rgyud): mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// ye shes lnga dang rtags ldan pa'i// phyag gi mtshan ma gsor mdzad cing // rmad 'byung ya mtshan ston par mdzad// thams cad pad+mor 'gyur ba yi// rmad 'byung chos kyi sgra yang sgrogs// oM AHhU~M swA hA/ bo d+hi tsit+ta ku h+ya/ sa ma ya
12b6(rnying rgyud): as/ a nu pro d+hi tsit+taM a nan ta gar b+ha/ ma hA sa twa pra ta a d+h+waM/ 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang // sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad dgra/ rab tu drag cing brgyal 'gyur nas// gzhan lha ma lus s+pho sa ci dgos// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag bka'//
12b7(rnying rgyud): bshad kyis rigs kyi bu rnams nyon// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med par// yang dag bden pa'i don bstan pa// de ni dngos po mtshan nyid de// mkhang ldan chen po rnams kyi gdeng // ji srid blo yi chos dag tu// gnyis su snang ba'i mtshon ma pa/
13a1(rnying rgyud): bsas bdod pan zhes rgya// dalas 'dadu 'a na dam man// mug sum gnyisas med pa po// snang badza dngas pam 'gags pa// ngas gsus byastan pa zhin padu gnas// 'od bzhin pa ma ngan nyid do// thams cad snyam/
13a2(rnying rgyud): g+ha bu'i tshul// thams cad rang bzhin myong pa nyid// drung drung drug pa 'i ye shing ni// de nyid na du mchog dam pa// de sa kyis ni bda'i tha spa sa// ma ma la yim brjo dpa // stobs mchog seng ga rje badris// de gar lags sa tsam ldan das// sngags kyi skal
13a3(rnying rgyud): gnas gang// snod la gnas pa gang dag gis// pan ts+tshan badril 'gyur khyad// hU~M la rim pa 'jug bu byam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// gsang po'i bdag po rtson nyon cig/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i don// mtshan nyid rnam dag dus
13a4(rnying rgyud): slang dang nga sa / sa sgyu sa she / shAn dzi bre rAs
13a5(rnying rgyud): legs gnas shing // bden gnyis 'brel pa'i don bsgrubs nas/ yang dag rtag pa'i don gsal 'gyur// rnal 'byor sa ston sa thob shod// mu skyes thabs kyi ye shes ldan// thams cad rtswanyam pa nyid kyi dbyings// bden gnyis dbye' med pa yin//
13a6(rnying rgyud): yang dag don mdzugam+b+ha pa'i // kun rdo bsnam thabs kyi gsung // b+hag r+b+ha smra ra'i 'i nyid de// ming pa ma yin mtshan med do// nam 'byor gnyis dang wang rtsing ro// slob po'i rnal 'byor gags brten nas// phun gyis thub mi gos nas// 'an
13a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur bden pa gnyis la gnas// tshe bying ma sa grub pa yin// dz+wa l-i rjes 'brangs nal 'byor bas// don med rjo la gnas par gru// yang pa nga rjo de na gangs bas// gnyis med ri na ngam badzin par gnas/
13b1(rnying rgyud): sgog/ rig pa'i skyes bu rnam par grags// zhes pas dgyes par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ de kho na nyid bstan pa'i le'u lte bzhi pa'o// de nas rig
13b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i skyes bu mchog/ gsang ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa// bcom ldan snying po byang chub sems// dgongs pa'i don ni ci lta bu// las dang nyon mongs drag byed pa'i// ye shes sgron ma ci ltar lags// rgyal bas dgongs pa'i byang chub sems// rdo rje
13b3(rnying rgyud): lta bur mnyam bzhag nas// mi rtog ye shes gsal mdzad de// sna tshogs rnams kyang byang chub sems// bde ba che las gzhan med do// lus ngag yid gsum rnam pa'i tshogs// chos rnams kun gyi rgyu yin te// rnam gsum rdo rje lta bu nyid//
13b4(rnying rgyud): gsum gsal ba rnam par snang // dngos po gsal ba'i chos med do// gcig las rnam 'phrul sna tshogs nyid// phyag rgya gur thabs dbang bsgyur bas// 'ching ba'i tshogs las rnam par grol// dngos po thams cad thal ba yi// phung khams
13b5(rnying rgyud): skye mched rnam par dben// gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i yul bral bas// dpag med pa yi ngo bo nyid// rnam gsum mchog gi don las byung // 'od gsal chen po'i rang bzhin no// ro mtshar rmad du byung ba'i don// rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs//
13b6(rnying rgyud): skye dang skye med sna tshogs dngos// phyogs 'dzin mtha' yis bcing bar byed// de dag chos las rnam grol ba'o// bden pa chen po'i ting 'dzin rgya// ngo mtshar ya mtshan rmad kyi chos// me long gsal ba'i rang bzhin can// N+Dal ba rnams kyi gsang ba'i mdzod// 'ag
13b7(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i chos nims pa// byang chub sems nyid skye bar 'gyur// mnyam nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra// ya mtshan rmad du byung ba'i chol// sna tshogs snang byed gnas grol ba// rang bzhin zhi ba'i byang chub sems// gnyis kyi mtha' las grol ba // gnas/
14a1(rnying rgyud): // dang gnas med byang chub sems// ya mtshan rmad kyi don byung ba'o// rgya cher po sor gsal ba'i dang // kun rtogs byang chub sems chen po// dmigs med gsang ba las byung ba'i// dmigs dang mi dmigs sna tshogs ni/ bde ba'i ye shes gas
14a2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// ma 'gags pa yi chos nyid do// bya ba grub pa'i tshul can du// spos med sngos pa sna tshogs snang // spo ba sdu 'dun dang spos bral ba'i// mdzad pa'i byung sems brtan pa las// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul bla na med// ye shes rgya mtsho rmad du bung // rang gi de
14a3(rnying rgyud): nyid gsal bar 'gyur// rgyal bas bshad pa'i dgos don la// 'khor rnams ya mtshan ngoms par 'gyur// mchod dang zhal dgas 'byin cing // rang gi de nyid gsal 'gyur nas// byang sems de nyid bstod par bya// e ma'o stong nyid byang chub sems//
14a4(rnying rgyud): ma'o dag pa dri ma med// e ma mi sgri ba gsal ba che// e ma'o mnyam nyid dbyer med chos// e ma'o so so rang rig sams// oM ma'o bya byed ldan gyis grub// de bzhin nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan 'das nyid byang chub sems// byang chub sems
14a5(rnying rgyud): nyid thugs kyi mchog/ bdag cag rig 'dzin tshogs pa rnams// byang chub sems nyid ston pa dang // 'jug dang ldang dang gnyis med de// rang gi byang sems g.yo bar gyis/ reg par bgyi zhing nye bar bgyi// nyams su myong bar 'tshal lags na// thugs
14a6(rnying rgyud): che dgongs byin gyis rlobs// bde bar gshegs pas byin gyis rlobs// de skad tshig tu gsol btab pas// bcom ldan snying po 'di nyid gsung // sna tshogs rnam dag ngo bo nyid// chos rnamasu 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams kun// rang bzhin brjod tha
14a7(rnying rgyud): rang gsang rtogs pa'i dka' ba'i don// srid gsum ye nas rnam dag chos// bdag tog 'phrul ba'i nyes dmigs kyis// dus ring 'i byams 'gyur 'gro ba rnams// rang rtog dngos po'i las la spyod/ log pa'i sem su btags
14b1(rnying rgyud): das byung ba med// ma spyad du sa cam / na / smrang 'a sa// 'du na gnas na / thab gnas nang byung chus dang // zod dag dngas
14b2(rnying rgyud): ga se pa / bye ba ni ban gsugs thangs kyi dbus pathaM 'ad pa'i ba ma du can pams ma
14b3(rnying rgyud): 'i tshul la'o// mi rtul ba rjes pa blo/ bya snang byasnyam pa drim/ sa gsang ba dag pacos// dkyil 'gar rnam par mi bya dum/ na na nying 'gro 'a dgas padag/ bas pa nga
14b4(rnying rgyud): 'di sa / na dpa nga ga// de dge nga 'bu ma thegs// nus pa dzin dang / yi ga bdus pa basbyi du gam// da
14b5(rnying rgyud): shing phyog sa me sbyin nga spyod padi bye / ni shing la gas pas / da gas // bya kyim pa
14b6(rnying rgyud): nga
14b7(rnying rgyud): mi'i sa sa su su brgya byas sa su na ngas
15a1(rnying rgyud): las// sna tshogs kun nas so so nyid// 'byung bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bkod// kun 'phrul sa bon las bskyed pa'i// ye shes rin chen sna tshogs gzugs// shar du do shal phreng ba dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rnga yab sogs//
15a2(rnying rgyud): me lo rol mo'i tshogs pa'i ma las// 'khong mdzin chen rdo rje dang // tA ran pani rgyan mdzes pa// ska dbyings sna tshogs ni sde'i tshogs// tsak+Sha bar khyams byeng ba dang // dam pa'i 'dod yon snya mo 'khrigs// rin chen dbang ba khri brtsegs gnas// nyi zla
15a3(rnying rgyud): pad+ma'i rin chen kun// gnas rnams khyab par ci bzhin par// dkyil 'khor ldan gyis grub pa 'o// a.A/ i m+me/ u s+yA/ e me/ oM so// yaM s+yan dzi rI/ ma mAM/ ka khrag g+ha / tsho dz+dzaH/ dzaHTA nA d+ha/ ta zad d+harmA pa pha ba b+hU ma/ yar la
15a4(rnying rgyud): sa ta k+Sha/ de bzhin nyid dbyings rmad 'byung ba'i// bder gshegs kun gyi thugs gsal ba// byin brlabs ya mtshan sprul pa'i sku/ dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kun gyi gnas// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang badzin dag pa dri ma med// phra
15a5(rnying rgyud): rnams sangs rgyas te// 'byung lnga dbyings phyag yum gyi mkha'// khams dang skye mched sems dpung dang // sems me'i tshogs dang khro mo de sku// phyi nang srid gsum dngos snang ba'i// dkyil 'khor rigs kyi bdag nyid che// gzugs phung rnam par sngang
15a6(rnying rgyud): mdzad che// tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan su// 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas sgra// 'du byed don yod grub pa yin// rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste// thams cad bder gshegs lnga yi sku// sa khams sangs rgyas sun yin te// chu khams
15a7(rnying rgyud): mo mA ma kI// me khams na bzang dkar mo ste// rlung khams dam tshig sgrol ma'o// nam mkha' kun du bzang mo'i sku// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa'o// dbang po'i spyod yul ma lus kun// thams cad bder gshegs rig
15b1(rnying rgyud): mug sa rnam par snang mang dang // rna ba na ldan shAng ldan pa// sbrul blam pa' bas nyid/ sa dang yang thab 'o// sa nang rgyas pad+ma pa // / dag nga kyi stsal ba nga // lenas spyan pa gnas pastsa//
15b2(rnying rgyud): na shesas// ma na rgyas su 'du // sa pa skyeg nga / bcwas sa pa 'i das ma tham // ji tshigs na' 'din mi // rjeg sa mthor ma // rang byagasas
15b3(rnying rgyud): 'dum sbyor 'du za ba dad/ sa// rang ga kyil 'kho ga sa bar ba// skyeg nas/ pa ma rum pa'i ma// ga 'dul ba med pa
15b4(rnying rgyud): shes rab la pa'i mchog/ sa byed par malus pa dang / rdo chos kyi madz+rar mang du dang // ron tan min lab mab byin pas/ 'di nyid rkyen 'a chog/ rdorje pasang gisum ngas tshig // rang ma 'i byor bye ga// dag tumanyam gas
15b5(rnying rgyud): bA yis// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas bzugs te// dri med byed chub sems kyi tshul// 'gro rnams tshogs bcas dag par byas// shin tu gsang sngags brjod byas shing // rdo rje mnan rje nags la brtan// rtag tu gtor sun gtang byas te/
15b6(rnying rgyud): don ming par gyur// sa gyug/ sa pad+hAtra/ par 'gyur// dag yang
15b7(rnying rgyud): dang / brda rig ngas nyam par gyur// do rdzogs na pa// gan bu chu ma 'a rig par// byung gyi kyis bya ngadrang gnas ni sa du
16a1(rnying rgyud): thig le las// 'od zer lnga yi snang ba bcas// rang gi gnas nas 'phro mdzad cing // de nyid mgon po'i sku 'dod gzugs// kun tu pad+ma chags med pas// gnas kun dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur// thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams
16a2(rnying rgyud): dang // dpe byad rdzogs par gyur nas ni// yon tan ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas// kun du drebs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog/ rdo rje'i dmatshig la gnas pas// rdo rje rang gi gnas su bsgom// 'od 'phros 'dus pa'i gnas phyag bya'i// ye shes mnyam
16a3(rnying rgyud): nyid kun don mdzad// thugs rjes rnam mang yul bral zhing // 'joms par mdzad pa'i khro bo'i sgra// rang gi dkyil 'khor dri bral ba// mngon sum gsang ba'i ye shes lnga// 'khor lo'i dam tshig la gnas pas// 'khor lo rang gi gnas su bsgom//
16a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba kun gyi rin po che// 'phro 'du nyi shu rtsa lnga'i tshogs// phung tshogs khams rnams rnam dag cing // phrin las ye shes bla na med// byang chub dag pa'i cha lugs gnas// dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i byin brlabs su// dga' ba'i thabs dang shes
16a5(rnying rgyud): rab sbyor// phyag sa chen po'i rigs 'dzin gnas// nal 'byor dang brtson ting 'dzin ldan// 'brab 'gyur ring por thogs me com/ ches gsungs pas 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams mchis par gyur te// de bdeg gshegs pa thams
16a6(rnying rgyud): dgos pathun med pa'i gsang ba dpal rnamachog la pA / depas ting nge 'dzin drug pa 'o// de nas ba rnams par rgyabyur d+ha la yangs te/ dga' ba'i mchod pa dang gi byangs kyis dkyil 'khor mad mnyas par byas nas/
16a7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba bda' po// kye ma N+Dal ba kun gyi gso// dngas rgyas tshogs rnams bskyed pa'i lab/ khyod kyi sad kyi'i 'khor la mdzang nas// gdul bya lapa 'di grol zas na// rdzu yi 'grob sar gzung // 'ang dab
16b1(rnying rgyud): po ma smin pa'i// dkar po chos rnams mthong mi 'gyur// de dag thugs rje chen po yis// bzung zhing las la gzhug par sbyang // ma 'ongs 'gro ba la la dag/ 'di ltar dkyil 'khor mthong ba rnams// ji ltar dkyil 'khor brtan par 'dul// zhes gsol
16b2(rnying rgyud): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro batheg pa gsang sngags kyi lam du 'jug par 'dod pa dag gis ni/ rdo rje slob dpon la brten te gzugs brtan gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o// rdo rje slob dpon blo gros mchog
16b3(rnying rgyud): dang brtson shes rab stobs dang ldan// bdag chos ma lus shes 'gyur nas// skyob pa byang sems sdom pa blangs// byang sems snying rje chen po dang // dga' ba btang snyoms pani bzhag nas// sems can thams cad mngon du gnyer// slang nyid byang chub las
16b4(rnying rgyud): la dgod// pha rol phyin pa drug rnams dang // bsdu ba bzhi la legs gnas pas// theg pa chen po'i lam gnye zhing // nyan thos la sogs thos pa med pa'i blos// gsang ba'i theg pa don gnyer zhing // dkyil 'khor dbang thob dam chog ldan// gas
16b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyun rnams don shes shing // de nyid bcu las goms gyur pas// rang gi ye shes nam grol zhing // dngos po de nyid brtan par gnas// mu stegs la sogs mi bskyod cing // theg dman la sogs 'gyur ba med// rtag tu 'gro bar zung ba'i blos//
16b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor la sogs las la brtson// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yi// grong khyer chen por 'gro byed dpon// 'jig rten drag btson chos brgyad dang // btang snyoms spong len med pa nyid// dmus long tshogs kyimag bu bas// bla ma'i
16b7(rnying rgyud): gtso bor gzung bar bya// 'jug pa'i gang zag phun sum tshogs// zhi des gsong por spro ba dang // 'jam zhing 'gro ba'i yid 'ong ba// rtse gcig dad pa brtson 'gyur byed// blo gros yon tan kun la 'dug/ lha dang bla ma la sogs bus//
17a1(rnying rgyud): thabras ldan bu ma dag pas// ngan pa phyogs grangs gzhan gnas// nan thogs pazang po yon tan la// rlub can pasang du da nga na bar da// sa mthog shin kya dab pa gnas// rab nags cal 'dus bu dang // gcu tan dun
17a2(rnying rgyud): su mtshogs// brjod byed kyi bathogs bral ba// rnal 'byor thogs bcas dag byung ba // ngadag dab dbang chad myed pa'i chog/ babyen pa bzhin rdzogs pa yis// dkyil 'khor bri sogs las rnams bya// phran bumatshogs pa bdun ldan pa'o// bdag
17a3(rnying rgyud): gnas sa gzhing thogs bcus dang // mchod rngus po zad ma las pa// 'azung zhing byin gyis brla par bya// rdo rjes gzhing pa dang // gur dang thar bcas pa yis// khrob me 'od mtshon ma'i tshogs// bsung zhing 'khor lo rim bzhin pa sgor// sams
17a4(rnying rgyud): can thams cad bskal ba'i thos// bsod nams tshogs kyis dag par bya// phyag 'tshal mchod pa dbul ba dang // sdig bshags bsod nams rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'dang zhing // chos kyi 'khor lor skong ba dang // lus dpal byang sems
17a5(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa dang // lam gnas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo// rgya cher yongs su bsngo byas shing // sems can don du smon lam gdab// dmigs med pa yi rang bzhin gyis// de dag brtson bral nam mkha' bzhin// rnam thar gsum las 'das pa yi// de bzhin
17a6(rnying rgyud): kyi ye shes na// rnams cad rnam mkhang mkhyen te dang // nub par bye ba tsun nyi med// rapa d+ma 'od byor // dod grang marnam panyid lagasal// de pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i tshogs// dkyi pa 'a dang blang
17a7(rnying rgyud): kyi zhing khams spyod byed cing // rnal dbyer chen po las kun 'grub// sa phyogs dri med yid ngang bang // grong ngam grong khyer dgon pa'ang // ri rdzogs nags chel gang rung bar// nyams dga' yan lag btag par bya// gang du bdang na 'bras thar ras
17b1(rnying rgyud): ne'u gseng rgyu 'gram me tog bcas// dpal rdzogs yon tan dbyung ba'i gnas// de ni rab gus btag par bya// nam mkha' 'khor lo dra ba dang // sa gzhi bdU da ba dang // bkra shis rnga na sum sna tshogs gzhi// bar chad med pa'i mtshan nyid yin//
17b2(rnying rgyud): sa gzhi zhom jib med pa yi// dbus su mtho ba phyag rgya che// shar dang kyang du gzhol ba ni// phrin las rnam bzhi'i dngos grub 'gyur// lho dang rub tu gzhol bas ni// 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub 'gyur// nub dang byang du gzhol pa ni// ting 'dzin
17b3(rnying rgyud): pho mo'i las gzhan 'gyur// gang zhig shar phyogs mtho ba dang // dbus su dma' ba spang bar bya// sa de pus mo nub tsam du// brkos te slar yang dgang bar bya// mang 'phel gyur na dngos grub mchog/ gang bar gyur pa shis pa yin// dma'
17b4(rnying rgyud): zhing ma legs gyur pa yin// sol du ma rus sogs byung na yang // yang na chu yis dgang byas te// slob dpon rdo rje dril 'dzin pas// mnyam bzhag lha yi sngags brjod cing // shang du mi drag gom pa brgyad// song ste spang ldog blta bar
17b5(rnying rgyud): bya// 'grib pa med na dngos grub 'gyur// snang dang mi snangs yi bdag/ mgu byas don gyis nyo ba dang // blangs te bar chad med pa'i phyir// bgegs gzhan phra mo bskrad par bya// bar chad med pa'i sa dbus su// rigs kyi bdag po 'byor ldan pas// chos gos
17b6(rnying rgyud): la sogs rgyan thogs shing // pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor legs bzhugs te// 'khor los sgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis// mchod sogs sbyang zhing byin brlabs te// rdo rje bsrung ba'i phyag rgya yis// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rig par bcas// sa yi lha mo srung
17b7(rnying rgyud): ma rnams// spyan drangs mchod pas mnyes par bya// khyad par sa yi bdag po dang // 'gro drug bgegs rnams ma lus kun// dgug cing bu lon mchod sbyin gtang // dri zhim chu yis kun gtor zhing // sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang bar bya// gang zhig dngos
18a1(rnying rgyud): grub la sogs 'dod// rab 'bring ba ma grub don du// ho 'phye btag pa'i cho ga bzhin// yan lag kun dbang na yang bya// de nas dkyil 'khor chur mnyam pa'i// sa gaN+DI khru la sogs chad du// banos tes yi skyon bsal zhing // sA zhag
18a2(rnying rgyud): mdog bzang 'angam byin pas// gang zhig dri zhim chur bcas pa'o// sngags btab gang zhig 'bras par bcag/ bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor khru dor bstod// rgyang ni khru drug pa yi tshad// tshogs bsag khru gang 'phang du bstod// mtha' tsho/ khwa gang pa yi tshad/
18a3(rnying rgyud): dbyung bslar song bzhi'i tsha brjod // de ltar thub ni rgyang bskyed cing // bam+b+has legs pa 'ong bzhid drung nas// tshad man pa thog smar la sogs pa// rin tshor lnga dang stan lnga dang // snying po lha dang shwa ga/ d+hi rma sngags kyis bkyam sa/
18a4(rnying rgyud): bkyil 'khor snying por gzhag par bya// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs te// stong pa nyid kyi sngags kyis kyang // dri zhim sngags kyis byin brlabs pa'i// rnga rmAn rdzogs bcur gtor byas shing // sna tshogs gtor mas mnyes byas te// lha cho
18a5(rnying rgyud): mthon rnams rtsom par bya// slob dpon rigs kyi btsor gnas pa'i// rgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs gyes nas// thub pa'i grogs mchog tho gros ldan// tshul bzhin d+ha ni sol ba btab// dbus kyis yi tshar gnas pa// kun 'byung nam mkha' dag
18a6(rnying rgyud): sngags// brjod byung bya'i sa bon pas// dkyil kho ri brtsegs pa sgom par bya// rdo rje brnams pas gzhag cing // byangs pa'i rdo rje na pad+ma maung // rdo rje kyil 'khor thugs dang bcas// zag mtshan dran pa thogs b+h+yaH/ #
18a7(rnying rgyud): rab dang // grar pags thob ma 'ad bcas// gtso bo bar gyi dang drug thos// ba bcas par mi par gsum ba// 'od thos pargyas gams pas// nga gsang me pa rkye gyis ma // mig gzang bkum bar/
18b1(rnying rgyud): sa las 'thon byas te// mthun na bka' nyan tshul du gnas// mchod bstod zhal bsil sogs 'bul zhing // dri khyim las rnams ma rdzogs par// de srid mi 'gyur brtan bzhugs nas// bdud sogs bsgo ba'i ngag bcas mdzad// slob pa sangs/
18b2(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol phyin pa las// lha mo khyod ni dbang du shog/ ji ltar rgyal ba thams cad kyis// bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms mdzad pa// de bzhin bdag gis bdud las kyang // rgyal bar byas pa'i dkyil
18b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor brtsam// de nas slob dpon rgyan rdzogs pade// de de dril 'gyir bcas pa la// dam chog nye bar baphrul ba yi// glu dag phyogs bzhi gnas nas gad ni// rgyal bas 'gro ba'i mgon gyur pa'i// chos kyi le long gas la bskyod// bder gshegs
18b4(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi gsang ba pa// rdo rje gsang bsum dam tshig mchog/ ye shes dri ma med pa'i tshul// grib sogs ma lus bral byed pa'i// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam pa'i dbyings// dkyil 'khor chen po drug cu'i bdag/ theg chen chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdzod// gsang gsum
18b5(rnying rgyud): drug pa'i dbyings// so sor gsal ba'i don bstan pa// rdo rje lta bus gnas kun sbyor// zab cing rgya chen sgra sna tshogs// chos kyi 'khor lo bshad pa'i dus// rgyal po yon tan dpe dang bral// rin chen lhun po'i mdzod mdang ba// nyams dga' thugs rje'i zhing rna
18b6(rnying rgyud): dgongs// bdag med mnyam pa'i ye shes can// phrin las dag pas zad par mdzod// gsang gsum sna tshigs rdo rje'i bdag// rigs mchog shes rab brtson byed cing // spyan bzang dag pas dgro la gzigs// slar nyid khro bo chen po'i bu// zhal lnga phyag man tshogs
18b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i skur gnas te// mgur nas hU~M sgoms smra sgrogs shing // jo rje ba skye ba yis// lha rnams bdag la bsdu byed cing // pa dang ta las byung ba yi// mig gnyis kyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brjid// 'bar zhe thams cad dag tu ser/
19a1(rnying rgyud): skar tad rang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// shangs kyi rlung sbom 'bar ba nus// 'jig rten thams cad 'bar byed pa// dzA rnga'i 'gros las byung ba yi// sna tshogs sa gzhir brtan par byas// oM swam+b+ha ni sam+b+ha hU~M/ gr-ir+N+Na gr-iHdz+haiM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya grah+NA pa ya tA
19a2(rnying rgyud): hUM/ A na ya ha~M thA ga zhan bi d+hA ra nga ya hUM hUM phaT/ phrag gi mtshan mo kun 'khol zhing // khro bo'i dkyil 'khor spro bar byed// hU~M dbang rlung sgra 'i tshogs// gA dod sbyin dri bsrin po dang // sha zag shAn rjem mo'i tshogs// mkha' bre gnod kyi ni ma lus
19a3(rnying rgyud): rnams// gang drags gzhi 'dir gnas pa// srung byed sa yi bdag por bas// zos pa tsam gyis myur bar dengs// nga yi bka' las 'di'am byed// gang zhig gnas pa'i mthu bo che// pad+ma rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ thal ba'i tshogs bzhin drug par byed//
19a4(rnying rgyud): rab 'bar khro bo'i gnas 'asgoms pa'o// pad+ma'i 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis// gal te gang gi dam tshig bcag/ 'dod gsum skye gnas gsal byas te// 'jigs par 'gyur zhing gzhan 'dis med// sa las yongs su bskor byas te// bgegs byed
19a5(rnying rgyud): bya phyir phur bar gdab// oM b+hU tA ya b+hU ta ya sarba duSh+Tan phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha rod Adz+nyA pa ya ti kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ lag pa bskyod cing rkang pa bskyod// ngo mtshar khro bo'i zur mig bzhin// sprin ma khro gter g.yon mdzad cing // kha yi
19a6(rnying rgyud): pad+ma 'dzum bcas pas// so so'i phyag rgya gnas su bskur// 'gyong bag bcas pas zhal la bstod// rta mtshig kho bo'i gar thabs kyis// ni chus dbang dang drag po'i tshul// ba yi rnam lnga dri bsres rgyas// dkyil 'khongs gzhi nyer thugs nas/ na
19a7(rnying rgyud): gnas su dri yi chus// thig le gru bzhir zlum por bya// rang gi sngags dang me tog rnams// so so'i gnas su dgram par bya// dbu rgyan rol mo mchod pa'i tshogs// lha mgon gnas kyi nye 'khor mdzes// dkyil 'khor lha rnams
19b1(rnying rgyud): maspyod cing btod pas mnyas par bya// tsha ga bya lag rnags pa dang // bzod gsol bskang ba don chung du// dil 'drin dpang ba mas// phyogs rnams kun tu bkor ba sa// o brngas hAs mA ma/ maT pAl pa/ brdas na dang / pa mnya/
19b2(rnying rgyud): su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su ho Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hiM me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ taM shre ye ku ru NI/ ha ha ha ha hoH/ b+ha ga wAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ badz+ra mA me mud+d+ha/ bidz+nyA b+ha ba ma hA sa ma yA satwa AH/ gsang sngags rtsal
19b3(rnying rgyud): bla med pa'i// lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang // sdig pa ma lus zad byed cing // las rnams thams cad 'grub par byed// pus mos la btsugs byas te// lag pa g.yas pa smos 'dzin cing // g.yon pas dril bu dkrol byas te// tshig 'dis
19b4(rnying rgyud): gsol ba gdab par bya// oM bder gshegs stobs bcu bcon ldan 'gro ba'i mgon// mi 'jigs la sogs yon tan rtsal med ldan// rigs gnyis thabs kyis brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor // bsnyengs pa mi mnga' thugs rje shugs chen po/
19b5(rnying rgyud): dga' mdzad dbang gi dkyil 'khor tshogs chen la// tshul khrims la sogs phung po mnyes gyur cig/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gtsor byas pa'i// dri bral thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid ni// mnyes pa'i tsho gas rnams kun las rnam grol
19b6(rnying rgyud): zhing // bde legs yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// 'dod yon 'bras bu phun sum tshogs bsgrub dang // 'gro rnams ma lus thugs rjes bzung byed cing // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor rnam dag bya chen com
19b7(rnying rgyud): lags na// mgon po'i bka' drin rjes su brtse dgongs te// khyed kyis rab tu gnas par mdzad ngos lags// me tog dri bzangs phreng sogs 'di bzhes la// ji srid 'gro ba'i don rnams ma grub par// de srid thugs rjes bzung zhing bzhugs
20a1(rnying rgyud): 'thung ba bar// la ldan kyang chub se swA dang // rdzu sams mchog tu da ngas// 'gor mtsho smra dngags// rnas gsumab cu/ u nga po dmas gis// thugs pa da lal kho gas la 'ang dag/ da gan nyid kyang rdza
20a2(rnying rgyud): drus gsum dag tu gakar maH// rdo stong dponal gus shing // dus kun dron yon tan bzang // rnal 'byor gas dang skang kyi// der bran la mig bzhin pa ste// gsang dwags phrag rgya'i rnam pa dag/ brtson pas dus gas mya drang bar bya//
20a3(rnying rgyud): shes par byaba'i byer// rang dang mdzin ma phyo gi sngags// byin brlangs ye shes de rnyed pA \u0f7f// slar yang bdug pa mi tog dang // myu ma dri chab la sogs pa'i// rang kyi gnas su 'jug cing dpral// bkra shrIs byed mchog ngo mtshan// ma
20a4(rnying rgyud): ga 'bras zur bcas// rlon drang 'di 'bru rjes med// chag gas med pa'i tshams shing ni// na cu gzhes rje ngas rgya/ mA~M ma ko gzang brtags pa// sngags chos dri rnas pas bar bya// rigs kyi mtshan rgyang rgyan rlabs pa
20a5(rnying rgyud): oM sar+tha pa gnanu ba d+he sha~M ta na swAd+ha/ paM gyi gsum banas sngags brjod cing// shang du 'angag ra// ba nupa padrang zhing skyed pazhing // des kyang mi ng+gA byung bar bya// rdo rje sta zlas lce bkang zhing // phra ma'i phyogs kyis zung /
20a6(rnying rgyud): gzhi drilas byugs pa ru// phan tshun mI lta dor bar bya// shwa ra la sogs pa'i phyogs kun gyis// zhe sogs dngos grud mtshan ma brtag/ sIn+d+ra thur rab dang 'bring gis lha// mtshams kyis 'jig rten las rnams 'grub// las dag pa
20a7(rnying rgyud): sngags bzlas nas// sbyar zhing byin gyis brlabs byas pa'i// chu gcad dris kyang tshong ba gsum// nye reg 'thong po'i tshul du sbyin// oM tra~M bi shud d+ha sarba d+hasleb pa'i hU~M sha bi sho d+harmas rba ka wAn e nA ya hU~M/ bcing ma'i dasal sa
20b1(rnying rgyud): nas ni// bdag gi gnas sogs 'di dag byin gyis rlobs// de nas slob ma la bos te// kye rigs kyi bu khyod theg pa'i snod// rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung 'di nyon// dang gus dga' ba'i shugs su shog/ kun gyi de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/
20b2(rnying rgyud): ga bzang po 'di bstan bya// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dang // ma byon de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs// de bzhin da lta'i sems can rnams// 'gro la phan phyir gnas bzhugs te// gsang bzab mo bla na med// cho ga bzang po 'di spyod pas// skyes mchog rang gi
20b3(rnying rgyud): gnas nyid du// kun mkhyen ye shes bde chen brnyes// gsang sngags myor ba mnyam med par// pad+ma gar dbang dkyil 'khor gyi// bdud tshogs shin tu mi bzad pa'i// dpung rnams ma lus 'joms par mdzad// de phyir kun mkhyen ye shes kyi// blo gros mchog
20b4(rnying rgyud): 'di khyod kyis kyang // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// kun du sbubs su 'gro bar gyis// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro gsang sngags can// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor so so yi// 'khor lo bzhugs pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun nas sangs su 'gro bar gyis// dpa'
20b5(rnying rgyud): bo dpa' mo 'khor dang bcas// byang chub sems dba'i bdag nyid che// khyang par du yang slong dpon la// rdod rjes snrubs su 'gro bar gyis// de nas legs stor thob ma yis// skyabs 'gro byang sems sdom pa bzung // dkon mchog gsum la rdza ga 'tshal lo// kon
20b6(rnying rgyud): mchog gsum po gzung bar bya// bdag gis sdig pa byas pa dang // bgyid pa rjes su yi ra ba// mgon po'i spyan sngar mchis rgyas ste// de dgra thams cad bshags par brtsi// rgyal ba sras bcas 'khor rnams dang // dang rgyal dgra bcom 'gro rnams
20b7(rnying rgyud): bsgo bathos la sogs pasod rnams le// dadangs rjes su ma nga // rims nyid mngon par sangs rgyas dang // rgyas kyi 'khor ba tur chu du // tshogs phying kya chung sems dpa' la// ba ni rgya byangs du gyi/
21a1(rnying rgyud): ba bang // rlung srung mdud pags ma ldan // ya g+sa cu sngags bzlas d+has// nga yi nga pagasan par bcing // pU shAn+ta ma ma grags dang // bstA ba b+had+has sapa mas// ya rgyam gnas pa gyun pa rlabs pa// rdzas dang san du
21a2(rnying rgyud): byin par bya// oM san du ni ku ru swA hA/ dga' ba'i gtam gyis gzengs bskyod cing // mchod pa gtor ma'i tshogs bcas pas// skye tshogs rnams la bsngo byas nas// bden pa brjod cing ci bder nyal// mi skra dge ba'i sems bcas pas// rmi lam mtshan ma btag par
21a3(rnying rgyud): skar nyid slob dpon nang song ste// dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// lha rnams mchod cing bstod bya ste// dge ba'i sems kyis nyal bar bya// de nas skya rengs shar dus su// slob dpon slob ma lngas 'ongs te// kye kye bzhin bzangs rnams
21a4(rnying rgyud): la rkyen / 'dod pa ma ston/ skye bya sa sa ma / / gsa'i ma sogs dang / 'phyi sa mjug
21a5(rnying rgyud): par bya// dngos rnams mtsha nA pA las grol ba // stong pa chen po ye shes bsgom// rin pon rgyalas byung ba y-i// dum ba mgul ring lto ba zlum// mkhyer zhabs bgeg 'phel ka ze// dri zhimatshon dkar legs grags te// badz+ra'i dkyil 'khor lags
21a6(rnying rgyud): gnas te// so so'i mtshan ma'i yi ge rgyan// nam rgal tham pa la sogs rnams// mchod nas spyan la dgram par bya// rin chen b+ha wA 'bru lnga dang // snying po lnga dang sran lha dang // bkra shis rnga pa wa gzhug par bya// mgul chings gzungs thag kha rgyan
21a7(rnying rgyud): sogs// dam tshig lha rnams gsal byas nas// ye shes sku dang gnyis med par// mchod bstod sngags kyi bzlas pa bya// sngags bcas chu deng gnyis med gnas// dkyil 'khor grub pa'i dus dag tu// rang rang gnas kyi phyogs su dgram// dam
21b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas// ye shes lha dang gnyis med pa'i// thabs dang shes rab 'brel byas pas// dkyil 'khor sa la thig gdab bya// shes rab spyan mdzes bcu drug lon pa 'am// ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang // dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa gnas bya'o//
21b2(rnying rgyud): gtsang ma'i glu las byung ba'i rus// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am// lnga las byung ba'i spyad pa dag/ byin gyis brlab cing bsgril bar bya// stong pa nyid kyis sbyang byas nas// rigs kyi lha ru gnas pa dang // mchod bstod sngags bcas bsgril bar bya// oM badz+ras ma
21b3(rnying rgyud): ya mu tra ma ti kra ma hU~M/ oM AHtrAM/ dzaM gdags pa yi sngags brjod cing // rdo rje slob dpon thugs ka nas// slob mas smin mtshams drang por then// de la gnas kyi nub dang shar// 'od 'phros byang sems thugs rje che// nam mkha' dkyil 'khor da
21b4(rnying rgyud): par+ya lha// rdo rje lte bas phyogs dang mtshams// dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs par bstan// stobs mchog dpa' bo dgongs su gsol// rdo rje thig skud sbyar ldan pas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor legs grub cing // 'gro ba'i 'don la bskul bar mdza
21b5(rnying rgyud): oM a nA na a nu ga ho sarba d+harma pa ra pa ra a nu ga tA sarba a nAn ta/ a pa tA ra sarba d+harma hU~M/ lha rnams mdun du bzhugs 'gyur nas// mchod bstod dbang po'i tshul du dgongs// rdo rje khu tshur sar bzhag cing // shar nas nub tu brkyang ba ma/
21b6(rnying rgyud): tshangs zig dang po gdab byas nas// de bzhin sgo nas tshad kyis ni/ khyer bzhi shin tu legs pa ge zhal// rdo rje lho byang gnyis pa dang // mtshams mi thig rnams gdab par bya// logs TIg gru bzhi mnyam 'gyur nas// brgyad dang bcu drug
21b7(rnying rgyud): dag tu bag/ bar khyams kyi khyams mi gtogs pa'o// gzhan dag ma than pa'i bzhir ba'o// theg gi cho ga rdzogs pa dang // ye shes phreng bas mchong bgod cing // rdo rje khu tshur sngags bcas kyis// rang gi gnas su gshegs pas /
22a1(rnying rgyud): ga rdoH/ dkyil 'khor bdag po'i nga rgyal gyis// mig gnyis ma dang ta las byung bar bsam// dkyil 'khor gnas rnams kun bltas te// sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa yis// sgo dag bzhi po dbye byas nas// cha phran dag kyang blo yis brtag/ rdo rje
22a2(rnying rgyud): skyong ba'i phyag rgya yis// ri mo'i mkhar ni bteg byas te// 'byung 'jug gsang ba'i cho ga dag/ rnal 'byor brtan pa yid kyis byas// oM be gA kra ma hU~M/ pad+ma rang bzhin rnam dag pas// dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i gnas chen po// thugs rje ye shes rnam 'phrul
22a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs// khyab mdzad byin brlabs ston pa'i gtso// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmad du 'byung // ma lus sems can don gyi phyir// pho brang dag par byin gyis brlabs// phyogs mtshams ma lus rnam dag pas// byang chub ye shes
22a4(rnying rgyud): gnas gsal 'gyur// nyon mongs nyes tshogs kun bcom pa'i// thugs rje chen po dri med shugs// ye shes byin brlabs lus byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub par mdzod// rin chen rnam lnga'i phye ma dang // sa tshon la sogs gang 'byor pa//
22a5(rnying rgyud): byin po che yi snod blugs te// dkyil 'khor gnas kyi phyogs lngar bzhug/ sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs byas na// rigs lnga'i skud tshogs yum bcas la// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dbus sogs dang // mchod bstod sngags kyis mnyes par bya// oM ba
22a6(rnying rgyud): tsi ta ma ti sa ma ya hU~M/ dkar mthing ser po ljang gu dang // dmar po'i tshon rnams rim bzhin du// dbang ldan mtshams nas brtsam byas te// pany+tsa rA ga drang bar bye// g.yas pas pad+ma rdo rje bzung // g.yon pas 'dren pa'i las bya'o// de la mchod 'bul
22a7(rnying rgyud): sngags brjod cing // bden pa bdar te dgab par bya// 'di ni chos dbyings rnam par dag/ sems can khams ni rang sgrol byed// dpal ldan pad+ma gar dbang ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// yang dge bden pa'i byin pa rlangs kyis// dkyil
22b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor las rnams shis par mdzad// dbus kyi lte ba nas brtsams te// dang po slob dpon gyis bri zhing // phyis ni ci dgar shes par bri// mtho dman med snyoms drang por bya// de nas mtshan ma rtags bstan te// chud cing smra bas mi 'grub ste// yon
22b2(rnying rgyud): pos gdung ba'i las rnams skye// chad pas slob dpon slob ma dag/ shi tha ma ngan par 'gyur ba yin// lhag dang bcas pas g.yul 'khrugs shing // phyogs 'khrul pa yis spro bar 'gyur// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gnas dag tu// re'u mig
22b3(rnying rgyud): nyi shu rtsa lnga las// bder gshegs gtso bo'i rigs su bcas// phyag rgya'i yi ge mtshan ma bri// phyi rol pa d+ma'i 'dab gnas la// nyi shu rtsa bzhi tshogs rnams la// byang sems khro bo bcas pa dag/ shar nas rim bzhin bri bar bya// kyi dang nang gi mtshams rnams
22b4(rnying rgyud): su// mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad rnams bzhag/ bar khyams bskal bzangs sems dpa' rnams// sgo bzhir khro bo'i tshogs gzhag go// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus song ste// bder gshegs 'od zer snang ba yi// pad+mo rdo rje dril bcas pas// rang gi kha da
22b5(rnying rgyud): tshon bcas bzhag/ de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la// tshe mtha' yas dang chos dbang byung // chags med 'od dang spyan dgu' ba'i// bad brtsegs pad+ma'i phreng ma dang // pad gnas rin chen glegs pa ma rin chen phreng // rang mdog sngags kyis brgyan pa bzhag/ shar
22b6(rnying rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bde bar gshegs pa mi bu sbyor ba// rdo rje dril bu'i sngags bcas pas// ra dr-i gi 'od bcas gdan la bzhag/ de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la// 'brug spa dri ma med pa'i rigs// mngon par snang mdzad bstan dbang phrag
22b7(rnying rgyud): chags shing rin chen pad spangs pa// rin po che yi dra ba ste// rim bzhin rang mdog sngags kyis brgyan// lho yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// bdeng gshegs rin po che sbyangs kyis// rin chen brtsegs dang dril bu la// rang mdog sngags kyis mtshan
23a1(rnying rgyud): // byas pa'o// de yi shar phyogs de'u mig pa// na mA mu ba'i mdzod dang dra ba can// dkon mchog tshul mtshan rin chen tog/ rin chen gling bu rin chen phreng // rin chen rgyal mtshan rin chen bum// rang gi 'od bcas sngags kyis brgyar// nub
23a2(rnying rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// bder gshegs kun du snang ba'i 'od// 'khor lo dril bu mtshonA ma la// rang 'od sngags kyis mtshan pa bri// pad+mo rigs kyi 'khor lo'i tshad// byang gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// bder gshegs don yod
23a3(rnying rgyud): grub pa yi// rdo rje sna tshogs dril bu bsdams// rang gi sngags dang kha dog gsal// de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la// brtson 'grus dang ni shugs chen po// gnod sbyin 'dul ba sna tshogs dbang // gya gram phreng dang pad+ma phreng // rdo rje gdengs po zla kham can//
23a4(rnying rgyud): 'od 'phros sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'i// mtshams kyi re'u mig bzhi rnams la// 'od 'phros pad+ma 'dzin pa dang // pad+ma gnon dang phrad skyong dang // me long rin che nu thong ba dang // pi wang gar gyi phyag rgyal// rang 'od sngags kyis mdzes par bya// phyi rol pad+ma'i
23a5(rnying rgyud): shar brtsams te// rigs kyi byang sems bzhi bzhir gnas// bde ba'i blo gros rgya mtsho'i sgra// gzi mdangs dang ni 'khor lo yi// na ma mu pa'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo rin po che// pad lhag 'khor lo dbyug pa rnams// rang 'od sngags kyi mtshan mar
23a6(rnying rgyud): gnas// shes rab snang bu rdo rje rgyal// 'od zer 'phro ba d+mag shul gyi// rin chen phung po rin chen gdugs// pad+ma'i sdong po 'od srung bri// dri ma'i tshogs dang sgyu ma 'phrul// rin chen rgyal po dra ba can// rin chen ri bo rgya bram mi// lag bzangs gser 'od
23a7(rnying rgyud): 'phro ba dang // rin tshon skyes chos mthong dang // pad+ma rgya grom glegs pas dang // bslang snang ba'o gachaH// dri ming mun pa sel ba dang // dga' ba dbyings dang gzhon nu yi// chu shel nor bu'i phreng ba dang // sprin pa mgras gyi// de ni rigs d+ma'e/
23b1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' ste// rang 'od sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'i// de mthar khro bo bzhi rnams kyi// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bri byas te// sprin bdag smra ba'i dbang phyug dang // rtse gsum rin can rtse dgu dang // dbyig pa rtsa gcig ral gro'o// gru chad mchod pa'i lham badz+ra//
23b2(rnying rgyud): 'dug spos me tog mar me dri// phyi rol bar khyams gnas dag la// phyogs re sems dpa' bzhi bzhi ste// rdo rje rnam snang gar mkhan dang // blo yi rgya mtsho thogs med bkod// rdo rje mtshan ma gsang sngags bcas// rang 'od gnas gdan dag la bri// pad+mo dga' ba'i
23b3(rnying rgyud): sa la dbang // rin chen spungs pa sprin gyi phreng // rin chen mtshan ma sngags dang bcas// rang 'od gdan la gnas pa bri// yid 'ong me tog sgron ma dang // spos brtsegs kha lo sgyur ba dang // pad+ma'i mtshan ma sngags dang bcas// rang 'od gdan la gnas
23b4(rnying rgyud): par bri// dran dbang pad+ma'i blo gros dang // las byed snying po'i blo gros dang // rgya gram mtshan ma sngags dang bcas// rang 'od gdan la gnas par bri// shar sogs pa yi sgo rnams su// khro bo'i 'jigs pa'i rgyal pa yi// rdo rje rgya gram rdo rje gdengs// rin chen dbrug
23b5(rnying rgyud): pa pad+ma phreng // rang gi yi ge gdan gnas pa'i// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bri bar zla// rtogs pa'i rgyan dang phreng ba dang // 'dod yon lha mo la sogs pa'i// rgyan rnams pad+ma rdo rje dang // rin chen 'khor lo rgya gram zi// 'phro bas mtshan ma kha dog lnga// nyi shu rtsa
23b6(rnying rgyud): 'or bcas pa'o// phyi rol rta babs drab sogs// b+han d+ha dril bu nyi shu bzhi// gdugs dang bum pa bla yi phreng // dpag bsam rdzing bu dang pa dang // nyi zla me long rgyal mtshan lnga// chos kyi 'khor lo ri dgas rnams// mdzes byas phyi mtha' pad+ma dang // rdo rje mo 'od
23b7(rnying rgyud): mtshon gyis bskor// dbus mig kha dog nyi shu lnga// ngad phreng dmar po bar byams dkar// sgo bzhi'i rin chen sna bzhi pa// gru chad gser gyi kha dog can// mchod pa lnga dang bum dgram zhing // bla rgyan na bza' phyogs rgyan bri// me tog com du sngags bcas pa/
24a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa gnas su dgus par bya// gtor ma'i tshogs mang sbyar byas nas// phyi rol phyogs dang mtshams su dbod// skra yi ting 'dzin gsapa byas pas// dkyil 'khor shes pa'i las 'grub 'gyur// de nas lha rnams brjod byas te// rdo rje bad+mod pa
24a2(rnying rgyud): tshig gzhug/ thugs ka'i sngags kyis dbug byas pa'i// mgron rnams rnam par 'gyur ba dang // dam tshig sngags kyis bsgral mus shing // rang gi phrin las bcol bar bya zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa blan med pa la
24a3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba dpal nam thogadong pa'i rgyad chen po las gzugs brnyan bskum pa'i le'u ste bdud pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems pa'i gtso// rdo rje 'chang sogs mapa 'gyur nas// dz+wal bsar par bskul ba mdzad// kun don thugs de chen po 'i shugs/
24a4(rnying rgyud): ngas gsang sdigs stong rnams kyis// dkyil 'bar rjen po gang 'jug pa// dbang 'byung chul bzhin des thar// de bzhin ba tu gnas pagang // bde TIgazhananan gyi yan lag bcu// sbyin skyeg pas para'i lung gas// ci bgapa
24a5(rnying rgyud): cher ldan pas// ma lus gdul bya kun gyi gling // dus 'di snad bar mdzad nas kyang // dz+yo dwe'i yar+tha lug rgyas pa gsungs// dri nas byang chub sems tshogs kyis// gus par gzung ste sprad par bgyi// de nus bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang // phyag
24a6(rnying rgyud): shes rab ba skyed cing // rab tu dge' bo'i bzhin rgyas pa// rigs rnams kun la gzigs mdzad de// mchog gas/ sa sbyin pa'i zhes bya ba'i// don di btu banas par mdzad// byang chu bu sems do lda pa // ma 'or gdul bya bang na
24a7(rnying rgyud): gis// gnyis mau gas dpa'i theg pa 'di// spen pa'i lam la 'jug nga pas// shes mashes pa'i las rnams kyis// ra rje thob pon ma bu byas nas// ping dang yang du gsol btab // kyil 'khor gsang ba'i don drug /
24b1(rnying rgyud): bsngal las bskal phyir// byang chub sems mchog kyu chen blos// kyi nang 'byor pa'i yo byad dag/ thams cad byang chub don du bsngos// 'dod chags rnam dag pad+ma'i dbyings// chos kun gyis ni de bzhin nyid// ye shes sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ de ring nga
24b2(rnying rgyud): 'od don chen gnyer// oM u ta ka ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/ pad+ma dga' ba'i sku mchog mnyes// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i gnas// mtshan dpe phun sum tshogs pa yi// bder gshegs sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje chen pos gzhan rnams 'joms// mi shes
24b3(rnying rgyud): dri ma kun sel ba'i// thugs mchog gsang ba'i chos mthar phyin// rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang sngags snying po gsang ba'i chos// rab snang pad+ma'i dbyings nas 'phrul// byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan
24b4(rnying rgyud): rin chen char 'bebs shing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal 'gyur ba// dpal mchog bkra shis phun sum tshogs// theg pa che la phyag 'tshal lo// kun du gnas 'gyur khyab pa po// las mdzad rdo rje dam tshig mchog/ mi mthun gnas rnams rab 'joms
24b5(rnying rgyud): mdzad// rdo rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas nyid du// dbang bskur gsang ba las byung ba// dam tshig ye shes rab grub mdzod// shes rab chos nyid las 'phrul pa'i// rjes su 'jug pas
24b6(rnying rgyud): snying rje'i tshogs// yang dag bden pa las byung ba'i// byin brlabs 'dod pa thams cad rdzogs// bder gshegs srul pa'i tshig tshogs ni// dbang bsgyur rdzogs mdzad pa yi rigs// me tog phreng ba la sogs pas// slob ma banyan par byas nas ni// phyi
24b7(rnying rgyud): phyogs stegs bu la bzhag ste// gtor ma phyogs kun las byin nas// kun la gsol 'debs bsgo bya zhing // slob ma gzhug pa nyid du bya// ras gtsang dmar po'i rgyu las byung // gnas gzhan ma spyad ma nyams par// rang gi sngags kyis byin brlabs nas// legs
25a1(rnying rgyud): su / sa
25a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// slob ma ngag la skar smras pa// gas sngags sem mdzon dzi na ci zung ba dka' bam// da kyis brgya ba did pa rnams// oM rnams pa man sbyi nas/ spyod marnags gangs na maso// ma nardzags ba sa/
25a3(rnying rgyud): pas kyiskye smos phyipo sapa'o/ ma brnam sa/ thugs mtshad pam da
25a4(rnying rgyud): dgongs// bdag gis byang chu bdo gto bas// kyil 'khor gnas sum sa/ pa la dra shes 'das po drang byed/ bdag ca zhugs par mam mas
25a5(rnying rgyud): bshegs 'asogs rgyas// nga du du
25a6(rnying rgyud): rje yis// gas pa'i mamangonas pa // sel ba nang du 'i dzag par/ canan gtas gas / nas gas pa'i gnas grags pa
