25b1(rnying rgyud): bar byung ba dang // dam tshig gsus sgrogs su bud cing// rdo rdza gsang pa'i rnam grags shig/ phyag rgyas sngags kyi gnas gsum snang// oM N+Dal bkun kyi spyod nyid na// byin gyis brgyag cing brtan mdzad pyas// yang+ga gang dbang dpal 'khor 'dir// bdag padang
25b2(rnying rgyud): gsangs pa dang // dang med partson 'bras nyams pa dang / yod par shes rababyung ba dang // grod ma tug 'dzin la gnas la// srog gi phyir yang babad mibya// bde ng+gA mgron po pa 'changs/ khyod kyi skyeng gzhugs pan// sang ba'i zhes dang dzin
25b3(rnying rgyud): da// yod sa
25b4(rnying rgyud): du
25b5(rnying rgyud): pad+ma bya/ rnaMs ni mtshan pa'i rtags mthong 'gyur// \u0f88\u0f90 ya ye shes rdzogs pacur gsum// gsung gi ye shes gsang ba brjod// thugs kyi ye shes mngon shes gasngal// sngags gsum mug cas brtan par gnas// 'dren pa'i ye shes byin brlab
25b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'kho rigs kyi lha gang yin// bdag gis bskal pa Ni lta par// dus 'dir dbab par mdzad par rigs// nor sra phreng ba gar byab pa// rigs de rang gi dam tshig nyid// sngags dang phreng ba ma lus pa// slar nyid de la sgren bur bya// gzir gyi
25b7(rnying rgyud): thur ma byin brlabs pas// ma rigs ldongs pa'i ling tog bsal// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// khyod kyi mig 'byed brtson par mdzad// ma rig bsgribs g.yogs pasal mdzad nas// bco stan lazang dri ma meng // oM badz+ras/ nyon dra bre
26a1(rnying rgyud): sh+tsa phaT/ rdo nas gdong g.yogs bsal byas nus// dkyil 'khor gsal ba brtan par bya// legs pad ltas zhag b+h+yothos te// sngon gyi thal ba la sogs rnams// gsang sngags byung po dkyil 'khong 'dir// lags par zhugs te bung/
26a2(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin// me tog gar la bab pa yi// lha de rigs kyi dam tshig yin// shar po sgo srung nas brtsams te// gtso bo'i bar du dkyil 'khor bsten// zhal zas na bza' la sogs pas// b+h+ya mran+do ldan mnyes par bya// pi da ma lha swA phyag rgya sogs//
26a3(rnying rgyud): gsar ba'i ming dang bzlas par bstan// de ring dus nas bzung byas te// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas thob par// rab ri ba tha ma'i blo ldan pas// dus kun du ni gzung bar bya// kye maho mo gros rgya mtsho'i granas// 'gro la bslab pa'i don brtson la// khyod klubs
26a4(rnying rgyud): pad+mal btud de// pho brang grong mchog nyams dka' 'dir // dbang bskur ba yi rin chen mdzod// snang mdzad lus la bab pa lags// rigs bzhin thugs rje brtse dgangs pas// dri ma'i skyon sol byin brdabs mdzod// gding bang mdzad pa'i dus
26a5(rnying rgyud): lugs pas// slob pa'i sku mchog thob pang mdzod// shar gyi sgo phyogs khru do'i rgyab// dbang bsnyen dgrel 'khor dbus kyi chad// pad+ma 'dag brgyad ni dang bcas// dmang po'i tshon gyis legs byugs te// seng ge'i khri bshams pad+mod bams
26a6(rnying rgyud): 'khong pos sgyur rtsal rgya lu gyis gzhag/ kyi bong gdugs mdzes rtsa l-I mtshan gri pas// dud dang zangs du sil tan num mo// rdol cha mtshad na phyogs ma thams dgod// t+yan phreng gos kyis legs pakrangs pa// dri mang gas bcas yus kang dang /
26a7(rnying rgyud): grwa yis dag par bya// oM ma hA bi da tA rgan ta na hU~M phaT/ de nas rigs kyi lhang babyed de// bkra shis dag pa'i bla bras shing // rol mo rgyan phreng bkod byis te// dus la'i chu yis dbang bsrung bya// da yi phyir ni slob grags dang // bag chag sto mongs
26b1(rnying rgyud): nas// b+ha yi chu rgyan dag pa'i mthus// pe shes phung po dbang phyug mchog/ oM pA yi mu ni dag pa'i rtsa// rdo rdzogs gsul gnas las byung // byung semasA b+hA yis phyogs rnams dang // dbang bsrung ba yis don rdzob brjod// yon tan rin mdu rnam dag mchog// rig du
26b2(rnying rgyud): lnga'i sgra rtsod byas pa yi// dbu kyan bzang po'i cod pan bcas// kun 'byung rin chen phung po mchog/ hri yon tan ma btsas pa yi rgyan// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed// khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po che// mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzob kun/
26b3(rnying rgyud): sa rdo rje tse lnga pa// 'od srung ljags kyis brgyan byas pa'i// rtogs ma tshogs rnams kun las rgyal// bder gshegs thugs gcig pas// khams gsum gnas rnams dor mi mdzad// byang sems rdo rje rtse lnga pa// rang rig ye shes gnas gsal byed/
26b4(rnying rgyud): chos rnams skye ba med pa'i don// sgra brjod dngos po brag ca bzhin// stong pa'i dril bu gsung rang bzhin// de la sde sna tshogs rgya chen tshogs// hi chos kud kyu las rnam grol zhing // de bzhin ched med 'bras bu'i tshogs// rang bzhin pad+ma dag pa'i dbyings// nges pa'i theg
26b5(rnying rgyud): pa ston byed gsung // kye ho rdo rje che ge mo// rigs kyi mtshan gyis dbang bsgyur te// chos sku 'od gsal bde ba che// bad+ma'i spu dbyangs ming dang bcas// oM phyag cu chen po gsang ba'i gnas// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// mi mthun la sogs bcom byas
26b6(rnying rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs/ oM badz+ra pad+mo a b+hi Shid+ha mi/ oM ra NA mu ku Ta a b+h+ye tid+h+waM hUM/ oM a ti pa tI d+hi a d+hi Shidz+dza ha~M/ yon mche ge mo a d+hi Shi d+ha mi/ slob dpod lha la rab gus pas// tshogs bcas yon tan bzung byed cing // rdo rjedam
26b7(rnying rgyud): ga pa yi san// mig gi 'bras bu bzhin du bskyad// 'di dge la gus spyong bying po/ srogi rdo rje gdum pos 'jog/ sngags rnams dus su brjod byadang / ga tu srung du bcing ba bya// gas ba'i tshig dang mtshan tshogs// dag tu
27a1(rnying rgyud): b+hAs te// bdud ce lakho na sogs rnams// mdam par shes pas rgyu du d+hA// rdo drug b+ha drug skabs pa pa// baN+Dal lpags gnas byas dak+sha k+sha b+h+ya// byung sa klu rang pa sa// dus nag rnams das gas da
27a2(rnying rgyud): rdo dri gyi phyag \u0f7f// gnas gisum brtul zhugs la gnas shing // lung brtan rdzos gzung dbyug pa 'dor byeg// cho ga bzang po ldan par bya// de na rje rje slob po tshig/ don d+han dba' ring gnas dza ba 'gyur// ral bu 'phyag rgya// yang
27a3(rnying rgyud): dgra sngags kyis byin parlabs te// ma 'ongs bzung ba'i blo gnas pas// gsang dwa di dam gyi/ rjes su byung // oM s+yarbad+hathA gra ta swa ra pra tra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M// oM pu shrI pad+mo pA d+hA a/ oM ma hA pad+mo swA hA sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya prA ka ts+yaid+hahU~M phaT// mchod pa bkra
27a4(rnying rgyud): shes brdung la glags// dargyal zhugs mchog tu gyur pa yin// bdag dang gzhan gyi don phyor bang // dngos grub rgyan mong cho ga'i las// ni gyis dbang dang dgug pa dang // du mongs bskang po'i chog dang // gas pa lce sogs pas rnams kuH// gas
27a5(rnying rgyud): kyil 'khor 'di yi tshul// khyod kyis gang 'dod grub pa bgyis// de nas rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor rab stong pas// 'khor ba'i chos rnams zil gnon cing // phyogs b.rung dam chos gsung snyoms shing // pha rol gyi jug gnas
27a6(rnying rgyud): 'phags te// smre 'dogs the tshom gcod par byed// l+r-ing brtan pa der gshegs pas bcas kyis// rigs mchog mdzad pa blan med// rgyal ba kun gyis lung bsnyen mdzad// khams ga bcas kun las da chags thal ba
27a7(rnying rgyud): 'ami gsum byed na gag rje dang / sa du da mardzogs thel bu rgyad byis dpa 'a bang / sa/ kyadang / myang kyib bu ba / ra byag
27b1(rnying rgyud): ga kun sgru bsungs pa pad// dkun mas spyan la pang bdugapa// dkyib 'byong la gas pa sa// dadagu dgas so/ pa / dang du bas tshul la / tugs na na // na na ma dag
27b2(rnying rgyud): des ni grib sogs kun spangs shing // mchog gnas ye shes gsal bar sbyor// bde chen gsang ba'i theg pa che// tshe'i de byang chub 'grub par byed// nyon mengs dag sogs las grol ba'i// bde ba chen po'i gnas thob pa'o// de nas lha dang ba zugs bdir
27b3(rnying rgyud): rnam dag de ting brtad bya ste// mthod kyi dru gtor chags mgron gnyed cing // bcu shes 'gro ba'i tshogs bsagasaH// rmang yang slob ma po ldan pas// bong 'chog tham la phul te// baN+Dal mchod pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// nyes bya ga
27b4(rnying rgyud): ba gdab par b+ha// shes rab phran lag phun su ma tshogs// bcu drug pa rnyan nyi shu ba ni// rdo rje bla ma lA rdul D+h+we// byin gyis brdabs pa cho ga b+ha// khrus byas dri zhim cad kyis bkrabs// sna tshogs sngags dang phyag byas byud// rigs kyi sku dang lda
27b5(rnying rgyud): pas// dam tshig bskul ba'i brdas mngon te// gnyis med yo shes snyoms 'jug bya// byang chub sems kyi chu sman gyis// rang gi dkyil 'khor mchod byas pas// slob pod tshogs la dbang yang bsrung // de ltar tshul bsras mchog gis// dru
27b6(rnying rgyud): pa bya rnams rgya ma mdzad pa'i// gaN+DIs med pa shes gsang ba'i don// dbub pa'i rgya// tshu las byung ba'i// a pa~M n-i// oM AHhU~M/ a to mra ka dang sho gnas/ \u0f7fma pang byad // dky-i la kho kun la na bas//
27b7(rnying rgyud): ba salung rkyod ba dris pa/ sa'i phreg rgyas yu ga sag 'ang ba'i dri bu na po rgya // tid ma bar 'bya'o/ em ta bu ba'i gnas 'dang/
28a1(rnying rgyud): nga las gzhad du // dadan can pa smras pas// g+han byu shA ba yang med// gan s+ho/ ts+tsha/ 'du // rnal 'a thang ban // dang ga rang bad da// da
28a2(rnying rgyud): sreg gsang ba'i don// khyed rnams kun la phying bshad de// dkyil 'khor chen po phyogs bzhi 'am// gzhan yang gnas gzhan gang 'thud par// ni rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod drang // las kun pa yi thab khung bsdam// zlum po khyu gang na kham dang /
28a3(rnying rgyud): gsum sna tshogs dbyibs can te// de dag dkar ser dpar dang dag/ sna bzhi kun gyis mdzan pa'o// rdo rje 'khor lo pa ng+ka'i d+hAd// sna tshogs rdo rje mtshan cha can// khwa gang bzhi drang gnyis yod dang // khru gsum de yi zhabs su myong// blang shing yang
28a4(rnying rgyud): shed so so yi// mtshan nyid lo 'bras kha dog go// rtse mo cha las song bzhi dang // sor brgyad bcu drug nyi shu'i tshad// sbams pa'i so so'i med gyis byug/ rim bzhin rtsa ba bud la ni// zlu ma dang gru bzhi blag ma dang // gru gsum grol du bajig par
28a5(rnying rgyud): sgra rnams kun gyi khang pa nyid// me yaM gnas su gzhag byas te// so so'i las dang mthun pa ste// a ga na~M tsAH bod par bya// g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgyas gabab// g.yon pa bzang phreng gzung bar bya// oM e h+ye nyi yag ne ye ma hA pa ba nyi/
28a6(rnying rgyud): pos gsung bya ste// me lha'i gdan ma chod pad+ma dbul// de rjes mchod pa rnam lda du// sreg rngu sna ma lus dbul byas nas// glu rnams mchod pa'i phyag tshad du// stod cing gsol ba gdab par bya// g.yas g.yon dgar gzung
28a7(rnying rgyud): bcud 'dzag pa'i rnam grangs dbul// oM ma dz+ra a na la ma hI b+hU tA badz+ral ba s+phi ku ru hU~M sar+b+ba duSh+TAn hU~M phaT// me lha mchod pa'o// oM ma Na ku ru pany+tsa NA~M/ dgang blugs dbul ba'i sngags so// oM sarba bad+ha ha na badz+rata/ bya'o//
28b1(rnying rgyud): oM sarba a b+ha ye dz+yo swA hA// bam shing ngo // oM badz+rA d+hA dza me b+ha ga lo ke shwa hU~M/ 'jig rten dbang phyug bya ba'i mchod pa'o// oM d+hu pe ti ba pu shu g+han d+he sbyar ba'i mchod pa rnams so// oM a pra ti badz+rA ya swA hA// ku sha'i'o// oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA// dAdUr bangango //
28b2(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang rdzas rnams gang tshogs pa// rang ming yi ge gsum sngags dbul// de nas dkyil 'khor kun mchod cing // 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gad pa// sdig bshags bag chags kun byas pas// lha yi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// tha ma me lha mchod byas
28b3(rnying rgyud): nas// phrin las so so'i sngags brjod cing // oM badz+ra na ma sarba ta thA ga ta hr-id pa ma ku rA dz+riM// lha rnams gshegs su gsol zhing / dam tshig lha la bsdu bar bya// de nas rab gnas bzang po ni// 'gro la phan phyir bshad par bya// sa phyogs nyams dga'
28b4(rnying rgyud): mdzes pa ru// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor legs byas te// mchod rdzas rdzas kyis mnyes byas nas// slob dpon chas su gzhug par bya// dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgrubs byas nas// rten tshogs sbyang ba'i cho ga bya// ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs
28b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun// dga' ldan gnas nas gshegs mdzad de// lha mo sgyu ma'i lhums zhugs nas// de bzhin 'dir yang bzhugs su gsol// dkon mchog gnas 'dir bzhugs nas kyang // me tog la sogs mchong bzhes la// 'di don gzung bar bya ba
28b6(rnying rgyud): dang // byang chub sems mchog spel bar mdzod// nang par rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal// skyob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // khyod rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// bcom ldan bdag ni grub pa la// bka' drin cho ga mdzad par 'os// de nas gnas
28b7(rnying rgyud): rnams kun sbyangs nas// 'gro drug gnas kun sgrol byed pa// thams cad dus 'dir dgongs su gsol// byang chub sems dpang dgra bcom dang // gsang ba'i sngags ldan lha rnams kun// 'jig rten mchod pa'i don phyir ro// rab gnas bzang por 'osapa
29a1(rnying rgyud): lags// de nas gnas rnams kun sbyangs nas// byin gyis brlabs pa rdzogs byas te// rang gi dkyil 'khor rnga lta bar// dbang bskur cho ga rdzogs byas nas// spyan sreg gtor ma la sogs gtad // zhes gsungs so// de btun gshegs
29a2(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las la ma khyad par du 'phags pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bdud gyi rgyal po
29a3(rnying rgyud): shin tu mya ngan skyes te/ kye ma'o ho sangs rgyas 'dir ni bdag gi gnas la sogs pa bcom zhing rlag par byed na thabs ji lta bur gdul bar bya// 'on kyang 'di nyid la ni bdag che yang bya ba'i gnas med/ shin tu dman par gyur pa dag dang mtshungs par
29a4(rnying rgyud): 'gran nas/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gsum pa 'di dag ni/ srid pa mi sreg brlag par bya ba'i phrin las yin pas/ thams cad la bka' bsgo zhing / las ngan pa 'di dag la bzlog par bya'o zhes bsam mo// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi gnam na mthu che ba
29a5(rnying rgyud): dang / dbang dang gzi rjid thams cad 'dus nas/ kye khyed rnams badrag la nyon cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ni/ rgyal po gcig gi dbang du ma gnas na/ thams cad sring ba 'jig par 'gyur ro// des na grogs thams cad 'khor 'ang bzlas pa ngas
29a6(rnying rgyud): la/ bdag gi bka' nyan par mdzod cig ces bsgrags so// de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi drag byed chen po'i tshogs kyis rang rala'i mu 'phrul bstan cing smras pa/ khyed ji lta bu'i dmyal can cig yin/ der rnams re res kyang 'khor dpag tu med pa song ba'i rgyal
29a7(rnying rgyud): yin pas/ yul 'khor grangs med pa la dbang byed cing / gzhan gyi re gnas dam par gyur pa lags pas khyod dang zhi ba la gnas na legs so zhes mthun par brjod pas/ bdud kyi rgyal po yang shin tu nyon mongs pas byas te gzhan dag pa sbas pa/
29b1(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten 'di dag kun// nga yi bka' las gnas pa yin// skye 'gro ma lus gang dag kun// rgyal ba'i bka' gas nyan par gyis/ khams gsum bdag po lha yi lha// sa rnams kun gyis steng pa// bdag ni mthu dang lnga 'daphral tshad// kun gyis 'gran par
29b2(rnying rgyud): nus ma yin// nga yi bka' las 'da' byed na// srog srid brlag cing gnas kyang 'thor// zhes brjod do// de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal pos/ rang gi 'khor dpag ta med pa bsdus te/ de dag gi dbus nas sran po chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i khro bor gnas nas/ 8
29b3(rnying rgyud): gi mthu las sprul pa'i khro bo dang / mtshon cha'i tshogs spro bar mdzad do// de bzhin du khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang / ting gi re te dang / gzhon du gdong drug pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang dpa
29b4(rnying rgyud): rgyu med pa bsdus te/ de dag gi 'bras na 'gying zhing sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab par spros te/ dbang dang rdzu 'phrul ston to// ri rab kyi kha khyer la gnas pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang rang rang gi 'khor gyi dbas na 'gying zhing mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ston par mdzad
29b5(rnying rgyud): do// gser gyi ri la gnas pa'i phyogs skyong brgya byin dang / dbang ldan dang / gshin rje dang / bden bral dang / chu lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / nyi ma dang / sa'i lha rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi gnas dang bcas par 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha dang bcas par 'khod
29b6(rnying rgyud): do// nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / mig dmar dang / phur bu dang / pa ba sangs dang / srin pa dang / gza' chen po rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas pas 'jigs pa'i khro bo'i tshogs dang / mtshon char bcas pas 'khod // mtha' yas
29b7(rnying rgyud): 'jog po dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / rigs ldan dang / nor rgyas dang / dud skyong dang / pad+ma dang / chu lha rnams kyis rang rang gi g.yog 'khor rnams dang / 'jigs pa'i sprul bas 'khod do// de bzhin du khams gsum gyi ngogs byed kyi tshogs gnas
30a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / grub byam dang / 'tha ba drug gzab dbang kyi zhing mahA yod pa rnams dang / ma mo rnams dang / gshin rje dang / lha mA yin rnams dang / 'dab brdangs dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / rgyu
30a2(rnying rgyud): kye tshogs su bcas pa rnams kyis byang rang rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyi mtshon cha dang nga ro dang bcas pas rnam par 'phrul zhing 'khod do// de nas bdud kyi rgyal po yang nyon mongs pa skyes te// rang gi 'khor
30a3(rnying rgyud): rnams 'dra byar mdzad cing rdzu 'phrul gyi nus pa ci yod pa dus 'di dag gcig tu ston nas/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang nas drag po 'bar bar 'jigs pa'i skud ston to// khro mo'i tshogs dang grol ba mdza' pa lags/
30a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i tshogs mtshon tshwa me 'od bcas pa phyogs bcur smos te nam mkha' thams cad grang bar byas nas thog ser na ngang chub ma thams cad skyes so// des 'jig rten gyi lha kun myos shing rmongs par gyur pa dang // 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyis
30a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad nas/ 'khor ba'i me 'od 'bar bya'i mtshon ches bas cing gtungs pa las/ so so'i tshigs med par gyur te/ rang gi snying po phul zhing skyabs su gsol lo// de nas sgra thams cad 'du bar byed pa'i bdud kyi rje de dag la mnas dor zhing dum tshig
30a6(rnying rgyud): byin te/ so so'i snying po spangs te/ 'khor tshogs thams cad rje dpon dang bral te/ lha chen po brgyad ni rang po rje la 'bor // rgal po chen po bzhini shar rtsi gleng la 'bod do// gnod phyin dang / phyogs tshong dag ni shar gyi gling phran gnyis su 'khod do// 'gro ba
30a7(rnying rgyud): drug gi sems can rnams ni lhor dgod do// dri za dang ma mo rnams ni lho'i grong phran la dgod do// lha ma yin rnams ni nub tu dgod do// gshin rje dang 'ad ba bzang ba dang srin po rnams ni nub kyi srong gi gleng phran gnyis la dgod ngo // gza' dang na rna
30b1(rnying rgyud): ni byang du dag dang// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa gsang ba can med pa 'as/ bdud pa sprus pa bstan pa'o// nganas bdud rtsal bad nyid shan sa dag 'gang 'khor thams cad la bka' bgag// rgyal po gnag ga 'bar du gnas pa na/
30b2(rnying rgyud): yid dang mthun par spyod pas gnas pa yin pas/ khyed rnams kyis kyang ngas ci ltar brko ba'i bka' bzhin ston la/ thar pa'i lam 'di stong la/ ston pa gzhan la gus par ma byed cig/ kho bo'i 'jig rten stongs par 'ong ngo // bsam pa rgya chen po med pa'i 'gro ba
30b3(rnying rgyud): 'di dag ni/ gti mug can gyi rang bzhin te// byol song lta bu yin pas/ bde legs kyi gnas thob pa'i don med pa yin no// yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ k+She 'du shes med pa'i 'gro ba dag/ rang gi bde ba spong byed cing // thar pa'i lam gzhan
30b4(rnying rgyud): sgrub byed pa/ de dag 'khrul pas rang rgyud brlag/ nyes 'dod pade legs spong byed pa// mongs pas 'gro rnams snying re rje// re zhig thugs rjeska la ldan pas// bdag gi 'khor du 'dus pa yin// gnas gzhan gong ma thob 'dod pas/ bdag la dang sems
30b5(rnying rgyud): gus par gyis shig ces bsgo'o// de dag gis kya nga ltar nyan te// ring rang gi gnas shor zhing mya ngan gyisems skyes byung tsaM ltar bya ba'i thabs med de/ de ltar 'khor cing gnas so// de nas bdud kyi rgyal po rang gi gnas su song ste/ 'khor dang
30b6(rnying rgyud): bcas pa rnams dgra' ba'i longs spyod 'dod pa'i yon tan la spyod cing // dgyes pa'i glu gaR+Sha dang rol mo la spyod do// dri ltar khams gsam ldan gyi bdag po ni bdag yin pas 'di las skrag pa'i bsgrub bya ni gzhan dag yod par bdag gis ma mthong
30b7(rnying rgyud): ngo // nga sangs rgyas kyi tshogs dang byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang bdag gi dbang du bstan thabs ci ltar brtsam zhing // rang gi 'khor dag la yang 'dre bar byed do// de nas bdud kyi grong khyer kun la bsgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor rnams pa mi dge ba'i
31a1(rnying rgyud): lhas dang mtshan ma ngan pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyi bsgrub pa thams cad du rab tu 'chad cing // cha 'dod pa rnams la grub par bya na bdag cag la mos pa byed do// de'i rjes la dadag gu gtso bo rnams bdag gi 'khor du 'das pa'i cha thabs sna tshogs
31a2(rnying rgyud): kyi sgo nas gdul bar bya'o// gal te 'ongs par ma nus pa bdag ni kho rong gi gnas de nyid dang bcas pa gzhom par bya'o zhes brjod do// de'i stong gsum g.yo bar byed pa'i tshogs kyi khro bo'i mtshon cha'i tshogs dang bcas pa sprul nas/ dkar po'i rigs la dga'
31a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'gro ba rnams ma lus bcom zhing / sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang brlag par bshams pa las/ bden pa'i mthu gang la gnod par ma gyur to// de nas rab tu khros te/ bdag gi khams gsum 'di dus gcig tu gdul bar bya
31a4(rnying rgyud): spyod pa la/ ngan pa'i tshul can g.yo sgyu dang bcas pa 'di dag mi 'dul lam/ de rung gi sde tshan 'og ma la gnas pa kun bskul te/ thar pa'i lam la gnas pa 'di drag rigs kyis gdul bar bya'o zhes brjod do// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa bsgo bar mdzad
31a5(rnying rgyud): pa dang / de dag gis kyang rang rang gi sprul pa dang / mtshon cha rnams phyogs kun du spro zhing / rang gi gsang sngags drag po'i tshogs dag kyang rjod par byed do// des 'jig rten 'khrugs shing g.yos nas thams cad sred par gyur to// bla na med pa'i gsang ba
31a6(rnying rgyud): dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ bdud kyi sde dang bcas pa shugs 'byung ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan pade chen mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyis// stong gsum so sor 'dul mdzad phyir// rnam 'phrul ting 'dzin
31a7(rnying rgyud): gnas la bzhugs// de bzhin nyid las mag pos kyang // thugs rje che dang smon lam mthus// so so'i las rtog mthun bzhin du// sna tshogs rtog pa'i tshul ma ston// 'dod chags la zhen sngon pa dka/ chags pa chen pos 'dul bar mdzad// de bzhin//
31b1(rnying rgyud): zhe nga ga N+DI mug dang // dmyal zag dog 'dul nganan// mthun pas spya ba chags dang // mi mAthun su nas 'dul bar ma / bde gshegs na don// des zhen rin cin la sman mugs// phyag tu sogs 'bang po snar// dris bya bzhin dag
31b2(rnying rgyud): par mdzad// byabs chen rnam dag pad+mo'i don// shes rab sbal pa'i mchog 'gyur bas// gar gyi dbang phyug bde ba ni// rdo rje ste nyid sbal bar mdzad// gzhan yang mdzad pa kyi chen po// sna tshogs mthu yis 'dul mdzad de// dag pa'i 'gro ba ma
31b3(rnying rgyud): gser 'od mtshan dang byed ldan// go byed rdeg pa blan med// zab so gas skrag pa de bzhin par// rtsapa ba bder gshegs rtseg rgya'i sra// rab sngas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i// pa pas byang sems rgya chen mchog/ pa lar lam lda
31b4(rnying rgyud): pan+d+ha sbyor// la yar pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs// la lar 'bras bya'i don la sbyor// la yang dga' ldan lha yul 'phags// rnams su grags dang bskams pa dang // 'jig rten stod mthun rol cad sogs// gzhan gyi srung spang bya ba rnam pa// @
31b5(rnying rgyud): ka'e can gyi bsam 'phrul po/ mthun 'jug thabs kyi bya ba mchog/ dka' thub mdzad dang dka' ba spyod// rdo rje gdan la yang sangs rgyas// bdud 'dul mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas shing // rtse gcig ting 'dzin bskul nas bzhugs// cho 'phrul
31b6(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa kun 'dul zhing // chos kyi 'khor lo rim bzhin bskor// mya ngan 'da' tshul snyed bsrel sbyor// zhi tshogs lto bo 'khyil pa dang / rang byung du 'gro'i gzugs sde tshogs// snod kyi 'jig rten kun mthu ste// tshangs pa khyab 'jug 'jig rten
31b7(rnying rgyud): skyong // bdud dang srin po gzugs sogs kyis// 'gro ba'i las rtog dag mdzad cing // rang gi ye shes don bkod bya// de tshe 'gro ba'i gnas mtshon tshogs// las kyi stobs tshogs mthus brdabs rnams// de bzhin nyid mthus tshogs chen pos// ya
32a1(rnying rgyud): dag lam pas rab grol zhing // nga rgyal chen po'i dregs tshogs skyes// rang gi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ston// nyon mongs las kyi lam la zhen// rang gi rigs tshogs bslu bar byed// 'jig rten gsum 'jigs la la// khams gsum
32a2(rnying rgyud): g+han pa ba ga rnams// ga sa pa kA lA y-i// bdag pa ma pa'i bas sa lags/ sh-i / gas pas/ mngangan 'das pa'i las mchog // gzhan kya shA pa cigag // byang rdzam/ dugs pa yan ga
32a3(rnying rgyud): zhig rang gi bde spong zhing // gzhan nas sdug bsngal ngon gnyer ba// gzugs mang sprul pa bsam yas kyang // rang gi sgra mdzes bsgyur ba dkara'// sgra mang sprul pa bsam yas pas// rang gi gsung nyan 'phro byed dam// sems rtog bya ba'i 'od ba
32a4(rnying rgyud): kyis// ting 'dzin rtse gcig 'gyur ba med// drag po'i stobus mchog gzi ldan rnams// rang gis rang spyod bde bar sdod// de nas bdud dpung dang po dang // dbang phyug tshangs pa khyab 'jug che// rgya byed glu dang dregs byed rnams// rab tu khros te rang gi
32a5(rnying rgyud): mamathus// ston zhing drag po'i gsang sngags dang // gtum tshig nga ro 'bod sgrogs byed// de tshe rgyal po'i byin brlabs mthus// mthun 'jug thabs kyis 'dul mdzad de// theg pa gsang ba bla med mchog/ khyad par sgo gsum gsang phyed cing // ya
32a6(rnying rgyud): dag don la bde bkod phyir// thugs rje chen pos mthun mdzad de// 'jug pa'i lam ring bde bstan zhing // dga' ba'i sgo nas bde mdzad kyang // rang gi nyon mongs dregs pa'i mthus// don 'jug mthun pa'i spyod sgo 'jig/ gti mug chen po mun gtibs nas
32a7(rnying rgyud): ngargyal ri bo kun du bkod// zhe sdang me lce 'bar bsregs shing // phrag dog rlung gis bskyod byas nas// 'dod chags chubs 'byin par 'gyur// dregs pa'i mthu yis rab khros te// tshogs rnams gcig la gcig bsgo zhing // gsang sngags rdzu 'phrul stobs
32b1(rnying rgyud): da nas// rab tu bsgrags pa'i mthu yis ni// 'jig rten gsum dag 'khrug par byed// mi nad ma go 'khrug pa dang // mtshon cha lo tog 'bras bu 'phrog/ 'byung po'i 'jigs gzugs nyes tshogs rnams// rgyun ma 'chad du 'khor bar 'byung // sa gzhi mo 'bar
32b2(rnying rgyud): chu bdag byed// drag dang dbyig drag rlung bzhin g.yos// bde lum mtho ris thar lam gcod// mi dag sems kyis non 'gyur zhing // 'gro rnams sdug bsngal bskyed byas pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyis thigs khral bskyed// de nas byang chub sems bcas
32b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i// 'khor rnams dus gcig bstan par bzhengs// gtso bo'i phyogs su 'dud byed cing // lan grangs bskor zhing phyag kyang 'tshal// mgon po bde ba mnyes byed cing // mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya// thugs rdo che mnga' lha yi lha// byams sogs
32b4(rnying rgyud): dga' ba'i bdud rtsi chus// gdos bcus thal bar brlag mdzad pas// thim 'gyur rdo rje ye shes tshogs// cho 'phrul dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol// mdzad pa'i byin brlabs bkun du gsol// de dag nyon mongs rlabs 'khrugs pas// rang gzhan thur
32b5(rnying rgyud): lam bde bar 'joms// byang chub sems nyid rlan bral las// srid gsum yal bar dor byed na// thugs rje chen po gang la gdags// e ma ho 'bras bu mya ngan 'das// e ma ho byang sems pad+ma'i rdzing // e ma ho brjod bral k+ta mud// e mra ho me tog
32b6(rnying rgyud): 'bras bcus shing // 'di dag dkyil 'khor rnam dag pas// rigs mchog mtshan nyid yon tan gnas// dus 'dir dag par ga la mdzad// thugs rje chen po ga la gdags// 'di ga skal ldan gsung ba'i snod// rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa 'dzin// da
32b7(rnying rgyud): skar nam tog ri bos no// thabs kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur bas// thugs kyis bsgral bar byaba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bstan du gsos// zhes gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa blan med pa'i gas rang
33a1(rnying rgyud): dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las mdzad pa chen po'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgra chen po rnams 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rdo rje bkang ba'i dkyipa 'ja
33a2(rnying rgyud): chen po 'di nyid sgra gsung thugs kyi dbyings nas phyung ste sprul pa mdzad do// gru bzhi pa la spro bzhi pa'i// rta babs rgyan tshogs kun gyis spras// rin chen nor bu'i phreng sogs dang // b+han d+ha dril bu 'dod pa lnga po tshogs// mchod pa zla chal mtshan gdugs//
33a3(rnying rgyud): dag nyi shurtsa lngas smras// 'khor pa dza mig da pA las// snying gi la sogs gradan tri sa// ka khAg gyung/ N+Di ti/ Ta ga nAH// ta zad rten/ bapa 'argyal/ yar la wa/ sha Sha swA hA kA// ye shes ma 'dres pad chen gas pa// rnamang thub
33a4(rnying rgyud): mchog gzungs kyi dam tshig dang // khro zhing 'dren pa'i mdangs kyis gnas// rigs gtus lung gis gyung pa'i sgra// dmar nag zhal gsum rgyag drug pa// ser dkar+ya dmapa' ji zhal gnyis dge/ bzhin mdangs tshangs pa'i tshul gyis gnas// dbu
33a5(rnying rgyud): mkhro 'dzum brjid pag dang // pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo dang // dril bu rin chen rtse gsum 'dzin// rin me ni phreng ba'i chun 'phyang dang // mu tig do shwal dpung rgyan sbas// stod gaphyogs smad dkris ni g+hazla'u bklubs// dbu rgyan snyan cha sor gdu' tshogs/
33a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan bzang dpe byad mdzes par brgyan// rigs kyis mchod pas dbu swa sil// rang ngod btsun mo'i sku bcas pa// blang nas phyogs bcu'i sngags kyis spos// hU~M phaT pa ga / rjebIng+ge rtsa dza pra mo haM// mdzad pa'i phrin lam
33a7(rnying rgyud): byas nas// slar 'dus de dag po'i hU~M la thim// shar du rnam snang phyag kyi che// gser mdo/ zhal gsum phyag rdzug pa// rtse gsum btson pad+mo la gr-i b+ha/ ni chen 'gyu ba dzin nyid// mthing gzhal gsum phyag drug pa
33b1(rnying rgyud): chen pad+ma gri gug dang // shu la bum pa rtse gsum 'dzin// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas sku// dmar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa// thod dbyug rtse gsum pad+mo dang // dgra sta 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin// byang du don yod grub pa nyid// ljang gu zhal gsum phyag drug pa//
33b2(rnying rgyud): ral gri rdo rje dbyug pa mdung// pad+mo rtse gsum gshin rje'i rkang // kun gyi g.yas dkar g.yon pa ni// dmar ljang se r+ya dang le brgan mdog/ rang gi btsun mo'i mgul nas 'khyud// zhal gcig phyag gnyis bdag po ltar// sku mdog gsang ba'i mdangs/
33b3(rnying rgyud): dang ldan// phyag dang cha lugs kun gyis brgyan// oM dzi na dzi ga laM// dwe Sha ra ti/ sA rat+na d+h+r-i ga/ maM mo ha ra ti/ oM A ro li ka/ pau rA ga ra ti/ ha pra dz+nyA d+h+r-i ga/ tAM badz+ra ra ti/ hUM phaT swA hA// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs bcas pas// rigs kyi
33b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzad// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal cha lugs dang // dgyes pa'i skyil krung tshul gyis bzhugs// khyams kyi phyogs dang mtshams rnams su// sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad// thugs kyi ye shes yi ge las//
33b5(rnying rgyud): rang gi gsang sngags dag gis gdon// sa snying dkar ser rin chen 'dzin// nA ma snying mthi ga ral gri 'dzin// spyan ris dmar skya pad+ma 'dzin// gsang bdag ldang sgra rdo rje 'dzin// g.yon pa pad+mo yu ba tsun// bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis
33b6(rnying rgyud): phyogs su 'dud// sgeg mo phreng ba dbyangs dang gar// dkar se rangad mar ljang 'od 'phro mdog/ me long rin chen phreng po dang // dbyangs snyan gar thabs mdzes pa'i tshul// oM kr-I ra dza yaM/ hU~M lA s+ye s+ya ma ya s+t+wa~M// d+ha~M mA le sa ma ya ho/ hrIHpad+ma b+hanaH/
33b7(rnying rgyud): gai dz+nye ha~M haM/ an+da ti ra ga yA me hU~M phaT/ byams bdakar ser grwa shing 'dzin// sgrib sel 'khor lo mthing ga skye// 'jam dpal dmar skya ut+pala~M// kun bzang ldang ser rin chen ste// g.yon pa pad+mo gi mi 'dzin// sems dpa'i skabs kyis gdan la bzhugs/
34a1(rnying rgyud): dpal rgyam pagra ma pa na can pa las mad pa chen pa la // / nas ma ldan 'das nas rdzun pa mas 'du pa byud rgyangan pad+ma sgrub nangs bgang pyong da pa dang
34a2(rnying rgyud): rkyen na nyid skyeg srung dgas kyi ngas b+h+ya m+b+hasmra pa mdzad do// gla bzhi pa la sgo zhe 'aM// rta babs kyang phyogs can gyi sa r+b+ba // rin chen ni dba'i zing sogs dang // b+han ta dri la tha 'dod lam rdzogs pa rdul mtshan gangags
34a3(rnying rgyud): dag sa/ 'khor pa byabs/ sdige pa gas par / hAhA/ sa pa na /
34a4(rnying rgyud): gnas myed ma cig dang// zhi rkyen pa'i thas gnas/ dag sa// na / me nga / ra ba da pa gnas dag / na ma / sangs par rdum gyis pa
34a5(rnying rgyud): mkhro 'dum brjid bag dang // pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo dang // dril bu rin chen rtse gsum 'dzin// rin che ni phreng po'i chun 'phyang dang // mu ti ga de shwal dpung rgyan sbas// snod g.yogs spad dkris na b+hazlang 'grubs// dadu rgyun snyan cha song gdum tshogs/
34a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan bzang dpe byad mdzes par byargyan// rigs kyis mchod pas dbu sasil// dang ngo btsun mo'i sra bcas pa// skang nas phyogs bcu'i sngags kyi // / ma mo to// mdzad pa'i rjen la
34a7(rnying rgyud): byas ni// slar 'dus badzin du du bzung // shar dran pa rgyun mye/ nas da 'i rgyag pa// ga mdza pa gzhal gsuM rgyag
34b1(rnying rgyud): chen pad+ma gI gug dang // shu la bum pa rtse gsum 'dzin// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas sgra// dmar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa// thod dbyug gsum pad+mo dang // dgra sta 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin// byang du don yod grub pa nyid// ljang gu zhal gsum phyag drug pa//
34b2(rnying rgyud): ral gardo rje dbyug pa mdzang // pad+me TI gsum gshin tu da // sprin gyi g.yas dkar g.yan pa ni// dam snga ma da la btsun mau / rong gA btsun ma'i mgrol nas bsgrud// zhal gcig phyag gnyis bdag pa sbyar// su mdog gsang bu'i mangs/
34b3(rnying rgyud): dang ldan// phyag dang cha lugs kun gyis brgyan// mdzin dzig la// g+neShar tI/ swA d+ha d+h+r-ig/ ma mo hA ti/ oM mA ra l-ika/ bai R+YA gar te/ hAH d+h+r-ig/ d+hi badz+rar te/ hU~M phaT swAhA// 'od zer 'grob tshogs bac+doMswa pas// rigs kyi
34b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzad// 'khor lo sbyar rgyal cha lcags dang // dgyes pa'i skyil grang tshul sdes byazhugs// byams kyi phyogs dang mtshams rnams sa// sems dpe' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad// thugs kyi ye shes yi ge las/
34b5(rnying rgyud): rang gi gsang sngags dag gis gdon// sa skaMng dkar ser don zin 'dzin// nAm snying mthong ga rul skye 'dzin// spyan ris dmar m+b+ha bzla 'dzin// gseng bdag ldang ste d+ho r+N+Na 'dzin// g.yon pa pasgo su brtan// bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis
34b6(rnying rgyud): phyogs su 'dud// skrag ma zhed par dbyings dngagang// dkar pa nga mar ldeng dro 'phrum dag// ma 'dri na chen zang po dang // dbyangs sbyi ger thabs mngos pa'i tshul/ oM k+kA de'i/ sbrul sa su ma yi ste/ pas /
34b7(rnying rgyud): gau N+Do hu~M ha~M/ oMr+tha ti ra ga yA ma hU~M phaT/ byams padar ser mug 'dren// sgribasal 'khor po mthing ga ste// rang ma dpal dmar gyi mar+tha// kun pa rang ldang meng rin chen ste// g.yon pa cwo ga ma ngon// seMmapa dpa'i rtabs kyis ga nol po nas/
35a1(rnying rgyud): bdug spos me tog 'thor ba dang // mar ma chab lha mo rnams// ser dkar dmar ljang go rims bzhin// madz+ha k+sha dang mthun pa'i rdzas kyis mdzes// oM me na/ dzAd+ha pa bra baH/ thi long sa ras byA ya/ spre zlas pa A ba na d+ha skAr cang // ba pa
35a2(rnying rgyud): ga
35a3(rnying rgyud): rgyud// byang sgor rdo rje 'khyil pa ste// sdang rtswa rdo rje rtse gsum mthu// khro bo cha lugs rngam brjid dang // dung khrod rim pa'i chas kyis brgyan// lugs su zhags pa lcags sgrog d+hil// lhan dmar 'jigs byed 'od dpung dang // rdo rje mche sogs khro ga nyer
35a4(rnying rgyud): n+dan// yab yum 'khyil pa brgyad bskum sku// hU~M phaT ru lu'i gsung 'don cing // zhes kyi 'khor lo gnon pa'i tshul// oM ru lu pad+mAn ta kr-id hUM phaT// dza badz+ra kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M pra dz+nyAn+ta kr-id phaT// hU~M rat+na kro d+hi shwa ri// hU~M bad+mAn ta kaM phaT/ baM pad+ma
35a5(rnying rgyud): ri hUM bi ga nAn tA krid/ ho karma kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M phaT swA hA// phyi nang med par dkyil 'khyor man po ste// thugs rje ye shes tshe las sprul// phyag rgya bzhi yi rgyas btab cing // dbu la rig suM gyi bdag pos brgya ni// 'od dpung sAl ba lha 'khor gyis// 'jig
35a6(rnying rgyud): gsum po snang byed cing // tshangs pa la sogs lha chen brgyad rnams 'gugs// rdo rje brjid gnon sngags kyi mthus// de dag drin pa med par 'gyur// mtshon cha'i tshogs kyis sgrol byas te// dug gsum phung po gsol bar mdzad//
35a7(rnying rgyud): brjid glu yis// lha chen 'khor rnams dbang du sdud// dkyil 'khor chen por gzhag byas nas// snga ma'i sha rus gnas nas ston// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin gyis// lha chen rnams kyis spar lus gsol// 'khor bcas pa mi dbang po phung zhing /
35b1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'chang gi gral la dgod// dam tshig gsang ba'i banas bsgos shing // phrin las bka' nyan gnyer gtud de// gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du bzhag/ kun kyang tshig dbyangs mthun pa brkos// dam tshig mna' srog thal myong 'gyur zhes brjod do// de bzhin
35b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas pad+mo chags pa'i sgrub// gsung gi gzi mdangs rgyas mdzad do//
35b3(rnying rgyud): rgya rdzu 'phrul gnas sbyor bas// gser mig 'dab bzangs grong khyer dang // lang kang gnas tshogs srin po'i sde// klu rgyal dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// rdzu 'phrul kun stobs 'khor lo yis// lha chen la sogs gdul bar dgrongs// ting nge 'dzin la rnams
35b4(rnying rgyud): zhugs te// pad+mo na mchog sprul pa mdzad// de bzhin nyid dbyings snyoms 'jug las// sems dpa' rgyal ba kun gyi yab// rdo rje 'dzin thab dbang nyid dang // rigs nyid sprul pa'i lung las grub// sku mdog dmar po rA ga'i mdog/ zhal gsu ma
35b5(rnying rgyud): megro ljang gu can// phyag ni gri glig kha T+wAM gu// thod pa khrag me dpung sprul lnga// gnas brgyad gu bdag thod phreng dang // blang chen stag gi phyugs pa ljon// sgra skad drag po phyogs bcur sgrog/ bgegs la sogs pa'i chu lugs can// drang srong khros
35b6(rnying rgyud): 'i cha lugs kyis// klu yi 'gro ba rmongs mdzad pa// pad+ma'i gdon la brgyad bskum gyis// yum chen dpal ldan ma dang sbyor// oM bad+mo gu ru he he ru lu hUM phaT/ 'khor lo 'bar ba phyogs mtshams su// ye shes khro bo chen po brgyad// rdzims grub
35b7(rnying rgyud): de 'jigs gzugs can// rta mgo ljang gu brjed pa yi// shar du pad+ma'i dbang phyug ni// dkar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o// rdo rje badz+ra ku zhags dang // rin chen dbyug pa ral gri mdung // seng ge rgyal mo su dang 'khril// sna tshogs me mdun
36a1(rnying rgyud): shAzhal gsu ma b+hag tu drug gis rol// rin zan mdzad tham sngags chen lkug/ 'khor lo phreng ba mag ta// rgyan dang zla lpags rin chen tshogs// dbyangs kyi dbang phyugs mtshan ma// dmar sa 'bra ma nga rgyal du sbyar// 'ad 'akra sems dpa ga du/
36a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'phro// rigs lnga'i dang rgyan rin chen phreng // phyag rgya bzhi yis brjid pa'i lha// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // gru bzhi sgo ba ni rta babs brgyan// bar khyams 'khod spyi dbus nas 'gyir// pad+ma'i lte bar snyil krung bzhugs// shar tu 'joms bya
36a3(rnying rgyud): da ji'i sku// dkar gsal rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// lho dri rin chen blo gros su// dpal be'u gdugs mdzes 'od mar ser// mu kyi phyogs kyi rgyal po rtog/ dkar dmar pad+ma glegs pa ma 'dzin// byang du 'jig rten kun skol ba// lnga skya rdo rje n+ya gram ze// shar lho drab/
36a4(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug ni// ser skya rin chen b+hi ga ra// lho nub chos kyi lhun po mchog/ rtse gsum pad+ma'i lhag ma 'dzin// nub byang rgyal ba'i ye shes tog/ lho d+ha seng ge'i bum pa 'dzin// krung shar sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtsegs// ljang ser g.yung drung rdo rje mtshan// 'di dag 'apo
36a5(rnying rgyud): los gyur rgyal byin// mtshan dang dpe byad 'od mdangs nAna?// dz+haiM swa bu chen po'i longs spyod 'phel// cha mthun yum dang 'khril par bzhugs// oM bi ta da~Mn tan sto bo ga ta hU~M phaT/ oM d+haR+tha Ta ni nas na sa d+h+waM/ oM bi ha ra phra mo tha na hA phaT/ oM don lo ta sa~M b+ho gA ya
36a6(rnying rgyud): phaT/ oM rad+d+ha mA rba rjes kr-i ba hU~M phaT/ a ma hA shu ta mu~M sa mo haM hU~M phaT/ oM dz+wa Ne bang rgyas can pra b+hA su~M / oM na ma ga ga nA si ta yo ba Sh+Ti Ta/ oM na sa nyi the sa ga pa'i hU~M phaT/ 'khor lo gsang sngag pa/ da pa la
36a7(rnying rgyud): drag po'i byu bas rgyas te// gnas su dag pa'i mi shes so// byig napa dgas / / dgas// gas sa dang // na mas pa
36b1(rnying rgyud): sems bcas// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod// snying po mdongs gsol phul bar 'gyur// oM trag sha ka sarba ra ma mas hUM hUM swA hA// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig pa 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsal// bstan pa myur du spel cig/ ma chad pa'i
36b2(rnying rgyud): sngags kyis thams cad bsud par gyur pa bde legs su bya ba'i gnas pa bdag cag dus thams cad dkyil 'khor 'dir gnas shing de 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag bsrung bar bya ba dang bran bzhin du gnas par bgyi'o// slar yang bdag zag rnams mgon pos
36b3(rnying rgyud): bzhengs la byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur ba dang grol bar mdzod du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa'i snying po 'di byin gyis brlabs so// oM u oM mr-i ta bi ga na shu d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA zhes gsungs pa dang // de dag da
36b4(rnying rgyud): po'i sangs rgyas bzhin du 'od zer dang bcas par gyur nas gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du 'khod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgrongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las thugs ye shes sems dpa'i dkyi la
36b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'phrul pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas bde byed gar dbang phyug/ pad+ma tshogs pa'i sgra chen pos// yon tan rin chen sgyu ma'i chos// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// mkha' 'gro tshogs bcas gshin je rnams// rgyal
36b6(rnying rgyud): bro rgyal chen rgal mor gnas// 'khor bcas 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir// mkha' 'gro chen mo'i tshogs 'phral mdzad// thabs dang shes rab gnyis ni dri las// gzi lda na gar gyi dbang phyug ma// pad+ma rA ga nam mkha'i mdog/ zhal gcig pa la thug pa
36b7(rnying rgyud): parnga'i bong po bdud rtsi'i sdod// rdo rje kha n+de zhags pa thogs// rin chen phreng ba'i rgyan gyis bklubs// khyod bzhed 'jigs mdangs tshul 'dzin cing // brkyang bskum zhing mchog nyi ma'i dkyil// g.yang gzhi nyi pa'i rkang bas brdzun// oM padz+ra
37a1(rnying rgyud): shAr nas/ dpa rgya sa ga tad dang // ya sprul tu thags dang mtsham// badz+ra gdan gang gsapa // bcang ba mdag nam rgyags// thag ma thag cad pa // 'ang ban du
37a2(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i chags bcas pa// ra tha~M sbyin po dganas / ni na rjodang// u / grus khyenal bA d+ha// rdzogs sgral byini ni mas // 'dug zugs ma Ta// gsas byung dran pa 'dus
37a3(rnying rgyud): drug pa rtse gsum dang // gser gyi ma 'du dorje dang // rba sbyin tu la mdza nags pa dang // gang chen rdo rje dkri ga // hU~M glags sde'i zhag slo s+hos// rdo gdangs patso kA ma thA// zhing chen log kyis snying 'dren cing // de zhi
37a4(rnying rgyud): thod pa bzang // oM badz+ra tA kr-id ma hA la ti ti hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+rA ta tri me dar hU~M phaT/ A~M ra ki mdakram pa ya hU~M phaT/ oM DA ka~M nA~M ti pre shwa hU~M phaT/ oM bar+d+ha DA ki bi la sa hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki dri kra Ta mA le hU~M phaH/ oM badz+ra kA dz+wa la dz+nyA la hU~M pha/ ra
37a5(rnying rgyud): pad+ma'i 'dab mA la// seng ge rta dang ci spang wa// rkyen kang ka d+ya dwag theg/ mgo brtan mr-ir+b+he ka shog chen mo brgya de// hU~Ml sa te mi ga dmang po// rgyag na gribabla thod pa khwa/ rI rdzagasu ma mdang // nga khor mo sa batshan mar
37a6(rnying rgyud): gtun shing zhing khog g.yang gzhi sprul// ne'u l-i gzhor pa rin chen khyar// zhal gnongs so so'i phyogs mdangs bzhin// phrin kya oM bcas khyams par gnas// zhing sngags/ yang gzhi dro phreng sngal// khrag 'ag rdul
37a7(rnying rgyud): mnga' 'gro rigs bdun ma sring sbrel ba'i tshogs// mche gshog 'bar bgyogs bcu nga khrug pa// oM ser ba ran hU~M / a ni te sha ba mra Sha hU~M raH/ ka na ma dun hU~M phaT/ oM mr-i kar na na hU phaT/
37b1(rnying rgyud): badz+ralkog sha su na n+yags na nA / mor ltos dag gatho/ ma da dag // pa dgag sbyong brgyan// da nga pag na du// dasu // ram na/ zhwa ga tsug tu ku nan po 'a sa
37b2(rnying rgyud): dbyings dang shes rabar brtogs pa// so so'i sprin lngas mdzad pa'i glug/ zhal dang spun so so mdog/ oM ru khA si twA kun T+Te tas mo ra ga hU~M phaT snying po'i sngags so// oM badz+ra nA ka~M dz+wa la sha~M ba ku mar spobaT nye ba'o// oM TI ki dz+has par tsA'i rtsa
37b3(rnying rgyud): me hU~M phaT rtsa pa'i sngags so// mkha' 'gro ma yi dkyil 'khor spro ba'i mthus// de dag dran pa med par brgyal// slar nyid rang gi 'khor du bsdus// dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen por bkod// de nas mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas// gdul bya rnams
37b4(rnying rgyud): kyi gnas dor nas// rgyal ba'i bstan pa bzung byed cing // rdo rje theg pa sbyor bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las mkha' 'gro ma sprul pa'i le'u skye bcu bzhi pa'o//
37b5(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan dgyes pa'i gtso// gar gyi dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs// gzi ldan yum dang zhal sbyor zhing // phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'o// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// phyogs kyi bge gas 'dul byed pa'o// khams gsum
37b6(rnying rgyud): gnon pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin gnas// rin rkyen 'byer ba khang bzangs na// rin chen pad+ma se ge'i gdan// dri med nyi zla smras pa la// dbus kyi lha mchog chen po ni// zhabs bkyang phyag ni bcu drug dang // dmar
37b7(rnying rgyud): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// bgegs la sogs pa'i tshul dang ldan// pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo gre// thod pa rin chen dgra sbya ras// yum chen dbang phyug sgeg mo dang / tshogs rin chen phreng ba can// dri med pargyas bklubs pa'o// oM pa gab
38a1(rnying rgyud): pogra ta ya hA phaT// mdun du dongs ma sna pa ni// dkar sa sto dril tha dzin// glams pa dun chen sa smras dpa' sa// ba ba na rgyan 'khar mo thogs// rgyab tu bad+ma sems dpa' nyid// dmar sor rtse gsu ma jal pa thags// g.yon
38a2(rnying rgyud): las kyi sems dpa' ste// ljang ser zil bu dzi sh+'ul// oM badz+ras ta hU~M baT// oM raHsa twa thA phaT// oM pad+ma sa d+ha trA~M phaT/ oM ka ma ba d+ha hU~M phaT// 'khor lo bcwa tsam la// yum dang 'khril ba'i tshul gyis 'khod// phyi rol pA rA'i rigs bdun la// bder/
38a3(rnying rgyud): gshegs yab yum nyis stong rdzogs// bde gshegs rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+ma na gam sna tshogs mkha'// sgra mdog bad+ma d+ha ga dang // ir+g+ha la sogs ram bdun la// ral pa rtse mdzod bum pa la// lhag ma dril bu glegs pa ma dang // chos
38a4(rnying rgyud): grul mtshan phreng ba 'dzin// kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa// rin chen rgyan phreng 'od mi dngas can// zag ma tshan gri grag thod pa dang // pad+ma'i phreng ba ce gsum bsdams// lhag pa'i phyag bzhi 'dzin par mdzad// dang par rang rtags drug
38a5(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra du ki bi shi ka du kuM d-i ma~M tra sreg ta s+t+rai su mo ta phaT swA // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o// oM baHsa mo yo ga tas ra la pu hU~M phaT// rin po che rnams kyi'o// oM pat+na thA saM ko ha he he ma'ihU~M par// pad+ma rigs rnams kyi'o//
38a6(rnying rgyud): rak+Sha mu h+yas hU~M phaT// las kyi rigs kyi'o// oM badz+ra tsakr-i gr-is ti yo gI shwa ri hU~M phaT// 'khor lo'i phyogs kyi'o// de nas dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i tshogs// sogs rnams kun du thos byas pas/ rigs mo nya yin/ rdzos la
38a7(rnying rgyud): rnams 'gugs// phrag shing byed nas dgra 'gugs shing // so so'i rags dbyer 'khrug pa dag/ rdo rje gsang ba'i sngags kyis gzer// rang gi dam tshigangs su ngan// srogs snying po dbul bar bya// gsang pa'i ma mogags
38b1(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs rdzogs byas nas// dkyil 'khor gsung ba'i gnas su 'khod// gsang ba 'dzin pa'i gnas 'dod nas// rang gi lus su gnas byas te// gzhal yas khang gi rkyen du gzhag/ de dag gi snying po ni/ oM sa mu da ra dzin na ga su tra b+ha ba si tri s+t+rai sha
38b2(rnying rgyud): pre phaT zhes pa'o// slar gso ba'i sngags ni/ oM su mu ge De sa~M mya ga he he tsu tra pa la si taM She hUM phaT/ lha rnams kyi snying po bsdus pa ni// oM sarbas kar gyi bag sha sa~M me br-i mu rak+Sha hU~M zhes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med par
38b3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las khams gsum gnon pa'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan gar dbang sgra// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus mdzad nas// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprul byas te// gnod sbyin grul gram 'dul
38b4(rnying rgyud): bar mdzad// gzhal yas gru gsum mthing nag la// dbus su 'khor lo nyi ma'i gdan// dpal chen pad+ma he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i rgyan gyis brjid// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ste// sku mdog pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs// rtse gsum gtun shing ral
38b5(rnying rgyud): gri dang // bsdu 'gas pa thod nga 'dzin// glang chen ko bzod rnon skal// yum dang zhal stor 'khril pa'i tshul// thebs dang shes rab sbyor ba las// yi ge las sbrul khro bo'i rgyan// shwar du rnam rgyal mdog dkar sngo// zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje
38b6(rnying rgyud): drang // 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang // ral gri me 'od kyis mtshan pa// lho ru gshin rje gshed po ni// sngo nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa// thod dbyug rin chen ne'u le dang // rtse gsum me dpung zod rnga 'dzin// Na ba hu rta mchog khro bo'i sgra// zhal gsum
38b7(rnying rgyud): phyag drug dmar skya'i mdog/ 'khor lo sngags mdzub rtse gsum dang // ral gri thod pa Da ma chu// byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// ljang sngon zhal gsum phyag drug pa// rgya gram gri grag pad+ma dang // be tson rtse gzam seng ge 'dzin// shar
39a1(rnying rgyud): stor 'thag pa na pa na// rdzag lags sa r+b+ba ga zugs// byug tu ga badz+ra dang // ngam brtan sbrel tha 'dun// skyon 'amag yo mgan mAn+tu// zhalags sa sad+d+haHthag drug pa// rin chen dam khrigazhan gang dang // ba khrug
39a2(rnying rgyud): mdzang rtse gsum// nub byung 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni// dmar sku zhal gsum phyag drug pa// rdo rje dkrug parin chen zlum// thod pa bdud rtsi snying 'dzin pa'o// byang shar stobs chen du da ka'i mdog/ zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mdangs// rdo rje rtse gsum pa ma
39a3(rnying rgyud): rten kho ga// sna tshogs rdo rje pamA chen khrag/ 'jigs pa'i cha lugs khro phreng dang // gyang gyi dor thabyas rol pa'i skabs// oM badz+ra kro ta bi dza ya hUM phaT// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn ta ka hri phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro D+ha a mr-i ta ku Na Da li hU~M phaT/
39a4(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Tak+ki rA dza hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hU~M phaT/ phyogs skyong rgyal po gnod sbyin dang // grul bum tshogs rnams dbang babus te// gsang sngags drag pos bsgral
39a5(rnying rgyud): byas na// slar gsol ye shes lhums su gyur// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dbang bskar zhing // dam tshig la gzhan dkyil 'khor tshul// kun gyi srog snying phul ba ni// dam tshig chen pos byin brlabs mdzad// slar yang dam tshig 'dzin pa'i sngags/
39a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor rnams kun la sbyin par mdzad// oM badz+ra kra kar murda si na ba pu ka hU~M phaT/ oM AHhUM badz+ra su ka ta b+ha mo tr-i a la wa hU~M phaT// lha rnams kun gyi dam tshig ni// rdo rje gsang ba gsum las byad// rdo rje gnod sbyin dag po'i sgra// khams gsum
39a7(rnying rgyud): dus kyis dbang bskur nas// 'khor ba'i chos las rgyal byed cing // byang chub sems kyis de nyid gsal// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol par rgyad las khro bo srin las rol pa'i mthu
39b1(rnying rgyud): bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan gar dbang glus// gzing rji dgod pa'i rgyan bkod cing // lha min grong khyer 'dul ba'i phyir// yum gyi dkyil 'khor 'phrul bar mdzad// chos dbyings sprul pa'i gnas bzang mchog/ grul pa'i rang bzhin du/
39b2(rnying rgyud): chen spos// gru bzhi khang pa sgro dang bcas// rta babs ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes// dbus kyi pad+ma'i gdan bzugs pa// gnyis med rol pa'i yum gyi sku// mdog dmar can du zangs chen gzugs// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mdzes pa'i mdangs// 'khor
39b3(rnying rgyud): lo dung khrag pad+mo dang // rin chen 'bar ba rtse dgu 'dzin// rin chen pad+ma'i phreng ba can// stod bzang na bza' dkyil bzang bzhugs// oM pad+ma mu sha ra sa ma ka ta hU~M phaT// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su// pad+ma dbyings phyag gsal ba mo// rig
39b4(rnying rgyud): chen phreng bA gla ma che// dkar dmar ser dang ljang gu'i mdog/ rdo rje gsum pa pad+mo dra ba dang // na ra si la'i snod rin tshogs// rang gi dkyil 'khor ma spros shing // sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// oM tsu na d+he shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM Sh+Ti sha badz+ra saM bruM ga
39b5(rnying rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM b+hi tsu swa te hUM phaT/ mtshams kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la// de bzhin bde ba skyed byed yum rkyen bzhi// drab mo dang glog 'gyur rgyun// gshog pa can dang 'dod pa'o// dkar ser dmar sna sngo bsangs dang // ljang gre mdog legs la
39b6(rnying rgyud): bzhugs nas// rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang // u dz+wal ljang gu legs mdzad pa'o// oM n+ya te no tsa kra hUM phaT/ oM saM bo ga ta su he bya hUM phaT/ oM ma ma krig+h+nAM hwe he hUM phaT/ oM ta re ga gA na a mA la hU~M phaT// phyogs rnams kun du mkha' khyab pa// ti la gang
39b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin du gnas gyur pa// ma mo gshin rje'i tshogs rnams kun// 'khrug rngam rong rod por gyur nas// thugs rje tsan la skyabs su mchi// srog gi snying po dbul bar byed// de nas dkyil 'khor bsdus byas te// rang gi gnas su dbang bskur zhing //
40a1(rnying rgyud): dam tshig dga' ba'i sdom parnyed// bder gshegs ye shes gsal bar 'gyur// kun gyis mthun par khas blangs te// dam tshig bslang zhing rnal 'byor skyong // oM ma ma rak+Sha sa pra ti id di sa pu ta phaT/ oM thakA ra la si bad T+Ta nya phaT/
40a2(rnying rgyud): mo dang 'byung po rnams kyi snying po'o// oM ye me sa~M d+ha rba wa ru lu hU~M phaT/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi'o// oM AHhU~M yog pri gu me/ ha sa ha sa/ ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ sker gso zhing byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag/ ngas pa tha
40a3(rnying rgyud): na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las rin chen dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas gar gyi dbang phyug nyid// rus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yis// sa 'og sa
40a4(rnying rgyud): bla sa stengs rnams// 'joms byed gza' dang rgya skar dang // bdud dang de yi rigs 'khor kun// 'dra bar bya ba'i ting 'dzin la// snyoms zhugs 'khor lo sprul pa mdzad// thabs dang shes rab bslab byas pa'i// 'od zer gsal bas stong gsum gang // rin chen
40a5(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // skyo bzhi rta babs phreng bas brgyan// 'khor lo rim gsum gdan dang bcas// rdo rje pad+ma rin chen gyis// khor yug seng ge glang chen mchog/ nyi mas mdzes pa'i pad+mo yi// dbus kyi dpa' bo yum dang bcas// zhal gcig
40a6(rnying rgyud): phyag bzhi rdo rje rin// brdu ngal gri 'dzin par mdzad// dmar ser kun du chub ni// ljang ser pad+ma dril bus 'khyud// mtshan dang dpe byang rgyan phreng bkrabs// sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya bzhi yis mdzes byas pa'o// rdo rje 'khor lo rtsi bas
40a7(rnying rgyud): rnams la// rigs kyi sems dpa' nyi shu bzhi// dkar dang dmar deng ser ba'i mdangs// rdo rje dril bu brla bsgom// 'khor lo rin chen snye ma bsdams// dang po'i phyag gnyis mtshan byas shing // lhag ma gri gug zod pa thogs// khro zhing sems dpa'i cha
40b1(rnying rgyud): lcags kyis// rgyan phreng rigs kyi dbang pogs sa// rin man 'bar ba can sas bkrub// oM brdas ta oM hU~M hrI hUM na ba Ta// rje rigs rnams kyi'o// badz+ra te shA s+phA na ma gardzas rje pas// pad+ma rigs kyi sems dpa' rnams kyang // oM ya
40b2(rnying rgyud): tsag ban ta si d+hi phaT phaT/ kro tI shwa ri hUM phaT// de bzhin gshegs pa rigs kyi'o// sgo bzhi mdzes gzugs khro mo ni// mi mthun blo gros dpa' chen mo// ye shes mkha'i dbyings bzhi rnams te// dkar ser dmar dang rim pa bzhin// rdo rje lcags kyu
40b3(rnying rgyud): zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog dril bu mtshan ma'i phyag/ oM badz+ra aM gu sha dzaHpA sha hUM/ s+pho Ta pa~M/ b+heN+De hoH/ phaT/ dgug gzhug bcing ba'i las dag dang // dbab pa'i cho ga mnyes pa byed// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kun// sku gsung
40b4(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dus// rigs gsum sems dpa' khro bor bstan// 'jigs byed che lugs rngam pa'i skabs// rdo rje gcod byed 'jigs pa che// rdo rje 'joms pa'i yid 'phrog byed// rdo rje rab bzang blo gros mchog/ rdo rje'i bstan pa
40b5(rnying rgyud): g.yul las rgyal// pad+ma'i sprin chen 'brug skra'i dbyangs// bad+ma'i sgo gsal mya ngan 'joms// pad+ma'i sdong por ro myo pa// pad+ma'i 'od zer bdud rtsi'i 'od// 'khor ba brtsegs pa myur du bzlog/ 'khor lo dga' ba sbyar sti'i mchog/ 'khor lo spob
40b6(rnying rgyud): dang rtse gsum 'ching // 'khor lo rol pa dga' byed stobs// 'di dag sbal pa 'khor tshogs sbas// gnas gsum po dgra 'dul bar mdzad// de nas gza' dang rgyu skar rnams// gzug pa'i ngaro rna ma shums// sku chen sgrogs shing sbal nas kyang /
40b7(rnying rgyud): mithu dang rje 'phral med par 'gyur// dkrol pa rjer chen pa spangs gas pa zhing // bstan pa brjeng bar dam bcas sa// de dgas sa srin snying dag/ lus sems dad pas phral byas pas// da pa 'khor byed pa dbang srung dang /
41a1(rnying rgyud): gdan la gzhagapar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa grus pa dasu song pa paldan pa gas 'drangal tum nag 'i da ben pa las dang sangs nyam thams cad thong blang ba'i 'du nye ba cwabatud pa'o// / de nas bcol san
41a2(rnying rgyud): pad+ma bde chen yum bcas la// 'gro drag rgya 'bras bya ba'i phyir// bde chen byang sems dkyil 'khor sprul// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas 'bar ba// rin chen phreng sogs 'jigs byed brgyad// cur khrod chen po'i gnas bzhin brgyan// dbus mi 'khor
41a3(rnying rgyud): gdan bcas la// rigs wa'i he ru ka bzhugs mdzad// yum chen lnga dang 'khril bar sbyor// kun mar zhal gsum phyag drug pa// dmar nag dkar ser ljang gru'i mdangs// rdo rje kha nI ral gri dang // tri shUl zhing du byug thob bsnams// g.yas par drang
41a4(rnying rgyud): yor g.yon thod khrag/ bar ma gri gug pad+ma ste// tha ma yum dang 'khril ba'i tshul// spyan dgu sdang mig dmar po bzlog/ khro gnyer ral pa gyen dra brdzes// thod sbal khrag dang thal pas brgyan// g.yang gzhi ri sha'i rgyan gyis mdzes// oM badz+ra shwa ha ru
41a5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/ oM b+had+ha shrI he ru ka prad+d+ha kro d+hi shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM rat+na shrI he tra ka hU~M phaT/ raHkro d+hi shA dza hUM phaT/ parba shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kro d+hi shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM karma shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ kA ma gro th+wI shwa ri hU~M Ta// bde chen byang chub sem can// ros/
41a6(rnying rgyud): pa kun du khyab mdzad de// khams gsum ma 'dres rnam par dbyings// bde ba chen po gnyis med 'gyur// dbang bskur byin brlabs rigs kyis bskur// babyed de dbu la dang lha bdag pos brgyan// sngon 'jug g.yo ldang bskyed pa yi// lha mo bzhi dang mnyam par
41a7(rnying rgyud): sbyor// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las bde ba chen po'i leng ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa nyid la bzhag ste bzhugs so// de tshe de'i dus na bdun kyi rgyal
41b1(rnying rgyud): po ma tra ru tras/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul chen po bstan zhing // 'khor dang bcas pas phyogs bcur rgyug cing rig pa 'dzin pa dang // rnal 'byor mtha' dag gi bar gcod byed cing bde 'gro'i bde ba thams cad chun gcod pa dang // rang nyid kyi nyon mongs pa bste
41b2(rnying rgyud): do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rigs kyi 'od zer mtha' yas pa zhes bya bas stong gsum gyi 'jig rten thams cad skad cig gis gsal bar mdzad do// rgyal ba'i dbang po stong
41b3(rnying rgyud): gsum 'dir// khang bzangs mdzes par byin brlabs te// rin chen ka pa gdan phreng dang // gzugs mdzes la sogs kun gyis sbas// nyi ma zla ba rin chen khri// pad+ma seng ge la sogs gnon// sgo bzang khyams su bzlas pa yi// rnam dag gzhal yas ya
41b4(rnying rgyud): ngas sdus// dgas bcom ldan 'drenan paste/ dab la ldan gang phred bang phyug nas/ sa kyis dkyil 'khod rlig sa rdzogs rnams// dga' ba'i spri kyis bskul pa me // byed ba chen pa gnyis med mthus// rigs kyi kyi'i 'bar gcid tubyung //
41b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs gsal ba rgya chen pos// dkyil 'khor rgya chen sprul par mdzad// dbus su pad+ma'i rigs rgyal po// gtso bo pad+ma rdo rje'i mdangs// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs byed sku// rdo rje dga' ba'i spyan 'dril zhing // shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kun du// bdang
41b6(rnying rgyud): gshegs rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog/ num snang rin chen don grub rnams// rin chen phyogs kyi mtshon mdangs gsal// rdo rje 'khor lo drin chen dang // ral gri pad+ma sna tshogs dang // gtso bo pad+ma'i drug mtshan can// stong pa'i sra spyan dril phu ga yong//
41b7(rnying rgyud): sman mdzes mA ma kI// dkar mo dam tshig sgrol ma dag/ mdog bzang phyug mtshan gtso bo bzhi// sangs rgyas teng 'dzin rdzu 'phrul stobs// thabs dang shes ri ba nyis stong tshogs// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo la// rang gi mtshan ma
42a1(rnying rgyud): dang nga / du gas na dang / du/ rgyu/ na smra / nga// gdang na
42a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs pab ga/ pa labang po'i ba thams dang// sa lags pa ga pa / m-i / me yin ci dang // gas la na rje pa'i// 'ams sa kyi gru pa dang /
42a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' gro dag pa'i tshigs papas rnams// dur khrod byin gyis rab sangs shing // rigs kyi dag sa tshan ci dang // nga der 'gro ba migs sna kyil// gang kyin dzin pa brjod da pa'o// den dadakyil 'khor khyi tshogs// skad cigs
42a4(rnying rgyud): 'jug byed ces mangs pa dag/ bang po 'bar 'ad kyis 'di thos da// dedage sa sa spyod 'i dkri ra po sangs sa te// deng su byed padab rdzogs gyur das/
42a5(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi bdag gas brtan// oM prad+ya kran d+ha la~M dz+ra la na bi wang dra ga na da ha hUM Te// grasang sngags kun gyis 'dzod byas na// 'jig ta gAs pa sbyar pa li// 'od rdo k+shis pa// ji gas byed gco da maH// de nas ma lda ba na sus/
42a6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad bskul pa'i phyir// rdo rjes gol lan gsum bdag// des tsheg chen po'i sngags chen podzod// de bdi gshegs pa'i rigs so shes rnams// ti dzin badra ba'i rdo rje las// cig tu banas nas 'gro /
42b1(rnying rgyud): byed gtso bo ma rungs rnams// rgyu dang 'bras bu log 'khrul zhing // sangs rgyas bstan pa log mi 'gyur// log pa'i lam la mngon zhen cing // mngon pa'i nga rgyal mthus bsnyems nas// 'jig rten gsum dag phung byed na// zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur
42b2(rnying rgyud): na// khro bo'i rol pa mdzad mod kyi// 'dul bar gzigs nas bkang sros mdzad// kye ma 'dul ba'i tshogs chen dag/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ltar// da lta'i dus 'dir byung ba ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las// log pa'i
42b3(rnying rgyud): lam du 'khrul pa skye// khro bo'i tshul du byung gyur pa// de tshe sems can thams cad kun// shin tu khro zhing gtum par 'gyur// de ltar gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyis// mnar med la sogs gnas ngan len// mi bzang sdug bsngal mtha' la brten//
42b4(rnying rgyud): ji lta bu yi babs kyis 'dul// shin tu gti mug mdongs pa'i tshogs// de bzhin bag chags ngan pa yis// rig 'dzin bdun rgyud gcod byed cing // bstan pa'i gsung rab 'jig par 'gyur// las kyi mun pas 'gro ba 'khyams// dus ngan
42b5(rnying rgyud): rigs ngan phra men ma// gnod byed gdon dang log 'dren dang // srid gsum 'jig cing dam tshig 'dral// 'di lta bu yi thabs kyis ni// sangs rgyas thugs rje rnam 'phrul bstan// nga rgyal chen po mdongs pa yi// lta ba ri po mthu brnyes tshogs//
42b6(rnying rgyud): dwa lta'i tshe ni 'di byung 'gyur// rgyal ba 'das dus sbyor byed cing // ji bzhin las la 'khrul par byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mdzod// mngon spyod rol pa'i thabs chen gyis// 'di dag bstan pa'i dus la bab// srid gsum gdungag/
42b7(rnying rgyud): cing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las// khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pa yi// 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis// khams gsum
43a1(rnying rgyud): mu lus rlom ci dgos// rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo lus// phrag dog 'khrul pa'i drung dag gis// 'jig rten byin gyi thog tu khyams// ji bzhin gnas pa 'a la bral bus// khams gsum rgyag pa'i lam 'khrugs// 'jig rten 'di dag dang /
43a2(rnying rgyud): rje nyid // mngon shes gdul dka' thongs tshogs rnams// khro bar tshogs kyis sbyor bar mdzad// zhes bsgrags so// de gzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa blan med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud la mo rnam par 'phrul pa'i da
43a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor bsgral bya'i le'u ste hi shu ba'o// / de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen pos// padz+ra garar+ya gyi dbang phyug sbas// ma tang du tra la sogs pas// bdud kyi tshogs bcas 'dul ba'i phyir// yum chen sragacig ro la mdzad de// byang chub sems sprin
43a4(rnying rgyud): phyogs brgyar s+pho// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dkyil 'khor gsal// dkyil 'khor 'dus tshogs dkyil 'khor che// dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdag nyid che// dgyes bcas gar bcas gdan la bzhugs// zhal gsum gangs ri mdangs ldan
43a5(rnying rgyud): pa// pad+ma gtun shing rtse gsum thogs// rin chen rgyan sogs dbu chun bcas// dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// snod gcig dus gcig spel pa mdzad// mtha' dang dbus med 'jig rten gnas rnams kun// rig po babring mga' bar bya
43a6(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo cibs drug par khums te rim ldan// kun du zla kham sgo khyud kyu bzhir bcas// rin chen 'bar ba'i thod dbyug rgyan dang bcas// tshad med ye shes 'khor lo la bskyed cing // 'jigs byeng khro bo'i rgyan tshogs yang
43a7(rnying rgyud): 'grungs// nam mkha'i mthang mnyam lhan gyis srub pa'i gnas// smon lom dbang dang thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis// 'jig rten drug dang dris pad+mo phyogs btsun// gzugs khams ma lus dbang du 'asdu ba na// dras pa lnga parta la
43b1(rnying rgyud): phyir// lha chen phyogs skyong tshogs kyis rtsig pa byas// sku bzhi dpal brgyad tshang bar bya ba'i phyir// rgyal chen rigs bzhi bzung nas ka ba byas// theg pa gzhan las 'phags pa'i don// grung chen ka la ling gis ka gtan byas// gling bzhi'i mi rnams dgos
43b2(rnying rgyud): 'dod bskang ba'i phyir// gzar skar mig tshags byas pas 'gyur ldog med// 'jig rten zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir// seng ge ka la sha yis ka zhu byas// 'khor ba'i gcod rnying gtan nas sbyang ba'i phyir// seng ge'i kha nas bdud ci'i 'o ma 'dzag/ thod rus par
43b3(rnying rgyud): khyams rdo rje'i gzer gyis brgyan// zhing chen rnga yab bla re 'phan gdugs dang // thugs rje byang sems kun du khyab pa'i phyir// nyi zlang bar ba'i rgyan chas gsal bar ldan// stsal pa'i me rlung 'brug gis dus bzhir phye// khro bo'i 'byung gnas thugs rje'i sgra dang
43b4(rnying rgyud): bcas// rin chen khri dang pad+ma nyi zla gad na// gser gyi seng ge spyan gsum pa// drug bzhi rtsa la 'phags hi shu brgyad// khri rkang brgyad kyis bar khyams dag la gnas// thugs rje che bas nyi ma nyi shu brgyad// 'jigs pa spangs pa'i seng ge nyi shu brgyad// sprul
43b5(rnying rgyud): skra thob pas dbang mo nyi shu brgyad// kun du 'od kyis la rab gnas pa// rin chen khro rkang 'degs pa'i stobs dang ldan// mgon gnas dben par gzhan dag gis// mthong rkang sbas pa'i chos nyid lung // phrin las rnam par rdzogs pa'i gnas// rigs pa'i
43b6(rnying rgyud): khrig 'drung ta rbeka/ bzhugs gnas ma 'i gyur chos kyi su// de nyid kun du thod kyi lung // padz+ra li bgan phyogs brje 'dzid// sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i sgol// chags par gyur pa d+ma ste// che ba'am yon tan lung du spyod// mkha' dbyangs
43b7(rnying rgyud): rnam dag dri med pas// ma chags pad+ma can gyi lung // stong zheng gsal bas gzhan gang 'phags// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brtsegs pa yin// seng ge 'khor lo tshogs chen pos// thabs dang shes rab ya bral bas// dris med rang gis brnams pa'i//
44a1(rnying rgyud): ma skyes pa yi chos nyid lung // 'od zer gsal bas 'char bas na// yang gabasras pa ye shes lung // 'phro 'du khyab par gyur pa'i tshogs// shes rab rigs kyi gsang ba'i yum// thabs dang shes rab dgyes pa'i ting 'dzin gyi /
44a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs chen yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor chen po ni// bdag po khro bo chen po'i sku nyid du// gsang sngags 'di yis yongs rdzogs bya// oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka pad+ma kro d+hI shwa ri hUM/ ma hA tsaN Da sar+b+ba duSh+TAn phaT// dkyil 'khor bdag po rngam brjid cha lugs dang // 'bar
44a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i me 'od dmar gsal 'phro ba'i mdangs// dbu lnga phyogs pa'i ra las bzhi'i tshul du bzhugs// dbu ma mnyam nyid bde ba dbyings su gzigs// ral pa'i srid ci me 'od bzhin du 'bar// smin ma khro gnyer slar sogs myur ba// lus zungs rgyan chad kyi
44a4(rnying rgyud): byung la// bcwa lnga'i spyan gyis rang gi yul rnams gzigs// rdo rje rin chen khyung gi gshog las gtams// bcu drug rol pa'i spyan dang phyag mtshan dang // sgeg po'i zhabs brgyad chas dang 'chas par gnas// 'jig rten gsum po zhim gyis gzon pa'i rgya
44a5(rnying rgyud): khro bong tshogs bcas 'gyeng pag yum bcas gnod// 'od zeng sna tshogs 'gro ba'i rtse mo la// bder gshegs rigs lnga'i snang ba sna tshogs ston// rang drug po'i gnas 'dul zhing // thams cad rigs kyi dkyil la kho tshul dgod// phyogs pa
44a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kyis// yang yum gnyis kyi dga' ba bskyed par mdzad// gnas su nyi zla bad dkyil zla ba li// sde bsung thugs kyi sa bon yongs rdzogs gsal// oM sarba tA thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra pa pra ba A ta mams nA ga ta
44a7(rnying rgyud): badz+ra swa b+hA pa Ata ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsad+ha badz+ra sa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha~M/ 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo drug rnams la// mkha' 'gro'i tshal mo kham rgya chen mo drug/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can// sa chug ma
44b1(rnying rgyud): 1Ta// bud+d+ha badz+ra oM/ satwa badz+rA d+h+waM/ rat+na badz+ra dz+nyA/ pad+ma badz+ra thA/ kArba badz+ra ta/ g+hun badz+ra phaT/ phyi rol dkyil 'khor khyab par spros byas te// 'gro rnams dud sogs khams rnams dag byas nas// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen brjo dang // ral gri kha b+h+rU~M rtse gsum
44b2(rnying rgyud): brel bu bcas// g.yon pa bdud rtsi thod pa gang bathogs// mkha' 'gro rab gtum rigs kyi dbu rgyan can// rang gi phreng ba dur khrod rgyan gyis bklubs// las kyi kham tu sna tshogs gzugs kyis bzhugs// dpapa chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// long
44b3(rnying rgyud): bya chub 'brel rgyan rnams rdzogs// sku mdog mtshan ma sna tshogs la// phyag spel zangs kyi thod pa thogs// oM shrI khA'i oM shwa ri khA ki traM/ shrI khA'i a/ dmus la 'khor ba bcu drug dag byung ste// thod rus par khyams gnas su bkod par bya/
44b4(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ shrI ( hU~M/ sngags kyi mo brgyad rnabs par sprus bdas// legs sto pa khyi bzung ba par 'a'an/ sa sbyin smra [] la zhe 'azugs// bar rgyas rgyas gnasal kun du la 'ong // oM ti / na
44b5(rnying rgyud): sor kho hUM phaT/ kuM kur ya gra hUM phaT// dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dzaHhU~M baM hoHphyag rgya las// mgo dgu brtsegs pa'i rkang gcig po// mgo brgyad lag brgyad rol pa dang // mgo drug lag drug rkang drug dang // mgo gsum
44b6(rnying rgyud): rkang gsum lag gsum po// dkyil 'khor chen po sgo bzhi ru// tshad med sprul pa'i phyag rgyas rol// de dag rol pa'i byin brlabs las// steng 'og phyogs mtshams ma lus pa'i// thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems// me 'brug rlung 'brug
44b7(rnying rgyud): phyag rgyas gsal// rab tu rdzogs pa'i tshul du byung // oM dzi na la ho tsa ra ya~M g+ha ku ru brda huM hU~M phaT// gzhan yang sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor chags// bse yi byan lag dmar po dang // dung bya khrung khrung la sogs rnams// 'jig
45a1(rnying rgyud): tsam pa'i tshogs kyis bskor// oM ha ha ru ru ma hAHrje shA re bi shA na ya hU~M sl-i thA// kun gyi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM bad+yA bi tas ho ha ha tsam b+h+yo Ta// snying po'i sngags so// aT la sa wa phaT/ a a mAr li hr-ing/ nye ba'i snying bang/
45a2(rnying rgyud): Ar pi dza zhes brjod pas khro bo 'khor lo ma lus par byon zhing // ring gi dkyil 'khor gnyis su med par gyur nas// he rA ka chen po nyid kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i chu'i dkyil 'khor du gnas shing // rang gi dkyil lakho rnams dam tshig bkod par mdzad
45a3(rnying rgyud): daM// de nas sprul pa'i 'khor lo tshogs// ma lus rol par byin brnabyas shing // bdud dang grags byed mo rjes byed cing // rang gi gnas su 'dre bar mdzad// oM hu lu hu lpa ra~M ngo la e a rA li dzaHwu ba hoH/ a pa la ho// oM ma hA ru tra ha la ha la hUM phaT/ dza/
45a4(rnying rgyud): gsum dngos po sbyang bya'i phyir// rngam pa'i khro tshogs phyogs bcur spro// khro 'dzum phyag rgya bstan mdzod cing // he he ru ru'i gsang sngags brjod// ha la rdo rje'i ga rkangs kyis// bdud dang srin po la sogs brgyal par mdzod// oM sarba pa pra ka ra he ta pa phye
45a5(rnying rgyud): ma hA ru \u0f7f hU~M phaT/ oM swarba pa pa ha~M ta pa byi sha khA tang rngu hU~M phaT/ oM sarba pa pA ka ra ha~M ta pa tshig kha tang rngu na hU~M dzaT/ dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor lo 'i tshogs// dpal chen rdo ga thog ser sbyin 'bebs// hUM dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'a
45a6(rnying rgyud): ba'ajig/ hU~M dang pan kyi byin pa rnas pas ma 'i khyag// rdo na drug 'thung khrag gi sa mtshogams// de rje mtshan mo nam lcags tha sa ma 'dral// ma ngagapa gog bdud rnams 'jos pa// rdo rjesar rkyen thog sa tsa ba re zhing 'khrugs// shAm
45a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i da po zas pa/ ye shes rdugs rje yal pa// oM mAhA hU~M // gang gang / ha pa ha ye hU~M phaT// de nas bzung / da ces bskal bskal nas// 'kho gyi longs spyod ngol ma
45b1(rnying rgyud): grol bdud rtsi dang // rus nang dbang por bcas pa la// tshogs kyi langs spyod ston mor mdzad// kun gyi dgyes pa rdo rje'i grus// mthun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis bstod// thugs rje rnam dag pa d+ma'i rang bzhin gas// thugs kar l-i las sprul pa'i byang chub
45b2(rnying rgyud): sems// phyogs bzhi dbus lngar brjid pa'i sku mchog ni// grub pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa'i ye shes lnga// dpal lus khyad par 'phags pa zhal gyi dbyings// dbang mchog lhun gyis grub pa'i rta skad can// thar lam thugs rje thabs mkhas sprul pa yi// de
45b3(rnying rgyud): shes byin pa rlabs khro rgyal 'bum du sprul// smin mdzad smon lam yun rings grub pa yi// dmigs pa'i mthang bral pad+ma yum gyi tshul// chos rnams ma lus gsal bar gzigs pa'o// chags med thugs rje pad+ma'i tshul// sgra skad thams cad mtha' las
45b4(rnying rgyud): gol// zab dang rgyang ring chos kyi don rnams mtshan nyid las// shungs kyi rlung sbom dug gsum rtsad nas chod// zhal gyi stso la 'brel pas rgyud lnga gcod// rno dpal mcho ba s+ya shi rtsad nas gcod// le brgan ljags kyi gsung sbra rgya mtshor 'chad//
45b5(rnying rgyud): rol pa'i phyag gis 'gro ba 'dul la mkhas// gshog bzhi bskyod pas phrin las rnam bzhi mdzad// zhabs rol pas ni zil gnon mdzad pa'i tshul// sku che yan lag rags pa ri bo bzhin// thugs mchog ye shes stong nyid nyi ma bdal// ye shes
45b6(rnying rgyud): lha mchog byin brlabs 'byung ba'i gnas// ngo mtshar rol pas khro bo kun gyi rje// dpa' bo sku mchog mnga' la phyag byatshal bstod// de nas bde chen dbang gi spus// 'khor lo dam tshig spogs mdzad cing // rno rje gsang ba'i sku gsung thugs// gsal bar
45b7(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs bskyed par mdzod// oM AHhUM sarba paT a mr-i ta sa ma yo gi sid+d+hi hUM/ pa ho ka ka ma la su ta sa hUM/ oM badz+ra pa ma ya kro d+ha sa ma ya oM AHhUM/ ma hA yo gi tsit+tA ri pa rak+ta ma la khA li khA'i hUM/ oM kha kha le la ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT/ i d+ha nas ma
46a1(rnying rgyud): ya a la la ho zhes rdo rje'i klu blangs so// pad+mo gar badzad do// bde ba chen pos mchod pas tshim par 'gyur ro// de'i dus na bdud la sogs pa rnams bskal pa tshogs rnams byang chub sems bde bachen po'i ye shes kyis brgyan te// dbang phyu
46a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i mthu sogs kyis// bdag po rig dadzin thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol du 'khod cing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin par gyur to// de'i 'khor rnams kyang dam tshig gi snying po blangs na bran du mdzad par khas blangs
46a3(rnying rgyud): so// snying po brjod pa ni// mA ma dzag sha ru dza ma ma b+h+yo/ sbyar na sgo ba'i sngags ni/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo bad+hA d+hid+haru ts+tshad+d+hohU~M// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal ta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las gsang chen 'dus/
46a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan pAr dbang gis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bsdu mdzad nas// bdag dang gnyis med rol pa'i mthus// khro bo'i rgyal po sku chen dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// gsang gsung
46a5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig phyag rgya che// dkyil 'khor rgya yi dam tshig sgra// bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'o// chos dbyings yon tan 'byung gnas gzhal yus khang // phul ba'i dkyil 'khor rigs kyi cod pan can// rigs kyi dbang phyug kyi 'gro ma lus sgrol// rdo
46a6(rnying rgyud): bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor che// dbang po yul tshogs rigs kyi sku lngar ldan// shes rab thabs dang mi gnyis 'du 'bral med// dus gsum cig rgyar slob bas tshar gsum rgyan// khams gsum yangs sgrol mdzad sde na du che// mi gnas kyu
46a7(rnying rgyud): gsung rab rgya mtsho sgrogs// ma bsgribs ma gsal go 'phang mdzes par mthong // mi ldog yul sgrol stabs drug mdzes par mgyogs// gar yang thogs med byin brlabs shugs dang ldan// 'tshor skad gdangs snyan ma sring spro ba 'gyeng // kham dam
46b1(rnying rgyud): ral pa'i dbus nas dbugs 'byung ba// dpral ba thur po brjid par khyad par dang // rta mgrin 'od 'bar gsal ba'i khyad par ni// don mchog khyad par yon tan chad du byung // ljang ga mo 'bar ta mgo'i rang bzhin ni// 'gyur med ye shes ji bzhin gsang //
46b2(rnying rgyud): thams pa'i 'dangs kyis kham gapa sa ldang par gzigs// rag ma pa ban na dbar ba'i ltung par bzlog/ phrag pa gad pags dang 'ams dpa' bram na// rdul gcig steng na rdul stod khra lo gan// zhing khams gsum dpe ma yul dbang du drung /
46b3(rnying rgyud): rab thabs su 'brel ba'i na skad ni// grub pa'i dpal tshogs tshangs pa'i na dbyangs yin// dang po'i gang pa kyi sa tshal ba'i zhing khams rdzogs// gdangs skad gnyis pa de rab rtse la ngasor// gzung stan gdangs gsum snyan pa'i khyad par ni// bcu drug srid ma byan
46b4(rnying rgyud): tog thar lam ston// stan mig glog ltar 'gru ba cher 'phags shing // sha khrag rlon pa za ba'i srin po 'joms// 'tshor can yid la gdung ba'i rta skad ni// mun mthu'i 'gro ba ma lus gsal bar mdzad// klung byings grangs dang gzigs pabs rtog pa'i don/
46b5(rnying rgyud): hUM las dpal chen khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// gnas ni sna yi dbugs rings dro ba lags// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa 'byung // shings kyi rlung sgom yangs pas ye shes srong // gsang ba'i tshub mas sdug bsngal ldeng nal 'byin// rgya
46b6(rnying rgyud): sprul pas bag chags tshwar gcod de// 'khor ba'i rgyam tsho lugs las bzlogs pa lI// rigs kyi rlung gis drug lha dbyis pra dz+ha la~M// nA maM dkar gzangs rings rje dpal choms// zhal du bdar ba'i byang chub sems// me skyes chos nyid phun la rol/
46b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas dbang spyad drag po yi// cir yang 'gyur ba'i nya ma khung ste// las lnga 'theb pa'i zhal zhes bya// 'khor ba yongs pu sbed po dang // las mangs nyon mongs dbang brtson dang // ts+tsha ba mi skye lung ma bstan// de ljid mdzad pa chen po yi// 'dzeg ldog cir
47a1(rnying rgyud): gyur pa dang // rdod byed gnyis ka'i bstan gyur nas// 'byar zhing bskyod pas ljags nyid do// yig 'bru'i chu nyid bder gshegs thugs// rdo rje myu gu tIng 'dzin thugs// 'od nyid nyon mongs rnam dag 'joms// rig byed ye shes phyag rgya dang /
47a2(rnying rgyud): yig 'bru sa bon phyag rgya dang // yon tan rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya'o// srid pa gsum ste lte ba dang // rgyud dang las ci rim pa'o// de phyir ye shes rol pa'i dbyings// snying po phyag mtshan phye mo dang // bstan par gyur nas mkha' yi dbyings// chos sgo chu ya
47a3(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin// sna tshogs snang lnga rang bzhin med// dur khrod chen po'i gnas kun du// gar gyi dbang phyug rnam par rol// shar du rol pa'i phyag bzhi mtshan ma ni// khro chen snying 'byin kha T+wA~M 'bar ba dang // rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pas rol// de bzhin
47a4(rnying rgyud): lho la sogs pa'i phyag kyang bzhi// thod pa khrag bkang rdo rje lu gu rgyud// rdo rje be con thod rnon 'dzin par rol// me yi zhags pa drag dang khrung gi khwa// sdigs 'dzub rtse la ye shes 'bar// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga ni rab tu 'khrol// rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga gdengs pa dang //
47a5(rnying rgyud): rtse gsum rtse gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ ye nas ma skyes dang pa'i cho 'phrul ston// ye shes lnga yi yon tan khyad par ni// rin chen dra ba sangs rgyas stong gis brgyan// klu rgyal nag po 'dra ba'i jebs shes kyis// rtse ba rnam thar sgo gsum ste//
47a6(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs// sprul pa'i don mdzad dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ston// gsang ba'i yum bzhis sku la 'khril byed cing // byang chub sems bzhi de nyid ston par byed// rdo rje dra bas rin chen glog 'gru ba// khyud gshog a mo de bra gshog sder mo can//
47a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis kyi thugs rje shar// thabs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas g.yas nas parkyang // srid gsum ma rig mun pa sel byed pa'i// shes rab rje stong rtsa gnyis g.yon nas khyab// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i byin brlabs che//
47b1(rnying rgyud): pa 'phros pas dug gsum rgyun mi 'chad// sna tshogs rol pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa yi// phrin las brgyad kyis bdag nyid sku che ba'i// dpa'i bo stag gis steng phyogs 'dul zhabs brgyad// rgya bye'u lcags kyis shar lho de zhabs brgyad de// rdo rje 'chol bas lho
47b2(rnying rgyud): yi phyogs rnga brjid// bse khrab srug pos lho nub nang pa brkyang // sna tshogs brjid pas byang shar mchoms su son// shu ke na der gyis byang shar zhabs mdzes shing // mche ba dmar pos nub byang brkyangs pa'i gdan// spul nag 'khril pa'i zhabs kyis 'og
47b3(rnying rgyud): phyogs 'dul bar mdzad// khro brgyad gnon cing gzir bas zhabs brdebs shing // dug chen bcom zhing sbal tshigs gnon// brang gnon ldan pa 'jom zhing 'jigs mdzad dang // 'khor gyi sku la spras pas ye shes gsal// sku nyid 'khor la sbas pas dbyings
47b4(rnying rgyud): kyis brgyan// thugs rje rol pas gzhal yas khang du bstan// phrin las rol pas hUM mdzod hUM gis brgyan// sa bcu zil gnon stobs bcu'i dbang dang ldan// de nas gar gyi dbang phyug che// dam tshig gar gyi byin brlabs kyis// rgyun gyi ting 'dzin la gnas
47b5(rnying rgyud): nas// yum chen gze ldan dgyes par mdzad// dam tshig chen po'i mgunA ni// minyes mdzod gzi ldan dbang phyug ma// ji snyed bud med sna tshogs dang // gsung gi rdo rje mi smad do// gtso bo rab tu gdungs pa lA// rab tu sba bar gad byed pa// sreg pa'i mig
