47b6(rnying rgyud): gis brgyan nas su// sri zhu'i sems kyis gdungs pa la// ye shes tshogs kyis rab bskor ba'i// lha mo'i tshigs rnams bskor byas te// rang gi phyag rgyagi dkyil 'khor du// gnyis med mnyam pa'i rgya gzhi gdab// byang chub sems tshogs gsal ba'i
47b7(rnying rgyud): rgyun// thes pa'i dkyil 'khor don can gas pa// dbyings phyug sprul chags pas ma yas dag // nges pa'i ye shes rol pa'i bya// sbyong gsum dbang por gdon ma ga// 'jig rten gsum gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ dus gsum kun gyi gnas da
48a1(rnying rgyud): rten// phyogs bcu dkyil 'khor thams cad na// dam tshig chen po de nyid mang // phye nang gsang ba'i mthar phyin pa// thams cad badz+ro rnam dag pas// cho 'phrul rnam kun de bzhin nyid// thugs rje chags pa'i phrin las kyis// dbang drag
48a2(rnying rgyud): phrin las gnod sbyin gnas// gnyis med 'bar bas thams cad sreg/ las dang bag chags sgrib sogs kun// gnas nas gshegs mdzad ye shes tshugs// snyun gyis dang pas kun du 'joms// snyigs ma lnga brgya dus kyi mtha'// srid gsum sems
48a3(rnying rgyud): can 'dul dka' ba// 'phro 'du 'khyil pa'i dod mdangs mdzad// 'jig rten mkhyen dang mya ngan 'das// gnyis med thugs kyis sa le mkhyen// de ltar dgongs pa'i khyad par de// 'gro bu mtha' dka 'dul don du// rnam par thar pa dbu gsum bstan//
48a4(rnying rgyud): g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing ga/ ye shes drug gi phyag mtshan ni// g.yas pas rdo rje rnge'u chung dang // mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pas rol// dril bu skya zhags thod rnon g.yon// bskal pa'i mo re sbrul zhags dang // zod rten yang
48a5(rnying rgyud): byas// skrag pa dpa' bo 'jigs su rung // dgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed// snying rje dam dang zhi ba'i sku// sku gsung thugs kyi gar thabs can// 'jigs byed khro bo rnam par rgyal// skye ba med pa'i chos dbyings su// mtshan ma med pa'i
48a6(rnying rgyud): bshad pas// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rgyal// longs sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis// mi 'jigs stobs mchog gdan stengs na// sangs rgyas zhing khams thams cad du// zab mo rgya chen chos ma bstan// dngos dang dngos med gsal byed
48a7(rnying rgyud): pas// me long lta bu'i ye shes dang // sprul pa 'gro mang don gyi phyir// pal mang dkod pa'i sa rnams su// dngos po mtshan ma rnam 'phrul gyis// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes tshogs// thams cad mtshan ma nam mkha' dngos// de nyid sgo btags
48b1(rnying rgyud): chos dang bral// kun ldan bya mas sems de kho na// rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med// he ru ka yi bde chen dbyings// chos rnams kun gyi rgyu yin de// 'od gsal ba yi gnas 'jug pas// rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya bshad// de bzhin
48b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor rgyu'i don phyung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan dpal gyi skus// gar gyi dbang phyug lhun grub mchog/ thugs je brjid
48b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i stobs ldan pas// yon tan khyad par bstan pa'i phyir// nam mkha'i ri mo phyag rgya'i rngo ma// cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs pa'i jo ma// zil gyis gnon pa'i gnas mchog jom// tshim ngam chen po'i stang stabs rngom// sku mdog brgyad kyis
48b4(rnying rgyud): brjid pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya'i don dang ldan pa'i lha// ha~M lnga 'brel par gyur pa'i zhal// glu kha ma cir yang 'gyur ba'i ljags// ske shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i choms// rnam pa'i 'brug lhur sgrogs pa'i dbyangs// ting 'dzin nam mkha'i skar tshegs bzhin//
48b5(rnying rgyud): phrin las rgya mtsho rlabs tshogs ltar// byin brlabs cho 'phrul sprin phrang tshogs// mdzad pa'i rol mo gar thabs rngam// bdud dang srin mo 'joms byed rnams// khams gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan// stong gsum dus gcig bskal pa'i zhing /
48b6(rnying rgyud): rtog pa 'joms pa'i brtul phugs mchog/ sku gsung thugs mchog yon tAn+da ni// dzAm brjid sum snun drug mngar// rgya chen yan+d+ra lag rags pas brjid// grangs ma rkyen dang 'tsham pas brjid// dkur gshogs gtso bo mthong bas brjid/
48b7(rnying rgyud): zhugs tha ma yin pas bang // gdangs chen skyong gsum gang bas brjod// don pa nyi che re ston pas brjid// gsal bas mtha' gnyis yangs pas brjid // bregs rje thugs ngam mthar phyin brjid// ma rmongs thabs kyis 'jal pas 'arji
49a1(rnying rgyud): gagasus sa nga// mdam nam gas papa nga// nga bya badz+rad/ na pa pa nga sadapas pa // bsu gyu / thal ma dam pas brgyadan
49a2(rnying rgyud): labar ba ldan dang sa mgon pa dbadzad/ ga ma la rjes btsun pas padi/ sa sa pa d+hA rdugs/ sa gdun bul bag par bya// dem pan pa ma// klog
49a3(rnying rgyud): gsum byung// sa'am sarnam gci ba bya// na ngal gri pa 'du/ spyod pa 'i thas pazhin // de gas nam rnaMs/ gapa 'dir pa'i grags na/ rjen dmas ldam// ra
49a4(rnying rgyud): stugang rgyal gyis// gang 'dod gnas su 'gro rje zhing // dregs bye tshogs rnams shel gnan te// bcul lugs spyod pas zla ga zhing // 'dul thugs spyod pa sna tshogs pas// bud tsam gcig la gnas mi dge par byed// bcom ldan pa
49a5(rnying rgyud): ki'i// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// ji ltar sprul zhing cir yang sbeng // mtshan nyid gcig tu mdzes pas// sku gsung thugs skas bas ma yas tsho// rang bzhin las dang yon tan gyi// byin ba rlabs ya mtshan sgrib med gsal// khams
49a6(rnying rgyud): gsusu kun las tsal 'phags shing // rang gi dkyil 'khor rnam gsal pas// byin brlabs 'grogs cid spyor// chos dpe meng 'i spyod rdzogs pa dang // sbal lnga sa tshogs 'dum pa'o// chog gi gsung rang rig pa'i gsang // bzhi la sras
49a7(rnying rgyud): drug gis brjid// dug gsum sku gsung thugs kyis sbyangs// dug lnga bde ba chen pos spyod// dbying ba las ye shes rim pa'i mthus// bye 'gro ma lus rgyas gtapa na ma// rang bzhin dag pa'i dbyings su spyod// rgyal ba gang gi thugs rjes kyang // 'di la la
49b1(rnying rgyud): dis med// srid pa gsum du ga byas su/ da pa gnas ga rgyags gas nga sa// snron sa su ga pa / nga ba tu gnas su bcags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgangs pa blan med pa'i gsung 'ad pa mtshad/
49b2(rnying rgyud): rol pa'i rgyud las// khro la jom 'arjid ston pa'i coM nyer bu sam pa // de das 'khor gyig tso bo mchog/ gsang ba'i bangag rlo ma sogs pas// yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal lo// mchod pa rgya chen phul byas te// 'gro ba brtse ba'i sems can
49b3(rnying rgyud): las// bsrub pa'i rim pa zhu bar mdzad// bcom ldan dngos grub kun gyi bdag/ gdul bya kun gyi don gyi phyir// thun mong dngos grub ji lta bur// de bzhin mchog gi dngos grub dang // bsgrub par bya ba'i thabs ni gang // las kyi cho ga ci lta bAr/
49b4(rnying rgyud): yan lag tshogs pa'i ldan byas nas// tshe 'di mchog tu gyur ram ci// thabs mang cho ga bshad par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang // rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs te// mi 'ongs 'gro la phan pa'i phyir// sgra gsung thugs kyi sgor
49b5(rnying rgyud): pa las// ngo mtshor 'phrul pa 'di gsungs so// rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig che// nam gsum phyag rgya la gnas nas// lus kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa ni// gnas bzang dag tu brtsam par bya// phyag rgya'i grogs la brten pa na// bezlas brjod yan lag ma
49b6(rnying rgyud): nyams par// gsang sngags yi ge bcu bzhi pa// sum 'bum dag tu brjod byas nas// rol pa mtshan ma bskyab pa'i phyir// mchog chen mu tshon ma mnyams pa// rab brtags dur khrod gnas nas blangs// khro bo chen po'i tsham ngam gyes// yungs kar thab
49b7(rnying rgyud): ba la sogs pas// sum b+ha ni yi sngags brjod cing // yi dgas gshin rje bskrad par bya// de nas dri zhim spong ba yi// dag byed chu yis legs babus te// me tog phreng sogs rkyen gyis brgyan// gsung gi phyag rgya byin brlabs shing // dpa
50a1(rnying rgyud): rang gi khyim du byu // klu drug dbyungs drug bzlas pa yis// khro N+Dal rol pa'i bro yis spangs// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor nyams dgra'i mchog/ rtswa khron 'dom gang khA yis bstod// ji bzhin la sogs chog bzhin// rdzas dang
50a2(rnying rgyud): gzhi dag ba zhing // sa bon gnas pa'i byas rdzogs nas// bsrung zhing draci pa 'khor bri bar bya// yab yum bsgrub pa'i grogs bcas rnams// dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir gnas bzung // mchog chen dkyil 'khor kha ru bzhag/ bslang ba ma
50a3(rnying rgyud): lo legs ldan pas// stod nyid ting 'dzin nas brtsams te// dkyil 'khor mnyes sogs rdzogs byas nas// r-I langs dgug cing gzhug bya ste// bar chad med par bzlas brjod bya// oM bi ran trag sha ta ha wa ti'i lo ma ta ya man ta tsan tra hU~M phaT/
50a4(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin 'od zer gsal ba'i rgyun// zur ma chag par brjod byas te// 'bum tsho gcig gis g.yo 'gyur zhing // gnyis kyis 'od dang bcas par snang // 'bum phrag gsum gyis sgra bstan zhing // phangs te kun du lta bar byed// de tshe rnal
50a5(rnying rgyud): 'byor dbang po yis// sgra nas bzung nas bsgyel byas la// rta mchog sngags kyis dbang du bya// rdo rje khyang gshog phyag rgya yis// don gyi gapung gis go bar spyod pas bro yang brdung // ting 'dzin sngags dang yan lag rnams// ma bral rang gi gnas 'ongs
50a6(rnying rgyud): te// dkyil 'khor mtha' ma bskor byas nas// mchong pa pro \u0f89\u0fa4 dang bcas pas// lho rnams mnyes pa'i cho ga bya// de nas brtul zhugs chen po yis// go la lang g+ha gnon pa yis// bro la sogs pa rdzogs byas nas// deng gser du gyur pa
50a7(rnying rgyud): yin// de ni mchod dang sbyin pa dang // rang la dgos pa'i yo byad bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal na mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ ro langs bsgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// nas
50b1(rnying rgyud): ra gyi dbang phyug gis// gzi ldan yum dang rol mdzad cing // 'khor gyis zhus pa'i tshig gsan nas// thun mong dngos grub bzang po nyid// ma 'ongs 'gro la phan gdags phyir// rim pa bzhin du phan gdags mdzad// dbang thob dam tshig la kunas
50b2(rnying rgyud): swa// yid mthun gnas mchog bzang po ru// mig sman sbyor ba bsgrub byas te// byin brlabs ldan pas 'gro don byas// rang gi ting 'dzin la gnas pas// rang gi gsang sngags 'bum rdzogs nas// mtshan ma pha mo mthong ba dang // bsgrub pa'i
50b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya// dkyil 'khor gang+gA yang rung ba yi// phyag rgya gsang sngags ting 'dzin ldan// rin chen sngags kyi bzlas brjod ni// 'bum phrag gusam du gsung bar bya// oM pad+ma ma tsa ga hu a la sa ma ra si ti yo na hA phaT/
50b4(rnying rgyud): kyil 'khor gnas kyi rtags mthong nas// grong mtha'i gnas su 'gro byas te// sras kyang ma mthong mtshan mo rung // lha 'dre gtum po'i grong du bskyad// rang gi 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyis// mi rgod btsan 'brang bsrung bar bya// der ni byan d+ha mtshan
50b5(rnying rgyud): ldan du// gzi chen mar ni bltas nas su// mtshan gcig yal breng sngags bzlas shing // ting 'dzin ma nyams sbyor ba byas// sku rengs dang po 'chung ngus su// dud pas bdugs te bcang bar bya// gu dang bro yi brtul zhugs dang // lha rnams kun
50b6(rnying rgyud): steng skyabs kyis// gnas de'i bdag po dbang du sdang// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags ldan pas// slar nyid mig sman shes gcig byug/ de nas 'khor gyi tshogs bsgo zhing // skye 'gro kun la gsang bar bya// pad+ma bsrub pa'i an Ta las// ci 'dang
50b7(rnying rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan yang ril bu'i sgrub thabs ni// bdud rtsi lnga las 'byung ba yi// rjes dag sha lnga dang bsres te// thod pa mtshan ldan nang bzhag nas// dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan gnas su// thags dang shes rab ldan gnas su// gar gyi
51a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa / nan na ku
51a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor de yid dbyas bzhig pas// bsrung ba dazlas paskyed bya zhing // rig pa rjed pa'i bsang rdzig / bram zug ga ba dbar rtse// 'di zer sngags 'byung bar 'gyur// oM ma hA bad+das pa~M ta tra lu hu wa hU~M phaT swAt+ma/ de nas dris phre ma sa /
51a3(rnying rgyud): phyag tu bzung byas nas// gang 'dod gnas su 'gro byed cing // ci 'dod padag grub par byed// b+ha yi gnas mchog nyams dga' bas// sA rdo gI cig gis 'khor bar nus// gzhan yang btud len bzang po nyid// rjes bu gang gis bsgrub 'dod pas// bdud /
51a4(rnying rgyud): rtsi rgyal po a rA ra// gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pas mchog/ ny+tsi sh+'u rtsa gcig ra bor sba// sul rangs rgyas par gyur pa dang // ba gcin phur mo nyal ba dang // ser sna'i ba mang btse bar b+ha// de nyid skad rtsi dang ltur bas// nyi sh+'ur+Na gcig zhag gi b+har/
51a5(rnying rgyud): ri'i tshad du brjid cing bza'// dkyil la bar gsang ba pa brten nas// gang gyi dab gag+sa srung ba rnams sheng// rig 'dzin pa yi gas rjod cing // mtshan rtogs gsal bar ma mthong ba// yan le ma nyams pa rtson 'grus bskyed// oM pan+d+ha
51a6(rnying rgyud): gai ha ra ha rA ti sa na hU~M phaT swA hA// gsang sngags sam 'bram ma rdzogs par// ad+ha r-I oM 'bras pa zang stong gi tshad// legs pa sbyar te zas pa'i mthus// nad dang zug rngu'i tshogs 'joms shing // me rad+ya bad pa phun sum tshogs// rgas la
51a7(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'i skyon sel cing // rig 'dzin gnas su 'gro bar byed// de bzhin dbang po'i lag pa dang / kha ra bra ngam nye shing dang // zur nul sra thil sogs pas// rang gi cho ga shes pa yis// reg pa 'dzin pa'i sngags kyis 'grub// kar dang
51b1(rnying rgyud): kyil 'khor la ni brten byas te// so snor ma nyams sbyangs pa'i sa// bA pheM 'o ma dung sbyar zhing // bA pa~M marA gyis gzungs btab nas// mtshan ma ma byung bar du gzhag/ de ni rig 'dzin dngos grub thog/ oM pad+d+ho ad drA a he ben d+hu ga/
51b2(rnying rgyud): oM pad+ma ra rgya a gu ra tA da ra sha hU~M phaT/ oM pad+mo sa monA bi sha gre hUM phaT/ oM b+ha lI sa bau ti mgo ra na hU~M phaT/ oM pad+mo me sha a nan da ta ya ka ra hU~M phaT/ de dgu las rnams 'grub pa dang // rtag tu rang gis 'char byas shing // gsang ba'i sngags laH
51b3(rnying rgyud): la brten nas// tshe 'di za par gyur pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cid kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal nam zlog rol pa'i spyad las/ thun mong gi dngos thub bsgrub pa'i leT sti nyer gyu ba ro// / de nas gar gyid bar phyug nyid
51b4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya rol pa'i sngar bcas kyis// snod ldan byang rgyab sems dpa' dag/ mchog gi dngos gru bskyed byed pa'i// rig 'dzin gnas kyi mtshan nyid bshad// dmar po dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// b+han d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa brgyad// pad+ma'i 'dab ma yi bkram
51b5(rnying rgyud): nas// tshe 'das sngags kyis brgyan par bya// de ni bza' bcung longs spyod rtogs// ma nyams phran susu rdzogs par spyad// gar dbang lha la mos pa yis// gsang sngags rgyal po rjod byed cing / sum 'bum bslus pa'i zungs ched nas// mtha' sngags
51b6(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyis brgyan byas te// rtags mthong bar du bzlas brjod brtsam// oM a s+yA sha oM a yu shwa so ta pr-i// 'od zer du ba lta bu dang // phyag rgya'i dbyings dang 'byung ba'i dus// bro drug bla dang gang bcas pas// brtul zhugs chen po bdud rtsi sprang // sku gsung
51b7(rnying rgyud): thugs mchog phyag rgya che// gsang ba'i yum bskyed snying po mchog/ oM e ka te pa~M gte ma tang ka te swA hA// ma nyams nyams pa'i phyag rgya ragasal// gnyis bu med par sbyor ba yis// rdo rje pad+mor ldan byas pas// thabs kyi phyag rgya'i cho 'phrul la//
52a1(rnying rgyud): gsutsun gas sa thu gsus// sa bad+magasu ba than// sa sa gas pa pa ba sa coM// ga rmAn+tu/ dz+nyAn pa byasarnam par 'thob sos// sas btsu pangs nas thugs pacwalda na // thung rdza sa sus du
52a2(rnying rgyud): tshe yi rgyan// rtsub po la gsal bar mdang// bad 'a bab rgyad pa nyi me bcas// rA s+t+ra sngags dab da hUM// hU~M gis gsor zhing a yis bskyod// yang dang phyed du bsgral ba ni// sku gsung dbyings su gyur zer// de la byung chub sems mchog
52a3(rnying rgyud): spyan// b+han d+ha mtshani ldan nang du bcug/ rnal 'byor gar dang legs bcas pas// byag gis tshigs bcu gu blang zhing // bkra shis gar dang dbyangs su bcas// longs stod ston mo kun gsol zhing // dngos gru bdon phyer gsol ba gdag// de bzhin gshegs
52a4(rnying rgyud): paM thams cad kyi dgongs pa thA na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po lus tshe bsgrub pa'i le dz+raM s+t+wa~M nyung drug paH// de nas kar gyi sa/ mchog gis// thams cad bdud rtsir byin ba rlabs nas// sbyin snod bcud ma lus sman/
52a5(rnying rgyud): rigs lnga'i sku ru bsgrub pa'i phyir// rang las byung ba'i rang bzhin dang // dngos grub snying po kun bsdus bshad// chos rnams ma lus rnams brtags nas// rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor tshul du gnas// de las 'byung ba'i dngos rnams kyis// de nyid lcadu
52a6(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba bya// dang por bsod nams tshogs bsugs shing / dza rje bla ma mnyes byas pas// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dgra tu// lha nyid nye bar bsgoms byas pas// dkyil 'byor chen po brtsam par bya// rigs su lha yi dkyil 'khor gyis/
52a7(rnying rgyud): kyithag 'dzu ba rje ngas 'dag mamigs/ rje ba sa bdin shi ma rdzun rdzumag sum nga byags pazhir dag/ pa
52b1(rnying rgyud): sngags dang ting 'dzin mthus// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub// mchod cing mnyes par byas nas ni// las kun grub pa'i gsang sngags brjod// oM pad+mod rje 'i gyur ro d+his rba raSh+Ta a mr-i ta/ oM AHhU~M swA hA/ de la bod dang du ba dang // dri
52b2(rnying rgyud): dadeng lha mo rtags dag na// bzlas brjod thun mong khyad par dag/ 'bum tsho gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur// de nas grub pa'i rtags mthong nas// de dag btag tsam spang bya zhing // mkha' dgro rol pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// bsod nams steng zhing byin gyis
52b3(rnying rgyud): brlabs// dkyil 'khor bkod pa rgyan dang bcas// khro bo 'bar bar zhal sbyar zhing // yab yum gdung ba'i gru dbyangs dang // byang chub sems dpa' 'phro 'du yis// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas bzhugs par// bdud kyi gar gyi dbang phyug 'byed// sbyar
52b4(rnying rgyud): nyid khro bo dkyil 'khor gyis// gzugs 'dul gtso bo'i thugs kar zhugs// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun bkug nas// dam tshig bdud rtsi gnyis med 'gyur// slar 'byung pad+mo'i rgyal po'i sku// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gdan la bzhugs// mchod
52b5(rnying rgyud): bstod dga' bas mnyes byas nas// pro ga ra g+ha yis thugs dam bskang // khyad par gsang sngags rgyal po'i mthus// ye shes lngar ldan 'od zer can// oM ma hA sarba ta thA ga ta pany+tsa i mr-i ta ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT swA hA/ ji srid mtshan ma ma byung bar// sngags kyi
52b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal po brjod par bya// de nas nya mgrin phyag rgya yis// sgrub pa chen po gsang bu'i don// rdo rje rta mchog phyag rgya che// bdud rtsi rdzas kyis dbang bskur zhing // rnal 'byor grogs bcas tshim par bya// phyogs rnams kun nas gdungs pa'i glus// dkyil
52b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor skya dang tha ma mchod// dngos grub gsol ba'i tshig brjod cing // dga' ba'i mongs spyod rgya char bya// lha rnams kun la dgyes 'dul zhing // dem med dbang po sprinas kyis bskrad// bdud ci gte bas lus rtag 'gyur// gi ye shes las la
53a1(rnying rgyud): skyes// de nas las mdzad srung ma dang // mgon tshogs gtor mas mnyes byas te// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen po// rab tshogs 'gro ba'i don phyir bsngo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyangs pa dpal rta mchog rol pa'i gyur
53a2(rnying rgyud): chen po las bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// // de nas dmachog rol pa'i sku dbus su// dkyil 'khor dbus su dgyes tshul gyis// 'gro rnams kun la bskul mdzad cing // sprin las gsang ba'i don bshad mdzad// bsam gtan las
53a3(rnying rgyud): kyis 'byung ba yi// zhi gyis dbang drag mngon spyod dang // mnan bzlog rengs dang bsad la sogs// ting 'dzin gsal nas goms pa'i mthus// bdag dang gzhan don las la sbyar// zhi ba zhi pa'i yi ge ste// bsgrub bya zla dkyil la bzhag nas// rnam
53a4(rnying rgyud): par snang mdzad 'od sngags kyis// dus gsum lha dang mngon sbyar zhing // byang chub sems kyi bde bskyed de// zug rngu rtog pa rnam par spel// yun rings goms par bstan pa'i mthus// me 'bar gnas kyang zhi bar nus// rgyas la rgyas pa'i gzugs
53a5(rnying rgyud): bgyis te// rin chen 'byung ldan la 'byung ba'i// 'khor los sgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis// ser po 'od dpung 'bar ba brjid// rang gi btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas// bder gshegs byin brlabs kun bskus shing // sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang //
53a6(rnying rgyud): phrin las sgo nas brtsam par mdzad// sngags dang 'od zer gsang ba yis// rin chen sna bdun gser la sogs// mkha' mdzod char sprin bzhin du 'bebs// tshogs rnams rang shis longs spyod cing // 'gro rnams gzhan la smin par byed/ thas
53a7(rnying rgyud): dang dbang du bsdus phyir ro// 'od dpung dmar po mtha' yas su// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs shing // chags pa chen pos 'gro 'dul ba// rigs kyi ting 'dzin sngags kyi mthus// lha tshogs 'gro rnams dbang lud cing // 'khor bcas
53b1(rnying rgyud): bar gyur pa yin// gang zhig sdung ba'i sems yod pa// 'phrad pa bzhin rgyas chags par 'gyur// gang zhig gsang pa'i las grub mdzod// de ni mthing nug las kyi khro bo'i nying 'dzin las// khro ba thul pa'i 'phro 'dra yis// bslab bya dang phra gang dgrag pa
53b2(rnying rgyud): me yi dkyil 'khor la gzhag ste// shin tu ma rungs mtshon char ldan// dkon mchog gsum la sngo byed cing // skye bo yong sA la 'tsho ba dang // slob dpon kan+da la bsngo ba dang // sangs rgyas thugs rjes bzod mi mdzad// las kyi khro bo sna tshogs kyis//
53b3(rnying rgyud): mnon na sde 'od 'bar 'phros nas// sdig pa nu bcwa la mdud cingag// smyung ga dang // zhig 'thu ma dus bla yis// bkod pa'i hU~Ml dzu ba zhing da sdes// hU~M tsam med pa bsgru ba dang // sems nying byed pa chen po'i gnas
53b4(rnying rgyud): dag ting 'dzin gsang sngags dang // dkyil 'khor so so'i rnam pa bslab// oM b+hU tA tsakra sa ma bA ga te la~M tsA na che ge mo shAn+tiM ku rU swA ha/ oM rat+na saM b+ha gu ru mA ma ki che ge mo puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ oM yA mi te sa ra ba ra ho che ge mo pa sha~M ku ru swA hA/
53b5(rnying rgyud): sa~Mn+d+ha swA dz+dza/ ngan la pa gas / rjeg krol 'khor la gnas te/ lpags dzin byung byu mas// tshig ma du // gan nga ngas dang ngos pa /
53b6(rnying rgyud): bskrad pa dang // gnon la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang // rang gi lta ba'i sbyor ba yis// bsam gtan sngags kyis 'grib par 'gyur// de bzhin gu shegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po pas
53b7(rnying rgyud): bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba'i rim pa ste nyer brgyad pa'o// / de nas sbyor ba'i rgyal po dang // phrin lis kun gyi mchog gyur pa'o// rdzas rnams rten pa'i mtshan ma nyid// 'dod 'dod 'bras bu srub byed pa'o// gar gyi dbang phyug phyag rgya'i sku/
54a1(rnying rgyud): tu ma tu sasmra // sa ga ku tunan
54a2(rnying rgyud): sa smra
54a3(rnying rgyud): sa skrun// da zhing la ye/ bam sa sa pa'i / rung shig gzugs 'dod ba ldan pa pa / gang sngag 'a jug par /
54a4(rnying rgyud): phyog gi dang smras pa dang // dbang la sogs ni sgrub 'dod paste// de dag de dang matsun pa da // mas kyi kyil 'khor la gnas bas sa// b+hag r+b+ha'i mtshan ma bsngal b+has te// rang gi las su rnam par gnas// dgrag la sogs pa'i las
54a5(rnying rgyud): dag dang // sngags kyu la sag+ha sa las kyi bzlog/ rten gyi mtshan ma pral bang/ da byub sa pa chen 'dre/ thabs dang // brjod gas nags la/ las kyi ma' ban te/ ge btsu zhi sathogs pa/
54a6(rnying rgyud): grangs kyis bslab par b+ha// mu~M b+he mo gi sa mA ng+ga bAn ga ga na rba wa ru lu hU~M phaH/ dang po rtsa pa'i lcags kyi/ gsum 'bram dag tu zlas byas nas/ slar yang de yi grangs mthun pa// gang 'dod pas rnams 'grub par gyur/
54a7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa blan med pa gas dus brags kyi gangal bad dpas bya stonas thams sun sabyas pa byed par// dag
54b1(rnying rgyud): gral bu'i byin brlabs gnas pa'i thabs// rnam pa yis ni bsam byas te// grong khyer la sogs bsrung 'dod pas// rgyu dang bye ma la sogs la// gsang sngags rgyal po brjod par bya// oM na mo g+ha rtswas pabi d+yA ra ni mo sA de ni nga sha ni ra shwa kra ra kra ta hU~M phaT// rang gi
54b2(rnying rgyud): lha yi sbyor ldan pas// stong du brjod cing phyogs bcur gtor// gang srung ba dgra shis 'gyur cing // 'byung po'i tshogs kyis mi tshugs 'gyur// gzhan yang ri'u cha dgu pa yi// 'khor lo shing shun tshogs la bri// mu khyud dag gis mtha' bskor nas// gas
54b3(rnying rgyud): das ga sa ga pa gnasam nga ga byed pang // gas da
54b4(rnying rgyud): skar gum bzang pos byug ste byas te// do rna mas dbus phra gzhag/ ga gi ming bcas bzlas pa sa nga // bzhugs pa'i snang ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// gzhan yang tham pa bzang pyo rba// bdud ci 'os sbyar ba dag// rang gi gsang sdigs yungs kar
54b5(rnying rgyud): bcas// gang dbang chags pa'i skur ba sgoms shing // sngags tha~Md bsrung bar 'gyur bar byed// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad kyi// gsang ba 'di nyid bshad pa las// phyog su bad+ma'i byang chub sems bcas pas// de la thams cad dga'
54b6(rnying rgyud): mdzad cing // lha rnams kun la sprir bsgo mdzad// de dag dang pa'i shugs kyis ni// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'dri bzung zhing // de 'dzin gzhan la'ang byams phyir 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dpal ha mchog rol pa'i rgyud
54b7(rnying rgyud): po zhes bya ba las bsrung ba'i le'u ste sum cu ba'o// / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po'i rtsa ba rdzogs so//
55a1(rnying rgyud): rdu gar skad du/ shrI he ru ka kA ru Na krI Di ta tAn tra guh+ya ga~M b+hI r+ya uta ta ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal he ru ka steng rje rol pa'i rgyud gsar bzab mo'i mchog ces bya ba// dpal rdo rje sems drapa' lnga phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ska/ bdag
55a2(rnying rgyud): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po dam tshig gi sdom pa gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po dbang brnyes pa/
55a3(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po/ khams gsum thams cad kyi bdag po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i skabs
55a4(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pa/ che mchog he ru ka'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bsrung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rin po che gsang ba rdo rje mchog tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das bud med kyi dkyil na gsung brjod pa
55a5(rnying rgyud): med par bzhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa/ rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang / 'grib par byed pa'i
55a6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba chen mo'i g.yog dang / 'byung ba chen po lnga dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa'i lha'i tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong gis khyab pa 'di lta ste/ snying po ye shes rdo rje dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rdo rje dang me long ye shes rdo rje dang / so sor kun gartog pa'i ye shes rdo
55a7(rnying rgyud): dang / mnyam pa nyid ye shes rdo rje dang / bya ba nan tan ye shes rdo rje dang / nam mkha' ye shes rdo rje dang / rlung ye shes rdo rje dang / me ye shes rdo rje dang / chu ye shes rdo rje dang / sa ye shes rdo rje dang / thabs dang shes rab ye shes rdo rje dang / gzugs ye
55b1(rnying rgyud): shes darje dang / sras shes rang dang / dral shes do rje dang / ya shas rdo dang / rdeg su shes rnga rje dang / sku ye shes rdo rdu dang / gsung la shas rdo rje dang / thugs phye shes rje dang/ blun brjen po la shes de rje dang / kun du babang po ye shes mo dang / gdung
55b2(rnying rgyud): gri dbang po yi shes rdo rje dang / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / zhi ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / gdul dka' 'dal ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyal ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / me tog gi ye shes rdo rje dang / rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / de
55b3(rnying rgyud): shes rdo rje dang / te ma'i khro bo ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyal mtshan ye shes rdo rje dang / rdo rje sba ye shes rdo rje dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba ye shes no mo dang / gzhon nu ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyu ye shes rdo rje dang / gsung med pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / sna tshogs kyi ye shes
55b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dang / go tshwa ye shes rdo rje dang / yang dag pa bab par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / 'dus pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / bde ba chen po'i ye shes rdo rje dang / byang chub sems ye shes rdo rje dang / rin chen dbang bskur ba ye shes rdo rje dang / pad+mo dmar po ye shes
55b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dang / dam tshig ye shes rdo rje dang / mchod pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo g.yog dang bcas pa rnams la 'di lta ste/ shin tu dga' ba'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / rmongs par byed pa'i dbang mo ye shes rdo rje dang / gsod ce
55b6(rnying rgyud): zlakhwa'i dbang mo ye shes rdo rje dang / rdo rje dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / ye shes dbyings phyag ma ye shes rdo rje dang / rin chen dbyings phyag mA ye shes rdo rje dang / pad+ma'i dbyings ldag ma ye shes rdo rje dang / las kyi dbyings phyag ma ye shes rdo rje dang /
55b7(rnying rgyud): gnon par byed ma 'o shes ngo dang / 'dum pa par byengs pa zhes rdorje dang / rmongs par byed mi ma shes rdo rje dang / rgyas 'debs pa dbyed ma ye shes ngo rje dang / badrod par byed pa ye shes dang da / gsod par byed pa mi shesado dang / pa
56a1(rnying rgyud): khyod ma ye shes rdo rdza dang/ gcod par bya sa yogs dang dang / thugs rnyed ces thub pa shes nga dang / rdzabargyad sa rgyab sa shApa da dang / yan lag zims cad 'jog d+ha ya shas rdon dang / 'dos byed mA ye shos rdo rje dang/ khrag+sa/
56a2(rnying rgyud): ladaka ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gcod byed pa ye shrIs rdo rje dang / ya.a s+t+rai d+ha ma yu shes rdo rje dang / nam ma 'angal 'gram ye shes rdo tra~M dang / drug 'phrog ma ye shes rdo rje dang / zas ga rnon zab ye shes rdo rje dang / bran mo ye shes rdo rje dang / gnad sbyin ma ye
56a3(rnying rgyud): shes rdo rje dang / gnod byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang // sbrul ye shes rdo rje dang / seng ge ye shes rdo rje dang / stag ye shes rdo rje dang / ri dwags ye shes rdo dang / gu ye shes rdo rje dang / spre'u ye shes de lde dang / khyi ye shes rdo rje dang / byi la ye shes
56a4(rnying rgyud): rdorje dang / ra ye shes rdo rje dang / b+hu rog ye shes rdo rje dang / wa ye shes rdo rje dang / b+hargod ye shes rdo rje dang / sra ma ye shes rdo rje dang / mi'i keng dras dang / 'bru chen po'i ro dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / gzhig dang / bong bu da / rta dang / ma he
56a5(rnying rgyud): ba lang dang / 'ug pa dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed ma rkyen mo dang / rdo rje zas 'dzin ma ldan ma dang / del sogs hU~MmAn+d+ha yas mchog mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang bcas pa/ chos kyi dbyi su rdo rje nam mtha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs g.yog dang banas hA/
56a6(rnying rgyud): rigs ye shes rdo rje dang / ye shes kyi bo kyai shes rdo rje dang / ye shes kyi khro mo la shes rdo rje dang/ skab pa'i wi zhes rdo rje dang / skul pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / yang sa pa mtshon mo ye sh+ya rdo dang / kyil mo ma / de dag
56a7(rnying rgyud): sogs te bye ba phrag brgya stong de rnams sma tsa co byin cing nam mkha' bye sa rab 'bum chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis mchod par byed / bud med byed rtsa pa na gsung brjod pa med par brdzogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kazhan du
56b1(rnying rgyud): na 'an du shA na tu na tu rgyu na na
56b2(rnying rgyud): sbyin sa
56b3(rnying rgyud): sa la ba sa nga sa ngas sa sa sa sa pa'i gra ga mas su
57a1(rnying rgyud): rgan po dang / brag pa ma drangs pa chen pa dang / gnam po chen po dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang / log 'dren dang / gdug pa chen po dang / yaM dgas dang / sha za dang / gan du sprin dang / srin po dang / shin tu gzug pa'i gdug pa
57a2(rnying rgyud): chen po dang / tsha ba'i don dang / nad dang / sbrul dang / sems can thams cad la 'tsho bar byed pa rnams nye bar zhi bar yang mi mdzad/ rnam par dul bar yang mi mdzad/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas dag sa panye ba rab TIg ste/
57a3(rnying rgyud): spyan gnyis mi 'joms par gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la rgo zhing sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i phyag gis phyag byas nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo
57a4(rnying rgyud): po'i dbyangs kyis bskul zhing gsol ba btab po// rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun// rnam dang / sras bcas byang chub rnams// yun rings bsgoms nas shin tu gdungs// dga' ba'i yid kyis dgyes par mdzod// kye 'dod chags dri med
57a5(rnying rgyud): du bzang po'i spyod pa ste// 'dod chags dam tshig la ni phye mdzad nas// dka' ba drug skad shin tu gsungs pa yis// 'dod pa bde ba nyid kyis 'jig par mdzod// rnam dag rdo rje las byung ye shes chu// rin chen 'bar ba'i byang chub sems na
57a6(rnying rgyud): rab gyur nas// rgyal ba thams cad rnams kyi dbu ni skyams pa la// dri med rin chen chab gyis spyi por dbang bskur mdzod// mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dod chags tshul dag pa// pad+ma'i gnas su rdo rje mdzod gtod pas// sna tshogs sems dpa'
57a7(rnying rgyud): sems brlan pa rlag gyur pas// sbyor ba gzhan men ma rtogs bshad du gsol// rdo rje sems khyod dang mchog bde bskyed pa'i mchog/ rdorje po tshul gyis spong mdzod de// rgyal ba kun gyi gtsug ba 'tha na// thams cad 'daba'i srab
57b1(rnying rgyud): da kyis mnyas par byu // da nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kya byu drud bapa da rnamams dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams rdzu byed bus kyi par 'angal bsngags sa chud nas panas te// madra dang babs pas gra
57b2(rnying rgyud): zhaming dus pa dang 'dor ba dang / brtsam pa dang / dbyi pa dang / spun 'dzes pas sbyin spyod cing brdzur ba dang / 'jogag gis gnyis g.yon gar gyi slong ba'i tshul gyis sa ngas la zhabs dben cing bsgyur ba dang / 'dor ning brtsam pa dang /
57b3(rnying rgyud): 'dags pa'i rnam par gnon pas nam ma 'dred byings thams cad du khub pur mdzad de/ rlung gi khams dang / ming khams dang / chung khams dang / smra'i khams kun khyab par mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das rlung na dri sems la san du khyab pang mngad de/
57b4(rnying rgyud): sa dang / phrab dang / sdom pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / ga pa dang / shes pa dang / skyes pa ma yin pa dang / wa dang / k+Sha dang / gnod ldan dang / skor ma dang / gshin rje dang / rje bdag dang / brgya byin dang / 'du dang/ 'dung
57b5(rnying rgyud): gyur pa thams cad la bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos rgyas par byas te yang drug par gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dro ma tshar du gyur te/ yang 'dus nas phyag gang byang bcas nas bal ma sbyar rnaMs brtsa
57b6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po lnga spyi bos btud nas gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kun gyi gsang ba'i he ru ka chen po rol pa'i thig le 'di// gnyis med ye shes yang dag 'byung // bcom ldan khyod kyis bshud du gsol// sems ca
57b7(rnying rgyud): kun gyi ma skyes pa// skyes dang ma skyes rnam spangs pa'i// 'khrung dang 'thung gyur dang sbyor ba'o// mchog tu rtag pa'i sbyor ba'o// thams cad rin chen 'byung gnas dag/ nam mkha' dri med 'dra ba yi// rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bya ste// rong chen po
58a1(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur ba'o// longs spyod zas ni yang dgra 'ab+hA // bad+ma maN+Dag na dmar tha ma dang// 'dod chags da tad gas drub cha// bad byed thams cad bdud rtsi'i mchog/ pa la ar ni don dang ldan// yang dag mdzes pa 'gyung ba'i 'gros/
58a2(rnying rgyud): sa phyogs ye shes bde ba che// byang chub sems thig mchog nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas 'gog pa chen po ye shes rdo rje
58a3(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te// yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po kun du bzang po chen po la de kho na nyid kyi dbyangs kyis bskul
58a4(rnying rgyud): nye bzhengs par mdzad do// oM AHhUM/ me skye phye shes pa de mdzog rol mnams// sems dpa'i mchog nyid 'gog pa rnams las bslang // chags med kun du mya ngan 'das mdzad bzhengs shing mnams// mchog tu gus dra ba'i dam bcas 'jig rten
58a5(rnying rgyud): srol// byang chub skye gnas dbyings pas gar mdzod cig/ sngon gyi nyon mongs do rnams gzir ba yi// bde mchog rgyun dang ldan pa'i thabs kyis bskul te go bar mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa tham
58a6(rnying rgyud): cad kyi snying po chen po he ru ka rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gis gsang ba'i thig le shin tu dgyes pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i dri le'i dbus su rgyas par
58a7(rnying rgyud): rnam pa pa'i dbyeng pa thams cad du spang bar byas te/ spyong dang ga tu yang bzhugs te/ ma lus lus pa med pa ba dang / sems ca thams cad lags pa par byas nas shin tud gyes pa chen po ngo bdem mnyes par byas nas sla de nyid
58b1(rnying rgyud): slar log nas/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i snying po gsang ba mchog gi thig le'i dbus na bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba mchog tu bde bar gyur pa snying po des bskul ba ni gang mdzad cing rang rang ga
58b2(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin du dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po'i thugs kyi dbus su mchog tu gsang pa shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bar bslabs te/ sku rang gi bud med kyi tshul du bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas mngon par 'byung bar bya
58b3(rnying rgyud): to// de la laM la ni spyan pad+ma lta bur bskur cing sprin dkyus ring // sangs rgyas tshul gyis gar mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor du// rab dgyes rdo rje gdon mi za// rdo rje sems la dgyes mdzad cing // bde ba'i sangs rgyas bde ba yis// bco
58b4(rnying rgyud): ldan sangs rgyas bzhugs par 'gyur// zhal bsgyur smin ma bsgyur ba yis// spyan yang bsgyur zhing shin tu gnon// sor mo rnams kyang rab bsgyur dang // rdo rje tshul gyis gar mdzad cing // sems dpa' che la mnyes par mdzad// rdo rje rnal 'a
58b5(rnying rgyud): ma dkyil du// sku ni skad cig bskul ba yis// btso mi ldan rdo rje gnas par 'gyur// zhal ni brjid cing rin chen dbu// dri med spyi bor gar mdzad cing // dkyil 'khor zhal gyis rnam bskur ba// byang chub sems ni med par mdzad// dur khrod yon
58b6(rnying rgyud): tan tshogs dag gos// pad+ma'i sman gyis gzigs mdzad cing // bde ba'i bdag po chen po lnga// rin chen tshul gyis mnyes par mdzad// rab tu dgyes gsal bde ba yi// bad+ma dmar le tshe mdzad do// 'dod chags bral zhi rab tu bskuro// @
58b7(rnying rgyud): dra bas 'brel pa yi// pad+ma'i rnal 'byor ma dkyil du// brjid pa'i spyan gyis kun gzigs pa'i// bde ba che lo mnyes par mdzad// bcom ldan pad+mo gnas par 'gyur// phyag gi sor mo rtse mo mtha'// rnam par bsgyur bar gar mdzad cing //
59a1(rnying rgyud): sbyar khong stong badz+ra yis// srog bzhin dpral nas spyi gtsug tu// mchod pa'i sprin gyis longs spyod pas// sna tshogs pade byed gtso nyid la// las kyi tshul gyis mnyes mdzod cing // bcom ldan sna tshogs gnas par 'gyur// de nas brtsam/
59a2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba byang chub sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba theg le byang chub kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po shin
59a3(rnying rgyud): tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dkyil 'khor nyid kyi tshul gyis su// cho ga sbyor ba spos byas te// de dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor gdon// sbyor ba'i gar gyis gar byas shing // ci ltar yang dag brtag
59a4(rnying rgyud): pas/ chog shes pas gribar za// gru bzhi pa lnga sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi dang yang drug ldan// thig gis yongs su 'khor byar btag/ dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhir ldan// kun d+ha yongs su mra khrud bcas// b+hi rol rdo rje rabs bskor// de'i
59a5(rnying rgyud): su bcom ldan 'das che mchog he ru ka rigs ba'i he ru kas ni bskor// grwa bzhi shwa ri yum dang bcas// de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug la ye shes khro mo btu drug/ de'i phyi ma pad+ma bcu drug la sprul pa'i khro bo pa bcu drug/
59a6(rnying rgyud): bcu drug la sprul pa'i phra men ma bcu drug de'i phyi rim snam bu gcig la yang srul bcu drug/ de'i phyi rim snam bu gcig la yang zhe sbal bcu drug/ de'i phyi rol snyam phrag cig la sman gyi sa mo sum cu rtsa gnyis// de'i spyi rim snam bu la bcom ldan
59b1(rnying rgyud): 'das sapan srabs pa dpag ba ma bya shing / da \u0f7fbanasan 'du lkug sa ra/ gsar sgyu ma ga gzhon nu ra/ bcom ldan 'das las byung dang bdud na rnam pa thogs sa m+bu khrus ma dbur nga/ thabs snyam tha la da ga
59b2(rnying rgyud): las las grub pa/ mgo brnyan ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod// yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dgod pa'i don bzung zhing bka' stsal pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du// bcom ldan che mchog he rba ka/ dgra ni nyi shwa rtsa gcig la/
59b3(rnying rgyud): kyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so// zhabs brgyad lha chen po mo mnan// glang chen ko rnon gos su gyon// zhing chen g.yang gzhi ya bskor// sbrul nag thun pos dbul brgyan// thod pa rlon pas se ral kha// stag lpags mgo chen sham thabs can/
59b4(rnying rgyud): khrag dang zhag gi tsam bur bcas// bder gshags rigs bzhi he ru ka/ khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag/ mi 'jigs sems can bzhi yi khri// sdug nag sngon gser nAg dang // dmur nad ljang nag 'jigs pade gzugs// dbu gsum phyug drag
59b5(rnying rgyud): zhabs bzhir bgrad// cha lugs mgo bo ya ba dang mthun// dbus kyi dbu gyen du lta ba'i zhal gyi nang du rdo rje bcug nas gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba tshul bzhin du mdzad cing bzhugs so// rigs kyi yum kun gtso bo yab dang mthun// ye shes las
59b6(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i lho bo rje rje tshogs med dang / khro bo rdo rje mdung dang / dri bo rdo rje me dpal da / khro bo rdo rje mda' ba ldag dang / khro bo rdo rje phur bu dang / khro bo rdo rje dro ba dang / khro bo rdo rje bya gri dang / khro bo rdo rje rnon po dang / khro bo rdo rje ral gri dang / lho bo rdo rje zhags
59b7(rnying rgyud): pa dang / khro rdo rje gtan khyang 'dzin dang / khrib rdo rje gzhung den dang / blong durje rab pa gcig pang po khro ngarje pa shes dang / rje badz+ra rje lugs sgrogadang / khro bo rje mya tham 'dzin dang / blomadu pa sa dang / mdzung la gtug
60a1(rnying rgyud): dang / rdza ma rdo rje mo dang / tha mo 'jigs sa rung ma dang / lha ma mthab dngas 'dus pa dang / wa mA bak+ka shis ma dang / khro mo dpal ldan ma dang / khro ma padz+ra'i phreng thogs ma dang / khro mo nor budag mu dang / khro ma thags ma dang /
60a2(rnying rgyud): mo glags chen mo dang / khro so rin 'od ldan ma dung / mo pad+ma'i lhan mnga' ma dang / khro mo zas sbyin ma da / khro mo bdang n+ti khyil ma dang / wa mdzo d+ha dur khyod ma dang / sgra mdog gcig tu mangs te/ sna tshogs cir yang 'gyur ba'o// sprul pa
60a3(rnying rgyud): kho bo 'di dag kyang sgra mdog sna tshogs su 'gyur ba'o// khro bo hU~M ka ri dang / khro bo rnam par rgyal ba dang / khyo d+hi la dar+b+ha dang / khro bo ya mAn ta ka dang / khro bo mo g.yo mgon dang / khro bo ha ya grI ba dang / khro ba Te ki rA dza dang / khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa
60a4(rnying rgyud): dang / khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang / khro bo ma hA ba la dang / khro bo baspyad kyi rgyal po dang / khro bo zla ba'i gtso bo dang / khro bo rdo rje khu tshur dang / khro bo gom pa 'dor ba dang / khro bo gnod sbyin rdo rje dang / khro bo las thams cad pa dang /
60a5(rnying rgyud): spes pa'i phra men ma dang / rdo rje go'u 'i dang / rdo rje tse'u ri dang / rngon pa mo ta dang / rdo be tA li dang / rdo rje sngags dang / d+yo di na wA ri dang / rdo wA shA na dang / rdo rje rten la dang / rdo rje si du m+b+ha kha dang / dzo rje b+he bAM mra kha dang / rdo rje sr-i la mra Sha dang /
60a6(rnying rgyud): br-in mu kha dang / rdo rje kr-i tA mu khA dang / rdo rje kaM ka mu kha dang / rdo rje khA ka mu kha dang / U lu ka pra kha dang 'di rnams su mdog gcig Na pA nges so// 'di kun zhing bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs so// badz+ra maude rnams kyang / phyag ma
60a7(rnying rgyud): 'di na/ sku mdog dmar po pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri nyi zla brdzogs pa'i gdan lo skya lus glang po che'i cha byang du sprul nas mdzad/ yang sbrul chen mo seng ge lcam dral dang / stag lcam dral dang / wa rtsa ma
60b1(rnying rgyud): glang mo lhan dral dang / bya rgong sus dral dang / kung ka lha ma dral dang / bya rog lham dral dang / 'ug pa byam dral dang / 'di dag kun gyi ye shes sprul pa'o// pha bang lham dral dang / zer mo lcam dral dang / pho rog lhas dral dang / p+la ka lha ma rdal dang /
60b2(rnying rgyud): khA ta lA ma dra ba dang / b+hi la lum rdul dang / spre'u lum dral dang // kyi lham rdul dang / sprul pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// las grub pa dbang phyug ma// kye mo'i ldan mo dmar ser shing chen tri b+ha ga yig mgos// tshangs par
60b3(rnying rgyud): b+han dmar rtse lha sbrul mgos// kho bo khrub 'dug dbyung sdig skyed 'dun khrig gi mgo// Sha ba 'dag dkar dmar drung dmar byinags ste mi numo// gzhon nu se ma rdo rje lnga bar mag/ dbang mo mar ska bas chen kho chen rjed kyi rtag/ dmar po dudam
60b4(rnying rgyud): zhugs dmar mi dom gyi mgo/ bdud rtsi ldan mo rin chen gyi srin mgo/ zhi ba sngo sba ba ma chen snying 'byin stag gi mgo/ be con nug mo bam chen pod rlon khwa yi mgo// srin mo nag mo bam chen gyi zhags wa yi mgo/ za breng drug mob mchen snying byed
60b5(rnying rgyud): gi mgo// dga' byed nag mo khong chen bgegasu rgal bya rgod mgo/ khrag byabred dmar mo rdo rje dbyug dra nga mar rta'i mgo/ gcig pu dkar dmyar nam mkha' lding gi mgo/ yid 'phrog dmar sder bzhis bzlas b+hi rba l+ye yi mgo/ grub ma dkar
60b6(rnying rgyud): sad ma byi za pu shud mgo/ rlung mo dmar ser ro zla rdo rje sha ba'i mgo/ gsod byed sgra ljang bram tshan rde'u chung sgye ka'i mgo// me mo dmar ser mo srag rgyu 'dren sbyin gyi mgo// phag mo ljang nag rtse sbyin rnon dmar phag gi mgo/ dmar mo ldar mon bdud
60b7(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung khwa yi mgo// sna chen ldeng nag bam chen longs spyod pa lang mgo/ grub mo ldeng ser bdud rtsi byin demar sbrul gyi mgo// phag mo lcags kyu phu tra rdo rje khu byug mgo// ra ni sor mo gru zhags ra yi mgo// bral snga par mo thugs sgrog kur
61a1(rnying rgyud): 'joms seng ge'i mgo/ gsus 'dzin ser mo bdud rtsi dril chen gzig gi mdo// sems can thams cad mchog dag dang // dgyes pa thams cad rab bsgrub phyir// nga ya de nyid gzung gis ni// dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan pa yin
61a2(rnying rgyud): spangs rgyas byang chub ba chen po// gang gis chud pas rdzogs sangs sgras// sems can mchog gi blo byed na// de nyid sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub// de nas bcom ldan gcig 'dus nad// rab tu spro ba'i spyan gdangs nas// zhabs dang zhabs kyis gdod pa
61a3(rnying rgyud): yis// sdud cing 'dor ba 'jug par mdzod// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis// brjid pa'i rtse mo mtha' nas dgrol// cung zad zur gyis gnon pa yis// mdzes pa'i spyi gtsug rnam bsgyur ba'i// stan gyi phyag rgyas phyag mdzad pa'i// 'gro la
61a4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur// dpa' bo rdo rje sems dpa' la// bskul ba'i dbyangs kyis rab tu bskul// gsang ba dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du// shin tu dgyes tshe rdo rje dag/ sangs rdzas kun gyi pade chen po// mchog tu dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bcom
61a5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// rnam pa kun du skye med rol cing phreng mdzad pa// bdag cag gzugs dang bcas te rnam stod 'gyur med pa'i// bde mchog byang chub sems dpa' di// rnam pa grang du thug bsngal yongs bral te// che ba'i ye shes d+ha thang
61a6(rnying rgyud): mchog dang ldan// bde sprod de 'khrol pas tshul bzhin mdzad// rdo rje glu ni blangs pa yis// shin tu srid pa'i mya ngan 'das// dag chen de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis brlabs// de bras bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa dang bcas pas
61a7(rnying rgyud): spyan ut+pal kha bye ba bzhin/ sprin ma dang sku rnam par sbyar ba/ klog dang rgyu rlabs su gyur pa nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las de kho na nyid 'di gsungs so zhes/ dkyil 'khor zhes ni rab tu bya// ye shes rdo rje rdzogs pa gnas// dkyil
61b1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje mchog nyid do// nyid kyi sbyor ba btags pa yin// rdo rje dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'od zer dkar po phreng bas mdzes// byang chub sems dpa' 'dra ba'o// rdo rje dpa' bo dkyil 'khor du// zla ba kham pa mdzes pa yi// mthing ga 'bar ba kun rgyas pa/
61b2(rnying rgyud): la rlung gis bus pa bzhin// dgyes pa'i mchog ni rab bsgrub pa'i// rin chen rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni// dga' bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// rab tu dga' pa nyi ma bzhin// dkyil 'khor dgyes mchog 'byung byed pa// dam pa'i dbang po pad+ma 'dra// 'dad
61b3(rnying rgyud): ma brgyad po dgyes pa yi// gre sar ze bas mdzes bya ba'o// las ni thams cad 'grub byed pa// rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gru gsum ste// 'bar ba chen po me dang 'dra// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i// dkyil 'khor
61b4(rnying rgyud): rnams ni brtag bya ste// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yis// ci ltar de nyid sprul pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas rdo rje brjed pa'i gar mdzad cing glu dang / sil snyan dang / gling bu dang / pi wang dang / rdza rnga dang / du na rba
61b5(rnying rgyud): dang / pa na a dang / pa la ki dang / zhi ba'i thal mos sogs pa kun du gdungs pa dang / sil snyan la sogs pa rol pas lha'i ro dang / ro'i zas dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / theg pa dang / stan dang / gos dang / bldag pa dang /
61b6(rnying rgyud): 'jib pa dang / 'jam pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos bstabs nas gus pa dang bcas nas 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan gdangs te/ dbyangs 'dis bstod pa mdzad do// byams pas kun du gzigs pas thugs rje'i stan/ yol ba
61b7(rnying rgyud): mthun pa'i lam ston drug rdzas 'brel// gzungs kyi rang po'i ni bder gshegs kun la stobs// bad chen kun du rgyas pas che ba'i ye shes 'dzin// hUM tid snang bas tshogs pa'i rgyal ba bzhin// cho sa nyid bde ba dag pas hU~M nyid po'i// byang chub
62a1(rnying rgyud): sngag r+tha// gzungs brtan rigs nga gtso ba rnams mdzad do// dgyes pa rjongs la bsnams shing ngol so mdang // bde ba bsdams shing dbyengs nas bslang ba'i phying // skye 'gag med pa'i tshul du rnam par ldan//
62a2(rnying rgyud): bcas bde ba chen po ston// chos nyid bde ba chen pos nam mkha' bzhin// bde ba mchog gi ngad las sprul pa'i lha mo kye// rol pas 'dus pa'i tshogs la stsal bar mdzod// bde la pasnams shing 'di la mnos spro// bde mchog chad pa drab tu dbab par
62a3(rnying rgyud): gsol// dbyings las bder gshegs slob ma gzung du gsol// ni sbyar bzhugs pa'i gnas su bzhugs su gsol// ngo mtshar byang chub tshe 'di bde ba thob// pha rol phyin drug gang la mi rten par// mi ste mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs pa
62a4(rnying rgyud): rnam par ldan// bde ba chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa yi// rmongs pa'i bde bas 'gro la snying rje che// byang chub sems kyi dgyes mchog mi chags pa'i// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// yid dang 'dzad pa'i 'di chen po// dngos grub mung du ma
62a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa/ pad+ma dang 'dra ba'i spyan gnyis kyis kun du gzigs shing // 'dzum par bcas pas zha rgyas par byar
62a6(rnying rgyud): nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phran gyi tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams mang po bskal par byas pa'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho chen po snyed mo lus lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / nong bu dang / rin po che dang / dang /
62a7(rnying rgyud): las phyung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / rin chen 'dzin pa dang / chos 'dzin pa dang / sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pathams cad dang / rnal 'byor dbang drug tshogs dang / rdugs pas byung pa dang / dang / dga' ba dang
62b1(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa rnal 'byor g.yog gi chags tshad med par byed par 'dren pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa dang / 'jigs par byed pa la sogs pa'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba tshogs dang / grags pa med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa tshag /
62b2(rnying rgyud): dang / gzhan yang phyi rol gyi rdo rje dang / rin chen pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs las byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa dang / rdul 'byor kyi dbang phyug chen po dang / num mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams la rnam par gyur pa dang bcas pa kun du gzigs pa'i dun
62b3(rnying rgyud): gyis gang mdad ma dang / gan rje gnon pa dang / tshogs kyis 'debs pa dang / phyag na gar mdad mA dang / 'gying ba dang / kun du rnam par 'dor bu'i gnon pas 'khod kyi dkyil khor la byin gyis brdabs nas dgyes pa'i gdod mi za bzho
62b4(rnying rgyud): bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsungs pa/ de nyid bdag ni mnyam bzhag dang // de bzhin lha'i de bzhin nyid dang // sngags dang phyag rgya de bzhin nyid// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'gyu
62b5(rnying rgyud): yan lag thams cad bsam las 'das// yod med gnyis pas mi gnas pa// 'dren dang tshig lus yang dag 'das// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog ces bya'o// chos min chos ni rnam dpyod pas// chos rnams thams cad brtag par bya/
62b6(rnying rgyud): rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra bA yi// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan pa yin// 'dod chag sde mi chags 'dod chags mAnyam// zla yi pad+mod mar ba 'dra// drang sems 'dod chags shin du zags// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no// gzugs
62b7(rnying rgyud): med gzugs ni rje med pa'i// khams gsum las ni 'jug byed pa'i// sems ni chu nyid dang ba bzhin// dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsog dang bcas/ loHdang / ma
63a1(rnying rgyud): la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / yang bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzung po bzhengs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma rab dgu sa dpa' ba bzlog/ kye mar ba bgegs phyogs bdU ba// rnal 'byor chen pa tshogs mchog na// gsang da/
63a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs// sangs rgyas sbyor ba rab tu zab// rdo rje spyod pa bla na med// 'jig rten gsum po bde thob pa'i// dkyil 'khor gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs// pad+mo rin chen sna tshogs che// thabs kyis sbyor ba gar mdzad pa// rnam
63a3(rnying rgyud): grangs sems kyi 'jig rten du// bde chen dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ thams cad gar dang bcas pa'i phyag/ sor mo 'dab ma kun du 'brel// rdo rje thal mo gar rnams bsgyur// brjid pag dag tu rab tu bcas//
63a4(rnying rgyud): stobs zhing bde ba sbyin mdzad pa// nam mkha'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab ste// stobs shing bzhengs te grub par mdzod// chags pas rab tu mi gros pa'i// bde ba reg cing dgongs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen
63a5(rnying rgyud): po dgyes pa chen pos bskul bas thugs sad par gyur te/ shin tu dgyes nas rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du shin tu dgyes pa'i
63a6(rnying rgyud): kyis mgur len cing / rdo rje rnam par rol pa yis/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes bzhed pas bzhad cing / nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsar po'i thugs kanas ma hA su kha hU~M zhes brjod/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
63b1(rnying rgyud): shes kyi byed sa dbang phyug pa 'di byung ngo // blug pa steng du ldan pa 'i// ye shes gnyis po many+dzu thA// TIg le madz+nyAn+ta d+ha wAn byas nas// gsal ba sa shas rnal 'byar ma// A le kA l+le 'dren byas ma// da me nas su brtagaHsa te// dwe la ga
63b2(rnying rgyud): mdzag nyid du// khro bo gnyis po mchog pas bya// 'di ni btsun mo rab gsang ba'i// dro daM hU~Ml 'khor rnal 'byor me'o// dran pa tsam gyis 'di dag kyang // bsod nams kun gyis byin pa rlabs 'gyur// A li gnyis dbus ma tho// 'dren pa
63b3(rnying rgyud): yang dag ldan pa ste// steng du zla ga ma thig ler dga'// mgo mjug tu yang gzhan yang zi// 'di ni gsal ba'i don dam ste// rdal 'byor rin chen dbang bgyur smin// bstan pas bsod nams thob 'gyur te// sdig pa rnams kyang 'jig par byed//
63b4(rnying rgyud): A li gnyis dang ldan bya ste// tshig drag yi ge gnyis su bshad// 'di ni rab 'gal kun du chags// chu srin ma zhes bstan pa yin// dang po bsgral pa chen po yi// cho ga drug po dang bcas par bzhag/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// bdang /
63b5(rnying rgyud): ny-id lam bzhag yang rung // phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btabaH// bsgrub bya dkyi 'khor sgrub byed ni// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dam pa rnams kyi mchog/ ye shes phyag rgya myangon gan su pa 'i// 'dzin de'i bgrod nam
63b6(rnying rgyud): 'dra ba'i// bris pa yis kyang khyab par 'gyur// a ma'o phreM l+le shos che// 'di ni ye shes su 'di la// gnod byed pa ni bsnyen byed cing // 'di yi tshul gyis thob par 'gyur// khams gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'di las
63b7(rnying rgyud): chen gzhan med do// sgrub pa po dang sems can kun// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub// tshe mchog tu drug gis po 'di bcom ldan 'das de ma chog kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
64a1(rnying rgyud): btsun pa rnams kyi gsang brjen po rdul 'byer ma dbang byug chen mo rnams kyis mchog tugs dpa byed kyil 'khor gyi ya ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ka shegs pa ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dgyes pa'i ya
64a2(rnying rgyud): pa dang / mgu ba dang / yid dga' ba skyes nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje bzhad pas mdzad cing / yang he ru ka'i sku mdog ni sna tshogs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das che mchog he ru kA zhabs brgyad phyag mtshan sna tshogs pa'o// de las smos nas phyag skyong gyur to
64a3(rnying rgyud): gis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa na// shin tu mi mun pas gdug par rgyal che zhing dregs pa can thams cad la badz+ra dza li'i sgra sna tshogs 'od zer du gyur te/ de las spros pas rigs bzhi he ru ka dregs
64a4(rnying rgyud): can thams cad tshor gcod pa'i phyir/ rAk+Sha he ru ka nyon mongs pa'i dug gsum dbang du sdud cing 'joms pa'i phyir rAk+Sha he ru ka/ ye shes kyi don dang ldan pa'i phyir byi sha he ru ka/ dam tshig las mi 'dar ba'i phyir sa ma ya he ru ka/ de las 'phros pas he ru ka
64a5(rnying rgyud): steng rtsa brgyad/ sku mdog dang phyag mtshon cir yang sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// s+pho d+ha shwa ri su mdog sna tshogs pa'o// dbu dbu byug bcwa ba zad/ zhabs pani phyag sa sna tshogs pa'o// zha'as bcad rdo rje 'bar ba me dbus kyi dang na/ ru ka pa ni 'bas 'as na
64a6(rnying rgyud): pa/ badz+ra he ru ka/ pad+ma'i sbubs su dpral ba'i stan phyed tsam nub par bzhugs pa/ shin tu rngam pa'i khro mo debu'i steng na he ru ka zhabs brgyad kyis khro mo dbu brgyad mnan pa yang dbus kyi gyen du 'altas pa'i zhal ni nang du rdo rje bcug nas gnyis su med par spor
64a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems yum gyi sgo la bstims// byang chub kyi sems kyi rigs kyi he ru ka zhabs 'og tu mnan pa yang gnyis su med par su zhi byang chub kyi sems 'bebs/ badz+ra jo pa'i sgra sna tshogs pas rab tu g.yos par gyu te/ 'jig rten gyi lha chen
64b1(rnying rgyud): par rab tu skrag nas skyabs su gsol lo// mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol te/ rdo rje 'bar ba me dpung gis// bskal pa bas kyang bsreg mdzad cing // 'jigs chen rngam pa'i khyad par can// dbu mang bsgrub pa'i chog sgrogs shing // phyag mang 'jigs pa'i
64b2(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha bsdams// zhi ba'i phyag stong spyan stong yang // 'jig rten rab tu spa dkod na// khyo gnyer phyag stong spyan stong yang // rgod dang gshe zhing za byed pa// 'bar ba'i mtshon cha sna tshogs can// 'jig rten thal bar rlig ma dpa// khro chen khyod la srabs
64b3(rnying rgyud): su mchi// me dang seng mo bu mo dang // chung mo sbas 'di rnams phul nas skabs su gsol lo// chags pa med pa'i dbang gi thabs kyi sbyor bas dbang bslus te/ dam tshig dang ming btags lag tu rdo rje byin nas rdo rje 'chang gi gral du dgod do// de nas bcom
64b4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po he ru ka rol pa chen po'i don gyi gsang ba rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes rgyal po sgra dang gsung dang thugs kyi rol pa 'di phyung ngo // dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad ni// su bzhi sgo ba'i mu khud bcas// thig gis yongs su 'khor
64b5(rnying rgyud): bAr btab// dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri// dbus kyi pad+ma'i snying po la// bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ shar du 'adz+ra he ru ka/ s+pho ru rata na he ru ka/ nub tu pad+ma hwA rA ka/ byang du kur me he ru ka// shar lho ru ru Te 'e d+ha ka// ho pa yaT+Ta te tra ka/
64b6(rnying rgyud): bye sha he ru ka/ byang shar sa ma ya he ru ka/ bder gshegs yum dang bcas pa dgod// de'i hrI rim sngam bu la ye shes las grub pa'i phra men ma bcu drug dgod/ de yi phyi rim sgo bzhi rgod pas bskor// gshin rje 'joms dang stobs po che// mgrin dang
64b7(rnying rgyud): ni bdud rtsi 'khyil// sgo bzhi dag tu rim bzhin no// sku dang phyag mtshan cir yang 'gyur te gcig tu ma nges pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po de kho na nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma
65a1(rnying rgyud): te pa m+b+ha khyab pan drugapa// gnas thaM rnaMs gams pa/ nasunang dang / dang na sa ba tus pa
65a2(rnying rgyud): chug mas brjod pa dang / dugs nga nga sa sa sa da pa rnams 'dzin pa/ da na 'i sa gdang pa
65a3(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i nang bzhugs pa/ dbug dug nas ta mgo sdang ba 'thung ba/ sbrul dag gi na po skyeg nas kyi nim thapas pas pa/ dzod po'i zung ba na po/ po sdol pa'i tshig bzugs pa/ btsam pan la sa nyimachog sa chen pama'
65a4(rnying rgyud): dad rje / sa to// nag ngas rgyas gi nga nas nas 'bar ni// bad 'dzin pa dpa'i dbang maston / 'du 'a bral pad gzugs// dang mtshag la ma mi dang
65a5(rnying rgyud): ga pa'i nas bya nga sa sa
65a6(rnying rgyud): na sa pa
65a7(rnying rgyud): btam ca gdangs/ su bdagadus su su gag shes pabs ca// ba dini de gis rtso pa'i so/ ma pa
65b1(rnying rgyud): glog stong 'gro// dbu'i gtsug nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bskyed nas ni// stan nas skra byung 'brug skad ldir// sman nas me byung khams gsum sreg/ shangs nas rlung 'byung 'jig rte na 'thor// zhal nas khrag 'dzag rgya mtshor 'khyil// ma mod ma can
65b2(rnying rgyud): rnams kyang dam la 'dra // hUM skad zeng gsum 'tsho bas med pa dbang du rung // rta tha zang gsus brdungs pas brdud bzhi zil gyis mnanA// pad+ma rgyal po sam tshog dpal// dkar ba'i mdog la dmar po'i zhal// su 'dog mthing ga'i khro gter cad// sten
65b3(rnying rgyud): rlung gi khongams pa// man lams khyi mchim ga/ ldana'ithugs su 'as// rangs gsumi dganas mchis sas// rgyag su ma ma// ma sa kyi gal 'a pol 'dus// shungs
65b4(rnying rgyud): 'thor// zhal nas mi bzang lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs// g.yas pa gsum po ba dan 'gyur// g.yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzus mo bsgreng // ken+da ri gshog pa gsang po ma phyag rgya yis// na ba rnams ni sos par byed// te nang bzhad pa/ ba
65b5(rnying rgyud): skad chen po thang gcig zhes// kuts+tsha pa 'is drug dbang du blang // rta nyid chen po zang gcig kis// mtshogs dbang phyub dbang du srung // rta skyed chen po zang gcig gis// bgegs kyi tshogs rnams dbang du spyad// rta.oM lan gas pa brdungs pa
65b6(rnying rgyud): 'dud bani thun kyang zil gyis gnon// dpag tshang dog ni bdud granas pa// skad du rgyob la zag par rlogs// ya gcig re byams rta mchog dbang // rta mun tshul dra gar byed kyis// gar gyi brda la datshur spyod// ha nA nA tshul du sngags 'ad
65b7(rnying rgyud): spyugs pa'i nyal ngacu spyod// ti kur tshul du g.yab mdor gyis// gapab mo brda pa da ra spyon/ d+h+r-i kis cu drug rtse nas gsod// phrin las zhi bar / rdo cig ste mchog dbang // drod gsum 'gron rdza med pa tshal po'i ma
66a1(rnying rgyud): sa klu phyugs// sh+tha na sa skyem g+sag+sa// mas ga dgas // sa / nga 'gags// mas sun dag pa bdag su
66a2(rnying rgyud): ci phyir thugs mi brje// lha mchog bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis na// ye shes lha mchog khyod kyis thugs rjer rung lags sam// dngos grub stsol bar mi dmigs kyang // sngon gyi thugs dam dbang gis dngos grub stsol// yum chen e ka/
66a3(rnying rgyud): dathe ma// ral pa gcig mas de skad 'phrul lo// yang pa kyis bskul ba 'khyud par bsnyed pa'i rnapa 'byor ma// bdud kyi yum la gshin rje'i lham// 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug sa// dpal ldan chen mo ra ma ti// maM che ni e ka da Ti ma// 5
66a4(rnying rgyud): gsang chen ral gcig ma// rI ta chen mo tsa mun TA// srinA mo dAka ru mo chen mo'i tshogs// dpal ldan rdo rje dam shin te// nam mkha'i khams mi rnam rgyal dpal// pi da ma N+Dal mo gsung 'grom// phas pa 'khril cing chos la bstan// dgra rnams 'byin
66a5(rnying rgyud): bdud pa'i tshul// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// de nas snying po dran tsam gyis// pad+mA ta krid ha ya gri ba/ hu lu hu lu/ e A ra li hring rdzing tring / e ka rdo Ta sa ma ya hUM/ rba lu ru la naM dz+haiM NAM/ sngags kyi phyag rgya sbyor ba yis// dbyings gsum rnam par
66a6(rnying rgyud): dag pas bsrub// de nas sgo nas bsdu ba ni// hrI dz+dza zhes ni rab brjod de// phyag rgya chen po sku gnyis ni// sang ga ra na hUM zhes rab tu brjod// yab cang yum la bsdu// yum yang chos kyi dbyings su bsre// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po dang // na
66a7(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las byung // ti mgrin dang gi dkyil 'khor ni// rje ni druganyis cad duH// dkyil pa ba bang gi rang ba'i dbar po na// dbus su bad+mal ba babyung gyi par / snying ba la bcom ldad 'das dpal tu man
66b1(rnying rgyud): gsum phyag drug la shar gyi pad+ma la badz+ra hi ru ka/ lho ra rat+na he rug/ nub tu pad+ma he ruka/ byang du ka ra sa he ru ka/ mtshams bzhir yum bzhi/ de'i phyi rim du ko'u rim brgyad dang // seng ha ma brgyad dang bcu drug/ sgo bzhi sgo khyud dang bcas pa'o// go bzhi ri pa
66b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin dang mthun/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po de kho na nyid rab gsang ba'i thugs ka nas phyung ngo // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// za byed chen mo tshogs kyi bdag/ yon tan phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa// rdo rje shugs can dang / rdo rje 'jigs
66b3(rnying rgyud): su rung bu dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dang / rdo rje gsus po che dang / rdo rje gad mo dang / rdo rje gad byangs can dang / rdo rje phrags can dang / rdo rje ha hA gad mo can dang / rdo rje he he grags chen dang / rdo rje bgegs gnon pa'i rnal
66b4(rnying rgyud): dang / rdo rje gshin rje gshed po can dang / rdo rje las kyi bdag po dang / rdo rje mi g.yo mgon po dang / rdo rje bsgyings pa dang / rdo rje glang po che dang / rdo rje ko brlon pa dang / rdo rje sems dpang chen po dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje mig mi zang dang / rdo rje bde
66b5(rnying rgyud): ba dang / rdo rje song phreng ba can dang / rdo rje rlung chen dang / rdo rje ba tshur dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzing dang / rdo rje ga yab mo dang / rdo rje dga' ba dang / rdo rje 'degs pa dang / rdo rje rje chen dang / rdo rje mda' dang / rdo rje gzhu bdungs dang / rdo rje ral gri dang /
66b6(rnying rgyud): dang / rdo rje g.yul zlog dang / rdo rje 'bar ba dang / rdo rje sa dang / rdo rje chu dang / rdo rje me dang / rdo rje rlung dang / rdo rje nam mkha' dang / rdo rje yang dag dang / rdo rje sgra 'bar dang / rdo rje 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje mig brgya ma dang / rdo rje ba snga ma dang / rdo rje sen
66b7(rnying rgyud): mo skyes pa dang / rdo zangs kyi pags pa can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi mchi can dang / gr-i sa can dang / rdo rje pags pa mkhregs pa dang / rdo rje phreng pa thogs pa dang / rdo rje rgyan pa dang / rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rjekI la la dang / rdorje dpa
67a1(rnying rgyud): nA / dngas par dan dang / dang byed dang/ da pad+ma sa dang / pa dang / 'du su ga dang / dngas du rgyab nga/ ga / nga bang drug pa
67a2(rnying rgyud): dga' ba dang / rdo rje gzi brjid dang / rdo rje 'od bzangs dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / rdo rje snang ba po dang / rdo rje sgra dang / rdo rje gsung dang / rdo rje thugs dang / rdo rje 'od gsal ba dang / rdo rje sprin rnam par 'thor ba dang / rdo rje char pa ston dang / rdo rje rnas 'byor chen po dang /
67a3(rnying rgyud): na gan padas dang / rdo rje rje bang po bad/ do shes dang / deng snang ba dang / dedzin pa dang / rdo rje rdo rje 'id pa dang / rdorje 'bras pa zal pa dang / de suMl krung dag pe ci dang / rdo pa skyes pa dang / ro dngasapa dzad dran ma khyen dang /
67a4(rnying rgyud): mdzod 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje pha rol phyin pa dang / rdo rje rab tu ldan pa dang / rdo rje rnam par dag pa dang / rdo rje 'khor po dang / rdo rje gshog pa can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje nu ma can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje sder mo can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje mche ba can gyi tshogs dang /
67a5(rnying rgyud): je bzhad pa dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje longs spyod rtogs pa'i sku dang / rdo rje sprul pa'i sku dang / rdo rje chud 'chang ba po dang / rdo rje phyogs bcur stsal pa dgyes pa po dang / rdo rje don byed pa po dang / rdo rje lha'i dbang po dang / rdo rje lnga min
67a6(rnying rgyud): bdag po dang / rdo rje 'chi med lha'i dbang po dang / rdo rje 'joms par byed pa dang / rdo rje chos kyi sbyin bdag dang / rdo rje byams pa dang / rdo rje shes rab rnon po dang / rdo rje rtog chog lugs kyi gsor ched 'bebs pa dang / te ka teg skyong gsum 'gyed pa dang /
67a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje theb thib myos par byed pa dang / rdo rje'ur 'ur krug sgra sgrogs pa dang / rdo rje tshim ches gnan lugs 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje yud tsam sgrog 'byin pa dang / rdo rje shig shig khams gsum bsngal ba dang / rdo rje ye shes 'bog byed dang / rdo rje sa
67b1(rnying rgyud): glog stong 'phro// dbu'i gtsug nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bskyed nas ni// snyan nas sgra phyung 'brug skad ldir// spun nas me byung khams gsum sreg/ shangs nas rlung 'byung 'jigu rten 'thor// zhal nas khrag 'dzag rgya mtshor 'khyil// ma mo dam can
67b2(rnying rgyud): rnams kyang dam la 'du// rta skad theng gsum 'chor bas srid pa dbang du sdud// rta bro thang gsum brdungs pas bdud bzhi zil gyis mnan// pad+ma rgyal po rta mchog dpal// dkar po'i mdog la dmar po'i zhal// sku mdog mthing ga'i khro gnyer can// snyan
67b3(rnying rgyud): ni rlung gi khong seng can// mu mid khams ni ci mchis gsan// spyan gnyis nyi bre'i lugs su bcas// khams gsum dag ni ci mchis gzigs// rtog pa mtshon gyi ldang lo can// ram lcags kyi g.yab mos 'debs// shangs nas me phung 'bar tshu
67b4(rnying rgyud): 'thor// zhal nas mi bzad lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs// g.yas pa gsum po ba dan 'phyar// g.yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng // ke'u ri gshog pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya yis// na ba rnams ni sos par byed// rta skad bzhad la rta mo brji/
67b5(rnying rgyud): skad chen po thang gcig gis// klur+g+ha la ris drug dbang du srung // rta skad chen po zang gcig gis// ma tshogs dbang phyug dbang du srung // rta skud chen po thang gcig gis// bgegs kyi tshogs rnams dbang du srung // rta mo lan gsum brdungs pa yis/
67b6(rnying rgyud): bdud bzhi kun kyang zil gyis gnon// dpag tshad 'og ni bdud gnas pa// klad du kyob la zag bar rlogs// yab gcig re byams rta mchog dbang // rta rgun tshul du gar byed kyis// gar gyi ngan la da tshu'i spyon// rta rkun tshul du sngags 'dor sa/
67b7(rnying rgyud): spyugs pa'i rta la da tshur spyon// rta rkun tshul du g.yab 'dor gyis// g.yab mo brda pa da tshur ston// hU~M kis rgya drug rtsa nas gcod// phrin las zhi bar mdzod cig ste mchog dbang // srid gsum 'gran zla med pa rgyal po'i mthu// tshe btsan pa
68a1(rnying rgyud): rba rin chen 'byung ldan bri// nub tu ldang ba mtha' bas bri// byang du don pong grub pa b+hi// d+hi ri ma do byung bas bskor// glu bzhir dgod par bya ba ni// shar du de rje dbyings rgyag bri// lto sri na chen dbyings phyag bre// nub tu pad+ma dbyings phyag bri/ 8/
68a2(rnying rgyud): du las kyi dbyings phyug bri// de yi phyi ma snyam bu pa// sgo bzhi sgo khyud bcas par dgod// sgo bzhin dkyil 'khor gzhan dang mthu naM/ de rnams kyang phyag mtshon tsho'i bum pa re 'dzin cing bsnams pa/ gdan pad+ma la bzhugs pa sha dag go// de na
68a3(rnying rgyud): dbub par bya ba dang / tshe gshin rje nag po'i lag nas dbrog pa dang // tshe gang g.yab pa dang / tshe bcing zhing bsdams pa dang / tshe dbang du bsdu ba dang / tshe yongs su spel ba dang / cho rjes par bya ba dang / tshe rang zhing bdud kyis par mi chod par bya ba dang /
68a4(rnying rgyud): mo klu gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par bya ba/ tshe skye shi med pa'i 'bras bu chos kun gyis grub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos lha mo lcags kyu thogs pa grangs med pa spros nas// oM bruM badz+ra A yu she hUM zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
68a5(rnying rgyud): bdud gshin rje nag po'i snying dral te/ shog shog skya bo rlung gis btab pa bzhin/ dun du na khyer khyar 'ong ba de la gshin rje'i tshe ho nas bzung nas 'dud kyis bsgyel te/ rdo rje snying sa bzhag nas/ lag pa nus nyur gyis phrogs nas/ tshe'i g.yab dang
68a6(rnying rgyud): dang / phyag rgyas g.yab pa dang / ri rab rtse la sbas pa/ rgya mtsho'i gting du smras pa/ bar steng gi khams la sbas pa/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad steng 'og bcu nas bkug cing cho blangs te zhags pa'i tshogs kyis bcings/ lcags sgos
68a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis bsdams nas dbang du bsdus te/ rgya cher yongs su spel bar bya'o// oM hUM badz+ra A yu she badz+ra rmAs zhes btong pas/ bde bar gshegs pa k+Sha'i phyag rgyas bstan nas rnal par bya'o// oM badz+ra d+ha ra/ rang Na d+ha ra/
68b1(rnying rgyud): thAg tA/ sa pa paH/ ya ma ya ki ga sa ma ya ya d+ha d+yan hi zhes brjod pas bdudag shi tudag po yag nas so grags te/ gshin tu yang bcal zhing spangs nas bskal zhing du ma ldas/ thung nan pos steng phrag sus ta/ tsa'i bar cad byas / rnye ba d+ha/
68b2(rnying rgyud): ma hA pu d+hi/ a pa ra mi ta A lu pu N+ya/ dz+nyA na sam+b+ha ro pa tsi te swA hA/ zhes bzlas pas/ sku rdo rje dang / gsung rdo rje dang / thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub thob pa dang / tshe srog gi snying po/ oM bruM badz+ra A yu she badz+re hUM a zhes bzlas pas/ tshe skye shi med pa'i g.yu
68b3(rnying rgyud): drung gi sku tshe thob bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas tshe'i las 'di gsungs so// dbang phyug gtso dang rigs kyi yum// yang dag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// bde ba chen pos yongs brgyan te// dkyil 'khor rdzogs par phun saH/
68b4(rnying rgyud): ldan// rdo rje sems gtso mnyes mdzad pa// gnas 'dir brtse phyir gshegs su gsol// aM e h+ye hi ma hA k+ShA ru D+hi kA tri sha ho/ sa mA ya swa/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ brtan par bzhugs pa/ ye shes chal po spa gaskyeng thugs// yon tan phrin las mang po che/
68b5(rnying rgyud): de nyid du ni byin pa stong pa'i// phyag tu chen por bdag sbyor cig/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya maM/ oM badz+ra sa ma pa a~M/ hU~M badz+ra s+yam pa hU~M/ s+t+waM badz+ra swa ma ya swA/ ha~M badz+ra sa mA ya ha~M/ lus la bzhugs pa/ oM shad gyi spyod ldan bldags pa/
68b6(rnying rgyud): mo dkar mo lugs kyu rdo// tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i pas mdzod cig/ dkar mo zhi byed mgyogs ma 'od 'phro can// tshe la gnod rdzing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas// tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud// bruM badz+ra A yu badz+ra a~M gu sha
68b7(rnying rgyud): ye phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// ser mo yid bzhin glog phreng 'dzin// phyag na rin cheni sbrul gyi zhags pa bsdams// tshe la gnod cing 'phel byed kun bsgral nas// tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang po spyong // rngub kyi phyogs nas tshe 'dzugs
69a1(rnying rgyud): dmar mo bkra gsal dbang spyad ma// phyag na chu srin rgyal mchod bsdams// chol gdod cing 'gal byed kun bskal nas// tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du skad // thung gi phyogs nas 'grags pa ni// nag mo mag gcig ral can// dung
69a2(rnying rgyud): gi tshems la lcags kyi spu// mug na rdo rje rgya gram bsdams// tshol gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas// tsha dang ye shes ma lus dbang du srud// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyings phyug ma rnams bsgrub pa// dbyings phyug mkha' ldan pa d+ma'i dbyings// phyag rgya
69a3(rnying rgyud): bde mchog dbyings kyi yum// ye shes sprul pa'i phyag rgyam// dbyings su mkha' la chod dgu rje brjing drongs// badz+ra e gu sha hUM dzaHstong gsum dbyings la tshe yi mnga' brnyes pa// khams gsum ma lus dbang sdung ma// zhing la rngam zhing ban ma stobs can//
69a4(rnying rgyud): gsum dbyings nas tshe dang gzi brjid drongs// dbyings ma dkar dang rkun mo gnyis med tshegs// bde chen rmongs byed papa pyid ma// gtum mo dbyings su sgrol mdzad snying babyin ma// dpal chen rgyal mo dgyes pa'i 'khor// dung phreng chen mo 'khor dang bcas
69a5(rnying rgyud): tshal gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas// dbyings su mkha' la tshe dang gzi brjid drongs// phog par lta byed bdud dpung 'dul mdzad ma// 'dod khams ma dang gnyis med rol pa'i sras// dbang phyug phra men 'bar ba'i tshogs// tsho la gnod cing 'gal
69a6(rnying rgyud): kun bskal nas// gshin rje lag nas tshe dang gzi brjid drongs// shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// tshe yi lha mo lcags kyu ma// phyag na shel gyi bum pa bsnams// tshe la gnod cing 'ag la khyed skol bar byed// lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// tshe yi lha
69a7(rnying rgyud): mo zhags pa ma// phyag na mthing shing bum pa bsdams// tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed 'ching bar byed// nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// tso me lha mo lcags sgrog ma// phyag grangs kyi bum pa bsnams// sa gnang nga 'gal
69b1(rnying rgyud): byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// tshe yi lha mo dril phu ma// phyag na g.yu yi bum pa bsnams// tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed dbang du sdud// steng gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa na// tshe yi lha mo dbyings phyug ma// phyag na dngul gyi bum pa bsnams// tshe la gnod cing
69b2(rnying rgyud): 'gal byed dbang du sdud// 'og gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// tshe yi lha mo bstan ldan ma// phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsdams// tshe la gnod byed ma lus dbang du sdud// oM b+haM badz+ra A yu yud te rad na yu ti/ d+harma lu ti/ ka ma yu ti/ buM badz+ra A yu she hUM a/
69b3(rnying rgyud): de nas dngos grub blang ba ni// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan// deng bdag sangs rgyas sku 'dzin pa'i// byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzod cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ dpal ldan rdo rje gsung
69b4(rnying rgyud): 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan// deng bdag sangs rgyas+ya kun 'chang ba// byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan// deng bdag sangs rgyas
69b5(rnying rgyud): thugs 'dzin pa'i// byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA gA ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ dam tshig nyams pa thams cad skongs par gyur cig/ lta ba yon po thams cad spongs par gyur cig/ cho ga nyams pa thams cad rdzogs par
69b6(rnying rgyud): gyur cig/ tshe sku gsung thugs kyi skye shi med pa'i dngos grub thob par gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'dres dpal kun du bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sgra gsung thugs sprul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs so// dkyil 'khor
69b7(rnying rgyud): 'dom gang gu bzhi pa// ma hA rak+ta'i mgo la yan gyis byugs la/ dbus su badz+ra he ruH// yum kro d+hi shwa ri/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/ shar du badz+ra he ru ka/ g+ho ra re t+na he ru ka/ nub tu pad+me he ru ka/ byang du kar+Na he ru ka/ sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyang
70a1(rnying rgyud): gzhan dang mthun/ de'i gyi rim snam bu la/ phra men ma bcu drug/ de'i phyi rim sgo bzhi la dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dri chen gyis maN+Dal thugs la dbus su yak+sha ga ru ka/ dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad/ zhabs brgyad gshog pa rdo rjes
70a2(rnying rgyud): gtams pa/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brkyang pa la/ shar du badz+ra he ru ka/ g+ho ra yak+Sha he ru ka/ rub ku byi sha he ru ka/ byang du sa ma yA he ru ka/ mtshams bzhir khro moM dbang phyug ma yum bzhi bzhugs/ gdan zhing bsnol ma'i khril bzugs so// de'i phyi
70a3(rnying rgyud): snam bu la phra men dang khro bo pha bcu ma bcu dgod cing bzhugs so// sgo bzhir lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi dgod do// khro bo chen po nI la daN+Da dbus su bri// de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la sprul pa'i khro bo shugs can dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / rdo rje
70a4(rnying rgyud): grags pa dang / rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dang / rdo rje gsus po che dang / rdo rje gad mo dang / gad rgyangs can dang / 'di rnams go rims bzhin bri/ sgo bzhi gzhan dang mthun/ dkyil 'khor 'od ma gang gru bzhi le/ rnam par rgyal ba dbus su bri/ pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la/ shar
70a5(rnying rgyud): du rdo rje grags chen/ lhong khro bo gad mo can/ nub tu khro bo he he/ grags chen dang / byang du rdo rje bgegs gnon pa'i rgyal po bri/ de'i phyi rim sgo rnams bri/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su gshin rje gshed po bri/ phyi ris pad+ma 'ang
70a6(rnying rgyud): brkyang la/ phra men ma song ha la sogs pa brgyad bri/ sgo bzhi god/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ khro bo mi g.yo mgon po dbus swa b+h+rUM/ de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtsi bsna bzhi la kho bo 'gying ba dang / khro bo glang po che dang / khro bu ko pa rlon pa
70a7(rnying rgyud): can dang / khro bo mig mi bzang ba bzhi rim pa bzhin du zo'o// phyir sgo snyam dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su ha ya sgri ba bri/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ ke'u rim bkyang bri/ rim sgo sngam dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang
70b1(rnying rgyud): gru bzha la/ Ta ki rang dbus su dgod/ phyi rim maN+Dal brgyad pal khro bo bde pa dang / smyo'i phreng ba dang / drung can dang // kha tshur dang / g.yab mo dang / dga' ba dang / 'dugs pa dang / Sh+T+r-in dang na 'di rnams / sgra skam dgod/ dkyil 'khor
70b2(rnying rgyud): gang gru bzhi le/ dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/ shar du rdo rje spu can dang / zengs kyi gshog pa can dang / lcags kyi mche ba can dang / smyu gre so can dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ khams gsum nas
70b3(rnying rgyud): byar rgyal ba dbus su dgod/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la stag gi mgo can dang / g.yog gi mgo can dang / sha ba'i mgo can dang / byi la'i mgo can rnams so// sgo bzhi rim bzhin du dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ khro ba
70b4(rnying rgyud): b+h+rUM kA ra dbus skra dgod do// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la smyu ka mgo can dang / lha'i mgo rgyan dang / dom gyi mgo can dang / da mag rten rnams dgod ngo // sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la stobs po che dbus su dgod/ 'khor/
70b5(rnying rgyud): l-i rtsibs bzhi lnga/ shar du rdo rje gdengs mo/ lho na rdo rje sder mo/ thub tu ngur khrod bdag mo/ byang du rdo rje gtun khung rnams rim bzhin du dgod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo de rnams kyi las kyi rkang nge 'dzin la snyoms
