70b6(rnying rgyud): par zhugs so// dbus kyi khrag 'thung chen po ni// dbu dgra phyag ni bcwa brgyad de// gshog pa rdo rje gtims pa gdengs// zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du bstan// de yi 'khor gyi khro mo nI// phyag kyang srin mo ltar mthun te// zhabs kyang de dang
70b7(rnying rgyud): 'dra bar bstan// shar gyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// khro bo rnam par rgyal po lce// sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag sbrengs na// dri za bsnol ba'i khro la bzhugs// 'jig can
71a1(rnying rgyud): skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// shar lho mtshams na bzhugs pa ni// khro bo dbyug pa sngon po can// sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// me lha bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten
71a2(rnying rgyud): slong ba 'dul tshul lo// lho yi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// ya mAn tu ka gshin rje gshed// sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// ma he bsnol ba'i khro la bzhugs// 'jig rten slong ba 'du
71a3(rnying rgyud): tshul lo// lho nub mtshams na bzhugs pa ni// khro bo mi g.yo mgon po ni// sku mdog sgo la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// bden bral bsgrol ma'i khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul
71a4(rnying rgyud): lo// nub kyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// ha ya grI ba rta mchog dbang // sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje phrag stengs na// klu bdag bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skrod pa 'dul tshul lo// nub
71a5(rnying rgyud): byang mtshams na bzhugs pa ni// khro bo Ta ki ra dza ste// sku mdog dud ka 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// rlung lha bskol mo 'i khI la bzhugs// 'jig rten myong ba 'dul tshul lo// byang gi grogs na
71a6(rnying rgyud): bzhugs pa ni// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// snga ma dag ljang gu 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i khri lnga bzhugs// 'jig rten song bya 'dung tshul lo// thAng sha rA ma
71a7(rnying rgyud): na bzhugs pa ni// khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal// sku mdog ljang mya 'od zer 'gre// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug ni rje thag stengs ni// bi nA ya ka'i khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ me gi
71b1(rnying rgyud): na bzhugs pa ni// khro bo hU~M mdzad hUM ka ra// sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// nyi zla gza' skar khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba 'jal tshul lo// 'og gi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni//
71b2(rnying rgyud): ma hA ba la stobs po che// sku mdog gnas la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag skyengs na// sa bdag bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo ya mAn ta
71b3(rnying rgyud): ka'i ting nge 'don du bzhugs nas 'di skad ces bskul lo// bdud ru tra nag po 'dul bar mdzad do// hU~M gtum chen rab 'jigs 'jig rten 'joms mdzad la// nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od ldan khyod// phyag cha mang po bskal pa'i me bzhin 'bar// rab
71b4(rnying rgyud): 'bar gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje sku la klu dbang rab brgyan cing // gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags rlon sku la brgyan// brkyang bskum tshul gyis rab 'jigs gshin rje gnon// zhir chen khrag 'dzag thod rlon sku la brgyan// mi zad rgyal po
71b5(rnying rgyud): gdong drug hU~M sgra can// phaT kyis khams gsum sngags mdzad zhabs drug po// sha za'i mgo garjod dbu yi rgyan du thogs// spyan bzlog tsam gyis thog 'bebs me ltar 'phro// ljags 'dril tshems kyi gseb nas thog 'bebs shing // ma mo rnams
71b6(rnying rgyud): da sbyin mo 'dar zhing 'bros// stong gsum med per mdza pa'i zhal ga dngas la// tshangs pa'i 'khor bcos khrag gzigs 'jig cing // nad stod srin ma'i tshogs rnams dbar zhing 'bros// rkan+d+ha m+b+ha gtogs pa lha chen wab 'jug kyang //
71b7(rnying rgyud): 'bum 'gyil bcas par khrag skyugs nyid la 'dud// phyag na mi thod rlon pa bsnams pa ni// dngos grub phyag gis glad khrag zhal du stobs// tshangs pa'i mgo bcid dbu yi rgyan du byas// zhing chen mgo nas chem chem za bar byed//
72a1(rnying rgyud): phreng khrag dang bcas par thogs nas ni// khyod mthong tsam gyis rab 'jigs nyid la 'dud// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // sprul pa'i khye'u bzang dbu gsum phyag drug pa brgya rtsa brgyad byung nas bcom ldan 'das pa 'dzum
72a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i mdangs kyis me tog gtor bka' nod pa'i tshul du gong de bzhugs pa de la// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dgung la thog thog mi bzad pa// khye'u chung sngon ma mo kha' la lding // ya mAn ta ka khro bo ste// sku yang che la bam ldir
72a3(rnying rgyud): bzang // sku mdog stang zil bcag pa 'dra// phyag gnyis dang po kha T+wAM ga/ bar na rdo rje dril bu bsnams// tha ma mda' dang gzhu bsnams te// 'khor ni phra men brgyad kyis bskor// nga nyid yin te skal ba bzang // skal bzang de yi dam tshig gis// dog la chem chem mi
72a4(rnying rgyud): bzad pa// bsgrags pa ral pa gcig ma yin// dam tshig dus la se ma 'da' zhig ces sgo'o// ci bka' stsal pa bzhin du/ las thams cad kyang grub par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos ma dang phra men ma'i ting nge 'dzin du
72a5(rnying rgyud): zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// las bcol bar mdzad do// kro d+hI shwa ri dpal 'bar ma// khams gsum sbrid la mda' mdzad ma// las su gsod la dga' ba mo// shan pa spu gri rnon po so// ro la rngam pa'i kha T+wAM ga/ 'byung po tsit+ta mchog la
72a6(rnying rgyud): rol// mthing ga mchog ston dpal gyi yum// rdo rje thugs kyi dbang phyug ma// ko'u rim yi mchod pas rol// gser gyi 'od 'phro mda' gzhu 'gengs// rin chen sku yi dbang phyug ma// tsu'u ri ma yi mchod pas rol// phra mo zla srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin
72a7(rnying rgyud): bad+ma gsung gi dbang phyug ma// pra mo ha yi mchod pas rol// nag zo ral pa thong pas 'gangs// karma las kyi dbang phyug me// ba tA li yi mchod pas rol// gtum mo zho sdong hUM gla sa// zhe sdang 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// d+has+pha yi ma
72b1(rnying rgyud): pas rol// pad+ma 'joms pa'i char chen babs// 'dod chags 'joms pa'i dbang thug pa// smad sa pa mdzad pas la// rin chen me kye zlog zeng 'dren// gtu mug 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// swA shan yi mchod pas rol// las su dgra sta 'bar ba 'dzin//
72b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// tsan d+ha le yi mchod pas rol// se ga gsod byed seng ge mgo/ ro mchog za ba'i phra men ma// d+hU b+h+rUM mgo gcod stag gi mgo// thod rlon za ba'i phra men ma// suM ga dur rgan wa yi mgo// dur sri ma yi pra men ma// shA na sha
72b3(rnying rgyud): 'drang srung mo mgo// sha chen za ba'i sku men ma// kr-i d+ha khrag 'jung ba rgod mgo// khrag cil za ba'i tha men pa// kang ka zug du bu'i mgo// dug gsum 'joms pa'i phra me nA ma// khA kha N+Da 'dren pho rag mgo// dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i phra men pa// hA
72b4(rnying rgyud): 'phrog 'ug pa'i mgo// glo steng za ba'i phra men ma// skyug g.yag shA ba seng ge'i mgo// kyi la stad ki wa yi mgo// de mdzod phag gi mgo can rnams// thugs dam bzhin du las byos shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sbyor ba
72b5(rnying rgyud): mu la 'khril cing / las mthar phyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis slob rnams la bka' stsal pa// rat+na rdoHlcags bya g+ho/ skyed 'dren// a myo sngon mo thong sbrul zhags// a l-i dmar mo lcags glog sdom// bas ni lung du dril 'khrol
72b6(rnying rgyud): dgyes// bka' stsal pa bzhin du nyan par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las ye shes kyi khro bo dkyil 'khor gyi le'u lho gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal lha mo sbyor ba'i ting nge
72b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te hUM dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di phyung ngo // gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs rnam pa bzhis na brgyan// dar dang dril bu chun po dang // nyi ma zla bas rnam par brgyan// rin
73a1(rnying rgyud): tig 'bras bus spras// do shal rkang gdub rnams kyis brgyan// sna tshogs gzugs ni rnam thos pa// sna tshogs phreng ba gos kyis brgyan// srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste// ka ba mchog brgyad yang dag ldan// dbus su dga' byed stanA la ni// dngul la
73a2(rnying rgyud): sogs pas rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs pad+ma'i dar gyis g.yogs// thams cad stan pa de dag ces// dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' ni// stan de la ni gzhag par bya// tshad med pad+mo dam 'dra ba// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs// yid bzhin nor bu
73a3(rnying rgyud): dbu rgyan ldan// rin chen gtsug ni rnam par mdzes// tshad med dang ni sbyang ba yi// dbu la chun pos mdzes par byas// sna tshogs ye shes rab tu gnas// chu skyes spyan ni rab tu rgyas// dga' byed yid tsam g.yon du 'dud// g.yas kyi phyag gis rdo rje che//
73a4(rnying rgyud): snying gar gsor la rab tu brtson// bde la sogs pa yon tan ldan// thog ma nyid du rnam par gzhag/ slob ma 'am yang na gzhan yang rung // mtshan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan la// tshul bzhin byin gyis brlabs bya ste// dbus kyi dkyil du gzhag par bya//
73a5(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam bzhag ste// de la sogs pa yon tan gtso// dbus kyi stan la 'dug pa ni// bdag ni rab dgyes rjes su smra// der ni slob ma byin brlabs te// thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs// rdo rje brgya las byung ba'i// gsang ba yis kyang dbang
73a6(rnying rgyud): bskur ro// rab dgyes la sogs yon tan ldan// yid 'ong bu mo btsal bya ste// snying ga mchog ma mgrin spyi bor// lha rnams la sogs 'bru bsgoms te// mtshan ma phyag rgya rab 'bar ba'i// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam spor ba'o// rab la 'khrung pa'i phyag rgya
73a7(rnying rgyud): yis// tshul bzhin thams cad gzhag par bya// mdun du lha mo myos byed ma// ma ma chu 'dzin pa'i ro la dgyes// dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yis// thams cad rkyen dang yang dag ldan// lo ni bcu drug lon pa mchog/ shes rab can gyis mdun du
73b1(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ g.yas su lha mo gsong blang ma// mtshan cha mda' ni 'dran par brtson// do shal rkang gdub dag gis brgyan// lo grangs te shwa lon pa ste// gser gyur po'u bA 'dra// rgyu skyes stan na yid tsam sngo// sems dpa' tsha la maN+Das mdzad cing // da mi tshul
73b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin gzhag par bya// rgyab tu lha mo rmongs byed ma// pad+ma dmar po mdog gi 'od// chu srin+da rgyal mtshan mdzes pa'o// sku yi tshad ni nyi shu gnyig/ dga' byed 'dod pa'i ro la dgyes// sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par
73b3(rnying rgyud): bklubs// sna tshogs pad+mo sbyod la sogs// gar gyi bya ba rab rlag gzhag/ g.yon du lnga tshogs chen mo ste// sna tshogs dgos pa rjes brlabs pa// sku yi tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan// rnal 'byor la ni shin tu brtson// lha dang lha min mi yi rnams// 'gro ba
73b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad myos mdzad ma// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs// sna tshogs dang ni na bza' gsol// grwa rnams dag ni thams cad du// gzugs sgra dri ro reg rnams dang // bdug pa me tog bsung ldang ba// gzi brji chen po'i 'od dang ldan//
73b5(rnying rgyud): rigs par ni gzhag par bya// sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rang gi las kyi zug rgyar ldan// skal ldan 'ga' la rnams mos pa// sgo srung bzhin gzhag par bya// gzhan yang num pa sna tshogs rnams// pi wang gling bu brdab pa dang // rlu
73b6(rnying rgyud): rnga chen ku mu da// mu ra tsa dang rar dang // gar dang dbyangs dang bzhad pa che// rol mo yo byad sna tshogs rnams// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya// gyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad do// dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol du// rdo rje nam mkhar 'a
73b7(rnying rgyud): ma gzhag/ yi dgas phyag rgya yang dag zhon// dpa' bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzin te// skal ldan rang gi lag char ldan// gdug pa'i sems kyis bsdigs byed cing // sha khrag dang ni chu ma dang // rkang dang tshil bu za spyad pa// dkyil 'a
74a1(rnying rgyud): rdzu ba ga / nga da/ nga / ngan nas/ gas sa d+han / na la
74a2(rnying rgyud): 'doms kyang pong du sto ste// gtsu lag nga ba rgyangs te/ mkhas pas rgyal bdi na gnag pa bya// chogs chen po da rgyags tha' dang/ nga pa mi nas 'a bsam// ba rjod pas ra // pa dgas chub tu gnag par ba/
74a3(rnying rgyud): tshigs lus dang srung ba dang // gnod sbyin mo dang yang dag 'phrog/ sngags dang myag byin parlabs nas// sngags mkhan ci rigs zung du bzhag// shar gyi grwa ru gzhag pa ni// byi rog gdong ni mig 'bru ste// 'jigs pa'i mig dang 'jigs pa'i gdang /
74a4(rnying rgyud): g+ha rjes samathun byas te// mi dwagras spyan la yang dag 'dug/ ga sna ma chog gi gdang 'dzin te// la 'a byer dang khar gnong thogs// ma chog tu sha dang khya za ba'o// dang sgo la mtshams gzhon pa// bzhad dang drug pa'i gdong ring ba// sa pa'i
74a5(rnying rgyud): khyi dang phag gi dong // gsus po tshal / 'ablangs rnams// rna dang nga gi mtshams dag kyi// ri ma bong bri ga dren gyi// ma par dang skye ma da // d+ha ba'i mgonas na par byed// shar dang byang gi ra mas dag tu// gang dus dkar po 'dzin pa
74a6(rnying rgyud): khros pa rus pa'i phreng bas bsgrubs// lho 'phangs po bum pa 'don// phan tshun 'thab par brtson pa yi// ce sgang gi ni 'khyor gyi rnams// 'jigs med gdong rje mche ba 'dzin// rnam par bsgyur ba gzugs 'dzinam// rnams kyi ni tsho gas rnams
74a7(rnying rgyud): bzhi rnams ni gzhag par bya// byang gi phyogs su 'bod 'grogs te// drug po rnams ni shar nyid du// nub tu rnam par 'jigs pa // sku rug shin rjergyal pob dang // de dang gzhan yang tshul po mchog/ rnam mkhar 'gribs kun du ra/
74b1(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' yum gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// dgyes shing spyan ni rgyas pa pis// bzhengs nas dgyes pa chen po yi// brjid pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing // thal mo lhor nas gtsug nyid du// gzhag pa yis ni
74b2(rnying rgyud): 'dud par byed// bskul ba yis ni dbyangs 'di yis// de dag gtso la mnyes par byed// kye ma chos ni ngo mtshar tshe// kye ma spyod pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma sbas pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma bde byed yang dag 'byung // sem kun du bzang po don// kye mar 'dakyis yang dag
74b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzugs// ma byu ga ba // ma pa de ba ba / kham lags nga dag ra// An+tha g+h+nA // mAN+Dag d-i ga 'azhugs// sem pa pa // ma pa la byin pa yis/ yang dgas pa/
74b4(rnying rgyud): ma dgos pa sna tshogs che// kye ma dag pa gsum sbar ba// kye ma rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba'i// kye ma pad+ma rnam phye ba// kye ma dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i// kye ma mchog dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// kye ma gar ni dga' ba che// kye ma gla rab dri ma med// kye ma sil snyan rnam par
74b5(rnying rgyud): 'khrol// kye me gda' dang mun sel ba// kye ma dga' byed me tog phreng // kye ma mar me mun pa sel// kye ma dri ni shin tu bsil// kye ma rnal 'byor mnyam sbyor ba'i// kye ma su ma nam mkha' 'dra// kye ma sangs rgyas nam mkha' 'dra// kye ma rin chen 'di mchog
74b6(rnying rgyud): skyed// kye ma sna tshogs sgyu ma mdzad// kye mngo mtshar sangs rgyas dang // kye ma ngo mtshar dbang po rnams// kye ma ngo mtshar sems dpa' che// kye mngo mtshar lha yi rnams// shin tu dgyes rje rdo rje la// rgyal ba kun gyis bstod byas te// rje sems dpa'
74b7(rnying rgyud): dgying ba yis// dga' dang bde byed skyes par 'gyur// chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas pa// yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad de// spyan dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis// rab tu dbyes ldan smin ma bsgyur// yangs pa'i sprin gyis gar mdzad de//
75a1(rnying rgyud): dang 'bas ni bsgyur ba las// yang tsam ma sa ba'i kun byung gzigs// shams brnyan na bar 'byung // dad pa nga rgyas ni nas par yangs// rnams phyogs kyang cha la mang sa// chags bcud zud choms sa gnan// rnams kyi thung ba kun daH// madrug
75a2(rnying rgyud): zlos pa'i dbugs 'byin cing // rab tu dga' chen dgyes pas bstod// bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas gsum gyis// dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo
75a3(rnying rgyud): mchog/ spyan la sogs pa bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yis// pad+mo rdo rje bsgom par bya// 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du dkar// yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya// bzhin bzangs
75a4(rnying rgyud): phan par 'dod pa yis// bud med rnyed na cho ga bzhin/ bde bar mchod par brtsam par bya// ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya// sngags shes pas ni gnas bzhin du// bud med rtag tu gzhag par bya// rgyan rnams thams cad
75a5(rnying rgyud): yongs su rdzogs// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub// mtshan nyid dag ni yongs su dag/ rab tu bzang la bzhin yang mdzes// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// pang par bzhag nas rnam par
75a6(rnying rgyud): bsgom// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// bu mo ut+pal mthing ga'i mdog/ 'dra ba dngag ni rtag tu dngu ba// sgo dbu'i cho ga de nyid ni// byas na las rnams brtsam par bya// blang med dems ni rab brtan pa// lo grangs bcu gnyis ljon pa la// rigs kyi sbyor ba
75a7(rnying rgyud): rab bsgoms te// bdag gi khu bas mchod par bya// 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra// na chung gzhon nu mig bzang bcol// gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa yi// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa'i// bzung nas gyol song skyes gnas btang // bzhin
75b1(rnying rgyud): bzangs shin tu mdzes pa yi// na chung mtshan ldan skal ba mchog/ mig bzang brtan pa'i blo ldan pas// khu ba blangs nas bza' bar bya// dben zhing rab tu nyams dga' bar// sbyor ba mchod pa kun brtsams na// rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs// zla bzed kyis
75b2(rnying rgyud): nges par grub// sbyin dgus ring zhing sgra lo 'angam// lus ldem dbyibs spu srod dgacing // brten pa chags shing bcos su btub// lus nyan nI la thogs pa med// rked pa phral ro spad zlum// stong ni drang la shin tu rgyas// choms dkar mgul ring rtsag sor
75b3(rnying rgyud): ring // dkar la dmar chags nor bu'i mdog/ gzungs ma mtshan ldan sdud par bya// mnyen lkug 'khril ldem rab tu mdzes// yid 'od 'bum phran spyan zur gzigs// mkhur chos dkar pos gdab par bya// dkar 'dzin gyir ni mota bya ste// pad+ma'i ze ba
75b4(rnying rgyud): chen pos gdab// pad+ma lan gsum mnyes bya ste// mchun khung mngon sum rna ba gnyis// zangs kyi mdog gis gzung bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi btsun mo dang bcas par gyur to// de nas 'di brjod par mdzad do// zhi ba kha dog
75b5(rnying rgyud): dkar la 'tshor// btang snyoms kun gyi spro baspu yis// gsum pa rdzogs par ldan pa dang // phyag rgya tshogs mchog de dag la// rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du skyes// phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// bcu gsum pa yi cha lugs 'dzin// che chung med
75b6(rnying rgyud): par gsal bar bsgom// dbul gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan// gsal ba nyid kyis dus dag tu// cod pargya lnga yi rin chen pas// rgyan gyi rigs ni gsal ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'o// mthing
75b7(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i yi ge che// rigs kyi rin chen spro bsdu las// phyag rgya gsal ba'i skur gsal ba'o// rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du skyes// sgrib pa kun spang sdig byed stobs// gnyis pa yi ni yi ge las// thams cad glo dbyangs yi ge gter// mnya
76a1(rnying rgyud): par 'khril ba'i tshul 'dzin pa// rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal// las 'di thams cad kun gyi mchog/ rgyal po rnam par rol pa'o// pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba'i mdog// chos a nA chos rab ldan pa// gsal ba'i kha dog mdzes pa na// thams cad ma jas
76a2(rnying rgyud): dang du mdzod// rdzor dang kye dang bsrub yis// phyag rgya gsal bar dbang gis bskur// btsun mo dag dang mnyam du skyes// gnyis su med par 'khril ba yin// dbu ru yi ge gnyis par ldan// rin chen rigs kyi spro bsu las// cod pan rigs lnga'i kha dog ste/
76a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// phyag rgya bzhugs tshul pardo'i tshul// mnyam par gsal bas dkyil 'khor yin// mau phyed pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor sa mchog// pad+ma rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal// rigs kun gyi ni phyag rgyar gsal
76a4(rnying rgyud): mun pa sel ba'i mar me bzhin// gsal dag yid gnyis med par bsgom// chu skyes 'jam pa 'og tu ldan// steng dang spyod pa'i rol mo yis// dgyes shing mnyam pa'i mchod pa bsham// 'di ltar gsal ba dbang yang rdzogs// thams cad bsdu ba zhes bya ba//
76a5(rnying rgyud): steng // gnyis su med par gsal bas na// rnam pa gnyis kyi bye brag gis// 'das par gsal bar skur gyur pa// 'dod cing chags pa ma yin zhing // blo la yid gnyis med pas na// phyag rgya gsal bar rgyal ba'i sku// rgyal mo dang ni mnyam du skyes/
76a6(rnying rgyud): dbu la gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan// sbyin pa rgya chen khebs pas na// rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas su bsdu// borje rgyad lo grangs khyad par med// gnyis su med par 'khril bar gsal// dus kun du ni mnyam ldan pa// gsang ba mchod pa rab tu rdzogs// bla rgyas
76b1(rnying rgyud): lha lpags pa bsgom// chags pa med par 'dod bsdu yi// yum dang lhan cig sgom pa ni// A la kA par byed pa'i don// phyag rgya las kyi bye brag gis// bde ba chen po tshul gnas pa// rgal ba kun kyang de dang mthun// phyag rgya bskol bar gnas pa yi// kun kyang sems
76b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor ro// phyag rgya rdo rje thal mo ni// kun kyang yum gyi rgyab tu bsnol// zhal gnyis mdzes par rab sbyar ba// bla gam pa yi lcags gnyis mdzes// dung gi phur bras mkhur chos la// 'debs shing rdeg pa'i tshul du bzhugs// bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang rdzogs pa/
76b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba kun gyi sku yi mchog/ bzhad dang 'dzum pa'i gtso gzugs bsgom// rnal 'byor dka' thub chen po'i don// gsang ba spyod pa shin tu dgyes// gsang ba nyid du sems can 'dren// thams cad kun gyi rmongs pa sel// yum gyi las stes khyad par ni/
76b4(rnying rgyud): sa yi rIm pa kun sbyor zhing // zas dang mgo dbang med pa yi// nyan thos 'gog pa la sogs pa// byang chub sems kyi char chen gyis// pad+mor bcings pa tshar gcod mdzad// dam tshig chen po sdom pa ste// rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor yin// phyag
76b5(rnying rgyud): na pa tshogs mchog ste// dga' ba don du dgas mchog yin// myur bar tag drum pabyas na// don mi tha byar grub pa ni// 'dod khamas+ya lha yi nyin byed kyis// gsang ba kun dang btam par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i di dang ma
76b6(rnying rgyud): pa rgyab ma'o// kun du bzang po rnal 'thor mchog/ gsung ba nyid kyis mkhadu kyings so// ga oM ldan chog dag bcas// rdul 'thor bar tshan nyid kyis// gnags khams thogs rkyen brlangs te// sngag mtshan 'khong po gas
76b7(rnying rgyud): bde brnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs// marbab gser gyi kha dag gas pa// nyi ma gsar sa 'ong bzhin du// gsal ba 'tshor ba bcom ldan 'das// dbu ru ma ga gnyis pa la// rin rkyen rdza bu khang pa 'bar// sangs rgyas lnga yi dang can gyis/
77a1(rnying rgyud): // legs par brgyan pa mtshan rnams rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po bzhugs tshul dang // ting 'dzin mthun pa 'gro la gzigs// pad+ma ga sar dbus gnas pa'i// thig ler gsang ba bzhin dang ldan// mdun du lha mo chags pa mo// lo grangs nyi shu mdzes
77a2(rnying rgyud): dang wag// mahA lu khe gnas lang gyes// mdzes pa'i lag pa gar dang bcas// gnyis su med pa'i bzhugs tshul ni// gcopa rten pa'i tshul du bsngags// rgyab rgya lha mo dkris chen mo// sangs rgyas bsnyen par mdzes tshul gyis// thal sngar dad pa sku brten pa//
77a3(rnying rgyud): sku tshe bcu drug brtsan dmar sku// sangs rgyas gdung 'dzin tshangs par sbyor// 'dod chags can la mthun par mdzad// g.yas su zhe sdang 'dul ba mo// rdo rje pad+mo sbyor la dgyes// ma dad pa rnams dbang med par// drag po sgor mdzad zhe sdang sel// chags pa chen
77a4(rnying rgyud): po bcom ldan 'das// gnyis su med par sbyor ba yis// gtong ba med par bstan pa'i tshul// sde bsangs mdog ldan khyad par che// phra tshad bcwa lnga chags pa can// dus mtha' med par g+ho ra la dgyes// steg dang sgeg pang cha lugs kyis// sems can na
77a5(rnying rgyud): kyi sdug bsngal 'jakhru// rab tu spras pa'i 'gog pa rnams// bskangs nas rgyal ba'ims su mdzad// a ta ma li phrin las kyis// thams cad byang chub chen po mdzad// mig gnyis 'dzums dang sbom po yis// dbang mor ldan par byas pa na// gnyis su med
77a6(rnying rgyud): par sbyor 'dod yin// swA yi rtse mor mthe'u chung 'dzin// ma ta bzhugs par brtson byas pa'o// so so rnams pa rnams kha gye ba// dus la bab ces bya ba ste// ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa na// dus la brab ces bya ba yin// 'di ltar ban ldan ting 'dzin la/
77a7(rnying rgyud): dam can bud med rnams mi 'dud// dngos grub ma thob dam tshig nyams// tshe rabs kun du brlag par 'gyur// 'di ltar brtson par byed pa na// g.yon pa sbed pa rnam bzhi yis// skyes pa na chung tshul bzhin du// rdo rje padz+ra'i mtshams nyid du// dbyings byug
77b1(rnying rgyud): yi sbyor ba yis// dal bus dal bus gzhug pa dang // dal bus dal bus rab bskul te// drag po tshig gis spro ba dang // byang chub sems kyis pad+ma dgang // sbom po dbang ngam lnga rnams kyis// yum gyis blangs la gtso la mchod// nye ba'i bsnyen pa la sogs te// bsnyen
77b2(rnying rgyud): pa che chung rdzogs par bsgom// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor las// mchod pa brgyad kyis mchod par ston// de ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang // gnyis su med par lugs bzhin du// mnyam par 'khril ba'i tshul du bstan// dus gsum kun gyi gdung 'dzin
77b3(rnying rgyud): la// g.yon phyogs bsnyen pa sa pa dang na// na tshod lo ni bdu jug pa// phung po la pa dag la dgyes// g.yas de zur gyi stan gyis gzigs// dril bu swa stan pa khrol la brtson// rdo rje rab tu sgrogs byed ma// sangs rgyas la yi dang can can// mngon du skor
77b4(rnying rgyud): rab brtson pa// brda dang brngas pa gar zhes ni// ngas chus kun pa spong mdzad ma// byang chub sems kyi sprin chen gyis// mchod pa chen po rab mchod mnyes// sprul pa bsam pas mtha' klas pa// dus gsum 'khor lo bskor ba re bskul// mo sor
77b5(rnying rgyud): chags pa'i sadangs kyis ni// mnyen dang bcas pa'i gar gyis mdzad// ded gsangam dang gnyis su med par 'khril pa chen po rah+ma ste/ yon zhe sbed pa gos mnyes pa dang badz+ra spang ba la sogs pa 'byung ba mnyes par mdzad nas ra
77b6(rnying rgyud): tu dgyes te glu 'di blangs so// chos kun dngos po med par rab gsol pa// dazung gnas chen po sa mtshan 'byung bar mkhyen// e maM kho ngo mcher ze'o zhes blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dalas gsungs pa/ mdangs bza'
77b7(rnying rgyud): mig gi dkyus kyang ring // sku ni ldem la tsan dan de// yan lag lhag ma bzhin du mnyan// tshams dkar sum cu rngo ma de// mgul ba zlum rengs rab tu legs// gser la g.yusas g.yas bu 'khyil// gsungs mo 'di dag bsnyen par
78a1(rnying rgyud): skad gdangs mi snyan rar po// yang na rmongs pa gsub suba'o// sbrang bus gtses pa'i sna sgra bzhin// sems can dag la khro zhing 'chag/ dam can dag la g.yel bar mdzad// phyi nang sra zhing 'bras bu can// de bsnyen na ni dngos grub nyams//
78a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bud med kun gyi sgyum la// rab tu 'phrul te 'char ba yin// bden gnyis so sor snang ba yis// yum gyi mkha' zhes rgyal bas gsungs// ma nor lam chen kun bsgoms nas// kun du bzang mo bsgoms pas grub//
78a3(rnying rgyud): sa / pa ma ga
78a4(rnying rgyud): pa dam pa ni/ sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba ste// kun du khyab pa kun du sbyor// rjes su chags pa dam tshig mchog/ de byi dkar sham mdog dang ldan// bcu drug pong tshod ring ba dang // lugs su blugs pa skya bu ste// lus legs mdzes dang ldan pa dang // dpral ba
78a5(rnying rgyud): dpes tshe kos ka rba// ru ma chung zhing sor mo ring // yid tsam mig dgras ring ba dang // so dkar zags bzangs mtshams thung zhing // skad bzang mdangs dang ldan pa ni// rdo rje sems dbang gnas mchog ste// 'di la brjon par byed pa ni// rigs kyi rdo rje gdon mi za/
78a6(rnying rgyud): tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// gnas rab bden par rab brtags te// sha dkar mdangs bzang mdog dang ldan// lus 'bring zlum pa cha byad can// so dkar thags bzangs mig dkyus ring // skad phra mdog dgod sgo ring ba// dpral dbyes la sogs pa
78a7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa// ma nag la sogs gnas pa ni// rtag tu mos pa 'dud pa yin// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi rin chen las/ 'di las btsun byas bslabs pa yi// de bzhin rigs kyi ting 'dzin las// phan tshun du ni dga' spyod na// tshangs pa'i snga dro gcig tsam gyis/
78b1(rnying rgyud): gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor spyod pa dga' ba ni// sbyor ba brtson pas 'grub par gsungs// bud med cha lugs legs pa na// bong tshod mi ring lus phra zhing // rkang lag chung zhing skad gsal ba// mig legs ngo zlum brtsan dmar che// blun du
78b2(rnying rgyud): chags pa mi shes med// lus la mtshon gyi rmad 'dres brgyan// tshig gsal rmi lam nyung ba dang // so dkar mchu phegs dad par ldan// cho ga shes pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// gsang ba'i mkhang la nyi zla'i 'od// rdo rje pad+mor ldan byas te// phan tshun bu ni dgang spyad
78b3(rnying rgyud): dod pa'i bags sgra mun cig gis/ 'grub par 'asgyur ba gdan mib/ dus rnam gtum pa gra pa can// 'dan sems nog sems pa 'dzin// thub 'dras mi gtod smram/ 'azla baba'i d+hApa gdus n+tu// mang su thag dugs dbye b+h+ring gas pa// spe pa /
78b4(rnying rgyud): zhing chos la dad// rin chen rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// bag chags yi ge tshar gcod cing // ting 'dzin blo la gsal ba na// bsgrub pa'i dus la bab pa ste// de tshe rab tu rtsen pa yis// yum gyi pad+ma kha phye zhing // bde ba thugs kyi 'phro 'dra yis// pha
78b5(rnying rgyud): tshun du ni dga' spyad na// rigs kyi rin chen grub pa ni// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// thugs rjes mdzad spyod bye brag gis// 'jig rten dag na dman pa'i rigs// rab tu bkug ste dga' spyad na// snying rje mchog dang thabs ldan pa'i// rnal 'byor
78b6(rnying rgyud): spyod pa chen po gsungs// shan pa'i rigs ngan slad 'tshong ma'i// na ba'i rigs dang 'dod spyod rnams// 'joms pa chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// myur du spyad na 'grub par gsungs// yi dgas gnod sbyin byol song dang // khyi dang rus sbal spre'u la sngogs/
78b7(rnying rgyud): mi dang lha yi gnas mchog kun// so so 'tsham pa dga' spyad na// las mchog dam pa 'grub par gsungs// rab tu chags la chags pa'i mchog/ rab tu rmugs pa rdzogs pa se pa// zhe sdang can la 'tsham par ston// grags pa can la zhi ba che//
79a1(rnying rgyud): cen pa dag pa rtsen par mdzad// thabs kyi mdzad pa kun gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi don bya byir// byin ci log tu gang sprad rnams// gdul bar mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis// mi mdzad pa ni ci yang med// shin tu gtum pa'i cha lugs kyis// gtam pa
79a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad dbang du mdzad// shin tu zhi ba'i cha lugs kyis// grags pa can rnams dbang du mdzad// shin tu mdangs ldan cha lugs kyis// chags pa'i yid rnams dbang du mdzad/ e ma'o shin tu ngo mtshar che// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen po sa ra
79a3(rnying rgyud): tu brtson par mdzad pa// yid kyi 'phro ba dang / zla ga ma med pa dang / gyad 'gyed pa dang // zung ba bla na med pas phan tshun du dga' bgyod do// sha mdog dkar la nu me 'bur// stong snad byed la srin dkyus ring // 'dra'i dri yang dung ltar 'gro// sarba legs pa gr-i
79a4(rnying rgyud): bos 'dra// zlum pa che chung snyoms pa'o// sha mdog dkar la sde ba can// stod slad phyed la sor mo reng // nu ma chung zhing mkhrang ba ste// dri yang pad+ma'i dri ru pro/ mgul pa legs pa ring bung ran// pad+ma dmar la mkhur tshos legs// sman yang zlum la 'og nas
79a5(rnying rgyud): lha// sha mdog ser la nu ma zlu ma// rked pa pra la ro smad zlum// rkang pa'i sor mo nang du spong // lus kyang legs la che chung snyoms// chems kyang dmar la thags kyang dam// sor mo rnams kyang phra pa ring // dri yang tsan dan dri ru pro/ yan lag lcag ma bzhin
79a6(rnying rgyud): du mnyen// pad+ma ser la phra la ring // spyan yang phra la zur du gzigs// sha mdog gnag la sme ba gnag/ sha yang gnag la rtsub pa ste// skad gdengs mi snyan gnyid ra ro// rmongs la mi shes sub sub mo// nu rdog tshe la nu bshal cing // rkang le spom la sor
79a7(rnying rgyud): mo thung // gdong yang leb la skye ba mthug/ smin ma thung la mig mi sdug/ lus po sbom rdung mjid pa thung // pad+ma gnag la yangs pa ste// ba pang can gyi rigs zhes pa'o// gzangs ma mtshan dang ldan pa 'tshal ba'i don ni/ rang dbang tho' pa na lo yang // bac+doMs pa
79b1(rnying rgyud): btub la lung nyan pa// rkad gas pa lta bas thag chod pa// spyod pa la dor rtog pa choms// yid gzhungs blo rno dbang po gas pa// sems dag gzhung bzang zhal do rtag/ dam tshig thog las mi 'dang ba// tshig la brdzun gyi gron thab med/ dad pa sgo dang dub pa med// blo
79b2(rnying rgyud): pablang zhing dor ba med// brtson 'grus thang dang lhod pa med// ngo tsha shes dang khrel yod pa// gam pa dal la skrod pa gzob// mig 'bru tshugs su mi lta zhing // 'og dang zur gyis rtogs par lta// dbu lo 'jam laM lcang por 'khyil// sun bkra prA pa dkyus ring ba/
79b3(rnying rgyud): gzur zor la rgyud ma chad// ya yo nyag dang chad pa med// so dkar sum cu thags bzangs la// kos ko sogs bu yul gzungs 'dra// mdog sdug dkar dmar mdangs phyed pa// rked phan chag gang zlum pa dang // mgul pa zlus la phra la ring // dang mo bya yi
79b4(rnying rgyud): tshul dang 'dra// sna zlum blta mdzes chung ba dang // phyag gi sor mo phra lA ring // rna ba gro ba gzus pa 'dra// lce ni dang bslab khug pa bzhin/ dbugs chu phyi nang med pa 'dre// gnyid chung sha yang sdud pa med// kha snabs med pa dri zhim pa// sna tshogs spos dri lus
79b5(rnying rgyud): bro// bskyod par mkhas shing pas la dpa'// sbyor drod rig dang ting 'dzin rig/ pad+ma dam la spyad na dog/ nu ma dag ni chung la sra/ kha ma chu srab pa bzang ba'o// lha yi sbyor ba tsog pu// mi'i gan rgal/ yi dgas zur gyis sbyor/ byal song kha sbub tu myong
79b6(rnying rgyud): ro// gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa rnams la zhag zla'i tshad bzung ste/ dam du bcas nas mchod dus ma tshig par gyi nang mi bsre/ dam bcas pa la ma gtogs pa gzhan dang sbyar bar mi bya'o// gzhan du sbyor ba byas na dam las 'das te/ mngal g+hi srin
79b7(rnying rgyud): bu kha dmar du skye'o// dam las ma 'das bka' bzhin du bsrungs na// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sras su skye'o// gzungs ma 'di dag dang bka' mthun par bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med do// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje
80a1(rnying rgyud): sems dpas gsungs so// he ru ka rol pa las gsang ba'i lha mo mchod pa'i sbyor ba'i lce'u ste gsum pa sa// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dang sA ru lu'i bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// thug /
80a2(rnying rgyud): nas nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // ru lu chos nyid du shes pa ni oM la dpral chen po yab lnga lnga yum khrag 'thung rgyal mo lnga yang spu la rdzogs so// de nyid lta bas srin por song gis dogs nas ye shesaM lngar bstan to// a ltar snang
80a3(rnying rgyud): bachos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes/ zlachos me long lce bu'i ye shes/ swa dzu ma sor rtog pa'i ye shes/ ma mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/ a pa btags par bya ba nad tan gyi ye shes/ yab yum rnams cad de bzhin du sbyar/ chos thams cad mthu ma skyes
80a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dang pa skye ba'i tshe 'phrul bstan no// ru lu dkyil 'khor du shes pa ni phung po lnga rigs lnga 'byung ba lnga yum lnga khams dang skye mched byang chub sems dbang dang sems ma dang srub pa lngam hA la// phung po wa he ru ka swA/ 'byung ba ta khrag 'thung rgyal mo lnga/
80a5(rnying rgyud): khams dang ste mched phra man ma bcu drug/ skab tshigs dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad// ba su nyag ma re re sprul pa'i tha men ma dang phyoH/ yan lag zho ba bzhi/ sprul pa thugs kyi rkun te// sngags ma hA yo ga'o// dkyil 'khor la yang rtogs dang grul ma nor pa
80a6(rnying rgyud): dgod do// sbyong yan chad rim bden du dag / drupA war shes pa ni 'acom ldan 'das dpas su du babyed po byung chub semam kya ni rtags na sangs rgyas yin par shes par bya'o// dri mchad par shes pa rgya lan dus byang chub sems kyi don rtogasan/
80a7(rnying rgyud): bdan kyang rdzun gyi sems mtshad pas de pags pa'i tshogs sa nyes pa ste// bzung sa she rjes par 'gyur ro// rim pos dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// dra mu brten par shes pa ni bsnyen pa da pa pa chen po'i spu// nye ba'i skyid pa'i yul hU~M d+hA // sku
80b1(rnying rgyud): bAn phra men ma brgya drug/ sgrub pa chen po ni 'di ltar bsgrubs pas 'bras brgyad rnam pa gsum dang sbyar ro// 'od kyi drod na bdag srub pa zad pa'i dus su bdag gi sra sa la dzod 'byung ba ni drod dang po dang sbyar ro// 'don pa'i drod ni bdag sgrub par byed pa'i dus su
80b2(rnying rgyud): bdag gi lus bal 'dab g.yengs pa ltar byed na drod 'bring po dang sbyar ro// drod kyi drod ni bdag gi sems tag tag rang rang nam mkhar 'phur snyam byed na tha ma dag sbyar ro// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ don dmi par bsnyen pa ni byang chub
80b3(rnying rgyud): kyi sems kun du bzang po'i nye ba'i bsnyen pa ni byang chub kyi sems kun du bzang mo'o// de la gnyis su med pa ni grub pa/ chu byang chub kyi sems skye ba med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos la 'bras bu kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems phyag rgya sna tshogs cir snang yang skya
80b4(rnying rgyud): ma ye shes kyi phyag rgya tsam du snang / snang tsam nyid na rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka ste/ chu 'bras ro gcig pa'i byang chub kyi sems shes par bya ste/ thig le chen po'i ngang du ye nas ma bcos par lhun gyis dub par gnas pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes
80b5(rnying rgyud): bya ste/ sgrub pa chen po'o// ru lu sgrar shes pa ni byi khur na bur ba chen po'i skad tsam rang gi rna bas thos pa las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyis tshor bar mi bya'o// ru lu dbyangs su shes pa na// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dren stangs kyis// rgyal ba rgya mtsho
80b6(rnying rgyud): thugs dam bsgral// rdorje srin po ngur sgra yis// khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// 'khun cing gdung ba'i sgra dbyangs kyis// ma dang mkha' 'gro thugs dam bak+kul// khong kun 'dren pa'i gdub byangs kyis// ke'u ri brgyad kyi thugs dam bskul// mkhur pa
80b7(rnying rgyud): dbugs kyi rlung 'byin gyis// seng gdong la sogs thugs dam bskul// sngags kyi yig 'bru bzlas pa yis// rdo rje tshig la skang mdangs med// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi bzlas pa 'di gsungs so// dam tshig ye shes dpal 'bar ma// oM na hA
81a1(rnying rgyud): dug d+hA sa/ na / sa/ gas/ pa shA// ngas su rnanams ma// nga nga lda // /

81a3(rnying rgyud): la lab / gas sa smra pa/ ma rnams can gtsun pam rjes/ khyong gsupa kyang gangs tud/ mi sgru pa sa / ga ga shi nan// gang ga sprul phebs pa rnag
81a4(rnying rgyud): dI yang dpal chen nyid kyi gsung // skyong gsum spyong gi 'jig rten // thugs kyi sprul pa bas ma mi khwar// de yang dang pa chen nyid kyi grags// ting gsum skyong gi lagarten na// shAr phyogs ga dag tun // dran dang ba dru kang byin pa dmas nas/ 8 ha rmu
81a5(rnying rgyud): dngos su ba dus 'dir spong // slong gsum spong gi 'jig tan na/ phyogs kyang gi 'jig rten ma// kun grang ke rung byin brtangs nA// radz+nyA ni rug ma dze sa gra di stso la// skyong gsum stong gi 'jig rtenan/ baphyogs nga shing dag tan// danang pa
81a6(rnying rgyud): sa rgya pa sub gyu dang sbyor pa ga sa kun pa rdzas naka/ lI sa rdzu 'dzis 'dir sa// gsum gi gtan sa gan 'i ga na
81a7(rnying rgyud): dur khrod chen po gnas kyi mchog/ bad ba chen po gsas kyimachog sa kyis pa'i myongs gnas kyi mchog dbangasu na su bya/ nga gangs spong gi 'jig rten na rgyas rnabs pa byu/ bying dpa ga tha
81b1(rnying rgyud): ga/ nam thams tsam chog/ da yang dba' rgyan nyid kyi zas/ nga gsum kyang gang ga tan // smram rabaskam na bsam mkhyag/ ra chusas kyis chab// yang dbapa can nyid kyags// spang bsam stong gi 'jig rten na// sogs rab rdzogs ni bsam hA/

81b3(rnying rgyud): bsas mi dza // gan du bad mo phram gyi mchog/ ded yang dbapa chen nyid kyi yus// mi ru lu 'din su yaM pra// du Ta 'di ni sru la gdang // ru lu 'din su ya thugs// rdul 'di ni gsung gi sra// rbas 'di ni gsung gi gsang // draT 'didon gang ga zugs// rdula?
81b4(rnying rgyud): 'di ni thugs kyi sa// ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi gsung // rulu 'di ni thugs kyi thugs// sngar gsal gsung gas la thugs kyang gsal// su don gsung don thugs kyi don// ru lur ma gyur gang yang med// stong khams thams cad rtsa lus bkang // cha wa ngos
81b5(rnying rgyud): grub dus 'dir gso pa// ru lu dngos su snang bang+gA / de nyid ma thus pa ni gastad/ ba 'dam pad+d+ha bA gnyis sa med pa ni lpags s+ho// d+ha wuswA bAsum gsad gsum/ thugs gsum/ dgu phyugs kyi dan+na to// oM ru wa rba sud+d+ha d+ha NAM/ oM ni dpal cher
81b6(rnying rgyud): ste smra pa spyod sa
82a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ han tan/ ThaHthAH/ dU thAsaH3/ datad na/ baHbaH/ rbabag tha ma ya sa la/ hA smra ba nas / matamak+Sha/ pa rma/ dz+radza dra/ da nas bcom ldan 'das khra ba can pa pad+ma 'byur gnas nas
82a2(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje thugs ka nas phyung ngo // pad+ma dza la ma hA kro d+hi pad+ma ba mu ka kha kha/ sarba duSh+TAM/ kha hi kha hi/ sarba dusta ba/ du sta na ma/ da ma dam/ badz+ra sho da ka/ ta ma tha ma tha/ kro d+ha kro d+ha/
82a3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra Sha ra tsa/ pa la du ru/ ga be ga tra sa ya tra sa ya ma hA badz+ra pa da ba mu ka/ p+ta mA pya ma hUM phaT/ ti ha ha hi ha ti/ tsa tu ra mu la/ bi phran sha na hU~M hri/ nA hrIM hAM hri// rdo rje chen po 'jigs byed ces bya bang khro bo chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes kyi snying
82a4(rnying rgyud): ga nas phyung ngo // oM badz+ra be ga ma hA kro d+ha sarba duSh+TAM/ sa ma ya bak+Sha ya/ hUM hUM hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ badz+ra sak+Sha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen po mngon par sprul nas mche ba chen po ngakhyil cing zhal mi sdug pa/ spyan stong pa/ nyi ma chen po stong gi
82a5(rnying rgyud): gzi brjid can rab tu za bar byed pa'i mdog sngon po'i sku// dur khrod chen po'i dpal chen gyi phyag cha mi'i keng nus khrag dang sha dang phud pa dang rkang dang tshil rnams zas su gsol ba/ mi'i pags pa rnams g.yogs te bsdams pa/ mi mgo'i phreng ba dgra la 'dzin
82a6(rnying rgyud): pa/ seng ge dang / glang po dang / bong bu dang / nga mo dang / ma he dang / phag dang / ce sbrang dang / ra dang / khyi dang / drug pa dang / bya reg dang / bzhad dang / bya ba dang / gzig dang / stag la sogs pa khro bo'i byol song gi gdong la sogs pa brgya stong mang po
82a7(rnying rgyud): rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas phyung ste// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis shar phyogs 'jigs byed 'dul ba/ zhal rnam par bsten pa/ 'jigs pa lta bu'i spyan dang // zhal rdo ngas che ba char gtsigs pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo chen po brkyad stong gi g.yog dang /
82b1(rnying rgyud): shar phyogs dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so// lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du khri gnyer can mang ba brgya stong g.yag dang bcas par gnas so// rub phyogs su yang rtag dang zla ba chen po brgya stong mang po g.yag dang bcas te gnas so// bung du yang dzang
82b2(rnying rgyud): ngur chen po khro bo brgyad stong mang po g.yog dang bcas te gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shin tu khro bo chen po'i tshogs brgya stong mang pos bskor nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs te/ he ru ka'i khro bori tshogs chen po de dag dang / khro bo chen po bcu stong mang po'i
82b3(rnying rgyud): rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa bskyed byung nas nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'bum thams cad snang bar byas te/ stong gsum yi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad gang bar bus so// shin tu dgyes pa'i khro bo chen pos khro bo'i tshigs rnams la bka'i stsal
82b4(rnying rgyud): pa// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ tad+ya ShAM/ oM d+ho b+ho/ ma hA ba re ba da ra ba/ ma hA rti/ ha ra ha ra/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ma ra ma ra/ d+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ TI kra na ma hA padz+ra tsaN+Da tA/ sarba budz+dza du ka?/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/
82b5(rnying rgyud): pa tsa paH/ ma tha ma tha hUM phaT/ 'di gsungs ma thug tu/ 'jigs byed chen po dngul bar byed pa/ rang gi sgra nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshul du byed do// khro ba ban+d+ha stong mang po zhal rnam par bsgyur ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ 'khyil cing bskur ba rtsag
82b6(rnying rgyud): po la mtshon cha sna tshogs bsdams pa/ zhal bcwa stong mang po me lde bzhin du 'bar ba'i sku/ oM ma hA badz+ra a / ha sa hA sa/ ha ha ha dz+nyA hA/ oM taM oM ma hA/ bai ra ba be/ shing shing / dzaTadza waM/ ha ha i ti/ dwe nas 'jigs sder chen po'i dul bar b+ha da~M dr-i
82b7(rnying rgyud): bongs he ru ka dzing ro 'byin cing mgo bo nas mnan to// rdo rje he ru ka'i rol pa'i bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs byed chen po'i nga ro 'byin cing rgyu ma'i sbu gu drangs nas khrag dang rus pa dang rkang rnams za zhing chem tsham mdzad pas/ de'i 'khor la
83a1(rnying rgyud): rab tu ston par mdzad/ ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgren mor byas te spa phab nas he ru ka'i tshogs chen po'i mthu dang gzi byin bskyed nas/ 'khor thams cad thul skyabs 'og tu yang btsud nas dam tshig la gnas te yang dag par bzhugs so// de nas
83a2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das khro bo drug po'i bzha pus bzhad ci / oM baHb+h+r-i kranr-i ha na hA na/ gr-ih+Na praH/ ma ta ma ta/ kai naH ri yAM/ s+ye swar ma hA sa/ s+yA t+ti rik+She ba su dza lan la ri tshaM br-id+d+hi dza li tA/ ma swa ra tAM/ Aka ta Ta ASh+yata Ta/ a d+ya wa/ a h+ya wa/ praH
83a3(rnying rgyud): rabarti da ya na hU~M thi/ de nas khrag 'thung gi sngags// oM badz+ra sUr+ya b+h+r-i ku Ti/ khro da ma hA kr-i te/ da ra ba da ra ba/ su ra du ra ti/ oM sa me dang ma ni tsa na/ oM pra pra bi br-i ba// de nas rta gdong gi khro bo chen po'i sngags/ ba h+ye/ oM ma hA badz+ra ba da/ ba mu ga/ kha kha/ khA hi khAH
83a4(rnying rgyud): tsa dur+yA mu khang / ba ba bi ba/ a dra ti ra ma/ ma kAr+ya hr-i da ya na/ dra na/ da mA de'u/ badz+ra ba daM ba mya ka/ hi hI/ sha hi shA ma hA she sha hi hi/ de nas rdo rje chen po'i rta gad chen po mdzad cing bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen pos khros pa dang brngas pa'i lta bas gzig
83a5(rnying rgyud): te/ oM gu lu gu lu badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha A ka ra Sha ya/ A kar Sha ya/ sha kr-i hr-i da yA na ma hA badz+ra daMSh+NA ya/ hU~M b+hak+Sha ya shr-i/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po rnal 'byor pa rnams dang rol cing / rang gi shin tu dgyes pa'i kun du longs spyod pa'i khro bo chen po'i dkyil
83a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du ba mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das lnga bsgral ba mdzad do// oM ma hA skA ra ta/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha pa saM ha ra pA saM ha ra/ sarba kro d+ha ma sha ma sha ma/ pra sha ma pra sha ma/ san
83a7(rnying rgyud): hU~M d+ha bas ma pa/ mi hA sa dul stem la/ sa du gyu shA bra rnam pa pa y-i dz+wa la la ga pa ba zhir ma la/ shir mahA/ b+hag ba/ s+pharahA/ sarba ta thAg rjes na/ sa ma yin / srur sa sa ste/ dri nas bcom
83b1(rnying rgyud): nga gsang dang ga su rdugs byung // ba/ 4ts+tsha dz+dza/ d+ha dz+nyAnanA~M/ stag ta sha d+d+haH/ sprug pa / prA be+e shA ya Sh+TAm+b+ha// ba shi ban/ san d+has ma ya na mags / lpA nas cos ldan 'das kyi thub cad
83b2(rnying rgyud): ngo // oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha ma ny+dza kro d+hI shwa ri hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi'i khro bo'i dbang mo 'di phyung ngo // oM badz+ra a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri/ uts+tsha badz+ra a mr-i ta hU~M AH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma bdud rtsi chen mo 'di kun du khros te/ ru lu ru lu zhes bya ba 'byin cing rang gi pagro la
83b3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje bcug nas bdud rtsi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rig pa phyung ngo // oM a mr-i ta sa man tsa pa ne a mr-i ta su myA te/ pra be sha ya sanA na badz+ra/ pad+ma ma sa/ yo gi ni ra/ ma hA bo d+hi tsi/ bi ta bi ti mur+t+ti ya/ rdo rje khro bo'i dbang mo zhes bya ba nyid kyi
83b4(rnying rgyud): skra dang gsung dang zhugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma he shwa ri sarba duSh+TAM/ su ta ni ma hA pA la yAn/ sma shwA na ba sha tsi/ ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha daMSh+Ti k+Sha ra le bi kr-i ta/ dwe ba na/ sarba sha du pra ma Na~M hU~M hU~M ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri hUM phaT/ khro bo 'di rnams phyag na mtshon
83b5(rnying rgyud): tshetsha sna tshogs bsdams pa/ zhal gsum pa/ mdog id+d+hi nI la'i 'od 'dra ba/ rdo rje dang / tho ba gcig khang pa dang / thod pa dang / mdung dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / rtse gsum dang / be con dang / mu su dang / 'khor lo dang / ka na ya dang / to ma dang
83b6(rnying rgyud): mda' dang / g+ha zhu dang / shak+ti dang / gri rnams phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba mgul can du byas nas nyi ma brgya'i me'i 'od 'dra ba'o// de'i dbus mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung chen mo de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang cha lugs 'dzin pa rig pa 'dis gzhag
83b7(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// oM badz+ra ma hA d+ha ra/ ma hA kro d+hI shwa raM ma hA swa shAni/ ki she ni la dz+wa la ya/ ma hA sa dr-i pra dz+wa la te/ mu ti dar/ ka pA la mA la/ pre shing / ma ku te/ ma re ru d+hi/ ra dra ra ba/ tsi pra ri ta/ ka yA la ha ste/ khan+thang+ga badz+ra/ tri shU la gar+b+ha/ many+dzakr-iH
84a1(rnying rgyud): a/ hU~Mn+tuH/ hi ha rba ta mA ta ma ye sbrelaT/ nganas pacom ldan 'das zla brtan pa gaT brjid myurgyag dang ldan pa ltas zla ba'i ti dang 'dren la rnams par zhugs sa// dzaH nye ma nyid rdzo ba nyid pa b+ha dang gsung dang thugs rna
84a2(rnying rgyud): las byung ngo // oM hUM AHsu rba badz+ra kr-i d+hI sha ri/ da ma da ma/ gra sa gras e sta ma hU~M phaT/ oM br-i dra drang / khro mo chen mo 'di lho phyogs su gzhag par bya ste/ gzi 'arjid chen mo rang gtong zhing // shin tu 'jigs pa ma bzhin 'bar// dpung pa bcu rdzun
84a3(rnying rgyud): rdo ba che// dpung bran zid pa'irtsegs pa byas// skyen ni rab dmar sngo ba langs mdog/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa rnams par brtson// gdug pa thams cad mapyad cing // yaM dag sgra chen po stug la zhon// rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das
84a4(rnying rgyud): pad+mo'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khro mo 'di nyid kyi su dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phung ngo // oM hrIHbadz+ra pad+ma ba mu ke/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ ma hA ma he dir/ bi go biny+dza/
84a5(rnying rgyud): byugs pa'i ban bdapar la sa sa sa pa g+sa/ dang 'bu ba / zhag dang can du spyo pan/ b+hab ci dpa da du nga/ rnam pa rgyang
84a6(rnying rgyud): gai // mi g+ho san la yang dgrazhon// khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa// mtshon tshwas tshogs 'dzin pa ste// rtsosam pa'i drabu rgyan pod pa brtsams// 'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing // g.yog baHsa dkyil 'khor thun du bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan nas
84a7(rnying rgyud): gdon mi za ba rdo rje khro bo gnyis su mang pa'i 'dul ba'i thabs zhes bya ba 'i nying nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khros pa'i dbang mo chen mdzad nyid kyi sgo dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las thung ngo // oMs rba a mo g+hi me hA d+hi shre shwa hrIM& ha~M haM haM ma
84b1(rnying rgyud): kr-i ti kra ma khe/ ma hA be shwa ru pa d+hA ri Ne sarba duSh+Ta pra sha ma ni/ hUMhAM hUM phaT/ 'di nyid kyis ni ci rigs par// rdo rje gang nam za dkyil du// g.yog dang bcas pa rnam pa bzhi// sna chags dam tshig gzhag bya ste// sna chags pa dang khyad par ldan// kun du yangs su/
84b2(rnying rgyud): bskor nas gnas// bskyed pa dang ni bcum pa'i gdong // rab tu dreg pa'i ro byang zhing // gdong gnyer thod pas rtse mo byas// dpung pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i// khro mo chen mo gdong gsum la// za byed me bzhin lci ba yi// de yi ri bo thams cad kyi// g.yog ni
84b3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa bzhi rnams kyang // rang gi phyag dang mtshan mar ldan// gzung ba brgyad dang ldan pa'i// de ni cho ga ci bzhin du// 'byung mo phyag rgya yang dag zhod// dur khrod bzhin du 'jigs byed pa// byi yi rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams// de dag kun du yongs su bskor//
84b4(rnying rgyud): bzhag gam dri bar bya yang rung // da ni de yi stan la gnas// bzhin mi skrag la dpung bzhi po// gdug pa'i khro lho rnam bkur bcas/ de la sogs pa rim par ldan// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i sngags
84b5(rnying rgyud): rnams nyid kyi wa dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba badz+ra tA rA a nu d+hA gi nI ma hA ti sha \u0f7f hUM phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra A kaR+sha Ni/ ma hA gro h+Na shA re hUM dzaHraHdzaHhUM hUM d+haM/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra ku la ma nu hA gi ni ma hA badz+ra kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M ha he laT hoH// oM sarba ba
84b6(rnying rgyud): do pram hA kr-id+b+haHsmA swA hU~M laT/ oM sarba d+hA ra mi hrI ha tsas be sha/ hUMSh+Ti/ oMs r+b+hu mas+thA sa~M ta mri ti ka rok+ShA d+d+ha/ oMs rbab na ta ma hA badz+dza hrA d+haka di shwA da~M/ s+'u d+ha gan+d+ha la ci ba ma/ hU~M da~M dza~M nr-i Sh+Ta/ oMs dz+ra d+d+ha sa
84b7(rnying rgyud): d+ha ya na gas ni/ hUM dwe traT ya rbo Ta ya hU~M phaT/ oMs rba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA ba dz+re kra d+ha rmArmANi hU~M trAM/ d+hUSh+Tha yab+hUk+Sha ya hU~M Sh+T+r-iH/ oM sarba badz+ra mahA/ ba d+d+ha dzata19/ da mi da y-i/ tra~M hA ma tha ma tha/ oM sarba
85a1(rnying rgyud): ra mdzab d+hAm tu ni rnam d+ha mdzu ba/ hU~M r+dz+dza tul bA ta ya/ mahA badz+ra k+Sha Ak+ShatArmAHd+has/ as ba tur mA ng+ku kA shA sa trA~MT+Ta/ pa tA.Ata/ As dzum thad ram ba ga sun tu rnas pan snyos par dub ldan pas ya /
85a2(rnying rgyud): \u0f7ftrA~M wA thA lA/ oM sa 'arje ster ma tha badz+ral/ khA Sha/ (ha~M/ oM ba~MT/ dz+dza/ oM sa~M ba ban d+ha ra ma hA \u0f7f pa nang ni b+h+ya na ts+tsha ya~M n+d+ha ya/ baN+Da ya hUM phaT/ A~Ms na badz+rad+ha rAd+ha / hU~M kr-idz+dza shwar ts+tsha wa/ oMs mdun
85a3(rnying rgyud): sA la ni/ tr-I r+the/ m+lair+the// AM sad+ya bad+hA d+hA ra ma d+h+ya badz+ra kro thAgad+ha gras ni/ d+hAkyAk+Sha/ oM sarbA badz+ranari ma \u0f7f/ gor+t+ti sh+tsa maHma hAH/ kAl d+ha / ti pa la/ hod ta daM/ i sa rbab d+ha ma hA kr-id+hA shwa raM mA hAM \u0f7f saM ts+li/ oM sarba bed+ha d+ha ra maM/ kr-id+b+ha shA ngaM gA po d+ha /
85a4(rnying rgyud): oM sarba badz+rId+hadA ma hA kr-i d+h+r-i ga h+Na dr-i tI hU~M hi haM/ oM sarba badz+rA d+ha ra ma hA gr-id+d+hi shA rI ni te ka hAM/ oM sarba badz+ra nA ram Shapo ta ma hA kar shi na/ dzaHdzaHhU~M trAM dzaH/ oM sarba badz+rA d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha d+ha ra ma hA badr-i gI sha hU~M trA~M hU~M/ oM sarba tu tha ga ha ma hA badz+ra kr-i d+hi/ pad+me ban+de/ @
85a5(rnying rgyud): bar+d+ha ya hUM baM/ oM starba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+hi ra ma hA kro rje ba she/ d+hI hUM hU~M ho ha~M ha~M/ oM hUM dza~M hri tA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ba thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje pheM sa~M phyung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra/ oM badz+ra
85a6(rnying rgyud): \u0f7ftrA~M Ta/ A~M badz+ra g+h+r-id+ha nu ts+tsha/ mahA ha ma pA ti ba ts+tshaH/ oM bar+d+ha d+hA ts+tshin r+b+he swAH/ oM bdu na nini d+ha shwa kA rA k+Sha s+t+wa~M la/ oM ba d+hA 'on btub su / bidz+ra ba~MH/ sum b+hA rnaM sa ma haM b+h+yan/ oM sar+b+ba dzang+ka ni ma d+hA aid+har-i'i dzA phaT/ a
85a7(rnying rgyud): ba hrI kra N+Da/ na rje tshon d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM bdun gron/ mahA ma thod pa ti ka hU~M phaT/ oM 'argya rten / ba dzin tidz+nyA pan/ oM badzi shin ma tha ma / com an+da ta ka
85b1(rnying rgyud): a badz+ra dz+nyA ni ni/ ma hA sarbagratrU~M shwa ra hU~M phaT/ a pad+mA TAk+ki ni mr-i tsa daN+Da ri hU~M phaT/ oM badz+raTAk+ki ni badz+ra srag la hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ran rgan pa ba pi badz+ra d+ha ra ma mA hA badz+ra pa laM hU~M phaT/ oM bad+d+hA na gi ni ma hA badz+ra bA shra ba pa sha k+Sha hU~M phaT/ a bcu kun nam hA b+ha shan pa ban+d+ha
85b2(rnying rgyud): phaT/ oM badz+ra TAk+ki ni/ ma hA badz+ra bi shaM hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra TAk+ki nI A nA ya A nA ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra TA k+ki ni/ ma hA badz+ra bak+Sha ni gu ku ma ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra TAk+ki ne badz+ra dz+wa la ya/ b+hasmi gu ru hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ga~M na ma hA badz+ra mi ke ta hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra DA rka ni ma hA
85b3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra ha ste hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki ni ma hA badz+ra kI lidrA be sha pra re sha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta k+ki ni ma hA su ma~M swa sha ni hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra nA gi ni ma hA ka ra hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra DAk+ki ni ma hA ka ra sha ni mi ta ka la mu ki hUM dzaHdzaHhUM phaT/ oM badz+ra TA k+ki ni ya bi sha ni hU~M phaT/ khro ba
85b4(rnying rgyud): sI'i bsnyen pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM pa hUM bi pi ta ro/ dra san ti ta/ yi ni sha she/ sarba ba d+hA nA ya/ sarba te thA ga ta dza l-i dza le/ pra dza le pra dza le/ gur bi kur bi/ k+Sha ma sarba ma ba prAH/ b+h+yo hUM haM/ oM ru lu ru luSh+Ti b+ho dz+dza/ bsnyen pa'i grangs brgya dang sru
85b5(rnying rgyud): dang 'bum mo// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las gsang ba'i khro bo'i bsnyen pa'i li'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru k+Sha rol pa rdo rje khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi
85b6(rnying rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // khro bo rdo rje mgyogs pa'i dbu lha bcu rtsa gcig/ phyag brgya rtsa gnyis pa phyang ste/ oM badz+ra D+hak+ki ni ma hA ban te/ baM paM phaT/ oM badz+ra D+ha gi ni ma hA do sha na sa ye hUM phaT/ a a/ oM jam pa
85b7(rnying rgyud): sam sarba ti/ ra ma ti de br-i ya/ ma hAM gra ma ba kArban/ hUM hU~M hAM hUM/ k+Sha oM bidz+ra sa h+ma rA/ a gar+b+ha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ sapra badz+ra ga la/ ba shi na b+han du/ nIdz+dza hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha b+hin d+ha ya b+han d+ha yaM/ bai sha ya/ bi sha ya/
86a1(rnying rgyud): sa / rgyu / dan na ga na na marnams pa ga tu da u ga
86a2(rnying rgyud): sa sas sas sa ya
86a3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra la rnga paT padz+ra pa Tas tha mardza ba dza Ti/ baT paT phan padu pa pa pa Tab waM/ brda pa la sa / bkren pa de rma ya la e/ khrab 'jam du gcig tu byung ste/ d+hi da bang bas mang 'dzin cing
86a4(rnying rgyud): gyi khams rdzas gcig tu gang bar d+har te/ rdzogs pa thams cad brtsal bar gyur te// de nas bcom ldan 'das bye ga rob pa ma dang / mkhang 'bras rnams kyi nying ra 'dzin du zhugs te/ ma dang 'khu' 'pho sa 'bram chos kyi dbyings nas pa des te/ nyid kyi
86a5(rnying rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo las byung ngo // ma mo 'bum gyi rgyal mo dbyings dam bzhengs// khyod ni ye shes la ma 'bul gyi gtse// zhing lpags rlon pas sa gni 'gengs mdzad ma// zhing rjemargod pa g.yung gzhi ral bcur// gzig sa mas rnon pa skong gis lnga spang bad+ha
86a6(rnying rgyud): sbrub dga'ajam gyis yan kun na pa sgrib// bod rten mo gag mthod tshal mar chu drang thanas rang kha// tshad cing bdu gshog g.yas pa las// ye shes sten chags ni 'argya ya ra/ khyod rje ra ga shig g.yon pa pa// lab byud
86a7(rnying rgyud): gnas/ tan na nas bcug sa ba// pa sa kyis byas bcug du rgya pa sa
86b1(rnying rgyud): draganyar zhing dgra snying chal bar 'gas// bskur chen dud pas 'dzag rten ma lus 'gangs// sha zan la rngam zhing dpal chen zhal du stobs// rang yang bzhing grogs la bdar bar byed// ma dang mkha' 'gro dbyings nas bsrub bstod la// bas pa khra
86b2(rnying rgyud): zhing chos kyi dbyings su bsnyen// mkha' 'gro za byed ma tshogs la gshog pa can// mkha' 'gro 'jug byed yid 'phrog na ma can// mkhang 'gro dam pa'i zhal gdangs mche ba can// mkha' 'gro 'byung ba 'dzin por sder po can// mkhong dkr-i khams gsum
86b3(rnying rgyud): rngub pa'i mchu rings ma// mkha' 'gro drug gsum za byed 'bar ba'i sku// phas kyi mkha' la 'gro 'di shugs can ma// don gis mkha' la 'gro ba'i ye shes phul// de nas mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dpal chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi las byed par gyur to// da nas
86b4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol pa ma dang mkha' 'gro ma de rnams dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba rtse gcig ma'i ting nge 'dzin du mdzad do// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum la skyes pa'i bdud bag chags kyis mtshams sbyar te/ bdud ru tra nag po sems
86b5(rnying rgyud): can dang rnal 'byor pa la 'tshe zhing gnod par byed pa za bar byed pa de la bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol pas pho ta'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // til mar sna tshogs kyis lus bskus pa'i rdo rje mche ba
86b6(rnying rgyud): can dang / nag mo mi thod thogs pa'i rdo rje phreng ba can dang / rnal 'byor ye shes rdo rje dam tshig ma dang / mgo bo cod pan legs sbas rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang / lag na mtshon thogs pa'i rdo rje phreng ma dang / dgra bgegs dbang du sdang po'i rdo rje gsul lko
86b7(rnying rgyud): ma dang / sbrul gyi ska rags 'ching zhing lag na mdung thung ral gri thogs ma dang / zhing lpags rked par dkris shing khrag gis mos ma dang / mig rtsa dmar por gyur pa'i dang 'khrug ma dang / mtshan mo dur khang du u pa'i 'byung mo sgrol ma dang / ko dran
87a1(rnying rgyud): na sa pa dpas khar dgas ma dang/ sa zangs rgya chu na d+hA gas ma dan na pa dang zug samahA na dan
87a2(rnying rgyud): sha la che mche ma zang 'i rnga rje mche ba 'dzin ma dang / drag po 'dul ba'i rdo rje drag ma chen mo dang / ma mo sbag par byed pa'i khams gsum dbang du sdud ma dang / zhing la rkam par byed pa'i rdo rje kha T+wA~M ga dang / nag mo lus mdog gnag pa'i rdo rje ma skrag
87a3(rnying rgyud): pa mo dang / zas su khAg tshol za ba'i rdo rje srin mo dang / kun la dpang mdzan rdo rje pad+ma yin pa dang / zas su sha N+Don zab 'o rdo rje rnga mo dang / e ma ma tshogs rdo rje za byed ma dang / dpal ldan chen po rdo rje lcang lo can ma dang / kha nas rdo rje me 'bar rgya mtsho skams
87a4(rnying rgyud): dang / lag na bdud rtsi rdo rje 'dzin ma dang / nag mo mig gcig rdo rje lugs kyi 'dzin ma dang / sbrul te zhags pa thogs pa'i rdo rje gshog pa can dang / ljags kyi bya khwa khyung gi gsu mug can dang / thal ba'i mtshan mas rdo rje 'byug ma dang / rnga rjer
87a5(rnying rgyud): cig chen mo tha byed ma dang / rdo rje tri shul thogs pa'i zhag gi tshom bu can dang / tsha mang ma drag shul spyod pa'i do rje sgrol ma dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rdo rje bdud 'dul mo dang / rnam par bsrings pa'i rdo rje gzugs can ma dang / cir yang 'gyu
87a6(rnying rgyud): 'phrul can dang / khro gnyer sran patha~M na la 'phyo ru sngo nag chen mo dang / mche ba gtsigs 'dzi ral pa dasil ma dang / thod pa rlon pa'i rdorje ldan tsa la drug dbu gsum gyag drug no rje mi lpags ga yang gzhi gsol ba dang / swa ra rbar du mang po brdzes nas @
87a7(rnying rgyud): te rdo rje brjid ma dang / tsham ngam pa cung bsum rdo rje 'jig rten srag ma dang / bdud pani gnon pa'i rdo rje b+han tar ldan pa dang / snyir gyi rna ste 'dren pa'i rdo rje khrag 'brang ma dang 'jigs su rung ba'i rngubs pa'i rje'u chung thogs pa'i na sa can pa ga par
87b1(rnying rgyud): ba rdoHbdud rnams 'dul ba dang / ra la rngam pa' rdza zab ma dang / gsad zang sbyong ba'i napa 'byor sngo nagam dang / khro gter stan bgrad rdardza ma cha gtsigs ma dang / tsham ngam chen mo mdzad pa'i tri shwa la mda' dben rdo rje 'gengs ma dang / dgyes par byed par na sa rba
87b2(rnying rgyud): rdebs ma dang / 'gugs par byed pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor dmar nag 'jigs pa'i sku dang / sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yum chen mo dang / rnal 'byor chen mo dur khrod bdag mo dang / tsham ngam gar mkhan chen mo rdo rnga stabs tshul can dang / rnal 'byor mthid nag rdo rje ltar
87b3(rnying rgyud): chen zab mo dang / bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i rdo rje gdug ba klad 'gems ma dang / gsod pa'i las la dgyes pa'i khro mo rdo rje ldang ma dang / khro gnyer 'jigs pa'i dbu gcig phyag drug ma dang / rdo rje tre shU la rnge'u 'dzin pa'i rdo rje stan sgra rdabs ma dang / 'ching zhang sdom/
87b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor ser nag dang / gtum mo zhe sdang stir chen za ba mo dang / zhing chen nang grol 'byin cing rdo rje tsham ngam can dang / sgrol bar byed pa'i rdo rje mthing nag dang / spyan bgrad mche gtsigs rdo rje chen mo dang / stir 'dren pa'i rdo rje khrag 'thung zhal du stobs ma dang /
87b5(rnying rgyud): sku gris 'debs pa'i rdo rje b+hanA d+har ldan ma dang / zangs gris 'debs shing kha T+wAM 'phen pa'i rdo rje sha zab mo dang / ro la brnam pa'i rdo rje za stangs chen po dang / dzA je ser nag seng ge mgo can dang / mche gzigs stan gsum 'jigs pa'i rdo rje sdang mig zan dang / pa
87b6(rnying rgyud): tshogs mang pos bskor ba'i rdo rje zhe sdang 'joms mA dang / mthing nag rdo rje seng ge rapA pa can dang / rdo rje ye shes sru'i cha lugs 'chang ma dang / mi 'jigs spyi ra'i g.yang gzhi gsol ma dang / srog chags mang po'i snying 'byin rdo rnga klad 'grems ma dang /
87b7(rnying rgyud): dmar mo chen mo ste ra mgo can dang / ye shes lnga'i rdo rje cha lugs 'chang ma dang / mi 'jigs bzhi'i g.yang gzhi se ral khar thogs ma dang / bkang pas mi 'dang thugs dam skong zhing las mdzad ma dang / b+han d+ha rak+tas bkang nas gcol stobs shing da
88a1(rnying rgyud): rdza wad 'gams ma dang / gas pyad su nug zur bu'i ma gcan dang / mam tshogs la bar nam/ ran pa 'ad chags 'angams pa dzu zab ma dang / thab can dkyus byang sbrul brtan sa dang / sbru wa mag gcad kun b+ha thung zhing g.yad la dag
88a2(rnying rgyud): ba mo dang / ro zhags pa 'ching shing khrag 'tha zhal du stobs pa dang / mthing dag 'ching skabs do sha na kyai mag can dang / oM snying bdun pa rdo rje lcags kyu 'jan ma dang / phrag dag 'a joms par byed pa'i rnga rnga za ba dang / dmar nag 'byung ba'i bya ma mgo s+ya
88a3(rnying rgyud): dang / can nu 'dren gti mug/ 'joms par zung ba dang / gsheg chags pang bas bko 'a zad rnon 'dzin ma dang / sar dag 'byung ba'i pha rig mag can dang / grwan mas 'bum par byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'chang ma dang / 'bang naka 'byung ba rgya
88a4(rnying rgyud): mgo can dang / ser nag gsod par byed pa'i mgo can dang / sha khrag za ba'i mkha' 'gro dbu gsum ma dang / lcags grus 'dun pa mi 'jigs spor ba dang rdo bka' bo nya ldan gsum mche ba can dang / rdo rje bran ma gtum pag can dang / 'jigs pa
88a5(rnying rgyud): gzugs can rdo rje khrag 'brang ma dang / snying rje phrag gi phag can dang / rdo rje sbrul gyi mgo can dang / ro rje gcig gi mag can dang / rdon byi ba'i mgo can dang / rdo pa bang mgo can dang / rdo phred kyi mag can dang / rdo rje dam gyi mgo can dang / rdosdig pa'i mgo
88a6(rnying rgyud): can dang / do Ta wa'i mgo can dang / rdo rje stag gi mgo can dang / rdo rje rta'i mgo can dang / rdo spyang ki'i mgo can dang / rdorje pu shud kyi mgo can dang / rdo dze sha ba'i mgo can dang / rdo rje sprin gyi mgo can dang / rnga phag gi mgo can dang / rdo rje rje po'i mgo can
88a7(rnying rgyud): dang / rdo rje bu rog mgo can dang / rdo rje spang ti'i mgo can dang / rdongs ka'i mgo can dang / rdor wa'i mgo can dang / rang lde mgo can dang / nga khwa phyag mag can dang / rdorje song shemag can dang / dathal par mgo can dang / da sha pa'i mas can
88b1(rnying rgyud): srin bya'i mgo can dang / rdornga sre mo mgo can dang / rdo rje zer mo mgo can dang / rdo rje dmag pazang gag gi mag can dang / rnga dza nya ma zhags pa can dang / rnga dzam g+ha glag phreng langan dang / dang sran ma mdung thung 'phan pa dang / rdo rje rapa pasgra 'byer ma dang / rdo rje Tu
88b2(rnying rgyud): thog 'babs mo dang / rdo 'jigs phreng ba lang gi sna dang / rdo rje gnod srin khud gdong ma dang / r-i nga lag na phrag thogs ma dang / rdo rje b+ha bska mda' ltar gtong ba dang / rdo rje dmachog bsrung ma dpal phreng ma dang / rdo rnga lag na phur bu 'dril ma dang / rdo rje rab bskal
88b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rngam stangs can dang / rdo rje dmar po spyan gsum shin tu mo sun ma dang / rdo rje cir yang 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul can chen mo dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgyogs ma dang / rdo rje spug nag gtibs pa'i me dpal can dang / rdo rje kang rus 'ja' ba'i tshe zas rnon ma dang
88b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje bzhad ma'i shin tu gad rgyangs chen mo dang / rdo rje na 'grol 'dren ma kang ka'i mgo can dang / rdo rje sgra 'byin 'brug sgrogs ma dang / rdo rje bdud rtsi rin chen char 'bebs ma dang / rdo rje shugs 'chang rdo rje sgrol ma dang / rdo rje dbang mo rdo rje sder mo'i tshogs dang
88b5(rnying rgyud): shan pa spu gri rnon po'i so can dang / rdo rje ko chas par byed pa dang / rdo rje sprin tshogs mang po sdud par byed pa dang / rdo rje'ur bur shig shig g.yo bar byed pa dang / rdo rje rkan sgra rdebs pa'i drag shul can chen mo dang / rdo rje za bar byed pa'i phaT phaT spogs ma dang /
88b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje brkyang bskum gshin rje gnon ma dang / rdo rje zhing chen khrag 'dzag thod rlon sgra la brgyan pa dang / rdo rje drag po'i nga 'byin pa'i gdong gsum ma dang / rdo rje yud tsam 'dul thogs bcur 'phro ma dang / rdo rje seng ge stabs su mchongs pa'i dkyil ban dang / rdospru
88b7(rnying rgyud): pa mang po 'gyed pa'i bya/ gro kyi sdigs can dang / rdo rje ster gnas myal bu khri khyo lcags can dang / rdo rje dam tshig gi tshogs rgyal ma bya khwa khyi snyigs can dang / rdo rje phyi nang mtshams myal ma b+ha khwa khyi skyigs can dang / dzong dam tshig gi rjes gcod ma b+ha khwa
89a1(rnying rgyud): stegs can dang / rnga rje dazung sbyor rgyal ma b+ha khwa khyi lcags can dang / dza rnga 'dong chags ma bu khA khi phyogs can dang / rdo rnga dur khrod za 'dul ba'i bya khwa khA skyugs can dang / rnga rnga dmar mo bklags pa dbang sdud ma dang / rdor sar mo sbrul gyi
89a2(rnying rgyud): rags can dang / rdo rje gnam sngags phur mo thog 'bebs ma dang / rdo rje brgyal byed dngas par byed ma dang / rdo rje bsdams pas srin mo brtul bar byed ma dang / rdo rje kha nas ma khrag rta khrag 'dzag ma dang / rdo rje dab stong phyag stong bdud kyi dpung rnams 'dul bar
89a3(rnying rgyud): byed ma dang / rdo rje 'bum phrag yangs pa'i mkha' 'gro chen mo dang / rdo rje ral pa spyi gtsug 'khyil ma dang / rdo rje swa yis rol pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bar ma dang / rdo rje gsung gi zhal pa phyogs bcur 'gyeng ma dang / dza na thugs kyi 'phrul mngadab chen mo da
89a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje thugs kyi sgra 'phrul dbang phyug mo dang / ngo rje rin chen sku'i dbang phyug ma dang / rdo rje pad+mo dbang phyug ma dang / rdo rje byings la spor zhing stan byed ma dang / rdo rje ma gyogs ma dbu dgra ma dang / rdo rje swa 'byin ma dang / rna chang ma dang / song ma dang /
89a5(rnying rgyud): byad kun la 'khyams dang / rdo rje dmar nag dbu gsum ma dang / rdo sngo nag ral pa can rkyen mo dang / rdo rnga ldang nag dbu 'am pa dang / lja stong bu drug pa dang / rdo ra ba lang gi mgo can ma dang / dza ser nag dbu bcwa la ma dang / rdo rjes gnas 'bru ba rtsa
89a6(rnying rgyud): dang / rdo rje ljang ser khro gtum dbu dgu ma dang / rdo rje ser mo dbu gcig ma dang / rdo rje dkar ma dang e ma dang / rdo rje nag mo dbu gsum ma dang / rdo rje bsnyems ma b+ha khu khri sdigs can dang / rdo rje ser mo da khwa khyi sdigs can dang / drar khrod kyi 'ja
89a7(rnying rgyud): b+ha khri khri sngags can dang / rdo rnga gtan/ khungs pa khwa phyogs can dang / ra ma mda' brtag ma pra khwal+la sngags can dang / dza8grupa drang ma rgya khA rgya sngags chen dang / 'brin ma thu Sh+pa khwa sngags rngan dang / byed ma kya sngags can da /
89b1(rnying rgyud): ra 'angags kyang na brawa kyi lcags can dang / rngarnga bdu sbyar yA g+h+ra khyA khwa sngags can dang / dang 'brag sa bcug zad pa sa ga khyong sa can dang / da mas byung ma thas grags can dang / rayang 'phrag nga khwa sngags cad dang / grub
89b2(rnying rgyud): 'joms mthu khwa khyi snyigs can dang / rdo rnga tshe 'joms ma b+ha khri khyi phyogs can dang / rdo rje thugs byed ma bye khwa lcags can dang / rdo rje srin mo snying zan ma \u0f7f khra khri sdigs can dang / rdo rje sul ma b+ha khwa khyi sngags can dang / rdo rje 'bebs ma bya khra T+wA~M skyugs
89b3(rnying rgyud): can dang / rdo rje dpal bdag ma bya khwa gyi skyigs can dang / rdo rje rgan 'jib ma bya khwa khyi skyigs can dang / rdo rje gnas ma mchogs byed mthu khwa khyi sdigs can dang / rdo rje sgrub pa tshe 'dzin ma bya khwa khyi snyigs can dang / rdo rje khrod rlon dang sngal nag 'khyil ba
89b4(rnying rgyud): can dang / rdo rje zhing chen stod g.yogs chu srin smad g.yogs can dang / rdo rje za byed kha 'bar ma dang / d+ho nam mkha' snying dang / rdo rje khwa dang thug pa dang / rngon bya rgod chen mo dang / dza rnga byan lag dang / rdo rje kang ka'i lus la tshwa srin me mag can dang /
89b5(rnying rgyud): gshog pa gtams pa dang / rdo rje sder mo lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje mchu rtse gcig ma'i gdod can ma dang / rdo rje so gri can dang / rdo rje kha gdangs ma dang / rdo rje karma mud ka ra dang / rdo rje 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs can dang / rdo rje sdigs bu'i mgo can dang / rdo rje
89b6(rnying rgyud): kha'i mgo can dang / rdo rje yid las byung ba'i mdun pa mo dang / rdo rje myos pa mo dang / rdo rje dra ba mo dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje byed pa dang / rdo rje dang pa mo dang / rdo rje kha spu can dang / rdo rje ral gri spu can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi pags pa can dang / rdo rje
89b7(rnying rgyud): zangs kyi kha sde can dang / rdo rje ka pa~M pi ka'i dbyings can dang / rdo rje dbang sbyin ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dgyes pa chen mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sgyu 'phrul gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje snyoms par 'jug pa'i chags dang / rdo rje cheng du 'dzi
90a1(rnying rgyud): par rnags da / byan kyis brnyas pa chags sa dang rab tu gtugs pa chags dang rnanarna gas dang / gargyanas kyisogs dpa dang / ga'adu sa ga mama'anasas dang / ngarag sargyags dang /
90a2(rnying rgyud): ma tshags dang / da gos gyon pa'i rdzogs dang / na nga nga gi sasas dang / don phyu gar cho mos rgya dang / rang ngo mar gyi tshogs dang / dang ga ma'i tshogs dang / rje pa'i chags dang/ rdung bye bar byed pa tshogs dang / rdo rdo bang ba ma rgyachags dang / /
90a3(rnying rgyud): dma'i rdzogs dang / 'od zin thung ma tshigs dang / dod gyes pa mngan gas dang / dem mnyas pa'i tshogs dang / ti ba'i 'a 'i tshogs dang / rnamapa' 'asum mtshags dang / don yid pazhi kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje mchog can 'ding pa'i tshogs dang / denga'i
90a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo nang rgyal can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje bam par byed pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ngo mtshar chen po'i phyogs dang / rdo rje 'khor lo ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ba tshogs dang / khro ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje mnyam par rdzogs pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rnga bka
90a5(rnying rgyud): skul ba'i tshogs dang / derje dngos grub las kyi tshogs dang / don spyod pas rgyas yang thogs pa med pa mchags dang / rdo rje rigs su thabs mkhas pa'i tshogs dang / rdorje 'di 'grob 'gyur ba'i tshogs dang / rjen chags pa med pa'i tshul du gnas pa'i tshogs dang /
90a6(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rigs su skyes pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje me stag phra mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sems ma ye shes su sdang ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje snyom las med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje snyid lug med pa'i
90a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs dang / rdo rjerje chos med par bsgrub pa tshogs dang / don gsang pasa'i tshogs dang / r-irdza rab kya dargyas pa ma tshogs dang / rdar pa po tshogs dang / derngarnam par sgos pa'i chags dang / nga rgyan bkod pa ma chags dang / rdo rje po ldan pa
90b1(rnying rgyud): ni 'og nas 'chad do// gsung gi rngom bzhi la hom lnga 'brel par 'byung ba'i zhal jo ma/ zla gam cing yang 'gyur ba'i ljags rngom/ ske shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshems rngom/ gsung spa 'bug wAr sgrogs pa'i dasungs rngom pa'o// de yang zhal ye shes kyi phyag rgya
90b2(rnying rgyud): rnam pa lnga'i bsreg khang du ro rnam pa lngas tshim zhing mchod pa 'brel pa rnam lnga'i tshul dang / gsung dbyangs tshul 'dus byas dang / rang bzhin zung ma 'dres par ston pa'i tshul dang / mche ba bzhi ye shes pa zhi'i 'phro 'bras dug bzhi ye shes pa zhis gcod pa'i
90b3(rnying rgyud): tshul dang / 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs kyis snyan pa'i mdo sdes go bar sgrogs shing zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang rnam par bshad do// thugs kyi rngom pa bzhi la ting nge 'dzin phyag rgya'i rgyan gyi skar tshogs ltar jom/ phrin las rba
90b4(rnying rgyud): mtsho rgyan gyi dpa' rlabs ltar jom/ yon tan sa gzhi rgyan gyi rtsi shing lhar jom/ mdzad pha rol mo rgyan gyi gar thabs ltar rngom pa'o// de yang rgya chen po bzhi ni rang bzhin dad rgyan du dbye'o// lhag mthong gi rang bzhin las lhag mthong gi rgyan ma
90b5(rnying rgyud): g.yos par snang ba'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin las zhi gnas kyi rgyan khyad par du 'byung ba'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin bzod pa las lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis phan 'dogs pa'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin mi zad ma gol ba las
90b6(rnying rgyud): lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis cir yang 'gyur ba'i dga' ba skyed pa'i tshul lo// mthu'i rngom pa bzhi la ru tra bcos pa'i gnas rngo ma/ lha chen gnon pa'i gdan rngo ma/ khams gsum sgrol ba'i zhing rngom// rtogs dajoms spyod pa'i brtul zhugs rngo ma/ de
90b7(rnying rgyud): yang gnas khyad par can bkra shis shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i tshul dang / gnas khyad par can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang / zhing khyad par can khams ga sum yo sgrol ba'i tshul dang / spyod pa khyad par can srid pa'i rtog
91a1(rnying rgyud): dgu pa la nang pa gcig pa dang / de'i 'khor gyi yang sbrul gyi pho nya ni lcags bya khyi ste rkang gsum pa dang / lang btu basbal ba dang / nag po mgo dgu pa'o// shar gyi dkar mo spang dung gi khyi mo chen mo dang / lha'i srul gyi zhags pa can dang / nub kyi dmar
91a2(rnying rgyud): zangs kyi mche ba can dang / byang gi ser mo dril bu can dang / 'di rnams kyi pho nya mo ni shar gyi rdo rje sder mo dang / lho'i nag mo dung gdub ma dang / nub kyi dmar mo seng ge'i mgo can dang / byang gi ser mo las kyi bdag mo dang / rdo rje rdus chen phreng ba can dang / ngo rje zangs kyi
91a3(rnying rgyud): phreng ba can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi phreng ba can dang / rdo rje ral gri so can dang / rdo rje nam mkha'i krung gcod ma dang / rdo rje nyi ma'i zer zhon pa dang / rdo rje mu bo'i gzung 'dral ma dang / rdo rje chu mtsho'i gting dkrugs ma dang / 'di rnams kyi sku mdog ni sna tshogs pa'o// phyag na
91a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan cha sna tshogs pa'o// drug byed bdag pos sgrol bar byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he cha kas klu dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las pho nya'i las 'di gsungs so// oM hUM pho nyasum brgya drug cu rnams// yud tsam las ni kun 'dul zhing // yud
91a5(rnying rgyud): gyis ni phyogs bcur 'phro// hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing // bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po lding // mgo gsum po la lcags sde ma can// mi sha za zhing bdud dpung 'joms// bltas pas bdud rnams tshig byed cing // klu yi khyim rnams rab tu 'joms// rab tu mi sun 'di
91a6(rnying rgyud): dag ni// 'di yang dpal gyi pho ha ste// las rnams thams cad grub par gyis// mtshan dang dpe byad gnyis las 'phros// mgyogs pa mgyogs ma'i pho nyar ldan// slong/ 'gyu ma dang 'dra bar grags// chos nyid khyab pas mtshan ma 'byings su spad// ye shes thugs rjes
91a7(rnying rgyud): 'brel pas kun la khyab// phrin las dra bas 'gro ba rlabs kyis grol// de phyir lha mo rin chen dra ba ma// oM dz+wa la badz+ra hUM/ ye shes glog 'gyus mtshan ma dbyings su gcod// skad cig bugs rjes 'khor ba dbye bsal byed// phrin las glog 'grus 'gro ba yud
91b1(rnying rgyud): ces sgrol// drabs sdud la grog 'byam yis 'jed// badz+ra a sa ka tra~M/ 'od zer du dka 'phro ba ni// hU~M dang phaT gyisgra sgrogs shing // bkal ba 'brug sgra chen po bzhin// kun kyang mgyags ma rlung dang mtshungs// mag gsul ya la lcags sngar car// man
91b2(rnying rgyud): gsum po la rkang gsum pa// mang du za zheng bdud khyim 'joms// bzlas pas bdud rnams tshig byed cing // bu yi gnas kyang nges par 'joms// 'di rnams khro bo yo nya ste// ha ha ru lu'i lga sgrogs shing // gang gis rlung phyogs song ba yi// khro bo thams cad
91b3(rnying rgyud): nges par 'jig/ na mo byi tsir b+h+yo// ha ha ru lu ru lu b+h+yo// mgo brgyad po la rkang brgyad po// lag pa brgyad la mig kyang brgyad// lag pa brgyad ni rdo rje 'dzin// rta mgrin gnas kyang nges par 'joms// mgo drug po la rkang drug po// lag pa drug ni chud drug gcod
91b4(rnying rgyud): rkang pa gsum ni phur bu 'dril// g.yon pa gsum ni gtor ma sbyin// gang nas gang du 'gro ba'i tshe// rkang pa lcags phur rab tu drag/ 'od zer dud kas reg pa ni// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang rab tu 'jig/ lag pa g.yon pas bstod pa ni// phra men 'khor
91b5(rnying rgyud): bcas ral par 'bar// lcags kyus dgra ska rab thogs shing // zhing chen yan lag 'dzin pa 'phro// byang gi phyogs nas 'byung ba ni// lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum po// lcags 'i lus la nyi ba'i mig/ pA ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra// bar
91b6(rnying rgyud): pas nges par ma rdzogs// skad ni bzug pas shin tu che// rab tu mi sun 'di dag ni// zag tu rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog/ mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po// lus kyang gnag pa 'di phung gnag/ yan las gnag la sbrul gyis brgyan// rab pa gnag
91b7(rnying rgyud): mche ba gnag/ mig kyang gnag la lag nag po// mgyogs kyang rlung gis bskyod du med// 'di dag pho nya'i mchog yin pas// las rnams thams cad grub par gyis// long ba rgyab spel gyi mnang // mos za zhing ri lu spol// mig kyang med pa cang mi
92a1(rnying rgyud): smra// yang na lags sbal te 'gro// 'di yang khro bo'i pho nya ste// las rnams thams cad grub par byed// shar gyi phyogs nas 'grags pa ni// dung gi khyi mo chen mo la// dung gi ba lang s+thA khrid can// drang gi ma mo chen mazhan// phag na lug
92a2(rnying rgyud): kyu 'bar bzlogs// lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum pa// lcags kyi sdang mo mgo dgu la// sngags kyi mi mo chen mo zhon// lag na zhags bsgril ma thugs// nub kyi ltogs nas dgugs pa ni/ rabs kyi khyim chen pa la
92a3(rnying rgyud): zangs kyi mi mo chen mo zhon// lag na lcags sgrog spril ma thogs// byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// gser gyi khyi mo chen mo la// gser gyi mi mo chen mo zhon// lag na rdo rje phur bu 'dri la// 'di yang dpal gyi po ha ste// las rnams thams
92a4(rnying rgyud): cad grub par gyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka pho nya bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// dbus su bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i ros pa/ sru mdog
