92a5(rnying rgyud): mthing nag dbu sam brgya phyag drug brgya pa zhig dgod/ shar d+ha dza rje trai lA mAr dgod/ lhor stag gi mgo can dgod/ rngub na g.yug gi mogo rngan dgod/ byang dras la spyi mgo can dgod/ de'i phyi rim pasgral brgya rtsa brgyad rim pa gsum la lo ha su ma
92a6(rnying rgyud): dgod do// de'i phyi rim snam bu la sa ta sa? bcu rtsa brgyad god do// de'i phyi rim sum thal yang spel gyi pho nya dgod do// de'i phyir ma sgo ba bzhi// po nyams byed pa'i dgod do// ci bzhi dang / bka nyan dang / bkwa'i bo ha dang / sprul pa dang / yang sgrub pa dang / rnams
92a7(rnying rgyud): yang dag pa'i bden du nges par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gsang ba ha ru ga rab pa las \u0f7f phony+dza gre kaM lba // / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las pA ru ka'i 'am
92b1(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa 'di gsungs shing phyung ngo // bdag med gnyis rtogs sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa// thugs rje sprul pas 'gro ba ma lus sgrol// yul med ma skyes byams pa'i chos dbyings las// 'dzin pa me rtog snying rje zhan chags lo// gnyis med dag las phrin las
92b2(rnying rgyud): snying rje snyoms// dpal chen khrag 'thung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtog 'joms spyod pa mthun pas 'gro 'dul zhing // brda can yan lag len pa'i don go la// lha brgyad brjod pas dngos grub kun dang 'brel// bka' don gtan tshigs rigs pas brjod
92b3(rnying rgyud): par 'os// zhes bya ba'i don to// // lung gsum man ngag gsum dang spyi don gsum// lung gi spyi gcod man ngag gdeng du bya// skye khog bcu bzhis don gyi khog phud la// bzhi bcom drug ldan rtsis mgos sa gcad de// khro bo rtog pa mtshan ma'i gter
92b4(rnying rgyud): gyis bshad// 'di ni khrag 'thung rngom bcid rgyal po'i lung zhes tshig nyung zheng mdor 'dus la don mang por 'byung bas mdo'i lde zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ lung gsum gyis sde grangs te rde'u bya'o// man ngag
92b5(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis mjug bsdus te blo la bzhag pa'i don to// spyi don gsum gyis lung thams cad kyi spyi gcad do// spyi khog bcu bzhis don gyi khog dbub po// bdud bzhi bcom pas yon tan kun la snang ba'i che ba btsam mo// rtsis mgo drug gis
92b6(rnying rgyud): gcad do// khro bo rtog pa mtshan ma'i gnyer gyis bshad pas ni gau la sa dang ni sgrib pa spang ngo // yon tan kun rngom pas brjid gzhan sa swa phyir rngom brjid chen po sum cu rtsa drug bstan te/ rgyal po yin pa'i rtags ni rin po che sna bdun gyi
92b7(rnying rgyud): por gsol lo// lung gis spyi bril de bshad do// de ltar rnam pa bcur nges nas/ de ni phye byang ngo bstan te gses nas bshad pa/ de la lung gsum ni zhi gnas mi rtog dngos po mkha'i khrab 'dra// lhag mthong ma rmongs gza' ska mkho' la bkram
93a1(rnying rgyud): gad bcas don dang bstan de 'tsham par bshad// ting 'dzin shes rab bka' phung gsum dungs// de la san ngag gsum ni bdag tu mi rtog sprul pa mdzod nas thong // yul dum grub gzhan med mdzad du gshegs// yul sems gnyis med ma
93a2(rnying rgyud): skyes dbyings su gcig/ nyan thos rang rgyal sems tsam sdong man ngag/ de la spyi don gsum ni/ med tu btag chags smrab 'grub bltas par snang // spyod mthun khro drag gdug pa'i dpal sos 'dul// tog 'joms stan rdzas dngos len dngos grag
93a3(rnying rgyud): 'di ni khro bo spyi yi don du bshad// de la sti khog bcu bzhi ni/ gang khro gang la ci phyir gang gis khro// gang khro rnam pa bzhir ni shes bya ste// deng khro shugs khro bar bcas dang bcas so// rtogs pa thugs rje rang bzhin 'dul ba'i dbang // gang
93a4(rnying rgyud): rjes khros te yul dang gnas// las dang 'bras su sems can sgrub pa'o// las bzhi sbal mdzad 'bras su sku gsung thugs// ci phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis la ni// dus gsum mi yang sha rus khrag la rol// gang gi ro ni hUM dang ha we phaT// gan
93a5(rnying rgyud): lha 'og mkha' stong ye shes thugs// bskyed thabs cho 'phrul gsum po khro bo'i sku// 'bras bu dpal chen phra men tshogs kyis bskor// phra men las drag 'gro ba cis 'dul mdzad// de la bdud bzhi gzhom pa ni// tsham mi drag pos lha chen 'ang
93a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyel pa rdzis// 'jal zhugs rol pas gdos bcas phung po bshig/ dus gsum brlag phyir sha rus khrag la za// rnam shes 'chi med rgyal ba'i gnas su stobs// gyis mgo drug rtsi dbang dang rab tu ldan pa dang // dpal dang gzug
93a7(rnying rgyud): grags pa dang // ye shes dang ni nan tan dang // dug dang yang dag ldan phyir ro// de la dbang ni chags sdang gti mugang rgyal phrag dog ni// mnyes stobs yu maM dang 'jigs tshul sgo la sprul// rngan med thod pa kham por g.yas ga
93b1(rnying rgyud): dang rgyal mtshan me dang lha chen gnon// de la dpal drug ni/ byams las khyab pa thugs dam dmigs kyis bsgral// thugs rjes 'gro ba thams cad bu ltar dgongs// smon lam dbang gis 'khor bar ji srid bzhugs// gzhan don mdzad pas bdag don lhan gyis krug/
93b2(rnying rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal// khro tshul khrag bzung dpal te rnam drug yin// de la dpal yongs su rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa bzhi ste// de yang gang zhe na/ sku gsum sa gsum sems dpa' rtogs dka' ba// bka'
93b3(rnying rgyud): khyab sten 'dab mar 'bab chu ba'i rdzun// ting 'dzin bsam yas po rjes thogs pa de// bsam yas pas m+b+ha khyab mkhas pa gzang skang gas pa// grA mthA gdul phyir zhwa lAs sgra 'argyan pa// sang chen gsung sgra dbyangs dang po nya'i dpag/ dug lngas gdos pa nas 'ang
93b4(rnying rgyud): rgyan byas pa// khrag sbrul g.yang gzhi khra ta dregs pa 'doms// de la gzugs rnam pa gnyis ni/ mi thud byas pa'i gzugs 'dra la// e gon la ni rkang lag gtams// drang srong khros pa'i cha byad la// shin tu mkhrang zhing skems bags bri// gnod sbyin
93b5(rnying rgyud): bags mi mthun gzugs dang ni// 'dul dbang yi dgas srin po drang srong 'dra// de la grags pa ni bud d+hi bo d+his bstod dam sras spun dgongs// gti mug gzangs bstod nga rgyal gnon par grags// de la ye shes ni/ rnam dag dbyings mkhyen 'khor ba
93b6(rnying rgyud): dang bral// 'gro ba'i rgyung ma khyen 'khor pa'i mtha' yis 'das// gnyis su med par mkhyen pas drabu ma'i ngang // mdor na thams cad pa yi ye shes pirda// de la nan tan ni/ nan tan snying po zag med zag bcas 'dra// nan tan phrin las 'gro ba gnas nas 'du
93b7(rnying rgyud): bsam yas nan tan 'gro ba chud mi gson// nan tan mchog gis mchog tu shes par bya// da ni lung rnam pa gsum spyir dril te bshad do// de yang mi 'da' brgyan gyi lung dang / tshe mchog yon tan gyi lung dang / yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad do// del
94a1(rnying rgyud): na rgyun dug tu
94a2(rnying rgyud): sa dag
94a3(rnying rgyud): sa gsu
94a4(rnying rgyud): ma gang dpa bgyis dpa'angs// gsu nga gras pa // mapa yin // ga sa dgas chags nga ga/ rnams gsus 'ad pa sa
94a5(rnying rgyud): kyi med kyi pa / kyi za ba 'jigs pas/ bye rnye pa sa gas sa bapa ma thes den pami mi seshes pa dag ba cad pang bdag pas pa bad// ringasasas
94a6(rnying rgyud): dpa cug drag pas kyis tha/ 'ad pa'i bab 'dzi ru / da// na pa ga/ yang gang tshu'ad du 'jun pa gshegs pa sa
94a7(rnying rgyud): sa da dag sa
94b1(rnying rgyud): rnams// rtsal mtshan sha khrag snying dang bcas// so so'i mthun pa'i gnas su bshams// 'bru bzang bshos dang dam chog rdzas// bdud rtsi sha khrag snying sbar ba// rin chen bcud kyis sbeng nas ni// grangs mnyam yang na phyogs bzhir gzhag/ gdugs dang ba
94b2(rnying rgyud): dan bla re dang // wa ldi rba bzar tshags// 'di la shis shing mthun pa ste// stag gzig dom dred 'phar sbyang dang // kad ka dur bya bya rgod khwa// me rta ban glang ne le yi// sha rus lpags dang mgo yis bya// mda' gzhu mdung dang kha T+wA~M ga/ rang gri n+ya gri swa
94b3(rnying rgyud): dang // tre shUl phur poso mangs dang // mtshon cha brag pos bskor zhing gtams// mdzes dang mi mdzes stan mi sbran// dring ba dang bsrung ba dang // kha mngar tsha sbur rtsub pa dang // tsha grang 'jam ru badro dang bsil// gzugs sla dr-i ro rag nam
94b4(rnying rgyud): kyis// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bstar// de nas rdo rje 'dzin ba des// gyi nang gsang ba'i bsrung ba yis// gnod cing 'tsha ba tshar bcad de// bsod nams tshogs kyis rang rgyud spangs// gzhan phan byang chub sems kyis bsgrub// chos rnams gnas
94b5(rnying rgyud): lugs bzhin du bsgom// ma mthong ba la snying rje bskyed// ngo bo bskyed n+ya hUM du bsgom// de nas snod kyi gzhi mo lnga// ye shes 'byung ba lnga ru bsam// steng du rin chen ri rab kyi// dbus su dur khrod gzhal yas khang// tha~Md mkhar e tri sum cu la//
94b6(rnying rgyud): gzugs brnyan bzhin du ting 'dzin bskyed// dbus su nyi zla pad+ma dang // ro bzhi bskol ba'i steng nyid du// rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku gsung thugs// nga nyid kun la snang bzhin bsam// yum chen khams gsum gyi 'dul ma// gtso dang gnyis med skyong ba
94b7(rnying rgyud): las// thabs dang shes rab 'od zer pas// e u'i rnam pa sa bon tshul// dgro 'dus gri gug kha T+wAM gas la// de nyid gsal ba'i rlud spangs pas// 'dod khams dbang phyug gtso bo che// lha mo yum dang bcas par gyur// seng ge blang chos
95a1(rnying rgyud): 'jams// stang gsum sred pa yo 'dul rgyal po'i rtags// kun la mnga' mdzad 'khor rnams dbang du spyad// zhing chen smon lam pha rol phyin pa ni// 'bod pa dag yab mas 'khor rnams dbang du spyad// sbyin pa 'azabs ma pa'i 'graja ma par byad/ rtag
95a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyig pas gdon bcas phung po bshig/ rtog pa chos nyid dran med shes lnga bzung // ci ltar sngon cing grub pas de skad bya// zong gshol thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa ni// nyon mongs za ba thugs rjes zlog mdzad cing // ye shes chos dbyings mtha' dang drayang rtag
95a3(rnying rgyud): thabs kyis sku gsum lhun grub sprul pa 'phro// brda ni shes rab pha rol phyin bstan pa// yul mer ma skyes chos sku rnga sgo la// 'dzin pa bdag med rig pa'i dbyu gus brdungs// gsung rab dz+ra sgras 'gro ba shes rab skyed// 'khor lo bsam gtan lhag pa gsum gyi mtshan/
95a4(rnying rgyud): tshul khrims ting 'dzi ni shes rab gsum dang ldan// bad+ma 'dam gyes ma chags thugs rjes spyod// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i ngang du bstan// mi zad par ldan smin pa'i phur pa byin// ral gri ye shes thugs rje mtha' gnyis gcod// rtse gcig tid 'dzin
95a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis las brtson 'grus mdzad// dpya sta zhags pa la sogs phragu mtshan rnams// rang gnyer las kyi badz+ra tsam chos sgra rtogs par bstan// de la 'di man chad che mchog yon tan g+hi lung bris skyer dril te bA shud pa ni/ yon tan gyi brjid la chen las kyi rngom
95a6(rnying rgyud): sum cu rtsa drug bstan pa ni de la sku'i rngom pa bzhi la nam mkha' ri mo phyag rgyar rngom/ ci dwa yang 'gyur bzhi bzhugs rjel rngom/ zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan rngom/ tsham ngam chen po'i stobs rngom pa dang bzhi'o// de yang kun rdzob rang bzhin med pa la nam ma
95a7(rnying rgyud): la spri nad pa'i tshul dang / lha dang 'phags pa tshangs pa dang / sngon lam cher yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs thabs kyi tshul dang / srid pa'i 'khor po thal gyis gnon pa dri med pa d+ma'i zla 'od yon tan rtags de gdan che'i tshal dang / stobs chen bcu'i tshul dang /
95b1(rnying rgyud): ni 'og nas 'chad do// gsung gi rngo ma bzhi la hom lnga 'brel par 'byung ba'i zhal jom/ zla gam cing yang 'gyur ba'i ljags rngo ma/ skye she rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshems rngom/ gsung sgra 'bug lder sgrogs pa'i dbyangs rngom pa'o// de yang zhal ye shes kyi phyag rgya
95b2(rnying rgyud): rnam pa lnga'i bsreg khang du ro rnam pa lngas tshim zhing mchod pa 'brel pa rnam lnga'i tshul dang / gsung dbyangs tshul 'dus byas dang / rang bzhin zung ma 'dres par ston pa'i tshul dang / mche ba bzhi ye shes pazhi'i 'phro 'das dug bzhi ye shes pa zhis gcod pa'i
95b3(rnying rgyud): tshul dang / 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs kyis snyan pa'i mdo sdes go bar sgrogs shing zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang rnam par bshad do// thugs kyi rngom pa bzhi la ting nge 'dzin phyag rgya'i rgyan gyi skar tshogs ltar rngom/ phrin las rba
95b4(rnying rgyud): mtsho rgyan gyi dpa' rlabs ltar jom/ yon tan sa gzhi rgyan gyi rtsi shing ltar jo ma/ mdzad pha rol mo rgyan gyi gar thabs ltar rngom pa'o// de yang rgya chen po bzhi ni rang bzhin dang rgyan du dbye'o// lhag mthong gi rang bzhin las lhag mthong gi rgyan ma
95b5(rnying rgyud): yos par snang ba'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin las zhi gnas kyi rgyan khyad par du 'byung ba'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin bzod pa las lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis phan 'dogs pa'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin mi zad ma gol bzas
95b6(rnying rgyud): lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis cir yang 'gyur ba'i dga' bskyed pa'i tshul lo// mthu'i rngom pa bzhi la ru tra bcos pa'i gnas rngom/ lha chen gnon pa'i gdan rngom/ khams gsum sgrol ba'i zhing rngom// rtogs 'joms spyod pa'i brtul zhugapa rngom/ de
95b7(rnying rgyud): yang gnas khyad par can bkra shis shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i tshul dang / gnas khyad par can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang / zhing khyad par can khams gu sum yo sgrol ba'i tshul dang / spyod pa khyad par can srid pa'i rtog
96a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa/ / spyo sa/
96a2(rnying rgyud): sa
96a3(rnying rgyud): na na
96b1(rnying rgyud): tan gyi brjod pa bzhapa/ med pa zang ma shes pas 'a daH/ gcag la 'dang dbyur ldan pas 'ardad ba/ gnang skur phan par 'dod pas brjod na/ thabs mkhas sngon kyis migs pas brdad cang // de yang bdag sa 'dzin 'ad nas sbed/ med pa'i skra nas/
96b2(rnying rgyud): zad mi shes/ ye shes kyi sgo nas gcig gsems kyi ko nas 'dod dgur ston// sems kyi sgo nas gnod par sbyar// grub brgya'i sku nas pan par mdzad// shes bya'i sgo nas babs mkhas/ spyad pa'i sgo nas ston gyis ma gos/ phri na las kyi brjid pa'i
96b3(rnying rgyud): la/ maM mnyal nyams lag rol pas brjid kyi/ 'khar ba yun rings mi mnyal bar brjod ce/ mgon sbubs rgyan du mdzad pas brjid che/ dgongs pa'i don rnams mdzad pas brjid ce'o// de yang sgyu mar gyur pa'i sgo nas mi mnyed/ rang bzhin
96b4(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'i sgo nas phag tu ropa/ spyod pa'i sgo nas 'khor bar yun rings por bzhugs/ bya ba med pa'i sgo nas mi mnyel/ mahA yi sgo nas mgon skabs che/ dam bcas pa'i sgo nas 'gro don rgyun du mdzad/ rtse gcig gi sgo nas mtha' gnyis
96b5(rnying rgyud): kye sman dgongs/ nan tan gyi sgo nas bya ba grug// brjid nyi shu dang sgo bzhi bcu sde snyir drug cu'o// de la rin po che sgra bdun ni 'khor lo rin po che'i dbang bcus skye ba bzhi la dbang bskur ro// btsun po rin pa chas ni yul gyi rdzal po la mnyes par dbul lo//
96b6(rnying rgyud): dmag mi rin po che'i tshul dbus pha rol gyi dpung 'joms so// khyim bdag rin po che'i tshad med pa bzhis rgyal po'i chab srid 'dzin to// glang po rin po che'i stobs bcas pha rol du bdag dang gzhan gyi byod byed do// rgya rin po che'i sgrar mtshogs su 'phrul
96b7(rnying rgyud): rkang pa 'dis bzad pa'i gnas sab par byung du// yang bzhin sa nar dun pa chen rnam pa zan sa nas sems can kyang gang // srang rnam pa gas nam 'da' ba can gyi grang la sogs pa kang mag sbyong sbyar bar byed/ danas 'khor
97a1(rnying rgyud): na na
97a2(rnying rgyud): gyur pa 'a
97a3(rnying rgyud): spya gnyis dang ma'i dang / sa byas gar bangs la mkhyem/ mas phyi smra ratho pa sas byas zla cad/ 'khar mas chas phyung / ngam
97a4(rnying rgyud): gyis bsgral bas// bla min pazh-i coM rdzogs bzhir las pani ma dang // smon las dbang gis dag pa d+mar ston pa// dus mthang bgapa pa bzhin du ba shos dus// de la brgyan mo nang rje'i nga / mchags rdo gzugs kyi sum gyis kyag// zhi gnas te
97a5(rnying rgyud): badzin ma gsuM sam gyis sbyor// gas med thugs na do na grab cal gyis btsu// phyag mang ye shes bram gyis mnas cad 'bangs// 'byung ba bani po dang sum pa// ba bgyin pa spel mnyes par la// min rje na ba N+Da la dza la // rdzog
97a6(rnying rgyud): bas bzla ba shes rab babyung ba tshul// tA med par yang na pa byung chug/ na ba pa bcad pa nubs da gas pa tsu// ga par kar bzhin da ga ba ts+tsha // rang byung ces thubs pa'ang mang chung // shin ces byung
97a7(rnying rgyud): pajo nyid rdzo rjong / sngon la dung rdzogs kyi bangs pa rgya'o// kun mangs dus pa ma mthar tshul/ na thog kyi ga// ma byas bdag dzin brgya'i zang ma pabazhin/ rdzog sa cang bang byams par rdzog/ ma /
97b1(rnying rgyud): skyed je bdag nyid ce// bzla zhing bskabs pa dga' ba'i mchog/ yal bar ma 'dor gang gams sa// dal glang bar nam tsha' rgyabs bkran/ drag tshon tha skabs na drugs rgyan brgyangs rdzir gnan// sa da stobs na ma dmigs nam mkha ma da// mi 'byung
97b2(rnying rgyud): stobs ni dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rgyun// ma spangs stobs ni gdos bcas sbal brgyan// ma g.yos stobs ni don mthun grol ba'i brgyan// smon lam stobs ni bskul par yongs grol mdzad// sprul pa'i stobs na mag brtan phra man 'gro// phrag dog sogs 'khor
97b3(rnying rgyud): par gcig mi gtong // 'dod chags yud tsam 'phral 'dod spyan bzlog dmar// de la rta rin po che'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/ chos dbyings med bzhin tsar snang ba// mkha' la 'ja' tshon bzhin du rnam par bkram// ye shes rdzu 'phrul chos kyi dbyings
97b4(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa// mkha' la nyi shar bzhin du gsal la stong // tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bye brag ni// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sprin phung bzhin du bdal// sprul pa'i bye brag 'phro ba'i rdzu 'phrul ni// ro la cig car 'babs snod bye brag kyi// de la nor bu rin po
97b5(rnying rgyud): tshe'i rang bzhin ni/ 'gro rnams ci ltar 'dod pa'i re 'dod skrong // mi zad bdag nyid gter chen nam mkha'i mdag/ srid gsum mun nag sel ba'i ye shes smon// dus gsum rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 'arin chen phreng // lung gsum ni rtsis mgo spyir sbyar bu yin no// da ni
97b6(rnying rgyud): rgyud kyi rtogs pas sor bshad par byaH/ 'gron mas ltar 'dul zhing gshegs mngad pa// shes rab nam mkha' bskal bdaga' byu tun// gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdza dpa// gti mug do Na bud+ha he ruka/ ye shes dengs rkyen mongs
97b7(rnying rgyud): mas// thabs 'don mchod pa'i dngos po bshig/ zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa// zhe sdang rdo rje badz+ra ha dra ka/ rin chen dacig wAr dran srung zhing // bdag med zhi gnas rgya yi bskal pas 'khru// de rtsal tshul gyis ngasngal 'joms mdzad pa/
98a1(rnying rgyud): la dzi na da he ruka/ 'khor ba'i 'das du pa wAr sgra 'khrungs shing // lhag mthong po chen 'bar bas thams rba sgeg/ dang chags rnal gyis dza dang chags 'joms mdzad pa// bdang chags dzang pa r+g+ga ruka/ phrin pas rgya mchis 'gra
98a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i don mdzad pa'i// shes bya thogs med bskal pa'i rlung gis bskyod// phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa// phrag dog rdo rje ka ma he ru ka/ sku yi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // shes rab mthar phyin gti mug rnam par dag/ phyag rgya
98a3(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing // chos dbyings nam mkha'i dbang bskur khro mo kyal// thugs kyi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // btson 'grus mthar phyin zhe sdang rnam par dag/ rtogs pa reg bya'i mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing // sra
98a4(rnying rgyud): brtan rdo rje dbang bskur khro mo rgyal// gsung gi longs spod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // tshul khrims mthar gyin 'dod chags rnam par dag/ gsung rab sgra yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing // b+hag mthong ye shes dbang bskur khro mo rgyal// yon tan
98a5(rnying rgyud): longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // ldan pas mthar phyin nga rgyal rnam par dag / ngar 'dzin bro mchog mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing // bdag med zhi ga nas dbang bas ru khro mo rgyal// phrin las longs spong sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // bzad pas mthar
98a6(rnying rgyud): phrin phrag dog rnam par dag/ tshul khrims ni med mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing // thogs med las la dbang bsgyur khro bo kyal// thugs mchog nam ngag ye shes dkar mo'i tshogs// 'bugs mdzad ye shes lha yi dbyug to can// dran pas cung lnga sgra
98a7(rnying rgyud): mdzad zhi bar gzigs// srid gsum 'joms byed dbyug thogs gau rim// sku yi yon tan tshogs sprad kun mo'i tshogs// mthu 'phrog zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel// bden gnyis lta bas khro tshul 'gro la gzigs// dam tshig dbyings mchog ska
98b1(rnying rgyud): zung car sa// gsungags thams cad zi mu gnan rmongs pa rdzogs// dbang ma nga mtha' gnyis mi long rje srin no// mi gnas sapa mtshan 'dzin ca myos par lta// sbyang gsas dbang bdang rtsal byed bu mo \u0f7f// thal bapyad pas thal byang ma 'i tshogs// kun
98b2(rnying rgyud): dngos grub rdo rje rtse dgu 'dzin// sa dgu rtog 'joms shi ba spong bar gzigs// 'jig rten thal byed rde'u thogs pe tA li// 'byed med shes rab mi rtog khros mo'i tshogs// 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin 'ching zhing dbang 'dren las// khro gangar gzigs tshul rgyun gyis
98b3(rnying rgyud): thugs rjes sgrol// bde mchog dbyings su 'dren mdzad bug se// zhe sdang tshul gyis don mdzad gtum ma'i tshogs// myos mdzad dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa'i// thugs rjes dkrug cing ro za'i tshul du gzigs// snod brgyad dkrugs nas spongs mdzad
98b4(rnying rgyud): ldan sku gsum bdag gzhan don// sdug bsngal zhe sdang gsod byed sing ha ma// dpa' brdzun za byed ye shes thugs rje'i las// brtson 'grus myur ba'i shugs 'chang 'gro don du// thugs rje ye shes rtse gcig so sor gzigs// baN+Dal 'chi bdag
98b5(rnying rgyud): 'joms mdzad bya khra ma// mdzes byen dam tshig rnam dag gsung gi yum// 'bas mkhas spyod pas bdag dang gzhan don mdzad// don gyi chos skra ting 'dzin ljags la gtang // 'dod chags dur khrod 'joms mdzad sri ka ma// mi ma byed spyod pa
99a1(rnying rgyud): rgyag chags sa// sna bya na pasmra sa 'jugs sarbu/ 'du la sa gas srung ba / spyan dang pas bya byung pan lagasasas pan pat+ta// rnab nas kyis pas dag dang thang
99a2(rnying rgyud): sbyang// 'khong ba spyan gcad na na / tshogs sus rtags da klung g+sa sa// rnam sa da mtshan ma ngams gsang pa'i gad rnams sbyin pas rang ba zhes mtha' cos tha gag
99a3(rnying rgyud): tshul bzung // 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal che 'brog kA ka ma// bskrad pas mi 'gyur bzlas pas mi 'dag cing // mi mthun gnyen pos mi shigs bzod pa'i mchog/ chos zhwa thugs su chud phyir zhal na thogs// yon tan yid bzhin bdag nyid kal ga ma//
99a4(rnying rgyud): si mi rtag 'grol thags rngas gzigs/ gnyis pra myi gnas shes rab la 'od cin/ dbyings kyi sngags rjes smin pas 'dus pa thas// mthan gnyis spangs pa ma tsul ka/ badz+ra gzhag gis tha ba'i dkyipa la khor rdzogs/ dang sa dzin 'acu
99a5(rnying rgyud): la ldan gyis grug// bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i // thog ma lad cing yan tan zab med// sbyin pas rigs pa'i zung du mtsha dang ljang // 'khor bas 'jigs nas thugs rje'i lcags bral 'dzin// dbang bar 'tsho ba'i ting mi
99a6(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa// thugs rjes shing mdad ta gang gas ma// don da na pas can nga dashing ba na/ ste snang hUM zhags pa lang pa'i rgyud dzi // rkyen grub rgyam sems can ma du zhing // yon tan tshogs rdzogs pag ga
99a7(rnying rgyud): zhags pa ma// gzhan gyi don du spyad pas bdag gi don// shes rab sgrol mas mun pa'i sdug bsngal sa la/ don nyid mi 'da' dga' 'a'i mchog/ kun gnyen ma rig nub mdzod nyi zla'i stag// snyan par spabs kun kyang bkang bzhin byed// @
99b1(rnying rgyud): snyoms thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'gro don du// phab nas rnam shes thal ba'i gzugs kyang 'tsho// chos ston bag chags byang mdzad dril 'grol ma// da ni srin mo'i lha rgyud bshad de/ bcwa brgyad sman gyis bcwa brgyad khams la gzigs// bcwa brgyad shangs nas bcwa
99b2(rnying rgyud): brgyad srub pa dbyung // bcwa brgyad khams la bcwa brgyad skur ston cing // bcwa brgyad thugs kyis bcwa brgyad 'dul thabs mnga'// bcwa brgyad sman gyis bcwa btsud khams gsan cing // bcwa brgyad ljags kyis gsung rab bcwa brgya dang zeng // brgya rtsa brkyar
99b3(rnying rgyud): kyis dgongs pa bsam mi khyab// sa dgur thugs rjes de ni mdzad dbu dgur ldan// brjod gnon zhabs brgyad phyogs brgyad lha brgyad gnon// ci ltar rol yang spyan dkur dbyings mi g.yo// 'dul ba'i dbang du bskal pa'i tshul ston cing // rdo rje srin pos ci
99b4(rnying rgyud): 'dul yid bzhin rdzogs// rnam thar gsum las sku gsum phrin las 'byung // spyod pa rnam dag smon lam stobs kyis gshegs// ral gsigs sprul pas 'gro don rtse gcig rol// bcwa brgyad stod pas mnyes mdzad rtsa bting ma// brjid pa'i stobs
99b5(rnying rgyud): kyis klu rnams zil gnon cing // phra ma'i skyon spangs dag gi dbang phyug che// 'bad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan// chos pa dbang mdzad ha yaM grI ba dpal// 'dzin tshul stabs kyis drang srong tshar gcod cing // log lha'i nyes spangs yang dag tu
99b6(rnying rgyud): dang ldan// tshul khrims mthar sbyin drang srong spyod pas tshe// skye la dbang mdzad bran tshul mi g.yo mgon// shugs 'chang stabs kyis rlung lha tshar gcod cing // 'khyal pa'i spyod spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che// 'dod pa kun la sprin mdzad rgyal po'i tshu
99b7(rnying rgyud): sems la dbang mdzad 'dod pa'i khro bo rgya pa// 'tshir ba'i skabs kyis gnod sbyin zhabs kyis mnan// ngag rtsub sgron spangs ngag gi dbang phyug cha// smon lam mthar phyin bdud 'dul thugs rje'i rtse// las la dbang mdzad bdud rtsi kuN+Da li// gnon
100a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i stabs kyis 'byung po tshar gcod cing // gnod sems nyas spangs thugs kyi dbang phyug che// mnyen pa'i stobs kyis mi mthun gnod mdzad cing // rdzu 'phrul dbang mdzad 'jigs byed stobs po che// rdegs pa'i stobs kyis srin po cha
100a2(rnying rgyud): gcod cing // bden dang bral ba'i brdzun spangs skyon sel ba// mtshan ma'i thabs kyis mtshan ma 'dul mdzad pa// ye shes dbang mdzad dbyug pa sngon po can// 'debs pa'i stobs kyis sa bdag tshar gcod cing // brdan sems skyon / das thugs kyi dbang
100a3(rnying rgyud): lhag che// bzod pa sa gzhi lta bu gzhar 'gyur ba// smon lam dbang mdzad 'dam skyes kuN+Da li// zlog pa'i stobs kyis bdud rnams tshar gcod cing // 'dod chags skyon spangs su yi dbang phyug che// ye shes mthar phyir nyi zla'i 'od bzhin gsal// skye
100a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi mos pas dbang mdzad hUM kar// rol pa'i stobs kyis lha rnams tshar gcod cing // ma byin len pa'i skyon spangs bdag nyid che// rab tu shes pa'i shes rab mthar 'byin pa// yo byad dbang mdzad gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal// 'jigs byed stabs kyis
100a5(rnying rgyud): 'chi bdag zil gnon cing // srog gcod nyes spangs sku yi dbang phyug che// gzung 'dzin skyon spangs bsam gtan dngu la gnas// tshu la dbang mdzad 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed// ye shes thugs rjes zin pas mthar mi 'ching // thugs rjes
100a6(rnying rgyud): zin pa'i srid las grol// gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bsnyems// 'dod pa'i rgyal po mnyes mdzad la se ki// rig pa'i sder chen chos kyi dbyings nyid 'dzin// thugs rje lcags kyul 'khor ba mi gtong zhing // shes rab thabs
100a7(rnying rgyud): kyi lcags kyus mtha' gnyis 'dzin// gtso bo dbyug sngon mnyes mdzad dra ti ru// ye shes mtshan sdud thugs je khrod 'gyur zhing // sprul pas 'gro bsgral sku dang ye shes 'phro// shes snying ma skyes dbu ma'i rig pa skye// stan pa tis khro
100b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal gshin rje mnyes// dbyings su mtshan ma shes rab tho bas brdungs// thugs rjes sems can phrin las mtshan ma 'joms// dbu mar ye shes snying rje me rtog dang // mi g.yo mgon po mnyes mdzad mA ha la// rdo rje gtum mo mtshan ma'i dngos po
100b2(rnying rgyud): bcom// thugs rje rngam tshul srid pa thal bar brlag/ gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bsdigs// hA ya grI ba mnyes mdzad tsaN+Da li// phra mor 'bags pa'i ye shes dbyings su 'phen// 'bigs pa'i ye shes gnad du thugs rjes reg/ ma
100b3(rnying rgyud): khyogs dbu ma tshan pa'i don ston pa// gzhan gyis mi thub mnyes byed shwa ya ti// mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings thos rig pa'i sgra// dbyings nyid rig shes dbyings la nyan pa'i sgra// de la bstan pa gsung gi sgra 'byin pa// bdud rtsib 'khyil pa sha
100b4(rnying rgyud): yA ya tis mAnyes// bdag rtog log lha'i mdzan ma kun bcom zhing // bablud mchebs sgra bzhi rtsa gcad de// lha dang ye shes ma skyes mi dmigs pa// 'adz+ra 'khyil pa mnyes byed par na/ thugs dri ma dbang gis rnam dag dbyings nas bsngal// thugs
100b5(rnying rgyud): rje'i shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas 'dren// gnyis mad mchod bskul dbu ma'i dgyes pa stabs/ ma ha hu la mnyes mdzad rdzun dam// bskyod pa'i ye shes pa rnams dus gcig gcod// thugs rjer thugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas spor// thabs dang shes rab 'askyor
100b6(rnying rgyud): pas mtha' gnyis spor// bA ya ba tis khams gsum hUM mdzad gnyis// sdug bsngal thugs rjes mi bzod phrin las dpa'// yal bar mi 'dor brtson 'grus shugs kyis brtan// gdod nas don mdzad 'khor pa mthar b+hag spol// de phyir dpa' ba tu
100b7(rnying rgyud): za byed bya khram// sdang zag mi 'gyur thugs rjes zha la gnon// mthu rtsal ngom brjid 'gyur med bdud dpung bzlog/ chos ngam ral gsigs gdangs nga 'jig rten 'gengs// de cir 'gur med phra men tsa sar// stug pa'i da stangs can
101a1(rnying rgyud): dgon par gnas// 'khrub skyon dri med shes bzhin rje mtshor stong // 'gro don dras la baban thugs rjes 'dug/ de phyir 'jug par byed pa'i hA ren// chos dbyings gnas ma la rtog pa'i ston sel zhing // thugs rdza spa rab sprul pa las
101a2(rnying rgyud): khyab// dug gsum 'joms mdzad sha zas khrag la rol// sel byed sprul pas don mdzad dA ma// yang dag zon chags 'gro don thabs mkhas ldan// mi 'dul zing thub btang snyoms chen por bzhugs// dus la bab nas brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan/
101a3(rnying rgyud): phyir mkhas brtson mdzad pa'i rtsa la ma// ye shes dbyings la 'jug pa shes bya za// dbyings nyid shes la 'jug pa nyon mongs za// gnyis med ye shes phrin las 'khor ba za// de phyir za byed pu ka mukas// rigs btsun gnyen por gyur pas thams cad 'dul/
101a4(rnying rgyud): phrin las rtsal gyis bdud dpung thams cad 'joms// skyong nyid sgra bsgrags mu stegs wa tshogs 'jigs// de phyir 'joms byed rtsa mchog sing ha ma// dbyings la ye shes nyal zhing thugs rje mi// lding nag nag po drag po rje ston pa// thugs mcho
101a5(rnying rgyud): dag chos nyid dbyings su mkhyen// de phyir mi byed phra men rik+Sha ma// ye shes thugs rje stobs kyis mtha' gnyis gnon// tsham dmar la gsigs sprul pas bdud dpung 'joms// las su ci mdzad brtson 'bras stobs gyisadzel// de phyir spobs ldan pa
101a6(rnying rgyud): men ha k+ta ma// lhag mthong chos dbyings zhi gnas rlan gyis brgyal// thugs rje 'khor bar ston lam stobs kyis myos// rtog 'joms rdzas la gtsang ste med par rol// de phyir gra men ltos byed u ka Ta// yid gas pas can sems par gyur pa ni//
101a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes dbang gis thugs rjes 'gro la g.yo// den mdzad god 'brang ye shes dbyings su mkhyen/ de phyir tshul khrims chen po kyi gya ma// bsam pa'i dngos po 'dod la 'dun pa ni// dbyings nyid mnyam nyid ye shes mkhyen pa sra// dugs
101b1(rnying rgyud): 'dun pas 'khor ba bag chags spyod// de phyir phra men za byad dod ka ma// dbyings la sems 'dzin yid la byed par 'gyur// ye shes dbyings rtogs drangs pa nyin mo nya la// 'gro mdongs rmongs la thugs rje snga mtshan mo dzA ta// ye shes thugs rjes drangs
101b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i u wa ka/ brtags pa'i dngas la tse gcig ting 'dzin 'gyur// mnyam nyid mthanga' bral dbyings las yi g.yo ba// tog go slong yul byis pas mi mthong ba// de phyir slong byed phra min pa ya tA las 'bras pa den la yid ches dang bur te// mnyam rnyed kyis pa
101b3(rnying rgyud): shes thugs kyis mgyogs// zhe gnas spyan ji lhag mthong bgrod chags chung // de phyir grwa men mgyogs byed b+hag shi ta// nges pa'i dngos la 'dzin pa'i mos 'gyur// lcug mthong ye shes dbyings nyid mnyam 'gyur 'dzin// zhi gnas gces par 'dzin pa mi 'phrog
101b4(rnying rgyud): pa// daM phyir phra men 'dzin ma tsa ta ma// 'dres pa'i dngos po ma brjed drun par gyur// dati sa dang ye shes gnyis med ma brjed dran// ting 'dzin 'jam phrag b+ha gra mthong so sor gsal// gnyis la ma rmongs zin mA ti ti la// chos dmas 'byed pa'i byed par ldang pa
101b5(rnying rgyud): ni// mnyam nyid dang dra pog sa sul byed cing // rig pa skyed pas srom nyi chom gcong // daphyir phra men gsong byed na skyed // 'dus pa rung dbar med pa'i gnyid sur / brgyad pa rdzogs 'o byos byeng byeng // mnyam dang pi mthu pag du thos byed cing //
101b6(rnying rgyud): mas cad myos byed ma zin tshwa di ka/ gsupa dngas gcod pa'i rig pa gyur pa ni// in las te brag mang po sa mdzad cing // thug rgya bzhi ba ma skyes dbyings su thos// de pyir khri sbyin 'bras byed ka si ka/ rdorje brjod pas byang na rjes
101b7(rnying rgyud): pas mtha' gnyis spangs// rjed byed 'arjod brab don gyi cho ga dang bral// de tsong ngor byed badra pa sha ma// chos nyid rdordzas mtshan ma'i ngos po pashig/ ye shes rdo rdzas gzung 'dzin rtog pa bsregs// phyag mtshan rdo rjes dregs pa'i lha du myong // de kyi dang
102a1(rnying rgyud): badra bar ga// 'chi ma bdud ci yul sams skye 'gag med// thub pa'i bdud rtsi bsam pa'i 'bras bu zag// thugs rdzas 'gro bdud rtsi gtong tha ma du bsdug// mchog ye shes badz+ra sas k+Sha// pai shes 'azhag byed yon tan d+ha mats+tsha bsgrag/ gas/
102a2(rnying rgyud): rjes 'phrog byed 'jig rten dbang du sdud// ye shes thugs rjes gnyis med dbang du jug// de phyir brlab byed badz+ra ma ra na// da ni pad+ma dbang chan dang / dbang phyug ma lha blud brjod par bya'o// bcwa lnga spyan gyis rgyud lnga'i mi dge 'aH// ye shes lnga dang so so cis 'dral mkhyen//
102a3(rnying rgyud): snyan bcus mi dge bcu yi sdug bsngal gsan// shangs lnga nas byung rigs lnga'i sbrul 'phros pas// rgyud lnga'i mgon mdzad brtson ldan rta dbu lnga// dug lnga zhal du shar te drab mdzad cing // ljags lnga the tshom gcod phyir theg lnga 'chang // skye bzhi las bzhis sgrol
102a4(rnying rgyud): mdzad shog bzhis spyod// bcu drug dmyal khams bcu drug phyag gis 'dren// phyogs brgyad 'dul phyir zhabs brgyad khro brgyad bcom// rigs bzhi snod bcud nyi zla 'od dang brdzis// phyogs bzhi rtsal drug dbang phyug yang ches mnan// che ba che ba yang che bla na med// bcu
102a5(rnying rgyud): drug zhag gis zla dkyil rdzogs pa lta// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas bcu drugs la zhugs// phyogs bzhi dbu lngar 'bar ltar rigs lnga'i dbu// mkhyen pa'i ye shes thugs rjes gzigs// tshogs chen yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // dbang chen yongs
102a6(rnying rgyud): su 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs ye shes lhan grub pa// dkyil 'khor gsum gyis brjid pa'i khro bo rgyal// thugs rje 'dam skyes spyod pa skyon mi gos// mthanga' gnyis dbang mdzad pad+ma he ru ka/ rngam pa'i dz+wal gyis srin mo gzugs
102a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin cing // thod rus gdug pa 'bum mar zas su za// srid pa'i sems can chags pa'i snying khrag gsol// dbang drag pas mdzad ma bu rak+Sha yi// sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das rtogs tshangs pa'i gzugs// tshad med bzhi rdzogs rtags kyi dbu bzhir ldan//
102b1(rnying rgyud): zhabs bzhis sgra 'don blang bzher bkra shas brjod// gti mug yid bzhin rin chen phra ma te// thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs rigs mchog ma// ma rig drug gsum 'joms mdzad dpal rtsa bsdams// bud med chags tshul dbang mdzad bka' klog ma// chags
102b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i skyon bral te chen re'u tri ma// thams cad sbru ma bzhin du rtogs mkhyen ma// 'brel pa'i thugs rjes sems can kun la gtogs// phrin las rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i bzhed chen can// 'khor ba'i rgyud gcod dragra mo po sna ba// 'du byed me rtag dril bu'i sku ltar
102b3(rnying rgyud): mthun// rtag par gzhon tshul 'khor ba dri sringad ba zlug // rten mongs thapa 'bigs pa'i mang byung 'ben// gzhon nu la chags pas dbang mdzad gzung // rnga rnams mang ldan mam na meng// b+h+rU~M yi N+Dal srid chos la dbang bskur zhing // mtshan da ba
102b4(rnying rgyud): mdzad mi dmigs sku dkar mdog/ gsod byed rdo rje 'bebs byed in dra ma// byams dang thugs rjes dbang mdzad sku mdog dmar// b+han d+ha snod yangs bcud kyi khrag mtsho la// rngam pa'i zhal du dug gsum za byed ma// sdug bsngal dbyings su spongs mdzad
102b5(rnying rgyud): bi ka lam// sems can gdul thabs khro bo mchog tu mkhyen// mun sel smon 'bar bad+mad kyi nad gsos mdzad// 'dam skyes pad ltar 'khor bar sgra 'khrungs kyang // chags pa'i skyon bral dbang mdzad a mri ta// zhi ba'i las ni gsod pa'i mchog tu
102b6(rnying rgyud): mkhyen// zla ltar yon tan cha shas mthar gyin sra// gdung ba'i nad sel 'jig rten sgrol mdzad cing // gtan mchog thams cad stobs byed se'u mya la// dbyug pa 'chog pu 'dra ba gzhan med mkhyen// thabs kyis ma rmongs phrin las ljang bu'i
102b7(rnying rgyud): mdog/ nan dbang drag shul 'chog pa'i dbyug to bsnams// dregs byed spyinas 'joms mdzad dan ha ma/ log par lta ba 'jigs byed spyan gyi mchog/ skye ba 'phrog byed rgya phun khrag mchog sol// las mdzad chags pa gsar gyi rked chings can// drag mo rngam
103a1(rnying rgyud): tshul glog 'gyur k+Shas// phreng ba rgyan gyi nang na mchog tu mangs// ting rnga d+han skadabasu zhugs pa yis// chags med ning du khams gsum kun 'dren ma// rgyun gyis thugs ngas sbru la mang dbags// 'chag pa dathug pas 'chang ba'i mchog tu mtshan/
103a2(rnying rgyud): gtun bus gdug pa ma lus 'joms mdzad ma// yon tan mi zad nor gyi gter 'dzin ma// stong gsum nor gyis rgyas mdzad ral gri ma// ra ro 'dra bar dpa' bo gzhan med mkhyen// chos rnams gnyis med don tags rtag tu myos// nyon mongs tha ba bzlog pa'i gshol
103a3(rnying rgyud): bsnams shing // dge ba'i lo tog skyed mdzad ru ti ra ma// brtan pa tsam gyis gzhan pham dpa' bo mchog/ ma lus gsod byed las la 'jug mdzad cing // bsnyengs pa mi mnga' 'gro don gcig pu spyod// gsod byed 'dra mdzad A ka ra tsa ma// bud med chags pas 'gro ba
103a4(rnying rgyud): dbang du byed// thams cad ma lus mgu byed dge ba'i las// 'dod lha'i mda' 'ben srid gsum yod 'phrog ma// thugs rjes zhen pa'i mno ha ra ma// khrag las zas gzhan med par rtogs mkhyen cing // gdon rnams bsgyur ba'i las mdzad sgo gtong can// mi zad nor
103a5(rnying rgyud): gtor ldan bum pa 'dzin// sdug bsngal stong thag thugs ti ka/ reg bya'i sems ni rlung gi khams te mchog/ srid gsum dbugs kyi srog sbyin tshe 'phel ma// bder gshegs rab chus sems can slob mdzad cing // khams gsum gnas nas smon mdzad pa
103a6(rnying rgyud): ya pe// snyigs ma lnga ldan lnga bcu'i tha ma la// srid gsum 'khor ba'i sems can gdul dka' ba// gsang ba nyid la las kyis 'dul bar mdzad// sdug bsngal dbyings su gsol mdzad ma ra na// gzi brjid can de me yi khams te mchog/ 'bur ba mchog gis
103a7(rnying rgyud): gdug pa ma lus bkrigs// byad pa/ la pajas mapa'i rngub ldan pa// thug pabang po shes 'bar 'gro a ga y-i// mar bdag pas smra ba cing gang bajug sa sa pa pa sgrog pa ga sachog gi phyogs nas phre dgas pa rtsu /
103b1(rnying rgyud): zla bzhi rtsad gcad tha byed par te// 'am bdag thams cad gnas nas ma 'angs mkhyen// thams cad gsod byed dang ma byams 'chi bdag mdzad// dam tshig bsrung ba'i 'chi bdag klog mdza kyang // phung gi dur khrod dbang mdzang 'a stan to// 'jigs las phyags pa
103b2(rnying rgyud): thags ni gzhan med mkhyer// stor phrag brgyad rgya grags la mnga' mang cing // rtswa man grang sna dad TI gau phyeng mthong // sdug bsngal nad gsos mdzad pa'i Ta ta ma// rga las lkug pa'i nod ni gzhan med mtshan// nar gyi tshogs rnams 'bras 'jog mdzad cing /
103b3(rnying rgyud): gdug pa 'dul phyir dug gtod sbrul zhags bsdams// zhi gnas ting 'dzin dbang sdud pa ru na// 'gro ba'i don mdzad mi 'gyur gru mdog gnag/ srid gsum 'joms mdzad tri shUl gdengs po bsnams// thugs rje shugs kyis 'dren mdzad lcags su
103b4(rnying rgyud): bsdams// 'khor bar thugs rjes shar ba'i ka ma la// chags pa'i thugs rjes don mdzad ra mgo can// byams pa'i zhags pa 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing // gang la ci 'dul de la des ston po// yo ni tan tshogs rdzogs re song tsa ka la ma// ston pa'i bka' drang
103b5(rnying rgyud): rang gi dam bca' gnyis// mi 'da' ma grub rab tu brtan par bzhugs// dam tshig sgog gis sems can 'dul mdzad cing // ma rig nub mdzad kum pa ka rnam 'phrul// sku gsum yon tan phrin las mtha' klas pa// stong pa'i sras bskul 'gro ba'i
103b6(rnying rgyud): rgyud la 'babs// sa so'i gad du chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa// ma tshugs pang mdzad lam po dar ma// dpal rdo rjes pas dpya he ruka rol pa las bzlas pa'i le'u sa drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi rtsa dang
103b7(rnying rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje las thabs dang shes rab kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang 'di bka' stsal to// dkyil 'khor 'dos gang gru bzhi la dbus su pad+ma dab ma brkyad / padz+ra'i lte ba pa rag ta'i maN+Dal byas te/ dbus su badz+ra ha ru ka/ shar du bud
104a1(rnying rgyud): d+hA ha ruka/ lhor rang na ha ru ka/ nub tu pad+ma ha ru ka/ byang du kaH ha ruka/ mtshams bzhar khra ma dbang phyug ma pan// de phyi ma sa ma bul gtsar ma brgyad// dang rgyan ma la sang na pa brgyad/ sgo bzhi dang so khyung dang bcas pa/ zhang ga rgyal
104a2(rnying rgyud): mtshan/ ras chen gyi 'phan gdugs/ Sh+Tha'i thog/ maM sa'i bla ris de nas bcom ldan 'das thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems yum gyi skul bstims te// yum kun du bzang mos rang gis mtha' la b+ha ba rgya'i kyi sems blangs te/ nyid las mi
104a3(rnying rgyud): gzhan pa'i 'khor rnams dbang bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sna dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // byang chub sems nyid sgom pa'i dbang // dbyings dang dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// sems nyid rtogs pa'i theg btang ste// de ru slob ma bskur bar bya//
104a4(rnying rgyud): chos rnams thams cad brtag par dka'// brjod pa'i tha snyad kun las 'das// da ltar sa gsum gnon pa ni// sems can nang na mi yin te// sangs rgyas mes ni bsgrub thag te// byang chub sems de'i don rtogs nas// 'bras bu yang dag mngon du 'char// de las kyang ni ma gtogs pa/
104a5(rnying rgyud): de las sangs rgyas gzhan na med// sems nyid dngos po de las med// bstan cing yang ni rtogs par dka'// bsgom pa'i dngos gzhi 'ang de las med// sems kyis btag par dka' na yang // chog gis 'di yin bstan dkapa zhes// sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid 'dri
104a6(rnying rgyud): de ring khyod la bskur bar bya// bo d+hi tsiSh+Tha hUM/ phye yi tshul du rtogs 'gyur na// sems pa srid pa thams cad rngub par 'gyur// nang gi tshul du rtogs 'gyur na// sems la sku gsung thugs cad 'khrugs par gnas// gsang ba'i tshul du snang ba thams cad ni// yum
104a7(rnying rgyud): zan kun du bzang mo zhes kyang bya// sems ni sdang ba shar po'i ye shes yin// gnyis su med par rtogs na chos kyi sku// byang chub sems kyis dang 'dir dbang bskur ro// badz+ra tsin+dahU~M/ mngon po sangs rgyas kyi bayum tshan kun ru ba // bdag nyid chen po sas
104b1(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun du bzang po ni// yab yum gnyis su med par gyur pa las// byang chub sems nyid bde ba chen po yin// chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas bde ba chen po ni// yum dang sems nyid gnyis su med pa yin// rdo rje sems ni ye nas mi 'gyur te// skye 'gag med pa'i sems
104b2(rnying rgyud): nyid don yin te// sems dpa' yi ni bdud bzhi med pa'i don// kun du khyab cing bdal ba dpag tu med// thams cad man ngag la ni thams cad rten// gdod nas 'tshang rdo ku pa'i che bar gsungs// phyi ni sdod kyi 'jig rten rtogs 'gyur na// 'byung ba lnga las
104b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas gzhan na med// nang ni brgyad kyi 'jig rten rtogs 'gyur ka/ sems pas ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med// byang chub sems kyis dbang bkur ro// bsdu ba'i gnas su nges pa med ces bya// rang 'byung ye shes nyid kyang thig gi mtha' las drangs/
104b4(rnying rgyud): sems la dngos po med cing gzung du med// gnas ni yum gyi b+ha ga ya ti s+ye// rnam par mi rtog chos nyid stong par gsal// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// rig pa rnyed pa dag pa shin tu gsal// byang chub sems kyi dngos gzhi ma gtogs
104b5(rnying rgyud): pa// sangs rgyas gzhan na med ces 'byung ba yang // me rtog pa'i lta ba mi bslad pa'i ye shes te// mi gtong ba'i spyod pa mi 'gyur ba sems nyid yin// mi 'drang po'i dam tshig mi 'bral ba'i gzungs// mi g.yo ba yi chos ted dbyings dag pas// byang chub
104b6(rnying rgyud): sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// mnyam par shes pa sangs rgyas kun gyi // mtho ris srin mon ngag dmyal ba kun// mnyam pa'i don dang rig pa gnyis med pas// 'di dang dri ma'i don du bsgom par bya// byang chub sems kyis deng 'drir dbang bskur
104b7(rnying rgyud): ro// mdzod gsum ston pa sangs rgyas kun gyi rje// phyi ma'i don du srid pa'i gnas 'gro bas// nang gi tshul du gnas ni rtogs 'gyur na// sku gsung lus ngag yid gsum gnas gyur na// de yang gsang ba'i gnas su rtogs par bya// kun gzhi yang dang rnam shes
105a1(rnying rgyud): yid dang gsub// gsang ba'i mdzad gsum yin pas bsgyur bar bya// da la sems kyi gzugs ni ci 'dra ba// tsaib+ha'i dbyings rdas 'dan chen gang 'phro// dkar por snyam la 'brel ba gcig tu gnas// las 'gro len las gzhan ni len pa
105a2(rnying rgyud): sems kyi gnyid na 'das/ bi chags pa 'bar ba mi dun de/ dang bcas pam gang gsas par bsgom// byang chub sems thas dang 'di dbang bsrud do// rtag pa me dun sa snying ma nga// po bskyod pad
105a3(rnying rgyud): bdag gi lus ni rtag pa ste/ bdag gi gsung ni 'gyur ba yin// bdag gi sems ni mi bskyod pa// sems nyid dus gsum 'gyur ba med par gsungs// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// thig le chen po dgu yi lung bstan pa// man ngag
105a4(rnying rgyud): gnyer chen rnam shes tshogs dgu ste// yid kyis rnam shes las 'phro len pa'i don// rnam par shes pa'i byang chub sems nyid 'di// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// med pa'i phul pa dang ni gcig pu lhun gyis rdzogs// sangs rgyas kun gyi
105a5(rnying rgyud): btsan bskal par mi nyams rdul tsam med// rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rang dbang las// gzhan nas sangs rgyas bca' gyur kyang // btsal kyang rgyal ba mi rnyed do// thams cad 'gyur med byang chub sems dpa' las// ma gtogs gzhan na med ces bya bar
105a6(rnying rgyud): gsungs// byang chub sems nyid mnyam par khyab bdal te// bdag dang gzhan du med par rtogs pa la// de ltar sus rtogs skyes bu gcig pu yin// lhun gyis rdzogs pa zhes kyang de la bya// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// dran pa'i sems
105a7(rnying rgyud): can sems kyi rang bzhin ni// dkar 'tsher snum la 'dril bas byang chub sems// mdzangs pa zin po sams shes dpa bya// blun po rtsol song sems ni nathun dud pas 'dres// sems gnas phung po tsi h+ya'i dbyings dkyil na// 'od mi thig le dkang ra
105b1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa ni// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems dan// ti dang dang nas btags zhabs bakhyud rnams/ sa rnams dag tu gnas gyur te// ma las sangs rgyas dag tu gnas bsgyur nas// dus gsums sa rgyas can gyi thugs kyis phan 'ad// bdag gyis /
105b2(rnying rgyud): yengs brjed bral med par 'di bsgoms na// sangs rgyas 'bras bu yang dag byang chub sems// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// nyams pa'i chad pa byung ba la// mgon tshun de las gzhan med do// rnal 'byor dam nyams gzhan gyis mi skongs
105b3(rnying rgyud): kyis// bdag gi sems nyid kun du bzang po'i ngang gyur na// bya tsa dang ni bral zhing 'das pa yin// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das pa yang // nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dbyer med mnyam pa chen po dang // de la sangs rgyas gang nas btsal kyang rgyal bas rnyed par ma
105b4(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// glang po dpal gyi thugs ka nas// lcags kyi zer chen bzhi 'phros te// glang po dpal chen he ru ka'i// lus ngag yid gsum su gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// 'od zer dgu 'phros
105b5(rnying rgyud): gdug pa ma lus bcom// 'gro ba mtha' dag rnams kyi don byas te// bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyang // kun gzhi snying la 'dus pa'i he ru ka/ de ltar lags pas rtogs na byang chub sems// gang nas btsal kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur te// byang
105b6(rnying rgyud): chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// bdag med khams kyi snod gang du// rgya che gsal ba'i khams bkang ste// ro dogs med par phung 'gro yang // nyam med par lam gyi mchog/ gza' gtad med pas don du bad// de bas rang sems bgrod
105b7(rnying rgyud): pa'is// byang chub sems ni yangs zhing tu che ste// de bas bdag gis lus rtogs na// snad bcud la sogs rtogs pa'i skyes mchog rnams// shes gsal blo ldan rnams la ye nas rnyed pa gsal// zla ba'i rgyud mchog de la yod ces gsungs te rdzogs/
106a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bsku ra// brnams pas rkad par ma 'gyur ma bsams gang bral yang // zhugs nas zhal d+ha byung ba 'gro bar ngan du gsungs// rnga drung dran pas thugs brtul te// las dang sems las ma gtags
106a2(rnying rgyud): bsgom du med// bsgoms nas sems nyid gzhan nas btsal yang rnyed par ma gsungs so// dus gsum rgyal pas ye nas ma bcos te// rang sems gdod nas ma skyes chos kyi sku// chos nyid bsgom par bya ba gang yang med// man ngag shes rab sbyin
106a3(rnying rgyud): cher des gsungs pas// lus dang sems las ma gtogs na// bdag gi sku gsung thugs la tshang par gnas// gal te brjod pa'i mtha' bzhi yod na ni// don rdzogs sgom po yang yod bar gyur// lus sems rtse ba med bden pas// bsgom bu med pa
106a4(rnying rgyud): 'jog pa gang // don kun rdzogs shing chub par der gnas so// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// zags pa dkar dmar rlung ka lci// zla ba shes rab gsalta ba thabs chen te// thig le byang chub sems nyid dkar la 'char ba yi// dmar
106a5(rnying rgyud): pa yug gi rakya byang chub sems// rlung la shor du mi rtsal thig le skam d+ha swa// de las ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med// man ngag tshul du zla ba'i gzugs yin te// gsang ba'i tshul du yid kyi rnam shes nyid kyang zla ba yin// thig le sems
106a6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin snum la 'dril// man ngag len par byed pas sems kyi thig po yin// sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med// byang chub sems kyis dang 'dir dbang bskur ro// rang 'byung che ba'i ye shes mi 'gyur la// chos nyid rang gis
106a7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i rang bzhin la// dmigs bral ting 'dzin rgya mtshor rab stsal te// yid ni 'phags pa'i lam ni gnas pa ni// phra zhing zab pa bsnyen dka' rgyal ba'i sku// dran pa byed pa'i rtsol dang srog chags gsum// kun gzhi pad+mor yig 'bru gsal bar byed/
106b1(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyis dang 'dir dbang bskur ra// rgya ni skye ba med pas rnam par dag/ 'bras bu 'gags pa med pas byang chub sems// byang chub sems dam+b+ha mad ya shes dbyangs// glu mad ma 'gyur ma shags rnga rnga 'don// sems la rdo rnga sems dpa' rab tu
106b2(rnying rgyud): bsgom// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// 'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das// nam mkha' rdo rje snang ba ston pa'i sangs rgyas so// sa rdo rje chos nyid ye nas gnas pa'i sangs rgyas so// me rdo rje chos nyid rin po che'i sangs rgyas so// chu rdo rje snying rje
106b3(rnying rgyud): zin pos brtan pa'i sangs rgyas so// rlung rdo rje 'dod pa sgrol ba'i sangs rgyas so// 'byung ba bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur ro// dngos grub stsol pa rnam gnyis te// nges pa'i lung dang rang bzhin no// chos kyi dbyings pas mnga' brnyes nas// gang grwar bstab
106b4(rnying rgyud): kyang dbyings kyi don// chos kyi dbyings pa 'char ba dang // dbang chen dbang sgrar 'chi ba med// sprul pa kun du bzang po nyid// sgrib dang 'che bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// lhun gyis grub pa'i dbang chen ni// de yang sa gser zla ba me/
106b5(rnying rgyud): gser dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems// byang chub sems ni sa zhes bya// zla ba me dang 'dra ba yin// byang chub sems nyid kun du bzang // gsal zhing dro la nyon mongs sreg/ byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// don ni dbyings dang ye shes yin// yab sum
106b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis med rol pa yi// rak+ta byang chub sems dkyil na// ma skyes rdzogs pa'i he ru ka// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// yon tan phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa// gsang ba'i don gyis dbang bskur ro// gsang ba yum chen kun du bzang // rak+Sha byang chub sems
106b7(rnying rgyud): dkyil na// ma hA su kha'i dkyil 'khor dbyings// sems kyi thig les thig btab ste// dkyil 'khor zlum po 'khril pa la// chos kyi dbyings las spros pa'i sku// don gyi dbyings nas lha dang lha mo dgod// nges pa'i don gyis dbang bskur ro// nga dang rang bzhin pa dang
107a1(rnying rgyud): nyid chen po ste// lhun gyis rdzogs dang spros pa med pa 'i// thugs kyi dkyil nas 'byung ba rigs kyi pas// kun du dazang po yum dang don ci thabs can 'as// man ngag dang bcas pa ye ye shes snying po'i don// bcom ldan gsang ba'i mchogs dkyi
107a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor na// dpal chen kun du bzang po ye shes te// gseng ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// dkyil 'khor ma hA lu kha'i gnas// ma hA swa kha'i dbyings nyin na// byang chub sems nyid de kho na// yo shes chen po lhun gyis rdzogs nas gnas// mahA swa
107a3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba chen po 'di// don dang ldan te kun du bzang po yin// ngang las ma g.yos kun du bzang po ni// gnyis su med par rnam par dag pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskyang ro// yum gyi nags tshul chen po 'dul med du// rtag tu
107a4(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi dang du bzhugs// deng ni dus gsum bzugs shing rang bzhin 'byung ba med pa yin// bdag nyid 'dus ma byas pas skye ba med par lhun gyis grub// gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// srid pa byang chub sems sum bcas
107a5(rnying rgyud): thig ler zlum// sngar 'das dang ldan bzhugs dang phyis 'byung ba'i// sems nyid rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa rnams// nyon mongs dri ma ye nas med pa'o// ye nas sangs rgyas ma skyes lhun gyis grub// byang chub sems nyid gsang ba'i dbang bskur
107a6(rnying rgyud): ro// dpal chen kun du bzang po dbye ba med pa'i don// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las sprul pa med kyi 'gro// lhag pa'i ye shes bye brag gcig 'du // phyag rgyu 'gyur ba med pa rgyan gyi phyag rgya'o// su ni thams cad chos kyi sku ru 'dus// la ma ni thams cad
107a7(rnying rgyud): rol pas chub pa'o// yum gyi dbyings chen rang bzhin rnam par dag/ zas ni thams cad bdud rtsi lnga yi don// spyod pa bya ba med pa chen po'o// thugs ni rtog pa mi mnga' sa la ba'o// ldem dgongs don dam byang chub sems kyi do do// byang chub sems kyis
107b1(rnying rgyud): deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// rnar brgyud ston pas thugs brtol te// nges pa'i lung dang don yang sangs rgyas yin// sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyings su 'gro ba zhes// byang chub sems ni kun du rtag pa'i don// rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde ba chen po nyid// dbang
107b2(rnying rgyud): mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro// su rgyan 'khor lo lung chen zab mo nang nas gsal// lnga bzhi nang du 'khor ba yang // ye shes sangs rgyas de las med// lta ba 'di lA gnas shing rnal 'byor skal ba bzung // bder gshegs kun gyi thugs dam
107b3(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi don// don drim dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro// dbyings nas gsal shar bdal ba la// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'bum re yas// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yid la thim// 'greng ldog spyi'u tshugs gang 'gyur yang // gang
107b4(rnying rgyud): ltar byas pa byang chub sems kyi don// TIg le chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// smya na nag langs kyang khams gsum gsal// ye shes khrus kyi rdzing byur+ya// dri la dag pas rdul mi 'gro// dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro// dri nas bcom ldan 'das nyid las
107b5(rnying rgyud): glazhan pa'i 'khor rigs bzhis 'khor ba'i phra men ma dang / khro bo rdo rje bka'i pho nya rnams la bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang // de ring khyod la bskur bar bya// sangs rgyas rnams su grub bya'i phyir// rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long // shes rab thabs
107b6(rnying rgyud): na 'dzin// rnam po la drug pasmras smon ste/ sa na gyis// rdzogs 'dzin du gags par byed// dang ma tshig 'di nang // la 'i khrab \u0f7f/ sa kyis sa/
107b7(rnying rgyud): dpal chen dgod par bya// bra men 'khor dang gronyis bskor// de cu slob ma bzlog par bya// da nas rigs kyi mtshon rdo // rgyal sring da ni ring gi lus// rje nga chung sa nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid zad dbul// dbang ga
108a1(rnying rgyud): mchod na// dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzi dang dang dang gsang ba gsum gyis bka' stsal to// phyi'i dbang rin po che sna bdun la sogs te dbang rdzas lnga bcu rdza lngas dbang bskur ro// nang dbang dpal chen po
108a2(rnying rgyud): yab yum dang / khro ba dang ma men rnams kyi phyag mtshan gyis dbang bskur ro// gsang dbang thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems kyis dbang bsgyur ro// bcom ldan 'das te dra ka rol pags bzab mo las dang ga le'u ste bdun pa'o// / napa
108a3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sgra dang gsung nga thugs rdo rje las 'di skad // chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas kyis kyang mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sku gsung thugs mnga' ba'i rtags su dang po phyag rgya chen po drug dang ldan par bsgom mo// ngan
108a4(rnying rgyud): kun mkhyen ye shes kyis thags mkhas pa'i thugs rjes go shag gis phye la kun du steng gi ting nge 'dzin du bsgom mo// de nas rgya'i ting nge 'dzin du yi ge hU~M mthing nag las sgra stag nag 'jigs pa'i sku/ gsung gi drag shul spyod pa'i sngags/ thugs ting
108a5(rnying rgyud): nge 'dzin hUM mthing nag las 'phags pa'i skur bsgom mo// de nas he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khyil pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyes
108a6(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / grub pa rdzas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje bza' ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud rtsi btung ba'i tid nge 'dzin dang / lha'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
108a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje gsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dgyes pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i tang
108b1(rnying rgyud): nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du 'dus pa'i tingangange 'dzin dang / rtog pa 'joms pachen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul khrims rten pa'i ting nga 'dzin dang / dbu pargyan pa'i ting nge dzin dang / bden pa nyi oM ti 'dun
108b2(rnying rgyud): dang / sgra spogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dam chog gI ting nge 'dzin dang / lhun gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'bar ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gtum po dam pa'i ting nge dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'o/
108b3(rnying rgyud): nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lu gu chud kye ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje 'gugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje las kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / khrag 'bung chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje ltos pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng gdong chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bzhad gdod
108b4(rnying rgyud): chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje mtshon cha'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dur khrod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dregs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
108b5(rnying rgyud): dang / 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brgyal ba'i ting nge 'dun dang / rngam par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glo snying nang grol 'dren cing zla ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / cho 'phral gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / byin gyis brlabs kyi ti nge
108b6(rnying rgyud): dang / mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bcom ldan 'das he rug rol pa'i rgyud gsang ba zab mo las ting nge 'dzin gyi lewa~M ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa'i mnyes pa chen
108b7(rnying rgyud): po'i mtshad pa 'di tha~Md kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rje rje las byung // de la mchod pa dam pa ni// thig pa phyog sa bdag nyid brgal// dra nas gnyis tha~Mng zla yis ni// tha~Mng na 'jig rten gyi rje// gnyis su med par bskal bar bya// 'phrul /
109a1(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten mnyam skor bas// bdag nyid mnyes pas mchod par bya// mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dang // bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bral// bza' dang btung dang bca' dang bgo// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni// dkyil 'kho la na
109a2(rnying rgyud): dpral bar bya// mnyes pa'i mchod pa chen pos rab tu mchod// sha chen dang ni dri chen dang // ga pur raH/ dri rgyu dang // ma he rta dang khyi sha dang // nA ge ge rgya gshog pa can// 'di dag 'phags pa'i tshogs la dbul// pad+ma can dang dung can+da dang // ba lang can dang ri mo can//
109a3(rnying rgyud): 'di dag mnyes pa'i mchod par dbul// zhing gi rgyal mtshan sha chen tog/ ras chen dag gi bla res dang // zhing gi dbyug pa tsi t+ti'i tag/ til mar ngag tu bcas pa rnams// 'di dag mchod par dpral bar bya// mnyes pa'i mchod pas rab mchod na/
109a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus mngon sangs rgyas// phyi yi mchod pa dang nang gi mchod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las mchod pa gsang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las
109a5(rnying rgyud): byung ngo // bla med mi spang ba dang / bla ma bkur ba dang / sngags dang phrag tu rdzun mye 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la zhugs pa dang / gsang ba'i dzin du mi smra ba dang / rtsa ba lda sgrub pa dang / bsrung ba dang / gti mug dang / 'dod chags dag zhi slong nga
109a6(rnying rgyud): nga rgyal dang / phrag dag dag mi spang ngo // dkar gyi dmar gyi dri chen sha// dag pa'i snod bcud mi 'dor ro// yan lag bcu yi dam tshig ste// ye nas mnyams rtogs pas sbyar// bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig ni// rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur// mi spong mi
109a7(rnying rgyud): 'dir gnyis po na// yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'o// mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba ni// mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// mnyam rdzogs chen po thob gyur nas// 'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no// rtsa nyams pa yi phyal pa dag/ gsol nye ba
109b1(rnying rgyud): mi brtson dang // skad cig yud tsam smra mi byed// nyams bur skyes pa brjod mi lang // rtsa ba'i dam chag nyams 'gyur na// bslab pa thams cad nyams par 'gyur// yid du ma 'ong sna tshogs pa'i// 'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'dra// yan lag dam chog
109b2(rnying rgyud): nyams gyur na// 'bras bu med cing rin 'gror ltung // dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag nyid yin// rtsa ba'i dmachog lnga la ni// gtsug la gnyis dang brtse phrag gsum/ yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la// gcig la bcu
109b3(rnying rgyud): phrag gnyis su med// bsrung bar bya ba dang me spang ba brgya nyi shu/ dang du blang ba brgya nyi shu/ spyad par bya ba brgya nyi shu/ sbar sum brgya drug cu'o// dam tshig 'di rnams ma nyams na 'tshang rgya'o// nyams na dmyal ba yin par shes par bya'o// bcom ldan
109b4(rnying rgyud): la pa las ma ga zhen skye na pan/ na ma sa mas pa ral pa nyid kyi sku nga grus d+hA ts+tshang / byung bar bya ra rjid na ga // nga bar thu ltas@
109b5(rnying rgyud): ba du zhig mchis// spyad par bya ba du zhig mchis// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis he ru ka rol pa'i don bka' stsal pa/ dum bu gcig dang dam bu gnyis// gsum dang bzhi dang lnga pa dang // drug pa dang ni bdun pa dang // dum bu brgyud pa ra
109b6(rnying rgyud): tu grags// bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang // dmangs rigs bud med rigs ma ngas// dkar dang dmar dang dkar sngo dang // sngo dang de bzhin ser skya ste// thal ba'i mdog dang mdog mi sdug/ kha dog bdun du rab tu grags// nyi rim dang ni
109b7(rnying rgyud): glang po'i rgyab// 'khor ba de bzhin bya rog rjes// dung sde gcig dang dung gnyis dang // chag pa dang ni mtshams gyes pa// 'di dag thams cad rab brtags te// rab tu brtags de spyad par bya// shin tu mnyam pa'i sa phyogs sam// snyi ba'am
110a1(rnying rgyud): yang gas ba sa// thugs sum pa gagagan pa bltar// rga pa ma da da gaH// 'jung// blan pa rgyags ba / sa sa da du na mas bsas
110a2(rnying rgyud): gsang ge thub// byang gi phyogs bltas phyag por 'gyur// dpung ldan phyogs bltas sngags gru bskur// shar du bags na pa dag nying gsod// me mi tshogs bltas she'u shing med// 'og tu bltas na dran por spyod// steng du bltas ni blang srid gsod// khror
110a3(rnying rgyud): bltas de ni rags dan te// snod kyi mtshan nyid 'di rnams so// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste// dge bstsal ba'i snod dag ni// dum zug cig pa sa la dbang // gnyis pa de ni rgyal phran 'gyur// gsum pa de yang no la dre' // bzhi pa de yang sngags
110a4(rnying rgyud): skab 'gyur// lnga pa de yang chos kyang sgrug/ drug pa de ni spong ba yin// 'dran pa do ni brtul zhugs so// brgad pa yongs su spang par bya// rngam phrag cag pa zlum ze'i rigs// gnyis pa drin hral po'i rigs// gsum pa rjerje rigs yin pa pa/
110a5(rnying rgyud): pade ni dmangs rigs so// brag med dang mang ba ni// mkhas pas shin tu spang bar bya// bang drang ba dang srab pa dang // gang dran ser bar 'gyung ba na// bud med yid par shes par bya// thang med rab tu sadapas na// de dgra rab kyi spa dang bya/
110a6(rnying rgyud): ni dkar ba dang // kha dog sna tshogs spang bar bya// drang byed pa dang drang gnyi ba dag/ lha ma sbal bapa me bla du// bdag ga rtul to// sa na 'ang btsod 'gyur// byang ni gsong par 'gyu/ ba ba ni nang du 'gyur/
110a7(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ gsang ba sgrub thong mtshan nyid ni// yan lag tshe sra mang ba'i bdag/ dpaga'as pa shing ni yid / 'dad pa'i 'breb patho ba 'gyur te// sngags pa la tha chos med// sa ga shang yang/ rna
110b1(rnying rgyud): na ga stong zaganas padan// yang ba gru sa bya// dem mam na u sa/ da shAca nga pa// nga ba // del sku ba na mas med/ gas na dab bshAs/ /
110b2(rnying rgyud): zla'adra ba'i mdog/ sum la mnyam du lhag pa ni// sdug sa rnams thams cad 'grub ster yin// dbang phyug chen par shes par bya// thal ba'i mdog la pong yang che// pa d+hA'i dbyibs sa 'dab mar brtan// tshangs pa'i sred pa gsal ba yod// 'od dang mdas par byon
110b3(rnying rgyud): par bya// skang kyi ser 'i mdog 'dra ba'o// zhi ba'i thag les rnam par brgyan// khub 'jug pa yi snod yin te// zug du dgra rnams 'dzems par byed// kha dog dmar zhing wa ba la// bad+mod mar rabs brgyan pa dang // zlum pa shin tu rnam pa ste// sdong 'di gzhon/
110b4(rnying rgyud): ba zhes zla// cung zad ser zhing zlum la zab// gang dag rdo rje mtshan yod pa// de yi mtshan ldan gang yin pa// dbang phyug/ chen mo rigs chen yin// ngag mo'i gdod dbyings 'dra ba la// rab tu mkhregs shings tig 'gro// sha ya~M tri dag mnas pa yi// snod
110b5(rnying rgyud): bgag ngag zhes b+ha// sham+ba pa'i ma ga la ba yang ni// theg sa chen ma rnam par brgyan// ldeg 'a bri ba ye ldan pa pa// 'jig pa zad pa yi sto bas bya/ hrI ung pa shes smras nas// sabs / ga // da ba byed ni
110b6(rnying rgyud): bzangs ma// de la bgegs kyis tshugs mi 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// snod kyi dngos po khyad par ni// tshangs pa zlum ze bcang ba'i bya// rtag tu de mgru'i sbyin par rjod// sa pa chen po'i dus drug tsa// khyab 'jug da na 'byung ba na g+ha/
110b7(rnying rgyud): thalas rnams 'grub par byed// rgyal rigs kyis ni gzhon nu ma// pha rol yul ni rnam par 'joms// rje'u rigs kyis ning mchen mo// sgra dang ldan pas bzlog phyir bshad// gsad dang bsngal dang bstabs pa'i phyir// dmangs rigs kyis ni phag sa
111a1(rnying rgyud): bcang // las dang rigs rnams thams cad dang // 'jigs byed pas na dngas thab snyed// rab med papa bdan nyid mas// grub pa'i klad pa 'di shes pas// 'drab med pas bdag bsams te// rtag tu 'di dag spyad cing bzung // bdag pa
111a2(rnying rgyud): dngos sgrub skye ba ste// sngags pas de nas pa sha byung bya// i rnab ba to// badz+ra ba ya sA shan/ ba son ya~M ta ka pA la/ oM bi sha ya~M/ a be shA ya/ hU~M baT swAH/ thal ba dang / me tog dang / tshul ldan brgya rtsa brgyad snod la btab te spang bar bya/
111a3(rnying rgyud): ni rdo rje 'khor lo dang // mchod rten dang ni rin po che// badz+ra dang ni ljon shing dang // dbus na khra ka gnyis yod pa// mdun na gshong bu gsum dang gnyis// gang dag ni je mtshan yod pa// dpal dang ldan pa'i sngod gnas so// srabasu gcig pa dang srabs
111a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis dang // skabs gsum pa dang skyabs bzhi ba// wa dang drug dang bdun dang btung // dgra dang bcu dang bcu gnyis dgra/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te// bcu drug pa dang nyi shu drug/ 'di dag rab tu sbyang bar bya// bcom ldan 'das ha rbag
111a5(rnying rgyud): rol pa las kun du bzang po he ru ka rol pa stong brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas dbang phyug chen po brtul paba'i thabs 'di bcom ldan 'das pa// la kun du bzang po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di ldang ngo // ma hAH
111a6(rnying rgyud): chung ngur khyod mu hA rbu brgyad po'i dbang du bsdu ba'i mchod// phyi rol phyogs gar bde badris zhid chen spya ga d+ha 'os pa gcig tu maN+Dal blags te/ gnas rje dur khrod kyi bdag po chen bya'i rgya lugs ci ltar nyal tshigs bcad las kyang /
111a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin tshon gyis bris/ yang na thal ris dang / yid kyis bkod kyang rung / stana'i dkyil 'khor bsham/ de'i dbus su hom khung gru gsum pa zhig bskon/ rje slob dpon gyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bca' ste/ mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa'i
111b1(rnying rgyud): sngags la/ a sa ma hA tsa la ta mrat+ta tra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha~M zhes cung zad bsgoms pa'i rjes la// ma g.yo phyag rgya chen po dang // chos kyi sra las bzhengs pa yi// gnyis med phyag tshu rol pa yis// dras la bab po sa ma ya zhes brjod nas/ rnal 'byor gzhan gyi
111b2(rnying rgyud): 'di ltar byin gyis brlabs nas mkhas pa gcig gis las 'di bgyi/ dbang gi gtam rgyad bshad/ rgyud kyi gtsug lag chen po dang bden pa'i tshig gis bsgrags nas// 'phags pa thams cad bdag la gson// 'byung po mang po kun nyon cig/ thugs rje dang dang
111b3(rnying rgyud): shes rab dang // thabs la mkhas pa'i phrin rlabs kyis// 'gro ba thams cad spyod par mdzad// 'gro ba'i bdag po che dang srog/ gson po bde ba'i bar gcod pa// bdud dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun// bcom zhing gsung ba'i gnyen po ni// 'jam dpal
111b4(rnying rgyud): 'phrul gyi khro ba das// srid gsum mthar byed rngam pa dang // thod dbyug drag po mi mdzad pas// gshin rje bcom ste bsad nas kyang // ro yang lho yi 'dzam gling du// phor nas sa gzhi dur khrod kye// bdag po gdol pa drug po yis// ro yi ta la thabs gan
111b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal te// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa b+hang shar mtshams su bstan// de yang rlung zud bskol ba'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon ma thig mA la// khyi gnyis dang ni bya rgod do// thal ba'i mdog la skra skyed pa// de yi lus snying yan lag ni// ma mo chen
111b6(rnying rgyud): mo rnams kyi gnas// dur khrod chen po 'odadi dag go// de yi snying ni ma hA'i lte// dung khong chen po bsil tshal na// ma ma chen mo go rI ma// mkhas ma snying stobs che ba'i gnas// de yi mgo ni lho phyogs kyi// sing ga la yi gling phran na// ma mo chen mo tshang ma/
111b7(rnying rgyud): mthong thos rngam pa'i rdza 'phrul mnga'// lag pa g.yas ni shar lho mtshams// bal yul na ni muk+ka mi// 'khor dang longs spyod sgra tshogs ldan// lhag par zas kyi 'gyur pa me// lag pa g.yon na sgron ba mtshams// sa yi tshal na ba ta li// phyag ni rna
112a1(rnying rgyud): gnas/ smras mazung dang yang // nang pags bya ba ca gang bcab ba// byu// sma na pa blags pad// yang 'a bang dang sa sa// dang pa ga smon pa byung sa / das pas san//
112a2(rnying rgyud): mamo ha// bde sbyin ldan pa'i sa la gnas// somatshan snyeng gi byung phyogs na// u D+yan yul na gas // blo shas yongs spyod 'jug pas na// dngas thab can yang den pang // de nas spyan 'dakyil 'khor 'dir// thos te bsams nas dgongs parba// dzu
112a3(rnying rgyud): bdag pas 'angs pa dang // dbang du srung ba la brtsam gyis// pa ba rgyas sra ste byin bda' pa zhes sorjod do// den suM greng pa ro wA drar dbu g.yas su gzhag cing / mig gis grogs bzur bags te// 'jam pa sring ba 'a ba rten 'di/
112a4(rnying rgyud): skye sha gnas phreng zad kyi// rang bzhin yin rnam ga gsanas// sag ni drar 'o ga sas brtan// bdag gis med rjes na / 'a kyipa dzin bsams lag this pa'i sa bkas te/ de'i bdag pa la sdigs pa'i byer ma
112a5(rnying rgyud): g.yas byo zhing sdang mig drag tu bzang // thig gi 'bras bu dril la/ sarba ba bkar he rug/ byis na ma ta~M ka ru dz+ra hU~M phaT/ rigs la'i 'thor dang bcas pa khro ba'i ngang du gyur te/ bdag dang 'dra bar bsams la/ de nas 'bring rngam pa la sar
112a6(rnying rgyud): bsdigs la/ lag pa g.yas pa bsnyed sor mo gyenu d+ha bgrAd la ba yA)/ tsi ta dza la hU~M phaT ces brjod nas lag pa sta bud d+ma bzhag cing lag pa g.yon pa rngam pa bzhin dranra gyen du bteg la/ pedzA ke shi n+na ta dz+wa la hU~M phaT ces brjod la rdzas pA'i
112a7(rnying rgyud): 'dus jus cugatags sa ma sa nga ma ma las
112b1(rnying rgyud): badz+ra ka ba tsa zhes brjod nas go bgo bar bsams te/ gnas lngar bsrung zhing / oM na ma d+hu ba bi/ spyi bor thal mo sbyar te/ sarba bud+ha mu dra sa~M ha ra na/ a g+hi shiny+tsa hU~M phaT ces brjod pas su cir yang 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bcas te/ rkang lag bzhi tshogs
112b2(rnying rgyud): bskum mgo mgrin 'khrel cing bsgril la hU~M zhes tshig 'bru drag pos g.yas g.yon du lta ba'i tshul drag po re re bgyi/ sum b+ha ni sum bu hU~M zhes drag tu brjod do// rdo rje dril bu gsil te/ brkyang bskum bsgred la 'gying zhing dkyil 'khor phyogs su
112b3(rnying rgyud): mangs la/ khams gsum nas 'byung sems can rnams// de de sgra la khyad par gyis// 'od byer tshul dra bkrus nas sa // de dag bdag gi lus la gzung // grob rdo rnarnams cad kyi// lha dang ye shes mchog gis bya// thar pa'i pa sred dpe la
112b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'dir// brod pa can rnams dang ba skar// skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu// bde bar 'ongs pa legs pa 'ongs// rtse rgyal bstan pa'i gnas chen 'dir// rbo h+Na si d+ha'i gnas nyid du// khams gsum 'khor ba kun bsdu'o// chos nyid skye 'gag ce
112b5(rnying rgyud): pa las// dbyings su thim pas gnyis su med// kun gyi ngo bo mnyam nyid de// thams cad snying po byang chub las// ma skyes pas na 'gag pa 'jig/ bdag nyid med pas mnyam pa'i sgra// thugs rje chen po cir mi mdzad// sems can ma rig rmongs pa'i
112b6(rnying rgyud): blos// bdag dang bdag gis so sor phye// log rtog phyin ci log bzhis bcings// 'khor ba rgyud lnga yi kha brims// mya ngan mi 'dang yan rings te// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// sku yi la bu phyogs brgyar brtse// gsung gis mtha' yas
112b7(rnying rgyud): sems can sgrol// thugs ni tshad med pazhi dang ldan// sgra gsum 'gro ba'i tshal ston pas// dus la ba'o pa'i sems can dag/ yas la bab pa'i rnal 'byor bas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// thugs rje sngags kyus 'jug nas ni// yang dag nyid
113a1(rnying rgyud): yang dag grol// yang dag bsgral nas bde chen thob// mi ldogs la nges par phyin// phyin pa tsam gyis dbang thob nas// rgyal ba'i zhing khams dbyings nyid mthong // klung drug gnas su mi skye phyir// dpa' bo dbu lngas lam lha dgag/ phung po khams drang skye
113a2(rnying rgyud): mched rnams// 'khrug pa'i bag chags bag la nya ma// bde 'gro lam la sbre pa'i rnams// ye shes 'bar ba'i mes bsregs te// mtshan nyid med par sdod par 'gyur// sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT gyis phaT// gsang ba'i dbyings su tra~M gis pas// srung bskyed ye shes
113a3(rnying rgyud): srung bsdus pas// 'og min gnas mchog dam pa rgya// chos kyi 'khor lo sbyor zhing gshegs// stong gsum pa lus gdon pa ni// 'bum gyi char yang mi phod de// skyes dri chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis// bskal pa dbang zhing snying rje'i mchog/ tan thos dgra bcom
113a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal dang // sa bcu byang chub sems dpa' pa// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pas mchod// de nas 'gying zhing dkyil 'khor phyogs su mchongs la// ma tang gi gnas dang lung gi tshul du spros pa bzhin gsal bar bsgoms te/ de'i 'khor 'byung po mang po yang mngon du
113a5(rnying rgyud): bkug par bsams te/ rkang pa gnyis bsnol ba'i drung du phyin nas byang shar mtshams su kha bltas te// bdag nyid brkyang bskum gyi tshul du 'greng la/ mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings la/ gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis bcad// sems kyi bdag pos
113a6(rnying rgyud): bzad dam che// gzung 'dzin na lag bsnol ba'i sgo// yul las 'das pa'i zhabs kyis kye// de nas hU~M phaT pra be sha hU~M phaT/ rkang pas shig gis kyi bar bsam// de nas lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje gsum pa'i phyag ca// yo pa'i 'dzu seng ga pa
113a7(rnying rgyud): he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sa rbaMrba dut+tA ne sa ma ya mu dra pra d+han hU~M phaT swA hA/ zung mthar byed kyis gzung / las mthing byed gang gis mnan nas kha phyogs su bsdus te/ brjing bsum du brjing la e a zhes brjod pa/ lcags sus snying gar sku phye bar bsam/
113b1(rnying rgyud): mag pa nga// nga gags shAn ca pagagis/ ga zug ma / kyabang bab sa/ gams rbab cas / ba snga la po bya/ / du// kun / A bas ru d+ha
113b2(rnying rgyud): glar gyigs ste 'do shing skye ba'i snyoms mya stong la/ shin chung mang po ge ba'i phyogs bzhi dadod // sreg hU~M chog tu spyod cing / gangasug yod du lan cig tu gang gyis paskong bar bya'o// de nas snying po 'did dpar bya'o// sa @
113b3(rnying rgyud): a ma d+ha raM/ shrI ma hA ka pA la/ \u0f7f gyi/ padz+ra ka d+ha raM/ badz+ra d+ha ra~M/ badz+ra mu trA lA~M ba d+ha d+hi/ zhes brjod do// de nas pang kyi tshul du snying gA phyogs su song la/ dum tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas ci ltar bde ba gtor ma smin par mthun pa ni shes rab ma la
113b4(rnying rgyud): sa
113b5(rnying rgyud): 'phros te/ phyi'i rnal 'byo dgug cing stan drang ba'i phyag rgya gsal ba las 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang ngo // mi gsang ba'i gsang ba chen po chos nyid kyis bskas pa dang / sku gsung thugs che ba'i yon tan gyis bskal pa dang / bdag nyid chen po
113b6(rnying rgyud): grub pas bskal lo// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa gsang ba zab mo'i don bdud 'dul ba'i le'u sa bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis he dra ka'i las hU~M bzlas pa 'di su dang gsu dang thugs rdo rjelas 'a byung /
113b7(rnying rgyud): rjes thod byung ba// de bzhi gshegs pa'i gsung ba las/ 'groba'i tshul du srid 'byung // 'ams pa thams car bya// shi cu gro zhing ga par gyur// shad tu khro drug gtum pa dang // zhi bas ngan par ming gyur // shes
114a1(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi po yis// khro bas de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// sangs rgyas thugs rjes khros pa yis// thams cad 'jigs pa'i mchog yin te// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dam tshig la spad nam spar phyir// dur khrod gar
114a2(rnying rgyud): phrag tur gastsal// b+h+rUM bzhis te drug pasgom/ rgyas rdzag la sogs pa bcoM/ sa sed tA la sogs pa bcwom/ kyis sgo bral logs pa bsgos/ hUM hU~M phan gyis ting nge 'dzin panas/ sngags 'dis sung d+hi ngo // ba ba nas sa ye mrang
114a3(rnying rgyud): pra b+han tsakra hU~M phaT/ oM h+ye ti b+ha ga pad+ma/ raHhU~M ba hoH/ drAm su sa/ dzaHhU~M ba hoH/ e h+ye hi hrI sha ho sa ma la to/ u h+ye)Ar+ya li Sh+Thi k+Shing / dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// wang gshegs chung gshegs te rbag/ rjes phra zhi ba'i dang las ma g.yos
114a4(rnying rgyud): gzugs sku 'jigs tshul bstan du gsol// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas// gdug pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol// tshogs rje tshogs bdag dpal dang ldan// tshogs kyi slob dpon gshegs su gsol// ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad pa pa las// sgra
114a5(rnying rgyud): pa mang po 'i tshogs dang gshegs// oM shrI he ru ma hA badz+ra/ sarba duSh+Ta~M sa ma ya mu dra pra be sha ya shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ oM dzaHhU~M baM hoHshrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+paM si mA ya thA/ hA pra b+ha na tsakro hU~M phaT/ bder gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'ad // 'gro ba ma lus
114a6(rnying rgyud): bskal ba'i phyir// don gyi dbang du dgongs nas kyang // 'khor bca sngo rab 'bar gshegs su gsol// oM shrI he ru ka ma he pa dz+ra sarba s+yA mi ya hi// sarbe ruSh+ma kA pA bAka tsi t+ta badz+ra hU~M phaT/ sems can don gying nan tan mchog bskyed cing // ye shes thugs rjes
114a7(rnying rgyud): bdag la dgongs nas kyang // mi gnyis don phyir dngos grub mchog gi rnams// bdag cag stsal cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM shrI tsi ru ka ma thA badz+ra serba dutwAM se ma yaM mu dz+dza a ma ba stam b+ha ka hU~M phaT/ oM pra rtsi gas pa raM/ suHtri sha sa ma la/
114b1(rnying rgyud): baT ga \u0f7fjigs ma pa d+hi/ dam byugs pa bzhengs pa pa// dpa' can khrag 'thung la blong dang babs// nam chag tshul bzhin ma gshegs sam// skab la zlog dgam smrasan// sku gsung thugs dang 'gal ba'o// tu rba hU~M draka ma tra badz+ras rba gas byab
114b2(rnying rgyud): mu dra pra dz+nyAn tsakra b+hak+Sha ya bA k+Sha ya be d+hogs pa pi togs la/ te b+ha ga byan/ br-id+d+ha NAM tra~M pra ti stA ma b+ha ka hU~M phaT/ sku gsung thugs su bdag spyong bas// pi zang dkyil 'khor rang las sprul// nga ni bdud kyi bdud bdag ste// mkha 'gro tshogs bcas bdus pa'o//
114b3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kar mu kA sha ra yA yan paH/ oM badz+ra gA sa ma yA ya na maH/ yau shrI bad+ha kha T+wA~M ga pra ma yA la na maH/ oM mI gan d+ha dzA yA ya na maH/ a ti pra ho/ pra ti pra to/ ta thA b+han d+ha na~M ka r-i yaM mI ma hA yo gaM ne/ i te pre ta/ pra tibA ho/ bdag med phyogs dra la don dram
114b4(rnying rgyud): thugs chud cing // byams dang snying rje sgra thun mi mnga' yid// gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las li 'da' ba'i// 'dogs byed he ru kA la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med cing // 'dod dgung sbyar pa'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che// ma sri blam
114b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul gyis 'grogs mdzad ma// phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHshrI he ru ka ya hA i dan pu ya ti bA lin ta/ pra ti dzaM ho/ shrI ba nra kha kha khA hi khA hi dzaHhU~M ba~M toHshrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra a be sha ya/ bu be sha ya/ hU~M khA ti/ he
114b6(rnying rgyud): ka yi gnas bcu dang // dur khrod chen po gnas brgyad nus// dpal chen 'khor bcas spyan drangs te// dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru// zhing chen gsar d+hi ra tI rar bcas// dmar gyi ad+ha rgya mchod ba skyil// mkha' 'gro 'bang pa'i tshogs bcas kyi waM// ma ru
114b7(rnying rgyud): gshegs shing bsdams su gsol// dzaHhU~M baM hoHshrI he rA ka ma hA badz+ra sarba dra Sh+Ti pa ma yaM mu dra pra b+han dzakra/ pa kha khA hi khA hid lan pi ba hU~M phaT/ da ni za byed chen po ste// khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar bya// gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir//
115a1(rnying rgyud): na/ g+hus lda sa bya// ga pa sa su ngas pa pa/ brnams / / shAn / d+hAbanas sprul pa la// rang 'drang na da ga sa/ 'a myong 'gyur ba/
115a2(rnying rgyud): rigs lha dam tshig lnga yid do// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// rgyud lnga'i sems can kun spol pa'o// dug d+ha sel ba'i bdud rtsi ste// phyogs brgya sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs che kyai// thugs dam byil kyi bsgra
