115a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i mchog/ stu ga bye thugs byed nyid di// bdug cig dang pas 'dul legs na// rA nas te srin dud kyis me de la// 'phrul gyi dngas su ba dgal spyo // oM sarba tathA ga r+b+he aN+Di // dpal kA nga // yul tsha /
115a4(rnying rgyud): la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bral// bzhes te kun du dges mdzod pa// 'phrub gyi dngos grub bdag la stso// oM sarba~M ta thA gA tA ma d+hA ar+g+haM ho// dpal chen badz+ra hU~M ru da // dz+ra bA d+hI shwa rI la// dem tshig gi brjod pa bus// dpal
115a5(rnying rgyud): chen dat+na he ru dang // badz+ra kro d+hi shwa ri la// dam tshig mchog gi mchong pa 'bul// dpal chen pa d+ma te rba dang // pa k+ko d+hI shwa ri la// dam tshig mi chog gi mchod pa'i bul// dpal chen karma te ru dang / karba ko tI shwa ri la// dam tshig chog gi mchod pa 'bral// a~M saH
115a6(rnying rgyud): tathA gu tAM mA hA i d+hi pra tits+tsha hi// dpal chen mi pham rdo rje dang // ma tshogs dbang phyug 'khor gyi tshod// gau re l-i sogs brgyad rnams dang // sing ha la sogs brgyad rnams la// dam tshig ma chog gi mchod pa 'bul// ma mo chen mo bdun rnams dang // sring mo
115a7(rnying rgyud): chen mo po ni rnams dang // sakhang 'gro 'khor bcas thams cad pa// dmachog mchog gi mdzad pa 'phrul// bzhes te kuni dra kyis mdzod pa// thub gyi dang mi grub bdag la spo // oM sarba tathA ga tAm / dz+ra ban khe ta/ ra
115b1(rnying rgyud): zan sems dpa' 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang / dpal chen po shrI he druH/ badz+ra DAk+ki dwe la bor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo mched lcam dral 'khor gyi mtsho dang bcas pa thams cad dgongs su gsol lo// de gnas
115b2(rnying rgyud): dam pa 'dir 'phags pa thams cad mchod pa dang / rdo rje mched l+h+wam+b+ha dral phyogs bcu ni bsregs pa dang / da ltang bzhugs pa'i thugs dam bskang ba dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i gnas su bskul pa'i phyir rgya mchog rkang ban+de po zhig yon du 'bral zhi
115b3(rnying rgyud): mchis na/ thugs rjes bzung zhing bsgral du gsol lo// rgya mchog 'di thugs rjes bzung nas ma bsgral na/ 'di la spyod pa zhig mchis te/ rnal 'byor theg pa'i gzhung las kyang tshul bzhin du ma bgyis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshad ma khyad du bsad pa
115b4(rnying rgyud): dang / rdo rje slob dpon dang / mched dang lha mra dral la dran sems dang dpya sems bskyed pa dang / mched la 'khrus pa dang / do ma las 'das pa dang / sba lo dang sgra gsog/ brdzun dang kha gas ga/ phyi tshul dang rgyab nyan bgyis nas rdo rje skyob dpon snying nas sdod cing bla ma la dbang
115b5(rnying rgyud): zos pa dang mnyam pa'i spyod yul sun phyung ste/ sbyor sgrol sgo bkag pa dang / dad pa can gyi tshogs bcag ste/ gdung sems kyi rgyun bcad pas phrag dog dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi gdung 'tshob pa'i bar chad kyis da ltar ngan song gi gnas na 'khyams shing rtog pa
115b6(rnying rgyud): dra bas ni bcings/ 'khor ba'i rtas ni byin nas dmyal khams kyi gnyid brgyad par nges te/ zhing bcu dang ldan pa 'di dam tshig tshul bzhin du bsgral pas/ 'di'i rnam par shes pa bla na med pa'i gnas su bskal ba yang gnas stobs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/
115b7(rnying rgyud): lnga phung gi yan lag ni kun du bzang po mchod pa'i sprin phung du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dgyes pa'i rang du thim par sbron to// smon lam brjod de bskal bar bya'o// spyi gtsug tu oM/ lag pa kA yas pango swA/ g.yon pa pa hA/
116a1(rnying rgyud): ga d+h+waM/ lus pa so// Umad+hAm+b+ha pa r+m+ma/ ts+tshan+d+haH taH/ sapa pa d+ha/ oM dz+ran d+hastIHdraka ya mA dz+r-i phA/ oM ba ga tang phyug/ o p+na nga? g-i rta ga/ tun t+yan d+hAs/ brgyagadon ladA dA ha dad+g+ha sa/ au hrAH ba ta p+tA s+yA / k+Sha paH@
116a2(rnying rgyud): dz+haiM Ta/ oM badz+ra kr-i ti AH a tsa la ba~M d+hA bid+yA hU~M phaH/ oM badz+ra bau d+hAt+ta pa g+h+ra~M badz+ra wa nu br-i hU~M thA/ oM ba~M dz+ra gr-i d+ha a pa tsi dz+nyA tiH taSh+ThahU~M phaT/ oM badz+ragr-i d+ha ya mr-i ti praN+DA la~M dzAhU~M d+d+hoH hU~M )/ oM badz+ra wa~M nI k+She lo ts+yai bi dza ya tid dab+hinA da trU~M phaT/ oM ba dz+reH d+ha mahA ba
116a3(rnying rgyud): la s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hU~M phaT/ ma ma ma ma/ po bo bo bo/ dzaHdzaHdzaHdzaH/ mi 'gyu na pa mkha'i rang bzhin las// gzugs snang rtog pa rnam par bsgribs// bag chags ma lus sbyong ba'i phyir// khams gsum ma lus bskal bar bya// nga ni bro byed chen po ste// sems can
116a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad gsad par bya// ma skyes phyir yang gsad par bya// rnam shes hU~M gis bsdus nas kyang // sha rus la sogs bza' bar bya// da ni khrag 'thung chen po ste// 'khor ba'i dra bas chags pa yi// dmar chen dag gi rgya mtsho la// 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro tshogs dang
116a5(rnying rgyud): rol// madrangs gdug pas ma chags shing // dAm tshig pa snang dgra chen rnams// thugs rje byams sems ldan pa yis// do mu thon stobs kyis bsgral bar d+ha// pra be sha ya phaT/ tsi ta hU~M/ sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya
116a6(rnying rgyud): ho b+ha ga bAn bi byA d+h+wa dza ya~M d+h+waM/ A na ya hU~M/ badz+ra DA ki ni/ A phyag/ s+phu ra nA phaT/ badz+ra yu tI dza/ drag po las kyis bskul ba'i rnams// 'khor po'i lam lnga sgo par gcad// rna ma shes hU~M gis bsdus brngubs nas// 'og min gnas mchog bla med 'dang /
116a7(rnying rgyud): gtso ba lnga dang ga tso mo lnga// sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang // khro bo dang ni khro mo yi// byung ba'i zhums su phaT gyis 'phang// zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun// skad cig phud la brlag mdzad de// brlag par ma gyur ga
116b1(rnying rgyud): phyang med// 'dod chags rdo rdulabor bcas rnams// 'jig rkyen largyas ni rab rnam za // lud tsam thos dri dbang mdzad de// dang dum pra dA gang yang bad// ngan ma rdo rje 'khor bzlas dpyas// 'jig nyid khams de rab 'tham kya// dpal ldan gzi brjid rdzun
116b2(rnying rgyud): po rnams// bud tsam gyis ni rgyas par mdzod// gti mug rdo rje 'khor brngas rnams// 'jig rten khams ne ba 'brum kun// yud tsam gyis ni zhi mdzad de/ zhi bar gyur pas dbyings la rol// bdag cig pazed lham dral rnams kyis rdo rje slob dpo dab
116b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang / phrag dog gi dbang gis mched l+h+wam dral ngan sems dang dbye sems bgyis pa dang / kanyed dbang gis le lor gyur pa dang / sems g.yengs pas sngags dang phyag tu byung zag pa dang / dam tshig dang du len rngom thogs pas sdad pa'i dang
116b4(rnying rgyud): tshig nyams so 'tshal thams cad mthol zhing bshags so// rgya mchog rkang bzhi pa 'di zin las rnam bzhis bskal ba yang gnas stobs par smon to// bdag cag mched lham dral ring tshogs pa rnams kyis yid la rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par gyur cig
116b5(rnying rgyud): shrI he ru ka byA sha na/ badz+ra be ra ba na shan/ badz+ra kar dz+wa li ta/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha bu lu ru lu hU~M phaT/ ud ta ke sha pra le ban/ sha ta sha pra dra/ sha ma ba ran shra ma lA ha ha ha hUM/ kur bau/ badz+ra ka ra mo/ badz+ra ka ra na tA/ hrI sh+tsa la a gu dzA/ pa ra sha na su sho
116b6(rnying rgyud): sA ma/ pra yo ma hA tsan+ta/ swa re ba ru sa/ ku b+he dA na/ ni rA pA pritsi ti mA d+hA k+Shu rma nad/ shrI he ru ka tan ti/ la la gan du sa twa ma ha dA ya ku ka te/ kra sha la ri mo ta/ b+he ram+b+ho/ gan ta ge na ta/ kar ta ka/ ga bo dza la ni/ bzar ti ba ta/ ko shA bi shA l+yA/
116b7(rnying rgyud): es dpa da// ming gra da nga/ ba / tu ga/ sa ngas nas dang / baisugs ngas la/ dpa dang / bkang ba/ bahA/ yangs par/ marje rdul
117a1(rnying rgyud): t+yaSh+Ta/ 'od nan// bshel cad/ thapad+ma/ rab tu/ ba tag pa raSh+Ta/ bdangs pa// mang dang/ // tha par thub nam \u0f7f/ byang byas ba
117a2(rnying rgyud): pa/ oM e ga r+b+ha ba sha d+ha sa~M ma yA bAr+b+ha tra~M/ sas r+g+ha la hU~M d+d+hodz+dza/ kha ra ba ti ho/ mdzad pa bral/ bshags pa kyi/ smon lam gdab/ phyogs bcu thang bras bu me pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' 'a' tum ma dang bcas pa dang /
117a3(rnying rgyud): dpal chen pa shA te drag badz+ra Ta kI nI tshigs kyi dmachog gi sa~M si lu gzhes pa'i dang gnal 'byor dang / po grubs pa sogs te/ med kyi 'khor bsam gyis mkhang pa la sogs par thug pa bzang ba ga la 'chis pa'i dpags pa thams ca da
117a4(rnying rgyud): dge 'dzin skal 'chang du gyur pa'i me la sogs te/ sprul pa sna tshogs sra bzhengs nas slob dpor byas pa bzhungs shing sems cad bye ngan mdzad pa la/ bdag rtag mched lha mjal 'dir chags pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i zhal zas 'di dag tshal bzhin/
117a5(rnying rgyud): byin gyis pa rlabs nas 'bral bas mtha' yas pa'i sa rdzas can thams cad ye shes rna ma sa non/ dmachog nyams pa thams cad grangs par snar nas sa song thags dam rmongs par stod to// rnal 'byor lnga rabs su tsho 'das pa rnams
117a6(rnying rgyud): rnam gnyis ni byang tshogs gnyis ni rdzogs// bdag drug gi skyong grogs su gyur cig/ bdag gis snga skad dam rdzas bskal ba dang / sems can gyi srog bkram mo 'tshal thams cad kyang mi shes dpa gis bskal zhing rnal 'byor gyi skalnga pa cam
117a7(rnying rgyud): cig/ bdag cag rnams kyi tshe snga ma nas da ltar gyi slob dpon du gyur pa dang / rgyad gcig cing yi dam gcig pa'i thugs dam la mangs par phog pa dang / bdag gi snying rje drangs pa'i gyen gyis 'phags pa thags dam bskal pa'i rtsal
117b1(rnying rgyud): dmas pa dang / gnang bang dang pas pham par gyung ba dang / gta phrag ma tshor ba'i rgyan gyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rkyen ma brjod do/ lus ngag yad gsum gyis sems dbugs nas ma yin pa'i zhes smra ba dang / spyod lam pa mkhas pa
117b2(rnying rgyud): dam chog gi lha dang / slob dpon dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / rdo rje mched lha ma rdal thugs dam kyi lha yal par bzhag nas dngos grub thams cad 'phang bar gyur pa dang / mkhyen gsal gong ma rnams dang bral ba'i chen gyis mchod pa \u0f7f
117b3(rnying rgyud): snyud mi gcig pa dang / mchod pa ma yin pa'i grogs po la brter nas rgyan ma gtsug pa dang / bsod nams 'das pas rtsal chad mar gyur te/ lde po dang btang snyoms kyi dbang du gyur nas thag pa rje'i gnas su mthur te/ ye shes lha dang srang
117b4(rnying rgyud): mi rnams 'phung bar gyur ba dang / cang 'ben gyi chos kyi gdungs nas bdapa yo byad dang bral te/ nyes pa bsags pa'i cha shes dang / mchod byin mi chung ba'i slob pa dang / ba de med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskrad pa las gcos gzong pol
117b5(rnying rgyud): bsamab pa yin pa da 'dud/ shin tu dag bda' bar thur ba dmus rdzas su dran zhing gnong ba'i sems kyis mthol zhir bshags so// bshags kyi 'din brjod pa rnamachis car bu dang sa tshor ba dang bag tshogs zang bar smos // sa rlo
117b6(rnying rgyud): ba dang chung byung bas byor ma ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur cig/ lha dang slob dpon gyi dbang dang sngon ci ltar dkyil 'khor gnang ba dang / mi sgrol zhing dngos grub rnam bzhi yang thob par gyur cig/ skyon brjod pa thams cad dang bral zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba
117b7(rnying rgyud): bsags pa rnams yin tad tshad ma bzhin thob par gyur cag/ de na 'i chags kyi gtor ma gtang / a shaH rba ka ma hA badz+ra DAb+ha kai na/ gro / badz+ra tsi ta/ bang pra mo ta/ badz+ra ba ta le/ badz+ra phrag sa/ badz+ra b+had+ha rA/ t+ta / du
118a1(rnying rgyud): sha na/ barba te grags pa yA ga ga nga/ sa r+d+ha kaswA/ rba mas d+d+hon+tu/ dang ga pa'i 'dra las mtshon nas kyang // ma thogs dang thug stan 'dun gyis// das kyi gatshal bzhi gshegs su byung la// thal mo ban yas ma
118a2(rnying rgyud): snang// ma tshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis// dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegasus gsol// pra yi bad yis mtshon nas gang // pa tshogs dbang zhug sman 'dren gyis// dri ma rdzog tshul bzhin gshegs su gsos// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba
118a3(rnying rgyud): yis// 'od zer 'du 'phro klong dkyil na// sku ni dud kha chen po la// zhal gsum po la phyag drug ste// gnag dang mtho ga dmar ba'i dbu// g.yas kyi gsum na thogs pa ni// rdo rjes bkug cing zhal du gsol// khyung gi khu chen 'bar ba'o// g.yon
118a4(rnying rgyud): pa gsum na thogs pa ni// sti ra'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang // bod rnon dmar gyis bkang ba dang // s+thir phra mo gsus pa nas// sgo snying rdang grol babyin cing na// glang chen ko blonags su sngon// zhing lpags g.yang gzhi sham thabs can// zong rngon phreng bas rgya
118a5(rnying rgyud): byas// ma lus padag g+hasar+b+ba dragaso lnga// rmA las byung bas de bzhin gshegs// skyon ni ma neng drin mdzad pa// 'jug pa'i gnasas yud tsam // rnams ca khon dbang mdzad mdzod// srangs shig myur d+ha rgyal dpal// thal ba bzhin du rab
118a6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// rol cig dgongs shig bzhin gshegs// sA ra na tas/ 'gyu ba'i shini zan pas zhem// dbyung po'i thug ni chang bas zham// 'byung po'i dus babyipa pa ste// thams cad gsol te dbes par mdzod// dpal chen d+ha d+yak+Sha/ mkha' 'gro 'drar
118a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdzogs cheran ro// shin tu me bzad 'jigs pa'i gzugs// nam mkha'i khams can khyab par sprul// lteng nag gcer bu ral ba can// mi tshogs rjon pa gos spyon// thal ba'i mtshan mas rgyags pa ste// khrag dang zhag ga thig les brgyan// phre
118b1(rnying rgyud): ba yang sa can du byas// lag na dri shA mthod pa dgas// drag gsusu bshigs par dngam bcus pa / na ma byung rtag pa'i tshul// dub byams cad spyod bad pa// da tu byas dam ngas la dab/ spyod rten na byung nga byu ga/ thas ga
118b2(rnying rgyud): gtanan rdzu // thams cad gcig tu bzlas da nga// rdul da bzhin nu bad+hag pa dang // seMms nyid dag pa chen po po// dam tha pa ni dgod par 'dzid// dal 'byung bad mchog smram sa sgrag// mchog dge la 'jog ceg po la// hor mas kya
118b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal par mdza// ma lus pa dag padangs su gsapa// rnam pa sgra chags 'a thugs rgyad kyis sangs da mya sa lus pa med par 'byu las pa/ de ba dug shegs pa pan kyi mkha' 'gra ba mchag sngams thams cad rab sngal rnam par sgru/
118b4(rnying rgyud): nA d+he baM hU~M/ rnam pa sna tshogs dag pa'i rgyud kyis sems can mra lus lus pa med par 'dul 'khas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bran gyi mkha' 'gro sgra ma'i bye batshag thams cad rab ldan nA pAd+yA hU~M/ rnam pa mtshogs khro ba nyid
118b5(rnying rgyud): sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu mus thams cad rab sngal rngam par sprul// ru lu dr-i lu trUM b+h+yo hUM/ rnam pa sna tshogs thabs kyi rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul
118b6(rnying rgyud): mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kunas mkha' 'gro rnams thabs cad rab sbal rnam par sbal// hU~M me sha tru~M bai sha b+h+rU~M// na ma rA tra~M yA ya/ dza ma d+hiH badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha sa na bA ta ye/ taHthA/ e tse hi snga ma ya/ A na ya
118b7(rnying rgyud): na ti/ bcug tu/ bcwa ma tho bcug/ bdu du gyur/ ta ba te/ 'jug te/ bdag sa / // tung/ u rab/ bcwa pa / bdun tang / brdargya la/
119a1(rnying rgyud): na la mA/ badz+ra grI ta/ badz+ra mu kring / badz+ra ka lam/ badz+ra As su/ badz+ra ma ka rang wA/ badz+ra bar+Na raka/ ku na la/ h+yA ta kha/ sarba a/ shA sa kha/ sarba mU A kAr+N+Na ya/ za ba shwa ya/ b+han thA ya b+han d+ha ya/ sarba nA ki n+da rban// ma sa
119a2(rnying rgyud): li ma nu swa ra ya phaT/ me yi sran mo tshangs ma dang / khro bo dang ni 'jug sred me// gzhon nu ma dang dbang po dang // rdo rje dmar mo bdud rtse mo// zhi ba ma dang po tson mo// zin mo dang na zab mo// rdo rje dga' ba mo dang ni// shin t+ya aka 'thang mo// gcig pu sprod dang
119a3(rnying rgyud): yid 'phrog mo// grub mo dang ni rlung mo dang // rdo rje yang ni gsod chen mo// me mo phag mo rgan byad mo// sna chen mo dang chu lha mo// rdo rje nag mo chen mo dang // rdo rjer ste dmar ser mo/ rdo rje sngo nag bum rna mo// rdo rje dmar ser dril 'khrol ma// ma mo chen mo khyed rnams sus/
119a4(rnying rgyud): ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// ye shes thob par bya ba dang // bsgrub pa rnams kyi las bya zhes// rdo rje byin nas ming btags te/ dam bcas bzhin du he ru ka/ da ltar khyod kyis gzugs mchog rnams// mngon par ston la
119a5(rnying rgyud): grub pa 'phrul// ci snyed grub mchong ma phul zhing // khyed rnams mngon du ma gyur na// rab tu stana'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'dug la las rnams kun gyis shig/ oM padz+ra ba da mu mu ka/ a kaR+Sha ya/ A kaR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sh+tsa ya/ badz+ra d+ha ya/ barba d+ha ya/
119a6(rnying rgyud): to sha ya tai sha ya/ badz+ra DA ki d+hI hr-id ya na/ oM oM hU~M/ gtor ma dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bsu la kha d+han d+ha dang ngas chen gyis bcad la rta mgrin dbang gi phyag rgya bcas la mchod do// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las/ khro bo bskyed rdzogs las
119a7(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa'i le'u sa bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyud // zhi ba'i mchog gtan phreng ba'i drin las rab bsdus pa/ tshad med snying rje skyed pa dang // byang chub sems
119b1(rnying rgyud): glu // ngas / sa su rdzu/ / smras / ga m+WA sa banas su sa// nganas na ma /
119b2(rnying rgyud): ni bran las dang // ngas dang gnas dang bdag dag/ thanas mtshogs pa bdun pa ste// bta na ci da smin no zhes// dam tshig bdag pos rab cig sungs// 'disan sra yang brnags pa'i phying/ ga bka' nga sa rang mi 'da'// gzungs ni byangs kyi
119b3(rnying rgyud): dbyings la ste/ lcags dang lpags lnga seng l+r-i la sogs pa char ma can gyi shing las sod brkyang dam bcu gnyis par bya// ba mgo mchag mnor bang shing rtsa 'a phyogs su mgo byas la/ ser 'byad la sor gcig pa rgya mdzad/ rked pa rgya dza
119b4(rnying rgyud): ba gas du byas pa/ na pa na sa sa tu dag nas da thugs ni di byed rnyepa
119b5(rnying rgyud): sa hA// shA na sa gas rnam pa / sa nga bca te/ tshig sa byagan
119b6(rnying rgyud): nyis sa med pa na rdugs par mdza ba sangs spyod dgas pa'i gyur bye cig pa sa 'o// de ni sems par bu ba byed pa ni la me 'o/ di 'i sgrib po da ma ltang sgyu sa pablang gis nga jings
119b7(rnying rgyud): zungagasa'i macan padang sa su ma sa na du na sa nga
120a1(rnying rgyud): bathar gas mang/ ga'i dang du sus sa mtha pa la rtag pani la g.yos sa gongs ga la par 'artan te ba dag par bya ste/ g.yon dang rabatus gan pa'i ta sas 'an pa/ g.yon da ngos 'jug 'a nga 'drang
120a2(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa/ 'og ma phur bu zur gsum 'debs pa'i stabs su gnas shing / ngan song gsum du 'jigs pa/ spobs dang mthul sogs pa khro bo thams cad 'dus pas kyang che bu gcig byung ste/ rtag pa chen po bzhugs par bstan pa ni spel pa'i myang
120a3(rnying rgyud): gyis brnab bo// de la rigs lngar byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ 'bru las gnas lnga byin gyis brlang ngo po// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ dri gtsug tu oM/ rked par ji/ rtse mor phaT bsam mo// ro 'og tu thugs kyi ye shes
120a4(rnying rgyud): gcig par byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ zur gsum du phaT gsum/ ngos gsum du du gzhag go// de nas sgra bltas pa dang / rigs so so'i khro bo thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar bya ste/ khro bo dkyis 'khor phyogs bcar 'phros pa skar
120a5(rnying rgyud): 'dus nas/ hUM hUM phaT phaT kyi sgra 'byin cing / de'i sgra la bstims te/ dbang dang byin rlabs thams cad brlan par bya'o// de nas 'gro ba'i don la gshegs nas phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dang / sngon thu dngas su rdus kyis pardzes pa lags
120a6(rnying rgyud): bas des gyos mdzad cing bskul ba la bzhugs pa dang / bdag nyid kya dbangag nyid chen po yin pas gyur pa yang ba gnyid chen po nyid du dbang bsang zhing byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ laka pa g.yas par ma las nyes kyi dkyil 'khor 'gyur pa'i steng du
120a7(rnying rgyud): hUM/ g.yon pa'i ste sus las tha pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i phying du tu ngasas so// klung ma / rje/ pa / chung la/ pa khor du dug nagan/ srar
120b1(rnying rgyud): ga / s+ho/ lta sa sa sa sa nga @
120b2(rnying rgyud): pa la mthe blo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung dang gnyis kyi bar du yang gzhug/ mtho bos chung zad paskal zhing drud do// oM badz+ra ye be sha ya/ a a zhes brjod pes phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa yab phyam klas dang ces pa zams cang
120b3(rnying rgyud): rjes sudran pa'i sku yungs 'du dzum par mtshams med par thad pa la bsti zang ba sgris po// sgra ga sung thugs kyi bdag po chen po nyid du rtogs pa'i rkyen gyis brna cing dbang bsgyur bar bya ste/ sor ma chab kyang rtsol la b+ha thog shebs te/ bskyed pa'i bar du
120b4(rnying rgyud): byin dang / dbang dang ldan par gyur te/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la e'i gdan la bzhugs par gsol nas yungs kAr gyi rgyal pos brab cing gu gul sbyar bas bdugs lha/ phyi nang gi mchod pa thams cad mchod par bya'o// de nas yid lA parnag pa'i phrin lus 'tshal te
120b5(rnying rgyud): de'i byin brlabs so// bzlas brjod nang dag nyid las kyi lha'i ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs la snying gar nyi pa'i dkyil 'khor la hU~M mthing dag pa gcig bas ma la/ oM badz+ra krot+ta kI li kI la ya ma ra ya phaT ces brjod pas phur bu'i khrob kyi 'dra ba jis raM las
121a1(rnying rgyud): sa rnams du / sa su nga sa sa// spyas bya rnams ga / sa/
121a2(rnying rgyud): matid brtag pa'i sarnyed nas bskrad pa dang mtshams gcad pa la sogs pa byas nas skad cig mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis khro ba'i sdang mag dang / mtshan cha'i char dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin la sogs pas bskrad nas phrar pa bcu khro bo brtser glan gyis brlabs
121a3(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcur btab nas ci tsam 'dod pa thams cad mtshams gcad do// rigs lnga'i lha mnyas par bya re/ de nas las kyi lha mnyes par byas nas de nas ting nge 'dzin gang nas byung ba dang / bsnyen pa tshang nas gnas chen po dkyil 'khor gru gsum
121a4(rnying rgyud): mahA phyogs su bstan te/ zhing chen gyi thal ba dang / ne tshe dang / phan d+ha dang shing chen gyi dgra dang / grab ma'i po mang go ma dang / khri dang ce tso dang / sum ma dang / thog ma par gyis dang / ro bu'i bdud rje las smras te/ zhing chen gyi thal ba
121a5(rnying rgyud): til nag po las gzhi blangs te gzugs byas kyang rung / ri mo bris la mdog skragatsug tu bgyis te shul ba la sogs pa la zhing chen gyi rakas chu che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ ces bris te/ snying gar gan te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gan rgyal du bzhag ste/ ma
121a6(rnying rgyud): phyogs su bstan te/ gdon nyid dgug pa 'i mang ga gzug gam/ khrob su ma nyan thong ba yang ru ste/ ga zugs kang ma d+hi da zlaba'i dkyil 'dzer dmar po ni sa bzhig la(\u0f7fbam pa na tshig so zhag sa rna
121a7(rnying rgyud): can mangs med pa cung ma steg myong bas bgegs kyi snying gnas bzung ste/ der 'ongs pa dang / b+h+yag mo mA~M nga ya rba be sha phaT rin tsam tha brjod pa/ gzugs sa ma ma la phab la lcags kyi dang / zhags pa dang / lcags pa
121b1(rnying rgyud): dang / bsdams pa dang / de'i sems ma 'khrugs par dag par byas nas e'i nang du rtse mo 'og tu song bar bsam/ de nas phur pa blangs te/ las kyi lha'i snying pa dang bcas pas drag tu chung zad bstsal lo// thal mo sbyar phur bya thabs kyis gsor la rdo rje sder mo'i sngag
121b2(rnying rgyud): bzlas nas ting nge 'dzin gsal bar ma khugs kyi bar du dril na ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa dang / gdan gyi steng du rtse mo nas gang tsam ma reg par gzas la khro bo'i skye 'am rked pa nas lag pa g.yon pas bzung ste/ rdo rje tho ba'i lha re lag pas rdeg cing rdo rje sder mo'i sngags
121b3(rnying rgyud): lan gsum dang nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab cing bzlas te/ seng ldeng gi phur pa sor brgyad pa gcig snying gar btab dpral bar gcig gdab/ dpung mgo gnyis dang pad+ma'i nang rol gnyis su yang gdab/ lte ba khung du yang gdab/ sder mo'i sngags/ na maHsa man ta
121b4(rnying rgyud): kA ye bA ka ts+tshi ta badz+ra nan/ oM g+ha pra g+hA ta ya/ sarba duwAn/ mA ra ya phaT/ kI li kI lA ya sarba pA pa~M phaT/ hU~M hU~M badz+ra kI li kI lA ya badz+ra tA rod/ Ad+ya bya ya ti kA ya bA ki tsit+ta badz+ra kI lA ya hU~M phaT drag tu brjod do// phrar ba de btab zin nas de'i steng du las kyi lha phyag
121b5(rnying rgyud): dang sngags kyis mnan te lag pa gnyis sor mo bsnol ba mthe bo dang mthen chung rtse sbyar brkyang nas gzhan ni TIka bor rgyab tu bskyed de de'i sngags/ oM badz+ra ka ma dzo d+he hU~M phaT/ la ni nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te g.yas phyogs su bskor tI kI la ya'i mgo la lan gsum
121b6(rnying rgyud): bdug go// de nas phur pa slar mi 'byung ba dang / sus kyang mi phyin pa dang / lhag par yang zad cing bral phyin par bsam mo// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan te/ sor mo rnams rgyab tu bsnol la bcangs nas gung mo gnyis rgyab sbyar rtse mo rnon por bsgreng la phur pa'i
121b7(rnying rgyud): glang du gnon/ phur ba'i lha dang bgegs che ge mo khyod dam tshig 'di las ma 'da' zhig par bsgo zhing sngags 'dis lan bdun bzlas so// oM sarba thA ga tA sa ma ya hU~M phaT ces bya'o// 'di ni sems ma dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ bsgo ba thams cad nyan
122a1(rnying rgyud): par bsam sor mo gnyis nang du bsnol te/ mthe bo dang mthe'u chung ngo ltar la bsgreng / khu tshur mi bcang bar sor mo rnams phyir bskyed de phur ba'i steng du mnan cing sngags 'di brjod do// oM badz+ra kro d+hA ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ban d+ha ban ta/ d+han
122a2(rnying rgyud): da rba na rba na phaT/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// stobs po che'i sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ gong du bka' nyan pas bdag gi dbang du gyur nas ci bsgo ba thams cad bran bzhin du las byed par 'gyur ro// yungs kar gyi rdul pos brdeg/ bur gum sbar mas bdugs la
122a3(rnying rgyud): gzhag go// de nas lag pa gnyis sbyar la/ mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig 'khyud mdzub mo gnyis sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig 'khyud/ mdzub mo gnyis kha gram la g.yas g.yon du sbreng / yid tsam dgu bar bya lhag ma rnams nad du bcang la
122a4(rnying rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis mche bar bsams te rkang pa g.yon pas bgegs kyi snying gar mnan te lan bdun bzlas/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha yak+Sha kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ hUM d+haM/ phaT phaT ces brjod de/ de nasu rdo rje be con gyi sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ lag pa gnyis rdo rje lu bu rtsu
122a5(rnying rgyud): sbrel la mthe bong g.yon pa'i steng du gzhag/ mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar te bsgreng nas sdang mig tu bgrad lA reg cing sngags 'di lan bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig ga ma brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hUM be la/ ha na ha na dA ha ba ts+tsha bi tA~M sa ya dza rje lam po
122a6(rnying rgyud): u ts+tsha sa ma so N+Da hU~M phaT ces brjod do// de nas yungs kar gyi rgyal po bdeg cing las 'di shin tu brtun zhing grub par bcol lo// rdo rje brjid gnon gyi bsam gtan gyis gnan par bya'o// khro bo rnams kyi spyi bo nas 'dus pa'i steng du hU~M mthing nag la rdo rje lcags
122a7(rnying rgyud): gya'i rgya gram ma lce'i phreng bas bskor ba'i rgya gram gyi dkyil 'khor yi ge gsum gser btso ma'i mdog 'dra ba zhig tu gnas pa las/ oM badz+ra badz+ra ma rta trA~M sa ma ya s+t+rI zhes brjod pa las gser gyi ri rab dpag tshad bye bi grwa bzhi pa gcig tu gyu
122b1(rnying rgyud): lnga de'i steng na bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang gu dbu gsum phyag drug lnga/ phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje 'bar ba phyar te bsnams/ g.yon dang po rdo rje n+ya gram thugs kar bstan/ 'khor dpag tu med pa'i pho brang gtams pa khro bo rnams kyis shin tu gzir
122b2(rnying rgyud): cing mi g.yo ba dang / las ma grub na bskal pa mthar thug na yang gnas par bsam/ phrin las kyang de bzhin du btsal te gzhag go// yo byad thams cad kyang nag por bsam/ gtor ma nag po cha gcig bshams te dam tshig can gyi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / 'angag
122b3(rnying rgyud): thas snang la bas // drug par gtu ma ci gcig ga nga byu byug+sag nang gags// tha na ma dang / di kun ma dang / phrin marnams na / ma papa ste// / ga
122b4(rnying rgyud): b+hUd yan+na / b+h+yam sa la hrInas ldanagasum pa dudu byu drung / gnas brjid la / au A zhes la nu gsum pa tA phul las bcula'o// 'di'i dzin pas sa// dus ni chos brgya bdun nam mar sri la
122b5(rnying rgyud): nyin mtshan gyi gung du gza' dang sbyar ba dang / bsnyen pa tshang ba dang / rtags byung ba la sogs te 'di ni rus so// gnas ni shing rkang gcig pa dang gnod par nges pa ste/ 'di ni gnas so// bdag nyid byang chub sems la gzhol zhing mang du thos pa dang / las la mkhas pa
122b6(rnying rgyud): dang / lha nye bar gyur pa dang / me phyed pa'i dad pa thob pa dang / drag cing ltos pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / gzhan la re ba med pa dang / dam tshig ma nyams pa'o// 'di ni bdag nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang
122b7(rnying rgyud): thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon skyong dang / mnan bzlog drug tu bka' stsal to// zhi ba'i zhi ba chen po ni dkyil 'khor 'dom gang zab khung zlum po chag gang zab kyi dkyil du 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mtho gang zlum po phar sor gcig/ 'jim pa
123a1(rnying rgyud): bong bal 'thur du brkos te gzhag/ thab kyi kha khyer rdo rje rabs bskor/ de'i phyi rim zlum po la pad+ma 'dab brgyang bri/ bkra shis kyi lha mo dang / mchod pa'i lha mo dgod/ bsreg pa'i rdzas shra gra shug shags/ mar dkar/ khar/ skung rtse/ 'bras can
123a2(rnying rgyud): 'bras thug/ 'bras yos/ til zho/ nas thug so ba/ gro so ba/ til so ba/ sran ma sha/ yungs kar/ 'bras kyi lag pa na/ gtor ma dkar po 'bras las bgyi/ yo byad thams cad dkar po/ tshon dkar pos bri/ chas gos gsum dkar po/ lha'i sku mdog kyang
123a3(rnying rgyud): dkar po/ grangs dang sbyar nas mchod par bya'o// rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi/ lha ni snga ma'i steng du gnod sbyin mo brgyad kyis bstan/ pho nya yang 'byung ngo // yo byad thams cad kyang ser po/ dgang gzar ser po/ phrugs su bcas pa gangs bzhin du dbul
123a4(rnying rgyud): lo// dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zla gam phyed par bcad pa'i tshul du bya/ las kyi lha pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dgod/ bsreg rdzas dmar po/ gtor ma dmar po/ chas gos dmar po/ lha'i grangs bzhin du dbul/ drag po'i dkyil
123a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi dbus su gru gsum zabs su khwa phyed/ gru gsum du mda' gzhu/ mtha' blod nga gsar steng gis bskor/ dpal chen po dang khro btu dgod/ yo byad thams cad nag po/ bsreg rdzas nag po/ dkyil 'khor yang nag po/ gtor ma yang nag po/ pas kyi
123a6(rnying rgyud): khro bo bcu dang / phra men ma chas gos dag po/ sbyin rje ga d+hA'i grangs bzhin du tshul lo// oM shadwa tI gan ti / kAr prA sha ma ne rA ts+tsha ta/ a bya ba srab pa/ a dz+ra ka sa/ swa siM shrI ba~M/ kA rba swA nA/ zla bam// pa shrang krAr+tha pra sha man ye n+te/ skye nyi bajas lngas
123a7(rnying rgyud): desum bya / bcom ldan 'das dpal su rung bcing ba nyid ka ral pa las khro ba mnan drug gi sa skye bdu / nas bcom ldan 'das pa'i kun du brjer ba zugs gosang ba kyil la yar byung ngo // dkyil 'khor 'dis gang grub //
123b1(rnying rgyud): thig bzhi gdab pas de'u cha dgu/ dbus su zla ba phyed par bcas pa'i tshul du bya/ de'i phyi rim phra me nu ma bcu drug/ sgo ba bzhi/ kham phor ri mor bris pa dgu/ snang ba'i 'od bcas pa dgram/ tshil chen dang nI tsit+ta'i tog/ ras chen 'phan gzugs la sogs pa/
123b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rgyun tu bri bar bya/ b+han d+ha'i gnam yol/ zhing gi rtsal mtshan/ thod pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa dgod/ rak+ta dri chen gyi maN+Dal bya/ yo byad thams cad tshang bar bsogs la 'phags pa mchod cing bdag kyang bza'o// ram ma 'dres shing mi gzig
123b3(rnying rgyud): spyod lam yan chad ci'i sgo nas kyang sgrub pa'i zhal zas dang tshogs rnams phyi rol tu byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa po nyid ting nge 'dzin gnyid dbang du mi gtang / spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas sgra gsung thugs dngos grub kyi dbyig bslab pa dang / srid
123b4(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi sems can rgyu'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa rnams grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir tshul mkhas pa dang / spyod pa gzob pas rnal 'byor bsgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o// de la dang por sgrub pa la bgegs mi 'jug par bya ba'i phyir mtshams gcad do// ting de'i
123b5(rnying rgyud): dang lta ba dang / sngags dang phyag rgya dang / rgyal mtshan dang rdzas 'di dag gis rab tu gcad par bya'o// bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang yang rdzogs// rdzogs nas dngos grub blang bar bya// lha'i grangs bzhin bsnyen pa dbul bar bya'o// snying po ni/ oM ru mu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM zhes drang
123b6(rnying rgyud): ro// de nas bsnyen bsgrub lags pa dang / yo byad rnams phyi rol du mi 'byung / gnas su mi bgyir lha dang bdag mchod la sogs pa'i rjes la lhag ma dkyil 'khor sa'i 'og tu rin po ches kha bcad la sba bar bya'o// don de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sem
123b7(rnying rgyud): dpa'i sras su skye'o// de ltar ma byas na dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phra men ma'i sgrub pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su gau ri/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma
124a1(rnying rgyud): brgyad la shar du stag gi mgo can/ lho ru g.yag gi mgo can/ nub tu seng ge'i mgo can/ byang du gzig gi mgo can/ shar lho pha bang gi mgo can/ lho nub tu pu shud kyi mgo can/ nub byang du srin bya'i mgo zan/ byang shar du ske ga'i mgo can/ sgo ba ba'i
124a2(rnying rgyud): dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la 'bus su tsau ri/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la/ shar du stegs bu'i mgo can/ lhor bya rgod kyi mgo can/ nub tu sha ba'i mgo can/ byang du khu thug gi mgo can/ mtshams bzhir pha wang gi mgo can/ khra mgo can/
124a3(rnying rgyud): dang / byan lag gi mgo can dang / pho rog gi mgo can dang rnams so// sgo ba bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su pra mo ha/ de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la shar du 'ug pa'i mgo can dang / lhor stad ki'i mgo can dang / nub tu sbrul
124a4(rnying rgyud): gyi mgo can dang / byang du gzig gi mgo can/ mtshams bzhir sre mo'i mgo can/ dred mgo can dang / sdig pa'i mgo can dang / wa'i mgo can rnams so// sgo ba bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su be hi li/ pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug la ye
124a5(rnying rgyud): shes sde khro mo bcu drug dgod do// mtshams bzhir ye shes kyi khro mo bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'odom gang gru bzhi la dbus su praT saM/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du rta'i mgo can/ lhor nam mkha' lding gi mgo can/ nub tu khyi'i mgo can/ byang du
124a6(rnying rgyud): snang ti'i mgo can/ mtshams bzhir yang sbal bzhi dgod do// de'i phyi rim sgo ba bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang khru bzhi la dbus su swAs+pha re/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du rdo rje dbyings phyag ma/ lhor rin chen dbyings phyag ma/ nub tu pad+ma
124a7(rnying rgyud): dbyings phyug ma/ byang du las kyi dbyings phyag ma/ nab tu khyi'i mgo can/ mtshams bzhir phag gi mgo can ma/ phyi la'i mgo can/ chu srin gyi mgo can/ nga'i mgo can rnams so// sgo bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang grwa bzhi la dbus su wa sha ni/
124b1(rnying rgyud): b+hi rim pa 'dab brgyad la shar du ste ra'i gnas thal ma lhar dang thang nyal ma/ rlub tu mchod pa'i tshogs thal pa/ byang du bya'i sgor thul ma/ shar skror dam chog rjes gcod ma/ b+h+yonab tu byi nang gi mtshams nyal ma/ drar khrod gdus phyag ma'i rtag thal ma/
124b2(rnying rgyud): mtshams bzhir rdo rje sgrol thul ma/ bsnyen pa'i mtshams thul ma/ dgongs pa'i don nyulam/ dur khrod gnas thal ma dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang grwa bzhi la dbus su tsaN+Da la/ pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la/ shAr du rdo rje sder mo/ lhor rdo rje gtum mo// thub tu rdu
124b3(rnying rgyud): khrod bdag mo/ byang du rdo rje sgrol ma/ de'i mtshams bzhir rdo rje ti ba ti ba dang / rdo rje teg teg dang / rdo rje 'dzin ma dang / rdo rje yid g.yo ma dang / sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang grubazhi la/ dbus su sing ha mu kha pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/ chu srin gyi lus
124b4(rnying rgyud): la seng ge'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su bya g+h+r-i mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/ kad ka'i lus la stag gi mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/
124b5(rnying rgyud): dbus su mri la mu la/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la seng ge'i lus la wa'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su shwa na mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la pho rog gi lus la khyi'i mdo can bcad kyis bskor/ sgo ba'i dag
124b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su kr-i d+ha mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la kad ka'i lus la bya rgod kyi mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gad gru bzhi la dbus su kang ka mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/ sbrang ki'i lus la kang ka'i
124b7(rnying rgyud): can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su kad ka mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la 'ug pa'i lus la pho rog gi mgo btags par rgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su u lu
125a1(rnying rgyud): A sa pa gas sul pa sa dung chu das sa nan sa sa gru sa nasung / na su su
125a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las phra me na ma bsgrub pa re le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs dngos grub kyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // sku dang gsung dang thugs las sgra
125a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i he ru ka/ chos dbyings don dam rig pa'i dbyings na bzhugs// phyag rgya yum gyi mkha' la bzhugs nas kyang // sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol// ye shes khro rgyal sprul pa mang po 'phro// phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'gro don mang por mdzad// las byed mkha'
125a4(rnying rgyud): 'gro chos dbyings sku la 'khril// ye shes khro rgyal dngos grub bdag la stsol// phra men za byed mche gshog 'bar ba'i tshogs// dbang phyug 'dug byed yid 'phrog nA ma can// rdo rje maN+Da can sder chen gshog pa can// phra men za byed chen mo dngos grub bdag la stsol//
125a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje yang sbrul chen po chos dbyings mkha' la shar// mtshon thogs sprul pa sna tshogs 'gro don mdzad// rtag tu don mdzad thugs rje shugs las byung // phra men yang sbrul chen po dngos grul stsol// smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don
125a6(rnying rgyud): dngos grub stsal du gsol// rdo rje mkha' 'gro dbyings kyi ye shes yum// las byed ma mo kun la dbang mdzad ma// phyag brnyan sprul pa sna tshogs 'gro don mdzad// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// rdo rje gshog pa thogs pa'i yid 'phrog ma// rdo
125b1(rnying rgyud): sngor ma phyogs bcur sprul pa tho// rdo rje las byed ma mo brgya yang 'gyed// dbang phyug po ti'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// mi mnyam pa yi// khyod rtag tu ni// thugs rnga can gyis gzigs shing 'gro ba'i dpal// bla med byang chub btab par dam bcas pa// bdag cag las
125b2(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnams 'dus nas gsol pa/ sngon tshe ye shes brnyes pa'i lha// de yi 'khor du gtogs pa ma dang mkha' 'gro ma// rtse gcig bsnyen kyang ye shes lha dang phra men khyod bsten bsnyen// bsten pa'i
125b3(rnying rgyud): d+hus na rgyud ma ring // bslab pa'i dus na mthu ma chung // yang bsnyen ni yang yang bsnyen na// dpal chen phra men khyed lhur ma lags kyi// lang ka tshigs kyi srin mo yang // phra bas byams shing khyabs gdung // yang bsgrub pa ni yang bsgrubs na// lang ka'i phyogs
125b4(rnying rgyud): gas su / nas ga sbyin du zhug smra
125b5(rnying rgyud): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs kyi skal ba'i dngos grub 'khor rnams la stsal to// 'khor rnams kyis kyang rdo rje chos kyi skud pa por dngos grub stsal to// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las sku gsung thugs kyi dngos gru'i dbyig bslab pa'i le'u
125b6(rnying rgyud): bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i dam pa'i don gyi gsang ba zab mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung nas sprul pa lham dral 'di mgo mjug gi don rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis/ dbyings dang ye shes gnyis/ thabs da
125b7(rnying rgyud): rab gnyis/ kun rdzob dang don dam gnyis/ mdor bsdus na don dam la lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub sems su bsdu'o// rgyud 'di'i mgo mjug gi don dpal kun du bzang por 'dus so// kun du bzang po sku mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang / gsung mi za
126a1(rnying rgyud): thun kyi 'bar po dang / thugs ma zang rgyun gyi khor la dang / skragasang thugs pa brtson pa ma nas kyid kyi ma na nyid kyang byang chub kyi sems su 'dus so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dran tu bzang por 'dus pa'i nan bcom ldan 'das kyis srud pa par na rjesal
126a2(rnying rgyud): gtad do// sugasung thugs kyi do gas ba zab mo 'di don chos kyi sdud pa po la gtad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa pos lus dag yid gsumadzes su 'i rang skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la btod pa/ kun gzhin la 'byor rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor na// thab cing gte pa/
126a3(rnying rgyud): dka' ba rgyal ba'i sra bzugs so// sprul pa mang pos 'gro na rtogs par mdzad// dpal chen kun bzang khrod la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes khro bo chos nyid dbyings na bzhugs// sprul ba'i khro bos las rnams rdzogs par mdzad// phra min yang sbrul ye shes dbyings su gaN+Dal// khro bo
126a4(rnying rgyud): ma'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// sngagasu dngos grub ya mtshan cha 'phrul can// sku gsung thugs pas sprul ba mang po 'phro// mkha' 'gron byed phra men po nyam// mgyogs pa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// las rnams drag shul mdzad pa'i tshe rgyal lnga// de bzhin gshegs pa'i man dag gsang /
126a5(rnying rgyud): chen rnams// glang nas grol bar mdzad pa ye shes yum// slob sgo ma'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams rjes su yi rangs te/ legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bka' dam pa gsang ba zab mo'i tan+da 'di spad pa po ni'i chos la gtang ngo // de nas
126a6(rnying rgyud): sdud pa po rdo rje chos kyis bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he n+da/ 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la sku gsung thugs kyi bshags pa phul lo// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang du gyur pas na// lus dag sems kyis sdig bgyis mthol zhing bshags// theg pa dman pa'i dbang
126a7(rnying rgyud): pas na// thabs chen spyad dang ma sbyang mtho' zhing bshags// ma rig yog pa'i dbang du gyur pas na// yang dag don ma rtogs pa mthol zhing bshags// snying rje chung zhing zhe sdang dbang du gyur bas na// 'gro ba'i don mabagyis pa mthol zhing bshags// le log nyid kyi dbang du gyur ngas na// ba
126b1(rnying rgyud): gna'ashAs sa gas/ ba myu nga nags nga gyur bas/ da pa byas ga/ sa sus nga zlas pa// ba sa nga gas// phyogs nga nga sa// gsam da nga
126b2(rnying rgyud): 'gal ba mthol zhing bshags// pha rog ngan pa'i dbang du gyur pas na// lud dang lhag mar gyur pa mthol zhing bshags// phung dang lhag ma nyams pa'i skyon dbang gis// phud nyul thugs dang 'gal ba mthol zhing bshags// phud rgyal thugs dang 'gal ba'i skyon dbang gis// mkha' 'gro ba
126b3(rnying rgyud): chad gnas su gyur pa mthol zhing bshags// sgrol ba'i dus su snying rje chung ba yis// sems can gnas ma stobs pa mtho zhing bshags// nyon mongs gnas ma stobs pa'i skyon dbang gis// yun gyi sgrib par gyur pa mthol zhing bshags// sbyor ba'i dus su ting 'dzin la gsal bas/
126b4(rnying rgyud): gzungs mthugs dang gal ba'i gyon dbang gis// tshigs shing 'khor ba'i gnas su mthol zhing bsags// bshags nas sragasung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// de skad ces bzod pa phul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshangs pa gnang ste/ bka' dam pa 'di yo nas yang du rda rda rjes kyi thung ba
126b5(rnying rgyud): bo la gtang do// de nas rdor chos kyis bka'adam pa 'di mchags pa'i dbang gis bka' bzhin byas so// de nus 'khor de dgra bral mo gyur nas rjes su yi rang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsus pa la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das te rug rol pa las yongs su gta pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun
126b6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / gru dang / lha ma yin du bzlas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gsang ba'i snying po zab mo mchog dpal snying rdo rol pa'i cud rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi po rgyab ma
126b7(rnying rgyud): bas pa sa gan ni/ gas pas byu chog gi byeng ba dang / na pa bzhis dang / ba sa ma napa kyi mas sangs ga cag pag ga yang gi
127a1(rnying rgyud): rgyu gar skad du/ mahASh+TaSh+TAnA thAs/ muN+Dal la tAnAm/ bod swA dang / rgyud kyi rgyal po rkyen po dpal bdud d+hA rol pa zhes zlab/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzung po la sdug 'tshal la// byang slad pa dgakas khros pa dus
127a2(rnying rgyud): rmongs skyed na ba gnas dpa bya bye rgyags parjes sa rnam sa da 'as par ba da pa/ ba yongs su ma 'gags pa/ rnam pa pa tshugs dag kyis ma dun pa
127a3(rnying rgyud): mtha' gan nas grol ba'i mdzod pa dres pas/ yon tan rin po che'i bdag nyid kun nas ga rdzogs dang / gsung tshogs dang / thugs sa tshogs dang / yon na sna tshogs dang / phrin la sa sna tshogs kyi sdu gzhan las 'phags shing mo phrul
127a4(rnying rgyud): ba thabs mkhas pa'i sgo thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs su gsal bar ston pa de nyid/ 'og min gyi gnas lha'i rgyal po'i 'ang bzang dam pa na bzhugs te/ 'od zer gyi snang ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa sna tshogs 'phrul zhing / dkyil 'khor thams cad phyogs
127a5(rnying rgyud): kun tu rgya cher bkod par mdzad do// de nyid kyi tshon phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa kun nas 'dus pa 'di lta ste/ snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / rag
127a6(rnying rgyud): rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba dang / mdzad pa rgya chen po zhes bya ba dang / pad+mo don yod pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas brtsegs pa zhes bya ba dang / sa rnams
127a7(rnying rgyud): gnon pa zhes bya ba dang / 'bras bu bskyed pa zhes bya ba dang / las chud sel ba zhes bya ba dang / blo gros chen po zhes bya ba dang / thams cad srung ba zhes bya ba dang / las kun byed pa zhes bya ba dang / glang po'i sde can zhes bya ba dang / ston pa gtso bo dam
127b1(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis snang ba sna tshogs dag rnam par 'phros te/ phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad nye bar bskul cing / de na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po nye bar g.yo bar mdzad do// yang dag don ni rgya che zhing // rol pa'i
127b2(rnying rgyud): byin rlabs kun tu snang // thams cad mi gnyis las kun pas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bkod// de tshe rgyal ba de dag gis// dgongs pa'i don kun mnyam bzhag nas// rang gi ye shes ji lta bar// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor nye bar sdang
127b3(rnying rgyud): de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa kun nas sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pas/ 'og min gyi gnas su mngon par lhags so// de dag kyang rang gi dkyil 'khor dri lta ba bzhi
127b4(rnying rgyud): du bzhugs shing / nyid kyi longs spyod thams cad rnam par bkod pa dang / rang gi gdan la thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i tshul gyis thams cad longs spyod par mdzad do// bcom ldan mchog gi dkyil 'khor na// shin tu rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs//
127b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal brgya mtsho 'khor dang bcas// skal ldan rnams dang thabs cig bzhugs// thams cad don kun snang byed pas// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i// 'di ltar ston pa kun snang bas// khyad par chos rnams kun gyi gzhi// rang gi ye shes
127b6(rnying rgyud): gnas longs spyod// thabs mchog gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// bde chen dgyes la gsang ba'i sku// kun tu bzang po kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo yis// dkyil 'khor gnas longs spyod pa'o// gnas mchog yum gyi dkyil 'khor
127b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis med lhun gyis gnas pa'i tshe// de tshe nyan thos dge 'dun dang // rang rgyal theg chen mdo sde dang // byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun tshogs// nyan thos dge 'dun chen po yi// dgra bcom mer yang med nang du// kun bzang thugs
128a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor nas// dgongs pa'i don kun rnam par gsal// thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i mthus// ye shes tshe 'phrul sna tshogs dang // 'od zer snang ba can khrub byer// phyag rgya'i tshogs kun kar bskur zeng // 'dzam
128a2(rnying rgyud): mdangs gas krugs cigazal ba'o// mi gnyis ye shes gnagasal ba'i// nyid bye kyil 'khor rnams cad kun// ngo mtshor chos nyid don la sbyor// dkyil 'khor kun mchog blan med// rigs can mdza pa ma 'gags pa / sems dang se lus gnas
128a3(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag/ phreng 'ams pas ma sa me khyab pa'o// gnas rnams de nyi dganas spyan bzhin// de dag la mtshan chos kun dang // rdo tsom rgyan gyis rnam par 'jug/ gcig la gcig gis rjod kyad pa/ 'di ltar spangs rgyas kun snang zhing // rang gi rtogs pa/
128a4(rnying rgyud): ji lta bar// don mthun gas dbyang gro bar byed// gnas su rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis// ban bzang dkyil 'dod rnam pa N+Dal// mamathun sma dgasang nags rnams// bya ba'i yon tan rgya rjer snang // de dag shes pa lab 'das pa// nga mchar yul 'a
128a5(rnying rgyud): wAT// danas 'dzor kyigatso bya chog/ gsang bdag rdo rdo chos nyid kyis// rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang // rnam ngan sngon pa'i gnas su ba // theb gags drab rna chen pa// rgyag rdo rdo rje lce gzigs te// rang rgya brtan pa'i gnas rnams ldan/
128a6(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi brgyad pas gleng slong mdzod// 'di dag sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas// de nyi dam thu yas kun snang ba// thams cad gas pa nag po nyid// sbyin ba sa ngos tshan kun cig ni// brten pa'i mthu yis phyogs khyab pa// gas deb ba dgongos lu bar mdzad/
128a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad sru dang gsung dang thugs// yon tan zin las sna tshogs ldan/ zang rnams 'dag pa nyon das// thams cad sa rdza// de nas gas dpa' ba ga mas// ga ga mtshogs dpel 'o rnams/ chos tshogs ldan ga
128b1(rnying rgyud): tu// blo gros gsang ba'i gnas kun 'drug/ na nyid phyag rdza lnga bar// mdzod pa bkad tshogs rab 'byams kyis// phyogs brgyang rgyal ba sbas bcas gaH// rangag rgyan rlabs yul bcas pa// kun tshogs rnam par mtshad byas shing // phyug
128b2(rnying rgyud): 'tshal 'dud cing gsol ba 'debs// mgon po dus gsum sgrib med pa'i// ye shes dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i gnas// 'di ltar dngos grub rgya chen tshogs// bstan pa'i sgo rnams gang las kyang // sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i don// chos kun ma
128b3(rnying rgyud): 'dres 'od gsal ba// sgyu ma lta bur 'gag pa med// de dag dgyel 'khor ji lta bur// phyogs rnams dus kun thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhing dag la// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya rnams// byin rlabs bkod pa'i yi ge bzhin// rnam
128b4(rnying rgyud): 'phrul rnam par spyod pa'i tshogs// de dag chos rnams bstan pa'i dus// shin tu rgya chen 'dir gnas pas// ngo mtshar gsang ba la zhugs mdzad// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rang bzhin kun tu bzang po nyid// nges par bstan pa'i byin rlabs kyis// /
128b5(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa'i dga' mdangs rnam par ston// thams cad rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du// byin rlabs byang chub sems sbyor te// rang bzhin bdud rtsi chen po'i don// nges pa'i klung nas grol par mdzad// srid gsum ye nas bdud rtsi lnga// ma bcos gdod nas rdzogs
128b6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas// kun tu bzang po'i thugs dkyil nas// byang chub sems tshogs dkyil 'khor nga char// dus gsum srid gsum sku gsung thugs// ye nas gnyis med bdud rtsi'i phyir// dgongs pa rgya mtsho mthar phyin pa// des don zab mo'i tshul gyis/
128b7(rnying rgyud): 'jug/ de nas bde gshegs thams cad kyis// rang snang dkyil 'khor la dgongs te// gnyis med bdud rtsi chen po 'di// rang bzhin mi gnyis bstan pas grol// de tshe 'khor gyi gcu bo'i mchog rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po rnams// bla na med pa'i bya
129a1(rnying rgyud): chub sems// ye shes mnyam nyad nyams rnyed de// rang gi rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas/ gas/ ba 'phral rnams 'khod// mtha' yas stobs rnams zad med 'ang // rgyal ba kun gyis mchod byas te// rang bzhin bdud rdzi chen po gA
129a2(rnying rgyud): dus gsum kun tu ston par dgongs// rigs tshogs byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bstan pa'i don gyis ro mtshab skyes// e ma ho lha klu 'gro tshogs kun// rang gi rtog pa mtha' yas sdang // kun gyi bsam pa shes rung zhing // thams cad skad rnams
129a3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur zhing // theg mchog snying po byin rnams 'di// phyogs rnams kun nas spyod par dka'// rang gi dkyil 'khor mam pa// kun tu mi 'gags na mnya' yas// rgyal ba kun gyi lam nyid ni// theg med 'dud gnas byas pas// byags pa gas
129a4(rnying rgyud): zab mo'i tshogs// de dag mtshan nyid ji lta bu// de tshe spang ba thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor ma 'gags rnam skal zhing // rang bzhin gnyis med bdud rtsa'i mchog/ slob pa'i thabs 'di sa par gsungs// bstan pa'i rdzogs rnams kun yod pa// 'a
129a5(rnying rgyud): dam pa mchog gi lung // chos rnams ye nas bdud rtsi mchog/ nges par stong pa'i sgo 'di stong// smra bgasas bye ba dang // 'as so pa du ba'i byung // gsang sra sa gdang de'i man ngag ni// bdu brtsi dam pa mchog gsung // snying po bams pa ngas
129a6(rnying rgyud): don 'di// thams kyang byang chub 'byung ba'i gna'o// smra ba dang spyod pa dang // da ma 'phrin las dang // nges pang dag dang bzung bya sar/ ma bsdis pa gsungs// bas gyis mtha' bstan pa dang / brjed cing ni stong bsam
129a7(rnying rgyud): kyang // theg pa'i sgo na gsum du gsungs// gas nyid theg par 'dus dang ba ni// lnga pador dgongs dang don dam yang // ngazo pa don sangs rgyas yis 'byud 'ister pa thugs batshal te/ rdeg po chos bur byang ba byer// nges pa'i lung yang sangs rgyas
129b1(rnying rgyud): sa// sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyings su grol// ye nas gnyis med ldan grub pas// gsang ba chen por rnam spyod cing / zag le byang chub sems kyiganas// 'di dag rang gi rgyud bzhin 'jug/ gsung sngags gsang ba'i sangs rgyas che// byang chub
129b2(rnying rgyud): sems 'di kun tu dag/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde chen nyid// ma lus mtha' dag nyid kyi rtswa// ye nas bya byed bya mi dgos// rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul pa'i bla// mi rtog sbyor ba'i yul med na// de lta'i yul dang rtog 'dzin gyis// 'khor ba'i rgya mcho
129b3(rnying rgyud): gyur pa yin// nges 'byung chos sku chen po la// thA ga ra ji bzhin bzhag pas na// byang chub nyid de ltung gnas med// bu gcig ma rtsal bde bar gnos// rgyud dang lung dang man ngag kyang // 'bangs dang rje'u dang rgyal po'i tshul// khyad par rtsal 'phags
129b4(rnying rgyud): thag ring yang // gcig la gcig brten gcig gi dang // dbyer med tshul gcig rang bzhin du// gcig ste rnam pa yongs kyi med// gnyis med dang du rtogs grol na// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya// de bas sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ khams gsum rnam
129b5(rnying rgyud): par sbyong ba'i gzhi// sku dang rgyan dang 'khor lo yang // lung chen zab mo'i nang na gsal// lnga bzhi'i nang du 'khor ba las// ye shes sangs rgyas gzhan na med// dbyings su gyur pas mnyam pa'i ngang // de ni sangs rgyas bde chen nyid// bdud rtsi
129b6(rnying rgyud): bde tshon mchog gi sgra// dus gsum 'gyur med dbyings kyi lnga// dbyings gyur dag mnyam ldan grub pas// rnal 'byor chen po'i ngang tshul bzang // lta ba'i de la gang gnas pa'i// rnal 'byor mchog gyur skal bzang po// ci skyong ci bsgom ci
129b7(rnying rgyud): bsgrubs kyang // bdud rtsi nyid de sman gyi mchog/ bde gshegs kun gyi drugs de ma nyid// byin rlabs ngo mtshar rje Nir 'byung // rgyal ba tha mtsho rnams kyi gsos// sangs rgyas bde chen nyid las byung // thams cad ma lus bdud rtsi 'di// blos med
130a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ thig la gnas pa las// mtha' yas sems can dan gyi phyir// rang la mdzad cing rung gis bza'// de dag dngos grub sa mtha' gan// sgrub pa pos donan tan gyis// rnams cad rang byung bdud rje dganas// rdzas rnams na
130a2(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid// ston pa'i byin rlabs la sdang ba// rnal 'byor thabs mkhas rnams kyi yul// rang bzhin ngo bo gcig nyid las// byin rlabs mthu rtsal rnam spros pas// thams cad dag cing grol ba'i mchog/ bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin te/
130a3(rnying rgyud): thabs mkhas rnam par spyod pa'i sgo// rang bzhin ngo bos ston byed pa'o// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du// phyi nang sdod bcud rnam dag tshogs// rang grol 'jug pa'i spyod pa yis// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas mthong 'gyur// de dag rab
130a4(rnying rgyud): tu dbang bskur zhing // blo bur dri ma dag pa'i mthus// rang bzhin ye shes gnas rnyed de// dam tshig gsal ba la gnas pas// thams cad kun tu mnyam sbyor cing // slob pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par spyod// de nas bsnyen bskyab kun rdzogs
130a5(rnying rgyud): shing // phyog rgya'i dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur// tha dad min la tha dad pa'o// brten g.yo mnyam dang mi mnyam tshogs// rab grol gnas pa'i chos kun nyid// ye shes bdud rtsi chen po'i don// zhes gsungs so// de tshe 'khor tshogs rgya chen
130a6(rnying rgyud): po'i// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// rang byed don gyi bdud rtsi 'di// gnas rnams kun tu rgyas par rtogs// byin rlabs ngo mtshar chen po'i yul// mi gnyis dga' ba mngon gyur cing // thams cad chos kyi gnas spong ba'o// yang
130a7(rnying rgyud): dag don na spyad par byed// e matogs chen nyid kyi dbyings// rngam grol ye shes dkyil 'khor nyid// byang chub sems nyid rnam spyod pas// rin chen bdud rtsa rgyas par snang // phyogs rnams mthang dag grol ba yi// rigs su
130b1(rnying rgyud): skye ba'i gnas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi gsos// rang byung ye shes gnas phyag 'tshal// thams cad min la thams cad snang // de dag dang gi dkyil 'khor nyid// phyogs dus kun tu ma 'gags pa'i// yon tan kun 'byur
130b2(rnying rgyud): gnas phyag 'tshal// ngo mtshar zab cing rgya chen chos// rigs tshogs theg pa grangs med kyis// de dag tshul rnams zhi mdzad pa// dkyil 'khor kun 'byung ston pa'i mchog/ khyod nyid byang chub sems kyi zhing // gsang chen dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa nyid/
130b3(rnying rgyud): gang zhig mthong bas rngam grol zhing // phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor kun spyod mdzad// byin rlabs theg pa'i gnas chen 'di// rgyal ba kun gyis bstan pa'odon// phyag rgya'i rol pa rgya chen por// thams cad 'dud ni dang stod pa'i gnas// zhes kun gyis
130b4(rnying rgyud): bstod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi dastil 'khor mngon par 'du mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par sbyor zhing / legs thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po la 'dud par gyur to// de dag gi pastod pas nang khams de nyi dgas /
130b5(rnying rgyud): par byas te/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi byin rlabs kyi gzugs brnyan las/ bdud rtsi'i grong khyer chen po rgya cher gzigs so// de'i tshe zhing khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa kha cig ni nyon mongs pa'i phyogs nas rnam par spyod cang / kha cig
130b6(rnying rgyud): ni snying po ye shes kyi tshogs kyis rab tu grol bar gyur to/ 'di ltar grangs med pa'i sdar ba kun kyang tshul sna tshogs kyi sgo nas srud par snang ngo // gdong nas ma bcos sangs rgyas kun// rang gi gnas na longs spyod mdzad// de la grangs med na chen tshogs
130b7(rnying rgyud): zhing khams bsam gyis mi khyab grub// skye 'gro kun gyi gnas spyod de// tha dad gnyis kyi chos snang ba'i// 'di ltar kha cig rtag pa'i rgyun// nyon mongs rgyu las de bskyed cing // nga rgyal chen pos gnas pa la// nga rgyal tshogs bcas dag par spyod// de
131a1(rnying rgyud): gas gnas 'a sadal// gas pa sa dang // dus sa na na kyang // mya man tha~Mng tha pa mag rnam
131a2(rnying rgyud): dargya la rdugs pa'i mtha' gnas pa/ rgyagag pa rnams dan// dag pa'i dadag gnas mas sa da rnam / pa na nas sas dan can dgra pa
131a3(rnying rgyud): rtag mAnA pa'i 'jig rten gnas// de dag maHles khams sa me dang // rje bras bad+ma/ ram thod ngas/ tshul meng y-i gad+han la son pa stod // sa rgyas pan gags lag/ de dag gti mug rabs bzabs// dmatha' ba rna
131a4(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'o// rmongs pa'i chags rnams can tu'ajug/ rang gi las thabs rnam spyong ba'o// phrag pas la nyon mongs choms sbyi / da sems snang ba jig // 'dod chags nyid kyinam rnyed bdag/ de dag chos rnams can dadang pa
131a5(rnying rgyud): na mongs tshogs bcas 'phel bar byed // ra ga las bzhin 'dag // ga tu chags sred med gdugadas/ cher 'brum rje'i n-i madrang ba sa// sa dag pa ga tad la sags stong // de nas las der rtags pa// brtan par cu
131a6(rnying rgyud): gzung bar byed// zhi khams chen pa 'thags// ni sdang chos can rjem slong // de rnye bar des da pa'i brdzas// ton mongs kyis kri byed par byed// de dag tu 'ardas 'bras pa tid// dmal 'jig rten la sogs ldang // rtswa can gams grags
131a7(rnying rgyud): da pas/ ga galas na tu/ ga bsngal ga snga ga kyis/ ngas medapar yongs bye de de ni bye // dam bad pal 'acan nas shes pa// na rnam
131b1(rnying rgyud): rnam par myos// zhing khams gzhan dag kha cig tu// phrag dog las kyi sa 'khor gyur te// bdag cag chos kun rnam brtags pas// de dag mya ngan sdug bsngal ba skyed// rang gi lta ba rnam 'dzin pas// thams cad chos las rab tu nyams// yon
131b2(rnying rgyud): tan 'dod pa'i dngos po la// kun tu 'dzin pas bdag sgrub byed// gzhan rtogs gnas kun phrag dog nyid// nyon mongs sdug bsngal spyad bcas pa'i// yan lag gzhan tshogs rnam bskyed pas// rtog pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas// de las rdzab
131b3(rnying rgyud): yan lag go// rgyu dang bcas kyi ming sogs gnas// rang gi mthu yis kun tu snang // dus kun mngon par zhen pa'i thugs// gzhan dag bstan pa la gnas byed// mngon par 'pho ba'i las kun gyis// lha la sogs pa'i 'gro ba kun// rang gi
131b4(rnying rgyud): ma nga bya bar// dam lug 'anas snang / 'bras na du rgyas byer 'ardzur// de ny-i nga ma tshogs 'du // la na byud sbyin byed pas// yun lagatu shas rnasaH ste// 'gro sanas pa
131b5(rnying rgyud): par 'grub// kha cig de dag kun 'dzin cing // kha cig de dag cha la gnas// las kyi 'khor lo rnam rgyas pa// sangs rgyas nyid la 'khor ba'i gnas// zhing khams chen po gzhan dag na// spyod bcas de las grol 'dod cing // de nyid rgyu rkyen las
131b6(rnying rgyud): kun spod// de dag brtags pas gzhan gnas te// de dag zlos pas gzhan du 'khrul// de nyid tshul las grol 'dod pa'i// thabs kyis ma zin gang zag dag/ theg pa dman pa'i lam spyod cing // mya ngan mi 'da' rtog kun 'dzin// thabs gzhan
131b7(rnying rgyud): theg pa'i rim pa bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen blos// zhing khams chen po rnam sbyangs shing // rnam grol mya ngan 'das lam bsgrub// de nas rigs rnams kun gyi bdag/ bcom ldan kun tu bzang po dpal// rang byung ye shes gdan
132a1(rnying rgyud): lpags // rgyas kyi nga 'a naganas// sangs rgyas na nga gangs pa 'dun// thugs myad stan ldan pas// 'a 'ams can pa bsam yas par// gangal su n+tad rnams dag par gzigs// dan bugs
132a2(rnying rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun snang byas// zhing khams chen po bsnam yas kyi// chos rnams 'od gsal mnyam par sbyor// rigs kyi rgyal ba thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor 'phrul par gsol ba gradab// de skar
132a3(rnying rgyud): ga pa'i mtshan gnas pa// rgya ched bstan pas ga la gling zhing // rgya cha theg pa skyeng ba'i phyir// phyag sung thugs hU~M b+hIl 'chir shing // thabs ma la su spyan tu rnas spyod mdzod// gtse bas lamang gyi tshig gsan te// thugs rjes phyogs rnams
132a4(rnying rgyud): sgrib med par// chos rnams thams cad mnyam sbyor zhing // gzhan dag rnam par byed bskyed do// de'i tshor yul kun 'gro ba'i phyir// mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor don bzhin bsnyen// dkyil 'khor chen po nyams dga' ba'i// 'og min gnas kyu rnam
132a5(rnying rgyud): bkod pa// de dag dus gsum rgyal ba'i sgra// rdul phran grangs me rigs kyi tshogs// dkyil 'khor me po grol 'gyur yang // zhing khams mtha' yas bas ma 'dres pa'i// 'gro rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// rang bzhin bdud rtsi'i
132a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'di// thams cad kun tu ston par mdzad// yon tan chen po'i byin rlabs las// snang ba'i 'od kyis kun khyab cing // rab tu sbyangs ba zung 'jug pa// snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid do// rigs mchog gso bo bzang po nyid// zhol ba
132a7(rnying rgyud): zla ba mdangs bzang gsal// g.yas sdig yon pa dmar ba'i bzhin// phyag drug rin chen rgyan gyis mdzes// rang gi gsang sngags kyi brdzogs pa// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // 'chi med bdud rtsi bum bcas phreng // kun tu bzang mo'i
132b1(rnying rgyud): gnas sbyor cing // dbu skra rin chen dbu rgyun mdzes// na bza' rgyan bcas rnam grol ba// thabs dang shes rab skyil krung gis// lha yi rgyal po'i khang bzang gnas// rin chen nyi zla par dkyil bzhugs// rin chen 'bar ba'i khrir bcas pa
132b2(rnying rgyud): khang pa gru bzhi mu khyud ldan// re cha'i phreng ba bzang po dang // 'khor lo bcu drug par khyams bcas// sgo khang rta babs ldan pa la// tA ra Na bzhi bkod pa dang // sna tshogs rgyan gyis nye bar sgras// padz+ra rdo rje phreng ba dang // 'dod pa'i
132b3(rnying rgyud): so kun gyis bklubs// de nas rin chen sa gzhi la// khri sted pad ma nyi zlas brgyan// thams cad rnam par bkod byas te// gnas ma tshig bla med gzhan snang ba'o// rang gi gsang sngags kyis bskyed cing // phyogs rnams kun tu
132b4(rnying rgyud): sa // nyid gdu bu'i gnasas snang // ye shes byi nubs sems byad // sus byung mo ba'i mangs// tshul cig zug gnyisa'i na// dkar mna' rnams can kyis mangs// 'di bar rdza wA'i 'a
132b5(rnying rgyud): can// gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskyed byas pa'i// yig 'bru phyag rgya'i mtshan ma kun// rang gnas 'od zer 'phro 'du'i stobs// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bzang po'i tshogs// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa// 'khor los sgyur rgyal ri
132b6(rnying rgyud): chen sku// btso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra las// nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid can// zhal bzhi dkar dmar sngo ba dag/ phrin las bzhi yi mdangs bcas pa// phyag rgya g.yas kyi bzhi dag na// rin chen spungs pa'i bum pa dag/ nyi ma'i
132b7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'dzin// g.yon na pad+ma'i phreng ba dang // 'chi med bdud rtsi zla ba'o// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis bklubs// rin chen dbyings kyi yum dang 'khril// rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma dang // sna tshogs rgya gram rtags kyi rgya/
133a1(rnying rgyud): ! / phyogs brtu'i gro ba'i don smos te// rang bzhin kun tu babang po'i gdas// dbang bsku sa tshan ma pas byung ba'o// rigs kyi bdag pas bu can pa// l+h+wa ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// uHla bu dgram bzang
133a2(rnying rgyud): po'i mdog/ bdud rtsi'i bum brdas phreng bas mangs// sna tshogs dang gyen bzas bklubs// gnyis med 'brel pa'i byin rlabs kyis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'tha bar mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa' chags bcas bdag/ bde gshegs thugs
133a3(rnying rgyud): rnam 'phrul zhing // rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa// thabs dang shes rab mnyam par sbyor// de bzhin tshogs rnams ku \u0f7fyang // rang rigs byin rlabs sngags kyi mthus// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam sdang mdzad//
133a4(rnying rgyud): dpag med den yod grub// mthing ga dkar po dmar dang ldang // rdo gyi lnga 'khor lo dang // pad+ma nA ga ma dril bus mtshan// rigs sgra mngon par snang byed cing // 'od mdungs rgyan gyi gleng bas mdzes// lha mod rje dab phrag ma// bdag she sad
133a5(rnying rgyud): phyug chos dbang phyug/ sna tshogs dbang phyug gtso bzhi dang // chags pa'i rgyan bcas mnyes 'dzin cing // rin chen bum bcas phreng ba 'dzin// mnyam pa'i rol stabs 'khril pas gnas// rigs kyi bde gshegs che rnams kyi// zhal
133a6(rnying rgyud): gsum g.yas g.yon dkar dang dmar// mthing ga ldang ser khyad par can// tha ma'i phyag bzhi bdud rtsi'i sdod// rang gi gsang sngags phyag mtshan kyang // 'phro 'du sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs// byams pa stobs ldan dgra' ba'i
133a7(rnying rgyud): dpal// mya ngan mun sel blo gros mchog/ mabs mdzad brtan pa'i dbang zug dang // chos bur skyong ba'i ni med dpal// bzang po'i rgyan can las slebs rdzogs// mi ga yo phyag rgya gtsug phrang can// tshong kyi stong po gzhan brtsig/
133b1(rnying rgyud): grags par na chen tog// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mangs pa'i mdangs// rin chen rgyan tshogs rna bcas mdzes// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// rigs kyi ma tshan mas brgyan te gnas// shAr na dka gas la rdo rje che// lha phyogs gsor gyi 'ab ma hA
133b2(rnying rgyud): nub tu dmar ser pad ma rgyas// byang ni ldang ser bya gram brtsegs// rigs kyi mtshan ma kun spyod cing // mkhas mchog 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas// rang 'od yum dang 'khril gyur cing // sprul pas 'gro ba'i'adin brtson pa'i// phyi yi dkyil 'khor de rnams su/
133b3(rnying rgyud): sa
133b4(rnying rgyud): gas zang ba dbyang ba dang gas// dkar mthang nga mu drang zang chu mad// me 'du sri de 'i yang dang // gar gyi phyogs brgyad bti 'amadzad pa// 'dug gyim mi to ga sa mang// sa snyed ngas dang yang bu ma da// rang gi mtshan pa sa
133b5(rnying rgyud): phyogs rnams kun tu spro byed pa'o// sgor gnas khro bo'i rgyal po dang // 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis yum dang bcas// dkar ser dmar dang ljang gu'i mdog/ zhal gzhan de las rnam 'gyur zhing // phyag dug tho ba dbyug pa dang // pad+ma Dal gri rdo rje che// 'khor
133b6(rnying rgyud): waM dang bcas rnam par bskur// spyan gsum khro gnyer 'jigs po'i zhal// phyogs bzhi 'byung po'i gdan steng du// dur khrod rgyan gyis rnam par brjid// yum bzhi lcags kyi nags pa dang // lcags sgrog dri la bcas yab pa 'khyud// de dag rang
133b7(rnying rgyud): gi bdag pa yis// dbang bskur byin rlabs rdzogs bcas pas// sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gnas rgyas shing // dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing spod// yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul gi dang po'o// // gzhan yang rnam par ba
134a1(rnying rgyud): pa ye// zhing khams gnas gzhan byung ba'i phyir// dbang bar gsal ba 'dzig nyid// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i gnas 'jug pas// kun tu sgra dang gsung shi dang // thugs sa chog yon tan phrin las rtse// byin rnabs
134a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa kun spyod pa// thams cad chos nyid de bzhin nyid// gsang ba'i don gyi rnam 'phrul zhing // phyogs rnams kun tu ston byed pa// yang dag chos sku chen po la// thugs rje'i shugs kyis snang mdzad pa// de dag khams gsum ji lta bar
134a3(rnying rgyud): rab tu sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// ye shes dbyings las snang ba yi// khang pa gru bzhi sgo bzhi mdzes// sangs rgyas theg pa kun 'dus pa'i// rin chen ta la'i phreng bas brgyan// padz+ra rdo rje sna tshogs dang // 'dod pa'i yon tan lha mo tshogs//
134a4(rnying rgyud): rta babs bzhi bcas rin chen tog/ 'khor los mtshan pa'i ka ba dang // gdung ma shar bu'i rgyan gyis mdzes// dbus kyi che'i gnas nyid la// 'khor mo'i phreng bas mdzes byas pas// gu chad par khyams rnams kyis brgyan// rin chen
134a5(rnying rgyud): sna lnga'i sa gzhi la// ji bzhin rin chen khri gdan dang // mi 'jigs seng ge la sogs gnas// nyi zla pad+mas mdzes byas shing // chu na dpyang dang la sogs pas bkrabs// de nas rigs kyi bdag po nyid// rang gi dkyil 'khod rnam 'phrul zhing
134a6(rnying rgyud): rigs rnams mnyam pa chen po'i chos// thams cad chos kun sbyor mdzad pa'o// 'gro rnams rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhing // gti mug nyid kyis 'khor ba yis// bag chags gnas tshogs nyon mongs rnams// chu 'bras thabs rnams mal byed cing //
134a7(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba mtha' dag dganas nyid// yang dag chos dbyings ma shes che// rtag tu rang gi gnas spyod pa// thabs ldan rnam babyor kun gyi yul// de dag tu 'bras sal bar mdzod// pho brang rin chen kun gyis mdzes// yon tan gnas kyi dbus
134b1(rnying rgyud): bzhugs pa// rang sngags phyag rgyas bsrung byas te// zhal gsum dkar sngo dmar ba'i mdangs// gtso ba rnam par snang mdzad mchog/ phyag drug nor bu rin chen bum// 'khor lo ral gri 'bar ba can// rdo rje dri la bus mtshan byas pa// rang po na
134b2(rnying rgyud): shes rab rigs kyi yum// pade gshegs sems ma dkar dmar mdangs// g.yas pas pad+ma g.yon phreng ba// thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbar nas// 'khor los sbyar rgyal cha lugs kyis// yon tad tshogs 'joms mnga' brnyes shid/
134b3(rnying rgyud): phyogs rnams thugs rje chen po'i dngos// kun tu ye shes 'gro mdzad pa// de ltar nyon mongs khyad par dang // thun mong rtog tshogs 'dul mdzad cing // rang gi dkyil 'khod gnas bzhugs shing // rang gi yon tan phrin las spyod// phyogs bcu
134b4(rnying rgyud): spros don byas nas// rigs bdag sku dang gnyis med sbyor// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan dag kyang // rang gi phyag rgyagasang sngags mthus// myo gas rnams kun tu spos byas te// rang gi gdan la rdzogs par gnas// mthing gi mdang ldan mi brjod du//
134b5(rnying rgyud): dgang dang dmar pa 'igal gnyis sa so// rdorje 'khor mo 'i chenarnam// pang sdong rin myen thong ba 'dod// rin che 'ing ldan gser gyi mdog/ dkar zhing dam pa pa ltan rnams na// rin ched kyi dpa' 'khor dang // badz+ra u thal 'an pa dzin//
134b6(rnying rgyud): mnang yas gur bum mjug/ mthing gang kang del byag rnams na// pad+ma rjo 'i khor khro chen mdzes// bad rtsi bsi lag pab phreng ba 'dzin// don sgrub sa rag ta y-i me ngas// se lags gnyis byug d+hag gis// su tshogs pa mdzo /
134b7(rnying rgyud): rid cid pa rda 'thong ba 'dzin// ni ba'i rkyen rnams kun gyis mdzes// dbye byung rin chen ni bzas bslabs// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer myong// rang gi zan las rnam spyod pa// sems mngo chan pa// rdo chos pa pas dang 'tha'// de dag da
135a1(rnying rgyud): dmar ljang mdog/ rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // sna tshogs mtshan mas yab la 'khyud// 'od bcas rgyal bas dbang bskur ba'o// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul tshogs// bde ga shegs so'i chen nyid// pad+ma sna sngags
135a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje che// 'od zer rnam lnga'i dkyil 'khor 'phrul// de bzhin rigs kyi sems dpa'i mchog/ rang sngags phyag rgyas rnam bskyed cing // rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas kun tu// sprul pa'i rigs brdas tshogs kyi gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po cha/
135a3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin chag pa dang legs pa gnyis// pating gzhal gcig tug gnyis pa// ngaji dri la bus mtshad rnas pa na// rje nyi chen nyi ma dang // de bzhin rgyab mtshar 'a'ad pa dag/ gser mdo gan mug N+DI gaphyag gnyis pa// rin chengs rgyan pa
135a4(rnying rgyud): bu'adzin// chos dang rnon po 'khor lo dang // rdo rje smra ba zhes bya dang // pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs ldan zhing // pad+ma'i rdo rje dril bus mtshan// rdo rje phrin las gnod sbyin dang // rdo rje spang ba khu tshur dag/ in+d+ra nI la'i mdangs ldan pa// sna tshogs rdo rje dril bus
135a5(rnying rgyud): mtshan// rang 'od yum dang mnyam sbyor zhing // rang gi phrin las rnam par spyod// rigs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pa'i// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin nyid// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs te// dge ba bde'i longs spyod rnam par ros// phyo
135a6(rnying rgyud): rnams sprul pa mtha' yas pa'i// mchod pa che la longs spyod cing // mi 'jigs bsnyems pa'i sgyu rtsal can// de dag gnas kun sbyor mdzad pa'o// ye shes che gnas snang byed cing // rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun snang bar// las kun snang ba
135a7(rnying rgyud): ston mdzad pa// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin pa'o// khyad par bde gshegs rigs kyi tshogs// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor la phyogs pa// sgron ma ye shes chos ston rgyas// gnyis med byang chub mkha'i spyod pa// thams cid don
135b1(rnying rgyud): kun rigs kyis brgyan// de dag phrin las kun spyod mdzad// bde gshegs snang bsal kun spyad dang // rab chags dga' ba'i dbang phyug mo// rigs kyi bde gshegs bskyed mdzad yum// phyag rgya'i cha lugs kun gsal ba// 'khor lo rgyal
135b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan rdo rje dang // rin chen pad+ma bdud rtsi rdzas// dkar mthing dmar zhing ldang ba'i mdog/ rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// phyi rol phyag rgya rol pa'i tshigs// mchod pa mtha' yas rnam bkod pa'i// sgeg po phreng
135b3(rnying rgyud): dang dbyangs gar bcas// bdug pa me tog yar me dri// dkar ser dmar dang lung gu'i mdog/ mthi dA ga pir sbyad mar zhing lding // rang gi lag cha kun yin pa // tshogs rnams dkyil 'khor lnga gnas pa'o// sgo bzhir khro bo'i rgyal po kun
135b4(rnying rgyud): zhal gsum phyug drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gshin rje 'joms mdzad stobs po che// rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang // dkar dmar mthi ga g.yas g.yon zhal// phyogs kyi snang ba ji bzhin 'bar// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma la/
135b5(rnying rgyud): bla mA bdud rtsi'i snod thogs shing // ljags kyu la sogs yum bcas rgyas// rang gi gdul bya mnan par mdzad// rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur zhing // phyag rgya'i cha lugs rdzogs pa las// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis/
