135b7(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs gsung gi byin rlabs kyis// 'dod chags mtha' gnas dag mdzad cing // zhing khams kun tu rnam spong pa// de ster lhag pa'i phrin las kyis// mtha' dbu'i 'od kyis khyab mdzad cing // zangs kyi dkyil 'khor
136a1(rnying rgyud): par bsgrub// ye shes rgyas pas kun khyab byed// de nas gzhal yas khang rgyan te// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// tA ra Na sa grwa log bzhi mdzes// padz+ra rdo rje'i phreng ba can// 'dod yon lha mo kun tu 'khrugs// b+hag
136a2(rnying rgyud): rgya sna tshogs mchod pas mdzes// dbus ni re'u cha dgu pa la// pad+ma'i phreng bas brgyan byas pa'i// phyi rol pad+ma bcu drug pa'o// gru chad bar khyams sgo khyud mdzes// rin chen 'bar ba'i khri snyed pa// nyi zla 'khor lo pad+ma'i gdan// gtso bo
136a3(rnying rgyud): chen chags pa'i rgyal// pad+ma'i gnas kun las spyod pa// zhal brkyang phyag rgya bcu drug ste// 'od mdangs dmar po'i rgyan gyis mdzes// pad+ma rdo rje mda' gzhu dang // ral gri bum pa phreng ba gos// 'od zer sna lnga'i tshogs dag las// rigs
136a4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun ston mdzad// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan chas dang // dbu rgyan dar gyi na bzas bklubs// 'khor los srur rgyal cha lugs kyis// rang gi longs spyod kun nas skyong // lha mo pad+ma bde chen mi// dkar dmar chags pa'i mad
136a5(rnying rgyud): ldan pas// pad+ma bdud rtsis mtshon byas shing // thabs dang shes rab sbyor bar gnas// rdo rje rnam 'phrul la sogs pa'i// phyogs bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa// rdo rje bde ba chen po dang // rin chen pad+ma las rnams kyi// bde chen
136a6(rnying rgyud): dang gnyis med sbyar// rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya yis// phyogs bcur spro dang bsdu mdzad cing // dkar mning ser dang ljang bu'i mdod// rdo rje rin chen 'khor lo dang // rgyag madril bu bdud rtsi'i sdong // bum pa rin chen phreng ba dang // bzang po'i
136a7(rnying rgyud): gnas su brgyan byas la// zhal gsum g.yas g.yon rnam par bsgyur// chags pa'i rkyen cha kun gyis brjid// rang gi dkyil khor gnas rnams su// rigs kyi phyag rgya tshul du bzugs// phyi rol pad+ma'i gdan dag tu// 'de ba'i lha
136b1(rnying rgyud): bcu drug nyid// bkra shis lha mo dpal ldan 'phreng // rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ma dang // pad+ma'i phreng ba nor bdag mo/ dbyangs can lha mo'i rigs kun ming // don yod nor bu dpal chen ma// pad+ma'i dbyangs spogs rin chen 'chang // 'od zer chen
136b2(rnying rgyud): mo nor gyi rgyun// kun tu snang ba'i bsil ba ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis brjid pa'i mdangs// 'od zer cha lugs kun gyis mdzes// dkar mthing ser dang ljang gu'i mdog/ rdo rje rin chen 'khor lo che// rgya gram bdud rtsi'i bum pa can// rang
136b3(rnying rgyud): byung rig pa dang bcas pa'o// phyi nas mchod pa'i lha mo kun// gnas rnams kun na rnam par 'khod// sgeg mo phreng dang dbyangs mkhan gar// bdud spos me tog mar me dri// rang gi rigs bcas rgyan kun dang // la dog mtshan mar rnam par gnas/
136b4(rnying rgyud): sgo bzhir khro bo rnam brjid pa// 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha 'phreng bas 'khrigs// rang gi yum bcas srur sbyor zhing // lcags kyu zhags bcas tshogs spro mdzad// de dag dkyil 'khor ji bzhin par// phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams sna tshogs 'phrul//
136b5(rnying rgyud): zhing khams chen po skyong mdzad cing // rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub// gsung gi dkyil khor rnam par 'phrul ba'i tshul te gsum pa'o// / de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i mchog/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan snang bas// rigs
136b6(rnying rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor kun spyod zhing // thabs dang shes rab rnam par spyod// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// phyag rgya che mchog rton pa yi// 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas sgo// rab tu ston pas rdzogs byed cing // de gnas 'gro kun dag par mdzad/
136b7(rnying rgyud): dag chos sku chen po las// thugs rje'i shugs kyis snang mdzad pa// de dag khams gsum ji lta bar// rab tu sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// zhe sdang nyid kyis 'khor ba yi// bag chags sna tshogs nyon mongs rnams// rgya 'thos mtha' rnams sel
137a1(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i// don mthun ston pa'i dkyil 'khor tshogs// rang gi gsang sngags kun spros te// brtan dang g.yo ba ma lus kun// dkyil 'khor rigs bcus gzhal yas khang // khang pa gru bzhi rta babs rgyan// rin chen dra ba 'greng
137a2(rnying rgyud): sogs kyis// phyogs mtshams kun tu rnam spro zhing // nyi zla phreng ba rdo rje dang // nor bu pad+ma sna tshogs kyis// phreng ba kun gyis yang dag brgyan// de dbus re cha'i steng rnams su// rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ka ba dang // rin chen khri sted mi 'jigs
137a3(rnying rgyud): sogs// nyi zla pad+ma 'khor los brgyan// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// gsang yum dam tshig nyid kyi mthus// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// gtso bo rdo rje sems dpa'i sku// dkar gsal zhal gsum phyag drug brjid// sngo
137a4(rnying rgyud): dang dmar gri mdadra bcas pa// rdo rje 'khor lo nor bu dang // pad ma ral gri mdzes pa'i phyag/ kha dog lnga yi 'od gsal bas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrol// phyogs rnams kun tu spros byas te// gsang sngags rdzogs pa'i gnyis med
137a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// phyogs rnams kun nas dbang bskur cing // rigs kyi bdag pos nye bar mdzes// thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i mthus// rigs kyi bde gshegs thams cad kun// sngags dang phyag rgya rdzogs byas te// phyogs rnams rang gi gnas su sbyong//
137a6(rnying rgyud): shar gyi rnam snang gser gyi mdog/ zhi la zhal gsum sngo dang dkar// phyag rngug 'khor lo sogs 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas spyan dang 'khril ba'o// ston rin chen kun 'byung rgyal// bi DUr+ya med gzhal gsum pa// dkar dmar rin chen sna tshogs brgyan//
137a7(rnying rgyud): thug rin chen la sogs kyis// mtshan ma yum bcas rgyal po'i tshul// yon tan gnas kun rgyas mdzad pa'o// nub tu mtha' yas dam gsal mdog/ zhal gsum sngo dang dkar ba'i bzhin// pad+ma'i rgyan chas rnam dag mkha'// chos rnams
137b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad rdzogs par byed// b+hag rngug ldarga la sogs pa'o// mtshan pa rdas dang gnas yA ma dngu 'khril// thang du ngon po ltang bu'i mdog/ zhal gsum dkar dang dmar ba 'a dul// kAn d+ha ldan las rnam spyod pa// rang gi dkyil 'khor gsal bar
137b2(rnying rgyud): mdzad// phyag drug rgya gram la sogs pa'i// rgyan bcas sum dang marnam par sbyor// rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' dang // phyogs mtshams kyi rol dkyil 'khor la// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon byas pas// gnas kun rtsod pas yongs su brgyan/
137b3(rnying rgyud): sa snying nam mkha'i snying po dang // kun tu gzigs pa gsang ba'i bdag/ byam pa pa sgrib sel kun tu bzang // 'jam dpal chos kyi sems dpa' che// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgyan dang bcas// yum bcas rang gi gnas spyod cing // phyag rgya
137b4(rnying rgyud): tshul kun nye bar mdzes// dkar ser de mar dang ljang gu'i mdod// dkar sngo ser dang dbang pa nyid// 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang // rdo rje bum pa zla dkyil 'khor// nye ba'i rin chen rdzas ldan pa// bdud rtsi bdung sogs rnam par rgyal// rin chen snyams
137b5(rnying rgyud): ma bkra shrIs rdzas// rigs kyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur cing // rigs kyi bdag pos dbu chan mdzad// ye shes bdud rtsi'i brgyad byas pa'i// phyogs mtshams dkyil 'khor kun spong ba'o// rtsi dang mchong ba'i lha mo rnams// dngag gsung sngags kyis
137b6(rnying rgyud): bskyed cing // sgeg mo phreng ba gar dang dbyangs// bajug spos me tog mar me ni// kha dog mtshan ma rigs rnams kyis// mtshan mthun rdzogs bzhir gnas pa dag/ kun tu mchod pa rnam sgo mdzang // de dag dang gi dkyil 'khor sbyor// slob
137b7(rnying rgyud): sgo nga'i rgyal po rnams// gshin rje la sogs pa dan la gnas// shang dugashin rje ngo mas byed pa'o// sngo rtsa zhe la gsum dkar dang dmar// rdo rdo rjegyi gsum lcags kyu dang // dbyug pa phrag gnyis yum dang spyor// sgo phyogs spobs tsha rdul po
138a1(rnying rgyud): da// sang ldan la gsus dag du nga dmang // phyag drug pa thog tu shishang dang // zhags par chen yum dang 'brel// mug rdzog rol pa nyid// dpa sa thul gsums dang kar// phyag dug
138a2(rnying rgyud): thags srog gri gug yum dang 'brel// byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa nyid// zhal gsum ldang dag dkang dam mdangs// phyag rgyag rgya mchegasum dang // rdzol du thod pa dbug pa'o// de dag po ma 'dzin pa skye pa// rab 'bar da
138a3(rnying rgyud): dang gi dpel ba lta rung // nga gi gnas la 'angs ston mdzad// lcags kyig gse rdzogs TIg la// gas bcas las// gang kyil sa
138a4(rnying rgyud): grangs med tshogs// spel brgyas kun tu snang ba dang // gsang sngags rgyug tshogs sa// zhing khams rgya chen dag par mdzad// thugs byed kyil po ra 'phrul pa'i tshul te bzhi pa la/ de ni rigs rnams
138a5(rnying rgyud): gtse// bcom ldan pa de'i chen po nyid// ri srid dkyi 'khor gnas spyo ci // phyogs rnams kya tho ba mdzad// ra ga cung zag dog chen po'i da/ ga pa'i thos kyis dmathus pa// da sbyin las pa rjod pa// ga nas
138a6(rnying rgyud): bubyer// grapa de ljags rdzu ma 'phrul zhi // zhi pas can stong dag pa mdzad// ye shes 'bar pa'i gzhal yos dang // phyogs brgyaHyo pacad pa'i// rabargyad pa sa pazhi phrengs// bas kyi
138a7(rnying rgyud): sa su sa la sa nga/ mas/ yangan
138b1(rnying rgyud): pad+ma// gyis mangs// dz+dza/ 'du klu ste// theng brgyan pacas tog gis mangs// den chen+da nA lha sa gaganyid// bcad kru gnas rnam byed pa// rgyags rdo po zung byed// brgya drug brjo par blangs pas/
138b2(rnying rgyud): can tshogs// nyi ma rdo rje rgya gram brtsegs// gtso bo rigs kyi bdag po nyid// zhal gsum sdang ser 'bar ba'i mdog/ ldang dkar dmang mdangos zhal gyis mdzes// phyag drug 'khor lo 'khor ba dang // nyi zla bdud rtsi phreng bas brgyan//
138b3(rnying rgyud): rgyun bcas pas// 'od zer sna tshogs phreng bas brjid// phrin las rnam par spros pa yi// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun ston mdzad// thams cad mthar gnas dag pa'i mthus// stobs chen sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul// las kyi dbang phyugang pa la chen
138b4(rnying rgyud): mo// dkar dmar zhal gcig phyag gnyis ldan// nor bu rin chen bdud kyi'i snod// sna tshogs gyen mdzes rnam par la zil// thabs dang shes rab spyod mdzad nas// phyag rgya sngags kyi byin rlabs kyis// thams cad dkyil 'khong gnas pa sbas te/
138b5(rnying rgyud): reg rgyal ba'i lha rnams kun// mchod pa'i yan+da lag rdzogs par bskyed// mi bgyod rin chen 'gyur ldan nyid// mtha' yas rnam par snang mdzad nyid// rang gi dkyil 'khor gdan bzhugs shing // mthing ser dkar dmar dkar po nyid// ku
138b6(rnying rgyud): kyang zhil gsum phyig drug par// dkar dmar mthing gA seng po brjid// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // 'khor lo bum pa bdud rtsi'i rdzas// nyi zla rin chen phreng bas mdzes// sna tshogs rgyan dang gos kyis bgrubs// bde ba dpal chen lha mo rnams/
138b7(rnying rgyud): seng dmar gyi ljang bu'i mdog/ rang gi dkyil 'khor de bzhin par// 'od mdangs phreng bas gnas spyod cing // rigs kyi dkyil 'khong gtso mnyes mdzod// sna tshogs rdo rje'i gnas rnams kyi// pho zang gdan la mngon phyogs par// bde ba'i ma'i 'a 'gro
139a1(rnying rgyud): rangag rdzags rnam par 'al// pa dgardzogs pa pad nas dang // gdus la pa nyis chag/ ma ma ngas tu nyid/ blang // dpam pags ga'
139a2(rnying rgyud): poste// dpa' tu ts+tsha kha mas kyi bdag/ lce yi bang thug ther btsun// bra ni gnas phyo ba'i dug se leg/ gang byi ni kyob nyes parje// dregs pa ngoms byed rigis ldang mchog/ rang shi 'od sa dang // dang shig nas sma
139a3(rnying rgyud): dad bang+gA dang // ma byed// du / sa dang/
139a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i zhwa lo rnams// rigs kyi sngags dang phyag rgya ste// sgeg mo phreng ba gang dang dbyangs// bdug spos me tog mang me d+hi// sku mdog phyag mtshan rigs rnams hrI// phyogs bzhi mam bris dang ma thun por gnas// mthong ba
139a5(rnying rgyud): ljongs myo kun skal zhing // grangs med de la phyogs pa kong pa mdzod// zla san pa zo bo'i rgyal po dag/ rnatshogs rdo rje brag ri la// rang gi phrin las kA yul ba'i tshigs// don bzhin mdzun par ma
139a6(rnying rgyud): sas pan gyis dzi// gzhi kyi 'jos pa byed sto \u0f7f// ta ma thi 'dzi mi ma theng la dag/ dkar med dmang dang ste bu'i mdo// ngo ba // 'aring po 'ab bas sla
139a7(rnying rgyud): pa ba gyi so+o// 'jigs byed rtsa gsum dag thogs/ cha lugs dpe rjeng pos// sto gsum rtul bas dgengs pa byed// da gas pa'i 'dus// rig bdag pos nye ba
139b1(rnying rgyud): 'di dag rang gi gnas kun nas// zhing khams thams cad khyab par // rten las kyi dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i tshul te lnga pa'o// / de nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po nyid// da
139b2(rnying rgyud): gnas spros shing // ljongs me de rigs kyi kun snang mdzad// la la ni dang khro bo dang // lnga lar rgyas nang dbang gi/ tshul// grangs med sgra rnams su // rigs pazhid kyi lang long rgyas por mdzad// drangag sto pas
139b3(rnying rgyud): thag pa'i don rtog tu chen po// bde gshegs kun kye sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las ji bzhin pa'i// gsung brgyad chen rnam bshad cing // phyogs bcu'i zhing khams sun smos te// rigs kyi sangs rdzas gnyis med ma zu//
139b4(rnying rgyud): gnas brgyan pa'o// bdag po'i sgra dang gnyis med gos lo// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bsku // de nyid de tshe 'briganas mtha' dag kun// kunas bsten pa 'dul tshur cing / yana'i gnas spyod pas// skye na mdza ba cad rnam par grol/
139b5(rnying rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal ba chen po bdu kyi rol ba zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems de 'o ting bstad cing dkyil 'khor kun tu 'jal ba te la par rtse ba dang po'i// denas kun tubabang po dpal// sangs kyis kyis gsol btab nas// rang bzhin
139b6(rnying rgyud): 'i gnas bzhugs to// A yana'i tshogs rgyas mdang // rdzogs brgya 'jig rten gnas 'di dag/ bde gshegs rkyen napas rol pa'i rdzogs// byang chub sems dbang spong // bdud rdzi na can rgyas pa nyid// rnams na
139b7(rnying rgyud): pas// tho 'phrul chad byung yub kun ldang // de nas tshangs pa'i gtso ba ma chog/ drang gi zong rdzogs khong ser can// tshangs pa kun sgrol chen po dang // drang srong chen po ljang rjod du// cang kang ri napas byas// tha skang du dang lhang bcas ting /
140a1(rnying rgyud): shes gnas dang ga yan lcags lha// thang pa bar dngam pade pa // dadu gnyis kyang da dka na pa// sh-i k+She phun ldang rngon pa// ti ma thA ba b+hU // shi shi dang chang ma// skad ci gas gyur/
140a2(rnying rgyud): kur nga khong dang bcas pa yas// kun bzang lha la phyag 'tshal nas// sman gyi dbang dang dam chog mnos// rang bzhin bdud rtsi chen po'i mchog/ dus kun 'gyur ba med pa'i gzhi// bdag cag 'jiganyen pa rnams la// ga bos bka' thos
140a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad par 'os// bcom ldan thugs rje'i gnas gyur cing // nam mkha' bzhin du kun khyab mdzad// yang dag sangs rgyas ma thob pa'i// 'jig rten spyod bcas rnam grol mdzod// thams cad bdud d+hi sA ya nra// dngos grub chen po nye pa'i rdzas/
140a4(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten lha bcas 'gro gnas dag/ dkyil 'khor gas bar dbang bsrung zhing // bdud rtsi dam tshig mthog 'di zung // de dag dum bzhin sbyor byed cing // kun tu bskyen dang nye bsnyen dang // grub durang chub rjen brtson pa yis// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu
140a5(rnying rgyud): byed pas// de dag ji bzhin goms pa'i mthus// thams cad chos kyi tshul thud sdang // rigs mthur gzhan gyis mi shig pa'o// ma tshig chen po rdzogs byed chos// thugs rje hi pas kun slobo mdzor// de nas kun bzang ba de gshegs
140a6(rnying rgyud): thams tha bdud rtsi'i da dgongs to// nyid kyi snang ba ma 'ag gas che te// tshong rdu la chud kyi gang pa ma dang / gas sngon ma 'phrul ze// sarnam pa rab tug ma padi// sbyong ga pad ga // rnams
140a7(rnying rgyud): sman chen bcud kyi len// skye ba med las thams cad byes// de dag ma 'gags la sa rdzogs pa'o// de ltar smin par phur pa yang // drugs rje'i rtse mtsho cheng med las// rnam dga'abyung ba'i rten khyab pas// rten 'bre tshogs par
140b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// sprin chen srog gi phreng ba dag/ phyogs bcur sgrib med rgyun banas pa'i// bdud rtsi 'dod pa'i char 'bab cing // thams cad thugs rje snyoms pa'i mgon// bskal pa'i bcud rnams chags pa las// gyi dang 'byung rnams choms par gyur/
140b2(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi rgya mtsho'i gnas rgyas pa// phyi nang ma lus bdud rtsi kun bskyed cing // ring ba rtse dang ri su la kun// sman ljongs gnas dang nags tshal dang // lcang lo can gyi gnas kun tu// thams cad bdud rtsi'i chang kyis brlan// bcud du rnams
140b3(rnying rgyud): cad ro gcig ste// 'byung ba'i bcud las skyes pa ni// dpag bsam shing dang gel pa'i shing // 'dzam bu'i shing rgyus ts+tsha ta'i shing // rang rang rgyud kyi tshogs rnams dang // yon tan tshogs rnams 'phel bur gyur// sdong po dang ni stod chen dang // rtsa ba
140b4(rnying rgyud): sdong bu shun lpags dang // snying po yal ga lo ma dang // 'dab me me tog 'bras bung bcas// de bzhin 'bru tshogs rnam grangs kun// thams cad bcud rgyas smin par gyur// de dag longs lho de kun gyi mchog/ so so'i yul dang gnas
140b5(rnying rgyud): gnas// mdog dang dri dang ro dang mthu// rang gi sa bon bden gnyis las// de dag rang bzhin 'byin par byed// der gnas skye 'gro thams cad kun// ra sA ya na ni rdzas la spyod// 'gro ba drug gi gsos su gyur// bdud rtsi'i sgo dag
140b6(rnying rgyud): rnam par 'phel// de nas ston pa kun tu bzang // nyid kyi dgongs pa'i don bzhin du// 'bod ldan tshogs la bka' stsal zhing // de dag byin rlabs ngo mtshar skyed// 'jig rten khams snang sna tshogs kun// thams cad bdud rtsi'i rgya
140b7(rnying rgyud): gyis sdang // de dag phyi nang sdod bcud kyi// rten 'brel mthur bcas kun tshogs pade// ran bzhin gnyis med ye shes che// dag pa'i thugs rje kun myong mas// thams cad sman chen re sde yan// rnam par 'phrul pas gnas
141a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas// dedag gnyis med rtsad pa gas// skang sa dag gas bzung thub// rang bzhi gnas pa lda rnams la// brlabs pa rdzobs dgags// da brtson pa mthag za cid/
141a2(rnying rgyud): par bra tha~Mng gnas 'phel 'gyur// lam 'dir grags dang phyag tu yis// bai stsu btu rnam pa // dang po 'i snru pa'i tshul gnas de// rang gi yid 'thun dpyo pang bamam+b+ha// du ma gapa bzhi ldan pas// dbang
141a3(rnying rgyud): dam tshig mchog la gnas// sngags dung phyag rgya bstan pa'i mthus// thams cad don thong 'bras bu'i tshul// phyi nang byung ba las byis pa'i// bdud rtsi'i rdzas rnams gang rung zhig/ dkyil lakhor gtsang ba'i gdas byezhag ste// ngang girten
141a4(rnying rgyud): 'brel rgyal bzhin phyung// grub pa'i dngos grub ca po nyid// las kyi dang sa thub la brted pas// thams cid don kun gsang brji gnas// seMs kyi sgrub pa ji bzhin du// brten pa'i stobs kyis mngon par sbyor// thabs da
141a5(rnying rgyud): da ga nyis mer ba'o// tshul 'dres thams cad 'grib byed shing // laswA bcas rdzogs rnams dang 'byu // gnyis byed rdzogs rje rje d+d+ha kyai // ni ma m+b+hi ba la garten pas// mchog gi dngas grub sde par 'gyur// de ga
141a6(rnying rgyud): bde prab+h+yas// yang dge pajug ga 'dus kyigs// de gas pa'i phung ba zhin// da 'o// 'di dmadon bsu// / 5/ byu phyas rgag na gan po'o// la sa nga
141a7(rnying rgyud): pas nyi theg gcig gis 'grug/ lal nyi ni grags cu kyis grig// la // oM parnal po la // ngadagi sa pa me dpeng jug/ 'di dan yang thogangs banan// kyi tsha gnang du ma bya
141b1(rnying rgyud): de dag sman gyi mtshan nyid ni// rtsa ba sdong bu ya la ga dang // lo ma me tog 'bras bu dang // shun lpags me tog 'bras bu snying por bcas// ro drug mthu stobs kha dog las// rtsa ba gcig la yan lag brkyang // de dag rnam par bye 'a'i grangs
141b2(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs yon tan stong du 'gyur// rang bzhin sbyang dang sgrub pa'i rdzas// bzhi bkyi rtsa bzhi'i nad sel zhing // bdud dpung nges par 'doms byed pa'o// bdud rtsi'i rgyal po sman gyi mchog/ des bsgrub 'bras bu gsal bar 'gyur// dang srong che
141b3(rnying rgyud): rnams stobs ldan zhing // mngon shes lnga dang ldan 'gyur te// rig pa'i gnas mchog bco brgyad shes// tshol dbang ba'i rig 'don 'thob// stegs bu khru gang tshad mnyam par// pa ye rnam snga dri gtsang rgya// yang dag maN+Da'adi bzhin par// 'do
141b4(rnying rgyud): gyen ldan rdzas rnams bkod// gcong ma'i gos sogs nyir brgyad cing // khrus kyi cho ga rnam gsum gyis// kyi nang legs spangs rdzas bsags te// byung zhing rkyen gyis brlab par bya// dbus kyi bum par sman gyi mchog/ bdud rtsi tse re zhi rnam ga sul dang /
141b5(rnying rgyud): ser skye ba las byung ba yi// 'o ma legs btsags sman ldan pa// a shU ga na d+ha'i phye ma dag// legs par bskol te 'dzes par sbyang // lcags las byas pa'i snod dang du// mang nga gsum hri bcas gdab mang bya// rkyen brlang brtan pas ba
141b6(rnying rgyud): bya zhing // phyung zhing 'gro 'dra'i sngags kyis gdab// oM badz+ra a mr-i ta si d+hi be la lig tsa d+ha sa d+hi tu swA hA/ brgya rtsa brgyad dang stong rtsa brgyad// byin rlabs sngags kyi 'od tshogs kyis// dag pa'i bcud rnams bsdus byas te// banims pa
141b7(rnying rgyud): dngos grub rnam par 'phel// oM a mr-ita sid+d+hi bi tsun la swA hA/ dngos grub mtshon ma kun ston pa// de dag tshul bzhin rnam par byor// de nas lha rnams mdzod byas te// byin rlabs brtan pas bza' bang bya// de yang lde dro'i dang po'am// nyi ma'i gung pa ba
142a1(rnying rgyud): dus su// phyogs rnams khro bos gnas bsrungs shing // rigs kyi dkyil 'khor longs spyod rgyam// dron dam thig pa bden pa pata// phyor tan gnas klung du mog su ston// snying po med pas snying po nyid// 'bras
142a2(rnying rgyud): rnam smin rig 'dzin mchog/ de dag byin rlabs phyag ma thags// don bzhin spyod par mi ldan yang // bdud rtsi za ba'i thebs rnams kyis// nad med lo bcu 'tsho bar byed// drang srong chen po mchog rnams kyis// ji ltar phal par sbyong
142a3(rnying rgyud): pabyas// de 'i nus man mtha' lngas tshogs// dz+ha rdzogs rnam par sdang ba bsnyen// de dag logs phred myar ba'i mthus// mchog gi 'bras bu rtse bar 'byed// rang gi bdud zin pa lnga dang // hrI yi sman 'dis gsum sogs paM// seM ra
142a4(rnying rgyud): grong dang gcig bsdus pa'i// ci narna pas ngo mtshang mtha' yis te// rang gi rten 'brel ma tod cing // las kun lhung ba g.yo bar byed// lha rdzas dge ba a r+ya // rje ma rgyal ga sa byed 'phel gyir dang // skyes bu bdud rtsi gse ci mjog
142a5(rnying rgyud): las kun rnam par sbyin par tshogs// rang gi yon tan rdzas ldan pas// legs sbyang ba sA ya rdo'i mchod// de bzhin med nag lcags kyi dang // dngus chu grib ma la sogs pa'i// mthu dar ngo bo mtha' yas te// bdud rtsi'i gtso bong dang sbyar bas/
142a6(rnying rgyud): rlung dang mkhris pa pad kan dang // 'dus pa'i nad dang dus kyi dgra// dus min rnam zlog kyi nang rkyen// gcig le bye brag mtha' yas pa// de dag rab tu zhi byed pa// phung po de bdud dang nyon mongs bdud// lha yi bdud dang 'chi bdag bdud// thams
142a7(rnying rgyud): da sel bar byed pa pa// bdud rtsi 'dis pa ga dang med // shang sgo nub byung bye breg gi// srin las so so'i kyi khrag panid// zab pa 'dag pa la rdzab da/ dzin lnga tra'i rdul bzhin kyang// da ga tu tu ba'i badrang// ba
142b1(rnying rgyud): mchog ces thugs// a rbung mchog brgyartsabargyad// gzhan yang nyi shurtsa gcig pogs// pa ma chu sogs rim bzhin du// skam po rlon pa'i tshad lta byung// gnyer ma phul rag drangs byas te// ji'im sma tshogs bcud dang sbyar// bdud
142b2(rnying rgyud): gyi'i rgyal po de lta bar// rim bzhin bstan pa pardzogs par 'gyur// zangs lcags 'khang pa'i snong rnams su// bkang ste stegs bu'i steng du bzhig/ byin rlabs sngags dang phyug rgya yis// 'od dang drig gas 'byung bar 'gyur// lag
142b3(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa bteg ste ba ka na// mthe bong srin lag mthil du dgug// lha yi dngos grub kun bsdus nas// rigs dang ldan pas btung bar bya// oM a mr-i ta si ti bi ts+tshe nA ya swA hA/ de yi yon tan bzod mi lang+yas// rdo d+hA'i srog dang ldan 'gyur te// dang med
142b4(rnying rgyud): rtag tu dngal bab// grub pa'i rigs 'dzin dam par 'gyur// srid pa chags nas sub shing gis// bsrubs pa'i 'bres bu rin po che// me shel rgyu shel kun snang 'di// de dag thabs dang shes rab po// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor longs phyung ngus// ba
142b5(rnying rgyud): rtsi 'dzad las smon lam stobs// rigs pa'i bu mo bzang mo gnyis// gtsang ma'i gnas su skyes shing rgyas// lha dang dri za gnod sbyin dang // rin chen sna tshogs 'byung khungs gnas// legs ldan gang+gA gtan gyi shong // ri rab chu grung bgegs bral ba'i/
142b6(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi chen por mnye ba// nye'u shing mchog ces rab tu grags// gser mdog bdud rtsi kun gsal ba// sbyar bu mchog tu gyur pa yis// nyi ma'i rigs las kun skye zhing // gzugs mdo sa dza ba'i ro dang bcas// tsher gnon dpal las 'khrungs pa'i
142b7(rnying rgyud): bdud rtse shing mchog dri dang ldan// gzugs bzang mdzes pa phun sum tshogs// rkyen 'bru 'byung ba kun gyi bcud // de bzhin zla ba bdud rtsi'i chu// dug rnams 'dams shing wang yang 'brog/ sna tshogs nad nams sel bar byed// nyi pa'i dod rnams
143a1(rnying rgyud): byu 'dug/ rnams rnam pa \u0f7fgas ldan// zhwardzus dag pa dbang pa ga/ rab da chog byung band// thugs su 'a bzung ngas nas// grags kyang ga nga yang gnas dgas// dga' dal
143a2(rnying rgyud): bzhag bslab pa'am// gong bzhin legs par spyod pas bza'i// rten 'brel rten gyi mthu byas pa// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan par 'gyur// hI maM zla ba'i dngos grub thob// nga sA ya na'i gtso bo yin// 'jig rte nA gnas kun rje byed pa// 'byung ba'i
143a3(rnying rgyud): drangs ma kun bsags nas// mkhas pas gcig tu sbyar bar bya// dkyil 'khor bzang po'i gnas bzhag go// rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya dang // tIng 'dzin brtan pas byin gyis bad+mar// bdud rtsi shed mchog 'dam bu'i shing // lo moM me tog 'bras bar bcas/
143a4(rnying rgyud): yon tan brdung rdzogs rol ba// bkra shis dpal rnams rdzogs byed rdzas// seng lding yan lag brgyad ldan pa// dri snang babring po sman dang phyir// de bzhin rtsab yan lag dang // lo ma me tog 'bras bu sogs// rang gi bcud rnams rgyas pa'i dus// de yi phyogs dz+ra
143a5(rnying rgyud): mkhas pas gleng // se ba gzhon du spobs ldan pa// de bzhin kan ta tar dag/ dkyil la po gnas su legs skyed pa bya// bcud len bsted pas bcu rdzogs 'gyur// de dag lha rnams ku gyib kyang // ngo ngos grib rdza byin brlabs te// rdzas bzhi
143a6(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal mched byed cing // dngos su brjes su bar myodan thab chu dkyi du ying // 'ong brda dang nya sa tsapa// kyis pa'i drug bdud da byed // gtsang mas / bdan nyid rtul
143a7(rnying rgyud): bcas pas// shis kyi phyog sulab skyes te// sems cad kud la tshad med thos// bud bzang dkyil khong pa dmigs shing // phyag 'tshal mchod cing bzhir phyin to// sngon lamargya med gdab pang che// phyaga'i tsha bdu sa sa kya /
143b1(rnying rgyud): phyog 'phral bdud kyi las byung ba// stobs dang bkA shis 'phal mdzad cing // rab byung ston pa'i bka' cas shog/ nywa mo khrod ni dpal 'gyu shing // nga sA yan dzas rnams cad// dngos thub mchog tu nyer spyod pas// tsha dang stobs mchog d+hAng
143b2(rnying rgyud): pa gsol// de ltar rtsab la sogs rdzas// gang gis bcud rgyas de nyid gzungs// tha~Md grags dang de rgyas pa bsal// thor tong d+hi la te gnas su skyed// sbreng bya'i ldan rnams gang yang rung // gtsang po'i gnas sku legs par ban+d+ha ma?// 'di dag dkyil
143b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor gnas bzhag ste// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus la// rang nyid khrus byas rgyan gyis mdos// drig tsang me tog phreng bcas pas// bdud rtsi'i lhal gsol btab cing // bdud rtsi'i bcud rnams bsdus te bsgrub// rang nyid lha yi ting 'dzin gyis// bcu song dbum
143b4(rnying rgyud): sogs kyi nus bzlas// thub pa'i bla zang gsal ba'i dus// rang gi phyag rgya mngon par blang // bsung byung byin rlabs brgyan byas te// baM yi 'o ma dag dring gyur// bzang ba'am ying na brkyang pa dang // bye ma'i mchog dag 'a/ ma pA las// thugs kyis thog mtha'
143b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas par bya// oMn mA dza a ka dza swA hA// de nas bsnyen drang bsrub pa dang // srub chen las kyi mthar dbyung zhing // sems can kun pa dmigs pa'i stobs// dkyil 'khor gus la bsngo longs spyod do// gang zhig rdzas la brten pa'i paN+Dal/
143b6(rnying rgyud): bzung len rtsal du spyod byed pa// zhig ga mnA ma'i zangs bzhin du// srang re'i na rnaMs brjed cing bza'// ji srid brgyartsa brgyad kyi bang // 'dra ba'i stobs dang smyung ba b+ha// legs par rdzogs pa'i chan lus rgya sa// lus ga/ yi gAs// dbang pogs pa/
143b7(rnying rgyud): ji ltar lha rnams 'tsho med ltar// klu rnams pa ni sman bzhin du// shing rnams la ni mu bzhin du// me tog dag la nyi zla bzhin// zol pa brgya'i ba gnas te/ bcu ga mdog gi gzhon nu m+bu/ da med dag tu dang la bab// stobs rnams gang po che mnyam zhing // mngon shes
144a1(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pa 'thar// ram tha ci ka ma / rdzab da lda dang cang // gag sa pargya tan paH// btsun yan tanab ldan du \u0f7f gzan grus pa yis// rnabardad stong gi dngos bya zad // blang
144a2(rnying rgyud): med myong la khyab par sbyor// sa bon mi zad 'bras bu yang // d+ha zong 'phel zhing dpal dang ldan// mirna mas spyan gyis mi gsod pa'o// rgagacig zos pa'i yon tun ni// de yang zla baM g+h+nAHsa bzhin// gdod sbyi mi dbros mi 'jigs pas// sA rna
144a3(rnying rgyud): kun dang mnyam par 'byor// zag bzad nas mkha' la 'gro// rdo rje khros bcas mkha' 'gro 'dul// rig 'don go 'phang 'thob 'gyur zhing // gang zag dngos gru ba 'phel bar 'gyur// 'di dag rten 'brel la nA yin te// me mthar gnas kun spang bAng rtsa/
144a4(rnying rgyud): lug mig me tog chen po ni// dA sA ya na'i rgyal po skye// pa yaM 'o ma dag dang bskol// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya bskyed// rngub cing 'thung bas pa yu langs// mdog dang byin rlabs kun gsal zhing // rngu ba gnyis 'thungs pas yon tan mchod// rim dang
144a5(rnying rgyud): nang sogs zhi bar 'gyur// mig rtsa dmang zhing mdog kyang gzhon// glang po che yi stobs dang mtshungs// phye madri mar skam pa dang // mo do la ni khu ba dag/ dag yi gzugs brnyan la bskyas na// lha yis bsrungs kyang 'chi bar 'gyur// oM mu tri tan han
144a6(rnying rgyud): hUM/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ tse tA ya tse ta ya sU tri grib phaT/ bdud rdzing sA ya na'i gtso// chu dag dkar po ru ha yi// phye ma byas te blud byas la// rgyal po bud med dbang du 'gyur// de bzhin ku gu la la sogs rdzas// gi wi stan dang myang ba'i mthus// drar+tha
144a7(rnying rgyud): tshad don kun ston byed de// tri ya yo ga'i rig/ 'dzin 'grub// de ltar myong bas chen rdzogs// thams cad rab tu byung ba'i mthus// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'o// yon tan chos kun rdzogs par byed// rag zhes ni 'dir grags pa// ra swA pa
144b1(rnying rgyud): n+ya'i gtso bo ste// rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu rnams// rigs mthun bzang zhing dmar ba'o// 'bras bu sran ma ma sha tsam// gyen du 'greng ba'i snye ma mchog/ ston blar ba'i nyal btsal// khrag gi hung ma zhes bya'o// rjod pa'i khu ba btsir ba dang // pad+ma ga tam mnyam
144b2(rnying rgyud): oM na mo hA ga ra ka ta mu la bun swA hA/ 'gro ba dbang byed dam pa 'di// chags pa'i bdud rtsi chen po yin// me tog tha skad gzhon nu nyid// sa bon khu ba kun 'phel byed// ste mazur gsum til gang 'dra// rdo rje brag kyang 'joms par nus// byang chub sems dang rus pa
144b3(rnying rgyud): sbyor byed stobs kyis kun rgyal po'o// rus pasra ma khregs rdo rjer 'gyur// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu dang mnyam// dbang po'i lag dang gnod sbyin lag/ lnga dang bzhi gsum bye brag gis// sdong bu ya lag mdzes par byed// sne ma zung gsum mda' sgo 'dra// da
144b4(rnying rgyud): zla tha chung nyal brko// srub po'i lag mthil g.yon du bzhag/ dngos grub blang ba'i phyag rgya yin// lus las byung ba'i dri chen dang // dzA tIDUr dkar cha mnyam pas// phyi nang dug rnams sel byed cing // bdud rtsi chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur// srin po joms
144b5(rnying rgyud): phyed rna ba gnyis// mchog chen lnga yi rna bar skur// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs pas// rna ba'i mngon shes thob par byed// ba~M hu~M mig gi me tog dang // mkha' lding tshogs kyi mig sbyang bas// rdo rje an 'dzed drag po bzhin// mig gi mngon shes
144b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyur// tsit+ta ka dang snying zho shwa/ mi mchog snying dang sbyang byas pas// mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub dang // bde gshegs thugs kyi ye shes s+ho// gi waM kun rtsa me nyams pa// gau ro tsa na rigs kun byeng// de dag ban thang rig can gyis/
144b7(rnying rgyud): dngos grub thams cad ston par byed// go ngo tsani'i rigs rnams dang // thang la haM yi rtsa bar sbyar// mdangs kyi dngos grub spu thob cing // dus rnams kun tu rgyas par 'gyur// me tog kha 'bar lce bzhi dang // lce rnams kun tu myang byas pas// dbang
145a1(rnying rgyud): b+h+ya/ po sngags kya dngas thub dang // wAn ras gzigs kyi gas rnams 'phel// me tog ma lo lakhrel khridag/ gan rigs gnyis 'bras bu gyur// chagams btags te byesar byas// rtswa ba gzang yas dadapang // yed pa ltung
145a2(rnying rgyud): mchod byas shing // de dag chang dang sbyar te btung // skad cig yud kyis 'grub pa ste// rta mgrin dbang gi dngos grub thob// sems can rnams kyi lce dang sbyar// ra sA ya na'i gtso bor 'gyur// snga dang rna ba'i me tog dang // legs par sbyar te bslab byas
145a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i// ri lu rang gi rnal 'byor na// tshangs pa'i gsungs dpyangs sgrogs par 'gyur// dung dang 'brug a tha kar dang // sems can dus pa gang drung gyur// lus kyi rje mngon shes 'thab// ri sA ye na'i gtso ba yin// rgya mtsha lbu ba 'jus pa'i chu/
145a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs chu dang gangs kyi rten// lan tshwa sna tshogs dri ma rnams// rdo rje rna yi bdud rtsi ste// phrin las 'gro ba'i don 'grub bo// de dgar sA ya na'i mchog/ phyi nang sna tshogs sbyar nas 'grub// brgyad kyi dam pa kun bslus pa'i// bdud rtsi chen po'i don spyod pa'i/
145a5(rnying rgyud): rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman// snga tshogs rnam par bkod byas pa// de dag bslab pa'i rdzas rnams te// rang bzhin gcig pa'i dngos grub mchog/ yang dag rtsa ba brgyud dang sbyar// phye dang rang gi dbye ba yis// sna tshogs snang ba tha dad de// rang bzhin bdud
145a6(rnying rgyud): chen po'i rdzas// yang na rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar// 'go'u ci nga dang le le hAng // 'gi snang Ni hAng ra sA yan// ga pur mu teg lan tshwa rnams// 'di dag rtsa brgyad la sogs rdzas// mkhas pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya// dkyil 'khor gsang ba yang dag gnas/
145a7(rnying rgyud): bsnyen bslab bzhi dang phyag rgya bzhi// thams cad gnyis med rol pa nyid// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor kun spyod pa'o// ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs pa'i mthus// thams cad 'dud rtsir sA ya na// de dag rigs rnams bkod pa'i rdzas// rang gi dkyil 'khor snga
145b1(rnying rgyud): kyis sbyar// thams cad rab tu sbyor byas pas// thams cad gnas kun ngo bor 'grub// bdud rtsi chen po lnga rnams la// rtsa ba yan lag kun ldan pas// bye brag rang gi las grub pa'i// sbyor ba sna tshogs bstan pa yin// ji ltar rdzas ni gcig
145b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis la// grogs sogs stobs kyi sna tshogs pa// bye brag stobs kun ston par byed// rdo rje'i rigs kun 'grub byed pa'i// byang chub sems kyi yan lag tshogs// klad pa gzhung pa chub dang // be la gzhung gnas rgyu ba'i lam// gshegs shul
145b3(rnying rgyud): ro brang tshul dag gis// sbas pa nang gi gnas su bstan// mig dang sen mo so spa spu// mthar phyin phyi yi gnas dag go// mi khyirta dang bdag gi/ 'o me nang gi gnas yin te// gats+tsha s+ya snam khur blangs dang // shang shA bre'u 'dra phyi'i gnas// bya Shi se
145b4(rnying rgyud): khri rgya sros dang // nu ga ge sar a kA ru// snying ko Ta kar rdo rje dbang po lag/ sna 'dren sbar pa kun gyi spyan// bongang dkar po shu dag dkar// ya bag k+Sha ra ka ko la// 'ang ma 'bras ti la da kar sle 'bru dang // zir she la mchod zi gsum// nye'u shing
145b5(rnying rgyud): tha kar ram nye ba// gaur tsan rus pa'i tshogs// mtshal bu tsit+ta mdog dkar zhing // mngar ba'i ro mchog tshad mnyam pa// de dag byang chub sems kyi sde// rang gi dkyil 'khor pho brang ngo // bdud rtsi dri chen las 'phros pa// slob dpon yum dang drang
145b6(rnying rgyud): srong mchog/ rta glang bya dang khyi rnams kyi// nang dang phyi yi rdzas tshogs pa// cha mnyam tshad kyis rnam par gzhal// rdo dreg lcag ro shing rtsi dang // chu dreg rdo zal shing tha la dang // lci dkar sdong ro'i snying po dag/ bdud rtsi snying po phung du sbyar /
145b7(rnying rgyud): seng ge dzA ti shing tsha dang // ru te srob phri nyung dkar dang // mu srin sder mor tshwar bcas// sman gyi mchog tu bshad pa yin// a bar rnam gnyis gser me tog/ gu gul gla sgang yung ba dang // chu shel thag zhun kai sho dang // dkar por rigs kun
146a1(rnying rgyud): kha bar sbar// sha yi rigs rnams rnam bkod pa// lce spyang mkhal ma pa sh+'ul sha dang // yan lag bzhi yi gyi dang nang // khyu mchog mnye rgod dang // rgyang thang gzings tshogs pa'i/ has de bag pur
146a2(rnying rgyud): dang // sug spel phob sne rta dang rkyang // ni lo tha la tsi tra ka/ ning nag po ti la nag dang // tig ta me tog lug mig sogs// ro bska kha dog sngon po'i rdzas// rtsa ba yan lag bcud kyi lenA// khrag gi rigs kun mngon bsdus pa// de dag thugs
146a3(rnying rgyud): rje chen po'i rdzas// glo snying mchin pa mcher pa dang // mkhal rtse nang gi gnas bzhi'i khrag/ bla ma'i gzungs ma las 'dzag cing // phyi yi rtse phran nas phyung dang // na chung za zog thog ma'i rdzas// 'dab chags sder chags rmig rnam dang // rtog
146a4(rnying rgyud): 'che kaM chu la gnas// kan ta kar dang tsan dan skrag/ spang tse g+han d+ha pa tra dang // rnam par bsgyur te rdzas kyi mchog/ skyu ru ra mchog shri shi d+ha snga// kha ro dang la li shi dang // dmar zhing ro mchog sbyar bkun// ra sI ya na'i rdzas mchog go// gzhan
146a5(rnying rgyud): yar 'byung tshogs gnas pas grub// khrag gi gtseb nyi shu ste// rigs mthun sbyor ba'i gnas bcas pas// chags pa chen po'i las kun 'grub// kun tu dag byed dri yi chu// dam tshig chen po'i rdzas rnams las// mchog chen yongs su dag
146a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdzas// mkhal rtsa lgang pa'i be d+ha la// rdo rje chu ba'i gnas byung bas// nang gi las kun sbas par ston// smon dpon phyag rgya byis pa gtsang // dmar ser pa las byung ba'i rje// phyi rol rdzas kyi dge byed cing // gtso bo brgyad du gnas pas
146a7(rnying rgyud): 'grub// gangs chu ser ba lu ma dang // khron pa chu klung rgya mtsho'i gnas// tsong 'i brag las byung ba dag/ de dag rigs rnams 'byed pa'i rdzas// thams cad dri btsas shing kun dang // lce phog le shi ba le ka/ sde ni ma~M ba kun du ra/
146b1(rnying rgyud): na tham sto/ kAdzam/ gsogs pa 'jas/ kha dag sa na ra sna d+han// na mas N+Di ga ga/ da gas na ga/ sa man ngas// / rtsam brgyad la yan lagang //
146b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil labang bzhin gnas/ mya na da byu tshogs ma rdzum kyi// rdzas so nas mthun pa cas pa// des yina'i snyan rnams can// l+r-i spyod byen 'khang gnas smin spyod// gtso dang ji yang du bcas pa rnams// ma la mngan rnarnam
146b3(rnying rgyud): rAs+phA ya na ma sogs rdzas/ skyeng pa mas na/ dkyil 'khong nam tu zhag/ sgrub brgyad dang ldan lagamigs/ parnapas sems dbang ba na no// skyed dngas sems sa bcu drug go// mig dang mdung
146b4(rnying rgyud): pa dang gang dang // dam padri chub kyi phyugs// rnab b+h+yang hrI// lug me bka don da // pri shing dbang po'i lag pa dang // nan mas ming marnas pa// phyogs pa'i nga gi gnas pazhi ra// kyang ma
146b5(rnying rgyud): kyis brdzun pa // tsab sbed bu shir gyi phyogs// yig ga po ma // de tog khring po rlob kyi gnas// byung ngu bras // de 'i myu sa rnaMs kyiso+o/ zhi ga me rnams pa// da mI yAn no sangs kyang /
146b6(rnying rgyud): dajig rten 'dir gnas gzhan yang 'grub// de dag rten 'brel mtha bcas pas// lam thun mngon par ston byed cing // seM ma'i phyogs srabs rnams kyis // rgyam dang rjod tshogs bzhin5/ de nas rnam 'byor ngo song steg chags
146b7(rnying rgyud): pa drang srong rig 'dzin pa // lus kyad sA yan 'ardzas// nges par srung pas 'brub gyur cing // bdun ci gsang ba'i dkyi khang khor du// dbang ba sku ma tshad l+r-ig rnas pas// ba'i ma snying po mabye// thalal mkhris 'gro ba
147a1(rnying rgyud): sngags 'di rnapas yi ga nod rgyun 'byams mang bar byang dgos/
147a2(rnying rgyud): yum+b+ha nga bas// las kyi dkyil 'byor ba rdzogs pa'o// rigs bcas kun bsgral bar byed// phrin las sa dkyil 'khor rgyam 'debs pa'i mtshan par// me sa d+ha'i bar da shi swA hA/ oM gri Na bdunar blas ma
147a3(rnying rgyud): las ba mag+sa sa ta ga par dziH/ ag+ne mi rigs gsan te hA/ oMng+ge na d+d+he/ maman su ba stan/ mthu shA sa cu // sa na/

147b1(rnying rgyud): nag sa \u0f7fhA/ raspyug pa/ ma yA rnam/ sa smra hA/ sa ga ma pa/ sa sa \u0f7f/ kAm d+ha/ gas pa stan/ / ya /
147b2(rnying rgyud): ga ta ni/ grong rnams ta ma// sa nA dug ti / mi mA// ste/ mnan
147b3(rnying rgyud): mo skyes rbag swAhA/ oM bih+nA ba la trAM/ oM mad+hi hA sA mA ya swAH/ oM ha ya shrI Tha b+h+yAM/ mahA par+b+ba big+sa nA/ oM a m+mAt+mak+ShaHlid+d+he/ madz+dza k+ShAr+sa rA maHsIhA// rje mnan gshegs so// sakyi dkyil na po rigs
147b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs so// i p+ta mthA mra kha kuraka shr-ing+ga ma smAH/ oM ma n+t+ra mag+ni a nAn ta sa pur snAd+ha/ oM pa da ma tsaN+Da badz+rad ni d+ha/ many+dzu sid+hi grI na rmAg swAhA/ oM pAng+ga se ga coMH/ ma na de shA/ oM padz+ra dza b+han d+ha rgyan la
147b5(rnying rgyud): t+pan swAhA/ oM bad+ha d+hA ra kar+Na sits+tshitAM/ ma~M hA ga~M gan a mA la ny+dzaH/ oM pad ma hA rAg n+d+haM/ oM ni dan d+ha sud+had+h+waM/ oM pad po ka s+phar hU~M/ pad+ma mo ya~M mud+d+haM/ oM pad mA dz+wal pa da / oM r+b+ba gnya' nub mod tad+ya/ oM pad+d+ha sa yin /
147b6(rnying rgyud): oM dz+r-i'i sal so bkri/ a d+h+wi karma sa ya ta/ oM Sh+pha lda to / oM pan+d+ha'i kAta ma gal te/ oM pad mgan ga ba na/ oM ts+tsha ts+tsha hU~M/ oM d+hams padziM/ mam \u0f7f/ aHma nga
147b7(rnying rgyud): tu 'di nang sngags tshan gnyis ma tshang
148a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo lta bus kun spyod cing // rigs kyi 'khor lo rgyas pa'i tshogs// phyag rgya mtshan ma'i sku sbyor bas// thams cad phyag rgya chen po'i dbyings// gsung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// 'khor lo yi ge
148a2(rnying rgyud): mtshan mas brgyan// oM sarba ta thA ga to ya/ swa b+ha ba bi shud+d+ha pa ri ba re hU~M swA hA/ dam tshig chen pos stobs byed pa'i// lag gnyis rgyab bsnol sor mo rnams// 'khor lo'i tshul bzhin rje bsnol sbyor// phyogs rnams kun tu skor byed ste// rigs
148a3(rnying rgyud): khyed kyil 'khor gnas su bzhad// rdo rje khu tshur las byung ba'i// rtse mo gdengs pa 'khor lo'i rgya// g.yon pas bsnyems bcas dbyings sbyor cing // rang gi las kun ston byed pa'o// sgra yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po
148a4(rnying rgyud): nyid// mi gnyis ye shes gsung gi bdag/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor che gnas bzhugs// phyag rgya mtshan ma rgyan dang bcas// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// pad+ma'i tshul du sbyor mdzad cing // pad+ma'i rigs kun dag pa'i chos// las
148a5(rnying rgyud): kyi chos kun ston pa'o// chos rnams kun gyi tshogs bcas pas// chos kyi don kun gsal bar byed// pad+ma'i sngags su sbyar ba'i mthus// gsung dbyangs yan lag kun rdzogs 'gyur// oM d+ha k+ko shud+d+ha sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+he dz+nyA na sid+d+hi hrI swA hA/ rdo rje
148a6(rnying rgyud): bcings pa bskyed bya ste// sor mo mtha' gnyis gshibs te bsgreng // pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed tshul// dam tshig sngags kyi 'phro 'du bcas// rdo rje khu tshur las byung ba'i// gung mo mtheb chung rtse sngar bsgreng // pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri med spun// chos
148a7(rnying rgyud): rnams kun gyi gnas kun gzigs// rang gi las bzhin bskul byas te// las kyi dkyil 'khor dag par mdzad// gsung gi dkyil 'khor rgyas 'debs pa'i mtshan ma'o// bde gshegs dam chog thugs kyi mchog/ sgra rnams ye shes rigs
148b1(rnying rgyud): kyi bdag/ de bas gnas kun stor mdza pa'i// mi bad+mod nga rje dkyil 'khor nyid// kha dog tu na bcas kun rdzogs pa'o// gtso dang sprul par bcas pa dag/ rdo dza daHla 'khong gnas bzhugs shing // rdorje m+b+hal krung mnyam sto pas// rdo rje'i rigs
148b2(rnying rgyud): rnams gsal byas te// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs par 'gyur// sgra yi rgyan bcas kun spyod pa'i// lde la rdo rje rtse lnga nyid// sa bon sngags bcas bgro 'dra yis// chos kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam par sbyor// oM badz+ra mo ha ri ni shrad+ha sa mA~M yA swA hA// rdo rje
148b3(rnying rgyud): bcings pa las byung ba'i// gung mo bsgreng rtse rtse sbyar cing // sor mo'i mtha' bzhi bkug byas pa// 'od zer sngags kyi sngags kun sbyar// rang gi phyag rgya kun gyi gnas// dam tshig chen po'i ye shes sbyor// rdo rje khu tshung bstan byas pa'i// sor mo'i rtse rnams
148b4(rnying rgyud): phyogs bzhir gdongs// sna tshogs las rnams rdzogs bskul zhing // gsang sngags mthun pa'i don kun sbyor// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas 'debs pa'i mtshan ma'o// thams cad kyis ston mdzad pa'i// phyag rgya ji bzhin rnam gsal bas// sku yi dkyilang lor
148b5(rnying rgyud): rab tu rdzogs// rigs kyi tshogs rnams 'byung ba'i gtso// sna tshogs rdo rje'i gnas bzhugs te// sna tshogs rdo rje zhabs mnyam sbyor// thabs dang shes rab de dag bskul// las kyi dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs pa'i// rdzogs pa'i gsang sngags phreng ba'i tshul// sna tshogs
148b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje la gnas pas// gsang sngags yi ge kun rdzogs shing // gnas nyid rang gi mtshan ma'i rgya// oM ma hA su kha kar ma gan d+ha ro ni shwa sarba hUM phaT/ dam tshig phyag rgya bstan pa yi// 'phro 'du las kun rnal 'byor pa// de dag rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe bong bcwol
148b7(rnying rgyud): te rtse sbran cing // de bzhin gung mo mthe'u chung dag/ rab tu sbyor bas sna tshogs nyid// dam tshig dkyil 'khor kun gnas mu// rang rigs sngags kyis brtan par 'gyur// rdo rje khu tshur bcas pa las// mthe bor mtheng chung gung mo dang // legs bsgreng g.yon pa
149a1(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal bdud ci rol pa zhes bya ba las/ ra swA ya na sgomapa' yas par bstan pa ste/ rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// / de nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs// ga
149a2(rnying rgyud): bcas lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyis// rang gi mchod pa'i tshogs bcas pas// yang dang yang du dgyes par mdzad// mi gnyis ye shes chen po'i gnas// thabs mkhas byang chub sems dpa'i don// rang bzhin bdud rtsi garjes rgyas mdzod// don kun gsal ba
149a3(rnying rgyud): rnam kun nyid// kye ma ho stobs mchog rnam spyod pas// rang rig dkyil 'khor ma 'dres tshogs// thams cad chos kyi gnas su stor// 'di dag nye bar spyod byed pas// las kyi bya ba ji ltar bskyab// bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin gang // dkyil 'khor sngags
149a4(rnying rgyud): dad phyag rgya'i tshogs// rnal 'byor tshogs bcas grol bya'i phyir// de dag nye bar ston pa'i rigs// de nas bde gshegs thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs dbyings rgya chen kun// gnyis med gnyis su med sbyor ba'i// lam mchog 'bras bu dang bcas
149a5(rnying rgyud): thub pa gtso bos bsnyen bstan bzhin// dus 'dir bkod pas rnam gsal mdzad// thams cad byang chub sems nyid mchog/ phyogs dus bdud rtsi chen po'i gzhi// sna tshogs gnyis med ye shes nyid// thabs ldan 'jug pa'i yan lag tu// las
149a6(rnying rgyud): smin cing grol bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor dbang bskur dam tshig dang // bsnyen bsgrub spyod dang phrin las dang // rta dang khyad par nas brtsams te// rang rtogs 'jug pa'i don bzhin bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// yon tam
149a7(rnying rgyud): mngon gsal byed// phyag rgya sngags gsal la sogs pas// thabs mkhas 'bras bu la spyod pa'o// theg ma tha ma med pa'i tshul// rang bzhin chos sku'i snying po nyid// bab cing rgya gnyis med pa'i// dkyil 'khor gnas kun rdzogs par
149b1(rnying rgyud): rdzing // dus gsum mthang gnas kun gas la 'ang // ma 'dras chos tshogs brtson byed pas// dang gi dasdel 'khor dgas bzhin du// zhing 'ams mtha' dag rnam par spyod// nyug ye bcog kun gsal bas// chos kyi chu
149b2(rnying rgyud): dam tshig kun gyi gnas 'jug pas// las kyi phyag rgya rdzogs par 'gyur// yon tan thams cad ston mdzade byings// rin chen rigs kun rdzogs pa'i tshogs// rin chen dkyil 'khor che gnas bzhugs// thabs dang shes rab rin chen byed/
149b3(rnying rgyud): chen po'i phyag rgya las// rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzhan rlung bzhin// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun rdzogs te// rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams// bsrung nyid nor bu 'bar ba la// rang gi sngags bcas rten sbyor bas// thams cad dkyil 'khor gnas
149b4(rnying rgyud): rnams rgyal// oM rat+na si me ta/ tar ta ra/ ma hA rgun si di d+h+waM swA hA// rdo rje bcings pa'i rgya chen po// rigs kyi sbyor ba klu gsal ba// thabs dang shes rab 'od tshogs rnams// rang gi gnas su brtan par bsdul// de dag byin rlabs rong pa'i
149b5(rnying rgyud): mthus// thams cad den chen dam tshig mchog/ rdo rje bsdams pa bstan byas pas// phung mo gnyis ni sdug gu'i tshul// rang mdzub mtheb chen rtse sbar bas// yon tan rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las// gung mo mthe
149b6(rnying rgyud): chen mthe'u chud dag/ kye slad bsgreng ste gzhan rnams sbed// nor bu rin chen phyag rgya 'dis// dkyil 'khor kun nas las la gzhung // yon tan dkyil 'khor rnams kyis rgyas 'debs pa'i mtshan ma'o// bde gshegs gtso ba rigs kyi bdag
149b7(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor slob med gzhi// mtshan dang dpe byad rgyan rdzogs pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor cha// gtso bo 'khor bcas gnas spyod mdzad// 'di dag 'khor lo che gnas pa// 'khor lo'i skyil krung sbyor ba'i tshul

150b1(rnying rgyud): ba 'ad+ha/ b+ha ga d+ha / a ba~M shwA ta ya T+Te badz+dza/ / oM baM nas sr-ita saN+Da laH/ k+Sha hoH/ 2 rigs kyi byin las cad dkyil ba'o chen po'i gsang sngags rdugs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugasu grags// rang sa rgya
150b2(rnying rgyud): rgya sngag dang bcas// nyi zla pad+ma la gAnas pa'i// 'phro 'du gnas gsum brtan par 'gyur// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta bA ke badz+ra swa b+hA wa arma ko&haM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga taHd+hi badz+ra lA tA wa A
150b3(rnying rgyud): ko&haM/ chos dbyings ye shes gnyis med pa'i// thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor mnyes mdzad cing // ya ba yum dga' bde gnas gas pa grub// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU ngo badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ phyogs pa cu'i dkyil
150b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor kun khyab mdod// thams cad rnam par stsal pa'i tshogs// phyi nang gsang ba rgya chen po'i// mchod pa kun gyi mnyes par spro// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ thams cad gnyis med byang chub sems// rang bzhin sdesaM bra la ye
150b5(rnying rgyud): shes che// dus gsum rnam par gsal byed pa'i// dmigs pa'i mtshan rtog yul las 'das// oM shun+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ rang bzhin byang sems thugs rje'i dngos// khams gsum 'od kyis gsal mdzad pa'i// gnyis med bde
150b6(rnying rgyud): ba chen po'i mchog// nam mkha' sprin las glog bzhin byung // oM d+harma d+hA tu badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ke& taM/ 'di dag rnam kun ye shes nyid// phyogs bad+ma'i de kyil 'khor mtha' yas pa// thug narje dkyil 'dzor sgrib med pa'i// mdzu las brtan g.yo rnam par
150b7(rnying rgyud): 'phrul// thams cad don kun 'byung byed pa'i// rkyen gyi gsang sngags phyag rgya nyid// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam dag pas// don kun gsal ba 'di nyid do// b+hUMbi shwa bi shud+he tsakra mad+hi oM karma ra ga sha haM/ oM tsak+Shu ma d+ha la hUM/ rdo rje bsdus pa'i dkyil
151a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyis// rigs kyi sangs rgyas kun sbyor zhing // thams cad gnyis med chos kyi dbyings// rang bzhin ma bcos mtha' las 'das// snying ga'i rten yig rnam spros pas// phyogs bcu'i rdo rje mtshon cha'i nags/
151a2(rnying rgyud): 'od 'phros pa rnam par 'khrigs// rdo rje'i rab sa gzhi dang // gur dag gnas nas gtams byas pas// khro bo'i tshogs bcas 'khrugs pa'o// rang sems zla ba rgyas pa las// 'od zer yi ge gnas byas pas// zhing khams chen po dag byas te// byang
151a3(rnying rgyud): chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid// thugs rje nyi ma la gnas pa'i// 'od zer rnam gsum kun gsal zhing // yi ge'i gang ba'i tshogs bcas rnams// byang chub sems nyid ye shes sku// rten dang brten bcas 'khor lo bzhi// don kun ye shes chen po'i tshogs//
151a4(rnying rgyud): ngo bo gnyis med brtan byas pas// rigs kyi zhing khams kun tu sbyor// de dag gnyis med brtan pa'i mthus// mtshan ma'i yi ge sngags dang bcas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal byed cing // phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bskyed//
151a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing // byin rlabs brtan pas gnas kun sbyor// rigs mthun rigs dang 'khril pa'i sku// ye shes rnam par gsal ba'i yum// chos rnams thams cad rnam par dag/ byang chub sems nyid gang byung ba'i// dkyil
151a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor dkyil 'khor gnas longs spyod// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// rgyu dang 'bras bu rigs mthun pa'i// sprul bcas kun tu rnam spyod pa// de dag rang byung dkyil 'khor gtso// thams cad sbyor byed chu 'bras nyid// rnal 'byor
151a7(rnying rgyud): kun tu sbyor ba'i mthus// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs// de dag de las de snang bas// ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin no// dam tshig dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas// dam tshig gsum gyi gnas rdzogs 'gyur// ye shes dkyil 'khor
151b1(rnying rgyud): spyan drangs shing // gnyis med brtan pa'i phyag rgyaH// a a h+ye ti b+hag b+h+ya nam hA ka ru d+hikadr-i \u0f7f ho// sa ma ya g+h+nAM/ tshwa tsA ba~M ho/ badz+ras ma ya hoH/ gnyis med sbyor ba chen po'i mchog/ phyag rgya sngags kyi sku stor cing // dkyil 'khor lnga rnams brtan byas pa/
151b2(rnying rgyud): bdud kyi'i gnas chen don sbyor grub// thog mar gnyis med sbyar ba'i tshogs// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pas// grol ba'i chos kun la spyod de// dkyil 'khor gsang bas yang dag 'jug/ legs par spyod pa'i cho ga yis// gnas can dag
151b3(rnying rgyud): par sbyangs byas pas// lha dang rdzas mchog lhag gnas shing // yang dag rdzogs pa'i tsho gas spyad// mi spang ba dang dang du phyung // spyad pa'i dam tshig bco lnga bsrung // shes bya ba sgrub lnga bsrung ba gsum// nyi shu rtsa brgyad gtso bo mtshe ga// stong rtsa brgyad
151b4(rnying rgyud): du rnam spos pas// thams cad don kun rdzogs par rdzogs// rang bzhin ma bcos gnyis med chos// de dag dam tshig chen po'i gzhi// bzhi po rdzogs nas kun tu bzang // thabs kyi theg pa bla med pa'o// 'i rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang // mnan
151b5(rnying rgyud): bzlog drug gi gcig tu sbyar// khu tshad bzhi dang ldan pa la// bzhin bzang mig gi dkyus kyang ring // stod skad phyed la sked pa phra// tshigs pa zlum zhing sor mo ring // yon tan 'od can bcu gnyis lon// ye shes rigs can yin pas na// thams cad 'gru
151b6(rnying rgyud): phyed gzungs kyi mchog/ bcu gsum rdo rje'i rigs su 'grub// dga' zhing mdog dkar sngags dang ldan// btu drug sngags pas ngos 'grub gnas// rin chen rigs mchog yin par bshad// nyi shu rtsa gcig pad+ma'i rigs// spyan ras gzigs
151b7(rnying rgyud): dbang rta mchog gnas// nyi shu rtsa lnga la sogs dag/ kun tu las rnams spyod mkhas pas// thogs med byang chub sems phyogs 'dren// las kyi rigs tshogs thams cad thub// sum cu rtsa gnyis tshun chad rtse// mtshan ldan dge ba'i sems
152a1(rnying rgyud): mas nang // yid 'ang thogs ci ma pa // / dpazhin dgus kun zlab par byed// 'diran 'dra' thal mod pa gnas// dag su mas na mo gang bad dag// byin thas tham dri las smra// sob dang / na tha
152a2(rnying rgyud): rab mangs// da tib la gra \u0f7f// ka ko la dang gzung dang // eka dza nga// gi ma byung ba'i spros rnams kyis// lam dpa 'phags pasgo phyis te// rin chen me tog kheng bas bcan// das 'dam dang spyan la mags pas// phyogs napas
152a3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa ba thabs// ga gang zla nga // 'byu / pa // sa sa/ // de bzhin su ga 'as// sa ng+ya ga pa //
152a4(rnying rgyud): padang ni nye bsnyen dang // sgrub pa dang ni skye brtson pa'i// dkyil gakhor cing ma gang gra bzhil// mamadzangs ni tsa rlon// 'drad kyi la sogs rngan sbyi rgyun// gachen bu khrel gros kyis padug// dkyil 'khor dal mngo phyogs te// b+ha
