152a7(rnying rgyud): ra'angs kyi man// dpe 'i la ga nyi sa// ngam pag na sa badz+ra me/ mas sasreg sa / cag rtsa ga na/ de na ma ngas// yang ban myor ma nga /
152b1(rnying rgyud): l+r-ing rtsol bar mngon par gyur// don kun gsang ba ston byed pa// thabs dang shes rab dkyil ba mar chags// rang bdan tam can bcas pa// mdad pa bcu ga nyis 'grob dra dang // phrin las rnam pag ku gsal byeng // pang ma thong/
152b2(rnying rgyud): bdi bzhin du// chos rnams thams cad 'dud rtsi'i dbyings// nges par bstan pa'i don chen 'di// rigs kyi rgyal bas kun nas sbyor// phyag rgya chen po bzhi yi bdag/ gnyis med mnyam par sbyor byas te// lha yi bdud dang phung po'i bajug
152b3(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs bdung dang 'chi bdag bcom// thabs dang shes rab tu tshogs rgyud// don rtags gnyis med ye shes nying // bdud rtsi gsang ba'i gnas dadug pas// phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan// mkha' las sems 'theng spro zhing bsu/
152b4(rnying rgyud): byang chub 'khor ba ma ngar 'das// bdud rtsi chen po'i mkha' dbyings su// sangs rgyab sems can mnyam par sbyor// snod gsum chos rnams sde tshogs kyi// mtshon mang bsten pa thams cid kun// bde che na nyid las gnan ma yin// sangs rgya
152b5(rnying rgyud): kyis kyang rnyed mi 'gyur// gyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun// byang chub sems su rnam dag pas// skye med ye shes yum gyi dbyings// gnyis med bdud rtsi chen po'i mchog/ yab yum bde ba'i nga du gsapa// 'di ni snyir po byang chub sems// lus
152b6(rnying rgyud): kun yongs su 'khyud pa yis// rdo rje pad+mo gdan byas te// byang chub 'khor ba 'phel pa'i rgyun// rang snang rnam dag byang chub sems// zhal bas bon kun rdzogs pa nyid// yon tan zad pas rmad du byas// oM sa d+haHt+ti rA ga gyur to// byang chub sems kyi
152b7(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur zhing // dngos grub chen po rjes su sbyor// dkyil lakhor bsgrub pa'i gnas dag tu// mchod ldan zad par rngas pas gas te// rigs kying chos 'khor gsal byas pas// ra sA ya na'i gdas rgyas 'gyur// thabs kyi theg pa ma las kAn/
153a1(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi chen po'i gnas 'jug pas// yang dag ye shes sbyor ba'i stobs// don kun gsal bar ston pa po// de ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// don 'di bstan pa'i gnas dgongs te// mi gnyis ye shes dkyil
153a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor gnas// gsang ba'i rgyud chen ston par mdzad// de tshe rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs// thabs mkhas byang chub sems bcas pas// sku gsung thugs kyi bstan pa dag/ sna tshogs 'byor zhing bzung bar byed// dga' mgu yi dang gus pa yis//
153a3(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi'i gnas rnams mngon par bstod// chud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal bdud rtsi rol pa zhes bya ba las/ chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul du yang dag par sbyar ba'i rim par gyi ba gsum pa'o// / de nas zhing khams thams cad kun//
153a4(rnying rgyud): rgal ba'i bstan pas 'dul ba'i phyir// blo gros mchog rnams grol mdzad cing // thams cad rigs bcas yang dag sbyor// de tshe nyon mongs dregs pa'i stobs// las kyi mthu rnams kun rgyas pa'i// 'gro ba'i gnas chen bdag po dang // rang gi
153a5(rnying rgyud): bcas kun nas rmongs// nyon mongs las rnams rgyu dang rkyen// 'bras bu'i bya ba tha dad kyis// bdag dang gzhan rnams kun spyod cing // dug gsum nyon mongs bde ba'i mthus// med pa ri bo mun pa'i tshogs// 'thor byed chu chung rta nabs kyis//
153a6(rnying rgyud): khams gsum kun gyi gnas bcom ste// rtsa ba yan lag nyon mongs rgyun// grogs kun spyad pas rab tu rgyas// rang gi sngar bcas dpung rnams kyis// rig sngags sbyor bas phyogs bcur spos// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// yang da
153a7(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chen po'i thugs// lha mo'i dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i tshogs// phyogs rnams kun nas spos mdzad cing // mi gnyis kun du bzang po la// phyogs rnams kun nas gsol ba 'debs// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// ye shes lnga
153b1(rnying rgyud): tshogs thugs rje'i bdag/ rigs kun dkyil 'khor ston mdzad pa// khyod kyi thugs rjes bzod lags sam// khams gsum dregs byed gnas tshogs 'di// thabs kyis sgrol bas mi 'dul zhing // nyon mongs kun spyod gnas rgyas pas// dus
153b2(rnying rgyud): 'dir yang dag zugs rje'i mthus// shugs kyis bsgral ba'i dus la bab// thabs mkhas mi gnyis thugs rje'i gnas// dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i don kun gyis// de dag mtha' yas pas rgyud dang // nges pa'i gnas gzhan rgyud gal zhing //
153b3(rnying rgyud): mngon spyod phrin las spyod par 'tshal// de nas sangs rgyas kun tu bzang // chos dbyings ye shes las bzhengs te// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun ston cing // yang dag thugs rje chen po'i mthus// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mngon par mdzad// zhal gsum
153b4(rnying rgyud): phyag rnams bco brgyad pa'i// dpa' bo mthing nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dur khrod kun gyi rgyan gyis brjid// khros pa'i cha lugs kun ston pa'o// dkar ser dpar dang ljang gu las// kha dog 'gyur ba'i zhal rnams brjid// rdo rje ral gri pad+ma phrang // gri bug
153b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo dgra sta dag/ bdud rtsi g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams// thod ba zhing dbyug mi mgo dang // rgyu zhags g.yang gzhi mche ba sprul// sdig mdzub gzhu dang dbyug pa g.yon// rang 'od yum la 'khyud pa'i phyag/ rigs kyi bdag pos dbang bskur zhing //
153b6(rnying rgyud): gnas kun phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rgyan// phyogs bcur 'gro ba'i don spros te// ye shes byin rlabs chen po'i gnas// gzhal yas khang chen sgo bzhi pa'i// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte ba la// rin chen dregs byed gdan tshogs gnas// gnyis med phyag
153b7(rnying rgyud): rgya chen po yis// phyogs mtshams thams cad sprul byas te// rigs kyi khro bo rnam sprul pas// phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams 'gugs par byed// oM ma hA shrI he ru ka sa ma ya hUM/ ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI a a/ oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M/ gr-ih+Na
154a1(rnying rgyud): r+tha/ pa sa krah+NA pa ya d+hA stan pa'o// b+ha ga ldan pa hU~M Ta/ khrag zung thugs kyi gsang ba nyid// gsang skyugs phyag rgya tshogs smras pas// thugs bcu'i bgags rnams 'jams byed pang // rdza ba
154a2(rnying rgyud): rgyal po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dpal chen ye shes rnam stsal ltar// zhing khams kun tu las mdzad pa'o// oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hU/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li trAM/ oM badz+ra tro d+ha nI la da
154a3(rnying rgyud): dz+haiM/ oM ba b+h+yod+ha A s+ya a tsal hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+hA ma par dzA d+hi hU~M/ oM ba kro/ d+hi kang hU~M/ oM badz+ra kro d+hA pad+mA ban+d+ha la~M trA~M/ oM badz+ra b+ha g+hag+hA ta ya b+hU ti ya trAM/ sarba tra rmAn phaT/ badz+ra pA li shI la la/ badz+ra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa pa ti/ kA ya hAnabadz+ra kI pa rA tra~M/ dka
154a4(rnying rgyud): saur dang dmang po dang // ljang klu sngo rtsa gser gyi mdod// lebargan ldang sngon mthing ga dang // dmar sna'i mdog la zhal gsum pa// phya'i dug mtshon cha'i tshogs bsnams shing // tho bo rdo rje pad+ma dang // ral gri dbyug pa zhags pa nyib// gtun shing mtshogs
154a5(rnying rgyud): rdorje dang // rdo rje sdig sa rdzo gsu ma tshogs// rang gi yum bcas rnam par sbyor// thod stsal nyin ri chen tshogs// dumachod rgyan rnams kun gyis 'jigs// rigs kyi lha mo dang bcas pa'o// sprul pas kyigs bcu kun na gang // 'od 'jos mi 'ong
154a6(rnying rgyud): nga tshogs// bgegs kyi rgyal po kun bkug pa'i// chung ma g.yog dang bran bcas dang // rang gi gnas kun bsdus byas te// 'jigs pa'i mtshon chas thams cad 'joms// brgya byi dag nanan la sogs pa'i// 'jigs para'i tshogs pardas ru 'bod
154a7(rnying rgyud): nga // nyes ma tshogs // dag dasapa ga su// de dag skung ba lta pa dang // ngasas tha~M chogs bcas pas// rgya rnams batshangs pas cid// grags dang rgyag cang thul pa ra/
154b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor gsang bar dbang bskur te// du mchog bstan pa'i dbang ga tud cang // phyogs kyi bgegs rnams 'jal mdzad pa// dam bcas zin las bzhin du spyod// dem phyogs brgya snang ba ya// rnamaN+Dal na shin nga gzhad pa dang //
154b2(rnying rgyud): kho po bdud rtsi khyil// dbyig sngon me g.yo mgon po dang // 'dod pa'i rgyal po stobs pa che// hU~M mdzad pa sgra khyil pa la// rang gi dam tshig bstan byed cing // rang gi lus kyang gdan du 'bral// de dag thigs chen po mos// bde ba'i ye shesu hU~M
154b3(rnying rgyud): mdzad cing // rnam par sgrol ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rang gi rigs kyi sangs rgyas 'grub// 'jig rten kun la pad+ma gdags kyir// las kyis gzugs kyi gnas mdzad cing // gsang sngags gsang ba'i dkyil 'byor du// bgegs dang
154b4(rnying rgyud): bar mdzad// brgya byin tshogs bcas gshin rje dang // klu dang gnod sbyin tshogs kyi gdon// me yi bdag po srin po rgyal// rlung dang dbang ldan mtshams kyi bgegs// nyi ma zla ba gza' skar dang // sa bdag lha mo lha min dang // sde dpu
154b5(rnying rgyud): dpung bcas// de dag rjes su 'jug byed de// rang gi rgyal po'i rang bzhin gnas// yang dag don gyi ston byed cing // rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gnas rgyas pas// ma 'ongs don gyir sgrub par mos// de dag rtsom pa'i dkyil 'khor che// 'dren pa'i
154b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor la// sa bon mtshan ma sngags dang bcas// oM badz+ra kr-i d+hi rje lo kyai ba dza ya mA hA si de de ra tri/ rdorje bskams pa las byung ba'i// grung mdub srin lag rtse gsum 'phreng // mthe bong mthe'u chung bsnol te ba rnams// khams gsum rnam
154b7(rnying rgyud): rgya yis// dkyil 'khor gnas kun brtan byed cing // sbyor bcas dam tshig sngags kyis 'grub// rdo rje 'u tshur bcings pa las// lag gnyis rtse gsum g.yas dang g.yon// las rnams ma lus kun spor ba'i// phyag tu gsang ba sngags da
155a1(rnying rgyud): de nas 'dren byed gtso bo'i mchog/ bdud kyi rgyal po'i tshogs 'dus te// tshangs pa khyab 'dug lha chen dang // rgan byed gnas bcu'i bdag po'i tshogs// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul sku ston cing // sde dpung dmag bcas
155a2(rnying rgyud): kun tu rgyug/ de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bde chen gtso la gsol btab cing // de dag gnas tshogs zhi byed pa'i// dkyil 'khor sprul pa kun nas ston// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi'i dbus// gtso bo rnam par sprul byas
155a3(rnying rgyud): te// thams cad 'od bcas snang ba'i mthus// dkyil 'khor gdan la lags par gnas// rin chen 'bar ba'i khri steng na// nyi zla pad+ma 'khor lor bcas// gtso bo che mchog he ru ka/ sku mdog smug nag 'bar ba la// nyi shu rtsa gcig zhal
155a4(rnying rgyud): ldan cing // bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag gis mdzes// 'jigs pa'i cha lugs khro bo'i bzhin// zhabs brgyad rol pa'i rigs rnams sku// dpal chen yang dag gdan la bzhugs// rgyu yi he ru kas brgyan te// zhal gsum phyag drug dkar ba'i mdog
155a5(rnying rgyud): sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal gnyis mdzes// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // pad+ma thod pa bum pa'i rdzas// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gos// gtso bo'i zhal rnams sna tshogs mdog/ 'od bcas rin chen sna lnga'i mdangs// phyag rnams zhi dang /
155a6(rnying rgyud): yi// dkyil 'khor gdan bcas sbrul tshogs 'don// khro mo dbyings kyi yum chen mo// sngo nag zhal dgu phyag bco brgyad// zhabs brgyad rigs kyi khro bo gnon// sgeg la sogs pa'i gar gyis mdzes// de dag kha dog sde tshogs pa/
155a7(rnying rgyud): 'od 'phro phyag rgya'i mtshan ma dag/ dbyings dang ye shes mnyam par sbyor// rigs lnga khrag 'thung chen po rnams// kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa// sngo nag dkar ser dmar dang ldang // rang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ni// rigs kyi
155b1(rnying rgyud): bcas rnams la sgor// khro bo chen po bcu gnas sbyor// 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro phra men dag/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs byed gzugs// 'jigs pa'i chun cha kun gyis mdzes// rang gi rigs tshogs srul par bcas// sgo bzhi'i khro bo'i rgyal po dag/
155b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun nas longs spyod pa'o// oM ma hA shrI hi ru ka ma hA kro d+hI shU nI g+h+ra~M hUM de s+ya ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ A ra li hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra mI he ruka badz+ra krod+hI sha d+hiSh+tha dza~M/ oM prad+d+ha shrI gi tsuka bud+d+ha bod+d+hi shwad+d+hi dz+haiM / oM rat+na shrI he ru karat+ne dro d+hi shU rI b+ha~M dza/
155b3(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka pA po d+hI shwa rI s+t+rai / oM ka pa shIhi rA ka ka rma mr-id+hI shwad+d+hib+h+rU~M da~M/ oM badz+ra kroHSh+T+rI/ ha la~M hA la ma hA dz+wa la phaT/ oM ba go tshig/ oM badz+dzatsa rnyeg/ badz+ra pra badz+nyA da/ badz+ra bit+taSh+T+r-ihaM/ badz+ra prA g-i s+t+wa~M ha~M/ badz+ren hrIH/ badz+ra
155b4(rnying rgyud): nI ha/ badz+ra tsaN+Da lI ha/ badz+re sid+d+hi mu kha te/ badz+ra b+hek+ShI mu kha he/ badz+ra sr-i ga~M la mu kha haM/ badz+ra shA na mu kha hA/ badz+ra kang+ka mu kha he/ badz+ra kA kA mu kha haM/ badz+ra u lu ka mu kha he/ badz+ra Ar+yA te dza tang da~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra a mu khe hUM phaT/ badz+ra lo ka
155b5(rnying rgyud): phaT/ bad ta sris la ya ba tu ts+tshahU~M phaT/ hU~M hU~MtrAM/ ha la ha la ha la phaT phaT phaT/ ye shes 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// phyogs bcu'i gnas nas kun thos te// khams gsum dregs byed tshogs rnams kun// rang gi gnas su brgyal bar
155b6(rnying rgyud): mdzad// kun nas 'drigs pa'i di r-i dang // zhu mi chog sgra rnams 'don byed cing // sder bcas dpung dang mgon med pa// nye bar dman pa'i gnas su 'khor// de tshe che mchog dkyil 'khor tshogs// phyogs bcu kun tu rnam spros pas/ zhing kham
155b7(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// dregs byed tshogs kun bcom byas te// rang gi chu 'bras dran rdzogs bskyed// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// gnyis med rdo rje chen po 'di// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gnas gsal ba// 'gro rnams
156a1(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs gnas su spangs// nye bar sbyor ba'i rkyen rnams kyis// bdud rtsi chen po'i gnas nus so// 'di dag nye bar spyod pa'i mthus// rang gi don kun gsal bar byed // de nas sangs rgas thams cad dang /
156a2(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kun yi rang ste// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor don gyi phyir// ngo mtshar rmad byung nye bar zhus// rang gi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du// rang gi sgrub pa chen po kun// de dag nye bar bsgrub pa yi// bsnyen bsrub phyag rgya 'tshogs 'jug pa/
156a3(rnying rgyud): phrin las kun tu bstan byed pa'o// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// phyag rgya chen po gsal byas pas// ljags la sa ru he ru ka/ mtshan mA yi ge rab sbyor zhing // snying po phyag rgya sngags dang bcas// oM shrI ma hA kA ya su kha he ru ka si ta d+ha ra dz+nyA na gar b+ha
156a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje bcings pa bstan byas te// b+ha ga che dang leng+ga che// yang dag sbyor ba dga' mdzad pa// pad+ma la gnas rdo rje nyid// dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yis// rigs kyi dkyil long bstan par mdzad// rdo rje khu tshur las byung ba'i// thabs dang shes rab
156a5(rnying rgyud): skur ston pa'o// de nas bdud dang dregs byed rnams// phyogs rnams kun nas sdud byed cing // sku gsung thugs kyi rnam 'phrul gyis// rang dang gnas su nges par bsgral// ye nas rgyu nyid dag pa la// nga dang bdag tu bzung ba'i spos// 'a
156a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i gnas kun rnam par 'phrul// khams gsum de dgra basbal ba'i zhing // oM ma hA a tsa la sa ma ya d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ mi ga yo phyag na chen po'i dang // chos kyi sku las bzhengs nas pang // me tog thugs rje chen po yis/
156a7(rnying rgyud): khams gsum las kun rnam par zhi// 'tsho ba'i bdag po che dang srog/ thugs rje che dang shes rab dang // thabs la mkhas pa'i byin rlabs kyis// 'gro ba mtha' dag spong bar mdzad// bdud dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun// gnyis med pa pa
156b1(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya yis// thams cad cig char bsgral byas te// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor che gnas sbyor// oM swa b+hA bas kar d+he d+has si b+h+rUM/ ma hA ka ru NA~M hU~M dza~M daM/ dregs byed rnams kyi rnam shes dag/ nges par gzugs la babs nas ni// mkha' 'gro'i zhal ni
156b2(rnying rgyud): nub tu bstan// phyag rgya bzhi yis 'grub par byed// gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis gcod// sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci// gzung 'dzin rkang lag bsnol ba'i tshogs// yul las 'das pa'i don gyi dbye// oM ka ta ka ri kan d+ha kan pra be sha phaT/
156b3(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i sgo rnams bcad byas nas// bde gshegs thugs rje khyab par mdzad// dregs byed ma rungs lha chen rnams// sems kyi sgo bcad rnam 'byed cing // rdo rje 'bar ba spu gri yis// nyon mongs rgyun bcas gcod byed cing // sems kyi gnas kun
156b4(rnying rgyud): gzung bar mdzad// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar gnyis su brkyang // ta ki rnga ma brjid 'bar ba yis// zhabs kyis dkyil 'khor kun mnan cing // bgegs dang 'byung po gzing ba'i tshul// rdo rje drag po rta skad bcas// oM ma
156b5(rnying rgyud): hA sa ma ya ki she tsi ta dz+wa la hUM phaT/ khams gsum nas byung sems can gnas// rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis// 'od zer tshul du bsdus nas ni// de dag bdag gi lus la gzung // spro ba rdo rje sna tshogs kyis// su gnas ye shes mchog tu sbyor//
156b6(rnying rgyud): thar pa'i lam 'byed dkyil 'khor 'dir// skal ldan blo la 'jug pa ltar// dregs byed lha chen tshogs sogs nas// rang bzhin bde chen gnas su sbyor// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du// thugs
156b7(rnying rgyud): chen pos kun sgrol zhing // zhing khams gnas kun rnam dag sbyor// chos nyid skye 'gag med pa las// bde bar gshegs pa 'gro ba'i chos// gnyis med dbyings su gcig pa'i rgya// spu yi ngo bo mnyam pa nyid// thams cad snying po
157a1(rnying rgyud): chub sams// ma byas pan 'gag pa 'dag/ bdag nyid med na mnyam pa'i sgra// thugs rngacan po car ma mdzad// ya nas da ltar gnas bzhin du// sems can ma dag rmongs pa'i thos// bdag dang gzhan du
157a2(rnying rgyud): so sor 'don// rtag chad mtha' rnams ma spangs pas// 'khrul pas bstan pa'i phung po lnga// logatog sbyin ci log gis bcings// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rgya bsags te// 'khor ba'i 'bras bcas glar tu stod// mngan 'das sogs mthar
157a3(rnying rgyud): sbyin pas// phung po khams dang skye mched rgyun// dgra dang ma dag gnyis kyi chos// bde 'gro'i lam la sgrib byed rnams// rtog pa'i mtshan ma kun skyong ba'i// mi rtog ye shes snying po'i chos// oM mtha ma tha sarba pro ta ka ga te he huM hUM phaT/
157a4(rnying rgyud): oM pa tsa ba tsa sarba tIr+ya ka ga te he huM hU~M phaT/ oM de ha da ha sarba nar ka ga te he huM hU~M phaT/ ye shes 'bar ba'i mes bsregs te// mtshan med ston pas rnam par dag/ thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// sru yi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed// gsung
157a5(rnying rgyud): gi mtha' yas sems can sgrol// thugs mchog tshad med bzhi dang ldan// nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// tshe dpag med pas dbang bskur te// yang dag nyid las yang dag sgrol// yang dag sgrol nas bde chen thob// mi ldog rigs
157a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// rgyal ba'i zhing khams rnam par dag/ oM AHhUM swA hA// las bzhi ye shes lcags kyu yis// 'gro gnas gsang bar hUM gis bsdus// byin rlabs ye shes lhan grub pa'o// sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams kyi// ba
157a7(rnying rgyud): gshegs po thang kun sprul zhing // rdzu 'phrul yan lag kun ldan pas// 'phags lam brgyad tshogs gnas kun sgrol// rigs kyi sangs rgyas kun gshegs te// chos kyi 'khor lo la sogs spyod// 'jig rten lhar bcas gtso bo dang /
157b1(rnying rgyud): sa da N+Dal dbasam rnams// sa bcu'i thung chub sams dpa tshogs// phrag 'tshal yang dag sa cad cing btad// lug pa bsad pa' sa 'das nas// rang gi rigs pa dpa'al bar rtsal// skang gsum ma las ston byas pas/
157b2(rnying rgyud): 'brum gyi char yang mi phod de// rjes bu chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis// bskal ba 'bang zhig snying rje mchog/ bdud dang dbang phyug snying rje dag/ thugs rje tshad med bzhis bsgral nas// ro yi nyal thabs gan rgyal te// 'dzam
157b3(rnying rgyud): yi rgyal khams su// bor nas so gzhir gyur pa ni// dur khrod chen po brgyad du thugs// mgo na lho phyogs gnas su bstan// lag gnyis g.yas dang g.yon du brkyang // mgo dang lus gnyis yan lag kun// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs
157b4(rnying rgyud): kyis// rang byang sprul ba'i lha mo gnas// de dag byin rlabs khyad par mthus// mchod rten shing la sogs par snang // 'di ltar sa gzhi de dag kun// bkra shis thugs rje ya mtshan can// chos dang dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas// cho 'phrul rol par bstan
157b5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// de yi lus snying ma ga d+hA// ma mo chen mo ko'u ri gnas// mkhas shing snying stobs che ba'i yul// khyad par chos kyi tshogs rgyas shing // mchod rten bde byed gzhon nu nyid// mgo ni lho yi phyogs gnas pa'i// dur khrod chen po rab snang byed//
157b6(rnying rgyud): sing+ga'i yul gyi gling phran dag/ ma mo chen mo tshe'u ri gnas// mthong thos rnam pa'i 'phrul pag can// mchod rten ri po ta la yin// lag pa g.yas pa shar lho mtshams// dur khrod chen po bal po'i yul// ma mo chen mo puk+ka sI// lhag par zas kyi
157b7(rnying rgyud): longs spyod che// mchod rten khri de kar ste// rab tu sprul pa snang byed pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa lho rngub mtshams// dur khrod chen po sA la'i yul// ma mo chen mo g+hasma rI// phyag rdo rdo rje dbang gi gnas// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas pas// kyang
158a1(rnying rgyud): kyi mchod rten mngon 'phags pa// rkang pa g.yas pa byung shar mtshams// dung khrod chen po la yi yul// ma mtshan mo tsan+da lI// ma dang chu yi rdzu 'phrul can// mchod tun med ni mya gung tshogs// mamo sngags rnams kun
158a2(rnying rgyud): 'grub gnas// rkang pa g.yon pa nub byang mtshams// dur khrod chen po li yi yul// ma mo chen mo s+pha sha nI// bde skyid ldan pa phun sum tshogs// mchod rten med ni ka ni ka/ mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kun rgyu ba'i gnas// mtshan ma'i gnas te byang
158a3(rnying rgyud): phyogs gnas// dur khrod chen po'i mo Di'i gnas// ma mo chen mo be tA lI// 'byor pa'i longs spyod lnga dang ldan// dngos grub can yang de na mang // mchod rten chos kyi 'khor lo'o// de yi nang khrol thams cad kun// dur khrod chen po'i nub phyogs spangs//
158a4(rnying rgyud): rgya mtsho gling gi gnas chen po// lang ka pu'i srin po'i yul// mamo chen mo za mo ha// rin chen nor dang dpag bsam shing // 'thor ba'i longs spyod kun dang ldan// mchod rten grub pa'i dngos grub can// thams cad kun la dbang bskur ba'o// de lar
158a5(rnying rgyud): sgrol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// rang gi rigs bcas dkyil 'khor nyid// dus gsum rgal ba'i bka' bzhin du// byin rlabs brtan pas kun spong cing // sngags mchog
158a6(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i phyir// dam rdzas brgyad rnams bstan par bya// sangs rgyas kun tu 'grub byed pa'i// dam tshig chen po mchog gi rdzas// pradz+nyA ki sha tset+ta dz+wa la hUM phaT/ ma nu da ra ma sha/ u ma da ra ma ma hA maM tAM/ kha ti khA hi hUM phaT/ e rbA ma
158a7(rnying rgyud): hA ka ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya ho// ka ra pa ta ni hUM phaT// thugs rje chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// dur khrod bdag po kun 'dus te// mchod rten gtso dang rigs bcas rnams// rang gi snying po 'bul bar byed// drag po'i chung ma da dbyeg chags// nyi shu
158b1(rnying rgyud): rtsa brkyang g.yag dang bcas// dkyil 'khor chen por dbang thob nas// dam brtas las bzhin rnam par bkod// de nas bcom ldan kun tu bzang // rigs rnams thams cad zhi zad pas// dkyil 'khor thams cad rab bsdus pa'o// 5
158b2(rnying rgyud): srug nag 'bar ba la// phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// rab tu 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor las// rigs tshogs sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed// bdud tshogs dregs byed chung mar bcas// thugs rjes rig 'dzin dbang bsrung nas// dam tshig
158b3(rnying rgyud): bskrun pa la gnas mdzad// phyogs rnams kun nas smras pa'i tshig/ rang gi dam bcas bsdam par byed// rdo rje 'bar ba'i me dpung gis// bskal pa'i me rnams 'joms par byed// 'jigs tshul rngam pa'i khyad par can// dbu ma rtsub
158b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshig sgrogs shing // phyag na 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha thogs// zhi ba phyag stong spyan stong tshogs// 'jig rten khams kun spa bkod byed// khro gnyer rab tu 'bar ba'i skus// 'jig rten dregs tshogs smos ci dgos// sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs
158b5(rnying rgyud): su rung // rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed// snying rje rngams dang zhi bar ston// 'bar ba'i mtshon cha sna tshogs can// 'jig rten thal bar brlag mdzad pa'i// e ma ho che mchog he ru ka/ khro rgyal khro la skyabs su mchi// thugs rjes nan tan
158b6(rnying rgyud): mi gzung ngam// gal te bka' ltar ma bgyis na// mgo lus snying dag brgyar 'gas shing // rab tu 'bar bas bsreg par mdzod// de nas de dag thams cad kyis// che mchog 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// rjes su bsgrub pa'i don phyir zhus//
158b7(rnying rgyud): dang yang du gsol btab ste// e ma ho ston pa khyod nyid kyis// yang dag mdzad pa rgya chen po// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyi phyir// thugs rje dag par bstan par mdzod// 'di dag ston dras ci bzhin du// ston pas bsten pa'i don gsal mdzad/
159a1(rnying rgyud): dga' 'khor na po nga bar bang// khung bag ba dan bzhis brtan// tshogs dang dra tubabs tshogs// rten martog phreng bas bcud// 'dod pa yon tar lha ma'in// dadunan can pa dan la g+sa//
159a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dril bu phyogs bcur sgrogs// rab rdo rje bzlas brgyan// pho brang dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// dung khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // dus gsum dkyil 'khor rgya chen tshogs// phyogs bcugan nas 'khrigs pa yis// zhing sbrul thod pa
159a3(rnying rgyud): phreng bas brgyan// mtshon rtsa sna tshogs me 'od 'bar// dbu yi dkyil 'khor phyogs dang mtshams// rin chen sna lnga'i mdangs bcas par// re'u rtsa brgyad pa'i phreng bas mdzes// 'khor po pad+ma rin chen dag/ ka ba'i cha brjod phyogs dang mdza/
159a4(rnying rgyud): kun nas yongs su bskor ba yi// rma chung bar khyams sgo khrung can// dang dang mo ho ga na chen tshogs// drang 'di mas rnams 'tshogs kyis// rang gi gnas bcas twa Na// padz+ra'i 'thong bas kun bkrabs pa'i// rnam mdzes 'jigs pa'i
159a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis brgyan// 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil 'khor dbus// kun bzang yab yum rol pa'i mthus// sems can sna tshogs phyogs dang mtshams// rang gi rdzogs sgong rgyal po tshogs// gnas rnams kun nas legs bkug ste// dkyil 'khor
159a6(rnying rgyud): brtan pa'i gnas su bkod// gsang sngags mthu las rab phul ba'i// ye shes khro bo bcu po rnams// yum dang gnyis med sgor mdzad cing // rang gi phrin las kun bskyed pas// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed// rin chan ka
159a7(rnying rgyud): ba mchog brgyad kyis// ti zla badz+ra'i dkying 'khor la// rigs kyang de gshegs yum dang bcas// phyogs mthams dbus su brtan lda ba'o// sprul pa yang skabar byam 'khor chags// su mdog mtshan pa ma bzhin bkod// kun kyang
159b1(rnying rgyud): gsum phyag drug la// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum 'bar ba'i skyabs// 'jigs byed rgyan cha cha lugs dang // khro bo 'bar ba'i gar bcas pas// rin chen te \u0f88\u0f90'i gang na bzhugs pa'o// d+yo d+hI bA dI dbyings kyi yum// sma mdag sngo na ga nga
159b2(rnying rgyud): dgu pa// bco brgyad phyag bcas zhabs brgyad mdzes// 'du gshegs rigs lnga he ru ka/ yum bcas gnon thabs gar gyis bzhugs// khro mo dbyings kyi dbang phyug dang // tshe mchog khro bo mnyam sbyor bas// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhi bcu gnyis//
159b3(rnying rgyud): zhabs brgyad skyug nag 'jigs pa'i tshul// rin chen rgyan tshogs chas rnams dang // dur khrod gnas kyis rnam par brjid// phyi rol mtshogs mkha' 'gro rnams// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas kun tu// sprul pa yang skal tshogs bcas 'khod//
159b4(rnying rgyud): phra man sgo ba khro ba'i tshogs// phyogs rnams kun tu khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa chen por sbyar/ derigs rnams kun gyi dbang bskur zhing // byin rlabs sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ dkyil 'khor bdun gyi brjid pa'i mu// stor ba brgyad kyi
159b5(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid can// rab tu rdzogs par gsal byas te// zhing khams chen po spo mjed cing // phyag rgya cher gnas rnal 'byor pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid do// khams gsum thams cad bskal ba'i zhing // rgyad drug gnas pa'i sangs rgyas
159b6(rnying rgyud): rnams// sdud pa'i sbyor bas kun bsdus nas// mi ldog dbyings su yang dag nyid// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun gsal bas// thig le chen por dbang bskur mdzod// sgra gsang dbus na byang chub sems// rdzogs sangs rgyas la som nyi mdo//
159b7(rnying rgyud): sha zan bshad gci khu ba dag/ bder gshegs lnga yi sa bon gyis// rnam par dri chen snang bar mdzad// phyi po chen po lnga dag pas// nang gi chu 'bras yo nas dag/ chos dbyings ye shes bo nyid// mi bskyod byang chub sems nyid de// da
160a1(rnying rgyud): med ye nas dag bas na// mAM sa rin chen 'byung ldan gtso// mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med dngos// snang ba dag mdza' yas thugs// skye 'gug med pa ye nas dag/ don yod dri chu las grub pa// kun kyang ga
160a2(rnying rgyud): zhing dri ma med// thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas lnga// ma sus rdzogs pa'i ye she sa nyid// ma bcos ye nas lhun gyis grub// de phyir sman chen bcud kyi mchog/ bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya// rtogs pa'i grong du su 'dris pa// mi zhes bya ba sangs rgyas
160a3(rnying rgyud): yin// bcom ldan 'das ni gud na med// 'byung ba lnga las rgyud lnga rgya// sprul pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas nyid// rang gi lus la bsdus pa'i phyir// sku gsum rdo rje'i dbang thob nas// sgrub pa'i rdzas su rnam par spyod// ces gsungs so//
160a4(rnying rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal bdud rtsi rol pa las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'du mdzad pa ste/ rim par phye ba bzhi pa'o// / de nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun 'dus shing // thabs dang shes rab sku
160a5(rnying rgyud): spyod pas// de dag dkyil 'khor mnyes par mdzad// de tshe 'khor gyi byang chub sems// rdo rje chos kyis bskul mdzad cing // yang dag rdzogs pa'i thabs 'di dag/ dkyil 'khor gnas kun 'jug par dgongs// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid//
160a6(rnying rgyud): tshen bstan pa'i thugs rje yis// sgrub pa gsang ba'i las kun dag/ byin rlabs mthu yis ston par mdzad// sngon du yun ring tshogs bsags pa'i// rnal 'byor chen po'i las thabs kun// yon tan rigs rnams kun ldan pa'i// mdangs da
160a7(rnying rgyud): mchog tu gyur par bsngags// dad cing rgya chen shes rab kyis// brtson pas yang dag sgrub par byed// de nyid yang dag bstan pa'i snod// rnal 'byor chen po'i mtshan nyid ldan// yang dag thams dbang bskur cing // yang dag dam tshig la gnas pas//
160b1(rnying rgyud): yang dag sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs// yang dag bslab pa brtson par bya// bde ba chen po'i sa gzhi dag/ kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i gnas// nyes pa'i tshogs thag mdangs ldan pa// bar chad 'gegs kyis gnod med par// phyi nang tshul pas
160b2(rnying rgyud): sbyang ba dang // bsgrad dang bsrung dang byin gyis brlabs// yang dag ye shes brtan 'gyur ba'i// sa ga/ zha pa' khyod sabs pa'i// mchod dang gtor ma chu cher tshogs// de dag sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthus// zhes pa'i spyod pa'i las rnam dag/
160b3(rnying rgyud): da dngos par thu 'byed pa'o// ji mnams dga' ma das bzang ba'i// yid ming gnas su 'dug nas ni// byin brlabs mtshams bcad brten par gnas// 6yi tshogs bcas thun meng dang // thad par rnam par rim pa yi// bde dgra zhags
160b4(rnying rgyud): byin rlabs lha mor bcas// mang du 'dus nas klan mnyes mdzad// dkyil 'khor bzang po'i gnas brgyan te// rigs rnams bkod pa kun sprul zhing // lhag pa'i wAr bcas ma 'dres rnams// rang gi phrin las mthu las 'phrul// ye shes dkyil
160b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor dgug bya ste// cho ga'i yan lag kun rdzogs pas// sta gon gnas mchog bkra shis par// rigs can dkyil 'khor brtan par gnas// rdzas kyi tshogs kun sbyangs pa dang // byin rlabs 'dod pa'i don bzhin du// thams cad longs spyod yon
160b6(rnying rgyud): tan wA// dkyil 'khor gnas kyi don bslab pa'i// thams cad rgyan dang khrus rnams kyis// phyi nang na par mdzes byas te// phyag 'tshal sdig bshags la sogs rgyud// de kun bstan pas rnam par dag/ rdo rje rgyal po rgyal thebs che// shes rab
160b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal khar rnam gsum// sems bskyed sdom pa la gnas shing // dbang dang dam chog rtogs byas te// bya ba chen por las mtha' phyin// dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi la// dri swa lnga yi byug pas brgyad// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'ab
161a1(rnying rgyud): bcad// re'u cha brgyad pa'i gzhung bzhin blta// de yi rtse mo brgyad la yang // yid bzhin nor bu 'bar brdzi// dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod pa'i rnam// ming gsum nyan d+ha bzung 'khor yug/ ye nas ma brtsa
161a2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin snod// dpal dang ldan pa'i snod bzhag la// gnas de nyid du dgod pa'i spyan// yoM nas rang byung bdud rtsi lnga// sha chen bshang gci bu ga khrag/ dag pa'i rgyu de 'dud kyi dngos// stong las sbyor bas ye nas dag/ pho brang rin chen gzhal
161a3(rnying rgyud): yas khang // gru bzhi sgo khyung rta babs rgyan// phyogs rnams kun tu gsal ba yi// rin chen kha dog rnam lnga pa// bdan dril bus rnam par bklubs// dra ba'i tshogs rnams rnam par 'brel// 'tshogs rdo rje'i sa gnyis// 'khor lo nyi Sh+Tha bdas brgyan//
161a4(rnying rgyud): gru chad pa byams s+ho/ khyung dang // 'dod yin lha mo 'khrigs pa'o// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas rnams su// kun bzang ye shes gsang ba'i sngags// A li kA li gsang ba'i rgyan// yig 'bru 'od phung phyag rtsa tshogs// rigs kyi dkyil la
161a5(rnying rgyud): kun bdag nyid// 'phyo 'du bstan pa'i don spyod pa'o// bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor kun rgyas pa'i// gtso bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa// ljang ser dkar dang dmar bas mdzes// dbu rgyan rin chen sman rnams dang // na bza' kun gyis rnam par bslabs/
161a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rgya gram bdud rtsi'i snod// nor bu rin ched badra dang // rtse gsum be con mtshan ma rdzogs// mtshan dpe cha lugs yum rnams dang // zhi dang khro bcas gnyis ka'i tshul// rang 'od yum dang mnyam sbyor te// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rigs rnams sgo/
161a7(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur rigs kyi 'dig pos bcan// sku gsu thugs kyi kyi rlabs dang // 'od tshogs sul pa kun du pa'o// thab pa dang shes rab gnyis med par// dkyil khongags pa ba la gnas te// rang sngags byan tu tshogs rlangs pa/ rgyag
161b1(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi rdzogs par mdzod// rdo rje rin chen padz+ra dang // bde gshegs rigs kyi lo rgyal ba ni// dkar sngo mar dang ser ba'i mdog/ zhal gsum g.yas g.yon rnam par 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // 'khor lo bdud rtsi bum pa nyid// rgya gram ngal gri dang /
161b2(rnying rgyud): sgra dang // rin chen phreng bcas yum dang 'khril// phyi rol mchod pa'i phongs spyod rgyan// lha mos gnas kun mdzes byas pas// rgya cher rnam par spro zhing bsdu// phyogs bcu kun nas 'khrigs pa'o// sgo srung rigs kyi khro bo dag/ zhal gsum phyag
161b3(rnying rgyud): drug 'jigs byed rgyan// dkar sur dmar dang ljang gu'i mdog/ tho ba dbyug pa pad+ma dang // rtse gsum bdud rtsi bum pa nyid// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba'i// rigs bca
161b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan mas mdzes byas pa'o// oM a mr-i ta kun+da li ma hA shrI he ru ka hU~M karma kro d+hi shwa rI swA hA/ oM bi shwa badz+ra he ru ka hUM/ karma badz+ra kro d+hi shwa rI swA hA/ oM pi shwa rat+na he ru ka hUM/ kerma rat+na kro d+hi shwa rI swA hA/ oM bi shwa pad+ma he ru ka hU~M/ karma pad+ma krod+d+hi shwa rI swA hA/
161b5(rnying rgyud): oM bi shra bud+d+ha shI he ru ka hU~M/ karma dzakra kro d+hI sha rI swA hA/ oM a mr-i ta badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M/ badz+ra a~M ku sha swA hA/ oM a ma~M ta rat+na krod+ha d+h+waM/ rat+na bA sha hU~M/ oM a mr-i ta pad+ma kro d+ha dz+dza/ padz+ra s+phoT bi srA tAM/ oM a mr-i ta dut+ma krod+hag+h+raM/ bud+d+ha b+har+Ne shwa ri swA hA/ rigs rnams
161b6(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ phyag rgya bzhi yis bstan par gnas// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rigs kun gyi// bdud rtsi mtshan ma rgya gram bcas// gsung gi gnas su gsal byas pa'i// pad+ma la gnas sna tshogs mtshan// sa bon sngas kyis brgyan pa dang
161b7(rnying rgyud): 'od 'phros gsung gi dkyil 'khor// oM ya mr-i ta karma sid tis mo g+ha g+ha na hU~M/ rdo rje bcings pa bstan byas pa'i// gung mo mthe bong mthe'u chung rnams// nang du rtse sdad snying gar bzhag/ gnas kyi dkyil 'khor gnas kun sbyor// rdo rje lu chur bcangs pa
162a1(rnying rgyud): las// bcangs ste sor mo so sor gdengs// sna tshogs rdo rje 'byung ba'i tshul// gzhan rnams kun nas bsgral bar byas// btag dang bcag dang gzhal ba dang // nyi bla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// 'bru lnga ye shes 'gro
162a2(rnying rgyud): 'du yis// stong gsum khyab pas don byas te// bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas// dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod pa'i phyir// mu tig dkar po dri med ltar// bka' bzhin bstan pa'i dngos grung dag/ rigs rnams phyag rgya sngags kyis sbyar // de
162a3(rnying rgyud): nas 'jam dpal rnon po nyid// rang gi 'khor tshogs sder bcas pas// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal mchod// de dag bstan pa'i gnas su 'khod// dngos grub chen po'i dkyil 'khor nyid// thabs dang gsang ba'i phyag rgya mchog/ mtshan ma rtags
162a4(rnying rgyud): bcas gsal ba dang // byin rlabs mthu yis gsal ba dang // gnyis med dngos grub mnyam sbyor bas// rigs kun 'bras bu ji ltar 'grung // de nas kun tu bzang po nyid// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs te// spang ba'i tshogs chen kun khya pas//
162a5(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor bsdu bar mdzod// dkyil 'khor kun nas gru bzhi pa'i// khang pa thu chad sgo khyud bcas// bar khyams rta babs ra ba dang // rin chen rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor zla gam gyi// rin chen pad+ma'i gdan rnams
162a6(rnying rgyud): su// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor dbang mdzad pa'i// rta mgrin rol pa rnam par brjid// zhal gsum phyag drug dbang gi pa// dmar dang mthing ga dkar po'i zhal// g.yas na pad+ma ral gri bum// g.yon na 'khor lo rda rjer phre/ rta mgrin ljang bu zhal gdangs
162a7(rnying rgyud): pa// lan+d+ra rtsa gsum phyag rgyas mtshan// sna tshogs kyathas datsho phreng // rin chen rgyar bcas gos kyis 'aslabs// khro bo po pham ro lang sa dang // lo gnyer ral pa gcig ma dang // dkar por dmar dang ljang gA'i mdog/ sna tshogs rdo rje padz+ra dang // rtse gsum
162b1(rnying rgyud): rak+ta bdud rtsi'i snod// phyogs bzhi thabs dang shes rab bya// snyoms 'jug shes rab bzhi yi tshul// bde gshegs rigs kyi dbu rkyen dang // byin rlabs cha lugs kun rdzogs pa'o// oM hrIHha ya gI wa hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra a mr-i ta hu lu hu lu /
162b2(rnying rgyud): phaT/ oM rat+na a mr-i ta hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM bud+d+ha a mai ta hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ oM karma a mr-i ta hu lu phu lu hUM phaT/ de dag dkyil 'khor rnam smos pas// ye shes bdud rtsi kun bsdus te// dngos grub las rnams dbang mdzad cing // thugs rje chags
162b3(rnying rgyud): pas kun bkod mdzad// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor brtan byas pas// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa'i mthus// phyi rol mchod pa'i tshogs rnams dang // sgo srung khro bo ya ba yum bcas// rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i// rta mgrin phyag rgyas phyogs bcu
162b4(rnying rgyud): nas// dngos grub tshogs rnams brtan par byed// gung mo mtheb chung rtse sbyar te// srin lag bsnol ba mig gi tshul// mdzu'o mo mapo pos legs mnan la// dam tshig mchog gi gnas kun bzhag/ rdo rje khu tshur las byung ba'i// srin lag mthe bong
162b5(rnying rgyud): rtse srur zhing // nyi zla gsal ba'i sngags dang bcas// las kyi phyag rgya kun spyod pa'o// oM ta ya grI ba hu lu hu lu pad+ma d+ha ra Ni sid+d+hi hUM/ gsang bcas lag pa'i phyag rgya yis// gzhung bzhin pad+ma'i 'phro 'du bya// de dbus klu bdag sa bon gyis// dngos grub pad+ma
162b6(rnying rgyud): blang bar bya// dbug pa'i sngags kyis bstan nas ni// le lo med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// bar chad med pa'i 'gro 'du bya// yang dag bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor nyid// oM kyi ye shes las byung zhing // AM gis mes bsregs thal bar gyur// hUM gis
162b7(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi rnam par dag/ gsal nas 'byung 'dug lhan ne pos// rtags dang mtshan ma bdun gyis 'byung // 'od dang du ba dri dang sba// lha mo'i gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur// mang du ston na grub rtags yin// de la ya mtshan skye mi bya// mtshan ma 'di
163a1(rnying rgyud): dag mthung na// 'an na kyog rgya babyud de// grogs thabs bskyed ba tsal shugs 'byung // dam ga cod pa bslang pa byer// rdus rnams dag kyang bkang la bdag/ de nas brtsod kyadadangs tha dang // stobs la
163a2(rnying rgyud): yang dpung bskur ro// tha ma lung ldar de dag gyis// tshogs su btad pa 'di brjod do// don dam ma skyes rnamangan thams kyi dbyings// dag dang ma dag mi rtog rtog las 'das// dus gsum du rtsig pa'i mu bstan sde bcoMm med//
163a3(rnying rgyud): grub sna tshogs rlabs chen 'bar ba 'di// sra 'don sbyin gyis da lta 'ang la longs// bsel bar bsgri bas dang gti mug mun pa la// sprin mthong nyi shu da dpar dro ba bzhin// bdud rtsi'i rgyal po de'ang chen 'di phyin pas// rag 'dzin rgyal ba
163a4(rnying rgyud): 'phang po'o// rnam pa kun gyis nges par chos la spyor// tshe dang dngos grub yid du 'ong // bgegs rnams kyi zas la sogs te// nad dang bral nas ci 'dod pa'i// yon tan rtsa bkyang 'di yis 'thob// de nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa'o// byang chub se
163a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs ye rang ste// ston pa'i bka' la gus bskyed cing // yang dag zhing po myur du 'brang // yul kun gsang 'ang bdag po nyid// phung rgya 'khor lo tshogs cing // mdzad stod rgya che gnas bsrub pa'i// rtog pa'i don kun yang dag zas//
163a6(rnying rgyud): risris lnga'i bde ga shegs kyis// yang dag don 'di rnam par bshad// tshangs dang drang skyong gtsangs pa// de dag thos pa rangs ma pa nang // grwa dang tham pa gtsang ma rjes// de kur grol ba ngas ma gdang // tshul song rdzog zang yang // sle
163a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i bar dug/ de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad// rnal 'byor thabs dang ldad pa' di// chos su'i bas mtha' ngad // rigs phra gi su snang zas// rab tu brtags pas thog par 'gyur// rang bzhin yi nas dag pa'angs// mnyam pa kyi
163b1(rnying rgyud): na su du ma na// / ma du sa / ga smra // la ga
163b2(rnying rgyud): sa kar bas na// dri ming rnam dag ye shes su// rag chags med dmar bas na// chos rnams kun spyod padz+ra'i \u0f7f// shachen yid bzhin rin chen po// snatshogs 'byung gnas mnyam pa'i sra// dri da gser pa dag smang mad /
163b3(rnying rgyud): byang smrab 'chos kyi su// dri mu dag byed ljang bu'i mdog// dran tu don yod pas rab lba// swa lnga lhan grub bdud kyi 'di// kun kye lus la gnas pa nyid// dri che dri chung ka dade// sha chen sems bcud 'di dag kyad// sems na rtog pa bzlog pa'i phy-i
163b4(rnying rgyud): gtsa r-i'i dang du blang bar byos// gtsang sde med par kun gyis spyod// gnyis med mnyam pa'i bdud rtsi 'gu // the tshom med par dngos gru ba thob// na mthol bres bu chen po dag/ tshe 'dir dngos grub mngon du 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// skad kyi nal po chen 'du
163b5(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsingal ba zhes bya ba las/ dngos bub kyi dkyil 'khor na par bslab pa'i tshul te/ rim par skye ba lnga pa'o// / de nas bdu rje'i snying po nyid// nges pa'i yang gis slab byed pa// don su nag sang ba bstan pa'i gnas// zang
163b6(rnying rgyud): n+ya de 'dings par gsungs// dang po kun sum tshogs pa'i gnas// dge zhing bar chad med pa'i gzhi// phyi nang rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes// dben zhing stan rnams kun rdzogs pa'i// nye bde spyong pa'i gnas dgeH// bslab pa'i dkyil 'kho na ba/
163b7(rnying rgyud): nga gdong kun ba srung da'i phyer// gsang spags ting 'don sreg tu dang // sngan rdzas lag cha sun su ma tshogs// gnong byeng par chad dgra bgegs pa zlog/ de nas sgrub pa'i yo byad dang // dmadzas gsing ba kun pa la gtsang // 'chab zas ci rngas rngam pa dang /
164a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rgyan brgyas phun sum tshogs/ mchod dang gtor ma cu chen rnams// nye bar bkod pa'i gnas su bar+d+han// phyi nang gsang ba'i lha dag la// ji bzhin nye bar der gnas te// sa gzhi rab tu sbyangs byas nas/
164a2(rnying rgyud): chos grangs yar ngo'i brgyad la brtsam// bkra shis snga dro la sogs dus// dkyil 'khor chen po brtsam bya zhing // ba yi rnam lnga dri lnga dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis nye bar byug/ bsnyen bsgrub so so'i bye brag bzhin// sgrub rdzas mkhas pas dbye bar bya// mtshan ldan
164a3(rnying rgyud): thod pa lnga rnams mu// tshol chen me mar gtams byas te// ras kyi sdong bu brgya brgyas brgyan// me mar lnga brgya bltams nas ni// phyogs rnams kun nas byin dpab ste// bsnyen bsgru ba don chen gsang babenam// phrin las bzhi yi spyan sreg dang // las
164a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i sbyor ba mchog kun bya// zhi ba'i tshe ni byang du bawa// dbang gi dus su nu 'phyogs te// mngon spyod chen lho phyogs su// rgyas pa'i las kun shar bltas partsam// so so'i gdan l-i gnas par bya// shar gyi dkyil 'khong steng dag tu// smrab rdzas
164a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad gzhag par bya// lho yi dkyil 'khor steng dag tu// mang ye lnga bcu sboms pa gzhag/ nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas brgyan par// sgrub mchog yab yum gnas par bya// byang gi dkyil 'khod steng dag tu// khams gsum dag pa'i rdzas rnams
164a6(rnying rgyud): bzhag/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// ring chen pad+ma'i khri ster la// bram ze bkra shis gtsang ma'i rngus// yid 'ong mtshan mdo snod rnams bzhag/ ye shes lnga ldan ri mos brgyan// rdo rje thod pa dbus su ste// sku gsum ldan grub tshogs
164a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i// 'khor lo'i thod pa shar gyi phyogs// mi shigs mdzod ldan kun 'byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor thod pa lho yi rdzas// srid gsum yongs bsgral rnam dag nyid// pad+ma'i thod pa nub kyi phyogs// tsho 'phul rtags kun las nyid rdzogs/
164b1(rnying rgyud): snatshogs thod pa byang du bzhag/ mi 'gyur brtan pa'i rdo rje dag/ dngos grub gsol byung rten du bzhag/ mi shrI \u0f89\u0fa4 mdzod ldan rdo rje dang // kham pa gsum rdzas dag rdornga dang // nyon mongs gnas stang dza rnga dang // mtshan sa slob thab rdo rje dang // no dra/
164b2(rnying rgyud): yid 'ong mtshams bzhi ru// rigs mthun pa dra'i gdan la dgod// yon tan mogs rdzogs rdo rje dang // bkra shis mtshan ldan rdo rje dang // mi 'gyur sra brtan rdo rje dang // dpal ldan 'joms byed rdo rje dang // pad+ma can dang dung can dang // 'an slang ca
164b3(rnying rgyud): dang ri mo can// mtshams dang sgo gnas pad+ma la// rigs kyi rdzas rnams bkod par bya// yang na b+had d+ha dpal ldan rdzogs// zlum la 'khyil bas pad+ma 'ang // dbus dbug gcig yod pa// 'di dag bdud rtsi mdzes pa'i sdod// nangazhes bri
164b4(rnying rgyud): par bya// phyi rol pad 'dab sngags dang bcas// snying po choms byed bcud kyi mchog/ gtso bo lnga dang 'bras bu lnga// dri zhemi bcud ldan thams cad kun// 'di dag rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir// mang po 'dus pas mthu byin che// yang dag rtsa brgyad stong du sbyar/
164b5(rnying rgyud): gtso bo lnga dang sbyor ba'i sman// a mra rgun 'bru ba nase// na le ge sar a ga ru// 'di dag nang gi 'bras bu lnga// sha lnga'i yon tan rtsal rdzogs dag/ dbang po lnga yi gzugs dang sbyar// de yi 'phral du dgos pa yang // shing thog rkun 'bru ka ko la// a pra pan bum
164b6(rnying rgyud): sha ri// dri ni chen po sna lnga dang // cha yi grangs su mnyam sbyar te// nA ga ge sar shing tsha dang // sug spel g+han+ta r+tha dra dang // kun ta ro ta dr-i yi mchog/ rgya spos dza ti phal dang // ga pur tsan dan mi di dag/ dri yi rgyal po spos mchog ste// rang gi rigs pa
164b7(rnying rgyud): dgod par bya// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ pog dang sbrang rtsi lde po / dag/ gser dngul zangs lcags dung rnams kun// brdar zhing zheng tu btags te sbyar// de dag rab tu cha bsnyams shing // rang gi mthu bcas lhor bas 'gub// btag bcog las kyi dkyil
165a1(rnying rgyud): du// bdud kyi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis sbyar// oM a mr-i ha he na ha na a mr-i ta mu sa la swA hA/ khams gsum nam N+Dal dkyil 'khor gyis// bar gcod bgegs rnams tshar gcod cing // gnas dang rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i rdzas/
165a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'byor pas brtan par bya// rigs lnga rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ji lta bar// sku gsung thugs tshogs bslab pa'i gnas// ting 'dzin bsnyen pas gsal bar 'gyur// bdud rtsi khrol bu'i rigs dkyil 'khor// de nyid
165a3(rnying rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya dang // 'od zer mthu yis sbyor byed cing // rang gi dkyil 'khor nyid du gnas// btag bcog phrin las gsal ba'i tshogs// bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor 'du 'dul bcas// rigs kyi 'khor los sbyor pa'i mthu// sprin las bdud rtse gnas chen
165a4(rnying rgyud): 'grub// de nas dpal chen he ru ka/ dur khrod pa dag po chen po ni// che mchog shin tu mi bzad pa'i// rigs rnams sangs rgyas rnams kyis brgyan// sku ni spug nag 'bar ba la// nyi shu rtsa gcig zhal gyis mdzes// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag gi tsigs
165a5(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi sangs rgyas khro bo dang // zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor yum bcas rnams// pho brang gdan dang bcud du ldan// khams gsum dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// 'chi med rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor brgyan// mkha' mnyam klong gi dkyil 'khor sbyor// gsang ba mchog
165a6(rnying rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// sku gdung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor la// bdud rtsi zab mo'i dkyil 'khor nyid// phrin las mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor gnas// mkha' 'phro rol pa'i tshogs dang bcas// yang dag bdud rtsi gsang chen bsgrub// phyag rgya kun tu bkod
165a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul// gar dbang dgyes mchog dkyil 'khor la// mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pas// thams cad gnyis med byang chub sems// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor nyid// rin chen 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor las// 'bas shes 'od 'phro
165b1(rnying rgyud): dkyib 'khor 'char// rnam dag chos nyid dkyil 'khor du// tshogs chen yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor rgyas// rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor gyis// dngos grub bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// rgyu 'bas mthun par spang ba yang // rigs
165b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor nyid// gsang ba yum gyi tshogs rnams kun// phyogs bzhi dag tu dkod bya ste// yang dag tshul bzhin byin gyis brlab// nyi zla'i 'od bzhin gsal bar sngo// gnyis mnyam gnyis su mnyam sbyor bas// dug gsum
165b3(rnying rgyud): sku gsum gnas su sgrol// yangs shing rgyud la goms pa dang // chos su zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin// yon tan tshogs dang ldan pa la// nges par dbang thob dam tshig gnas// 'byung ba bzhi las bskyed pa'i yum// mtshan mchog bzang po bdu rtsiganyid//
165b4(rnying rgyud): cha lugs rdzogs par ma 'dres gsal// zla gsang dkar dmar krung dkar lci// rab sbyangs gsal ba'i grogs ldan pa// ma dang sring mo rnal 'byor ma// btsal nas bslab pa chen po bya// dri skyar spos chus mgo lus bkru// dkyil 'khor gnas su nye ba
165b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzag pa'i bdud rtsir sA yan// chags chen sbyar pa'i sems dang bcas// khyad par bdud rtsi gnas kun tu// rab tu klas pas kun 'grub 'gyur// mtshan dang ldan pa'i nod pa ru// gsang sngags phyag rgya 'phro 'dus srung // bdud rtsi dam pa'i gnas nyid du/
165b6(rnying rgyud): kun byed thams cad gsang ba yin// slob ma dpa' brtul gtsang sbra can// skyon drug rnam par spangs pa yi// mi phyed pa ni dgu dang ldan// dam tshig thams cad ma nyams rdzogs// lus srog bu dang chung ma dang // rin chen sna tshogs rdzas rnams da
165b7(rnying rgyud): sring mo shin tu brgyan pa dag/ slob dpon bla ma mchog la 'bul// de dag rab tu sbyangs pa yis// nyung yang bdud rtsi'i grangs bzhin du// rab tu brtags shing bsal byas pas// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos thub bslab// bdud rtsi'i bu mcho ga rdzas
166a1(rnying rgyud): 'dis// rang byung don kun rdzogs byed pas// de dogs mtshan ma'i mtha' spangs te// don bzhin rigs kyi dngos grub blang // de tshe phyi nang gsang ba dang // ma dag pa rnams mtshams bcad do// las kyi gcon bskang bas
166a2(rnying rgyud): te// sbyang dang mtshams dang gsal byas 'grub// nyi zla pad+ma yang dag gnas// rigs mthun dpa' bo 'bru lnga'o// 'phro 'du mtshan ma skra yi tshogs// gnas lnga dag tu bsam par bya// 'di dngos bi ma rab 'byams mchog/ dngos grub rab 'bir tham kun//
166a3(rnying rgyud): mthob par du mi gtang bzung // btang na par chod chen por 'gyur// gsang sngags bdud rtsi'i gnas chen 'dir// ma gnyis mnyam par sgrub par bya// de dag ni tsho ma rnam spangs pas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor brtan byas te// sngags dang phyag tu nye bar sbyar/
166a4(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po'i tsho gas rab rgyus// oM a ho su kha d+harma kA ya sid+d+ha a mri ta sid+d+ha hrIHswA hA/ gnas lnga dag tu bsam par bya// spyi gtsug dbus su zag ma ste// de ni oM dkar 'od ldan pa// 'od zer rnam lnga 'phro 'du'i rgya// bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad gco
166a5(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi phyag rgya'i tshul bzhugs pa'i// lce yaM pad+ma hrIHdmar po// 'od zer rnam lnga'i mdang+ga dang bcas// mtha' yas chos kyi gsung ldan pa// mnyam pa'i phyag rgya'i tshul bstan pa'o// de nas bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor kun// snying ga'i nye dkyil hUM mthing ga/
166a6(rnying rgyud): rin chen sna lnga'i zer dang bcas// thugs mchog mi bskyod rdo rje sems// rdo rje dril bcas sa gnon mdzad// lte ba'i nyi mar skra ser po// 'od zer sna lnga'i 'pho 'du las// yon tan rin chen 'byung ldan nyid// yid bzhin rin chen sbyin pa'i rgya// gsang gnas
166a7(rnying rgyud): nyi mar ha ljang gu// 'od zer sna lnga'i phreng bar bcas// phrin las don yod grub pa'i sgra// skabs rten sna tshogs rdo rje'i rgya// pho brang dkyil 'khor re cha'i gnas// phung po'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhon pa'o// rigs lnga gtso bo yum bcas kun// rang
166b1(rnying rgyud): byung bdud cid dbyal 'bang shing // ya shAs lnga las dang snang ba'o// nyi kra rdu lda 'gro 'dralas// ngas gsas 'ag pa 'dan pa da cing // slang 'angs pa nga nas suthob// dazung kyila' bar gdan rnamasas// sran nyid phyag rgya gsal kyar
166b2(rnying rgyud): sgodang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// rigs kyi dkyi la khor gnas sbyor cing // rigs gnas kha dog las kun dag/ de dag mtshan mar gsal bar gnas// oM las 'khor lo skyabs brgyad kyis// rin chen bdud rtsi gnas skyong yadzad// hUM las rdo rje rtses pa//
166b3(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba byang chub sems nyid spyong // sA sngon rin chen 'od 'bang bas// sha chen bdud rtsi'i gnas ngag mdzad// dmar po \u0f7flas pad+mar gyur// chags pa'i da spyod byed pa'o// hA ljang rdo rje rgya gram las// dge pa'i dri chu bdud rtsir gyur// yang dag gom
166b4(rnying rgyud): pas sgo dang bsdu// yun ring brtan pas kun tu sbyor// oM AHhUM swA hA/ rigs rnams rtsa ba'i snying po yis// bde gshegs kun gyi gnas sbyor zhing // rigs bcas zhing khams thams cad kun// bdud rtsigasang men rgya mtsho nyid// oM A
166b5(rnying rgyud): pany+dza a mr-i tatrUM hrIH/ ye shes lnga yi 'od 'byung bar// bsdus pas bdud rtsi rnam par dag/ thams cad gnyis med byang chub sems// rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor mngon sangs rgyas// ma skyes byang chub sems kyi dbyings// dugu gsum nyon mongs
166b6(rnying rgyud): rtsad nas gcod// yon tan tshogs kun dbang sdud cing // dam bcas 'jig rten ma lus sgrol// bdud rtsi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// pho brang 'bar ba'i gzhal yas gnas// bdud rtsi rtsa ba grogs dang skyabs// rtsa brgyad stong las mya ba'i sman
166b7(rnying rgyud): rnam par mi rtog chos kyi sgra// de dag longs spyod yon tan rnams// ma 'gags rnam par 'phral pa'i sgra// thams cad gcig tu rdzogs pa'o// phyag rgya'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// phrin las so so kun gsal ba// sprul pa'i phreng ba rgyan mi char
167a1(rnying rgyud): gas gas pamams ma nas/ gas gags pas// ga la ngas sa// na mang // sa da/ sa dang nas nags// slom spongs sa pa gsas pa/
167a2(rnying rgyud): sram gyi ma'a'adas 'byur ba mad // nyid bsung gi rang bzhid// thab med las the ba tshul// ting dang dmigs sa 'bral ba dzum// rgyangs das bskams ba tid du bskams// blo na thugs rje rang bzhin te// thags rje cad pas 'gro' nga//
167a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis med ye shes rnam stsal pas// gzhon nu rol pa btsun pa dang // sems pas pan gyi gzhing chu cing // thargyas da brjed pa'i lam nyid ni// kyis dang ma shes 'brel pa na// rigs kyi lha mo tshogs bcas pa'i// g.yo bas
167a4(rnying rgyud): bskyed mad cing // kun gyi stor pa'i gnas ldan pas// 'khor dang myang ngan 'das par sbyor// rab tu byung ba'i tshul 'dzin pa'i// drug pas can nA sbed mdza cing // rnam rtog ji ma 'khra bar byed// don pan gsang ba bstan pa'i spros// dkang tha
167a5(rnying rgyud): mthang byin pa'o// bangan pa banas sbyang byed cing // rnams cad bsregs pa'i mtha' pas// cig pa 'a rdzogs ng+yas// thugs ngo nyi mas bsdu bar yang // 'ang ba rgyang chubamams cad cis// myed dbyings su ras dag nga / @
167a6(rnying rgyud): ba ts+tshin pa pyod pas// yang dag rdzogs pa na la byer nyid// dathangs drug gas me cad nas gtsang // thugs rjen ma dag ye shes chags// sngags sngags kyi mdad bdag/ tshong bral bar d+ham 'gags pa'o// rba zhing gnyid dang ga med pa sa
167a7(rnying rgyud): zab cang caca 'grol ston// skye med dngas su med ma // chos tshang ngong po 'dod pa grol// ba dbang du rung par grags// ga ga yong dngos bcas ma lus bu// rnams cad ba chen por 'gyur// bya med cing shA sa
167b1(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcur sngags kyis spro byed cing // 'byung tshogs dam rdzas yab yum sra// rang bzhin gnyis med phyag rgya las// srul ba'i sku ston sku gdung bags// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba'i rgya// slar 'dus bdud rtsi gsang ba'i gnas// 'byung ba'i d+ha
167b2(rnying rgyud): yab yum mkha'// 'di dag don kun skye shi med// rnam rtog mtshan ma kun sbyad pa// thabs dang shes rab rnam bkod pa'o// lag pa g.yon po'i dpung pas kyang // mthe bong srin lag sbyor ba'i bar// thabs shes dkyil na yi pi Sh+Tha// gsang ba'i mtshan
167b3(rnying rgyud): ma bstan byas nas// mdzub mo gung mo mthe'u chung brkyang // sngags kyi phreng ba 'od bcas kyis// sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams byin brlabs pas// dkyil 'khor sbyor ba brtan par 'gyur// ting 'dzin me dang 'dra ba la// bzlas brjod rlung dang 'dra bas bskul//
167b4(rnying rgyud): le lo nyams spangs g.yeng ba yi// glal dang sbrid pas bar mo bcad// oM badz+ra a mri te hUM hrIH/ oM AHhUM/ dza hU~M baM ho// a mr-i ta thA be sha ya/ A ba sha ya a a/ rang bzhin bdud rtsi gnas rnams nas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khod can
167b5(rnying rgyud): bsdus te// de dag gsang ba'i gnas su bzhugs// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rtag par gnas// gnyis med gdod nas dag pa ste// sku gsung bdud rtsi'i gnas rgyas shing // rigs kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor// phyag rgya rol pa'i tshul ston pa'o//
167b6(rnying rgyud): de nas 'khor gyi gtso bo dang // kun tu longs khyod mnyes pa'i tshogs// rang gi dkyil 'khor rngam dag pa'i// bdud rtsi'i gnas kun longs spyod nyid// de tshe dga' mgu dad pa yis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bstod// oM nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ye
167b7(rnying rgyud): shes te// mtshan nyid sna tshogs nam mkha' bzhin// bya dang byed tshogs rnam par grol// bdud rtsi'i rgyal mchog phyag 'tshal ba stod// Achu zla bzhin du ma 'gags gsal// thams cad rtog pa yongs su spangs// dug tu 'dzin med rnam par spangs/
168a1(rnying rgyud): bdud kying dbul 'khang phyag 'tshal bsad// dus gsam sangs rgyas pas dbyang sa gnas// grags pa byas par slob mang // tha ba mad kyang 'gag pa mang // bad pa dbyangs pa phyag 'tshal ba snyed// rags
168a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad nyid// don ku bya ba'i gnas rdzogs pa'i// mdzad pa chen po ldan gyis grub// dkyil 'khor kun la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod do// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal bdud ci rol pa zhes bya ba las/ dkyil 'khor gas

168a5(rnying rgyud): kun gyi dbang bskur nyid// bdud rtsid gnas las 'byung ba 'di// dag pa'i dkyil 'khor bslab pa'i thabs// yang dag rtsa cher gsol ba 'debs// de bzhin sgo rnams ma lus kun// thabs kyis bdud rtsis spyong byed nga de// cho ga rags
168a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzi kun gyi pham// phyag rgya sngags dam bcas pa yi// thabs ldan pan lag rdzogs pa'i gno// de dge gsang ba gnas 'jug pa'i// don bur rgya cher gsol 'debs shing // yang dag ye shes brtan par gnas// denas ston pa

168b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// sa gzhi rab tu brtag par bya// 'jam zhing sdum pa nag ma can// mi sdug srin po'i gzugs sogs med// tsha sgo tha ba'i skyon sogs bral// ma zhes ma gas mnyam po la// phyi nang rgyan gyis mdzes byas pas// bslab pa'i gnas mchog bdung zhing
