188b2(rnying rgyud): sapa/ / dedang do
188b3(rnying rgyud): sa du sa
188b4(rnying rgyud): rnams bkud pa de lta bar// de 'dang bde snyen gas bdag ma nga// rgyud kyi la debade gshegs pa'i so// /
188b5(rnying rgyud): sa/ du /
188b6(rnying rgyud): gshegs du 'dus/ gsu su ma da so// yang // mi mi 'i / kyi di'i pa
189a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ e ma ta sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// dkyil 'khor rnams ldan nyid don// byung chub sems kyi mtha nyid dang // ma bcos snang ba 'don rnams kun// bdag cag 'khor la bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang / de nas gsang
189a2(rnying rgyud): ba mchog gi bdag po des/ rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ khyod kyis zhums pa'i sems ma yin par/ spobs pa bskyed nas zhus pa legs so legs so// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi de nyid ni// gsang ba'i don las byung ba yin// don dam
189a3(rnying rgyud): kun rdzob gnyis yod de// mkhas pa rnams kyis rig par bya// byang chub sems kyi de nyid ni// sngon gyi rgyal bas ma gsungs shing // da lta'i rgyal bas mi gsung la// phyis kyang gsung bar mi 'gyur ro// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang // rab
189a4(rnying rgyud): tu gsungs par dka' ba yin// ma bcos pa yi kho na nyid// sems kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir// snod du gyur pa dkon pa yin// zhes gsungs nas// sems dpa' chen po khyod nyid kyis sems la dris shig ces bka' stsal nas cad mi gsung bar
189a5(rnying rgyud): bzhugs so// de nas 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po khyod nyid ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs yang dag pa yin pas na bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar yang spobs
189a6(rnying rgyud): bar 'gyur ba yin pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po gnyis su med pa la mnga' brnyes pa ni the tshom thams cad gcod pa yin pas khyod kyis kyang the tshom dang som nyid gyur pa thams cad zhus shig/ yang nas yang du zhus shig/ gsang
189a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i bdag po ni snod kyi rim pa ji lta bar chos ston par mdzad cing byang chub sems dpa' blo dman zhing sems zhums pa rnams la yang byin gyis brlab bo zhes bka' stsal pa dang / rdo rje chos kyis 'khor rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
189b1(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis bskul ba thugs su chud de 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' blo dman pa grangs med pa byin gyis brlabs nas snod du rung bar byas so// de nas yang rdo rje chos kyis ston pa'i zhal du bltas nas 'di skad ces glengs so// e maho bde gshegs bcom
189b2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das// gsung mchog bka' ni dri ma med// bdag cag 'khor tshogs ma 'tshal na// bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ de nas yang gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des/ spros pa med cing brjod pa las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
189b3(rnying rgyud): te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje chos dang / rigs lnga dang / 'khor du 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'dus pa kun nyon cig/ byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid ni// brjod med smra bsam kun rtog bral// dngos med byang chub sems zhes brjod//
189b4(rnying rgyud): brjod pa zhes bya kun rdzob yin// yang dag nyid la brjod pa med// rang phyung sgra ste bde ba'i mchog/ ma bcos don dam dang nyid la// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med// rang gi lus ngag yid gsum dang // gnyis med ma bcos rdo rje ste// lus ngag yid gsum
189b5(rnying rgyud): dmigs med pas// ma bcos pa yi sems nyid kyis// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su snang // der snang dbyings las bskyod pa med// de ltar rig pa'i skyes bu de// gnyis med byang chub mchog sems bskyed// ces gsungs so// de nas 'khor rigs lnga dang // der 'dus
189b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang rang gi lus ngag yid gsum la sems nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas rdo rje chos kyis rtogs tshad 'di gsungs so// e ma ho bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// chos su byang chub sems
189b7(rnying rgyud): las byung // chu yi dus na de nyid gsal// rig pa rim par gsal byas te// ma bcos don dam ngo bo nyid// spos bral brjod las 'das pa'i sems// nam mkha' rdul dang bral ba ste// dpes kyang de la mtshon mi rus// rtogs par dka' ba'i snying po 'di//
190a1(rnying rgyud): rab tu mi tog gnas med pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pas/ byang chub sems rtogs pa'i tshad 'di gsungs so// e ma ho bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams
190a2(rnying rgyud): kyi thugs// dmigs pa med las thams cad bskyed// de rdzogs sngags kyi don rab gsal// byang chub sems rdzogs bde ba'i gnas// gzung 'dzin rnam spangs rig par gsal// gsal ba dri med rgyal ba'i bka'// de rdzogs ngo bo gnyis med sba// tshig
190a3(rnying rgyud): dang yi ge skra las 'das// brjod med brjod bral don gyi mchog/ bsam dang bral ba'i sems nyid ni// rang gi ngo bo ma skyes pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod kyis/ byang chub kyi
190a4(rnying rgyud): sems rtogs pa'i tshad 'di gsungs so// e ma ho bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sems las thams cad shar// shar ba'i ngeng las ma g.yos gsal// gsal ba'i ye shes 'di chen yin//
190a5(rnying rgyud): chen dang nyid sna tshogs pa'i// ji ltar brtag pa gnyis su med// gnyis med brjod las 'das pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub kyi sems rtogs pa'i tshad 'di gsungs so// e ma ho bde gshegs
190a6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi// gnyis med byang chub sems zhes bya// ngo bo nyid las thams cad 'byung // ji ltar snang ba dag pa'i dbyings// ma bcos ye nas mkha' ltar dag/ gnyis me thabs dang shes bdon// mnyam
190a7(rnying rgyud): nyid las gzhan med do// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag pa las 'das pa'i sems dpas byang chub kyi sems rtogs pa'i tshod 'di gsungs so// e ma no bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// chos kyi dbyings las thams cad shar
190b1(rnying rgyud): shar bad na brjod du med// brdad med dang las rnams cad gsal// gsal ba'i tha zag thabs cad gsas// gsal ba'i byathugs par 'byung // dalas thams cad nyon mongs med// dri ma rnam dag rnal ba'i sa// ral 'gyur na gyes bsems dang/
190b2(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das don thams car grub pas/ byang chub kyi sems rtogs pa'i tshad 'di gsungs so// e ma he bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// chos su byang chub sems pas byung // rgya 'i dus na de ha dgasal// ras bar
190b3(rnying rgyud): par gsal byas te// gnyis med pa po nyid la gnas// ma bcos parjod ma dang po nyid// ral 'byor dpa pas bsgoms nas 'grub// ces gsungs so// de nas bde bar gshegs pa lnga la sogs pa 'dus pa'i ngang phyogs rnams gnyim su med pa'i dang sher ba
190b4(rnying rgyud): pa dang bral ba'i don la sems nas bzhugs so// chud kyargyal po'i yang rgyal po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi modo las byang chub sems kyi nges pa de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang
190b5(rnying rgyud): chos kyis bcom ldan 'das la byi nang gsang ba gsum gu mchod pa rnam par dag pa phul nas/ larab tu phrag srong du bskor babyas shing / brkyang phyug 'tshal nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la gsol ba btab pa/ e ma to bde gshegs bcos ldan 'dang//
190b6(rnying rgyud): gnyen gyur dam pa'i gtso// kAn la snyoms pa'i ngang tshul can// 'khor ba'i gnas nas drangs pa dang // sems can lam ga 'god pa'i zhir// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ren chen dkyil// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor las kyi dkyil// nam snang mdzad chen dkyil 'khor ro/
190b7(rnying rgyud): dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ bde gshegs ngo mtshar khyod la 'dus// gsang ba gsum las byung ba rnams// 'gro ba rigs drug thams cad la// rab tu phan pa'i sems 'chang zhing // rnal 'byor dmas la thugs brtsotsor byed// bdag ca
191a1(rnying rgyud): 'a tshogs su bar 'tshal// zhes gsol ba ba po// de nas ston pa gsang bdag gis rdo rje chos kyi tshig gas na nas/ sa sor rang rang dkyil 'khor rnams// rab tu nyams dga' thogs med bshad// rnal 'gyur rdzo ldan pa phyir ro// 2
191a2(rnying rgyud): kyi bye brag thams cad dang // dngos grub rab 'bring ba na rnams// slob dpon byed par 'dod pa dang // bde bar gshegs pa'i rjes 'brang ba'i// so so'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rgyung shes legs par smon pa dang // ting 'dzin drod ldan gdeng du bcang // bka' da
191a3(rnying rgyud): bstan bcos thams cad la// rab tu mkhas shing the tshom med// don la mun tshugs bsgom la brtson// gnyis med po ldan dad pa che// gsang ba bzhi yi don rnams dang // gab cing sbas pa'i thabs mchog rnams// snod ngan sbas pa gsang mi thub// de la
191a4(rnying rgyud): byeng dang / das/ smra bab dug sa/ byung nga be leg ma/ ba dang // dag pa nga thugs shing // ngan
191a5(rnying rgyud): 'chang zhing // lag mthil 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad yod// kha dog ser zhing shin tu 'tshor// 'khor lo can gyi las rnams ni// cing gar dkyil 'khor bya bar gsungs// blo yangs yon tan kun gyi brgyan// shes pa gsal zhing yon tan ldan// rig pa'i
191a6(rnying rgyud): gnas mchog kun la mkhas// spyang lam nam bzhir lha na sdub cing // mdzes pa'i glu dbyangs rnams la mkhas// yon tan kun la ma 'gags spyod// rdo rje slob dpon bka' bzhin byed// rdo rje spun la gdung ba che// rin po che yi las rnam kun// rnal
191a7(rnying rgyud): 'byor de yis bya bar gsungs// rtag par ting 'dzin rgyun mi gcod// bzlas pa dag la rab tu brtson// sngags kyi don rnams ma lus mkhyen// ngag kyang shin tu 'jam par smra// bden sgra mgrin bde glu dbyangs mkhas// gyi nang chos la mos shing 'chad//
191b1(rnying rgyud): rdzog sogs la zhang kha dag dmar// pad+ma nAn s+ye las ma rigs// sbyin nga las rnams thams cad la// shin tum mongs dbang yang thob// sngags pa rtson zhing shes rab gus la// rtsi nang rgyad kyilas rnams la// lhag ga ma 'on chad kyang rung //
191b2(rnying rgyud): gi don rnams mnor skong // phrin las rnam bzhi'i las la mkhas// las kyi dkyil 'khor bya bar gsungs// yon tan thams cad kun dang ldan// gyi nang sde snod kun la mkhas// spyod pa'i rtse thag mar po spyod// las dang bya ba kun la mkhas// rtag par dang dza m-ing
191b3(rnying rgyud): dzirtse// ting 'dzin rtse zug kun la mkhas// byang sems mtshan nyid chags pa chud// dkyil 'khor spyi pi las sA rung // slob dpon lung ldan dam ba des// slob pa'i mtshad kyi da brtag par \u0f7f// rta ba padu la gang mchog bsrungs// shes rab rnam gsum sde nas nga
191b4(rnying rgyud): dade ldan brtson 'grus rkyen thub dpa'// ston pa'i bka' dang bstan bcos mkhas// slob dpon 'a khung zhing snying rje ldan// rdo rje spun la bco gdung ste// bla ma'i man ngag shin tu 'dzin// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i slob mang rung // lus la dri zhim dang lhung zhing // lus mdzes s+ho
191b5(rnying rgyud): yang ser la 'jam// slob dpon rdo rje ldan la gdung // dkyil 'khor gyi ni las la mkhas// spyod spad phyed cing mig dkyus ring // drang bong lta zhing tshig mi 'gyur// dag kyang shin tu bde zhing 'jam// 'khor lo can gyi slob mar rung // spod pa sdang zhing dpa' tshal tshe//
191b6(rnying rgyud): rin chen sna tshogs na rnams 'chang // gi steng dang b+h+yaR+tha mu tig rnams// rig dngas pa'i na che gyis// bra pa'i dgongs pa stong bar byed// dag stan lus kyang mongs pa dang // skyon rnams thams cad spang ba bzhi// don ched dkyil la kho tha~Mng mang rung // lub dang
191b7(rnying rgyud): ngag dang yid gsum gyi// mi dge bcupa yongs su spong // dge ba 'phrul rtag tu brtson// ngag stan mgrin pa grul grangs// ma dog dpang phul la dzod ni// zla yang mtho na mthing sen po dmang // yan lag thal tshig rnams drang // badz+ra 'chang gi slob mar
192a1(rnying rgyud): bshad// byin chos la rtag tu dga'// dz+nyAn las rnam bzhi'i las la 'brum// dpa' rtsal maming ldan yang sdug/ bzol mkhas zhing rig pa gsal/ tha mA dam pa ma nyes byed cing // dgangs pa thams cad gong byed pa// snga
192a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs 'as la shin tu gakhas// las kyi rigs kyi slob par rung // yon tan mchog rnams kun tshang zhing // mang pos bkur shong brtags pa brjod// lus mdzes spyod gzo yid du ngong // byi bad kyil 'khor mas la gakhas// ma dngag gam nga'i thas pa ba/
192a3(rnying rgyud): pa gang bsgoms slob dpon 'khur// rig pa'i gnas la 'gag pa med// spyi pi dkyil 'khor slob mar rung // dang po gnas kyi brtag pa ni// bzang ngan gnyis su shes par bya// bzang po dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub// ngan pa yan la 'byor nyid brtag 'gyur//
192a4(rnying rgyud): spang brang gnyis su shes par gyis// sngon la spang ba'i gnas bstan pa// gnod sbyin srin po bsgrub pa dang // srin mos zad pa'i sder rjes dang // srin gdug mtshon cha 'dra ba dang // srin po bsad pa'i khrag rjes dang // 'thung po mang po 'dub gnas// grwa gdug
192a5(rnying rgyud): mig dmag ga dang // sa sbyin ma dang // dzi cadan mi na yini 'a // gan sbyin gnas pa nas// dge 'a ga sa ga // man pa bang das sunams na// nga byung // lpagapas rnams ca pa
192a6(rnying rgyud): de wA 'u yi gnas dag ni// mtshad nyid legs par shes kyis la// sangs na dngal grub mchog par 'grub// blang bar bya ba gnas rnams ni// rdorje brag dkar ma dngas bzang ba// ri bo sbyin sdug zug chen gtams// dani rin chen sbyangs padangadra // de sabu le chen mapa ma/
192a7(rnying rgyud): nyams dga' gangs ri mtha'am bskor// shin kun mas dga' yid 'ong ba// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i gnas// srang phug bo nyams dgang dang // sdod kyi bde gshegs kyis bsgrubs pa// mi dang bdu 'dzi dben pa dang // ring zang po sul dag dang // nag
192b1(rnying rgyud): tshal chen po gtibs pa dang // skyed mos tshal gyis mtha' bskor dang // nyams dga' shar du kha bltas dag/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i gnas// kha dog rnam pa lnga yod dang // rin chernga sna lnga'i dbyibs 'dra ba// yang na rin chen zur brgyad dam// rin ched mya
192b2(rnying rgyud): 'dra ba'am// mdzes pa'i bya skad sna tshogs sgog/ lung ba mdzes shing kha dog po// skye shing legs po yod pa'i gnas// rin che dkyil 'khor bsrub pa'i gnas// ri ni dri zhim tshogs yod// tsa ldan dmar po nags tshal can// me tog bting gling por
192b3(rnying rgyud): dmar// yid 'ong lung ba dmar la mdzes// patra 'dra ba'i dbyibs yod dang // gnam ni zlu ma pa ya lo med// za ma sprug pas gtebs pa der// padz+ra'i dkyil 'khor bslab pa'i gnas// dur khrod ma mo 'du ba'i gnas// thang yangs grog po mdung brdzogs sam// las
192b4(rnying rgyud): gsum bsnol ba'i dbus su'am// grog po phas chod tshus tshod gleng // ril rnga mo yod pa dang // brag sngon rag rag mang ba dang // ral gri 'dra ba'i dbyibs yod par// las kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par shis// ri bo spun sdug bsgyings pa dang // ri thag mang pos bskor ba dang //
192b5(rnying rgyud): lung ba mdzes shing khajog yongs// lcag phran tshal dag skyes pa dang // mdzes pa'i sa ni rin chen 'dra// gnam ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'dra// logs la ldan gyi nags tshal yod// dkyil 'khor skye la bsgrub pa'i gnas// yang na dkyil 'khor mchar ni// yon tan
192b6(rnying rgyud): dang ma yis brgyan// de ltar spyi yi gnas su bstan// de lta bu yi gnas rnams ni// rnal 'byor gro dang ldan pa yis// mtshan nyid shes shing rtogs byas la// dang du blangs te bsgrub par bya// slob dpon slob ma gnas rnams dag/ gzhung dang mthun par rnyed nas ni// slob
192b7(rnying rgyud): dpon ting 'dzin mi ldan na// nyes dang bcas shing yi gar 'gyur// dngos grub med cing tshe chad 'gyur// de ye mtshad nyid zirda byas la// shes dang spang ba rab pa rin// ting 'dzin las su rung ba yis// rnal 'byor blo dang ldan pa des// gnas dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid ni//
193a1(rnying rgyud): chog po byed pa chags kyang // dngos bu 'di ltar 'dod pa rnams// 'grub 'gyur 'bras thabag ma dang // gnas dang thas sa tshan ga de// cha ga la byang du gyur na// mkhas pas rnas pa rgyam rnamapa// dngos thab 'thas tha nar 'thung
193a2(rnying rgyud): ces// dus gsumasangs rgyas kyis gsungs pas// kun gyi mtshan nyid bshad pa yin// dngos po'i chos la dad pa dang // mtshan ma dag la dga' bdag/ drang zhing mtshan dngos gzhom pa'i phyir// lung ba'i di dang bar sdang dang // rigs lnga sa so'i mtshan nyid dag
193a3(rnying rgyud): rab tu brtags te gzung bar bya// gnyis med don la dgang ba dang // ma bcos don rnams nyams su len// gas dang sbas pa'i don la brtag/ de la rtsegacig ting 'dzin btud// dang po dang lus na la 'dug ste// ting dzin ci gcig byas nas su// phyi nang dngos po
193a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad la// rang bzhin med rtog des bsgoms na// de nis slong dang po yin// mig g.yas nyi mag ro dza dra ga// snga nas rlung gis bsreg gtor bkrus// de ni sbyong ba gnyis pa yid// byang chub sems nas rab bsal ba// de ni spong ba gsum pa'o// de'i
193a5(rnying rgyud): tshe phyag tu bcas nas ni// dbang gyur lha mo spa nadrangs la// mchod de 'od zhus la bim// bdud dang gzod sbyid marungs pas// bar du gcod par mi nus shing // bsod nams tshogs bsags dam pa mchog/ dngos bzhi dpa par 'gyur ro// sa ga
193a6(rnying rgyud): gyis brlab par bya// gzhung dang mthun pa'i so bzhi de// rgyal po 'ams bdag la sogs la// dbang btsan bug zhu'am yin par// bden pa'i gtam sbas rin gyis thang // de nas rdo rje'i khang ba bya// de rabs stegs le'u bzhi bcig/ bdud cirnam pa la rnams da
193a7(rnying rgyud): dri zhim po ni sna tshogs pas// rab tu bsres te blags paraH// mthug sra pa yi ko bcom// legs par 'azas shing snyoms par bya// rdo rje'i khang ba gsal yang gdab// dkyil 'khongs so song bdag gi// rigs dang mthun pa'i phrog ma chog des// mdzes das
193b1(rnying rgyud): byas rgyan gyis spras// byin dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya// de dag nal 'grong g.yon du bzhag/ tshad ldan rdo rje srad bu la// de ldan dbang bskur byen brlabs nas// thig gi bye brag dkyil 'khor gzhung // ji ltar 'os par thig gdab brtsam// de rjes dri'i thig leH//
193b2(rnying rgyud): po brang gdan du bcig/ rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drangs rdus// mchod bstod rim par byas nas ni// rab tu mnyes byas dkyil 'khor ni// tshon ci sdu lnga rab 'bring ba// rab tu bsgrims te byin brlabs la// 'gro ba mongs pa las dang pos// dang po mtshan nyid
193b3(rnying rgyud): byas nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor de// rab tu mtshon par bya ba'i phyir// rnam lnga'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bshad// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// dbus su ra'adu zlum pa la// thig bzhi btab pas le'u tsho dpu// kra chad dang di bar khyams dang /
193b4(rnying rgyud): khrung dang ni rin chen lnga// 'dod yon rin chen pha gu dang // dra ba du phyed dngol mor bcas// 'be' tshul dang rta babs dang // dril bu g.yer khasal sil sgra// chos kyi 'khor lo tA ra Na// rin chen rgyad gyis brgyan par bri// de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'didzi
193b5(rnying rgyud): dbyings phyug ma dang gnyis med 'khril// seng ges gtams pa'i khri steng du// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// de sring yab yum yang dag gnas// rgyan rnams yongs su thogs par gsal// kha dog mthing ga 'od dang bcas// g.yas dkar g.yon pa dmar ba yin//
193b6(rnying rgyud): phyag ni rnam pa drug tu gsungs// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste// bar ma 'khor lo tha mar ni// g.yon gyi dang po dril bu dkur// bar ma rin chen mya gu'o// tha ma rul gri 'bar ba bsnams// zhabs gnyis mnyam bu'i skyil krung bcas// mdun du rnam par skar
193b7(rnying rgyud): mdzad de// sangs rgyas spyan dang gnyis su med// glang po'i gdan dang bcas pa la// nyi zla bad+ma rin po che// de steng yab yum yang dag gnas// kha dog dkar po'i 'od 'bar bas// g.yas ser g.yon pasngo ba yin// g.yas dang khor lo thugs kar
194a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// bar pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa// za ma rin chen myu gu'o// g.yon dang dril bu dku la brten// bar pa pad+ma kha 'bus bsdams// tha ma rdo rje gya gram ma// zhabs ni brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// g.yas su rin chen 'byung ldan te/
194a2(rnying rgyud): mA ma k+Shi dang gnyis su med// rdzu 'phrul ta li khri steng na// hih+la pad+ma rin po che// de steng yab yum yang dag bzhugs// kha dog dzAm bu dada'i gser// g.yas dmar g.yon pa dkar ba yin// phyag drug g.yas dang rin po che// par mardo rje tha ma pad// g.yon dang
194a3(rnying rgyud): dril bu bar ma gdor// tha ma ral gri bsnams pa'o// zhabs ni brkyang bskyam tshul du bzhugs// rtsab tu snang ba mtha' yas te// gos dkar mo dang gnyis med bzhugs// rma byas gtams pa'i khri steng na// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// de steng yab yum pang dgra
194a4(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// kha dog pad+ma rA ga'i mdo// g.yas pa dkar la ser ba ste// g.yon pa sngol skya ba'o// g.yas dang pad+ma zhugs kar 'dzin// bar ma rdo rje za ma 'khor// g.yon dang dril bu dgu la brten// par ma rdo rje rgya gram ste// tha ma rin chen mu gu'o// zhabasa'i
194a5(rnying rgyud): brgyad bskam tshul du bzhugs// g.yon du don yod grub pa ste// dam tshig krol dang gnyis med bzhugs// nam mkha' lding gi khri steng na// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// de steng yab yum yang dag pazhugs// kha dog yon+da nI pa'i mdog/ g.yas dkar g.yon pa
194a6(rnying rgyud): dmar ba pon// phyag drug g.yas dang ral gri thugs// bar mardo rje tha ma pad// g.yon pa dril bu dku la brten// bar ma 'khor lo tha ma rin// zhabs dri brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// rgyan rnams kun dang yang dgu ldan// yum ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis
194a7(rnying rgyud): te// rdo rje dril bu thogs nas 'khyud// kha dog yab dang 'dra bar btag/ kun gyi mtshan nyid yin pas so// g.yas pa'i rtsag na bskams pa ni// 'khor lo rin chen pod+ma dang // las kyi ngal gri bsdams pa'o// shar sgomatshams kyi re'u mig la// pad+ma kar
194b1(rnying rgyud): po'i gdan steng na// byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// lnga ste dkar mo sru la 'khril// g.yas pa rin chen myu gu bsdams// g.yon pa dril bu dku la brten// yum ni 'gyid stabs yab la 'khyud// zhabs
194b2(rnying rgyud): ni brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// lho nub mtshams kyi re'u mig la// pad+ma dkar po li thi steng du// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying // zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste// kha dog sngon po mdangs dang ldan// mA le sngon mo sku pa 'khril// g.yas pa
194b3(rnying rgyud): ral gri g.yon pas bu// yum ni phreng ba gcol 'khyud// zhabs ni brkyang bsum tshul du bzhugs// nub byang mtshams kyi re'u mig la// pad+ma dkar po'i gdan steng na// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar//
194b4(rnying rgyud): gI rti dmar mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa dril// yum ni pi wang yab la 'khril// zhabs ni brkyang bsdum tshul du bzhugs// byang shar mtshams kyi re'u mig la// pad+ma dkar po'i gdan sted na// byang sems phyag na rdo rje ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku
194b5(rnying rgyud): mdog ldang // d+hU rti ljang gu srul 'khril// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa dril// yul ni gar gyi phyag rgyas 'khril// zhabs ni brkyang bsku mtshul du bzhugs// shar lho mtshams kyi gru chad la// pad+ma dkar po'i gdan steng na// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni// zhal
194b6(rnying rgyud): gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// d+hU bed kar mo sul 'khrel// g.yas pa kru shing g.yon pa dril// yum ni pog phor sku pa 'khril// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// lho nub mtshams kyi gu chad la// pad+ma sngo skya'i gdan steng na// byang chub sems
194b7(rnying rgyud): dpa' sgribasel ni// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste// sku mdog sngo skya 'od dang bcas// puSh+pe sngo s+ya su la 'khril// g.yas pa 'khor po g.yon pa dril// yum ni me tog phyag rgya can// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// nub byang mtshams kyi gru rbad pa//
195a1(rnying rgyud): pad+ma dmar ser gdan steng na// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang // zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste// kha dog dmar per 'od dang bcas// A lo ka dmar ser gru la 'khril// g.yas pa rin chen snyem bsnams// g.yon pa dril bu
195a2(rnying rgyud): dku la brten// yum ni mar me sku la 'khril// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// byang shar mtshams kyi gru chad la// pad+ma ljang ku'i gdan stong na// byang sems 'jam dpal gzhon nu ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ldang // g.yas
195a3(rnying rgyud): pa ut+pal g.yon pa dril// yum ni byug pa sku la 'khril// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// shar gyi khyams na bzhugs pa ni// pad+ma ser po'i gdan steng na// bcom ldan shAkya thub pa ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sed// g.yas
195a4(rnying rgyud): pa gseg shang g.yon par bu// bzhengs nas mi rnams ston pa mdzod// lho yi khyams na bzhugs pa ni// pad+ma ser skya'i gdan steng na// lha yi thub pa brgya byin ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku ser skya// pi wang bzhengs nas lha yi ston// nub kyi
195a5(rnying rgyud): khyams na bzhugs pa ni// lha min thub pa thag bzang ris// pad+ma dmar skya'i gdan la bzhugs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku dmar skya// phyag na ral gri go cha bsdams// bzhengs nas sgra min ston pa mdzod// byang gi khyams na bzhugs pa ni// pad+ma dkar
195a6(rnying rgyud): skya'i gdan steng na// yi dwags thub pa kha 'bar ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku dkar skya// sbom bu bzhengs nas yi dwags ston// shar gyi khyams 'gram bzhugs pa na// pad+ma sngon po'i gdan steng na// skyel song thub pa a glang mgo// zhal gcig phyag gnyis
195a7(rnying rgyud): sku mdog sngo// bu ste bzhengs nas byol song ston// nub kyi khyams 'gram bzhugs pa ni// pad+ma nag po'i gdan steng na// dmyal thub gshin rje mi thod can// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nang // me rtse bzhengs nas dmyal ba'i ston// shur gyi khyams na
195b1(rnying rgyud): bakhrugs pa// bad+ma sha pa'i gdan sa ngan// kun parang phyug nga dgang // dang thalam phyag tung gnas// dug rnams ga par na bzhugs pan// badz+ra dkar nga gang spyad na// kun du bang ma gAHdang badzan// dpal 'khong shang can sa/
195b2(rnying rgyud): pa ya mAnA ta kr-i te ni// zhing gdan me dpung nang na bzhugs// zod gdang rta gdong bu la 'khril// zhabs gnyis bskrad pa'i tshul du bzhugs// lho yi sgo ru bsam bya ba// 'joms pa pra s+t+rai kr-i ta ni// zhing gdan ma dpung nang na bzhugs// pad nang rdo rje phrag
195b3(rnying rgyud): gdang khyis// dbas gnyis cad ci dri sa pas bzhugs// rab kyi klo bas ma byab// 'jams pa pad+ma khri de// zhing ga me nga dang na bzhugs/ thod par rdang bcu gsal gyis dpal// na sngags spyi g.yul 'tshal// dbapan
195b4(rnying rgyud): byed kyi dong bupas bklags// byang gi rdo rjebasam bya ba// 'joms pa zob to btad// zhing gdan me dpung nod na ba zhugs// rdang tu tham zad pa gnor// thal byed del bsngal 'khril/ zhabs gnyis bzang pa'i tshul du bzhugs// mau ga
195b5(rnying rgyud): skaya ga rigs las shes par bya// ma ldan pader gshegs gyu dzugs te// sangs kyi rdo rje dzin papa// dkyim ma das pa nyam sa dag na// mab ban ci dbye' la' // 'thung chung bzhi khyang da// bzung ba thams
195b6(rnying rgyud): sogs pa// dor 'dzod dkyil 'khor ji bzhin no// dbus su seng ge'i gdan dag pa// rnam spang bab yum banom par bya// ldan sngar mi bskyod pa ba zhum bcas// gdan rnams sa po'i mtshan nyid ni// dor 'dron dkyil 'khor 'dra bar rje// rin chen
195b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor brib ni// rin chen bur bcud 'dra ba la// bde bar gshegs pa'i bzang bya// bar khyims pa lags gang bzhin \u0f7f// dbus pa 'phrul tag rbe// da 'i gang ring cher 'byung man bslam// yul dang gnyis su med par bajugs/
196a1(rnying rgyud): pa bsgom// phra la dang gnyis su med par bzhugs// gzhan nams gong ma'i bzhin no// pad+ma rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa zi// ze'u dbu pa d+ma bras bur bzlas// dbus sum b+ha'i gdan dgal// sdang ba mtha'
196a2(rnying rgyud): yapral baphub bsgos// rab rtsong rje 'dzin pa bac+doMs// gzhan rnams gong ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi // shin tu gyis pa grib yin// dod yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor na// dbus sku le'u ma gu dang ldan// gyi la 'khong lo rnaMms pa'i ldan// rin chen byung brgyad bang
196a3(rnying rgyud): mdzes// dbus su nam mkhal rdzing gi khri// de'i steng don meng yab yum bsgom// byung du rdor 'din pab sum ste// gzhan rnams kyang ni gsal bar bri// dkyil 'khor dam pa de dag la// babyin par bya ba'i rdzas rnams ni// bum pa brgyad dam bcu drug gam// 9

196a5(rnying rgyud): po gser las byas pa brgyad// gnyis pa shel dung dngul las byas// gsum pa bai DUr+ya yi brgyad// bzhi pa za sa las rgyas babargyad// lnga pa lugs las byas pa brgyad// de rnams dkyil 'khor lnga yi brgyan// dkyil 'khong drug pa la brgyan pa// za lcags dngung
196a6(rnying rgyud): dang po thu // gser la sogs pas brgyan par bya// gzhan yang bstan par bya ba'i rdzas// rol mo'i rtse brag rnams cad dang // yid du 'ong bya'i lbab lu ba dang // bza' dang bza' ba'i kye zag gis// dkyil 'khor dam pa 'argyan par rtsa// phyogs skyong gtong ma la

196b3(rnying rgyud): can gyis bya// gas ba'i mchod pa de bzhin no// de nas las rnams so so yi// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bu mchog der// dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan pa'i phyir// bu tshur ci la dga' zhes dri// rigs dang ldan pa'i bu mchog des// bdag ni 'di la dga'
196b4(rnying rgyud): lags so// so so'i dkyil 'khor mtshan nas brjod// slob dpon lung ldan dal pa des// mna' bzhag chu byung bya ba'i phyir// oM badz+ra a mr-i te kre Na li ta no da ka tra/ bzlos pa'i chu 'di kha ru thud// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag la// gang dag mi
196b5(rnying rgyud): mos pa yi drung // khyod kyis smra bar pa byed cig// gal te smra bar gyur na ni// khyod ni sdug bsngal dang li 'bral// li 'du byed byas nas ni// sems can dmyal ban par rje// khyod kyis bslang bar bya ba ni// yai da pA lnga brtag gnas bya// thab mig gi
196b6(rnying rgyud): 'bras ster ltos// rdo rje ldan lo brtse gdung skyed// sngags dang phyag rgya rtag tu bca'o// gseng bsas pa'i thabs mchog rnams// snod ngan gzhan la spel bya min// zla ba yab kyi byang chub sems// tri ma yum gyidri// sgru ba rdzas rtag tu

197a1(rnying rgyud): ba rnam pa 'da' ba dka'// slob dpon lda par tha med// gal ldasad par byang na ni// dngos grub med cing dmyal bar krung // de ltar dam thog bsgragasangs te// da nas pa b.lung ldad des// snod kyi khyad par ci rigs pa//
197a2(rnying rgyud): dbang rnams rim par bsrung bar bya// dang po dkyil 'khor gzhug pa'i dbang // gnyis pa gsang ba nyan pa'i dbang // gsum pa rdo rje slob dpon dbang // bzhi pa las bzhi'i lhung yang bstar// lnga pa dbugs dpung bstod pa ste// drug pa rab
197a3(rnying rgyud): 'byams rgyal po'i dbang // bdun pa gsang ba'i dbang dag sbyin// brgyad pa shes rab dbang mchog sbyin// dgu pa ye shes dbang mchog ste// mthar phyin dbang mchog rdzogs par sbyin// de nas dbang mchog ldan phyi'i phyir// so sor rigs kyi za mchog des/

197a5(rnying rgyud): lo n+dan gyi yon du 'bul// rin chen sna lnga'i bye brag dang // glang po rta dang ma her bcas// dgos pa'i bye brag ci yod par// rin chen rigs kyi yon yid do// ma sring bu mo chung ma rnams// rin chen pa lngas pargyan byas la// rgod ma la sogs mo yi med/
