199a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor dam pa yis// gti mug 'joms pa'i phur pa'o// gsung gi dkyil 'a bor dam pa ni// 'dod chags 'joms pa'i phud pa'o// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba yis// zhe sdang 'joms pa'i chur pa'o// yon tan
199a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gsang ba yis// nga rgyal 'joms pa'i phyir pa'o// las kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi// phrag dog 'joms pa'i phur pa'o// de ltar phur pa drug po yis// btab na ci 'dod sbyin no zhes// dam chog bdag pos rab tu bsgrags// rang gi snying
199a3(rnying rgyud): gar zla dkyil 'khor// de steng nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de steng so so'i yig 'bru dbus// tha ma bzlas pa'i sngags kyis bskor// bsnyen bsgrub gnyis la de bzhin te// las su sbyar bar bya ba'i sngag// so so'i las gang sngags kyis sgo// da ltar bltas la
199a4(rnying rgyud): sngags rnams ni// glong la ting 'dzin 'dres par bzlas// sngags kyi phreng ba dam par bya'o// kye bas ya bsnyen pa'i dus// nyis dbum sum 'bum sgrub pa'i dus// stong dam brgya rtsa brgyad pa ni// las kyi dus su shes par bya// mtshan ma'i bye brag mthong nas
199a5(rnying rgyud): nini/ de nas las gang brtsam par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// re re la yang gsum gsum ste// de las 'phros pa bsam mi khyab// de bas dris pa med par ni// dus gsum bde gshegs rnams kyi gsung // gyad kyi rgyal ba'i yang rgyal po/ de
199a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ k+Shi ya bcu gnyis kyi mdo las/ so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas ye shes gsang ba'i bdag/ phyi dang gsung gsum bdag nyid gtso// sngags
199a7(rnying rgyud): kyi bdag por gyur pa des// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba las// rdo rje'i gsung 'di bka' stsal to// glegs pas sor ni bcu gnyis bya// til chen po snag tsha bya// dung khrod rkang gi smyu gus bris// brgyad dam bco brgyad nyi shu bcad// nyin mtshan gung la
199b1(rnying rgyud): bris byas te// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad la// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// mkha' 'gro dam can 'khor bcas la// gtor mas yongs su tshims byas nas// lus la zhing chen gon nas ni// sgra yang kyi bor bcing bar bya// lho phyogs kha bltas
199b2(rnying rgyud): dang ba'i sems// dri zhim spos bltams bri bar bya// lugs su blugs sam 'bur du brkos// ri mong bri bar bya ba'i tshe// dur khrod ras ma btsal nas su// hUM gi dbyangs ring lan gsum blangs// ha hong gdamos mkha' 'gro bskul// de nas rnal 'byor blo ldan
199b3(rnying rgyud): gyis// rang gi ting 'dzin gsal byas la// tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor la bri// mchod rten tsha tshe 'debs pa rnams// oM las bskyed de so so yi// bye brag gis ni gdab par bya// yoM rkang yi ge ldanams kyis// ci rigs par ni bskyed nas su// mchod pa yongs
199b4(rnying rgyud): su rdzogs par 'bul// de rjes so so'i gzhung dag gis// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod// gnyis med bstim la mchod pa brtsam// bstod dang khrus gsol rim par bya// zhal bsro brtan bzhugs smon lam gdapa// bkra shis pa yi
199b5(rnying rgyud): tshegra bcad brjod// chos kyi sbyin pa rgya cher btang // yongs su rdzogs pa'i mchod pa bya'o// de nas rdo rje chos kyis bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la bltas te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan dgyes chen gsang gsum bdag
199b6(rnying rgyud): brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa// byas shing 'di la rtag gnas na// 'di don 'bras bu ji ltar 'gyur// bcom ldan gsar mchog dgyes chen gyis// rdo rje chos kyi tsheg gsan nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// sa yi 'du ba byas pa dang /
199b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i thig gdab tshon rtsi yis// brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// rnal 'byor blo dang ldan pas ni// las de dag la 'jug mi bya// gal te zhugs par gyur na ni// dngos grub 'bras bu thag ring 'gyur// de bas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin bsgom/
200a1(rnying rgyud): mkha' mnyam rdul bral rnga ba'i dbyings// 'byung ba'i dkyil la khor dbang chen rnams// gsal la dag cing dri med bsgom// b+h+rUM las gyur cing gzhal yas rdzogs// rdorje po 'od 'bar bas 'khrigs// rgyan dang stan rdzogs
200a2(rnying rgyud): bltas ltas gsalab// der ni sngags kyi bdag por bsgom// bstod dang mchod pa la sogs pa// rim pa ma lus phongs rdzogs bsgom// mkha' dbyings dag pa'i dbus su ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// rol mo rgyan dang rdo rjes la thigs// de dbu
200a3(rnying rgyud): rang sngags rdo rje can// rnal 'byor blo ldan dam pas bsgom// gnyis med rdo rje can du 'gyur// mkha' dbyings dag pa'i dbus su ni// yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas mchog/ rol mo rgyan dang 'khor los 'khrigs// de dbus rang sngags 'khor lo can//
200a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis med don ldan rnal 'gyor pas// bsgoms na 'khor lo can du 'gyur// mkha' dbyings dag pa'i dbus su ni// rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor ni// rin chen rgyan dang rin chen 'khrigs// de dbus dang sngags rin po che// rnal 'byor sro mchog
200a5(rnying rgyud): ldan pa des// bsgoms na rin chen 'byung ldan 'gyur// mkha' dbyings dag pa'i dbus su ni// 'od dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// rol mo rgyan dang pad+ma 'khrigs// de dbus 'od dpag med pa bsgom// rang sngags bad+ma dag pa bskyed// bsgom
200a6(rnying rgyud): na pad+ma can du 'gyur// mkha' dbyings dag pa'i dbus gnas par// las kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sol mo rgyan dang sna tshogs 'khrigs// de dbus dang sngags ral gri can// rnal 'byor blo dang ldan pa des// bsgoms na las kyi sems dpang 'gyur//
200a7(rnying rgyud): mkha' dbyings dag pa'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// rol mo sna tshogs kun dang ldan// de dbus dang sngags kun tu bzang // rnal 'byor blo dang ldan pas ni// bsgoms na sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// 'di dag bsgoms
200b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i gdas dgan// dram gra ba rba ban ba gnas// dbang skal gdug pad pa gnas// bklung sa pan ma pa gdas// rnabarjod pag gcig chags 'dab dang // gtsug pa'i gnasas pa ngan paH// bad dkyil yang bgapas dang//
200b2(rnying rgyud): bsam pa'i 'bras bu dag/ thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// a las byung ba'i bad+ha'i nang // glang po'i sha dang khyi sha dang // ma b+ha'i sha dang shang shang sha/ rta sha lha rnams bsam par b+h+rUM// zla ba ti ma ru sman dri// yig 'bru lnga yang bsam par bya// 5
200b3(rnying rgyud): las nam mkha' thu dkyil 'khor// hU~M las d+ho rje wu bye// 'od 'bring la phyogs pa rnyed pa pam bya// las rlung gi dkyil 'a khong bskyed// r-ilas mi yi dkyil 'khor gyis// bdud rtsi myangs pa'i las rnams b+ha'o// khrel po las
200b4(rnying rgyud): pad+ma ste// de steng hUM las rdo rje ste// tshang bzung hU~M ga~M rdo rje 'odadi// bdud rtsi skyob pa'i las myong // zang mchog dam pa 'di bza hU~M// dben pa'i zas pa tshogs mi rtsa// nyan thos gzugs pa mthong bar 'phrul// rang kyi la gzugs pa de bzhin te// yang chub sems dpa
200b5(rnying rgyud): rnams la ni// gnyis med mchod bstod dgyes par bstod// byang chub sems dpa' chen po la// zung 'jug don la gnyis med bskul// bu de bar gshegs pa'i rang bzhin la// sems can don mdzad sngon lam bskul// bde gshegs lnga yis sku gdung
200b6(rnying rgyud): bskyed// rgyal mtshan bzhi yi rigs gsal bya// snang mdzad sems dpa'i lcagasu la sogs// ji lta'i rim pa bskyed par bya'o// cho ga'i rim pa go rim bzhin// kun la de bzhin bya ba yin// glegs pa ma zab mo'i gzhung 'di ni// yum mchog shes rab pa
200b7(rnying rgyud): rol rkyen// de la chog yongs rdzogs bya// bum pa brgyad dam bcu drug gam// phyogs can pa rko/ te dbang yang bskur// de zhu yi ge'i rang bzhin te// bde gshegs gsungs kyi kyis 'jab// nyon mongs dug gsum gzerang yang gded// ya
201a1(rnying rgyud): bAs thog rim bzhin bya// mkha' dbyings rnam dag gzhal yas su// ma zags parje gdan btang zhing // rang sngags kyu yi dkyil 'khor rnams// bsgoms na dngos gyub dam pa thob// mkha' dbyangs gsal ba'i dbyings nyid /
201a2(rnying rgyud): dang sngags gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnams// bsgoms na dngos grub dam pa thob// mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i dbyings nyid du// rang sngags thugs kyi lcag mtshan rnams// bskos sman dngos grub pa mtshan 'thung // rnalang pyor te 'dzin ceg
201a3(rnying rgyud): gis// gang 'dod las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dis// thams cad kun la dbang bskur ba'o// mtshan mar bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams// de ltar ting 'dzin pa sgoms rgyas kyang // gnyis med 'bras bu thag ring
201a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis med do rdul rab gnas mes// bad chen lha la dang gnas pa T+Te// de bas ting 'dzinanan tan bskyed// gtis med don btso par 'brang // ces gzungs so// rgyur gyi rgyal thos par rgya po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad myi gas ba'i yang gsang ba/
201a5(rnying rgyud): yang bcu gnyis kyi mdo las ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la/ rdo rje chos kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan gsang bdag dgyes pa'o// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sngags rnams dang // phyag
201a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid pams s+t+rai gan// bdag cag 'khor rdzogs thams cad dang // sems can rnams la san skad bri// bde gshegs mgon pos bshad du gsol// de nis gsang bdag cal po yis/ ga gsan nas// gas
201a7(rnying rgyud): slar bka' stsal to// sems can chen po tshur ton cig/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i don bshad gyis// phigs par yum ngag pid gsum nyon/ na s+ho/ 'di na dus gsumasangs rgyas// mtha' phyin las gang ting po ri
201b1(rnying rgyud): rnal tsang su mos pa// thang mdzad sems dpa' tid 'drar 'gyur// lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur gyis// g.yan pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba ni// g.yas pa'i khu grwar nang du gzhug/ thags kar brtan par bzung ba na// rnam par snang mdzad las kyi
201b2(rnying rgyud): bsgrubs na sngags kyang 'grib pa'i dus// ji ltar mchod par nges pa'i rdzas// ji ltar bsams pa 'byung bar 'gyur// de yi 'bras bu brjod las 'das// byang chub mchog tu gdon mi po'o// gzhan yang rdo rje 'dzin pa pI// sku gsung thugs kyi
201b3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba las// oM ba dz+ra ya NA~M b+h+yadz+dza/ sngags 'di phreng bar bskor cing bsgrub// legs par 'grub pa'i dus pa ni// sems dpa'i skyil po byung 'jug nas// lag g.yod rdo rje pa dbar bdag/ lag g.yas rdo rjes gzhi gnani// mos pa'i
201b4(rnying rgyud): sems bcus phyag rgya gtud// rab tu dge po'i sngags bzlas pas// sangs rgyas kun kyang skrag 'gyur na// bar gcod pa drung napas smos ci dgos// gzhan yang rin chen 'byung ldan ma// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba 'di// snying po
201b5(rnying rgyud): dam pa 'di yin no// sgyir d+ha sAm d+ha mAd+d+he/ sngags 'di ma nor don gyis bzlas// sngags 'di bsgrib pa'i dus su ni// lhag g.yo ni na chen pa dbang bzhag/ lag pa mchog sbyin phyag rgyani// 'asu gang skyed pa'i dus su ni// phyag rgya gta
201b6(rnying rgyud): sngags bzlas pas// tshaM zadi shi las slong bar byed// nor lcags 'phel bar de 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'od dpag med pa pi// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i sngags// ma bcos dam pa 'di yin no// A pad+ma ya mi tAH hrIH/ sngags 'am
201b7(rnying rgyud): nor don gyi bzlas// ji ltar rtags rnams bzung ba dang // lag gnyis bsngol nas par par bzhag/ gdung ba'i sems bcas phyag rgya gtad// sngags bzlas pas ni sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' las la bskul// rgyal po
202a1(rnying rgyud): dbang du 'gyur// gzhan yang don yod grub pa yi// lnga gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i sngags// oM badz+ra a mo g+ha sid+d+hi a/ sngags 'di g.yo ba med par bzlas// grub dus phyag rgya bca' ba 'dra'o// lag g.yon par
202a2(rnying rgyud): par bzhag nas ni// g.yas pa mi 'arigs sbyin pa ni// las byed pa yi dang drug tud// sngags bzlas phyag rgya gtad pa yis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i sems dbang 'gyur// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gzhan yang dbyings lhag ma yi sngags//
202a3(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs las byung ba 'di'o// oM bud+d+ha lo tsa na oM/ sngags 'di zhi ba'i sems kyis bzlas// sngags de grub pa'i dus nyid du// lag ma thib thal sbyar gyi gtsug bzhag/ sngags pa klas pas ni dregs pa kun// po mo thams cad zhi sems
202a4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// gzhan yang rdo rje dbyings phyug ma'i// su gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i sngags// sgro ga ga na lo tsan hUM/ sngags 'di gdung ba'i sems kyis bzlas// sngags gang las la sbyar dus su// rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba las// mdzub mo mig 'bras
202a5(rnying rgyud): mthe bong mig/ las gang byed pa'i dus nyid du// phyag rgya bca' zhing gtad byas na// sngags bzlas sangs rgyas mnyes pa 'byung // zhi dang rgyas pa shi dang sos// 'grub par 'gyur te gdon mi za'o// gzhan yang mA ma kI yi sngags// u/
202a6(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs las 'byung ba 'di'o// A ka re kai ri ma mA ka~M shU/ sngags 'di khros pa'i sems kyis bzlas// sngags grub dus su phyag rgya gtad// lag gnyis thal sbar gung mo bsgreng // tshigs gsum par ni mdzub mo dgug/ rdo rje byas
202a7(rnying rgyud): bsrung ba yi// gnas gsum dag tu gtug tsang bsrung // de yis bsrung ba byas gyur na// dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis mi tshugs// gzhan yang bad+ma dbyings phyug ma'i// sku gsung thugs pas byung ba yi// gsang ba'i sngags ni
202b1(rnying rgyud): 'di lan na// mas ta ba kA/ ka ga d+hAH/ thabs 'dad migs ma sa sus byas pas// sngags grub dus sa thag na pa la// lag gnyis bcwa la tha' sas// bcangs kaster bar gcug par bya// gnyis cad dan thab byad bar byung // gdan/
202b2(rnying rgyud): yang las kyi dbyings phyug ma'o// sku gsang thugs las phyung ba 'da'o// oM tA ra s+'uThA re swA hA/ sngags 'di g.yo ba'i sems kyis bzlas// sngags grub bca' ba'i phyag rgya 'di'o// lag gnyis thal mo khang stong skar// mdzu ba gnyis sor mo ldad nas
202b3(rnying rgyud): dgug/ de ster mthe bong gnyis kyis mnan// gung gnyis rje spang bsgrengs nas ni// phrin lag mthe chung so sor bsnol// gang 'dod yul la gtad par bya// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jigarten pa'i// gang 'dod dbang du 'gyur bar nges// de las
202b4(rnying rgyud): gzhan pa'i sngags rnams ni// sku gsung thugs kyi las sngags ni// dbang bskur bdag sbyin skabs su sbyar// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+mako&haM/ rdo rje khu tshur bsdams bcangs la// mtheb gnyis gyen du bsgrengs pa ni// bde bar
202b5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i sku yi rgya// gang la byin brlabs su yi gnas// rgyas bcings sngags bzlas byin brlabs na// gnyis med rdo rje lta bur 'gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga tA lA ka badz+ra swa ShA wa A t+ma kro&haM/ rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas// g.yas pa'i mthe bong rab
202b6(rnying rgyud): bteg ste// g.yon gyi mthe bong nang du bcings// gang la byin brlab gsung gi gnas// rgya bcings sngags bzlas gtad byas na// gsung ni bre 'gag med pa ste// sangs rjes kun gyi gsung du 'gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga tatsit+ta badz+ra swa/ wa At+ma kaNAta/
202b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings la// g.yas pa'i mtheb bteg g.yon pa'i nang // gang la byin brlab thugs kyi gnas// rgya bcings sngags bzlas gtad byas na// gzhan gyis sems 'phrog mi nus la// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su 'gyur/
203a1(rnying rgyud): s+yAH/ sra gzugs grags ma 'bur du brkos// dal sogs paci rigs par// dbang bsgyur dus su btsam thab// don bu nur dam bcangs la// gung ma gnyis gshibs bslabs byas nas// tsa nga na dbang baphur phyag zums/
203a2(rnying rgyud): A~M a b+hi Shiny+tsa nAM// sarba ta thA ga ta mu ku Ta ra bA tAM/ sngags brjod dbang bskur gnas sgra gtug/ rin po che dang rigs lnga yis// so so'i skabs kyi dbu rgyan sogs// skabs su rgyan du shes par bya// de la sogs pa sna tshogs pa// mkhas pa
203a3(rnying rgyud): brtags shing ci rigs par // las rnams yongs su shes par bya'o// de la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang // sngags la sogs pa brjod mi lang // chos dbyings brjod thal de las 'byung // 'byung ba nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa// brjod med bsam
203a4(rnying rgyud): las mi dpog pa// yon tan bsam yas de las 'byung // zhes gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs so// rgyad kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi mdo las/ phyag
203a5(rnying rgyud): rnam par spro ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas rdo rje chos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gsad pa mchog gi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho ma bcos ngo bo nyid// brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang thal// dus gsum sangs rgyas sku
203a6(rnying rgyud): yi mchog/ ji ltar rtags snang khyod la bstod// e ma ho ma bsgribs mkha' ltar dag/ dus gsum sangs rgyas gsung gi mchog/ so so'i sgra skad rnams su gsal// rnam dag sgra chen khyod la bstod// e mdo gnyis med pa po nyid/
203a7(rnying rgyud): brjod med brjod bral tshig mtshon med// ye shes gtso gyur dam pa'i mchog/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs pa bstod// sangs rgyas mngon krung ye shes gtso// chos dbyings ye shes ngo ba nyid// ye shes chen po rdon 'chang /
203b1(rnying rgyud): la phyag 'tshal bstod// dus gsamasangs rgyas sgyu ma mchog/ malong la shes rab nyid// thams cad can gyi bdag pa gtso// 'khor lo 'chang la phyag tshal bskrad// dus gsums ngas chas yon tan mchog// mnyam tad pa shes btad//
203b2(rnying rgyud): yid bzhin nor bus re 'dod skong // nor bu 'dzin pa khyod la bstod// dus gsum sangs rgyas gsung gi mchog/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes bdag/ ma chags skyon gyis gos pa med// nga d+ma 'chang la phyag 'tshal bstod// dus gsum sangs rgyas
203b3(rnying rgyud): phrin las mchod// bya grub ye shes de ba nyid// marig dra ba gcod mdzad pa'i// don yod pub la phyag 'tshal bstod// khams gsum sems can thams cad la// ji lta'i sgo nas chos ston 'gyur// sa badz+ra'i byang chub sems dpa' ba// rba
203b4(rnying rgyud): sa das dgag 'ag pa sa/ g+sag/ de rnye yang gis na/ ga sa/
203b5(rnying rgyud): phyung ngo // gdul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// 'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul bar 'gyur// la lar sku yi 'dul bar ston// la lar gsung gi 'dul bar ston// la lar thugs spos med pas 'dul// sprul pa'i su ni sna tshogs pas// so so'i ngo bor
203b6(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba la// kun la sdig spang tshul gyis so// dmyal ba rnams la gshin bu'i rje'i// sku yi dbyibs bstan tshul gyis 'dul// yi dwags rnams la khang bar ma// tshul mdun sku yis 'jal bar 'gyur// rgyal so rnams la glang mgo can// seng
203b7(rnying rgyud): ge la sogs thams cad kyis// mthun bcas gzugs kyis chos ston to// mi rnams kun la 'khor lo sbyar// cha lugs bzung nas chos kyang ston// lha min rnams la zab/ bzadra ras// go mtshon mthun byas chos kyang ston// lha yi gnas su brgya byin
204a1(rnying rgyud): sa6/ gyis// mthun gyis gzugs kyis rgyas kyang ston// tshangs das rnams la tshangs can gzugs// mthun pas gzugs kyis chos kyang ston// nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom gzugs// shAs rngub par mthun byas can// rang rgyal rnams pa
204a2(rnying rgyud): rus pa'i gzugs// mthun pas tshul gyis zos kyang ston// sa bcud byang chub sems dpa' ba// rnam par snang mad ci gnyis ston// 'jo ba bas thapas dbang bsrung bas// ji ltar gdul te spang bstan 'dul// gsung gi tu zag pas mu yas te/
204a3(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa'i tshig tsam bshad bya ba// la lar sngags pa dag tu bsdus// bslus nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// le yang gsung rab bgyi gnyis su// bsus nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// la lar spyod phyag brgyad du mas// sa sa rgyud du chos kyang skyon//
204a4(rnying rgyud): mug gis 'thibs 'gro gang la// sangs rgyas 'khor po can gyis ston// zhe sdang gis ni gzir ba la// rdo rje 'dzin pas chos kyang ston// nga rgyal gyis khengs 'gro gang la// rin chen 'byung ba'i 'khor lo bskor// 'dod zags kyis gdungs 'gro gang la/
204a5(rnying rgyud): 'od dpag med pas 'khor lo bskor// phrag dog gis myos 'gro gang la// don yod grub pas 'khor lo bskor// 'gro ba'i skad ni bas ma yas par// bde gshegs gsung gis de skyed ston// thugs las nges med gzugs byung ngo ba// 'gro rnams
204a6(rnying rgyud): gcig par 'don rnams la// thugs kyi sprul pas mdo tsam bshad// la lar yongs su lung bstan tshul// la lar lhums su gshegs par ston// la lang mngal gnas bde bar skyon// la lar lhums nas bltams par ston// la bar phyogs bzhir/
204a7(rnying rgyud): gshegs par ston// la lar gzhon nur ngalo byed ston// la lar khyim pa lta bur ston// la bar khab las rab byung ston// la lar dka' rnga ba mdzad par ston// la lar sems bskyed skyobaskyed pon// la lang bdud tshogs 'dul bar byed// la lang
204b1(rnying rgyud): byang chub shing gi drung // la lar rdo rje gdan la gshegs// la lar cho 'phrul chen por ston// la lar rnam pa bcu gnyis su// lan gsum dag tu 'khor lo bskor// la lar mya ngan 'das par ston// la lar sku gdung dag tu ston// la lar sprul pa'i
204b2(rnying rgyud): mchod rten ston// la lar chos kyi glegs pa ma ston// la lar rten bcas sru yis ston// la lar 'byung ba'i sgra skad las// chos mthun skad kyis 'gro rnams 'dul// la lar bskul ba'i sa la gshegs// la lar 'jig rten zad par bsgom// pa
204b3(rnying rgyud): ar bsam gtan rim gyis bsgom// la lar 'khor lo'i tshul du snang // la lar dge 'dun sde bzhir snang // la lar thig le'i rang bzhin ston// la lar byang chub sems su ston// la lar spyan lnga rnam dag ston// la lar khyab dazug gzugs su rton/
204b4(rnying rgyud): lar dbang phyug gzugs su ston// la lar skyong ba'i srung mar ston// 'gro drug ji ltar 'dul ba'i dbang // thugs kyi cho 'phul bsam yas ston// de yi dus kyi 'gro ba rnams// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gnyis med don gyis 'dul
204b5(rnying rgyud): bar gsungs// log pa'i lam la ma gtogs so// khams gsum sangs rgyas bstan la dad// de snyed 'bras bu bden gnyis mthong // dus der 'khor du sprul pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa// ngo mtshar yid bde rmad du byung // rdo rje chos la
204b6(rnying rgyud): 'di skad gsol// e ma ho don zab rdo rje chos// rab zab khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma ho sngags kyi bdag nyid can// yongs gsal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma ho mi 'dul gcig kyang med// cho 'phrul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma ho sangs
204b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi mi 'dul med// 'di na ngo mtshar ya mtshan che// zhes gsol pa dang / rdo rje chos kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs rnams byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor// 'dus pa'i 'a khor tshogs kun nyon cig/ gsang
205a1(rnying rgyud): ba thug pa'i 'du la// gnag dang kya mas gyur // dmas las rnams thams cad 'grub// oM bya ba ni gang yang med// mi ba gan gang yang med// zhud kyis srog chags gusang par bya// mtshangs par yang dang
205a2(rnying rgyud): par bya// btsun du yang ni sbu bar bya// tshig rngub pa yang sba bar bya// rin chen rigs su nges par skye// pa dang khru ba tog tu bsad// mes po bu rnams rtag tu gzhom// spun dang cha po rnams spangs te// zhe sdang sems kyis med byas na// rdo rje 'dzin por
205a3(rnying rgyud): g+hanade 'gyur ro// ma dang bu mo gdol pa mo// sring mo dang ni bral ba la// chags pa'i sems kyis rab sbyar na// pad+ma'i rigs su nges par gyis// zas su bshang gci sha rnams dang // nag dang khrag rngon 'thung bas ni// las kyi rigs su nges par bya// ngan pa zos shrIng
205a4(rnying rgyud): ngan pa spyad// ji ltar ngan pa thams cad kyis// gtsang sbra med par spyad byas na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bya// zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor du 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag skrag te/ rab tu brgyal te kha zub tu 'grel bar 'gyur ro//
205a5(rnying rgyud): de nas rdo rje chos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la b.las te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag/ sngon gyi 'du shes ngan pa dran nas brgyal na/ 'di dag gso bar gsol zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gas
205a6(rnying rgyud): ba mchog gi bdag po ngas/ bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'khyil pa yis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstims te/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams dran pa rnyed par byas so//
205a7(rnying rgyud): sa nga dasags tshig sa dig na ya rgya pa/ dus pa sa nga ni dig // dag pa'is bya dus
205b1(rnying rgyud): pa rnams// 'di la gnas par ma byed cig/ 'di nyid byang chub spyod pa'i gnas// gang la yod pa brgyad du shes// gang la ci 'dra'i de nyid srid pa yin// rnam bzhi bye brag drug las brgyad dkyil na// gang la snyoms 'jug de la yod pa la// de la
205b2(rnying rgyud): de yod de la blta bar bya// gang las byung ba de las byung ba yin// de las de byung de nyid kho na'o// gsang ba'i shes rab thig le'i dbyings// bcu drug gnyis kyi dkyil na bzhugs// shes rab thabs kyi snyoms 'jug la// kun tu rgyas btab dkyil
205b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor yin// bdag nyid chen po lngar blta zhing // thur du 'phro zhing gyen du 'bar// bde ba chen po'i mchod pa yis// steng gi snying po skul bar byed// de 'od thig le mnyam 'byor las// lnga gnyis drug gi dkyil na'o// bde ba chen po'i ro yis ni/
205b4(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa chen po rtogs par bya// shes bya'i 'byung zad rtogs pa yis// de nyid sgyu mar rab sdang ba// gzigs mo'i bde ba mtha' yas kyis// bde ba chen po'i sprin las spro// bcu gsum gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor na// thig le'i de nyid mnyam pa'i dbyings
205b5(rnying rgyud): kun gyi dngos yin kun gyi gtso// bcu dang bzhir ni mngon rdzogs pa// gsum dang gnyis su yang dag gnas// kun gyi dngos por bdag nyid 'gyur// de la bsgyur ba'i dbang ba yin// yid la gnas pa de nyid de// de la gnyis rdzogs lhun gyis grung // /
205b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad de yi gyen du che// gnyis rdzogs thig le mnyam sbyor bas// snying rje chen po yongs kyis 'char// bcu bzhi'i sems can gdul dka' la// sgyu ma'i sems can sgrol ba yi// rnal 'byor chen po'i 'od ldan spyod// 'od la rtag tu gang 'dug
205b7(rnying rgyud): pa// sangs rgyas sras dang 'khor bcas kyis// thugs rdo'i nyi ma shugs kyis 'byung // dngos med nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ni// mtshan nyid la yang mi gnas so// de nyid sna tshogs par yang sdang // phyag rgya ldan grub de nyid do// de ltar sgyu ma'i rang bzhin
206a1(rnying rgyud): pas// de ltar dngos med dngos dang bral// ji ltar spyod cing bltas pa rnams// gnyis med don las g.yos pa med// dmyal ba yi drugs byol song rnams// 'di yi sdug bsngal byang chub pa// de yi gnas nyid bla med gnas// khams
206a2(rnying rgyud): gsum 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// lus kyi sgrib pa mngon sangs rgyas// 'di zhes bya bar bstan pa ni// ngas kyang bstan du yod ma yin// rang rang lus ngag yid la ltos/ zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor du 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag the tshom dang bral nas//
206a3(rnying rgyud): rang rang gi lus ngag yid gsum gyis de bzhin nyid la dmigs nas cang mi smra bar 'khod do// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi mdo las rgyu gsung thugs kyi sprul pa'i le'u ste drug
206a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dang / rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dang / 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur te/ phyin ci log pa'i lam la dad pa'i dbang gis de ltar
206a5(rnying rgyud): dngos po la lhag par mngon sum du gyur pa/ mngon pa'i lus ngag yid kyi mthu brnyes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la skur pa 'debs shing 'jig rten phung bar byed pa/ khro gtum brlang tshig gi 'o dod 'bod cing / sems can thams cad sred cing brgyal bar byed pa/
206a6(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu byas par spyod pa'i sems can de/ chos nyid zhi bas 'dul ba'i skabs la ma babs te/ thabs mkhas pa'i rol pa'i mdzad spyod kyis 'dul bar gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la/ rdo rje chos
206a7(rnying rgyud): kyis 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// e ma ho bde gshegs gsang ba'i bdag/ log pa'i lam du zhugs pa 'di// shin tu khros shing gtum par 'gyur// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs su sbyong mdzad pa// khro bor de bzhin
206b1(rnying rgyud): gshegs kun mdzod// sangs rgyas thams cad ltos pa yis// gdug pa'i dargyal zhi bar 'gyur// dpying 'khor rnams bsdu bar mdzod// ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan gsung mchog dgyes bdag gis// rdon chos kyi tshig gsan nas/
206b2(rnying rgyud): hUM zhes brjod de rab tu bsdus// rigs lnga la sogs 'khor rnams kun// thugs kar bsdus te mi snang mdzad// hUM zhes brjod de gzhal yas bsdus// sku yi dbyings su mi snang mdzad// hUM las gyur pa'i 'od zer gyis// 'jig rten gsum yang rang
206b3(rnying rgyud): bsdus te// gsung gi gnas su mi snang mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos/ nyid kyi sku mi bzad par rab tu khros pa'i sgra mi bzad par bya ba'i phyir/ sku gsung thugs las gsang ba'i sngags 'di brjod do// oM badz+ra kI pi
206b4(rnying rgyud): la ya ma hA rA dza ya hU~M zhes brjod cing / rab tu khros pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rab tu khros pa'i sku mi bzad pa dbu stong mnga' ba/ phyag stong khams kyi rdul dang mnyam pa/ spyan bye ba stong mnga' ba/ zhabs kyis phyogs mtshams gnod/
206b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sra shin tu mi bzad pa cig tu gyur to// rab tu mi bzad pa de'i thugs ka nas/ e bton te/ e A kA sha hUM zhes brjod pas/ 'byung ba nam mkha'i rang bzhin/ yu ma kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' gru gsum pa ste/ chos nyid bde ba'i rol pas
206b6(rnying rgyud): bde ba bskyed par mdzod/ de nas yang nyid kyi thugs ka nas yaM phyung ste/ karma rak+Sha haM zhes brjod pas/ 'byung ba rlung gi dkyil 'khor yum dam tshig sgrol ma'i mkha'i rang bzhin du/ rdo rje rgya gram pa dan bzhis mtshan pa cig tu gyur te/ phrin las thogs pa
206b7(rnying rgyud): med pa'i don mdzad do// de nas yang nyid kyi thigs ka nas raM bton te/ ri badz+ra dz+wa pa ra zhes brjod pas/ 'byung ba me'i rang bzhin/ yum gas dkar mo'imakha' gru gsum ste gnyis su med pa'i 'bras bu smin par mdzad do/ de nas yang nyid kyi thungs
207a1(rnying rgyud): kanas/ ma bston tam thar nyan la ma N+Dal zhes brjod pas/ khrag gi chu mtshang gting mtha' med pa/ sa ma mam nyi mkha' rnam pa ste/ sdug bsngal dbang du bsdus nas gnyis su med pa rang bzhin du mdzad// de nas yang
207a2(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi thugs gnas su bton te/ sa mA yAhU~M/ zhes brjod pas/ 'byung ba ma'i rang bzhin/ sram sangs rgyas dran gyis pa'i rang bzhin pa ba'i pa bton te/ khams gsum thams ci gtas su med pa'i ye shes chen po la gnas par mdzad /
207a3(rnying rgyud): nas yang nyid kyi thugs ka nas/ k+Sho ba ton toko ni ro ta~M maN+Da la zhes brjod pas/ ker rus kyi ringabag ces tu gyur te/ 'khor ba gnas su dag cing co 'jal mngon par 'dra mdzad do// de nas yang nyid bye thugs gnas rin po rje'i rje b+ha gnag bton te/
207a4(rnying rgyud): dz+wa la n+ta pa zhes brjod pas/ ! gan la lus pa mthing na ga ba rtse ba ba/ 'ams pa' mngon par shar bar mdzad do// nas ya ma ma thal lam d+he/ zhes pasade di da kyi las su me tha ba rgyas 'dasasam mngan
207a5(rnying rgyud): gyi skul la khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs par thar ta// de nas yang rab ma gnyis sa med pa'i byang chub kyi sems las/ ba rje le bra la ya be tham samaN+Dal baT dang / ta la ta la rnaMs ba pa da kyi rgyags bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams cad kyis/ zhe
207a6(rnying rgyud): rjes su dran par gyur to// nyid kyi sgra las thang rab tu mi bzad pa'i sla 'bar ba/ gsung gtu mchog tu smrab mang po 'ithon pa de rtse/ 'jig rten drug pa phyogs mtshams thams cad g.yos/ rab tu ga mas/ kun d+ha btugam par// 'khrug
207a7(rnying rgyud): 'khrugs so// kun tu rab kyang khrigs sa// tshi ga btu tshig/ kun tu rab tu tshig go// 'brang rab cu 'thor/ kun cu btu'athor ro// de dakhas pa'i rgyal po ma phral byung ba dngaH/ 'jig rten thang bar byed gadrug pa can/ lus ga nga/
207b1(rnying rgyud): gsum b+hi rtogs pa ston pa'i dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang ba dang / khyab 'jug rnams rang rang gi mthu stobs ston cing rab tu thog tum mo// de nas 'jigs byed kyi bdag po badz+ra hrIpa la/ hUM dz+ra thA badz+ra lI la ya/ badz+ra
207b2(rnying rgyud): big+h+nAM waM hU~M hUM hUM phaTaHzhes brjod pas/ phu gsung thugs las chung ba'i khro ba de dag gis/ phyogs bcu'i dregs pa can de dag bsgral nas slar 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan sras mchog rdo rje ga zhon nur gyur te/ zhal gsum pa/ g.yas
207b3(rnying rgyud): dkar ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ dbus mthing nag/ zhal shin tu yang rngams pa/ zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/ rdo rje'i gshog pas gtams pa/ skra kham na ka gyen du brdzes pa/ khrag 'thung rdzas dbul brgyan cing g.yang gzhi la bkor du
207b4(rnying rgyud): gas sa na gyug sa sa
207b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa gcig tu gyur te/ bran jo bo la bka' nod pa'i tshul du bzhugs shing / gdug pa can gyi dregs pa rnams zhabs 'og tu brdzis te gnas par gyur to// de nas khrag 'thung chen pos khros pa'i dargyal chen por byin te dbang bskur ba'i phyir/
207b6(rnying rgyud): hUM badz+ra kI lA ya hU~M dz+nyA na badz+ra zhes brjod de/ ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa ni g.yas kyi dang por byin/ ye shes lnga'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa ni phyag g.yas kyi bar mar byin/ nyon mongs pa gzir ba'i ri rab ni g.yas kyi tha mar byin/ thugs rje chags pa'i b+han+ta ni g.yon
207b7(rnying rgyud): kyi dang par byin te dbang bsrung ngo // phyogs bcu'i gdug pa can btul nas de'i lag cha kha T+wAM ga phrogs nas/ g.yon gyi bar ma na dpa' rtags su bsnams so// de nas yang khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badz+ra kI laM yas phyogs skyong ba bsgral ba'i ched du/
208a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ smra s+ho// na
208a2(rnying rgyud): rdorje sems dpa' gang gang brjod// dngos phub kun gyi dbyor pa rnams// de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas de'i dog tu las kyi bya bas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mjog nyid du bshang /
208a3(rnying rgyud): par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems can ji ltar yin zhe na/ bsam gyis mi khyab rgya che ba// zab dngos kun pade mi 'gyur ba// thams cad khyab cing dri ma med// byang chub sems ni bdag brtanang // de nas 'di
208a4(rnying rgyud): las kyi khyad par ni// sems nyid brtan pa nyid sems pas// ting 'dzin de la mnyan par gzhag/ nam shes pas ni dzi rje kun// rdo rje las ni 'dzin 'gyur te// bcom ldan 'das rdorje 'din ji ltar yin zhen// sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyong ba ni// bdag la byin ba rgyabs mchog bsku
208a5(rnying rgyud): pa// nyen re srab par byed na des// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur// de la bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po 'i spyod pa ji ltar yin zhen/ snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang // gang phyir sems can don gyur pas// de kyi rang ni kun tu bzang // byang chub spyor pa'i nges mang
208a6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdud nyid dang 'dul byas rgya lnga ba ji ltar yin zhe na/ sems nyid kho na bdud nyid do// sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rang sems gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ bdag ni bdud nyid gyur pa yin// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs
208a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i byang chub dang sangs rgyas yin zhen/ rang sems so sor rtog pa'i phyir// byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid// de phyi de nyid sangs rgyas nyid// bdag byin rlangs mchog grub phyir ro// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyig na rdo rje yin nen// ma gyi dngo sor rtogs pa dang // gdu
208b1(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad des par kunan// sangs rgyas kun ngos rjon ste// byang chung sems rta pa bdag// stan zang po nga gtu// mtshon ny-i ni rdul bas byin// brtan pa thams ca dgrub pa'i phyir// des na phyag dardo rjengs// de 'di lta dang po rigs las zung ba gang la byud
208b2(rnying rgyud): yin zhen/ shes rab pa rol phrin pa yum// pab ni thabs la mkhas pa ste// rdo rjesams dpa' gdus gyi phyir// rig rnams rab tu byung ba'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod dang thar pa yin zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das na chags pa che// dngos grub thams cad rngas chags
208b3(rnying rgyud): phyir// dngos grub thams cad mi 'gyur 'de// bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum yin zhe na/ bdag ni dus gsum mtha' yas phyir// nga ni srid gsum gdul bya'i phyir// gsum mchog 'jig rten gsus kun phyir// 'jig rten gsum 'das/
208b4(rnying rgyud): gsum du// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyid yin zhe na// de nyid brten pa thams cad bde// bsod nams kun mchog che ba'i phyir// g.yo ba sems kyis 'dus byas phyir// sgyu ma thams cad nga yin no// zhes bya ba rang gi las kyi bya ba'i de khon nyid rdo rje sems dpas gsung
208b5(rnying rgyud): so// de la di skyer nga po'i glu byung ba shes pa yin zhen/ srid pa shin tu klu pA yi// dbang phyug chen po mchog gra bar// gzi can sems can don mdzad phyir// bskal pa thog ma bcom ldan gsungs// de nas de gang yin zhe na/ 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das/
208b6(rnying rgyud): rab tu dag pa mau'i bya ma ga// gsang ba'i phyi ni snying por brjod// yaM k+She dz+nyAn pa 'du mchog/ de nas nye pa'i rnyi pa la/ de khon nyid shes pa de// de nyid gsung zhing gsang ba dang // snying po rab tu brjod par bya// snying po'i rjes su sgrub par grub// nye ba'i snying po nyid du
208b7(rnying rgyud): del ji ltar ba de brtson po 'dzi don yong pa mchog gi bshad pa'i chung len rjen/ rdo la grwa bdun gyi ming gyur bang // bde ba chen mo nas brjod do// rdo rje de nyid don yod byab// dam chog 'da' ba dka' ba'o// zhes bya ba'i mchog gi ngam pa'i grubacom ldan
209a1(rnying rgyud): yang 'dod// 'di nyi sems cad nyon mongs pa// 'dig 'jal ba/ na par gyur// 'di ltar ma 'phral ra tshang chu// deyongs su bslab pa pas// dkyil 'khor dam pa ji gar bsgoms// rdzogs par ma dang bu ma dang /
209a2(rnying rgyud): mdabang du mi 'tshal lam// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das badz+ra/ ra yas bka' stsal ba/ ton cig ka ta ru// rjes pra bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// deng ba tshangs pa'i banas bzhi bsgoms/ dri rjes rim pa'i ting 'dzin pa sdad//
209a3(rnying rgyud): bas ne sdang gcod// mtshon chen sngon po dbang ba yis// nam mkha kyil nas thigs par shar// TIgag gi ru shang ba dang // ting gi ga rngu 'askam par hA// ting rjes bskal ba'i nga mchog ni// bsad cing mnan pa la yi de// sring de ga ta
209a4(rnying rgyud): byas nas// ye shes khro ba 'grub par mdod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sa// ngang nyid do chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyings su bdag bskyed cig/ thangs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang ting rjes pa
209a5(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs bya'i phyir// dbang dang kyin rlabs 'dir tshol cig/ de rjes kyi nang gas gsum dbang // byin nabs bdag la skal nas ni// de nyid du ni mi ldang chur// de nas sras mchog yab yal gyi/ gnyis ma
209a6(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems las ni// 'byung ba'i gsung sngags 'di ldan no// dz+haiM ny+dza dang rnam par rtsal// dbyig sngon ga shin ji'i gshed pa dang // mi ga yatam ni rtsal ba dang // ba mi nga 'a // 2
209a7(rnying rgyud): skabs pas// rang rang skul dbyings su thor// gyid snyoms ma 'i mdang // dra da ga mdang/ sa ya ma// zhes 'phrulangs
209b1(rnying rgyud): ga zhabs pa shi bzung// nas byas 'gas pa na// garlag pa la gan ngags ma// glu byur bas gsas// na ga dang / dam kunanams// bad smra
209b2(rnying rgyud): sham thibs can// brang gas 'gro ba chen pos brgyan// de dag yang yum rol pA las// phreng chub snyems las byung ba'i 'khor // phag dang smrig prastag dang ni// nod gal gdang bya ga dang // shA ba 'ug pa gzig dag zhwa//
209b3(rnying rgyud): shud byang kaiTi// khwa dang seng ge ba wang dang // dam dang rtse mo rjed dang ni// rtsi ba'i mgo can la sogs pa'i// sprul pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa yis// srid pa'i rlung yang mi 'tshor gtums// de nas yang slo ba rnams kyis gdan na sasu byung bar bya ba'i
209b4(rnying rgyud): ra/ sras mchog rdo rje gzhan nus/ phrag gi rdegs pa rnams kyis byung la bal te btung bas/ phung po'i tshogs mi gtsang ba'i rgyamama'i nang na/ dran pa med par gnas pa las/ bcom ldan 'das 'dza kI la las/ bdud bye byung ba nga ba dan la
209b5(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ thugs ka nas khra ba sleb brtsegs pa bton nas mi gtsang pa'i rgya mtsho drabyas so// de na su bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi 'od zer lus la bsnyems pas/ slang dran pa rjing nas bden mthong ngo // de 'tsho dpal chen po'i 'brang
209b6(rnying rgyud): samana' bor te lus khro ba rnams kyi gdan khri phul te/ grub pa lang kar khwas 'ches shing kyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa'i tshogs pa snang bar dam bcas so// de'i tshe phyogs sbyong ba rnams// khro bo rnams kyis zhabs rog tu bzhag go// de nas yang dpal chen
209b7(rnying rgyud): ba badz+ra kI la yas/ srin mo'i tshogs gdul ba'i phyir/ gsang ba rol pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ hUM hU~M hUM e Ar li ru lu ru lu hU~M dzaH/ zhes brjod pas/ dregs pa chen po'i me dang bu mo dang / chung ma'i tshogs kyi gtsem ta shurtsa brgyad
210a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor grangs med pa dang bcas nas/ bdadz+ra kA la ya'i thad du yud tsam gyis 'dus so// 'das nas kyang mapa' gcig tu bcug te/ sbyor ba mdzad pa'i byang chub sems kyi sman las/ ha ha zhes brdad pas/ gad mdud/
210a2(rnying rgyud): tsau rI ma dang / pra mo hA dang / bed+d+ha ldi dang / puk+ka sI dang / g+ha sma rA dang / sra sha nI dang / tsaN+Da lI la sogs pa re re la yang 'khor grangs med pa dang bcas nas/ rang rang gi stan dang lag cha gdug pa dang bcas te/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kyi
210a3(rnying rgyud): khyams la 'khod do// de nas yang he he zhes brjod pas/ si d+ha ma dang / bya b+hI ma dang / sr-i ga la ma dang / shwa na ma dang / gr-i D+ha ma dang / kang+ka ma dang / kA ka ma dang / u lU ma la sogs te de dag re re la yang 'khor bas ma gyis mi khyab pa dang
210a4(rnying rgyud): bcas nas/ rang rang gi stan dang lag char bcas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi me ri'i khyams la 'khod do// de nas yang phaT ces brjod pas/ lcags kyu ma dang / zhags pa ma dang / lcags sgrog ma dang / dril bum dang / de dag re re la yang
210a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor grangs med pas bskor te/ me 'khyams kyi sgo'i thad du 'khod do// de nas srin mo rnams la phaT ces brjod pas/ rang rang gi gnas ga la ba der yud tsam gyis bkye'o// de nas yang dpal khrag 'thung chen po badz+ra kI la yas/ gsang ba bkod pa
210a6(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams yongs su rdzogs par bstan nas/ e A ra li ru lu ho dzaH/ zhes brjod pas dregs pa ma dang bu mo'i tshogs rnams 'khor grangs med pa dang bcas nas/ rang rang gi lag cha
210a7(rnying rgyud): gdug pa stan du chas te/ ci bgyi zer zhing thad du 'dus pa la dam tshig phog cing las kyi dbang bskur te/ gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol du bzhag go// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kI la ya
210b1(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis kyi mdo las gdug pa can btul ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang ka ma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan dgyes pa che// 'di bslab 'tshal ba'i rnal 'gyor pas// gnas ni gang dang
210b2(rnying rgyud): gang du bgyi// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// bye brag rnams ni ji ltar lags// zhes gsol ba dang / de nas ston pa kI la yas// karma he ru ka yi tshig gas na nas// gnas kyi khyad par 'di gsungs so// phur ba bsgrub pa'i gnas rnams ni/
210b3(rnying rgyud): dur khrod gnas dang shing gcig drung // rgya gram lam du bya ba dang // ngam grog gnas dang khang stong du// rdo rje drag po'i dkyil 'khor bya// las la phan 'dogs yod pa dang // grims 'byin shags kyis ting 'dzin gas la// de la thabs dang rtags med na// bad
210b4(rnying rgyud): gi gzugs phud brlag pa dang // tshe dang dge ba'i bar chad 'ong // nags tshal chen po ga na bar// der ni legs par dpyad pa yi// klu yi gnas dang 'byung po'i srang // sa yi bgegs dang 'byung ba'i sa// tsha sgo dmyal ba'i chu med par// las kyi bya ba gzhung brtsams
210b5(rnying rgyud): nas// bkra shis don gyi gnas yin pas// bsgrub yun ring bas zhi rgyas 'grub// me tog gling dang rin chen ri// dpag bsam shing dang skad snyan bya// 'bru sna tshogs dang gnams lags// dbyigs legs lung pa ngan pa ni// bkra shis gan
210b6(rnying rgyud): sma dbang dgug 'grub// gnas kyi dam pa yin par bshad// drag po'i las sa bya ba dang // dang por phur pa bslab pa'i gnas// gnas ri tsher ma can gyi shing // gcan gzan gdug pa sna tshogs yod// gnam ni ge mda' ral gri'i shul//
210b7(rnying rgyud): ni kugasum med pung 'ang // logs la dur khrod gnas yod pa// mkhas pas brtags te btsal byas nas// 'di ni phur pa bsgrub gnas yin// tsher ma can gyi shing rnams dang // dug shing gdug pa yod pa dang // brag ma rang rong yod pa dang /
211a1(rnying rgyud): grog po ngan pa gting zab dang // stag gi so 'dra sbrul gyi lce// sdig pa'i drang dra cu srin la// ban glang snga 'thab brag chu'i bar// nang gcig shing dang marungs pa// 'di ni sras mchog bsgrub gnas yan// gsang ba'i gnas su
211a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa ni// sngon chad lha mi phung sa dang // g.yul bkye ba dang mtshon dum dang // bsad bcang sa dang ma rungs 'dus// srin po bsgral ba'i bcas gzhi dang // srog chags bsad pa'i khrag rjes dang // g.yul ngo bgos pa'i sa mkhar gling // mang po
211a3(rnying rgyud): zhing // nyams dang ting 'dzin g.yel ba ni// gnas 'di dag tu bya ba min// rnal dpyod nyams med de brlag 'gyur// de bas gzhung dang mthun pa yi// bkra shis pa yi gnas dag tu// yun ring bsrings na gdon to med// dam tshig ma nyams nges
211a4(rnying rgyud): thub dang // ting 'dzin brtan pa'i blo can gyis// gnas ni de dang de dag tu// cho ga'i las 'di brtsam byas na// nges par 'grub pa gdon mi za// de lta bu yis rnyed nas// snang dang mi snang ba dag po la// rin dang bden pas bkrol la bslang // de nas byin
211a5(rnying rgyud): brlab mtshams kyang gcad// ma rungs yod na gtor ma byin// de nas zhag grangs 'di tsam mam// drag po'i las 'di ma grub par// gnas 'di rnal 'byor bdag g.yar bas// gtor ma sbyin pa 'di longs la// ma grub bar du gzhan du dengs// de skad byas la
211a6(rnying rgyud): gtor ma sbyin// bsgo ba'i las rnams gnyer yang gtad// de nas stegs bu gzhung bzhin bcig/ ngam rdzas chag chag gzhung bzhin btab// kha dog mon rnams bkye byas nas// dbus kyi ste ba'i zlum po la// thig bzhi gdab pas ling cho brgyad/
211b1(rnying rgyud): bubacad dang brgyad kyang 'dug
211b2(rnying rgyud): dung sazag pazugasuma'i// rnam can gyi pang la brgyad// brgyad bu su ni bco// gocan byud pa dang na// 'ab 'a'i ba thams gnyis kyis yongs// dngas pa ga supang gang na dpa dang / sa nga bdan pa gan
211b3(rnying rgyud): bdi rnams gas la zas nas// dang po sngags kyi bdag por bskyed// de bzhin brtsod brkyang du bstan// bzhi ba dngag cu gang bzhin dang // te thaH brgyad la sogs pa// mkhas pas gzung banyin dgong bar bya// shang kyi tshang mos pas dag pa/
211b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i gdan steng du// rnam rgyal yab yum bdag po bskyed// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs snyed la// gshin rje bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// gshin rje gshed po yab yum bskyed// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// chu bdag bsnol ba'i gdan steng na
211b5(rnying rgyud): ta mgrin rtsal ba yab yum bskyed// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs snying la// gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// bdud rtsi 'khril ba yab yum bskyed// shar lho 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la// me lha bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// dbyug pasngon po yab lam ba
211b6(rnying rgyud): lho nub 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la// bden bral bsrol ba'i gdan steng du// mi ga yo mgon pa yab yum bskyed// nub byed 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la// rlung lha bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// gzhan gyis mi thub yab sum basbed// byang sha khor lo cings
211b7(rnying rgyud): la// dbang ldan bskol ba'i gdan steng du// khams gsumanam rgal yab yum bskyed// mdun du gza' skar gdon la ni// rje chen yab yum bskyed par bya// rgyab tus bdag gdan la ni// stobs chen yang yum bskyed par bya// bu chang bzhi la dpo pa
211b8(rnying rgyud): ni// b+hab+ha bad ci'i bgang ba ni// gnyis med bdud rtsi'i mtshad bye dgad// gas nang nyima'i gdon na/ srung ma gcin bskyed par bya/ rkyen ma gdan lan// skye ga'i cigacan bskyed par bya// rngub nga ni mang ga nga dzi//
212a1(rnying rgyud): 6\u0f7f/ mgo can bskyed par na// brang sho nyim gdan la ni// khwa ma mag can bskyed par bya// las kyi grwa rnams dam bzhin dgod// rdzas su dgod par byab ni// b+han+ta byug gcigazung du// dbang bldarnams zhugs pa ni// bdag pa
212a2(rnying rgyud): yab yum mtshan mar bzhag/ yan lag bzhi yi ni sag brgya// kho rgyal yab yum rnams kyi rdzas// yan lag bzhi yi mtshan mni// slob rnams kyi mtshan mar bzhag/ thod pa dram bu brgya drug ni// lha mo bcu drug mtshan mar dgod// so dang 'bar 'brar
212a3(rnying rgyud): sna/ thams cad kun// pho nya rnams kyi rdzas su dgrod// ska pa mag nyi shuH bcad de// ci ba kyi chags kyi ma tshan mang dgod// sa sa'i gsung gi yig 'brurnams// rudu rangs so'i maranamyal// yab kram byang chub sems de yis// drur khrod skrag pa
212a4(rnying rgyud): da pa ma thong ba da // la rkyen pa pa ca gang shu da// dAngs nan na ma 'dus// na pa ste// gang ma da// gsung cin dadu brdza / rdzogs pazhim thams pazhi ca dag
212a5(rnying rgyud): stag dang chu srin tshwa ked dang // zhing gi rgyal mtshan brgyad rnams gzug/ zhing lpags g.yang gzhi smin ltar gtibs// zhing phran mang po 'phan du bkram// de ltar gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// zhe sdang 'joms
212a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i phur ba'o// sku yi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba la// gru gsum me 'od 'bar 'bri// gzhan rnams gang dang mthun par dgod// dbus su dregs pa'i gdan la ni// rnam par rgyal ba yab yum bsgom// spyan sngar sngags
212a7(rnying rgyud): kyi bdag po'o// de ltar gsal bar bltas pa ni// su yi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// gti mug 'joms pa'i phur pa'o// gsung gi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// chags pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// gru gsum me 'od 'bar ba dgod// dbus
212b1(rnying rgyud): sra drags pa'i gad rda la ni// rta ma chag rol pa yab sum bsgom// rgyab tu sngags kyi bdag po ni// gsung gi dkyil 'khor dam pa te// 'dod chags 'joms pa'i phur ba'o// yon tan dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// rin chen mya gra bcang du
212b2(rnying rgyud): phri// gru gsum me 'od 'bar bar dgod// dbus su dregs pa'i gdan la ni// gshin rje'i gshed po yab yum bskyed// g.yas su sngags kyi bdag po'o// yon tan dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nga rgyal 'joms pa'i phur bu ste// thugs kyi dkyil 'kho
212b3(rnying rgyud): rigs zhes bya// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// dang po tshad med snying rje bskyed// byang chub sems la dga' ba ni// sngon du 'gro ba'i lam mchog yin// sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya// khrag 'thung thugs la gnas pa ni// ye shes rtse mo mchog yin te/
212b4(rnying rgyud): hUM gsam las ni 'das pa'i phyir// rtse mo med pa'i las su bstan// 'di ni gzug dang byin rlob dang // bzlas brjod dang ni zin las dang // dus dang gnas dang bdag nyid dang // phun sum tshogs pa bdun po yis// las gang sgrub pa 'grub par byed/
212b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhi yis brgyan pa'i gnas// dbus su dregs pa'i gdan la ni// byang chub lnga las bzhengs pa yi// las kyi he ru bsgom par bya// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs la ni// dri za bsnol ba'i gdan dag la//
212b6(rnying rgyud): byang chub lnga las mngon rdzogs pa'i// rnam par rgyal ba yab yum bsgom// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng la// gshin rje bsnol ba'i gdan sted du// byang chub lnga las mngon rdzogs pa'i// gshin rje gshed po yab yum bsgom// rngub phyogs 'khor
212b7(rnying rgyud): lo'i rtsibs steng la// klu gdug pa skol ba'i gdan steng du// byang chub lnga las mngon rdzogs pa'i// rta mgrin rgyal po yab yum bsgom// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// byang chub lnga las mngon rdzogs
213a1(rnying rgyud): pa'o// rlabs ldan la ba sum pa rnam par bya// rgam yan chad gzhan brtanags pa// hUM bsgril lnga dang nyi zla dang // thug ma cad 'ad dang brnas pa // bsar rtag pam pang dang // mnyam nyid ye shes chos dbyings dang /
213a2(rnying rgyud): byab nan tan ye shes lnga// yongs su rdzogs pa'i phra ru brtag/ las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa yi// thugs kyi rigs las byung zhes bya'o// dkyil 'khor nga yis phrag dog 'joms// las kyi phung pa yin rjes gsungs// dkyil 'khor dadag nyid la
213a3(rnying rgyud): brag tu ni gsungs pa'o// rnal 'byir zla lan dam pa yis// darje'i brayab mos g.yabs nas ni// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod// gnyis su med par bstim byas nas// bdag nyid ldan grab dkyil 'khor la// na ga
213a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i mchod pa brtsam// bdag nyid thugs kyi 'od zer las// lha ma mang po zan nas ni// phyogs brgya'i rgyal ba rnams la mchod// phyogs brgya'i rgyal ba'i thugs ka nas// rtse mo mang po slar 'thun nas// bdag la mchod pa dpral bar brtag/
213a5(rnying rgyud): ba stod pabyed par ba'am// tre bskal pa ma ltar 'bar ba mas/ 'od zeb ma 'dra'i klud rtsi na// zhwa bzham nam gzhugs pa/ srin cir yang gyur ba'i gzugs// d+h+r-i dbagra kham na ga dul ba zang// rtswa dul ci 'i srid cer 'bar/
213a6(rnying rgyud): misminya mkhrig ter snang migaH// log par lta ba 'dral ba'i stan// bla mche bzang lag gajigs pa// phya gang chub ba rjod pa'i thob// phrag tung thugs kyi sbyin rnabs las/ phyogs pang dang // rmugs phyi da pas dzin
213a7(rnying rgyud): gtings// byams pa'i 'od zer glog bzhin 'bru// rngams pa'i sgra skad 'brug ltar blogs// sprul pa'i thog thog char bzhin 'bebs// hUM sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni// blan ka chen po bdud mi jol// kyal gachen po bgegs 'tshol// mal
213b1(rnying rgyud): mnan pa dang sa zung kyal// hU~M thugs chen po byin napas rjes// bdag pa ci rjes pa ba mang cing // bdag ga rtag pa dasam pa rnams// 'brung par byin thos banab tu gsopa// khyil cing rgyan yang 'khril ba che// sems sa
213b2(rnying rgyud): nga // sbru las 'das pa'i snar bste// bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes lags// rnaM mr-i gsum 'jams pa'i rnal phyag 'tshal bstod// mnyam nyid nga gis thob rtsa ga tshal bskyed// rdos pangs spyod mdzod la phyag tshal bzod// dza
213b3(rnying rgyud): a tshal bstod// ces bskyed do// de nas yang kam t+te rlugs/ khrag 'thung gi rgyal po 'ad kA~M la yang 'di skad kyis gsol to// rtse kye bcom nyam thag 'thung bdag/ gnyis med las byang gro rtsal gto// stsal dbang bska mi tshal la // rna
213b4(rnying rgyud): bdang // khro ba'i rgyal po badz+ra kI la pas// kan te ru ka mi chog gsan nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsam to// gnyis med las byung lta so phrul// rtogs brgya'i rtsal baspyan drangs la// mchod bstod dam par byas nas ni// gsol gang 'a
213b5(rnying rgyud): sbyin nod par bya// bdag nyid dbang nod rim dbang brlab// bdag nyid las byung lha mo yis// rab bsrel lha mos rigs dbang bskur// 'khor dang las kyi dkyil 'khor la'o// las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di lta ste// dgon pa'i gnas su de da 'drag
213b6(rnying rgyud): mnyams rgyal pos dasrung bar zung // dkyil 'khong brgyad pa'i las rnams kyi// phung bre badra dang mtshan du 'angs// ma mo bsnyen pa'i dmar dang yi// gcig shos 'dul ba'i drag rnams gsog// rnam gsam pa rnam pa ma \u0f7f/ @
213b7(rnying rgyud): grubargya dag cod bus pas ma~M// d+hucan ba bang rgya dang steng 'og 'khor po la// btu mchen pa ba brgya pa sra yi g.yon// khyims pa ldan pas gro pang la ca ba'i// srub skye dbang bzang 'a dang ldan paraH// sngan drangs mcha dpapas sa
214a1(rnying rgyud): gzhung bzhinaH// bdud rtsis mnyes phyir mchod dang brang // rags mchod phyir spang bar bya// bsnyen 'bram grangs kyang chang bar bya// ting 'dzin 'od dang sgra yang spro// bsreg drang rdul du brnag par bsam// mra dang pa dang nga
214a2(rnying rgyud): ga'o// lte bar bsam bya snying po bzlas// bdag nyid khro rgyal yin pa'i phyir// sku las 'od zer 'bar ba 'khrugs// thi ma dang dbang phyug stobs dang ldan// cis kyang mi bskyod dpal dang ldan// skra yi dbang chen rdzogs pas bka' la thams cad nyan// lha
214a3(rnying rgyud): srin sde bcas bka' nyan thams cad bsrung bar byed// rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa sku yi snying po nyid// gsung gi dbang phyug thams cad dbang du sdud// rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa gsung gi snying po nyid// 'od dang zer gyis klu rnams rab tu 'dar// thugs
214a4(rnying rgyud): kyi rdo rjes dgra bgegs thams cad dang // gnod byed sdang ba dbang du sdud par byed// bsdu dang spor byed shugs dang ldan pa'o// tshogs phul nyams dang ldan na bsgral las bya'o// phur btab ho yis phyung nas bstab gnan bya// dkyil 'khor dbus su bum
214a5(rnying rgyud): bzhag nas ni// spos chus bkang ste gzungs thag sbrel bar bya'o// sngags kyis bstib ste tshang na blang bkra bya// bdug pa byas te drag tu bzlas bkra bya'o// gsod pa'i las can gang zhig byed pa na// khyi dang phag dang dri la zod nang du mnan// sbas
214a6(rnying rgyud): dang mtshal du dgu gul nag pos bdug/ bsrung ba'i las can gang zhig byed pa na// tshwa dang spyi tshe ste 'brim rnams sngags te// phur te mtha' ma yang na sba bar bya// phur bu dbang bskur 'os pa'i sa ru gdab// mo gsham gang zhig bu pho phal byar na/
214a7(rnying rgyud): pas bkru zhing bdug pa mang du bya// lkog 'bras sbrul dang phal gyis zin pa la// kha rung zlas shing nga la gdab par bya// 'dza' gad gdan gyi dbang du gyur pa la// nyung dkar sngags shing sol tags dus su blag/ gang zhag gdon gyis smra bog byed pa la/
214b1(rnying rgyud): mtshan dang ldan pa'i mam gzhon pal// byin dang ldan pa'i mchogagasur ba dang // phrar bas gdab cang stong ba dag \u0f7f// thagastsal bdon/ gas rlon pa rnams pa la// de lag zang rlabs nacan dga'// gzugs byas rbar pas btab ma
214b2(rnying rgyud): des// gang zhig bdag ldagan dang med 'khrugs ni// man dang dbas chang zad pa rangs par mdun// gdon la tid 'dzin gis mgang snying po bzang // glang du slar na phyogs bram pade 'byung // nyam sa 'i na nga nyams mi 'gyur// /
214b3(rnying rgyud): nadon yang 'grub// ting 'dzin med ci nga dbang med pa dang // thugs dang krung myed rang yan rnams grags pas// wang du rlabs sa kra med lal bar gyur// zhes bsrungasas// rgyud kyinal shA me rmyi la ba/ de bzhin gzugs ma
214b4(rnying rgyud): kyi gas pa'i yang gas pa/ kA lA la ba rgya gnyis kyi ma da las dag pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bzhed pa'i le brgya // denas yang kaH haM grags/ bcom ldan 'das khrag zung gi rgyal pa'i yang rnam pa dz+ra la la dam
214b5(rnying rgyud): gsol to// kye rtse gsang mchog rol pa'i bdag/ sras mchog phur ba'i dkyil 'khor kang // gsod pa las kyi dkyil 'khor gang // zhes gsol pa dang // kI lA ya yis bka'i stsal pa// sras mchog phrar pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// yang dag
214b6(rnying rgyud): nyid dungs bshad kyis// lus ngag yid kyis gus par nyon// las la sbyor ba'i dus su ni// gsang ba yum gyi dkyil 'khor la// me 'od 'bar bas bskor ba bris// rol mo'i rgyan nam 'jigs par brtag/ phyogs pa'i mtshams bani
214b7(rnying rgyud): steng 'og bcu// sras mchog nyi shu dgod par bya// dbus su nyid kyi sras mchog ste// pho nya'i dpung tshogs mang po kun// shin tu gsal zhing 'bar bar brtag/ 'di ni sras mchog dkyil 'khor ro// de nas gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor ro//
215a1(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid dkyil 'khor dam pa'o// pho brang yid tshe dgu pa la// phyogs bzhi le'u tshe dag dang ni// mdun dang g.yas mtshan g.yon mtshan la// sras mchog bdun po dgod par bya// 'di yang sras mchog dkyil 'khor
215a2(rnying rgyud): ro// gsod pa las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// sras mchog phur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// dbang ldan phyogs kyi grwa la yang // 'brug khung las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// hom khung gru gsum gdengs pa la// rtse mo lho yi phyogs su bstan// dug gi rgya yis
215a3(rnying rgyud): chag chag gdab// ro bsregs sol bas nag po 'byug/ bar rim gsum dang ldan par bya// hU~M dang phaT kyis 'khor bar bri// rtsang thod mang pos kha bskor la// thob lcags kyu 'khrigs par dgod// dus la bab pa'i sems can gzugs// las
215a4(rnying rgyud): la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dri ma drug la sogs pa la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya'o// ho ma khung nang du gzhug pa yin// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// gan rgyal dag tu gzhag par bya// de nas gdeng ldan rnal 'byor pas/
215a5(rnying rgyud): dbyug pa blangs nas su// khrag 'thung 'khor la gnas pa yi// gsod ma las mkhan spyan drangs la// de la rdo rje'i g.yab mos gdab// de la gtor ma rgyas par byin// bdag nyid chen po bskul ba ni// sha chen la sogs bdud rtsi lnga//
215a6(rnying rgyud): glu ba shing kun rgun 'bum gyis// mchod pa phul la las la btang // shwa na mu kha bskul ba ni// nyi ma'i mchod pa phul ba'o// sa bdag chen mo bskul ba ni// gnod sbyin sha khrag byin la bcol// phra min las la bstsal ba ni// snying
215a7(rnying rgyud): po phul la bcol// srin mo las la bskul pa ni// snying sna snying khrag phul nas ni// rnal 'byor las 'di grub par gyis// gang yin gnas nas drang bar byos// dug ga gtor ma za ru gzhug/ 'gro ba'i lha dang dpral ba gcas

216a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ bya shing // rab tu mi bstan gnas dag nas// gang dag skyes pa gang yan dang // drug dang gcan gcan gdug pa dang // rab tu gtum pa'i gnas dgran// skyes pa'i shing mjug cor mthun// phrer ba dang ni seng ldeng dang // ga
216a2(rnying rgyud): dag skyer ldeng mdo mo shing // rtsa ba'i logs su rgya mdud bya// rtse mo'i logs su zur gsum bya// gzhan yang gdug pa'i tsher ma can// gong ma de rnams ma 'byor na// gdug pa'i shing mchog gang rnyed bya// ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor d+ha// yid la dran zhing gas
216a3(rnying rgyud): bsgoms nas// sngags dang bya ba mnor na// ngas kyang bya bar nga yis bshad// 'di dag ring thung tshad bstan pa// sor bzhi pa dang sor brgyad pa// bcu gnyis pa dang bco brgyad ste// de las thung bar ma gsungs shing // de las ring ba yongs ma bstar//
216a4(rnying rgyud): sor bzhi 'byung ba bzhi mi tshad// sor brkyang rnam shes brgyad kyi dzad// bcu gnyis skye mched bcu gnyis tshad// bco brgyad khams chen bco brgyad tshad// rtags dang skur te de rnams bstan// rtags phyin pa yi lcags rnams ni// de yi yon tan bstan pa ni//
216a5(rnying rgyud): dper na nags kyi sdong po la// sngon chad chong pa'i sta re dag/ de dag yod par gyur na ni// tshod mchod kyi the tshom med// de dag sngon chad mchod pas// tshod dang mchod yod mangs// de bzhin na yang de dang 'dra// mdor na rnal 'byor rtsal mchog gces// re zhig
216a6(rnying rgyud): yang skyon med de// yon tan yod par 'di las bstan// nag po'i shing ni dug can la// phrar ba byas pa'i yon tan ni// nag po gzhan gyis mi tshug la// dug gis pha rol gsod par byed// tshor macan gyi shing rnams la// phur pa byas pa'i yon tan ni// byer pa
216a7(rnying rgyud): longs spyod 'phel// mjams dbang du bya ba 'grub// gzhan yang kha dag rigs su sbyar// mdor na bde gshegs sa bon gyis// byin gyis brlab pa gces par bshad// de bas kyang ni dam tshig gtso// nal 'byor rnams la dam par bsngags//
216b1(rnying rgyud): bag na las kyang pa nan// dadag na pa sam pas// chags pas rgya ma ma sa// bgangs pas sgru ban pa // na rgyu kyang rgyab sams// byung nabasams 'gas// / 'argyal ba ga ga// gdus
216b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i rngu ba shad pa// zangs lpags la bar ba gang yod pa// de la legs shing dod par bya'o// mdod pa yi skyon rnams ni// gang dgar byas pas rgya las nyams// ta mAche la zas na bka' las 'gal// rtod ba ca byas na zi chu bas chung // yod pa
216b3(rnying rgyud): nabasgom mi bde// ngan dgyur pa shams na rtog pa 'byung // legs par byas na yid rang bzhin// tshogs par bsags na gzhung dang mthun// dod bar byas na byin rlabs yod// mdor na rtogs pa gtso ba yang // rtogs pa'i don la mthar byinan// dam
216b4(rnying rgyud): rtag las 'di yangs mi dgos// rnam par tig la khri 'dral bzang // nyan mongs pa la gnyen pos 'joms// rtogs pa gsal bar bsams pa shes// gzhan chug 'dod na grangs mang zlos// rtags phyin 'dod na yun du spangs// don la 'jig 'di
216b5(rnying rgyud): gaphel gyis// rings par 'dod na bcan 'grus bzung // dan 'di yid la bzhag nas kyang // rdzogs pas de lanan tan bskyed// ces gsungs so// chud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal ba/ de bzhin gshegs brnam pa cid kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/
216b6(rnying rgyud): las bcug nyis kyi ma lam+b+ha/ phrar pa'i stan pa'i le brdzu 'o// de nas yang kam ga zugs/ 'di skad ces stong // 9 9 bcom ldan sems kyi bdag// gnyis meng las kyang du 'phral ban// dpal chen med bdag
216b7(rnying rgyud): la// thang pa byed pa ra ba/ rkye kyi du ma byar bajug/ bani la mi gas pa gas// gshesas pa su gas pa rnam sa ngas gsas/ 'a pa dang / man sa dpa
217a1(rnying rgyud): 'byung gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig ka ma ta sa?// phrar pa dang pa bskyed pani// rdzas kyi phung pa gzhal las bang // can dang chas par rnam par btag/ bad ba shags thag 'brang sbran drangs pakrugs/
217a2(rnying rgyud): gyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul// ngong zhu bdag gi zhal du thim// lte ba'i dbus na byang chub sems// rim pa gnyis kyi tshul brtags so// pad+ma las 'phros 'od phung las// so sa'i yig bu phyag mtshan gyur// de las grwa bzhengs 'jigs pa'i tshu
217a3(rnying rgyud): sku stod zhal gcig phyag bzhi ste// sru spad sngo sangs zung gsum pa// ral pa kha ma nag gyen du 'bar// brang gi 'gro ba chen pos brgyan// phyag g.yas dang po sA re la// de 'og rdo rje rgya gram bsnams// g.yon gyi dang po kha Ta 'khrol// de 'og khro bo'i
217a4(rnying rgyud): ske nas 'dzin// de ni phur pa bskyed pa'o// byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa ni// sngon la sku gsung thugs su brlab// skra yi rdo rje sku yi gnas// shin tu brjid par byin gyis brlab// gsung gi rdo rje gsung gi gnas// gdangs sgra grags par byin gyis brlab
217a5(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje thugs kyi gnas// zhe sdang rtse gcig ldan par brlab// de nas rigs lnga byin brlabs te// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge gsum// rang dang thugs kyi mtshan ma gnas// lte bar sta dang sked par hA// rigs rnams 'dres pa'i ngo bor brlab/
217a6(rnying rgyud): de nas thugs nyid mi 'gyur ba// ye shes gcig tu byin gyis brlabs// logs gsum hUM gsum mo 'gyur rtogs// zur gsum phaT gsum 'joms pa'i rtags// de nas shin tu brtas pa dang // dzaHyI dkyil 'khor gdon pa dang // bdag nyid mdun
217a7(rnying rgyud): na gnas par brtag/ de nas rigs kyi khro bos ni// rang rang so so'i dbang yang bskur// 'tshal par spos la so sor bstim// hUM hU~MphaT kyi sgra 'byin cing // rang rang rigs la thugs gyur pas// dbang dang byin rlabs thams cad kun// de nyid la ni 'dus
217b1(rnying rgyud): drim bsam// de nas sngon gyi dmachog bslab// de rjes bdag nyid chen por brdab// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil dul// ti ma'i dkyil 'khor gyur pa'i dkyil// tAM bdag kun tu bzang po'i sku// g.yon pa malas rlung kyil bsam// ma ba ba ngan tung
217b2(rnying rgyud): sa
217b3(rnying rgyud): chen dbyung ldan bskyed// sprin lag dkyil du hrIHbsams la// de las don yod grub pa'o// mthe'u chung dkyil du I bsams te// de las snang ba mtha' yas bskyed// kun kyang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la'o// g.yon gyi sor mo rnams la yang // yig gong ma bsam
217b4(rnying rgyud): sa pa sa sa 'du
217b5(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod// sor mo chub tu bsnol te bsdams// de nas sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes// brjod la phur pa lag tu gzug/ lag pa'i rting par 'bye ste// mthe bong mthe'u srin lag gsum// dbus su phur bzug 'dril bar bya// oM dang badz+ra A ba sha
217b6(rnying rgyud): dang a zhes brjod pas ni// phyogs bcu dus gsum bde gshegs kyi// yab yum skyes dang bcas pa yis// zhe sdang rjes su dran pa'i sra// yungs 'bru grangs med phur par bti ma// de nas su gsung thugs nyid kyi// bdag nyid chen pong dngang
217b7(rnying rgyud): bsrur te// ser mo rgyab tu bsnol nas ni// gung gnyis bsgreng bar phur bu gzhug/ oM dang badz+ra mat+pa rA// rdo hUM zhes ni brjod pa las// sras mchog bdag nyid thugs 'drar 'gyur// de nas sor mo thag po dbya// lag pa'i rting pas phur ba bzung / @
218a1(rnying rgyud): phur bu zhes brjod pas// des ni bdag dang gsung 'drar 'gyur// de nas sor ma brgyad bsnol te// mtha bdag shibs pa'i bar du ni// phung ba brlag nas 'di skad brjod// ad ts+tsha rgyun dang // han tan ti lta dang /
218a2(rnying rgyud): hrI zhes rab brjod pas// bdag nyid yab yum byang chub sems// rab tu spo zhing de la bstim// stong khams gang ba'i me stag 'jo// dmigs pa thams cad des 'grub pa'i// byin dang dbang chen ldaran gyur to// shes rab grom gyi dbus bzhags
218a3(rnying rgyud): gsol// gu gul nag po'i dud pas bdug/ yungs nag khro chung rgyal pos brdeg/ las la sbyar ba'i dus su ni// lcags sam shing dam gang yod la// khyi khwa gang khrag gis byugs la// dug ding ma rungs pas kyang byag/ byin brlabs
218a4(rnying rgyud): lag par blangs nas na// gyen du gsor zhing 'di skad brjod// hUM bzhi gsal 'phros hUM bzhi tshogs la bskyed// dbu la rgya mdud bstan pas thabs kyi rtags// rtsibs la logs brgyad bstan pas khro bo brkyang // rin chen zer bcad bstan pas
218a5(rnying rgyud): bo brgyad / dbus su rgya mdud bstan pas shes rab rtags// rtse mo zur gsum bstan pas sku gsung thugs// steng 'og gnyis su bstan pas khro bo bzhi// khong stong byang chub sems kyi thig la las// khro byal 'das pa'i sras mchog kI la la//
218a6(rnying rgyud): ma g.yos che mchog sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ sdug bsngal log par 'khyams pa'i sems can rnams// thugs rje bye brag dbyings su sgrol mdzad pa// thabs kyis bsgral ba'i skal dang mi ldan yang // shugs kyis bsrel ba'i phrin las mdzad
218a7(rnying rgyud): du gsol// de nas phyi nang mchod pas mchod// blta bci la dmigs bstan pa// blta ba'i rgyal po nges pa'i don// gdod nas ma skyes chos kyi dbyings// rnam dag ma skyes shes rab sa// me 'gag tshe 'phral sti// rig pa'i
218b1(rnying rgyud): parang gnas pa// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag/ thabs kyi rgyal po bdag gnas pas// 'gro kun bla na med par stsol// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi nyal ba'i yang rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gas dnga'i yang gas dang / ma sa
218b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi mdo las/ sras mchog phur pa byin gyis brlab pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das khraka 'thung gi rgyal po/ badz+ra kI lar 'di skad ces gsol to// kyi kye mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag/ don yod
218b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po mchog gi gtso// gnyis med las byung dpa' bo'i mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi yab chen po// drag po'i phur ba gsungs pa rnams// sngon mo drags pa bskal pa'i zhing // da lha'i rjes bslab rnal 'byor pas// dmigs ni gang dang gang du 'a
218b4(rnying rgyud): bskal ba'i dus tshong ji ltar lags// gnyis med don la bdag zhu 'tshal// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das badz+rA kA la yas/ 'di skad ces gsungs sa// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ bskal ba'i dmigs rnams bstan pa ni// kun la bya
218b5(rnying rgyud): gzhung las min// nyams pa bya ba bdun yod de// dam las nyams dang bka' yas nyams// don las nyams dang las kyis nyams// mtshan mas nyams dang 'dod pas nyams// log pas nyams dang bdun po la// 'di la nyams pa 'as pa ste//
218b6(rnying rgyud): 'di dag so so'i mtshan nyid ni// ma 'dres gsal ba nga yis bshad// srog la nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// pha dang ma dang mkhan po gsod// slob dpon gsod dang nad du mi byed/ 'di ni nams kyang ldang bsen// bskal ba'i zhing gcig 'di yinan
218b7(rnying rgyud): mas las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rdo rje slob dpon bka' bslu dang // ngan sems dpya sems byed pa dang // sngags dang phyag rgya tun gcod dang // gsang ba sbas pa'i thabs mchog rnams// sdong med rnams la bsgrag pa dang // 'di ni nyams pa
219a1(rnying rgyud): non // / 'di yang bskal pa da migs gcig yo// bA/ 'alas nyams pa'o mam nga // dpal btags na su dra 'ab// zlab thar blun nu lag 'dags// gan ga byastan na myur ba 'dabs// bdan par bsan
219a2(rnying rgyud): log par 'gyid// don rtags brten na go lasar 'dzin// 'di na nyams pa chen po te// 'di sa bskal bsgyur yang brtsam// don las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bya ru mi rung sna chags byed// rdzas dang lag cha mngon du 'dzin// ta nag 'asgor grol dngas par gyud
219a3(rnying rgyud): ma// da pa nga pa dang 'an// lags sa rgyal da ga gang // den kyisan g.yog par ma// pa ba 'an la dgrwa pa thos// sbyin pa cig ga la pa / bka' byu ba sa // reg par da pa
219a4(rnying rgyud): dag spyad// 'di ni rna tha dngos yin te// mngon spong bskal yang sdig migos// las kyis nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bdag dang skye gnas me gcig par// bskal ba'i las kyi grong 'ongs nas// sngon chad 'khon par yod med par// zag pa bab par
219a5(rnying rgyud): dran nas kyang // zhi ba drang por ni nyan par// nyis mad gzhan la 'dzugs pa dang // dpung pa bsnyems la klan ka tshol// kha lde god cing bzhin mdog bzlog/ brga las med par bdag la rgol// dbrog mi dgos par bdag pa 'phrog/ bdag gis
219a6(rnying rgyud): nyes par madran zhing // bdag gis brgal bar ma bsams kyang // las kyis bdag lagand 'dzugs shing // bdag la mthu brtsal 'dod pa// las kyi nyams pa 'di yin pas// 'di yang bzhal ba'i dmigs gcig yin// gzhan yang las kyi
219a7(rnying rgyud): nyams pa ni// gal mi che bar yag tshol// phan rgyu med par bdag la 'tsho// 'od rgyu med par sgrub par 'ong // las kyi nyams pa'i rtags yin pas// 'di la bskal ba spar yang brtsam// las kyis 'khor bas sdig med bshad// mtshan mas nam
219b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid ni// chos la phyogs char 'dzin pa dang // lta ba d+ha d+har spyod pa dang // rnal 'byor don ldan zugs dkrug dang // rang bzhin med pa' chos bshad kyang // mtshan ma can gyi chos bzung nas// lha srin bran dung 'khol lo// mthu 'gran byed pa
219b2(rnying rgyud): zhig yod// nga yi nyams su dpal cher byung // nga ni khro bo'i rgyal po rgan// gzhan la 'tsho ning khro la sogs// 'di ni mtshan mas nyams pa ste// bsgral par byas kyang dam mi nyams// log par nyams par gyur pa ni// mnyan go togs gsapa med par/
219b3(rnying rgyud): ra mthu chertsal 'dod pas// las kyi don du mtshan ma spyod// sdigs pa'i lag char mi mgo thogs// ral pa bsi gcing so gtsigs byed// dmar gyi ar+tha glo la thogs// zhing gi pags pa phrag la thogs// spo ba nag po shadang chel// sdong bkang khur zhing
219b4(rnying rgyud): log chos spyod // spyod pa ma ner gzhung bor nas// bya ba mi 'tshams rje tshogs byed// ngo dang gdong la khrag gis thug/ tshul 'galadam dgra sna tshogs byed// the tshor sbyor cing dam mi bsrung // spyod pa brlang pos bka' gzhung spad// sangs rgyas kun
219b5(rnying rgyud): zhabs 'dren byas// rnal 'byor sngags pa'i rkang nas drangs// dpa' chen khrag 'thung thags khal bskyed// ma mo mkha' 'gro zan tshogs bkram// rnal 'byor yongs kyi dam btsogs byas// 'di ni bsngal ba'i dmigs gcig yin// 'dod pas nyams
219b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid ni// 'dod chags nor gyis snying bus nas// shi bar nges kyang 'dod pas rgyal// phung bar rtogs kyang sngags 'chang 'joms// dug tu snang yang lho ru bza'// gtan pa yin yang thabs kyis spong // thob tu 'dod nas gsang sngags ba
219b7(rnying rgyud): bza' ru sgrub pa'i yo byad brgya// nor du rnal 'byor gzhung spyod 'joms// 'di dag bskal na rnal 'byor btsun// btul zhing tshang bcad bstan pa gtan// med cing stong na bar chad kyang // 'di dag bsgra bar ma byas na// mtho ris 'grim nas dmyal ba
220a1(rnying rgyud): 'phel// rnal 'byor dam can spyod ldag nas// theg pa rman pa bcos zho 'gag/ 'di dag bskal bar b+has dang// dmyal ba' gnas su yun zung 'gyur// brdeg pa'i dras myong bstan pa ni// gnam gang dang rnam sa brgyad dang
220a2(rnying rgyud): bco lnga nyi shu gnyis dag dang // bcu drug dang ni bcu bzhi dang // nyer gsum dang ni bco bzung dang // nyi shu la yang brdeg pa yin// bcu gsum bcuthug par dag dang // bcu dgu nyi shu dgu la ni// 'ardeg pa'i dus ni babs pa yin// brlab da
220a3(rnying rgyud): dgu tshes gcig dang // nyi shu bkyang dang gnam stong dang // bco lnga tshes drug dag dang ni// bcu gcig nyi shu lnga dag dang // chos gsum tshos gnyis bco brgyad dang // nyi shu dang na nyi shu bdun// 'di la brdeg par yang mi bya// 'di la brdeg par bya
220a4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor 'khor du bcas pa brlag/ mig dmar phur khu gza' rnams ni// brdeg pa'i dus la bab par bya// dang po dkyil 'khor gzhung btsugs te// bsnyen bsgrub cho ga tshad byas nas// 'dzab grangs bsnyen pa dbum du gdon// bzlas brjod
220a5(rnying rgyud): mtshon par mi gcad// bsnyen bsrub gnyis kyi rtags rnams ni// lha yi sku mthong phur bu ldeg/ rtags byung nas ni las la 'jug/ drag po'i rtags su bstan pa ni// rab kyis mngon du khugs pa 'ong // 'bring gis ling ga 'gul ba dang // tha mar
220a6(rnying rgyud): dmyigs gnon mtshan nyams 'byung // dang ni legs par 'ong ba yin// nam gyi gu nga mnyi ma dros// de la brdeg par rab tu shis// dur khrod chen po gan bar// bskal ba la sogs tshul bzhin bya// rgya grum lam gyi gan par// bdeg par
220a7(rnying rgyud): sogs tshul bzhin bya// 'di dag brdeg pa'i dus tshod kyang // srong la zhugs nas tho rangs pa// 'di dag brdeg par bya ba min// 'di dag brdeg par bya bas ni// yun rdo lo tsam du yang bsring // grangs ni byed 'bum du ga dzod// mchod
220b1(rnying rgyud): smra gzhan nag / rgyug panas pa dung thug nas// thab la sogs pa pa'o// bdag pang dus tshang bstan pa// rnal 'thong dbapas shes par bya// dayang bya/ ngas 'di kar bskos// bdag na dang bral ba dag pa
220b2(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa / ga pa sa sa da ba / me sa
220b3(rnying rgyud): gang byed pa dbang du badz+ra// de ni brdeg pa'i dus tshang yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po/ de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kI la yab rgya gnyis kyi mdo las bskal pa'i dmigs ba
220b4(rnying rgyud): sa / dngas ra/ na das na na la pam 'di / 'a dgas thabs// nga byu dpa bsong 'angs/ ma ba
220b5(rnying rgyud): bdud// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs dkyil 'khor// dam pa rnams kyis gsungs pa ni// da yas pon ni sngar lags// gsong pa'i sngags ni ji ltar lags// bskrang pa la sogs sngags 'di dag/ sngags kyi rgyal pos lung bsan gsol/
220b6(rnying rgyud): sa gsol ba dang bcom 'a dang pa ga 'azung gi rgyal ba ba ga pa las bka'astsal pa/ cig sa / ngas du gnas nam/ rjes rgyal ba babyu bya sa/ sa padag dga' ba pags
220b7(rnying rgyud): ga pa mad pa / gro ba gas pa 'ang ga ga/ // sa sam da thas / ma las mi sa#
