221a10(rnying rgyud): gci pa man/ sa / rgyu/ / ya tu
221b1(rnying rgyud): ya ban+d+haM/ yo badz+ra kad+hi mAr Na trI/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha rbo su rje// khro mo rnams kyi ming gis bskyed pa'o// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sa rbabi g+h+nAn dig/ tsag hU~M phaT/ bskyed nas gdon pa'i sngags so// gsod pa'i sngags su bstan pa ni// tshang nas
221b2(rnying rgyud): brdeg pa'i dus de ru// khwa 'gugs pho nya gtang bya ste// spyi dpal gyi pho nya las mkhan mo// dkar mo dung gi mche ba can// mkha' la 'byung ba'i mdzod 'khyil ma// lag na lha gris sems can sgrol// zhal du sems can snying khrag gsod//
221b3(rnying rgyud): sprul ba'i thog thog char ltar 'bebs// phoH sum baN+Da drug cu'i gtso mo nye// bskal pa ba ga/ khri'i pha rol nas// dam pas 'das pa'i tha 'dzin ma// nyams pa'i thal nan mchung // g+ho yi phyogs nas 'byung bani// @
221b4(rnying rgyud): mo lcags kyi lan tshar can// khyung gi khra tshogs g.yas pa na// b+han+ta gri thogs gsod la rngams// tshangs pa dkyil ba'i chu lugs can// mi gdug mgo la gcer bu can// pho nya sum brgya drug cu 'gyed// sum brgya drug
221b5(rnying rgyud): gtso mo ste// bskal pa brgya nas bla tsho tshol// dpag tshad bye bar srog dbugs 'gugs// nyams pa'i bla dang srog la ya// nub kyi phyogs nas 'gyur ba ni// dmar mo nyi ma'i 'od 'phro ma// gdug pa 'dul la sdang dab sel// gsod pa rdan+da
221b6(rnying rgyud): la las la brtson// mche gtsigs g.yang gzhi gos su gon// pho nya sum brgya drug cu 'gyed// sum brgya drug cu'i gtso mo ste// rab tu mi bsrun zla 'gugs ma// nyams pa'i bla dang srog la ya// byang gi phyogs nas 'byung ba ni// d+ha ngan ga brtsal ba'i
221b7(rnying rgyud): thod gdengs can// ser mor la can gsum gyis bskor// phyag na ral gri gsod la rngams// sum bcu drug cu gtso mo te// sngon nas dgra bo'i bla 'gugs ma// nyams pa'i bla dang srog la ya// nam mkha'i lha mo kur pa'i lha// lag brgya rtsa zla kyi phung pa 'dra ba// rdzun brgyang
222a1(rnying rgyud): gi mchi ma 'dag/ zhal bsdug drag pa'i lpags par thos// choms kyis bya shalas pa gcod// zla ba' las ma khanan nom pa// rab tus pa sun las la bdon// ma nyam ga zugs patu byed// rnga rjeng sra gsung thugs las
222a2(rnying rgyud): sbal// nyams pa'i zla dang srog la ya// gzhan yang po nyar grags pa kun// de dag las la bkur bar bya// de dag mngon par grags pa dang // gas pa' las la ltar pad b+ha// oMn ma pa/ N+Da ta ya r+dz+nyA// / oM g+hag bA d+ha sa/ sang thAn/
222a3(rnying rgyud): la phan/ kI la kI la yA/ sarba thA pa / badz+ra k+Sha pa yA/ btsun yang pa sa te/ kA ya lA rjes kyil phardorje phre mo 'i sngags sa/ la la yab y-i seM sa ma / com pan 'angs
222a4(rnying rgyud): gsod ba'i sngags so// oM sa dz+wa 9 ni/ mo has// 'gun/ bathobadzin shA gA la/ dayi rdzogs// 'dzin pa nyi / 'jugs shi sha pa'i rdza // yas raban da pa
222a5(rnying rgyud): phaTa.oM bidza~M hU~M kAr hUM yA/ tshe lung ngo // pa ra badz+ra' snong kyi bru~M Ta/ b+hiHb+hing+ga badz+ra hU~M phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ir+Na badz+ra hU~M phaT/ tan ta \u0f7f/ b+harba d+ha po N+Di/ tathA paHswA d+hA / !sa yang thaM na d+ha sa/ shri brin yAn ya sa/ la pa ya pa pa /
222a6(rnying rgyud): A be sha yA s+yAng sha yA trUM phaT/ pi snga ma brje la rdzu Ta/ nAta na badz+ra hU~M phaT/ dahang ha badz+raSh+Ta phaT/ patsam / mtham 'a3/ 'i badz+ra d+hA phaT/ su dzab/ 5\u0f7f/
222a7(rnying rgyud): dza ya bi dza ya/ a dzi tas pa dzi hi/ mA ra se ni pra mdza ni ya bru~M pheMT/ hU~M hU~M ma ma pa sha~M ku ru ma taM ta ka re/ ya~M dan ta/ ma ma karmA tra kr-ing ka ra swA NA/ oM sarbe kA na ya hUM phaT/ ti thA ya hUM phaT/ oM su ru su~Mr+ya.u D+yaHkro d+ha hU~M phaTa.a ta tha ma /
222b1(rnying rgyud): d+hab hUMng/ oMs ma 'i spre/ yabi 'byung / bid+ha ra bi nAr thaM'ang/ A badz+ra yi sa/ A ba dza ya na pan Ta/ oM badzag sakro d+hA sbyib Tapa Ta sa?H/ u badras rgyas pa pa D+h+we/ smra bad+hAn tA na ta / daha tu/ bathabaH/ band pa naH/ ! dzu/ ban ra
222b2(rnying rgyud): hUMhUM phaT phaT/ badz+ra kro d+ha yak+shal kha khA ti khA ti ha ho hU~M phaT phaT/ A badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha na tan/ da ha ha/ ba tsa pa~MH/ bi t+ta m+ba ma/ dza R+R-i la~M bau ngar Na/ u d+hoSh+Tokro d+ha ya hrI d+ha phaT wa~M/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya ba waM khaM gaM bar+b+r-i b+hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ raM dzA pa ra dal ska na rje phaT/
222b3(rnying rgyud): das mes/ rjes maSh+Ta)/ bto b+hag na/ 5/ samahA/ bahrI/ sa ma \u0f7f/ sprin mo nyag pa tekid+d+ha/ / skyebyed de/ tsapa tsa/ ma
222b4(rnying rgyud): pang chub tuH/ lhan ngas pa'i lhags so// oM bajasam pa/ yo ga kyi rje/ zhib dbye ba'i sngags pa// kha' dung ma ton rung / ralus kyi/ gameng batha~Md de/ // nang // bramag ni/ sem pa ma
222b5(rnying rgyud): hi/ ka kha ga d+ha / !/ dzarba/ d+haH/ ta thad ta na/ pa phapa? nyam/ yang lA la/ sha Sha sa tak+Sha/ a A/ i swI/ u A/ r-i / mau wAM/ e ai/ ma mo/ yaM yaH// sngags de phyi mo yang dag ldan// de las spang bang sa
222b6(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis// bskyed dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang // bzlas dang dgug dang bstim pa dang // bcing ba mthu thog gzir bste// las kyi bye brag yongs gsal bya// gdab dang thun dab ba gzugs phung gtub// bdud dang zhal bstang dbyings su 'phangs//
223a1(rnying rgyud): las mthA bskyed cing // k+Shai mi kI li'i bzlas pa bya// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dkrug/ rtag pa smod pa 'don rnams 'byung // byang chub yid la dran pa yis// mang du thos shing las la mkhas// lha dang gnyis med mi phyed dang // drag kyang rdzog/
223a2(rnying rgyud): med sems dang ldan// phrag dog med cing khong khro med// gzhan la re ba mi 'jog cing // rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig rnams// ma nyams nges thub gzhung bzhin bsrung // de 'dra'i rnal 'byor dam pa des// las su bya ba thams cad 'grub// dang po shes rab rnam
223a3(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis// gtan tshig don la yid ches nas// de nas nges par dbang thob ste// snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa yis// khams gsum 'khor ba gzung bar bya// don 'di dag dang mi ldan zhing // nges pa'i dbang rnams ma thob dang // mkhas la sgro skur 'debs pa
223a4(rnying rgyud): dang // gsang sngags theg chen skur 'debs dang // rang shes sbyang tshig tshul gnas dang // dam tshig nyams par gyur pa dang / don med phyal par gtong ba rnams// 'di ni rnal 'byor ma yin te// log pa'i lam du shes par bya// de yis spyad kyang yongs mi
223a5(rnying rgyud): 'grub// slar la rang sems brlag pa dang // 'bras bu mnar med dmyal bar skye// 'di dag rtsom pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rigs kyi rnal 'gyor gral du spos// gzhan yang las 'di tsam pa yi// rnal 'byor pa ni gang yin na// theg pa bsam yas sems la
223a6(rnying rgyud): gsal// lta ba mi 'gyur gdeng du 'jog/ sgom pa yengs med don la gsal// dam tshig nyan thos khrims bzhin bsrung // rgyud dang grub thabs kun la mkhas// rdzas dang lag cha rtag tu 'chang // don dang man ngag sems la 'chang // tshul dang dang
223a7(rnying rgyud): tshul bzang la shis// dus drug mchod pa rgyun mi gcang // phung po lha dang gnyis su med// sems ni chos nyid dang la gnas// rnal 'byor rtag ldan dam pa nges// las su bya ba kun rdzogs nas// bzlas pa dag la rab tu brtson// sngags dang phyag gya rtag tu 'chang //
223b1(rnying rgyud): de lta bu yi rnal 'byor pas// las dang bya ba gdon ni zar// nges par brtsams pas 'bras bu 'grub// gtor ma'i las la khyad par mkhas// mkhang 'gro las la 'khol ma pas na// dga' seng bgugs par byab shes// drag shul thabs kyi pho nyan// rdza 'bral grags
223b2(rnying rgyud): las thabs kyis 'gyed// rnam tog mtshan ma thabs kyis 'dul// gtsang sde med par spyod pa des// las su bya ba kun 'grub 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kI la yal cu gnyis
223b3(rnying rgyud): kyi mdo las sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang karma te du kas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan gsang gsum bdag/ gnyis med don ldan mtshon pa ni// phyag rgya rnams
223b4(rnying rgyud): ni ji ltar lags// de yis las ni ji ltar 'grug// gsang gsum bdag la bshad du gsol// zhes glengs pa dang / dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badz+ra kI la yas bka' stsal ba/ nyon cig ka ma te ru ka/ khros pa'i rgyal la sogs pa yi// phyag rgya dam pa 'chad khyab/
223b5(rnying rgyud): po'i stabs su gnas nas kyang // lag g.yas rdo rje gdengs pa yis// lag g.yon phur pa bzung thabs su// bgrad pa'i tshul du gnas byas pa// khrag 'bung phyag gya yin par bshad// phyag kyad ma pa 'di bcas nas// nyid kyi rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas pas// sangs rgyas
223b6(rnying rgyud): rdordo badzin la sogs rnams// tshul bar 'dod na rgyal bar 'gyur// 'ching bar 'dod na 'ching bar 'gyur// khams gsumasems can spos ci dgos// khro mo'i stangs su gnas byas te// g.yas pa thabs kyi gcol 'khyud// g.yon pa dud dmar gtsol stong //
223b7(rnying rgyud): ni khros pa'i kyal ma nye// yum gyi phyag tu 'di bcings nas// nyid byen ba'i sngags bzlas pas// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // sragasung thugs rna spa ba mnyes te// bdag keng bangar du 'dra bar nges// rkang pa mthel tung nga drag drug/ sa
224a1(rnying rgyud): pa sA re gyen du 'phyar// g.yon pa phur pa 'debs pa'i tshul// gzugs pa gzus shing zar mig palta// 'di ni sras mchog phur pa'i bya// gya 'di bcings shing sngags bzlas pas// sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'chang 'gyur me/ khams gsum sems
224a2(rnying rgyud): can spos ci dgos// lag gnyis thal sbyar gyen du bsgred // rkang pa'i mthil sbyar thur du btsugs// gcu zhing rol pa'i tshul du ston// hU~M chen phyag rgya yin par bshad// phyag rgya bcings shing sngags bzlas gtad// dus gsum sangs rgyas 'gugs 'gyur na/
224a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po'am bu mo spos ci dgos// lag g.yon mdzub bsgreng snying gar bzhag/ g.yas pa mdzub bkug lcags kyur byas// spyan bzlog stangs kyis blta ba ni// rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya yin// sngags bzlas rgya 'di bcas pas ni// rlung gcod 'dod na
224a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo la'o// chu chen gcod na phrar ba ste// ji ltar 'dod bzlog par byed// g.yon pa khro mdzub snying gar bsgreng // g.yas partse gsum gyen du bsgred// brdeg pa'i tshul du gnas pa ni// dbug pa sngon po'i phyag rgya yin// kya bcings sngags bzlas gtang
224a5(rnying rgyud): byas na// rdo rje'i brag kyang 'joms par nus// gsod pa'i las la nges par 'grub// lag gnyis khu tshur bcings pa las// gung gnyis spang de bsgreng bar bya// grub kyi tshigs la mdzum mo dkri// mtheb gnyis gzhibs te mdun bzhag ste// kha yi tshul ba thus
224a6(rnying rgyud): pa ni// gshin rje'i gshed po'i phyag rgya yin// rgya bcings sngags bzlas gta byas na// 'grags par 'dod na rang dbang med// gsad par 'dod ni yud kyis 'chi// dbye bar 'dod na drag gis so// bskrang par 'dod na drar khrong ras ma la'o// lag pa gnyis
224a7(rnying rgyud): kyi mthe bong gong // srin lag mthe chung sen mos mnan// gung mo mdzub mo gshibs te brkyang // ral gri lta bur byas pa ni// mi g.yo mgon po'i phyag rgya yin// rgya bcings sngags bzlas gtad byas na// lha 'am gu'am gnod sbyin nam// bdag gis las gang
224b1(rnying rgyud): bsgob bzhin// gang 'dod las la lhur du 'gro// bgegs rnams med par 'dod pa la// srin lag ca la ri lug dgas// de yis skrag cang byed par 'gyur// lag gnyis sa sor 'a chur bcangs// mabe chung gnyis ni lag zung bral// mnab ma gnyis ga gebs bsgreng ba/
224b2(rnying rgyud): lan gsum bskor nas dpral bar bzhig// te mgrin bral po'i phyag na yin// rgya bcing sa sngags bzlas gtang byas // drug rnams gzhos par bum pabya'o// ser ba zlog dpal bas so// 'jigs pa las zar ldan dza'o// lag gnyis thatshwangs sor bcings// rgyang
224b3(rnying rgyud): spangad mthe chung lu gu khyud// mdzub gnyis rtse mo spang nas kyang // zhags pa lta bur byas na ni// gzhan gyis mi thab phyag rgya yin// rgya bcings sngags bzlas gtang byas na// zas gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang // sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams// rab tu gnad
224b4(rnying rgyud): la 'bebs par byed// gdon dang 'byung po ro langs rnams// dung khrod g.yam pas gzir bar byed// lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong gis// mthe chung gnyis kyi sen mo mnan// lhag ma gsum po dpung mgor bsnol// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya yin// rgya bcings sngags
224b5(rnying rgyud): bzlas gtang byas na// sangs rgyas sems can don la baspod// byang chub sems dpa' sa la spod// rno bo'i bgeshes rnams gnas la bskyod // lag gnyis bu tshu sa sa rabacangs// madrab gnyis bsgrengs te mtheg ma bsnol// khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yin
224b6(rnying rgyud): rgya bcings sngags bzlas gtad byas na// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang // 'chi bar 'gyur te gdon mi za// g.yon pa khwa tshur snying gar bzhag/ g.yas pa sta re brdeg pa'i tshul// stobs po che yi phyag rgya yin// rgya bcings sngags bzlas gtang byas na/
224b7(rnying rgyud): than pa byung na char pa 'bebs// zar chen yang dag gcod par byed// khro mo'i stabs su gnas nas kyang // g.yas pa thabs kyi gcol 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// khro ma rnams kyi phyag rgyar bshad// rgya bcings sngags bzlas gtang byas na// masa'i las
225a1(rnying rgyud): rnams 'byung bar byed// lag pa gnyis kyi tid sbyar nas// gung mo rtse spang drag tu dril// 'di ni phur bu 'dril ba'i rtsa// g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs nas ni// g.yas pa rdo rje tho ba sa brdeg/ phur bas brdeg pa'i rtsag rgya yin// lag pa gnyis ni tha
225a2(rnying rgyud): sbyar nas// gung mo rtse sdad mthe'u chung brgyad// srin lag mdzub mo rgyab bsnol te// mthe'u chang gshibs te rab tu bsgril// 'di ni phur bu 'dril ba'i cha// mtheb mdzub gnyis kyi bar du ni// phur ba btsug pa yas mar bdag/ bab dus brdeg pa'i las pa bayul/
225a3(rnying rgyud): 'di ni phur bu bskul ba'i rgya// lag g.yon steng nas gdugs ltar dag pa// g.yas pa'i mthil du ho las steng // ga dug pa dbul ba'i phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis nyi zla'i tshul du sbyar// dkyil du nyur dkar bcug nas ni// phur pa gzi byin bskyed pa'i rgya// 2
225a4(rnying rgyud): ba gnyis kyi rting sbyar nas// pad+ma 'dra ba steng dang 'og/ gtor ma bsngo ba'i phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis so sor khu tshur bcings// rgyab sdad mthe chung lu gu rgyud// g.yon pa'i mdzub bsgred rgyab tu ni// g.yas mdzub lcags kyu ltar gyes pa// 'gugs shing 'dren pa'i
225a5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya yin// g.yas g.yon lag pa so sor spel// tshogs chen bkug nas zur du byas// mthe bong gshibs nas mdun bzhag pa// ri rab kyis gzir phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs nas kyang // mdzub bsgred kun tu bstan nas ni// g.yas pa
225a6(rnying rgyud): zhags pa 'dzin tshul bu// yan lag bcing ba'i phyag rgya yin// g.yas g.yon mor mo bsnol nas kyang // brkyang ste kha sbub byas pa ni// gzugs la 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis sor mo bsnol nas bsdams// gung gnyis gshings nas bsgreng ba ni//
225a7(rnying rgyud): lung chen po'i phyag rgya yin// g.yas g.yon khu tshur bcangs nas ni// mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar byas pa// snying ga nas 'dzin tshul du bya// g.yas pa ral gris gtub pa ni// gzugs phung bshigs pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi khu tshur bcangs//
225b1(rnying rgyud): spyi 'o'o snyed du bzhag pa ni// phung po ba rung ba'i phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis sor mo bsnol te brkyang // mthe bong mthe'u chung gshibs la bsgreng // las kyis gdab pa'i phyag rgya yin// nu bcingan sngags bzlas nyi shu gcig/ lan gsum mgo la bskor la gtug
225b2(rnying rgyud): sus kyang thon par yongs mi 'gyur// tshe srang chen po'i phyag rgya yin// phur pa'i mgo la rab gtugs te// rgya bcings sngags ni lan bdun bzlas// lha dang bgegs ni dam mi 'dar// lag gnyis sor mo nang du bsnol// mthe bor mthe 'chung rtse spang bgrengs/
225b3(rnying rgyud): mon du so sor brgyad// kha sbub phur pa'i steng du bzungs// rgyab cings sngags bzlas nyi shu gcig/ bdag gi bka' nyan bran bzhin byed// stobs chen sngags ni yin par 'dod// de nas lag gnyis chu skur te/ mthe'u chung lu mu chung du spel// khu gror bcangs te mdung
225b4(rnying rgyud): mo bsgreng // kha 'grem gnyis su dgu bor bya// mche bas gsod pa yin par brtag/ rkang pa g.yon pa snying ga mnan// sdang mig bltas la la na gsam du// bzlas shing snying rtsa gcad par bsam// lag gnyis sor mo lug rgyud nas// g.yon pa'i mthe bong g.yas pas
225b5(rnying rgyud): mnan// mdzub gnyis nang sbyar mnyam par basbeng // rdo rje ba con phyag rgya yin// rgya bcings sngags ni nyi shu gcig/ 'od te bdun nam sdang mig blta// gzugs phung rdal ba gyur par brtag/ hung dkar brdeg cing dgu gul 'dug/ las 'di grub par gyis shig btsong /
225b6(rnying rgyud): chung zad las su ma rungs na// khro ba'i steng du ri rab bskyed// ri rab snyed du hUM bsams te// hU~M pasardordo rgya gracha ldang // sde lce'i phreng bas bskor bar bsam// de snyeng nyi ga'i dkyil 'khor ro// de steng hU~M las don yod grub// dbu gsum phug drug su mdog ldang // g.ya
225b7(rnying rgyud): nam pang po rab tung byur// ma du rgyag gas// ma dang 'a sa ba gdag sna pa med nin rtag chem// las pa zun pa da par thar// khyod kyis seM ti po pa 'badag/ gzhan rang dul bam dang/
226a1(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro rtsi bgyi'i tshogs// so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya dag/ nges pa med par dmyal bas gsungs// don du phyag rgya la sogs pa// yang dag rtogs na kun kyang bya// ma rtogs mtshan ma tog pa'i gzhi// nges pa med par rgyal bas gsungs/
226a2(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi 'do las phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas kam te rugs bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pa la 'di dar
226a3(rnying rgyud): ces glengs so// kye kye bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul bdag/ bde gshegs phyag rgya de lags na// rnal 'byor las dang rtog pa la// sku mdog phyag mtshan mi 'tshal lam// spyi dang so so'i bye brag ci// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po
226a4(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kI la yas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rnal 'byor las dang 'dir 'jug pa// sems spyod pa yi thabs 'di yin// dang po spyi yi dkyil 'khor gyis// kha dog dbyibs la brtan par bzung // kha dog dbyibs rnams 'di lta ste// khro bo d+hi chen
226a5(rnying rgyud): ra ni// dbu gsum phyag kyang drug pas// zhabs ni rnam pa bzhi ru bgrang // g.yas dkar g.yon sdo dbus sngo ba// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rje rten// bar ma gnyis ni mda' gzhu 'gengs// tha gnyis ri rab phrar bu 'dril// thod ska mthong rlon phreng bas brgyan//
226a6(rnying rgyud): stag dang glang chen sbrul gyis brgyad// kho mo g.yas na dril ba'o// khro bo rnam par rgyal bani// dbu gsum phyug kyang drug pas// g.yas sngog yon ljang dbus ma dkar// bar gnyis rdo rje 'khor lo'o// khro bo dbug pa sngon po ni// g.yas dkar g.yon par mar
226a7(rnying rgyud): s+ya te// dbus ma'i zhal ni sngol sra// bar gnyis dbyug pa me dpal bsdams// khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po ni// g.yas pa sngol sra ba ste// g.yon pa ldang la gnag pa'o// rtsa ba'i zhal ni nam sa 'a' 'ang// bar ma gnyis na bsdams pa ni// dkrug pa mi mgo ga/
226b1(rnying rgyud): stong // khrabo mag yo mgon pon// dbus sdang g.yas sngag yon sdug nag/ bar ma gnyis nang zhugs// khrab zan po nya mgrin na// g.yas dkar g.yon rdzong bus pa dmar// bar ma gnyis na pa thinags// khor gzhan gyis thubab// g.yas se ba
226b2(rnying rgyud): ljing dbus dmar smra// bar gnyis b+han+d+ha rnga yab bo// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ni// g.yas ser g.yon dud dbus ldang nag/ g.yas pa rdo rje chu gra ma la// g.yon pa rin chen dbyug pa'o// khro bo khams gsum rnam par tshul// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ser /
226b3(rnying rgyud): par gnyis 'khor lo mda' gzhu'o// khro bo chen po stobs chen ni// g.yas nag g.yon dmar dbus dud ka/ bar gnyis zhags pa thob thogs// khro bo'i rgyal po de dag kun// dang po tha ma kun kan// rdo rje b+har+d+ha phur par bshad// dur khrod gyen kyang de bzhin no// khro mo kun kyang yab
226b4(rnying rgyud): 'dra ste// g.yas kyi phyag na dril bu'o// skal pa lcam dral sku mdog ni// g.yas g.yon mdog las shes par bya// g.yas kyi dang po rang rtags la// g.yon gyi dang po de bzhin sbyin// badz+ra yaN+Di NI rdos pas// shar du gu shud mgo can de// gru mdog mthing nag
226b5(rnying rgyud): gas kyu bsnams// badz+ra b+hi ra be zhes pas// lho ru lce ka'i mgo can ni// sku mdog ser po zhags pa bsnams// badz+ra a mr-i ta zhes pa// nub tu srin bya'i mgo can ni// sku mdog dmar nag ljags sgrog bsnams// badz+ra mA ra NI zhes pa// byang du wa yi mgo can no//
226b6(rnying rgyud): sku mdog ldang nag dril bu bsdams// de ni spyi yi dkyil 'khor ro// so so'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni// so so'i kha dog rim pa ste// phyag mtshan la sogs spyi bzhin brtag/ re re la yang so so ste// kha dog phyag mtshon la sogs pa// nges pa med pa de rkyal bas
226b7(rnying rgyud): gsungs// bde gshegs bcom ldan gtso bo la// khro mo rnams kyis bskor ba ni// dkyil 'khor nyams dga' dam pa de'i// spu mdog rnams ni mthing nag ste// las kyi bye brag rnams kyis gsal// bde gshegs bcom ldan khrag bzu nga // bdag nyid chen mo
227a1(rnying rgyud): bzhi yis bskor// thod pa'i 'khor lo bzhi la gnas// ma las yongs bsgreng gzhan dang 'dra// dkyil 'khor de yi sku mdog rung // bcom ldan bde gshegs khrag 'thung la// lha mo bzhis bskor badra bzhi// su mdog so so'i bye bag ste// ku dang
227a2(rnying rgyud): shu dang co dang ni// ki las yongs sa bskyed pa'o// bcom ldan pade gshegs thag 'thung la// ci bgyis bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// pad gdan nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// phyogs kyi cha yis dgod par bya// dkar dang dmar dang ljang dang ser// kha dog de bzhin rab tu brtang //
227a3(rnying rgyud): nas gnas bzhi de bzhin no// bcom ldan bde gshegs khrag 'bung la// phra men tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// spyi yi dkyil 'khor dbye bas 'dral// nang dang kyil de bzhin dgod// tso'u rig ser mdog phra mo zangs// be ta ma zing nag go ri dkar// pug dmar ser b+ha sma lnga /
227a4(rnying rgyud): lhag mthing nag tsan+ti ser g+ha'o// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gnas par btag/ brtsed+he dkar pa b+ha dz+haiMH// srol dam la bran ljang // sre na per pa sgru ba yin// kang / dkar la rlung dmang ba// kA ka mthing nag chen moste// hU~M lung sa ral mer bya'o// ti gdong dkar ma ma
227a5(rnying rgyud): can// phag gdod nag mo'i tshul du snang // nyi zla ma ni dmar mo ste// thal byed ma ni ljang bu'o// so so'i phyag mtshan la sogs pa// mtshan nyid dag gi rnam pa'o// ming gis bskyed pa la sogs pa// ji ltar bkod pa bzhin du bya'o// bcom ldan bde gshegs khrag 'thung
227a6(rnying rgyud): la// shAn mubs bskor ba ni// dkyil 'khor ngam pa bri ba te// shin tu gru ba ning ldan pa la// thig ga ga ba papa li tshang ba// dbras bu khrag 'thang chen po te// shar nga g.yod byed seng ge'i mag/ lhor 'grags byed sdig mo ba mgo// nub tu byug byed wa yi mdo/
227a7(rnying rgyud): gyad du za byed sbyang mo'i mgo// dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ldang // rim par kha dog ldan par bshad// zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis pa ste// lcags kyu phur bur ldan pa'o// byang shar mtshams la sbyang bzhi ste// nub byang la yang de bzhin brtag/ lho nub mtshams la khyi
227b1(rnying rgyud): ga/ na smra/
227b2(rnying rgyud): ma
228a1(rnying rgyud): yum lnga 'byung lnga rnam dag pa'o// byang sems sa yi snying po ni// mig gi rnam shes dag pa'o// byang sems nam mapa'i snying po ni// rna ba'i rnam shes rnam dag pa'o// byang sems spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// sna yi rnam shes rnam dag pa'o// byang
228a2(rnying rgyud): sems phyag na rdo rje ni// lce yi rnam shes rnam dag pa'o// byang chub sems ma lA s+ye ni// mig gi yul rnams rnam dag pa'o// byang chub sems ma mA le ni// rna ba'i yul rnams rnam dag pa'o// byang chub sems ma g+ha rti ni// sA yi yul rnams rnam dag pa'o// byang chub
228a3(rnying rgyud): sems mnirta ni// lce yi yul rnams rnam dag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni// mig gi dbang po rnam dag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgribs la ni// rna ba'i dbang po rnam dag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun bzang ni// snga yi dbang po rnam dag pa'o//
228a4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal ni// lce yi dbang po rnam dag pa'o// byang chub sems ma d+hu pe ni// sngar 'das dus ni rnam dag pa'o// byang chub sems ma puSh+pe ni// da lta'i dus ni rnam dag pa'o// byang chub sems ma A lo ke// phyis 'byon dus ni rnam dag pa'o//
228a5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems mag nem// byon par rtog pa nam dag pa'o// sgo srung khro bo bzhi rnams ni// yan lag pa'i rnams rnam dag pa'o// sgo mtshan mo rta gdong ni// rtag par lba brnam dag pa'o// khro mo bag gdong zhags pa ni// mang bar lta brda ma dag pa'o// kho mo nyi zla lcags
228a6(rnying rgyud): ga ni// gnyis su lta ba rnam dag pa'o// khro bo thal byed dril bu ni// bdag tu lta ba rnam dag pa'o// bcom ldan thub pa drug rnams ni// 'gro drug rnam par dag pa'o// yid dang chos ni de dag ni// mtshan nyid spos med de nyid do// gdug pa 'dul ba khro bo'i sra//
228a7(rnying rgyud): bya khro nang nyid ma bcos pa'o// de yi rnam dag bshad bya ba// bcom ldan rdo rje gzhan nu ni// rnam shes tshogs brgyad rnam dag pa'o// khro bo chen po hrI kAr// 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'o// khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal// ngag 'khyal rnam par dag pa'o// khro ba dbyug
228a8(rnying rgyud): cha
228b1(rnying rgyud): pa sngon po ni// rdzun du sgrub rnam dag pa'o// khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po ni// srog gcod rnam par dag pa'o// khro bo mig yo mgon po ba// log lha rnam par dag pa'o// khro bochen po rta mgrin ni// phra ma rnam par dag pa'o// khro chen gzhan gyis mi thu ba ni// ma byin len
228b2(rnying rgyud): pa rnam dag pa'o// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ni// ngag rtsub rnam par dag pa'o// khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal ni// gnod sems rnam par dag pa'o// khro bo'i rgyal po stobs po che// brnab sems rnam par dag pa'o// de rnams kun gyi yum rnams ni// khro mo
228b3(rnying rgyud): rnams su dag pa'o// phra men bag gi mgo can ni// gnyid kyi dngos po rnam par dag pa'o// phra men rmig pu'i mgo can ni// gnyid kyi mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'o// phra men stag gi mgo can ni// sems dngos rnam par dag pa'o// phra men bya rgod mgo can ni// /
228b4(rnying rgyud): sems yul rnam par dag pa'o// phra men g.yag gi mgo can ni// gdul dngos rnam par dag pa'o// phra men bya rog mgo can ni// gdul yul rnam par dag pa'o// phra men sha ba'i mgo can ni// yid la byed pa rnam par dag pa'o// phra men thug pa'i mdo/
228b5(rnying rgyud): can ni// yid yul rnam par dag pa'o// phra men gzig gi mgo can ni// ting 'dzin rnam par dag pa'o// phra men gyi la'i mgo can ni// dad pa rnam par dag pa'o// phra men pu shud mgo can ni// dad yul rnam par dag pa'o// phra men srung ka'i mgo can ni
228b6(rnying rgyud): mos pa rnam par dag pa'o// phra men khra yi mgo can ni// mos yul rnam par dag pa'o// phra men seng ge'i mgo can ni// dran pa rnam par dag pa'o// phra men pha wang mgo can ni// dran yul rnam par dag pa'o// pra men dom gyi mgo can ni// byed pa rnam
228b7(rnying rgyud): par dag pa'o// phra men sre mo mgo can ni// byed yul rnam par dag pa'o// phra men bred kyi mgo zan ni// rig pa rnam par dag pa'o// phra men byi ba'i mgo can ni// rig yul rnam par dag pa'o// phra men pra shud mgo can ni// byams pa rnam par
229a1(rnying rgyud): dag pa'o// pra man skye ka'i mag can na// s+yAng rnga rnam par dag pa'o// phra la nasan bya'i ngagacan na/ dga' ba rnam par dag pa'o// phra mem khwa yi mgo cadz+nyAn// btang snyoms rnam par dag pa'o// bdag nyid dkyil yang dam pa na// 'adz+ra
229a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi rnam par dag pa'o// lha mo'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// mtsho bzhi rnam par dag pa'o// ci bgyi'i tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor ni// mchod rten rnam par dag pa'o// phra men dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// rnam shes tshogs brgyad yul rnams brgyad// de rnams rnam par dag par
229a3(rnying rgyud): da/ shA na mu pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// nyid lag rnam par dag pa'o// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi mdo las rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//
229a4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang karma te bukas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badz+ra kI la yal 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan gnyis me ga tse// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod la 'dud// brjod bral bdag nyid khyod la 'dud// rnam dag dang bzhin de lags na/
229a5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor blo ldan dam pa yis// sems bsdu thabs ni ji ltar lags// sems bzhag thabs ni ji lta bu// gzhal yas bye brag ji ltar lags// zhes glengs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badz+ra kI la yas 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon
229a6(rnying rgyud): cig karma he ru ka/ rnal 'byor don la yid ches te// sems bsdu'i thabs la rnam pa mang // sems can mos pa'i dbang du'o// dang po rang lus bder 'jug ste// mngal skyes nus skyes drim pa yang // drod skyes skyod skyes la gnas pa'i// ting 'dzin rim pa rdzogs
229a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rjes// gnyis med blo gzhan dun byas te// gzhal yas bye brag dran byab// 'byung ba las byung rdo rje'i gur// chos dbyings cis kyang mi tshugs rtags// de las me 'od 'bar ba ni// nyon mongs log/ lha ni gnas rtags// rnal 'gror ti 'dzin la gnas
229b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i// srung ba dam pa shin tu gces// gzhal yas gru bzhir byung ba ni/ tshad med bzhi rnams rnam dag rtags// sgo bzhi dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi// rnam par dag pa'i rtags yin no// rta babs yang dag spong ba bzhi// rnam par dag pa'i chags yin no//
229b2(rnying rgyud): phyed kyis brgyan pa ni// nyon mongs che chung rnam dag pa'o// ka ba brgyad kyis dbus brgyan pa// 'phags lam brgyad du rnam dag rtags// rin chen pha gu la sogs mtshan// tshul khrims rnam par drag pa'i rtags// 'dod pa'i lha mos brgyad pa na//
229b3(rnying rgyud): rnam dag rtags// so bzhir rgyal mtshan bzhin ma ni// rnam chog bdud las rgyal ba'i rtags// byar bzhir rgyal mtshan bzhi rnams ni// byi pe bdud las rgyal ba'i rtags// zhing gi blar bres pa ni// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med rtags// rdo rje sas
229b4(rnying rgyud): ba ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rtags// bum pa brgyad kyis brgyan pa ni// byang chub sems kyis brgyan pa'i rtags// dpag bsam shing gis brgyan pa ni// thugs rjes yongs la khyab pa'i rtags// de dgra shar Nas brgyan pa// byang chub sems dpas
229b5(rnying rgyud): bskor ba'i rtags// chos kyi 'khor los brgyan pa ni// so bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rtags// gdu gla dang 'phan gyis brgyan pa ni// sa la gnas pa'i byang sems kyis// so sor chos rnams ston pa'i rtags// rin
229b6(rnying rgyud): chen lnga las grub pa ni// nyon mongs ldarnams rnam dag cing // ye shes lnga las grub pa'i rtags// nang du thod pa'i gzhal yas 'ang // ba dang bdag 'dzin bral ba'i rtags// 'o bas bdun gzhal yas kyis brgyan pa// bya dka' sde tshogs mdzad pa'i rtags
229b7(rnying rgyud): de ltar gzhal yas nyer bzhag ste// phyi yi gzhal yas dgra pa'o// rang lus gzhal yas 'di ltar rtags// rkang pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// lte ba mtha' zad med dkyil 'khor// lto bachu yi dkyil 'khor te// ro stod sa yi dkyil 'khor ro// mgo bo re

230b1(rnying rgyud): pus nas// dus gsum sangs rgyas byang chub sems// mi 'gyur ba yi 'od ces bya'o// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i sems bsdus nas// slar yang rim gyis spel thim// hUM yang rim gyis thig le'i ngang // yongs su dag pa'i 'od ces bya'o// nges par snying po
230b2(rnying rgyud): bkod de// tsan ka yi 'bru tsam la// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku yang bskyed// shin tu don cing gsal bltas pa// dbug dbyung 'grogs nas g.yas nas spos// mtho gang mtho ji srid bar// byang chub sems ni de gzung bya// gal te nang du 'jug na yang /

230b7(rnying rgyud): gyur bye// de las gzhan du mi gso'o// de las rang bzhin med brtags te// gang pa dmigs pa med par 'gyur// 'di yang sems bsrus gzhag thabs yin// de las gdan pa'i bcwa bzhag ni// drang gis rab bskyod pa sar te// yin yongs su 'a
231a1(rnying rgyud): 'od// gapas 'byung chos su yongs su nas// de 'og sa g.yas phongs spyod la// skor gsum yongs zhu bde chen gnas// te sgros phyir 'gron phyogs bcur spos// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba byang chub sems// thams cadang thus te phreng skor byis/
231a2(rnying rgyud): a wa d+hU tI'i gnas nas byung // saM b+ho ka ru sems gzung bya// lus srungs mi rtog ye shes skye// ston pas de lung sgo zhes bya// de nas 'dug pa'i lam zhugs te// sprul ba'i gnas su bka' lung nos// yang dgas der sems bsdu bzhag/ gnyis med don
231a3(rnying rgyud): kyigyi lung thob 'gyur// de du me gnas dbus nas gshegs// chos su'i gnas su yang dag gnas// lus rnams rnam dag skye bar 'gyur// skyes nas bskal pa'i bar du gnas// chos kyi gnas su mi gnas na// ni swAN yi gnas su drangs// de ru sems bsdu gzhag par
231a4(rnying rgyud): bya// rnam tog med pa'i ye shes skye// 'byung bas bsreg cing 'jug pa'o// gnas su byang chub sems 'od la// rnal 'byor mig gi 'od zer gyis// g.yo med me 'gyur 'od la blta// de ltar yang dang yang du bya// sangs rgyas ye shes nam mkha' 'byung //
231a5(rnying rgyud): de yang nang gi thig le ste// sems bsdus bzhag pa'i thabs cig yin// de las gzhan pa'i sems bsdu ba// gsang ba'i thabs ni 'di yin te// shes rab ma yi mtshan brtag pa// sgra ni mthon mthing gyen du 'khyil// lus ni ring bu da gnyis spangs pa// mig
231a6(rnying rgyud): 'bras dkar nag phyed pa dang // lus lA dri zhim nad kyang nyung // rtsa lha mdzes shing ngang pa'i skad// mchog dang rab dang 'bying dang ba// ngi lnga dang 'og mtha' btag ste// sran matsam nyid zang po'i rlung // de la yang yang rol mo bya// lce yi rol mo bya ba yin// ga
231a7(rnying rgyud): dgu rtsa yang sen mo gdab// ma mchu so yis dud par bya// de nas gnyis med sbyor ba bya// sra dang drod dang gsher la bskyod// byang chub sems ni kun drangs nas// dga' dang mchog dga' rang bzhin dga'// thal ba'i dga' ba'i mtshan nyid can// snyoms
231b1(rnying rgyud): 'jug pho thang der zhugs nas// spyan drangs rlung gi lcags bya ste// bzung brdung gnyis bsdams pa'o// bskyod pa dus sbal lta bu'o// sems bzung thabs mkhas lcags bu ste// de ltar kyang sems rab gnas nas// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa 'byung // de yang sems
231b2(rnying rgyud): bsdus bzhag thabs so// don du gang la mos pa la// rab tu 'bad de yid gzhungs na// ye shes skye bar nges pa yin// ji ltar btag pa der snang bas// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog gyur par// dus gsum pa de gshegasarnams kyis gsungs// zhes gsungs so// rgyad kyi
231b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po'i yang rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi mdo las sems bsdus bzhag thabs kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas lang kam te kas/ bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badz+ra
231b4(rnying rgyud): pa la la 'di skad sa gsol to// kye rtse bcom ldan 'byung gnas ga// thams cad pa khyen pa'i gtso byung ba// thabs pa khas mi lus padag tid ca// rngogs nyid sbed pa bdag dra da mas// sesas bcu zhag thabs de lags // dpe 'bras bu ltar pags/
231b5(rnying rgyud): nadu shA babyung pa pa das/ da la sa du sabyad pa ma pa lam
231b6(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i chos 'di la// gang ltar btags pa der snang ste// dmigs med yid la dran byas na// 'bras bu khams gsums dgu non// lam gnyis mngon du gyur pa'o// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i mngon tags ni// 'gro nyal 'dug sdod kyi brtags kyang // gzhan la
231b7(rnying rgyud): sems ni 'phros pa min// 'bras byas ni dang po non// mthong ba'i lam ni mngod gyur pa'o// de las yongs su btas byur na// tag dang chad pa'i sgon rnams kyis// rnal 'byor pa la gos pa med// 'bras bus ni gnyis pa ste// dri ma med pa'i ye shes so// de la
232a1(rnying rgyud): yang dang yang du// yongs su da par gyur par// mas nyid la gnas gzhan na med// khams gsum sems can gdung bas zin// yongs su rtogs pa'i ye shas ta// 'bras bus gsum bgrod pa // dra nas yongs su gyung pa na// grA
232a2(rnying rgyud): tu gsal ba'i sems de la// gzhan du mi 'gyur ldan ner gnas// 'dzin pa med pa'i ye shes te// 'bras bus bzhi pagrod pa'o// de la yongs su gsal gyur na// rtsal la sdig rgya lta bung mthong // gang la'ang shes pa yongs mi 'jug/ tha dad med pa'i la sa
232a3(rnying rgyud): ha~M// 'bras byas lnga bgrod pa'o// de las ljongs sgra rgyas gyung na// nang gi shes pa shin tu gas la// la yul 'du bar mdzang // shes rab 'angon gyung la shesaH// 'bras byas drug bgrod pa'o// de las yongs su 'phel bAn// shes pa yongs pa
232a4(rnying rgyud): gsal ba dang // 'bras bu la gnas rgyu med pa'o// gyi yul srin bu me khyer mthong // tha dad med pa'i ye shes te// 'bras bus bdun bgrod pa'o// de las yongs su 'phel gyur na// 'di las lhag pa'i ye shes med// 'di las bgrod gnas ga la yong
232a5(rnying rgyud): nang gi shes pa de ltar gsal// phyi yul srin bu me khyed mthong // mi skye'i chos la bzod pa yi// ye shes zhes ni de la bya// 'bras bya sa brgyad bgrod pa'o// de las yongs su rgyas gyur na// chos nyid ma bcos nyid la gnas// 'khyags rtogs sdug
232a6(rnying rgyud): bsngal mi brdud pa// de'i nyes pas gos ma 'gyur// ts+yai phyi yul gyi rnam pa la// sprin med nam ma khalA wA k+te// dri med rnam dag ye shes la// 'bras bus dgu bskrad pa'o// brgyad pa dang ni dgu pa las// zhi ba phyogs gcig lung bsring /
232a7(rnying rgyud): chu ba sems kyi bar chad rkyen// dus deng 'bad pa drag tu brtson// de las yongs su rgyas gyung na// mi ldog shes pa phyogs su skye// phyi rol me tog kun 'dra// yongs su gtong ba'i ye shes te// 'bras bus bcu brjod pa'o// sa bcung gnas
232b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus nyid tu// tshogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad kyis// rdzang chub sems kyis dbang bskur te// dbang ngas gas bya'ib pa bcos// 'bras thal thar byin dbang shes bya// de nyid zhi bcug cig 'od// mdung dang ral gri gdug pa'i mtshan// sbrang bus
232b2(rnying rgyud): lata// / kyi dang drir b+ha kang ka yis// zos sam gtses kyang tshor yi 'gyur// rnga dang rnga bo ched ga dang // dzar 'brug rgya chen po dang // dung dang rbalang la sogs pa'i// bla rnams yongs su balpags gyur kyang // de 'i nying 'dzin yongs mi 'phrog/ 'di ltar snang ba
232b3(rnying rgyud): dngos po la// skad cig gcig la mngon sangs rgyas// rnam par sbyang mdzadas la gnas// phyi nang thams cad chos nyid la// de las sems can dgos 'dod 'byung // rin chen 'byung ldan sa la gnas// de la brjod pa yongs mi 'byung // gang zhig dir las
232b4(rnying rgyud): dpog mi 'gyur// snang ba mtha' yas sa la gnas// chos nyid brjod med don rnams grub// thams cad de yi rgyan du che// don yod grub pa'i sa la gnas// brjod med brjod bral la gnas shing // de la gang gis mi bstod pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas//
232b5(rnying rgyud): la gnas pa'i ngang nyid la// brjod med brjod bral ngo bo nyid// gang la 'di zhes bya bar ni// yod pa ma yin de nyid do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid// thams cad ma lus de yi dang // rdzogs pa'i rdzogs pa mthar phyin pa'i// bsgom pa'i lam las phongs gsal
232b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i// bar chad med pa'i lam la gnas// 'bras bu mthar phyin lam la gnas// ma bcos sa rnams nges par thob// spyod pa'i tshul ni 'di lta ste// ting 'dzin la ni gnas pa'i dus// tshogs kyi lam gyi zhabs su ni// bzhi gsum bcu gnyis dran par bya'o//
232b7(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba'i lam du gnas dus su// dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga rnams// mi brjed yid la dran par bya// mthong ba'i lam la gnas pa dang // bsgom pa'i lam la gnas par du// chos ni bco brgyad dran par bya// sbyin pa la sogs pha rol gyin// bcu la yongs
233a1(rnying rgyud): su 'bad par bya// sbyor ba'i lam pa man chad kyi// ting nge 'dzin ni rgyun du byas// mthong ba'i lam pa man chad kyi// rgyan la sogs pa dngos su bya'o// de la spyod pa gnyis yod de// sbas pa dang ni skyon thabs so// sbas pa'i spyod pa rab
233a2(rnying rgyud): spong na// kha na ma tho spang bar 'gyur// spros pa'i spyod pas raba'ab dan// ting 'dzin yongs su nyams pa der 'gyur// de lta'i spyod pa gnyis la gnas// mkha' 'gro ma yis bde ba rtul// yongs su rdzogs pa'i sems gnas pa'i// de che che 'phos 'chi
233a3(rnying rgyud): no// rang gi sems ni 'di ltar brtag/ gdod nas sre med byang grub sems// de las byung ba'i yi ge aH// 'od zer lnga mes lakhrigs pa'o// snyig sum lnga nyid lus brtag ste// dngas mchen por rab brtags pa// ye shes rtal zhon gnas par// rtag tu
233a4(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid gsal bar bya// de las srid pa'i bar mdo// stobs kyi rta zhon de la gnas// de tshe ting 'dzin lhag par gsal// ye shes stobs su gyur nas ni// skye ba med la gnas pa ste// phung po lhag med mngon sangs rgyas// 'on te skye ba blangs nas ni//
233a5(rnying rgyud): ma'i las 'gro rjes dran nas// gang la spangs pa der gnas par// bar chad med pa'i lam zhes za// de lus la brten rab 'bad na// skye ba gcig la mngon sangs rgyas// phung po lhag ma med ces bya// gal te las kyi dbang brtson nas// skye ba gnyis thogs par
233a6(rnying rgyud): chad na// phung po lhag ma med ces bya// 'di ltar 'da' ga ma yi sems// rab tu' bad de nyams su zangs// gal te de la ma bdan// bsags pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur// 'da' ka ma yi sems yod na// ma bsags 'bras bu nges par skye// zhes gsung
233a7(rnying rgyud): so// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyigasang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kI la yab cu gnyis kyi mdo las la mal bgrod tshul kye le'u ske bco brgyad pa'o// de nas yang karma nye rugs/ bcom ldan 'das dpal lag
233b1(rnying rgyud): 'thung gi rgyal po badz+ra kI la yal 'di skad ces gsol to// kye sde bcom ldan sngags kyi bdag/ sngags 'di dang por ji ltar byung // sngags bsdu ba ni ji ltar lags// sngags kyi ming ni ji ltar lags// zhes glengs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas
233b2(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ dang po ye nas rnam dag las// da dang bdag tu brtag pa'i dbang // 'khor ba'i gzugs su brtag pa las// de lus yi ge a la brten// a las yi ge sde dang bcas// thabs dang shes rab yi ge byung //
233b3(rnying rgyud): de la yi ge a zhes bya// yi ge'i tshogs la sde tshan dgu// s+tha yi yi ges yongs su brgyan// de ni ming gi tshogs zhes bya// A li la sogs sde tshan gyis// ka la sgrogs pa'i sdel brgyan// de ni tshig gi tshogs zhes bya// de las sngags kyi tshogs rnams 'byung
233b4(rnying rgyud): dang po gaN+DI ga la dgu dbus bzhag/ gnyis pa yis na 'go nas brgyan// bcu gsum pa yis steng nas bkod// de steng bco lnga pa yis brtsan// gti mug yin par rgyal bas gsungs// de 'og lnga pa'i gsum pa bzhag/ de 'og gnyis pa'i gsum pa la/
233b5(rnying rgyud): drug pa'i gnyis pas 'gonas brgyan// de dog dang po'i dang po bzhag/ dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas bcaH// de 'og drug pa'i gsum pa sbyin// dbyangs kyi bzhi pas steng nas 'tshan// da dog dang po'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas ltung nas brgyan/
233b6(rnying rgyud): de 'og drug pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi bzhi pas steng nas brgyan// de 'og drug pa'i gsum pa byin// de 'og drug pa'i dang po sbyin// gang ming bsgral ba der bcug nas// de dog lnga pa'i tha ma sbyin// de 'og drug pa'i gnyis pa bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i dang
233b7(rnying rgyud): po ste// hUM phaT mtha' du bzhag pa ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi gsod pa'i sngags// sngags ming bslab pa'i sngags zhes bya// dang po rnam par snang mdzad bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i dang po ste// de rjes drug pa'i gsum pa'o// stong pa yis ni rnam par brgyan// de
233b8(rnying rgyud): sngags pa du 'di la dbyung ba mang yang sor bzhag byas//
234a1(rnying rgyud): 'og hU~MhUM dang lam gnyis te// de 'og bdun pa'i tha ma la// bzhi pa'i dang pos rnam par brgyan// de nas lnga pa'i tha ma sbyin// de rjes lnga pa'i gsum pa'o// de 'og gsum pa'i tha ma bzhag/ de la dbyangs kyi gsum pas brgyan// sngags de gzir ba'i
234a2(rnying rgyud): yin no// de rjes lnga pa'i tha ma la// dbyangs kyis bcu gsum pa yis brgyan// rdo rjes brgyad pa'i mtha' lhag go// de 'og dang po'i gsum pa la// de rjes drug pa'i dang po ste// de 'og lnga pa'i bzhi pa bzhag/ de 'og dang po'i gsum pa'o// de rjes lnga pa'i gsum pa'i/
234a3(rnying rgyud): de la bzhi pa'i tha ma sbyin// de rjes bdun pa'i tha ma la// drug pa'i gnyis pas 'og nas brgyan// dbyangs kyi bzhi pas brgyan byas te// de 'og dang po'i dang po la// drug pa'i gnyis pas yongs su spras// dbyangs kyi gsum pas de la brgyad// de 'og lnga pa'i bzhi pa blangs/
234a4(rnying rgyud): de la dbyangs kyi bzhi pas brgyan// de 'og dang po'i dang po bzhag/ 'og tu ldan steng du gsum// mi shigs snying po brjod pa las// de 'og hUM dang dang po ste// de 'og drug pa'i gnyis pa bzhag/ hUM dang phaT gnyis rab brjod pas// yon tan kun dang ldan pa'i sngags/
234a5(rnying rgyud): dang po gti mug rigs yin te// de 'og mi shigs snying por brjod// de 'og dang po'i dang po bzhag/ dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de 'og drug pa'i gsum pa bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i dang po bzhag/ de dag bskul ba'i ming dang bcas// de 'og gnyis pa'i
234a6(rnying rgyud): gsum pa bzhag/ de rjes hU~M dang ri dang ho// sngags ming dgug cing 'ching ba'i sngags// dang po rnam par snang mdzad de// de 'og thams cad snying po brjod// de 'og lnga pa'i gsum pa la// brtsad pa'i mtha' ltag gis brgyan pa// de 'og dang po'i gsum pa skyed//
234a7(rnying rgyud): dbyangs kyi gsum pa steng du bkod// de 'og bzhi pa'i lnga pa la// gsum pa'i lnga pade la sbyin// de 'og dang po'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de rjes drug pa'i gsum pa bzhag/ de rjes drug pa'i dang po'o// ni gnyis phaT kyi po brjod pas
234b1(rnying rgyud): sngags ming zil gyis gnon pa'i sngags// me shik+sha snying po brjod pa las// de 'og brgyad pa'i tha ltag ste// de la dbyangs kyi drug pas brgyan// stong bas steng nas mdzes par byas// de 'og dang pa'i dang ba bdag/ da'og drug pa'i gnyis pa bzhag/ ba nag dbyungs
234b2(rnying rgyud): dang po za// dang po gti mug rigs yin no// sngags ming tshe lung zhes bya'o// dang po lnga pa'i dang po bzhag/ de rjes drug pa'i gnyis pa'o// de nas lnga pa'i gsum pa la// brgyad pa'i tha lhag pa yis brgyan// de 'og bzhi pa'i gsum pa bzhag/ de rjes bzhi pa'i
234b3(rnying rgyud): pa la// gsum pa'i lnga pa de la sbyin// sngags ming bcom ldan 'das kyis bsad// dang po gnyis pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi gsum ngas rnam par brgyan// de la gsum pa'i lnga pa sbyin// de 'og gsum pa'i gsum pa'o// tsheg drag dang bcas nyis 'gyur la//
234b4(rnying rgyud): na nasu sa sa sa masan
234b5(rnying rgyud): snying po hUM phaT mtha'// sngags med rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags// dang po'i dang po bzhi pa la// thug pa'i gnyis pas 'og nas spras// dbyangs kyi bzhi pas steng nas brgyan// cho ga drag dang bcas gsum pa'i lnga// nyis 'gyur mi shigs snying po can// hUM phaHmtha' can
234b6(rnying rgyud): drag bcas// sngags ming rta mgrin las kyi sngags// dang po brgyad pa'i tha lhag bzhag/ de rjes cho ga drag gsum pa'i lnga// nyis 'gyur badz+ra hUM phaT mtha'// sngags med gzhan gyis mi thub sngag/ dang po lnga pa'i gsum pa la/ brgyad pa'i tha lhag 'og nas brgyan//
234b7(rnying rgyud): la lnga pa'i lnga pa sbyin// de 'og gsum pa'i bzhi pa'o// tsheg drag dang bcas nyis 'gyur la// mi shigs pa yi snying po can// chog drag dang bcas hUM phaT mtha'// sngags ming mi g.yo mgon po'i las// dang po brjod mi dgor ma bzhin// de rjes bzhi pa'i dang po la/
235a1(rnying rgyud): la gsum pa'i bzhi pas brgyan// de 'og drug pa'i dang po bzhag/ de rjes gsum pa'i gnyis pa'o// cog drug dang bcas nyis 'gyur la// de 'og mi shigs snying po can// b+hulaT mtha' du cog drag bcas// sngags ming stobs chen las rgya
235a2(rnying rgyud): sngags// dang po brgyad pa'i tha lhag bzhag/ de 'og bdun pa'i tha ma'o// de 'og drug pa'i dang po bzhag/ de rjes drug pa'i gnyis pa'o// de 'og brgyad pa'i tha ltag la// drug pa'i gnyis pas 'og nas spras// dbyangs hUM bzhi pas steng nas bca
235a3(rnying rgyud): rjes gsum pa'i gsum pa la// de la bzhi pa'i lnga pa sbyin// hU~M phaT mtha' du bzhag pa ni// sngags ming 'bru 'phrog sngags yin no// dang po bdun pa'i dang po bzhag/ drug pa'i gnyis pas 'og nas sbas// steng du dbyangs kyi gsum bya'o// de 'og dang po'i dang pyong /
235a4(rnying rgyud): drug pa'i gnyis pas rnam par brgyan// de ster dbyangs kyis bzhi pas brgyan// de 'og dbyangs kyi gnyis pa bzhag/ de 'og gsum pa'i tha la bzhag/ de rjes drug pa'i dang po ste// hU~M phaT mtha' ru bzhag pa ni// sngags ming bcings pa'i sngags zhes bya'o// dang po
235a5(rnying rgyud): sa sa // ma ga sa/ ga sa
235a6(rnying rgyud): dang po rnam pa snang mdzad de// de 'og bcu pa dgu dbus bzhag/ de rjes lnga pa'i bzhi pa bzhag/ dbyangs kyi bcu gcig pa yis babyan// de 'og bdun pa'i gnyis pa bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i dang po'o// cho ga drag dang bcas nyis 'gyur la// hUM phaT mthu 'du bzhag pan
235a7(rnying rgyud): ga ba kyi dam ba'i phre rtsigs byi / dag zhing dzin sang // cig sa kyis byung // sa sang gas du
235b1(rnying rgyud): phung po'o// dang po brgyad pa'i tha lhag bzhag/ de rjes chog drag gsum pa'i wa// nyis 'gyur badz+ra hU~M phaT mtha'// sngags ming gzhan gyis mi thub las// dang po bzhi pa'i gsum pa bzhag/ de rjes chog drag brgyad tha ltag/ mi 'gyur mi shigs snying po can// hU~M3
235b2(rnying rgyud): mtha' ru bzhag pa ni// sngags ming dbyug pa sngon po'i las// dang po lnga pa'i dang po bzhag/ gnyis pa'i dang po tsheg drag bcas// mi 'gyur stong pa'i snying po can// hU~M phaT mtha' ru bzhag pa ni// sngags ming gshin rje'i las kyi sngags// dang po lnga pa'i lnga pa bzhi
235b3(rnying rgyud): de rjes gsum pa'i dang po ste// tsheg drag dang bcas nyis 'gyur la// mi shigs snying po hU~M gi mtha'// sngags ming bdag nyid las kyi sngags// dang po gnyis pa'i gsum pa'o// drug pa'i bzhi pas 'og nas brgyan// de rjes drug pa'i gsum pa bzhag/ tsheg drag
235b4(rnying rgyud): dang bcas nyis 'gyur la// mI shigs snying po hU~M phaT mtha'// sngags ming shwa na nu kha'i las// dang po bdun pa'i tha ma la// dbyangs kyi lnga pas rnam par brgyan// de 'og drug pa'i gnyis pa la// dbyangs kyi drug pas bstan pa ste// thog dag dang bcas
235b5(rnying rgyud): nyis 'gyur la// mi shigs snying po hUM phaT mtha'// sngags ming mche ba can gyi las// dang po lnga pa'i lnga pa la// dbyangs kyi lnga pas rnam par brgyan// de rjes drug pa'i gnyis pa la// dbyangs kyi drug pa shin tu mdzes// tsheg drag dang bcas nyis 'gyur la/
235b6(rnying rgyud): mi shigs snying po hU~M phaT mtha'// sngags ming gshog pa can gyi las// dang po'i dang po dang por bzhag/ de rjes bzhi pa'i dang po la// de 'og dang po'i dang po yin// de 'og drug pa'i dang po la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yis brgyan// de 'og lnga pa'i bzhi pa la/
235b7(rnying rgyud): dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de rjes gnyis pa'i bzhi pa la// de'i gdug pa'i dang po'o// de 'og dbyangs kyi dang po bzhag/ de 'og gnyis pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de la bzhi pa'i lnga bgyin// de dag bzhi pa'i
236a1(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi bcu gcig pa las brgyan// de 'og dbyangs kyi dang po bzhag/ de 'og lnga pa'i dang po bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i gnyis pa bdang // de 'og gnyis pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi bcu gcig pa yis brtan// de
236a2(rnying rgyud): 'og bzhi pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi bcu gnyis pa yis brgyan// de 'og lnga ba'i lnga pa bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i gnyis pa bzhag/ de 'og bdun pa'i tha ma bzhag/ de rjes bzhi pa'i lnga pa bzhag/ de rjes lnga pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi lnga pas 'og nas spras// de
236a3(rnying rgyud): 'og lnga pa'i lnga pa bzhag/ drug pa'i gnyis pa de la sbyin// de rjes drug pa'i gnyis pa la// bzhi pa'i dang pos 'og nas bcan// de 'og bzhi pa'i lta ba ste// de 'og drug pa'i dang po bzhag/ hU~M ngaT mtha' du bzhag pa ni// sngags ming lha mo bzhi yi sngags// dang po
236a4(rnying rgyud): hUM bzhag ma gnyis bzhag/ de rjes lnga pa'i dang po bzhag/ de 'og bdun pa'i gnyis pa la// dbyangs kyi gnyis pas steng nas brgyan// de 'og dang po'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi lnga pas 'og nas sbas// de 'og drug pa'i gnyis pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs kyi lnga pas brgyan// /
236a5(rnying rgyud): de 'og bdun pa'i gsum pa la// de la bzhi pa'i dang pos brgyan// de la lnga pa'i lnga pa sbyin// de 'og lnga pa'i gnyis pa bzhag/ de 'og dang po'i dang po ste// de rjes drug pa'i gnyis pa la// dbyangs kyi bcu gcig pa yis brgyadan// de 'og dbyangs kyi gsum pa bzhag/ de 'og
236a6(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa'i bzhi pa la// gsum pa'i lnga ba de la sbyin// de rjes bzhi pa'i dang po la// drug pa'i gnyis pa de la sbyin// dbyangs kyi bcu gnyis pa yis brdzun// de 'og ma gnyis chog drag bcas// de 'og dang po'i dang po la// drug pa'i gnyis pa de la sbyin// de 'og lnga pa'i lnga pa bzhag
236a7(rnying rgyud): de rjes bdun pa'i gnyis pa la// drug pa'i gnyis pas 'og nas sbas// dbyangs kyi bzhi pas steng nas brgyan// de 'og dang po'i dang po la// dang po'i lnga pa sted du bkod// de 'og dang po'i dang po bzhag/ de rjes drug pa'i gnyis pa la// dbyangs kyi bcu gcig pa yis brtan// cho ga drag
236b1(rnying rgyud): dang bcas swA hA'i mtha'// sngags ming thub pa'i sngags yin no// dang po thams cad snying po bzhag/ de rjes dbyangs kyi dang po'o// de 'og gsum pa'i lnga pa ste// de rjes drug pa'i dang po'o// de 'og mi shigs snying po can// chog drag dang bcas hU~M phaT mtha'// gti mug rigs
236b2(rnying rgyud): kyi dang po ste// sngags ming hUM chen las kyi sngagapa// dang po bzhi pa'i dang po bzhag/ de la gsum pa'i gsum pa sbyin// de rjes drug pa'i dang po bzhag/ de 'og bzhi pa'i gnyis pa'o// cho ga drag dang bcas hUM phaT mtha'// sngags ming rdzu 'phrul dbrog pa'i sngags// dang
236b3(rnying rgyud): po rnam par snang mdzad de// pu ru nyis 'gyur yu tsun// de rjes dang po'i dang po la// drug pa'i gnyis pas 'ogra nas sbas// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis brgyan// de 'og bzhi pa'i dang po bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i dang po bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i dang pa la// chog drag dang
236b4(rnying rgyud): bcam hU~M phaT mtha'// sngags ming seng ldeng phrar pa'i sngags// dang po gti mug rig yin no// de rjes bzhi pa'i gnyis pa bzhag/ de 'og gsum pa'i gnyis pa bzhag/ de 'og gsum pa'i dang po ste// de la bzhi pa'i gsum pa sbyin/ de 'og bzhi pa'i lnga pa la// de la
236b5(rnying rgyud): gsum pa'i lnga pa bzhag/ de 'og dang po'i bzhi pa la// drug pa'i gnyis pas 'og nas zhes// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis brgyan// de rjes gsum pa'i dang po bzhag/ cho ga drag dang bcas hUM phaT mtha'// sngags ming rma shing phur ba'i sngags// dang por rnam par
236b6(rnying rgyud): snang mdzad de// de rjes bdun pa'i gsum pa bzhag/ de 'og lnga pa'i lnga pa la// de la bzhi pa'i lnga pa sbyin// de 'og gsum pa'i dang po bzhag/ de rjes lnga pa'i bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de sted bdun pa'i gnyis pa la// dbyangs kyi lha
236b7(rnying rgyud): pas 'og nas brgyan// bzhi pa'i gsum pas de la sbyin// de 'og bzhi pa'i bzhi pa la// / dbyangs kyi bcu gcig pa yis brgyan// de rjes dbyangs kyi dang po bzhag/ de 'og lnga pa'i bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// rdo rjes bdun pa'i gnyis pa la/
237a1(rnying rgyud): dbyangs lag ldabs 'os nas smras// de la bzhi pa'i gsum pasten// de'og drug pa'i dang po bzhag/ da'ag lnga pa'i bzhi pa la// dbyung ba'i ga gsum pas snyed nam brgyan// dngas pa pa'i bzhi ba la// da'og drug pa'i ban pa bzhag/ dgazus
237a2(rnying rgyud): nyis 'gyur hUM phaT mtha'// chog drug dang ba cam mchog phur las// dang po rnam par sdang mdzad de// de rjes mi shika snying po'o// de 'ogang dablangs kyi dang po ste// de rjes dang po'i gsum pa la// brgyad pa'i tha lhag gis brgyan nas// dbyangs kyi lnga pa jog nas brgyan// do'o
237a3(rnying rgyud): bdun pa'i gnyis pa la// btung ba'i tha lhag 'og nas brgyan// chog drag dang bcas tshwardza las// dang po gti mug gis yin te// dang 'i gi pra snying po tsan// de tha~Mng drug pa'i gnyis pa la// lnga ba'i gsul ba yis brgyan te// de 'og sum pa'i nga dag su
237a4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur brjod pa'i rjes// lnga pa'i bzhi pa gzhag par bya// 'og nas drug pa'i dang pos brgyan// tsheg drag dang bcas hU~M na mtha'// sngags mi phyer lung las kyi sngags// dang po gti mug rigs yin te// de rjes mi shig nga snying po can// de 'og dang po'i dang po la// drug pa'i gti
237a5(rnying rgyud): pa de la sbyin// de 'og lnga pa'i lnga pa bzha// de 'og dang po'i dang po la// phyag pa'i gnyis pa de la rdzin// de 'og lnga pa'i lnga pa bzhag/ de dog dang po'i dang po pa// drug pa'i gnyis pas 'og nas brdzun// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum steng nas bkod// de 'og bzhi pa'i dpa
237a6(rnying rgyud): bzhag// hU~M gnyis phaT gnyis swA hA mtha'// cho ga drag dang bcas 'bigs pa'i sngags// dang po gti mug rigs yin te// de rjes mi shigs snying po can// de rje ba bdun pa'i gsum pa la// drug pa'i thams 'og tu spras// de rje ma bzhi pa'i dang po bzhag/ de ces btun
237a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i gsum pa bzhag/ de 'og lnga pa'i lnga pa bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i dang po'i// hUM dang chog drag bcas pa ni// sngags ming dam tshig mi 'da'a'o// dang po rnam par snang mdzad de// de 'og me shigs snying po can// de 'og dang po'i dang po la// 'og tu dang ldan steng dbyangs
237b1(rnying rgyud): gsum// de 'og bzhi pa'i dang ngo bzhag/ kun nyis 'gyur dag gnyis// btsa gnyis dang ban ta gnyis// dzin d+ha gnyis dang rnan gnyis// rtsi gnyis paT gnyis brjod pa ni// sngags ming bka' tan thags yin no// dang po rnam par ldang ba dza dang // na 'gas shegs snying po cam/
237b2(rnying rgyud): rjes dang po'i dang po la// drug pa'i gnyis pas 'og nas spras// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum sbed nas bkod// de 'og gsum pa'i dang po bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i dang po la// dang po'i gsum pa de la sbyin// de rjes bdun pa'i gnyis pa bzhag/ kha gnyis ha gnyis hUM yang gnyis//
237b3(rnying rgyud): chog drag dang bcas phaT gnyis brjod// sngags ming snying khrag drang ba'i sngags// dang po rjod byed gong ma sbyin// de 'og mi shigs snying po can// de rjes dang po'i dang po la// drug pa'i gnyis pas 'og nas sbas// steng du dbyangs kyi bcu gsum bkod// de 'og bzhi pa'i
237b4(rnying rgyud): dang po bzhag/ de rjes lnga pa'i lnga pa bzhag/ de 'og mthar gnas tha lcag bzhag/ de 'og lnga pa'i dang po ste// de rjes drug pa'i gsum pa bzhag/ ha na gnyis dang da tu gnyis// sngags ming bka' nyan sngags yin no// dang po rnam par snang mdzad de// de 'og mi
237b5(rnying rgyud): shigs snying po can// de rjes dang po'i dang po la// drug pa'i gnyis pas 'og nas spras// de la dbyangs kyi bcu gsum steng du bkod// de 'og gsum pa'i dang po bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i dang po la// pa co gnyis brjod rje sa thog la// lnga pa'i bzhi par dbyangs gsum brgyan//
237b6(rnying rgyud): de 'og bzhi pa'i dang po la// drug pa'i bzhi pas 'og nas spram// de la bzhi pa'i lnga pa sbyin// de rjes gsum pa'i gsum pa ste// de rjes lnga pa'i lnga pa bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i dang po'o// de rjes gnyis pa'i bzhi pa bzhag/ de 'og gsum pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas
237b7(rnying rgyud): steng nam brgyan// de rjes drug pa'i gsum pa la// lnga pa'i lnga ba de la sbyin// de 'og la pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis brgyan// de 'og bzhi pa'i bzhi pa bzhag/ de rjes drug pa'i gnyis pa bzhag/ de 'og gsum pa'i lnga pa bzhag/ de 'og dbyangs kyi drug

238a2(rnying rgyud): lnga pa bzhag/ de 'og dbyangs kyi drug pa bzhag/ de rjes gnyis pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi lnga pas de la brgyan// de 'og bdun pa'i gsum pa la// lnga pa'i lnga pa de la sbyin// de rjes dang po'i dang po la// drug pa'i gnyis pas 'og nas spras// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa
238a3(rnying rgyud): yis brgyan// de 'og bzhi pa'i dang po bzhag/ de rjes drug pa'i dang po'o// tsheg drag dang bcas hU~M phaT mtha'// sngags ming brtan cing sgrub pa'i sngags// dang po rnam par snang mdzad de// de rjes mi shigs snying po brjod// de 'og dang po'i dang po pa// dbyangs kyi ga
238a4(rnying rgyud): pas steng nas brgyan// de rjes drug pa'i gsum tha bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i dang po ste// kha tha ma gsum dang hUM gsum ste// cho ga drag dang bcas phaT gsum brjod// sngags ming brdung ba'i sngags yin no// dang po drug pa'i gnyis pa la// lnga pa'i lnga pa skyed du bkod// de
238a5(rnying rgyud): sa gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// drug pa'i bzhi pas 'og nas smras/ de rjes drug pa'i gsum pa bzhag/ nyis 'gyur brjod pa'i rjes thog la// bdun pa yis ni gsum pa la// lnga pa'i dang pos brgyan par bya// de 'og zug pa'i gnyis pa la// de rjes bzhi pa'i lnga pa
238a6(rnying rgyud): ste// hU~M phaT+Ta mtha' du bzhag pa ni// sngags ming me sbyar sngags yin no// dang po rjod byed dang po ste// de rjes mi shigs snying po can// de rjes bdun pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi lnga pas 'og nas smas// de 'og lnga pa'i lnga pa la// dbyangs kyi bcu gcig pa yis brgya
238a7(rnying rgyud): de rjes bzhi pa'i dang po la// 'og tur ldan dbyangs kyi lnga// steng du dang po'i lngapas brgyan// de 'og hU~M dang sa dang ma// ya dang s+t+waM zhes brjod pa ni// sngags ming mnan cing gzer ba'i sngags// dzaHdang hU~M dang de dang to// de rjes dbyangs kyi bcu gcig bzhag/
238b1(rnying rgyud): rjes mthar gnas tha ltag la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de rjes lbu pa'i bzhi pa'o// de rjes dang po'i gsum pa bzhag/ de 'og lnga pa'i gsum pa la// bzhi pa'i rdza ba de la sbyin// de dag lnga pa'i bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas sta
238b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rjes bzhi pa'i dang po bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i gnyis pas brgyan// de 'og gnyis pa'i dang po ste// de'ogazug pa'i gnyis pa'o// de 'og drug pa'i dang po bzhag/ de 'og dang po'i dang po la// bdun pa'i gnyis pasna 'og nas phreng // de ngog ye shig
238b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis bu lu gnyis ldan hU~M// sngags med las kyis spyan drangs sngags// dang po brjod med gong ma ste// de 'og lta pa'i dang po la// thug pa'i gnyis pas 'og nas sbas// de rjes bzhi pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi bzhi pas skyeng nas brgyan// de 'og gnyis pa'i
238b4(rnying rgyud): po bzhag/ rdo rjes dang ldan pa ni// sngags ming dbul ba'i sngags yi naH// dang po gti phyag rigs yin te// de 'ag bdun pa'i gsum pa bzhag/ de rjes lnga pa'i lha ba bzhag// de 'og drug pa'i dang po'o// de 'og dbyings kyi dang pa hA/ sa pa'i rnab pa
238b5(rnying rgyud): 'og tu dang ldan dbyings yig gsum// 'jog bzhi pa'i bzhi pa bzhag/ de rjes dbyangs kyi dang po'o// drug pa'i gnyis pa dang po'i gsum// de la lnga pa'i lnga pasbyin// de 'og lnga pa'i dang po la// drug pa'i gnyis pas 'oganas smras// de 'og bzhi pa'i dang po la// da
238b6(rnying rgyud): gyi bzhi pa sa snying nas brgyad// de 'og gnyis pa'i dang po bzhag/ hU~M dang swAhA mtha' ldan pa// sngags ming zhal du gsol pa'i sngags// dang po rnam par snang mdzad de// de rjes bzhi pa'i lnga pa bzhag// de 'og lnga pa'i lta ba la// dbyangs kyim rtsa gsum pa yis bcad/
238b7(rnying rgyud): de 'og lnga pa'o gsum pa bzhag/ de rjes dang po'i gsum pa de// de 'og lnga pa'i gsum pa la// dang po'i gsum pa de la sbyin// de rjes bzhi pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi bcu gcig pa yis bcan// de 'og bdun pa
239a1(rnying rgyud): bsrings 'oganas smras// de rjes bdun pa'i// nyis pa la// bzhi pa'i rdza ba dang b+h+yaH// dra ga gsum pa 'dang la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas bye nas brgyag// de rjes dang po'i gsul pa la// dbus kyi ban pa sarnam pa bad//
239a2(rnying rgyud): de 'og bzhi pa'i dang po pa// dbyangs kyi lnga pas 'og nas sbas// de 'og bzhi pa'i dang pol// de la gsum pa'i gsum pa sbyin// de 'o gadrug pa'i drang po bzhag/ de 'og mi shigs snying po can// de rjes bzhi pa'i bzhi pa la// de la gsum par lta ba sbyin// de
239a3(rnying rgyud): gsum pa'i dang ba la// dbyangs kyi bcug sum pa lis brgyan// de ngog drug pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa zis brdzun// de rjes lnga pa'i 'artu la// dbyangs kyi bcuganyis pa yis bcan// de ga dang po'i dang ngo bzhig/ de rje sa bzhi pa /
239a4(rnying rgyud): dbyangs kyi gsum pas sted nas brdzun// de 'og dang po'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis brgyan// de la gsum pa'i rdza pa byin// tsal gnyis dang pal gnyis// til gnyis dang swAhA'i mthanga'// sngags ming rtog par byed pa'i chags// dang po na
239a5(rnying rgyud): par snang mdzad// de 'og mi shigs snying po can// de 'og dang po'i dang pal// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de rjes drug pa'i gsum pa bzhag/ dbyangs kyi bzhi pas steng nas btsun// de 'og dang po'i dang po la// dbyaras kyi gsum pas rnam pa
239a6(rnying rgyud): brgyad// de 'og drug pa'i gsum par zhug/ de rjes drug pa'i dang pa bzhag/ de rjes brtan pa'i rnam pa// dbyangs kyi ldabs ngas par brgyan// d+hU pa'i lnga pa dang ldan te// de rjes lnga pa bzhi pa bzhag/ de rjes rgyags yang dag bzang // ming dang ba
239a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i phaT brjod pas// sngags ming drag po'i sreg drug sngags// gong mji ltar bsgrub pa las// drug pa'i dang po'i 'og cani// rdza pa'i dang po yongs su bkod// dbyangs kyi lnga pas rab tu brtan// rdo rjes bdun pa'i them pa// bzhi pa'i dang po de la rgyan/
239b1(rnying rgyud): sa kyo gsum pas rnam pang brtanadang pa'i rdza ba labyin/ dru gnyis dang snying ba rdzu nga// thags du gdus kyi byu// gang sa ltar bska du las// drug du 'ad // bdun pa gnyis pad+mo dag nas
239b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i tham du la / dngon du pa da la// she rgyas kyis / ngas kyi zhi pas brta/ dang pa ba dral spyod/ shing bcas su ma dung// rtags pa ni pa'i sngags byed do// pa ltung bslab pa pas
239b3(rnying rgyud): pang dang pong da d+hi// wA pa'i bzhi ba bzhag par gyi// de 'og bdun pa'i gnyis pa la// 'og tu brgyad pa'i thal ga sbyiH// dengag pra las phongs su can// sto pa sa ni krin du mdzes// s+yAt+tha'i bangar dbang gis smras// rdzogs pa rgyas pa'i gas
239b4(rnying rgyud): yid gas pal/ da sa gapa hU~M// das kyi da sa
239b5(rnying rgyud): drug pa'i gnyis pa la// dazungs kyi lngapas 'og nas smras// de 'og lnga pa'i drang po bzhag/ de 'og bzhi pa'i gsum pal// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas bcan// de 'og bstad pa'i gsum pal// de la bad+hi pa'i dang po byi// de rjes bdun pa'i gsum pa brdag
239b6(rnying rgyud): rdza paji lnga pa bzlag/ de dag drug pa dang po nyi/ de dog dang kyi ban // de rjes dbyings kyi dang ngo bdag/ de 'og drug pa'i gnyis pa'o// de rjes drug pa'i bsdum pa'o// dbyangs kyi gsu pas steng nas brgyad// dang hU~M dang bI da ny-i// sngags kyi sti bang kha
239b7(rnying rgyud): drangs pa pi de sngags yin na// de dag lwa pa'i lnga pa ba dang // de 'og bzhi pa'i dang pa la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas sbed nas brgyan// dang brjod byed dgongs sbyin// de dzig mi shigs nying bcad// de 'og btsun pa'i gsum pa bzhid// de ngog lnga pa'i lda
240a1(rnying rgyud): de 'og dang po'i dang po ste// de rjem drug pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis brgyan// de 'og dang po'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de 'og bzhi pa'i lnga pa la// dbyangs kyi bzhi pas steng nas brgyan/

240a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'i dang po bzhag/ de rjes lnga pa'i lnga pa la// dbyangs kyi lba bas 'og nas sbas// de la bzhi pa'i lnga pa byin// de 'og bzhi pa'i bzhi pa bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i gnyis pa la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas bcang // de 'og dang po'i dang po la//
240a7(rnying rgyud): dang po'i lnga pas steng du brgyan// de rjes dang po'i dang po bzhag/ de 'og bzhi pa'i gsum pa'o// de 'og drug pa'i gnyis pa la// dbyangs ci gsum pas steng du brgyan// de rjes dang po'i gnyis pa bzhag/ de 'o/ drug pa'i gnyis pa la// lnga pa'i lnga pa de la sbyin//
240b1(rnying rgyud): de rjes jug pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis brgyan// de 'og dang po'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de rjes bzhi pa'i lnga ba la// dbyangs kyi bzhi pas steng nas brgyan// de 'og dang po'i gnyis pa bzhag/ de rjes dbyangs kyi gnyis

240b3(rnying rgyud): 'og nas sbas// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de 'og bzhi pa'i gnyis pa bzhag/ de 'og dbyangs kyi dang po'o// de rjes drug pa'i gnyis pa la// dang po'i gsum pa de la sbyin// de la lnga pa'i lnga pa byin// de 'og lde pa'i dang po la// dug pa'i gnyis pas

240b5(rnying rgyud): dang po'i phyi mo'i yi ge rnams// sde tshan dgu pu rnam par grags// de las yongs su grub pa'i sngags// bsad dang bkug dang bcing ba dang // gzir dang gtum dang bskyab pa dang // zhi ba rgyas pa dbang dang dgug/ drug grags baspad pa la sogs pa// las 'di rna la
240b6(rnying rgyud): 'byor dam pas 'grub// nyams pas brtsams cad nyid brlag 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kIl yang chu gnyis kyi mdol pa/ sngags badz+ra ba'i 'du
240b7(rnying rgyud): dgra pa'o// / de nas yang kas he dra gas/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces glengs so// rtse rtse gnyis med ting 'dzin pa dag/ las rnams thams cad brtsam pa la// ting 'dzin bye brag mi 'tshal lam
241a1(rnying rgyud): ting 'ang tha ga de lang lags// dpa'ag kyis pagang nganasad/ nas byangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dpal khag gargyal pa bcwal pa da pa nas gsangs// tan cigs \u0f7fta s+ya// ma ma dang rig te
241a2(rnying rgyud): mas// 'di ba lamanapas 'gru mazed// dab nyid yod kyi zag stan// dab pa kyi sa kyid byu gnas par// btang ba dpal 'dzugs bsasa'o// dac-i ni dkyil la bar bzhom// de tha ma'i bdug pa yang/
241a3(rnying rgyud): dang dran pa dag sa / 'a.A rnas pas byung \u0f7f/ pa 'dzi pa brgya // myung gas sa da 'byung // 'ad pa nyid / dkri khor byeng cu gzugs / nga kyi kyi
241a4(rnying rgyud): brtag/ sras mchog par pa'i dkyil 'khod ni// gnyis su med pa las thung po// de la ba byung ba'i sprul pa'i tshogs// gang ci la rdzogs paskal bdag ga/ 'di tid di rung kyil 'dzor // 'di ni dkyil 'khor sti pa y-in no// bdag te dang /
241a5(rnying rgyud): 'dug ste// rti ga kyiba'i dag 'byor la// ye gI sa rje dbra ti kyi// de sa med kyil mthong bsas// de byeng zhid dag 'bang ba'iH// de la migs kyi skye sa// ma 'i ga nga gis las bsho / thar pa 'a
241a6(rnying rgyud): na // bsnyen dus 'du' bo gci brjed// blangs pa la n+de ti byung ba dang // sgrub pa'i mas par bathugs 'ab // mtshan pa la sogs grang bar// thar pa po'i thar thos te// rnam pa'i ting gir gtams byas nus// rang sngags ga
241a7(rnying rgyud): la sa/ 'as su su /
241b1(rnying rgyud): nga ma gags// sa// ga ya // gapapa / na // su // gsum
241b2(rnying rgyud): gsum rtsal ba'i gdung 'tsha ba dang // dag 'dzin pa dag tuganams lani// gnod cing gdag pa'i ba dang bzhegs// bdud dang bar dragacod pa dngas/ dngos thub 'drug cing 'tho napas// blob can po'i byi rgyabyas kyis// pad mas ni 'ad po da dpa// da
241b3(rnying rgyud): tshul banid bskal ba dang // zas ngag dul du ba shi ga nas snang // sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'dod// de 'bras dang mdan pa'i/ 'dzin de lab// nga rdo'i tshig tu brjod drug// so so dang sngags pa byeng te// bca dang demi dang
241b4(rnying rgyud): babri'o// tid byang du ba srings kyi sa// phur ba nyid kyang nga gyid bskyed/ 'ad dang bab bang lhag par 'arjod// don thong las grang gi// ting nge dod des de la cir// deni sa phyogs pade tsho bo 'o// rdo rje rtsigazhi pa 'dis du 'bral// de blang ba na
241b5(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing yang sems sun brnangs// zung nas gyi ga rdung par cings// sa shi ga grogs dang bral bar byes// rengs par 'ug la snar chug/ po sdi garngu par gzang bar rtsis// de yi dbang dag da so// ga
241b6(rnying rgyud): ga da// sa rnamasalnga/ sa sbed brjod/ bdud gro martogs// rjod ci pa gnas ltabab/ rdzog pas pa rjod pas
241b7(rnying rgyud): 'das gyung // rdo chubs bla ngos// dri med las la bsgral bapo// ting nge 'dod ni 'de bya/ denas rdo rje'i chog tug// zab mchag pas la bskul bani// rdorde gsang pa'i bka'a'ab// drug pa dgang zhig 'ang med do/ ra
242a1(rnying rgyud): po yis// klad pa tshol pa brgya ru pos/ nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// rdo rje'i bka' las 'da' ma byed// gtub par bya ba'i ting 'dzin no// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa yi// lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung // nga la bar
242a2(rnying rgyud): cad byed pa rnams// de yi mthu dang dpung ma byed// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul dpung mgyed// mthu dang brdzu 'phrul med par byos// dbye ba rgyun gyi ting 'dzin yin// khro mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje tho bar bsgom bya zhing // dngos por gyur pa'i gnas chen kun// rdul
242a3(rnying rgyud): phran bzhin du brdung bar bya// rdo rje'i tshig tu brjod pa ni// rdungs shig rdo rje'i 'bar ba'i gtun// bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams// rdo rje med pal snying bsregs nas// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rdzogs// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje tho bas brdungs
242a4(rnying rgyud): byas nas// lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur// brdung ba rgyan gyi ting 'dzin yin// rdo rje khros pas 'bar ba dang // rdo rje za byed srin po dang // rdo rje khrag 'thung srin mo dang // de dag la sogs zhal gdangs par// gzugs phung ba shig la bstab par bya// jo
242a5(rnying rgyud): ji'i tshig gis 'di skad bskul// nam mkha'i khro bo zhal gdangs su// thugs rjes 'gro kun yud la bstab// ngas bstab khyod kyis yud la gsol// rol pas bgyis pa'i gang rgyangs sgrogs// rol pa'i lcags kyu 'bar ba yis// gnyis med zhal du rab bsdus
242a6(rnying rgyud): la// ye shes khang pa'i me chen gyis// rab zos las ngan myur du bsreg/ bstab brgyan gyi ting 'dzin yin// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de steng gser gyi ri rab bskyedadra// de steng rdo rje rgya gram bsam//
242a7(rnying rgyud): de steng las kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// skye 'gro thams cad gnas par bsam// rdo rje'i tshig gis bskul ba 'di'o// hUM las kyi rdo rje 'khor dang bcas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// log par blta ba'i sems can rnams// skang cig yud la man
242b1(rnying rgyud): par zhog/ mnan pa rgyan gyi ting 'dzin yin// lha'as bu'am gnod sbyin nam// 'byung po'am ma mo klu la sogs// lha 'dre 'dra ba'i gnas dag tu// bdag nyid la sogs las mkhan rnams// bskal zhing bkug la bsad par bya// las mkhan gyis gso
242b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin yin// rdo rje'i chog gis 'di skad bstsal// bdag nyid chen mo'i dus la bab// shA na mu kha'i dus 'bab// phra men las mkhan dus la bab// sa bdag chen mo'i dus la bab// dbang chen las mkhan dus la ba pa// khyod kye thugs dam dus la bar/
242b3(rnying rgyud): cal 'byung ba'i dus la bab// so sor bskul pa'i ting 'dzin yid// lha dang klu dang btsan dag dang // ma po 'byung po lha mo dang // yul gyi lha 'dre mchod rten lha// de la gtad de mi 'tshor bsgos// rdo rje'i tshig gis 'di skad bskul// lha dang klu dang brtson
242b4(rnying rgyud): ma mo mkha' 'gro las mkhan rnams// yul 'dir gnas pa'i lce 'dre kun// ma mo sde gdon lha 'dre rnams// dkon mchog dri med mchod rten dang // gtsug lag khang gisung ma rnams// las ngan nyams pa 'di gtad kyi// bskal pa'i mthar yang ma btang zhi
242b5(rnying rgyud): ming bcug la tshul bzhin glan// mdog ni mi 'dra so sor bya// dkar ba la rdzogs bya ba yin// gtad pa rgyun gyi ting 'dzin yin// tshe lung gnas pa'i byang chub sems// zhu dang gnas pa nyid brtags la// byang chub sems rwa yum gyi mala'// bde bar gshegs pa
242b6(rnying rgyud): sba bskyed la// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang yang bskur// lung brtags la sogs byas nas ni// 'jig rten khams su rab spos bton// sems can don la bskul la gtang // rdo rje'i tshig gis bskal pa 'di'o// hUM rgyal ba rjesas po gnyis med ga so// bde chen tha parnab
242b7(rnying rgyud): sems las byung // 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na// nyon mongs lngas gzing sems can gyi// don rnams ma lus khyod kyis kyis// las la 'bras bu yod ces bya// gnas lung rgyun gyi ting 'dzin yin// bde gshegs ting 'dzisatha yas pa// ting 'jam
243a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor mchog/ las su rung ba'i rnal 'byor pas// de yi brtsam pa yid bzhin 'grub// gang la bsams kyang 'thab par 'gyur// mi thA ba ni gang yang med// tid 'dzin las sna rung ba'i mi// mi zhes byab bde ga shegs yin/
243a2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das zhes gud na med// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi mdo las/ ting nge 'dzin rim par phye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas yang kaH
243a3(rnying rgyud): he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'byung gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// rtse kye dpa' bo brjid pa'i sgra// las kyi bdag po khyod la 'dud// rnal 'byor bstan la 'tshe gyur dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa bshig byed dang // rnal 'byor yongs kyi dgrar gyur
243a4(rnying rgyud): la// phur pas bsgral ba tsha gsungs lags na// dug la sogs pa'i thun rnams kyis// bsgral pa la sogs ji ltar bgyi// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan gsol// zhes glengs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badz+ra kI la yas 'di
243a5(rnying rgyud): skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ dug la stsogs pas bskal ba rnams// nges pa kho nar bas bshad kyis// rtse gcig sems kyis nga la nyon// dang po 'khor lo ma bsgral ba bstan// dang po h+ya yi 'khor lo bcas// ci bas ni bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad la/
243a6(rnying rgyud): ming byang gnyis dang ldan par bri// de las 'khor lo bzhi du bca'// sngags rnams bsdus te gsal bar dgod// dang po dgug pa'i 'khor lo la// dbyag pa'i 'khor lo dang dbyed dbyibs// yi ge bcu gcig rnam par ldan// g.yas nas bskor nas langs
243a7(rnying rgyud): pa brtag/ bca' ba'i rgyu rnams bstan pa ni// nyi shu ra ga nim pa'i 'o// sngags dang 'khor lo'i rgyu ru gsungs// 'od zer spros nas de bkug bstim// rlung gi lcags kyus khro bo sbyor// sngags kyi 'od zer phra men spong // gang las nges par dgug pa yin
243b1(rnying rgyud): de ni dgug pa'i 'khor lo yin// de 'og bsad pa'i 'khor lo ni// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// g.yon nas bskor ba bcu bdun bzhag/ gti mug zhe sdang yi gsum kyang // lhag ma thabs dang shes rab po// de yi rgyu rnams bstan pa ni// sna tsho
243b2(rnying rgyud): ldod ros re lhag pa// kyi lha nag po me reg khrag/ smyo byed chu yis sbyar byas la// de ni sngags dang 'khor lo'i rgyu// de las 'od 'phros gzi byin bskyed// shin tu 'bar zhing khros pa yis// lam nas gzhug ste bsgral bar bya'o// de gnyis gcig pasdoms
243b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo ni// gsang pa'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs mtshan la// hUM phaT bzhag pa brgyad po dgod// rgyu ni dang po de nyid do// dgug dang bsad la shis pa'o// ma grub spogs thabs bstan pa ni// dgug pa'i 'khor lo 'dab brgyad la// yi ge mgo nang brtag
243b4(rnying rgyud): nas bskor// rgyu ni dgug pa'i 'khor los bya'o// 'od zer bzlog la rnam par bslang // de yis 'grub par rgyal bas gsungs// 'di yis mi 'grub mi srid do// ma grub spogs pa'i cho ga'o// tha dam pa'o mas 'khor lo bkru'o// bde gshegs
243b5(rnying rgyud): ga nga/ la sa / bya sa/ nga// sus byed na
243b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i cho ga'o// skrod pa'i 'khor lo yang gsungs pa// lte bar sa yi dkyil 'khor la// grong khyer la sogs gzugs bris te// de yi phyi rol 'khor lo bris// 'khor lo la yang yig 'bru dgod// ku chad bzhi la yaM bkod la// yaM las rlung gi dkyil
243b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor te// mtha' ma bzhi ru dzA brtsegs bzhi// chung gi dkyil 'khor khyod byed yin// bsnyen pa la yang grangs las 'das// srub pa khri phrag gcig tu'o// las bus stong rtsa gcig tu bya// dang po chud sgra gnyis par ldeg// de lha'i mtshan ma byung ba dang // dur khrod
244a1(rnying rgyud): da na/ su // bum na smra/ pa
244a2(rnying rgyud): rnas baspyod pa gyur ba dang // then ga 'a bar la grags pa// stong ba'i dang sna bang // bdung btsulas rababardzam ste// dadapa mya no// rim gazlapa 'arjod paH// de na khyod yang yang// dugagis thol pa par ga /

244a4(rnying rgyud): bskyam// dz+wa la tu rgyan pa brtag sa// sems pan gang gi sa brjo brnams// rdzas dag yi gsam tha bar bab pa// dem pa 'a dang rdu dang // sa zla ba tu bar mthong na// hrI sad+hag las byas pa'i gzugs// mgang po dmas tha zhan ma/

244b1(rnying rgyud): du// sdug ma sor ni bcu drug la// 'ug pa'i thon partson nas su// skyer ba'i mda'u sor gsum gzhugs/ gshin rje'i gshad du brgyad la gzhag/ shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// khwa yis basmon pa'i mda' di bzhin// rnam par thal la 'gyud la
244b2(rnying rgyud): bzhag/ byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// srin byas basmon pa'i mda' de bzhin// bdud rtsi 'khyil par bakhyed la bzhag/ nub phyogs 'khor phyi'i rtsi bas steng du// bya rnyog grob gyon mda' de bzhin// rta mgrin rgyal po bskyed la bzhag/ zhing lpags
244b3(rnying rgyud): pa skyon mad 'dug bya// so so'i gnas su l+ya bskyed gzug/ da las byung ba'i sras phur bu// dug shing gdug pa'i shing dag la// phur pa phra mo tshon gang bcu// sras su byin brlabs rtsibs mtshan la'o// b+h+yar+g+ha gling bzhi'i nang du ni// ma mo mkha' 'gro
244b4(rnying rgyud): gtor ma bya// zangs yur la sogs 'grugs pa'i rdzas// nal 'gror mdun du gzug par bya// thod pa le'u cho bdun nang du// nyung dkar nyung nag pag nag ma mo// khrag dang drug ni sna chog pa dang // rdo rje nug po ste/ tshod dgras// mthing nag yol
244b5(rnying rgyud): zhing chan gur// b+had+ha gling drug nang du ni// gzas pa'i gzugs byas gru gsum nang // de ltar legs par tshogs pa dang // rang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par blta// bul dkar nyung nage la sogs pa// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i sngags bzlas gdab/
244b6(rnying rgyud): zangs gur la sogs bdun po yis// dgrag pa dag kyang tshul bzhin bya// phyar pa la sogs 'jab rnams kun// gzhung gi las rnams ji bzhin no// khugs pa'i rmis ltas byung ba dang // thun rnams sgrol ba'i sngags dang bcas// kun gyi nang du bla
244b7(rnying rgyud): par bya// phur pa so so'i bsad pa'i sngags// mang du bzlas la thugs nang drug/ rdo rje'i skyugs pa rab blangs la// ma mo mkha' 'gro bran bkug ste// gtor ma byas par byin nas ni// gsod pa'i las la rab bskal bya// drar khrod gnas su rab brtags pa/
245a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i nang du mda' yis brdeg/ khyer pa'i gzhu ni gru gang la// mi yi lo mas gzhu chud rtsa// gnas dag tu ni rgyab nas ni// thun rnams kyang ni re mos brdeg/ lhag par gsod pa'i las la myur// phud bzor gyi thun zhes bya// khrag gi zan yang gsungs pa'i//
