245a3(rnying rgyud): la sngags kyi dbyang yang bskur// dur khrod mchang khar song nas ni// til chen po yi dud las btang // rang gis mnyes dbang yang gzug/ dUr du gtor na mtha' rabs chad// grong du gtor na mi nad 'byung // phyugs la gtor na rlag par 'gyur// ma po thun gyi snyi
245a4(rnying rgyud): po 'di'o// au tI ga nan/ ro ru pa ti ta nan/ khrig nan/ ra klo yak+Sho trig nan/ sa ma ya snying rdzal byo/ bdag nyid chen mo'i thun sngags so// AM mu tri pa ya bar tsit+ta yo gI sha ra sa ma ya tsit+ta oM phaT/ mi ri kun d+ha ri/ rgyal mo bzhi yi thun sngags so// dza ya bu ma
245a5(rnying rgyud): shwa ri ni/ a pu ti/ dza dza dzaM/ thums nad/ khrag ti smar phaT drad/ wa mo bzhi yi thun sngags so// de la las 'di bsam yas te// mkhas pas brtags ste shes par bu/ de nas yang rdo rje kha T+wAM ga'i las kyang gsungs pa// rdo rje drag po'i dkyil 'khor la// khro bo rnams
245a6(rnying rgyud): gyang grub bsnol brtag/ khro bo rtag pa'i snying pos spras// bsad pa'i las kyang de nyid bsad// dang po rtag pa bdun drangs la// de nyid la yang mchod pa 'bul// gzu dang dbang du de gsol la// de la las rnams brtsam par bya// kha dang snying ga mtshan bar du// de rje
245a7(rnying rgyud): ma yis de bsreg brtag/ klad dang nang pa'i mthil dag nas// bad+ma'i lugs sus drang bar bya// zla ba nyi la'i ga'adi// rlung gi lcags kyis kha bya la// de la na bung bsu ru gzhug/ kha T+wAM rnams kyi gzhal las btim// ngadra rnams kyis de mi gsang // dus chags
245b1(rnying rgyud): 'on pa'i gnas nyid du// mkhas pas brtag la gas par bya// 'di 'khri'i las 'di dam tshig zag// mi rig pa yi dkyil lakhor du// las kyi bya brag shes pas bsad// sangs rgya kyid kyang byang na// rnal 'byong nyams pa smos kyi dgas// rtsa bar badz+ran
245b2(rnying rgyud): thun zhes bya// zhas gsungs so// byad kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi mdo las// thun gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas yang kas he ru kaH/ bcom
245b3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po'i 'di skad ces gsol to// he rtse bcom ldan don yod bdag/ las byi mdzub ni ji ltar brtul// phrin las rnam bzhi'i bye brag ci// don yod dpa' bos bshad du gsol// zhes glengs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dpa
245b4(rnying rgyud): khrag 'byung gi rgyal po badz+ra kI la yas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig ka ma he ru ka/ las kyi bye brag bya ba la// kun tu sna tshogs dkyil 'khor du// gnas pa'i rnal 'byor dam pa yis// ji ltar las rnams thams cad kun// brtsams pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/
245b5(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// rmugs par byed pa'i 'gro gang la// sna tshogs las kyis zhi bar bya// bkra shis dben pa'i gnas dag tu// bkra shis mtshan ldan yum mchog bzung // rnam snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor do// mi bskyod dkyil 'khor
245b6(rnying rgyud): bdag gnas la// dkar la thum pa'i dkyil 'khor bri// rdo rje'i 'od zer 'thobs brgyan// rgyan rnams mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus// rin chen dngul la sogs pa yi// kha dog dkar las zlas pa'i bus// sa chu 'phyar lo zhel rgyan mdzes// ska
245b7(rnying rgyud): kye bye brag mang gos dgang // bkyil la bor dbus su gzhag par bya// de yis las rnams thams cad kye// gti mug 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// zhe sdang 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdal 'gyor dam pa de zhugs nas// don tshim bdag dkar pongs/
246a1(rnying rgyud): 6\u0f7f/ 'ug pa stug po'i mig/ d+hi lad+hi mig dang lung thang dang // de rnams dkar 'o mas rdza// srog spring rtsa ba'i sngags rje dang // rnom thong rtsa ba'i sngags sbrel bzlas// oM ma d+hu ma N+Da la/ k+sha dzaH pra be sha paT/ dzas de mig la byugs ngan// srang
246a2(rnying rgyud): ba bskum srung tho gyur// yong du gyung gyus/ sa sa smra yang / dpabarjen sgrub pa rdzogs sa nga nga ma nangs bas// ung pa nga/ rjegasapag/
246a3(rnying rgyud): sngags 'di spel la bzlas// 'byung po 'dul byed dasha hU~M tsu lu ts+tsha lu phaT phaT/ chos sbyong bskul zhing dbang yang gzug/ phur thun sngags kyis brab pa na// gnod byed skad ngan cong tser 'ong // mna' bsgag 'gags bsdam rjes gcod bya// 'dre gdon thams cad
246a4(rnying rgyud): hU~M bar 'gyur// sa ba rgyu ba'i'i d+ha / oM zhes 'dzig rten gang yang rung // ngo la brten bsgrub songs rdzogs nas// de nyid gsung bsrang mdun rdzas pa sham// khyed ba shes gtod m+b+hi mdzod de// badren pa brdo rje me mdze na \u0f7f// de nas ra drang nam na
246a5(rnying rgyud): tshe// bdag nyid yongs rdzogs dpal chen bskyed// dregs pa thams cad bka' nyan bsam// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de la// ser srung yang snying 'di sbrel bzlas// g+he rA sad/ r-i ri sad/ phur pur sid/ tha' chen nyung dkar dag la bsngags// gdong du gtor
246a6(rnying rgyud): na bzlog par 'gyur// dkor nor srung ba'i kha sbyar ni// ye shes 'jig rten gang yang rung // de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// de nyid gzhung bsrang mthun rdzas bsham// khyad par nor rnga ma yul khams rnams// ming gzugs lha yi rten la bcing // kho la nor rdzas
246a7(rnying rgyud): bsrung ma bcol// srog snying rtsa ba'i sngags de la// nor srung sngags 'di spel la bzlas// trig tra~M bi tsin+d+ra yA/ rat+na ra sI nor srungs shig/ de byas nor de gzhan khyer na// nor gyir cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'breng // skabs skabs gsol ka bcol gtang bya// rang gi mthong
246b1(rnying rgyud): gsongan// ma dang no ma lagod brdza gyur// d+mo ba nag po'i khyam+b+ha hA// ye shes 'jig can gang yang rung // de yi bsnyen bsgrub yongs rdzogs nas// 'odi nyid gzhung ba srang mA b+hang rnam pa sham// khyad par sngags 'das rgyun tu bsrung // @
246b2(rnying rgyud): rmyang rjes pa// dug 'joms gsang sngags 'drib rgya bzlas// oM ti shak+to li dmi la u be s+t+wa~MH/ yang na nya cang rabazlas// des ni bdag snyed rtul por 'gyur// 'on te byung zin nazhan rung na// sngags 'di rgya la ma ba nga chud// oM ha re ha dang /
246b3(rnying rgyud): 8/ ka na pa swAH/ gang la dogs pa'i sa na la// rdzogs grom gang dag mas ngas// gag / nas ga ni gang bstan// de'i dzin ba rgya yo rdzogs nas// dashi gi
246b4(rnying rgyud): zugs sa nas sna nazhes da ba gas
246b5(rnying rgyud): oMn+da dzang rgyog rgyam dri la swAH// sa la nye gcig tugs/ rgyas te// mdzegs dung chug ting bas thug// dge non rgol ba'i bad+hU d+he/ zhes gtan gti yang dzang// de yi bzhin brtsub nga mardzogs nas// ti nga kyang bslar mi drun rjes pasang// thang pa
246b6(rnying rgyud): ma byed pa'i nang / da pas / ga sto rtsa ba'i dgas del// rab thab sngags ji spel pa'ings// mi zhig shig tung chur khrol la saH/ brjod pa brjid rdzogs pa dang // ci nga
246b7(rnying rgyud): gnas/ dayang sdugadug ldan dag ga mam sa 'dum pa ma na mas la thal da / ga ngag bsres da
247a1(rnying rgyud): bahom camad do// bdud rjethal rab sngangs te// dbang ga lasal pasgoms la danalta// blad shong dmar ba ba // du 'dugs ga bsas// dbu gtang san thathags// zangs kyong brnams dmar ba'o//
247a2(rnying rgyud): gtor ma byas te las mkhan sbyin// phyar zhi mdang pe ze sa rnams kyis// dbang gi tshul du srin bsreg bya// yi ye tshogs kyi dkyil 'khod dra// 'dod chags las kyis 'tshal brnams// 'gro gang dang dubs pa la// bum pas dbang byas mdzang sbyin
247a3(rnying rgyud): bsreg/ dbang du bzlas nas dbyings su ro // 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byas stan// gan tu gdug pa'i sems mtshul// drag po'i spyod las su byas te// rkang gcig drung dbu ma lo'i gangs// me reg ma yi gzungs pa bzung // khros pa'i gzugs
247a4(rnying rgyud): su bdag gnas pa// nag po gru gsum dkyil 'khor la// ngos de sor ni nyi shu'o// sor bcu gting du brko bar bya// song gsum phyi brtsed kha khyer te// zheng dang dbangs dang gnyis ka'o// phyi rol sor gsum rdo rje ste// mda' gzhu mdung rtse gzub la gogs/
247a5(rnying rgyud): spel la bcan te glar mad 'ga'u// bkang ba bani yis brgyad par bya// kyang dang thod pas brgyan par \u0f7f// tshangs pa'i lcags thag gnyis pa bskod// lpags sas dag po'i shing rnams la// drag shing rjod ma can gyi shing // rabs chad nag po'i nang gi rung // kye'athung
247a6(rnying rgyud): gsum dpal dang ldan// gsum las byung ba'i bye zag la// dbang bskur 'od dang ldan par brtag/ mthing dag khrong ba'i nya tshogs rnams// thegs pa 'dul gyir spyan drangs te// rab tu khros pa'i sems gnas pa// macu song ba ni sngon zag byed// gdug pa'i ni
247a7(rnying rgyud): po che// mi rjes dra khrod molab dang // thal chen lang tshu pa'i rjes// bdud rtsi sA li thal grangs// do khyod 'asal bsgrims la dbul// bud gang ma sa can gyi zhing // d+hi mr-i ba bltas nyid dzidzinaH// sngags kyi 'thun gas gragangs// ru ba
247b1(rnying rgyud): tang ma sha zan rdungs// las mkhan byed pa las la btul// dag pa'i chu drug rtsub pa la// drug pa 'phrul du sbyin bsreg bya// ma latshogs kyi dkyil labar du// zhwa wad las kyis rgyab pa rnams// hur pas bsad byas mthar smin pasro// brlag par drang
247b2(rnying rgyud): bas dbyings su ro // zho dang sut+pa 'tshor ma can// sna drangs nas ni 'chod pa brtsams// las kyi rjes mthun yon lam gradab// zhi bsalas kyi bye brag bya// byas pas tshe dang dbang thang 'phel// dbang gis dbang du thub dang // de ltar 'dod pa dbug pa// dag gis
247b3(rnying rgyud): bsad dang bsrung ba dang // drag po'i sbyin sreg nam byed na// drar khrod ras la ming rus dang // mthun byas gzugs ni bris nas ni// me reg yum mchog dkyil 'khor du// byed kyi cha las bsad nas ni// khrag gi dum bu gsher byas la// bshan pa'i me blangs
247b4(rnying rgyud): de la bsreb// dur khrod ras la sngags la bdug/ bshang gci khrag gis lus po byug/ gsang sngags yab yum thun gyis bzlas// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dzin pa yang // brlag cing 'chi bar gdon miza// sems can rnams lha spos ci dgos// zag pos 'thung
247b5(rnying rgyud): bar bya ba ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad zhing shun bri// yi ge rnams ni legs bkod la// de la dbang bskur byin gyis brlab// bdug pa la sogs mchod par dbul// mkha' 'gror gtor ma rgyas par dbul// gang 'dod las rnams rab bcol bskul// gang
247b6(rnying rgyud): la lan gsum 'khor lo bskor// bsung 'dod lag g.yon dpung rtsar gdags// cis kyang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// 'khor pos bsrung ba zhes bya'o// dur khrod ras ma blangs nas su// song bzhi dus bu gnyis su bya// gcig la nyi pa'i 'od dang bcas// gcig la
247b7(rnying rgyud): zlab mdog dang bcas// yongs su rdzogs pa'i bdog can// de dbus yi ge'i phreng ba can// yang yum gnyis po so sor bri// de la sngags kyi bzlas pa bya'o// gu gral chus thugs la spad rgya// rdo ni rgyagram gyis kha ba cer// ril bu thas te ting gang gdag

248b6(rnying rgyud): 'di grub nyams pa'i dus mtha' med// rdo rje'i cho ga gi lu gu rgyud// 'di la rnal 'byor dam pas blang // 'di med 'bram bu 'gyur mi srid// yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka'i chos// rdo rje tha ma slob dpon la// rnam pa'i bye brag gis kyang ni// mnyes bya rmog la
248b7(rnying rgyud): bab kyang bkur// dam tshig dbang dang shes rab rgyud// man ngag ston pa'i slob dpon la// ji ltar blta zhing bkur ba ni// dam chog dbang gi slob dpon la// 'jig rten pa bzhin palta zhing bkur// shes rab rgyud kyi slob dpon la// ji ltar blta zhing bkur
249a1(rnying rgyud): ni// 'jig rten ma bzhin palta zhing bkyang // man ngag ston pa'i slob dpon la// bkur zhing blta bar bya ba ni// 'jig rten mig 'bras bzhin du blta// de yis bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan// de bzhin mdzes pa dbul bar bya// rdzas dang

249a3(rnying rgyud): bcas bzhin// rgya bcas sngags 'di rgyan mi gcad// ting 'dzin bye brag nyams su len// dngos grub dam pa 'byung ba'i rgyu// 'di la rtag tu bdag gnas na// 'di ni gsung gi dam tshig go// phyi nang nyams su blangs pa bzhi// bar gsang ting 'dzin bye brag
249a4(rnying rgyud): gnas// gsang 'os ting 'dzin brtan por bzung // gsang gnyer gang yang mi g.yo'o// 'di lta bu yi man ngag rnams// snong ngan tshul 'chos spel mi gyi// gsang ba sbas pa'i thabs mchog rnams// blo yi gting du 'tshang mi sba// 'di ni thugs
249a5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig go// dam tshig rnam gsum rdo rje ste// 'di dag nyams par gyur na ni// 'bras bu med cing bdun rgyud brlag/ nyams pa'i grib mas gos pa la// de yi grib ma'i skyon rnams ni// brjod med brjod las 'das pa la// rtsa ba'i dam cho ga tams pa dang //

249a7(rnying rgyud): na 'bras bu rnyed par dka'// 'di ni mi spang dam tshig go// sha che nang shang gci khu ba khrag/ gdod nas dag pa'i rang bzhin te// zas mchog dam pa bdud rtsi'i dngos// mi 'dor ba yi dam tshig go// rdzun dang tshig rtsub rdza ma dang // sbyor ba dang ni brtsa ba dang //

249b3(rnying rgyud): tshig tams pas na// de bas bskal pa'i mchog tu 'bad// dam tshig 'di ni kun gyi dngos// sangs rgyas bsrub pa'i rgyud dang gzhi// kun gyi bdag nyid rin chen 'dra// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan mchog/ gdod nas mi gtang pon tadzA 'phel// de yi nges pa brjod mi
249b4(rnying rgyud): lang // dngos grub dam pa thob pa'i gzhi// dngos grub phra mo spos ci dgos// de bas nan tan bskyed de bsrung // gal te nyams par gyur na ni// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dam pa la// phyi yi dbang nos byas pas sobs// gnyis pa nang gi dbang nos soms//

250b2(rnying rgyud): stong pa stong pa'i yul las 'das// yul las 'das te brjod dang bral// de phyir sems nyid chos rtsa ba// de nyid srid dang grol las ldang // ho// e ma ho sems nyid stong pa ste// ma bcos stong pa chen po'i dbyings// brjod dang bral ba'i ngo bo la// gnas dang rgyan zhes
250b3(rnying rgyud): gdags su med// ston pa 'khor zhes ga la yod// ting 'don yig 'bru so sor med// phyag mtshan sku mdog rtag pa med// snyan dang bzhugs thabs bgrang du med// stong pa nyid med snying rje med// tshogs bsag byang chub sems bskyed dang // gzug brtan dkyil
250b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor bskyed pa med// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drang med// gnyis med sngags dang phyag rgya med// thugs rjes khams gsum 'dul ba med// drag pos ma lus 'dul med cing // drag po'i dkyil 'khor 'joms pa'ang med// gsod pa'i ngan sngags snying po

250b6(rnying rgyud): gyi sdom pa kun las 'das// dag gi sdom pa brjod las 'das// yid kyi sdom pa bas ma dang bral// thams cad brjod pa kun rdob yin// 'khrul pa bzlog phyir kun rdzob bstan// don nam bden pa rig par bya// sems las 'das pa'i chos nyid ni// tshig gis
250b7(rnying rgyud): de la mtshon du med// tha snyad gdag mu ga la yod// nam mkha'i dpes kyang mtshon du med// 'di zhes bya bar bstan du med// kha dog dbyibs su grub pa med// ye nas ma bcos rnam par dag/ rnam par dag ces brjod pa kun// bstan rnams kyang sgrib pa'i
251a1(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma med pa'i sgo ldan te// rnga skad tshig la dad mi 'gyur// bden gnyis blo dang ldan pa des// gnyis med blo dang ldan par zad// cis gsungs pas/ 'khor rnams rab tu dang bskyes te/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams ma bcos pa'i de kho na nyid la gnas shing / sems
251a2(rnying rgyud): cang mi smra bar 'bod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' khrag 'azung gi rgyal po badz+ra spe la las// khro logs he ru/ 'i lum dag yid gsum byin gyis brlabs shing / don bsdu bar dbang bskur nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig kAn te dra ka/ nyid mngon par sangs rgyas nas/
251a3(rnying rgyud): mdo yi don nyid bshad kyi bar// mi gtsem du yang ngas ma bshad// tha skad tshig kyang ngas ma brjod// bshad cing brjod pa gang yang med// gyi nang chos kun thams cad kun// bshad cing brjod pa rnams dang bral// b+hog bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas ni// bshad cing brjod dang bra
251a4(rnying rgyud): don// thugs su chud nas mngon sangs rgyas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de las byung // de bas ma 'ongs rnal 'byor la// don du mdo ni mngon bsdus la// mi nub pa ru bya ba'i phyir// gsung mchog chos kyi yi ger ni// snang zhing mi nub paru gyis// ma nor 'khor lo'i lam 'di ni// phyi ma'i rnal
251a5(rnying rgyud): 'byor rnams kyis ston// de dag mnor khong du chud// ye shes mchog de thob par gyis// mnor lam la bgrod par gyis// sems can sangs rgyas don rnams kyis// bden gnyis snying po 'chang bar gyis// gsang nga khong du chud par gyis// lam gyi bye brag shes par gyis// spyod pa'i rtsad
251a6(rnying rgyud): par shes par gyis// 'on kyang dad can rnal 'gyod pa// des ni rdo rje theg pa yi// gting ni 'dzug zhing mi nub byed// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yi// rgyud ni 'dzin par de 'gyur ro// mi gnas ye shes gnas gyur te// gsang ba'i don rnam mi 'gyur ro// gsang pa'i don rnam ma nan 'phrur
251a7(rnying rgyud): sbas pa gsang pa'i tha bra mchog rnams// rtse brag med par de 'byor ro// khro bo ka ma he ru ka/ de yis bshad pa'i mdo 'di ni// rnal 'byor dam pa rnams kyi ni// nye lam brdo rdo lnga yin pas na// khyod kyis de ltar shes par gyis// gsang ba'i ting khro len par ni// khyod kyis de ltar shes pa
251b1(rnying rgyud): kyis// zhes gsungs so// de nas khro karba he ru ka rang tu dag pa'i spyod pas/ rang gi gsang pa 'dzin rang gi gsang ba gnas su gsor zhing / gtsun ma gra h+Na mo dang gnyis mu med pa'i tshul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma to bcom ldan thab kyi bdag
251b2(rnying rgyud): klu mdog bltabs me bzad pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi sgra'i mchog/ bde ga shegs rtsal phyag 'tshal bstod// e ma to gsung ni dri ma med pa'i gsung // chos kyi sgra chen mtha' yas pa// gyi nang gsang pa'i don da gu ston// bdeg sheg gsung la phyag 'tshal brjod// e matogs gachog cas pa//
251b3(rnying rgyud): nub rgyal mtshan yon gyi bdag/ dus gsum bde gshig thugs kyi bdag/ bde gsheg thug la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod nas/ 'di skad ces gleng so// bcom ldan rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// 'das pa'i bde bar gsheg pa dang // da lta ma 'ongs pa rnam gyi// nye lam chen po lta bur ni// mdo
251b4(rnying rgyud): snang ba la gla bas na// bdag gi mi nub pa ya ni// rgyal mtshan chen por snang bar bgyi// gsung mchog chos kyi yi ger yang // sdang bar bdag gis bgyi lakra mo// bcom ldan gsang bdag nyid du yang // bdag gis gnas par bkyi lags so// 'di don 'chad cing ston pa yi// sang zag skyes
251b5(rnying rgyud): dam pa de// gzhan la phan thog gnas par bgyi'o// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal po ltar// mdo 'di bdag gis gnas par bgyi'o// mas kyi rgol ba la so tha pas// 'di la tshug par mi bkye'o// bcwa gsum gnas pa'i sems can na// sangs rgyas bstan pa dang ngarab kyi'o// gzhad kyi sde la so zla pa ping // bang du
251b6(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur bgyi// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badz+ra kI la ya gnyis su med pa'i dad la bzhug nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// rgyad kyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po/ de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ sI la la bcu gnyis kyi mdo las kI la pa'i rgyud bcug
251b7(rnying rgyud): gyi ma da rnam par bshad pa'i rgyud ces bya ba yongs su gtad pa'i le'u po nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi su gsong ba/ gsung gsad pa/ thugs gas dang / kI la labacu gnyis kyis do// gisas bcuganyis kyi ba ga dang 'argyad sa byang rdzogs so//
252a1(rnying rgyud): drug spyad du/ ha sti ga da ba dkan+danA ma/ bod skad du/ glang por ba 'bog gi rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyug 'tshal lo// 'di rgyud bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ pa de bzhin pa'i rdorje
252a2(rnying rgyud): 'chang chen po de ni/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ltar gnas pa// rgyud dag pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po de ni/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar dbyer med pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba/ dbyer med gcig tu gyur pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po de ni/ nam mkha' rnam par dag pa'i klong nas
252a3(rnying rgyud): nyi ma sprin dang bral ba lta bu ste/ rig pa'i gnas mchog sen po na/ rang sdang skul pa'i gzhal yas khang chen po na/ 'dod pa pad+ma'i gdan chen po rgyas pa la/ mi rtog pa'i 'khor lo chen po/ bde ba chen po pad+ma'i nang du/ gsal ba'i rdo rje chen po bzhugs pa la/ 'das
252a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'dor thams cad ma lus par thim/ da ltar kyi 'khor thams cad lus pa med par rdzogs/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'khor thams cad mi lus par gyur pa'i mnga' dbang rdzogs par bzhugs so// nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor ni 'di lta ste/ 'gyur ba med pa'i rdo rjes mi rtog mkhyen pa dang
252a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor po can po rnam par brjid pa dang / pad+ma chen po smra brjod 'byung ba dang / yid bzhin nor bu 'dod dgur bsrung ba dang / gya bram chen pos thogs med mdod pa dang / btsun po 'dus ma byas go rnalas 'byed pa dang / sra brtan mi 'gyur ba dang / gsal bar smon bralas
252a6(rnying rgyud): dang / mnyen krung thun ma chad pa dang / g.yo bskyod thogs med pa'i tshogs rnams dang / rig pa khyad par can gyi 'khor rnams 'di lta ste/ byang chung chen po thugs su chud pa/ thugs kyi bdag nyid stangs dbul dang bcas pa dang / gau pa spong pa gsung gi bdag nyid yab yus
252a7(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa rnams dang / thugs rje sprul pa'i 'khor ni 'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag po dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ded dpon dang / tshul khrims ci pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang po dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyal po dang /
252b1(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mnga' bdag dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang phyug chen po bas makyigyis khyab pa 'byung ba dang / gadrug pa 'dul ba mas chags su snang ba ni 'di lta ga/ gshing rje mdang spyod 'dugs myong ma dung myong ba dang / bshags
252b2(rnying rgyud): mdzang byed pacing byed ma dang 'gyud ma dang / pad ma mthar byed sdom byed ma dang rol pa dang / shes rab mthar byed dgas pached pos 'jobs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / den pas 'dus pa'i 'khor ni 'di sa te/ maM long gi dkyil la khor chen po la/ bzhin gyi
252b3(rnying rgyud): 'dod chen pos bltas pas/ ded pas gtam nyan pa ma smras par thos pa chen po'i 'thog thos par 'gyur dab/ gsang babs kyang ces gsang ba/ yang gsang rbad du byung ba/ bkang gas blags kyi dkyil 'dod/ rang dod du rtogs par dkang ngas pa dang / gang dra
252b4(rnying rgyud): kya dang drun pa snang bas che/ phyag rgya can po dang / gsung chos byag d+ha dang / thub d+hA tsug gi d+hag tu dang / yon tan mdzad pa las b+ha da ba sa pas gas kyim myed do 'jam btab mi gnas pa/ gzung ba
252b5(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad yi ge gyi dbyings su thim pas skyil bu 'bang bar 'dzin par byed pa/ sems kyi chos thams cad zhi ge hU~M la yongs su rdzonas pas gsang ba'i rdon chen por bcugs pa/ gzung 'dzin dbye mi byed pa po rdul bu 'thu bral med pa dgan so// de ni zas kyi rang
252b6(rnying rgyud): po 'di sa gsungs par thig go// sring ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs dang bstan pa// glid phran bu zad par byams rdo khya bcas// lcags mkhyud do rje rtse dpung 'badi// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lanas sman gyis thub// drid gsum sengs can dang lus dkyil ngong pa// rtan /
252b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i bu rnams sur gsal ba// rgyal 'thos pa mdzad ma bcos dang snang ba// me zad rgyan gyis 'khor lo bas pa mi khyab// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po'i khyod yul du// rang bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor spyad kyis krub// kA med ga na mcho ga rigs pa'i 'og mnan/
253a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rnga dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'du gsal ba// chos s+ya smra bas ma brjod dang bral ba la// ya shas sgyu ma'i gzugs su rang ldang ba// rang bzhin 'bras bu mthang phyin dkyil 'khor yin// 'khor bar snang ba nyid na snang ba med// mya ngan las
253a2(rnying rgyud): 'das rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs// gzhan na med de 'khor ba nyid la gnas// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rang bzhin nyid du snang // de nyid 'bras bu mthar phyin kun dang mnyam// rnam gsum dbyer med gcig gi dang du gnas// gnas dang ma gnas tha dad mtha'
253a3(rnying rgyud): las 'das// mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings la 'phel 'grib med// dri med chos kyi sku la skye 'gag med// dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med gcig gi dang // gzugs can ma yin kun la khyab pa dang // 'gro 'ongad med par kun la 'dus rnams su// thams
253a4(rnying rgyud): cad pa zhes spyod yul dkyil 'khor che// mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya chen por gnas// sangs rgyas nyid kyis gzigs pa'i spyod yul las// gtso 'khor dgongs pa chos kyi sku la bzhugs// zhes gsungs so// glang po rab 'bog gi spyad las/ gsang
253a5(rnying rgyud): ba bstan pa 'byung ba'i rgyud gleng gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// snod du sdang ba dkyil 'khor yum gyi dbyings// bcud
253a6(rnying rgyud): du snang ba rgyal ba lha yi sku// snang srid ma bkod ye nas rdzogs mangs rgyas// rmongs pa'i mun pa bsal phyir bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po 'khor 'das dbyer med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas/ 'gro ba'i ched du
253a7(rnying rgyud): tshad du brjod pa 'di gsungs so// kun nas nyon mongs 'khor ba'i chos rnams kun// rnam byang mya ngan 'das par dbyer med pas// gnyis med ro gcig phyag rgya chen por gnas// ji ltar glang chen rtsal gyis rab gcod pa// chu klung rba klong che la bde ba ltar//
253b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i chos las gzhan la mi 'chol ba'i// sangs rgyas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhal phyes pa'i// glang po rab 'bog rgyud chen gus pas nyon// sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i rgya mtshos bde chen klong // ye shes chu bo dang gamed rgyan mi 'chad// ma rig mun par skon
253b2(rnying rgyud): mar rang 'od 'bar// shes bya mtha' dbus med par yongs rgyas pa// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'bar 'dra bas// mun pa'i tshogs bcom zangs la gser 'gyur rtsi// dug 'gyur rtsi mchog bdud rtsi sman mchog 'gyur// 'khor ba nyid ni sangs rgyas dkyil 'jo
253b3(rnying rgyud): yin// rab tu gus pas rgyud 'di dang du longs// thugs rjes 'gro ba rnams la khyab par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// glang por rab 'bog gi rgyud las/ gleng bsrung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'chang gis 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad
253b4(rnying rgyud): kyi 'byung gnas 'di gsungs so// rang bzhin dang gis snang ba ni// gdod nas ma skyes snying po a// ris med kun gyi dngos gzhi pa// bcing grol med par lhun gyis grub// skyes bu'i phyed kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// me long nang du gang shar ba// nyid las ma gte
253b5(rnying rgyud): gzhan med pas// de yis rkyen rnams bral bar 'gyur// chos dbyings dkyil 'khor mu mtha' bral// ye shes rgyal pos dbang bsgyur na// sku dang ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal// rang zhal rang gis mthong gyur pa// chos sku phyag rgya chen por gnas// bla
253b6(rnying rgyud): med kun tu bzang por grol// rtogs pa mngon du 'gyur zhes bya// rang bzhin dag pa'i snang ba shar// sems nyid sangs rgyas ye nas kyang // nges pa'i shes pa ma skyes pas// ma rig mun pa'i spyod yul can// long bani grong byed chen por 'gro// dbul mo'i gte
253b7(rnying rgyud): ltar gyur pa'am// gyang kyi nor bu ltar gnas pas// rang gsang thabs kyis tsha dgur pas// dang la yod kyang de ma shes// ma dag rang bzhin snang ba shad// don mchog nyid las nyams pa med// la rig pa nyid rig par gcig/ ma rtogs rtogs pa tha dad ma /
254a1(rnying rgyud): shes dang pa shas gcig tu mtshungs// 'dor bar snang ba mya ngan 'das// sdug bsngal bde ba chen po shar // mun pa nyid ni snang bar gsal// kun cang byang chub zan po gnas// blang zhing dong ba ni yang med// thabs dang zhes rab zung du
254a2(rnying rgyud): 'brel// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med kun// snang ba stong pa ngo mnyam pas// rnam pa kun ldan stong chen po// mtha' dbus med par rang shad pa// chos nyid gshis kyi 'dug tshul nyid// skyes bus mngon du gar byas pa// phyag rgya chen po mchog nyid kyi// dngos sa gyi che
254a3(rnying rgyud): thob pa yin// zhes gsungs so// glang po rab 'bog gi rgyud las/ gnas lugs kun gyi gzhing bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rig pa'i grong byer chen po shes par byed pa 'di gsungs so// bde gshegs snying po
254a4(rnying rgyud): chub sems// thams cad bskyed pa'i sa bon nyid// 'di yis ma bskyed chos med pas// chos su snang ba 'khrul ba'i yid// sems nyid ye sangs rgyas gyur kyang // de ma shes pas ma rig pa// sngon gyi bag chags mtshungs gyur pas// lhan cig skyes pa'i sa
254a5(rnying rgyud): dag pa// rang la dang brtags ma shes pas// dmus long nam mkha' blta bar 'dod// kun tu brtags shing mi shes la// kun btags ma rig rgyu nyid yin// dge sdig lung ma bstan pa'i las// rab 'bring tha ma spyad byas te// nyon mongs lnga la mngon zhen
254a6(rnying rgyud): pas// khams gsum 'khor pa 'byung ba'i rkyen// stod kyi 'jig rten yul du snang // bcud kyi sems can bdag tu bzung // bdag gzhan rtog pa'i rkyen chags pas// ri rab gnas bcas lha yi yul// lha min ri rab long seng gnas// gling bzhi'i gnas na
254a7(rnying rgyud): mi rnams nyid// phyi yi rgya mtsho byol song gnas// yi dwags grong khyer ser spyan// dmyal ba rdo rje gdan gyi 'og/ ya dkar lha ste pu ser ni// lha min ni sngon mi ru gnas// yi dwags bre dmar dud 'gro la// du nyid dud kha byol yong yin// dmyal bar rdzi
254b1(rnying rgyud): gnag sa bon gnas// rigs drug bskyed cing 'phel bar byed// lha rnams 'dod pa'i longs spyod bsam yas la// dpag bsam shing la lto gos rtsol ba bral// lha min longs spyod rdzas la rnam skrod pa// rang bskal las kyi dbang gis rnam par
254b2(rnying rgyud): snang // mi rnams bza' btung longs spyod 'dod yon lnga// rtsol bas lto gos bde ba ldan par bsgrub// dud 'gro las kyi rang gi sa longs spyod la// ji ltar 'dod pa las kyi snang ba dang // yi dwags bsam pa'i dbang gi dang skal tsam// snang bar gyur pas lus kyi srog kyang
254b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// dmyal bar rang snang tsam gyi ngang la spyod// rang gi dbang gis de ltar snang ba yin// lha rnams ltung ba'i sdug bsngal snang gyur pa// lha ma yin la 'thab dang rtsod pa dang // mi rnams la ni 'gyur ba yod pa dang // byol song bza' btung ba ko la dang spyad pa dang //
254b4(rnying rgyud): yi dwags phyi nang sgos khur sgrib pa can// dmyal ba tshad ngadagrang bar snang bas sdug/ lha mig dag pas mthong ba'i yon tan dang // mtshon chas bsnun yang 'chi bar dka' ba dang // dam tshig sdom pa bsrung na sangs rgyas 'grub// byol song rnams ni lho gos btsal
254b5(rnying rgyud): par sla// yi dwags rnams la bsngos pas tshim par 'gyur// dmyal ba rang gi tshe las snga phyi dran// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag las tshang 'gyur bas// byams pas gzhan la phan ni 'dogs par byed// snying rje brtse ba'i se thas dang ldan pa dang // dga' bas sdug bsngal
254b6(rnying rgyud): bral bar 'dod pa dang // btang snyoms dgra zin med par khyab gyur cing // dga' ba dang ni bde ba ldan gyur pas// rtog pa dang ni dpyod pas rnam par byed// tshangs gnas rim par gnas pa'i lha rnams yin// skye mched bzhi la mig yo gnas gyur pa// srid pa'i rtse mo lho
254b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas yin// chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab pa'i phyir// gang zag theg pa gsum du 'dug gyur pa// des med gang dang 'phrad pa'i chos la spyod// 'di ni rigs kyi nges pa med pa yin// chos kyi dbyings ni kun la khyab pa dang // bde gshegs snying po dang sems
255a1(rnying rgyud): la bdabs sa la ba bldan/ na ga ga ga padunasaH// gan ga sus la// sgru pa byung ban garnams// da ya da sa 'jugs//
255a2(rnying rgyud): da pa sa thos kyir 'byung ba yin// rang bzhin gshes kyis dbang po bal ba dang // ma sbyangs las dan dang gis la dade// rna ma'i yon tan nga thaMd sa pa zhunas/ dbang pa rnal ba gang dag kyi zhing med// 'ang na snong du byung ba gang ba rnams// la 'ad
255a3(rnying rgyud): skal par rab tu ldan pa yin// rang bzhin snod med dang myang ngan pa rnams// las 'phroskal ba med pa'i chos mi 'byung // khams gsub 'khor par 'a byams pa'i sems can rnams// ma'ongs sangs nas 'byung ba'i rgyur gyungar ba// bdeg shegs snying pos kun la
255a4(rnying rgyud): pa yid// dmachis rtog pa'i zhal dang me ldan pa// nga du khabags thag gi drug pa dang // nyim mi 'char las dang zugs drugs// sangs rgya thug pa rje za la khyab ga// thung ba dgags kyi rnam pa kha' kya gnas// thams cad ma lus 'del pa 'ang
255a5(rnying rgyud): bamed// ces gsungs so// glang po pa'abog ge chud las/ 'khrul pa'i litra ste bzhi pa sa// denas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dgongs par grol ba 'di dag gsungs so// mya ngan 'das pa'i chos rnams can// mthar thug 'bras
255a6(rnying rgyud): hrI byung ba// phu ram sa rgyuN+DI gzhing byung // tsham du brim med pa gnas// rig pa dang snang gzhal yas cig// rigs bdag rnal ba sangs rgyas la// tsun mams kyi tshogs kyis bzod // dngos po gnyis la yongs mye cing // ma btsu
255a7(rnying rgyud): gzigs gyur pa// mongs myo rdzogs pa'i thunas \u0f7f// gangal byam lus 'grodamapa la// rgyu 'bri ma kyis 'dul 'ad cing // mad pa bcu nyis rdzogs med do// snying gsum 'gro baphrul pas 'dras// de skyed gdul bya ba mam pas rnams// b+ha
255b1(rnying rgyud): grangs mnyam sprul par snang // mthun pas mthun pa 'dul mdzad pa// de la sprul pa'i sku zhes bya// dang po'i sangs rgyas sar 'gro ba// de nyid ji bzhin rdornga 'chang// de nyid rang snang rang rig pa// mgon po gzhinas rdzogs sangs rgyas// sems can lus pa
255b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs gnyis rdzogs nas sangs rgyas pa// lam sbyangs rig pa grol gyur pa// rtogs pa mngon gyur sangs rgyas yin// de bzhin nyid rtogs gzhi nas grol// lam sbyangs rtogs pa mngon gyur pa// chos su thob pa gar gyur pa// mtshan med phyag rgya chen por gnas/
255b3(rnying rgyud): kyigyi sku las rnam 'phrul zhing // gdul bya yas gzigs longs spyod rdzogs// lus dag yid gsum sku gsung thugs// gang bsgom mngon du gyur pa yi// sku nyid gnyis su med gyur pa// shes rgyad ma sbyangs 'ongs skur bzhugs// 'khor dngas dngos po rnam gnyis la//
255b4(rnying rgyud): spyod pa rang gro la sgyu ma'i sku// bde ba chen po nyams su bstar// gzugs su phyag rgya chen po yin// 'jig rten khams ni 'di nyid na// sbrul sku thub pa'i dbang por snang // de bzhin 'gro drug thub pa drug/ 'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag na// bzhugs pa'i sprul sku bsam
255b5(rnying rgyud): mi khyab// 'gro ba ji ltar 'dul zhing snang // chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes nyid// dang po chos rnams stong par rtogs// me long lta bu'i ye shes nyid// chos rnams dag cing gsal bar mkhyen// ye shes gnyis kyis gang bsdus pa// chos su dri ma med par bzhugs//
255b6(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// 'khor 'das so sor tha dad med// so sor kun tu rtogs pa yis// rang dang spyi yis mtshan nyid mkhyen// ye shes de gnyis gang bsdus pa// sgyu ma'i ye shes chu zla bzhin// zhal phyag 'khor dang bcas rdzogs pa// longs spyor rdzogs pa'i sku
255b7(rnying rgyud): ru bzhugs// 'khor 'das phrin las ma lus pa// lus ngag yid kyi bya ba grub// phun sum tshogs gyur ye shes 'di// sprul pa'i sku ru bzhugs pa yin// bsod nams rgya yi tshogs bsags pas// gzugs sku gnyis kyi bdag nyid che// 'bras bu ye shes tshogs
256a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pas// chos kyi su ru rab tu 'brab// mtshan dang dab byang yang dag chags// langs spyod chags sgra sprul pa'i su// mtshan dang dab zud mi dmigs sbyangs// chos sraH/ brjod yul las 'das// dri ma med pa'i chos srul/
256a2(rnying rgyud): gzhan snang rtog pa kun bral bas// gzigs par bya ba'i yul dang bral// rang snang dgongs pa rang gsal mkhyen// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// sa thob rnams kyis zhal gzigs nas// gas chos kyi bgro ba nyan// longs su thugs rjes sa brgya gzis
256a3(rnying rgyud): las dag 'gro ba drug rnams la// mthun pa'i thugs rje rang snang la// lha rnams la ni srid thub 'dzin// lha min rnam par snang byed dang // mi la shAkya seng ge nyid// byol song seng ge dam brtan sku// yi dwags kha 'bar rgyal mo'i bu// dmyal ba rnams la chos rgyal
256a4(rnying rgyud): sras// thugs rje'i mdzad pa bcas par snang // zhes gsungs so// glang po rab 'bog gi rgyud las// mya ngan las 'das pa sku gsum bstan pa ste le'u lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po 'khor 'das thams cad rang
256a5(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// rang bzhin snang ba bcos bslad bral// 'khor 'das dbyer med chen por gnas// 'khrul pa'i snang ba snod dang bcud// gzung dang 'dzin pa gnyis su snang // gdul bya'i snang ba gang snang ba//
256a6(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs sems can don mdzad pa// bde gshegs snang ba sku gsung thugs// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor snang // snang ba bzhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la nyid 'di brjod do// sems can 'khor bar 'khyams rnams la//
256a7(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs rnam pa lnga ru snang // rnal 'byor nyams su len rnams la// nyams kyi snang ba lam du snang // bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor snang // gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab dang // thams cad pa ru blang ba'o// snang ba gsum
256b1(rnying rgyud): gag rdo pa'i 'dzer min cad//
256b2(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nga dzin// de nas ba bar gshegs pa tong sa nyid 'di brjid // martogs pa'i snang ba nyid// log par rten pa'i snang ba dang // 'phyo sbyin pa'i rnang ba dang // d+hU 'bras bum snang ba dang // dbyar ma pan bzang spang ba rnams// rang ba'i namadza na
256b3(rnying rgyud): rtogs na// chos kyi dbyings las 'gyur ba med// chos su chen por rang gnas pa'o// de yang ji lta bu zhen// dmus long tshul byung gyi bo bas// mtho bor mi rta rtags rnams mdzod// mu stegs rgyad par blta ba ni// blo brang tsam snang mtha' med balnga// rtag pa byas
256b4(rnying rgyud): dngos por 'dod// thams cad byed pa rgyu ru swa// dmyal ba'i rang bzhin me sogs snang // yi dwags sdig sems mi gtsang lus// byol song gyen mthung ngam grog snang // mi la mthong yul gling du snang // de bzhin lha min go mtshon snang // lha yi dge sems rin chen
256b5(rnying rgyud): snang / 3/ nyan thos phyi rol rdul bral bltas// rang gi shes pa skad cig ma// rang sangs rgyas pa'i lta ba ni// phyi rol bcu gnyis sgyu ma tsam// nang gi ye shes skad cig ma// rten 'brel rtsa brtsad nas bcod// dbu ma kun rdzob rnam pa bzhi// don dam spros pa rab tu
256b6(rnying rgyud): zhi// kri lA don dam chos nyid blta// kun rdzob dang rig yon tan lha// rigs gsum dkyil 'khor snang ba la// skye bo khrul pa med pa'o// gnyis ka rgyad kyi 'dod pa ni// lta spyod gong 'og rdzas su ma d+h+yani// yo gdon dam dag pa yis// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes
256b7(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa'i byin rlabs ltar snang ba// de phyir skye bo ltar mthong 'khrul// rnal 'byor chen po'i don dam du// rang rig gnyis med de bzhin nyid// rtogs pa'i cho 'phrul drug sogs pa// ltar snang dang las 'khor la med// a nu yo gas don dam du// bde chen rtogs pa'i rig
256b8(rnying rgyud): rtsal las// kun rdzob lha yi dkyil 'khor snang // de phyir skye bos brtags pa 'khrul// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor bden gnyis bral// thams cad rang byang rang snang ba'i// ye shes mtha' gsunam bral ba la// brtags pas gnyis po gdong nas med// kun tu bzang po
257a1(rnying rgyud): snang ba ni// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// ma lus rig pa byang chub sems// dbyed med thig le chen por bzhugs// zhes gsungs pas snang ba'i chos 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad brjod do//
257a2(rnying rgyud): snang ba dbang po yul rnams la// gzugs sgra dri ro reg byar snang // mchod pa 'dod yon rnam lngas bsogs// dbang po rab 'phreng tha mas brtag/ thob pa don rig zhen pa log/ sgo lnga yid kyi ngang du thim// tha mal yul gyi snang ba dang // yul can rnal 'byor
257a3(rnying rgyud): snang ba la// yul bral rgyal ba'i sdang bar grub// legs pa'i yon tan 'dod chags dang // nyes pa'i sngon la zhe sdang skyes// gnyi ga ma yin gti mug pa'i// dug gsum rna ba mched par byed// sdang ba su yi dkyil 'khor nyid// grags pa'i sgra skad pa de
257a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs gsungs// dran rtog thugs nyid bde ba che// gcer mthong gcer grol mngon sangs rgyas// 'khor bar snang ba zhen pa'i chos// mchod par gyur pazhin yul brtag/ thob par 'bras bu'i nang du bskyal// zhes gsungs so// glang bar po 'bog gi rgyud
257a5(rnying rgyud): las/ 'khor 'das snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi spyod yul bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos rang rang gi theg pa gsang bar gsungs so// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa la// lta ba'i don la kun kyang gnas/
257a6(rnying rgyud): lta bas ma khyab gcig kyang med// theg par zhugs pa shin tu nyung // 'jig rten tha ma la ngo mtshar can// gzhan lus bsad nas rang lus gso// 'di bde phyi ma ma shes pa// 'di rten rgyang 'phen blta bar bshad// kha cig skye bo dman pa yis//
257a7(rnying rgyud): 'di dang phyi ma'i don ma go// bya ba gnyis dang bral gyur pa// 'jig rten phyal ba'i lta bar bshad// rang sems snying gi dkyil gnas nas// byed pa po ru de 'dod brtag/ las 'bras bden pa'i don med cing // thams cad med 'dod chad par blta// mu stegs rtag chad
257b1(rnying rgyud): ga gapa sa pa sas// su mas thapa yang pa// bgapa pa dungs sugs la byu/ sungasas bangs dag nas/ 'das pa sgyu das// mags // / 'ad 'a
257b2(rnying rgyud): theg par bgad // ses sa she dus rgya rgyud dus pa// ma / ga sa nas/ zhi na bskas pa tugs bdugs pa'ithas tshig/ mdzad shid kyi dag bgang/
257b3(rnying rgyud): sa sa// / bya pa / pa / /
257b4(rnying rgyud): na sad+has// ba sa megs su sa sa ra 'grum na pasarna pas myed pa'is/ ngadu gsuMm da pa dpa// rig pa sa dag kyang lang das/ 'dun mang theg pa yod// byamam padu ba sa
257b5(rnying rgyud): pam/ shes // dU mi ma na sa gnas gnas nyid dag 'a ga smra sa las sa 'anag// zhig tshal ldam ba ga// nam nas don ma rnamam mam/
257b6(rnying rgyud): ga ba kyis thugs pa'i// gas byed rnab khyod// sbyin po chom gyis rnams // ma pa khyab la sheg sang dang // gci ga bang 'thob pa gyu// dpyir ba dag mtshad par bya// dmigs pathab la thal /
257b7(rnying rgyud): med pa drang bas mas so// sri ci ni byo// sa byedas pa 'a bar dang / brgya kyi'o// myang rgyas pa phyi dang // sami myongs pa kyi mi'ang // dam tsha 'bras thung ba da/ ngas
258a1(rnying rgyud): dpa theg ni// pha rol byin badrung lam zhugs pas// sa ba sa kyis bgrod srud dus// bcu gcig pan gra nga sa// dug gsus grangs pa gas gsum pas// rdo 'an pa'i sa 'tho gyur// rigs zhe nang
258a2(rnying rgyud): cha gnyis 'dzin// rigs padi rdo ba tshang sar 'gro// rigs lnga bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor ni// stug po bkod pa'i sa 'thob 'jod// rnal 'byor chen po nang pa ni/ ma chags pa d+ma can gyisar// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen la// sku lnga ldan gyis grub pa 'thab// rjes surdal
258a3(rnying rgyud): 'byor chen po ni// mtshan rdzogs rdo rje 'chang gi sar// bcu bzhi rdo rje 'dzin pa 'thob// rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// kun bzang dbye ba med pa'i sa// chos sgra theg chen kun tu brdal// thig le chen po gcig tu 'thob// phyal pa rgyang 'phen bza' btung gis// gangs ri
258a4(rnying rgyud): yul lha mchod par byed// mu stegs srog chags sha khrag gis// phywa dang dbang phyug la sogs mchod// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// gtsab ma'i mchod pa sna tshogs pas// dkon mchog rnam pa gsum mchod pa// zas mchog gtsang ma'i snod kyis dbul// ki 5
258a5(rnying rgyud): wA payog pa// dung chos nang gi snod nang du// yi dam lha la mchod par bul// sbyin gtong gnas su gtor mas mchod// dbyed pa ma hA yo ga'i rgyud// rdzogs pa a nu yo ga'i lung // dam rdzas bdud rtsi b+han d+ha'i snod// sgrol sbyor mchod pa 'bul bar byed// rdzogs chen
258a6(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// sems nyid rang snang rig pa la// mchod bya grub pa'i gnas med pas// chos sku gcig la rol par shan// zhes gsungs so// glang po rab 'bog gi rgyud las/ theg pa thams cad kyi khyad par phye ba ste le'u bdun pa'o//
258a7(rnying rgyud): de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen pos gzigs pa 'di 'gro ba'i ched du gsungs pa'o// dri med chos kyi sku pi thugs rje ni// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i gdul bya la// dmigs pa med pa'i mdzod pa kun 'khyab// chu bo'i rgyun ltar rtag par
258b1(rnying rgyud): rgyun du kye// rdo rje 'bru dang mngon par byang chub sku// rang bzhin shugs kyi thugs rje skye ba ni// dbyar dgun ston dpyid nyi ma dkyil 'khor ltar// ma byas byed med rang bzhin dang gis snang // longs su rdzogs pa'i sku la thugs rje ni// bskul zhing gsol ba btab pas
258b2(rnying rgyud): lci bar 'gyur// sa btsuthob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams// lhan cig pa dang go phyi'i dakhor rnams la// 'gro ba'i don la skul ma 'debs pa yis// gsang ba'i ba dan tu cher spogs par 'gyur// 'di ni sngon byung yin zhes don yang bstan// de bzhin rjes su 'dug
258b3(rnying rgyud): par byed pa rnams// bsam gtan rang bzhin dkyil 'khor basbed byas nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor gnyis bu med par bsgrub// 'dod pa'i don la bskul zhing gsol ba 'debs// thun mong mchog gi dngos yub 'thob par 'gyur// yul dang phrad nas thugs
258b4(rnying rgyud): ba ni// sbal pa'i bu yis gdul bya gzigs mdzad pa// ma nges 'khor la sde snod rgyud rnams gsungs// bzang po'i yul dang phrad par snang ba yin// gdug pa gdul bya'i don du khro bor bstan// ngan pa'i yul dang phrad par snang ba yin// gang la cis 'dul de la der ston pa/
258b5(rnying rgyud): d+ha tshogs yul dang phrad par snang ba yin// rjes 'jug rnal 'byor chen po sgrub pa pas// sdod ldan bu la gsang ba'i mnang gasbyin// bzang po'i snod dang phred par gyur pa yin// zhing bcu gdug pa ma lus bsngal byas nas// gnas ngan ngan song gnas rnams sgrol mang dag/
258b6(rnying rgyud): ngan pa'i yul dang phrad par gyur pa yin// rab 'bring tha ma'i dbang po mthun rtogs pa// sna tshogs yul dang phrad par gyur pa yin// phyogs gcig steng rje 'gro bkun la yod// khwa dang s+yAng gis rang gi bu nyid gso// mchod nyid nyan dang theg pardung ngul// sems can rnams
258b7(rnying rgyud): la dmigs pa'i snying rje yod// tshad med bzhi yis 'gro don yid la byed// mdo sde byang chub sems dpa'i theg chen la// chos la dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po yis// kun rdzob byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yis don rnams mdzad//
259a1(rnying rgyud): gsangababya rgyan pa byang rgyud rnams na// thugs rje chen pos gzhan don dang du men// phrin las rnam pazhes gra na drags par ma dang// bla ma la 'byor gsang skyugs nang pa// 'dod cag sa chos nying ngan skar byas nas/
259a2(rnying rgyud): zhe sdang sted de chen po'i mdza sto dkyis// mtshams med mnar ming dmyal bar ltung ba dang // ngam nyams rdo rje dmyal deng skyed rnams// gsang sngags thabs mi mdza spyod chen po yis// 'khor ba'i gnas nas mya ngan 'das par grol// rdzogs cadams cwa ga zegs
259a3(rnying rgyud): chen po ni// dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen po nyid// snying rje chen pos cing mi mdzad// sring pa'i rkyenas dmyal ba'i gnas rnams kun// chos spu thig le chen po gcig tu rtogs// zhes gsungs so// glang po rab 'bog gi rgyud las/ thugs rje yongs la snang
259a4(rnying rgyud): le'u ste brgyad pa'o// de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas longs spyod chen po rgyal ba drug pas/ sku gsum dkyil 'khod kyis 'gro ba'i don du bstan pa rgyas par snang ba 'od gsungs so// stong phrag brgyad khri ba'i
259a5(rnying rgyud): stong gi// nyon mongs de nyid gnyen po ru// stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong gi// chos kyi rgo mo de nyid do// stong gsum sems can ma lus pa'i// nyon mongs gnyen por dgongs nas gsungs// le lang mdo yi sde ru gsungs// la yar dbyangs kyi sde pa dang // la la
259a6(rnying rgyud): lung du bstan pa'i sde// la lar tshigs su bcad pa'i sde// la lar ched du brjod pa'i sde// la lar gleng gzhi'i sde dang ni// la lar rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde// de lta bu ru byud pa'i sde// la lar skyes pa rabs kyi sde// la lang shin tu rgyas pa'i sde// rmad du byung pa'i chos
259a7(rnying rgyud): kyi sde// gtan la phab pas bstan pa'i sde// gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis rnams// gdul byang gyur la gang mos gsungs// la la lhums su zhugs pa de ston// la la lhums nas bltams pa dang // la lar gzhon nu rol rtsed mdzad// la lis khab tu bzhe
259b1(rnying rgyud): ba dang // la lang rab tu byung ba dang // la lang dka' thub mngang par sna/ lal thal btan pa dang // la lang sangs rgyas pa da pa dang // la lang bdu rnams brtul ba dang // lal rgyas kyi 'khor la bskod// la lang myang na 'das pa dang //
259b2(rnying rgyud): sku gdung bgod pa mdzad// sangs rgyas mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyis// gdul bya ma lus 'dul bar 'gyur// gti mug rmongs pa'i gdul bya rnams// bdeg shegs sdang mdza 'byung bar 'gyur// zhe sdang mnang sems 'dul don du// rdo rje sems dpa'
259b3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// nga rgyal mngon pa 'dul ba'i phyir// rin chen 'byung ldan 'byung bar 'gyur// 'dod chags can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// sdang ba mtha' yas 'byung bar 'gyur// phrag dag can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// don yor grub pa byung bar 'gyur// drag lnga
259b4(rnying rgyud): gdul bya la// rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor mngon par snang // bram ze 'dul bying bya ba'i rgyud// rmongs rigs rnams la spyod pa'i skang // rje'u rigs la rnal 'byor spyod// gdol par rnal 'bod bla na med// mi rigs bzhi rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// rgyud sde bzhi
259b5(rnying rgyud): par mdzad// rgyal rigs la ni kun gyis 'dul// chos skyong mnga' bdag 'dul ba'o// gdug pa can rnams 'dul 'gyur phyir// du khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshul// mkhas shing snying stobs che ba'i gnas// dur khrod chen po sku la rdzogs// yon tan mthong
259b6(rnying rgyud): thos can ni mang // du khrod chen po ha rbanA brdal// bde skyid ldan pa de na med // drang khrod chen po gsang chen rol// mthu bang yon tan den che// dur khrod chen po lhun grub brtsegs// zas kyi longs spyod che ba'i gnas// dra srong zan po lang ka brtsegs/
259b7(rnying rgyud): yon tan dngas sru thab pa med// rung khrod chen mo sgrol bar mdzad// rnal 'khyor longs spyod rab tu ldan// drung khrod 'jig rten ma ni rdzogs na// rdzu 'phrul la ma zung du skyon// 'jig rten lha brgyad bsgol 'dul ba'i// dru rjod chen mo brgyang du bstan/
