261b1(rnying rgyud): la gzung // yang dag don ston nges pa'i don// sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas pas// 'khor ba ka dag dri ma med// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gnas// dgongs pas bshad pa blo rab la// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad na// bdag
261b2(rnying rgyud): gzhan dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhe sdang shan pa rdo rje'i rigs// gti mug glen pa de bzhin rigs// 'dod chags yi dwags pad+ma'i rigs// dug gsum zhing bcu'i phung po bsad// sems nyid sangs rgyas sras su bsgral// rgya 'bras bsod nams
261b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes tshogs// bdag gzhan gnyis kas thob par 'gyur// dgongs min dbang po dman pa la// lha dman sngags kyi lha zab 'bri// sems ni sangs rgyas 'grub pa'i rgyu// tshogs gnyis 'bad pas 'bras bu 'grub// sgra nI rdo bzhin bshad pa gang //
261b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil la bang thos dang dmachag bsgreng // lha kun skom dang gsang sngags bzlas// rlob sa dbang bsud dngos grub blang // sra da nga bzhin ma yinu pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te// a 'bras rgyun 'brus pa nas// nam ga nas yigang// kAT/
261b5(rnying rgyud): k+Sha ni srin po'i skyed// kun mkhyen dgongs pas shes par 'gyur// bshad pa'i tshul bzhi tshig don dang // spyi sbas mthar thug don du bshad// tshig don ming tshig sgra 'byor la// ru sa~M skul bskur 'gros lta bu nyid// lci don mdo sngags rnam pa gnyis// mda~M
261b6(rnying rgyud): zhugs nas 'dod pa zlog/ sngags la zhugs nas bskyed rdzogs bsgom// spyir srud seng ge'i mchongs pas bshad// sbas bshad nanyung thig le sngags// sems can lus sras ston pas 'byin// 'dod chags kun rdob ye shes gsum// hA sas thugs
261b7(rnying rgyud): ga brna brgyud 'dzin// mthar thug 'khor 'das dbyer med chos// rang bzhin 'od gsal zung du 'jug/ nyan bshad dbye ba rnam pa gnyis// tshogs dang slob ma phyi dang nang // tshogs bshad sgra bzhin dgongs pa yin// drang don yi ge spyi yi don// slob bshad sla
262a1(rnying rgyud): nyid ji bzhin min// nges don dgongs te sras mthar thug/ snod kyi gang zag rnam pa lnga// ut+pal pad+ma dkar po dang // pad+ma dmar ba tsan+dan dang // rin chen lta bu'i gang zag lngas// gsang sngags snod rnams gtan la dab
262a2(rnying rgyud): Akhrul mang 'dzin yal bsnyen// thos mang 'dzin ma khas rjod pa sa// pad dkar spang ma spang rje 'dzin// thos mang bum nang ngas bal 'dra// par+Na yid 'ong legs par bya// thang rtsi 'dzeg par gyur bsan// dad ldan snying rje shes rab rje// thos ni sa kha rgya tshig
262a3(rnying rgyud): brjod// tsan+dan sdod chung ji ldan pa// 'dab mdug bul byung bar dka'// thos nyung nga rgyal rtsa med sgra// rjes su gzung bar mi nus so// rin chen dang dag gzhan don mdzad// 'odod 'byung no dbus don byed ltar// dam ldan 'dzin mkhas shes rab ldan// hud gcig
262a4(rnying rgyud): thos nas len par ston// bden pa'i dgongs pa rnam pa gnyis// kun rdzob bskyed rim su lus bsgom// don dam rdzogs rim 'od gsal bsgom// zhes gsungs so// glang po rab 'bog gi rgyung las/ gsang sngags gsang ba'i rgyud thams cad lce rgyan bdun gyi
262a5(rnying rgyud): bshad par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i chang chen pos dmigs par bya ba'i brtag bya gtan la 'bebs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so// chos rnams ma lus thams cad
262a6(rnying rgyud): kun// gnas lugs snang lugs gnyis su 'dus// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// gnas lugs ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi// gnyis med ris bral kun ngo po// snang lugs 'khor 'das gnyis su snang // mime rtog pa dang rtogs par 'gyur// de nas ma sbyangs go phye'i 'khor//
262a7(rnying rgyud): cig pa la 'di skad zhus// 'gro drug snang ba rang ka ma// gnas lugs gzhi nyid yin nam min// yin na 'gro drug bden mthong bas// 'bad pa med pas rang grol 'gyur// min na 'gro drug sems can rnams// sangs rgyas 'bras bu ga la thob//
262b1(rnying rgyud): na te gnyis su med gyur na// rig dang ma rig tha dadadu snang // 'on te so sor tha dad snang // sangs rgyas sems can 'brel ba med// sems nyid bde gshegs snang po man// chu dang me bzhin dgra zung 'dra// de skad sbran pa'i lha can gsungs// de nas
262b2(rnying rgyud): lhan cig gnas pa'i 'khor// dgyes nas rmang byung ngo mtshar gsungs// srid gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// sems nyid ye nas mngon sangs rgyas// de ma shes pas bden mthong min/ gser mdzong gser dum shes bzhin// rang sems ldan
262b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kyang // rnam rtog gzung 'dzin mthu brtas pas// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa rnams// bden pa ma mthong 'khor bar 'khyams// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med kyang // theg dman 'khor 'das tha dad 'dzin// 'khor ba spangs nas de
262b4(rnying rgyud): 'grub// me long lho rgyab log dang mtshungs// khams gsum sems can las dang ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs rje 'brel// dper na me gnyis gnyen bshes bzhin// bde gshegs snying po gcig tu gnas// 'di rtogs sems can sangs rgyas
262b5(rnying rgyud): yin// yang ni go phye'i 'khor gyis dris// 'khor ba'i chu ni ci las byung // ma rig pa las byung gyur na// gzhi la yod dam med pa yin// yod na ma rig spang du med// med na 'ong ba'i rtsa ba med// med kyang 'byung bar gyur pa na// nam mkha' las kyang me tog tu
262b6(rnying rgyud): lhan cig 'khor la bka' stsal pa// sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas kyang // nges pa'i shes pa ma skyes pas// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa// gzhi la med kyang glo bur snang // dper na nam mkha'i sprin dang 'dra// go phye'i 'khor gyis yang dris pa// 'khor ba'i sems la
262b7(rnying rgyud): gzhi rtsa med// de la rtogs par byar yod na// nam mkha' ye nas stong pa la// de las stong pa gnyis mi rnyed// de phyir sangs rgyas gang rtogs snang // lhan cig pa yi 'khor gyis gsungs// dper na mig gis gzhan mthong yang // mig na rdul song de ma mthong //
263a1(rnying rgyud): sa su / sa gsu sa/
263a2(rnying rgyud): sa/ / dag pa na / 'dapa ba da /
263a3(rnying rgyud): smras sa/ smra / smra
263a4(rnying rgyud): sa byas sas
263a5(rnying rgyud): smra sa
263a6(rnying rgyud): sas sa sa sa smra
263a7(rnying rgyud): sa dus su su / kyin na slang du gas su
263b1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' don dmaH dang 'dra// cha gnyis 'dzid pa sun rdzob rigs bzhi'i lus// don dam ye shes wA ni rang snang s+ya// rnal 'byor kun rdzob sa ni dang lus nyid// don das rdo rje dbyings te spyan 'a grogs// ma hA yongs su rtog tshogs bden gnyis lha/
263b2(rnying rgyud): a ru dbyings dang ye shes bden gnyis lha// theg brgyad snang lugs 'khor 'das gnyis su bzla// rdzogs chen gnas lugs thig le chen po 'don// rab zhi spos med yongs su gdung 'dzin bral// zhes gsungs so// de nas go h+ye'i 'khod rnams
263b3(rnying rgyud): ces/ lhan cig pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di spyad ces dris so// gzhi la don ni ka dag na// ma ga 'khrul pa grub sa grub// dpa' bod pa'am na ga'abral pa// gal gA'i gus thal pa'i// kAnas dag kyi thub sa myong // dra la srer ba med ldan
263b4(rnying rgyud): sa smra nga sa su/
263b5(rnying rgyud): 'thad de// 'khor 'das chos ni mi 'byung phyir// mtshungs ldan smra yang med par 'gyur// dung las 'khrul gzhi yod dam med// yod na gzhi yod 'khrul bar 'gyur// gzhi med 'khrul par mi srid do// dung las stsal du 'khrul mi srid// dpa' po dpa' mos yang
263b6(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa// 'khrul med ka ngag yin shes na// de la 'khrul po'i yul med pas// gser la ga ser du rtogs pa bzhin// rdo rje mched kyis yang nus pa// 'khor 'das gzhi la lhun grub na// phyogs gcig grub bam phyogs med grub// phyogs
263b7(rnying rgyud): gcig grub na gnyis mtshad // ma grub ga ni yi rjem tshig khyod // phyogs med grub par gyur bar// chos can ma mthung dang grub gyur// 'ad na sang sa mngon sus gsal// migs la bsams na sdang byed// de de phyogs med yin par 'gyur// dpal
264a1(rnying rgyud): po dpa' mos bka' stsal pa// phyogs med kun tA rang shar gzhan// gang lhung ba sdus pa der snang bas// 'khrul med lhan grub gzhir rtogs bya// gzhi don ma nor bskad mtshon// 'khor 'das rang sems nyid yin pag//
264a2(rnying rgyud): ti la gang bzhin du ye gnas pa// gnyis su bsdus pa ma 'dres la// yongs su rdzogs pa lhun gyis grub// rdo rje mched kyis yang zhus pa// ma rig 'a khrul pa zlab mthug/ dpa' bo dpa' mos bka' stsal pa// kun gyi dngos gzhir snang ba'i gzh-i// yid
264a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin nor bu ltar snang bas// grub ma grub kyi 'angams ka bral// 'khor 'das snang bar shar ba ni// de ni 'khrul pas dbye bas na// brtag gzhi zhes kyang de la bya// rdo rje mched kyis yang zhus pa// chos kyis bsdus pa'i mched lham rnams// gzhi yi don du gcig
264a4(rnying rgyud): pa la// ka dag lhun grub ci phyir gnyis// dpa' bo dpa' mos bka' stsal pa// chos kyi 'dres pa'i rdo rje mched// gnas lugs snang lugs rnam pa gnyis// gnas lugs don la dbye ba med// log pa'i rgyu rkyen shes rab bral// snang lugs 'khor 'das
264a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis su snang // 'khor ba'i snang ba sems nyid la// sangs rgyas dgongs pa lhun gyis grub// 'das par snang ba'i sangs rgyas la// ma rig 'khrul pa ka nas dag/ gnas lugs snang lugs thams cad kun// ma rtogs rtogs par mtshon phyir kye// yang
264a6(rnying rgyud): drag don gyi gnas lugs la// rtogs drung ma rtogs grub pa med// ces gsungs so// glang po rab 'bog gi rgyud las/ 'khor 'das rtsod bral chen po'i gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
264a7(rnying rgyud): nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la bgro ba'i ched du 'di gsungs so// bka' dman 'dud pa'i gdul bya rnams// sbyangs pas chos kyi snod du gyur// dpag med bsgral par rgyal sbyangs// sngon tshe thub chud sngags la sbyangs// tshe 'dir rgyu 'bras chos la
264b1(rnying rgyud): blangs// de nas gangang chen sngags la 'jug/ nges pa don gyi gdul bya rnams// rang bzhin gyis ni snod gyur pa// skye bo mnges sa dag nas// gsang chen sngags la rab tu 'jug/ kha cig sbyangs pa'i rim gyis pa// dpag med sngon nas tshe 'dir sbyangs// kha ci
264b2(rnying rgyud): dus mtha'i cig char ba// rgyud lung man ngag chos la 'jug/ sngon gyi las 'gro yod pa dang // 'phral du skal bar ldan pa dang // dad pas chos la mos pa dang // brtson 'grus dang du len pa dang // shes rab rtogs par ldan rnams la// yin pa'i thog tu
264b3(rnying rgyud): mtshon nas bstan// mtshon pa'i thog nas go ba dang // go ba'i thog nas rtogs pa dang // rtogs pa'i thog nas thob pa dang // thob pa'i thog nas grol 'gyur bas// ma nor nges pa'i gtan la 'bebs// dang por gtan la 'bebs dus su// gzhal bya 'khor
264b4(rnying rgyud): 'das gnyis la 'jal// 'khor 'das gnyis su zhen pa yis// snang ba gtan pa dbab par bya// de tshe go phyi'i 'khor gyis dris// 'das pa la ni 'jal ba na// dang po las kyi spyod yul du// 'das par ma gyur gzhal mi btub// 'khor ba la ni
264b5(rnying rgyud): gzhal ba la// 'khor ba spyi yi mtshan nyid ni// da dung mi rtog gzhal mi btub// de brtags bsam byung shes rab 'gro// las ni dang po'i gang zag gis// thos pa'i chos ni ma byas par// bsam pa'i shes rab mi 'ong // 'khor ba rang gi
264b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid la// de la gzhal byar byas 'jal na// 'khor ba'i rang mtshan skad cig ma// skad cig snga ma 'das pas med// phyi ma'i ma skyes pa ni med// da lta'i rig pa skad cig ma// de la ga zhal du mi bdub ste// mdzub mo rang gi rtse mo la// mdzub mo rang
264b7(rnying rgyud): gis reg mi nus// skyes bu ji ltar rtsal che yang // rang la rang gis mchongs mi nus// spu gri'i so ni rdo gyur kyang // so yis so nyid gcad du med// mig gis thams cad mthong gyur kyang // rang nyid rang la mthong mi srid// de skad ma sbyangs sems dpar
265a1(rnying rgyud): sa// lhan rtsig pa po 'khor kyis gsungs// dper dag la byangs gcig pa// 'dal kyang bye mang la bu na// jag med bre mang gzhal myi brtag/ snang med rdzas kyi rji mi shes// gzhal byar ga
265a2(rnying rgyud): ma// 'jal byed gtan tshigs de nyid gtong // gzhal bya byas na gtan tshigs med// gtan tshogs byas na gzhal bya med// khyed ni de ltar 'dod pa yin// bdag ni 'di ltar 'dod pa ste// zhen pa shes pa'i spyi yul yin// rig pa skad cig gnas
265a3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba// shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid yin// de phyir len pa'i spyi yul la// shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid 'jal// yul dang sems ni ma 'dres phyir// zhe na sdang rig pa 'angal skyon med// dang po las kyi gang zag gis// 'od 'das gnyis zhen snga
265a4(rnying rgyud): ba la// rang rig rtod byed tshad mas gzhal// zhen snang 'jal la ston pa med// de skad brjod pas ma sbyangs mnyes// srid gsum 'gro la thugs rje yi// brtags ka zhi ga tAn la nges par phab// ces gsungs so// glang po rab 'bog gi rgyud la yi/
265a5(rnying rgyud): gzhal bya'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas sangs rgyas thams cad gyis// 'gro ba'i don du brjod pa 'ang dgra gsungs so// sems can kun gyi yid rig pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi mchog/ ste shi med pa'i ga yung drung
265a6(rnying rgyud): skye// chos sku dri ma med pa yi// rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor rnams ni// ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshogs rnams la// thams cad chos kyi dbyings su thim// thig le chen por ye nas gnas// 'khor 'das bde ba'i longs spyod la// ye shes lha mang pos bu dang//
265a7(rnying rgyud): zad mi shes pa'i gter du 'gyur// longs spyod rdzogs sgra rigs lnga'i sku// sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems// smin pa rgya mtsho'i 'khor rnams la// dgongs pa brda' yis sdang 'gyur ba// me long bzhin du byad skyon sel// rab 'byams sto 'i 'jig rten na/
265b1(rnying rgyud): rdul phran 'grob thams cad la// thams cad mkhyen pa sprul pa'i sku// nyon mongs kun gyi nang du gnas// 'gro ba lha ma'i byang chub sems// mos paku ma tsha'i 'khor kun la// rang rang sa sa'i skad du gsungs// tshig dbyangs med pa'i skad kyis po// mngon sum
265b2(rnying rgyud): snang ba dngos med nyid// dbyer med byang chub chen por rtogs// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// mngon par byang chub sku nyid la// snang ba gang yin rang sdang zhid// rig pa rang snang 'khor rnams la// snang bas bstan par thugs pa ni// sdang sro grags ba
265b3(rnying rgyud): su snang // skye 'jig med pas 'gyur ba med// nam mkha' nyid du rnam par dag/ rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku// rtag pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid// 'byung ba lnga nyid 'gyur med rtogs// dbyer med rdo rje'i 'khor rnams la// grags stong dbyer med snang ba yang // ma skyes
265b4(rnying rgyud): 'jig bral go bar snang // lhag pa chen po chos kyi sku// skye med don gyi gsung mchog gis// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i 'khor rnams kun// chos dbyings skye med nam mkhar rtogs// longs spyod rdzogs pa rigs lnga'i sku// dgongs pa brda yi gsung snang bas// smin
265b5(rnying rgyud): rgya mtsho'i 'khor rnams kyi// shes bya'i sgrib pa gting dpag med// mdzad pa mthar phyin sprul pa'i skus// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi gsung lhan gyis// thos pa rgya mtsho'i 'khod rnams la// sgrib stangs sa dang rnam thar thob// snang srid mngon par byang chub slus/
265b6(rnying rgyud): skang gsung gis chos ston pa// rig pa rang snang 'khor rnams kun// yul kun rang rig mngon byang chub// skye 'jig bral brdo rje'i sus// grags stong dbyer med rdo rje'i gsung // dbyer med rdo rje'i 'khor rnams la// kun rdzo don dam mi byed go// btags pa
265b7(rnying rgyud): ma yin pa'i// mtshan nyid spu lnga'i snang ba la// btags pa'i gsung lnga ma yin pa'i// mtshan nyid gsung lngar snang ba yin// btags pa'i 'khor lnga ma yin pa'i// mtshan nyid 'khor lngar snang ba la// btags pa'i chos lnga ma yin pa'o// mtshan nyid bstan
266a1(rnying rgyud): ma smra/ sa / ma na sa
266a2(rnying rgyud): na tong btud// mngan sum dar ras mtshul gyi// maspod med kya 'dra nas/ kyang na tu 'i mngadababya/ sa gnas ste/ gas kyi sbyong pa'o/
266a3(rnying rgyud): panas
266a4(rnying rgyud): yangasan mi thams cad kyi rgya cin byos// 'tho'amams can lum mi cing tu nigasungangaso// ces thum pa'i ga kyis sa// edu dgongs pa nga tu bu/ dbang ma gagis slob dang // sa pan do das
266a5(rnying rgyud): na // ma / // dgas pa'i phyis k+Sha/ mapa da
266a6(rnying rgyud): da// e ba dun pa ga sa
266a7(rnying rgyud): yul sa/ ma thun pa yi ga 'ang dang // ma zab pa la rig 'dzin dang / bye mi ninams kyi so// smre rjes bstan pa de bzhes// mam 'don pa da 'gra bas/ sa ga sa tha pa
266b1(rnying rgyud): laslebs pa chung / smon pa'i bya gtong sul rto // rabyu ba'ims ga la mthas// 'khor ba blang ba ltas dang / mkhal ma rgya gsus bzud pas// nami nga rnye pams dang / chang byin ma ma ba'athor chu//
266b2(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa ston// srang len med pa'i don rtogs nas// phyag ma chen po mchog nyid kyi// dngos grub dam pa thong par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// glang po ba 'bog gi chud las// tshul lha'i gtan tshigs kyis nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste 'acolnga pa'o//
266b3(rnying rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte dbus na// sku lha'i bdag nyid chos 'chad bzhugs// ston pa'i bdag nyid rnam pa lnga// 'chad pa'i skyes bu rnam pa lnga// dmachos lnga rnams so song go// dpyad du meg pa sa
266b4(rnying rgyud): pa bzhi// dpyad du yod pas gro ba gcig/ rnam pa gnyis su snang 'gyur yang // sdud pa rdo rje'i snying po yis// don bzhin bsdus pa'i yi ge'i rgyud// glegs pa ma tshig gi tshogs rnams ni// lam gyi yi ge rgyud nyid dang // sems lnga skyes pa'i skyes bu'i
266b5(rnying rgyud): thugs// lam gyi ngo bo rgyad yin byas// thams cad ma lus rtogs par byed// dpyid du med par go pa ni// dbang po rnan po'i spyod yul te// snang srid chos rnams ma lus pa// byang chub snying por gtan la 'do bas// dpyod du yod par go ba ni// dang
266b6(rnying rgyud): brtul po'i spyod yul te// dpe don rtags dang gtan tshigs kyis// yid ches nges shes byas par ston// dpyod pa zhugs na rtog pa'i gzhi// rtog bzhugs na dmigs pa'i rten// dmigs pa zhugs na 'dzin pa'i gzung // 'dzin pa sa zin
266b7(rnying rgyud): phyi grol mi 'gyur// dpyad du med par gang dpyad pas// sems can ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas byang chub snying por gnas// de phyir dpyad pa'i bya byed med// sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed par dka'// tshig dang yi ges mi mtshon te// rgyal
267a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i zas pa cang mi gsung // dpyad du yod pas dpyang yod pas// phyi rol snang ba'i spyod yul ba// dbang po rnam lngas dpud byus // dug gsung skye bar snang bu rnams// martogs khams gsum 'khor ba rnams//
267a2(rnying rgyud): mi rtog bde stong lam du byas// sku gsum 'bras bu thob 'gyur ba// dpyad du yod pas dpyad par bya// dpyad du med pas dpyad med pa// rnal 'byor sems kyis sems la blta// sems la dngos med bsgom pa med// dngom por bsgom pas bsgom pa
267a3(rnying rgyud): min// dngos dang dngos min rnam dpyid nas// chos rnams thams cad sems su 'dus// sems nyid nam mkha' la gnas te// nam mkha' cir yang mi gnas pas// de phyir dpyad pa'i bya byed bral// byar med bsam bral brjod 'das rtogs// dpyad du yod pa
267a4(rnying rgyud): dngos zhen pa// mu stegs rtag par blta ba tshungs// dpyad du med la zhen 'thas pa// mu stegs chad par lha dang mtshungs// mtha' gnyis gol sa dpyad bya'i phyir// mkhas pas phyogs gcig zhen mi bya// rtag chad phyogs su gang zhen pa// don gyi snying po
267a5(rnying rgyud): nyid las go la// dpyad du yod par snang ba rnams// phyi yul rnam pa lnga tshogs la// nang gi rig pa zhen pa yin// de nyid dpyad du med ces bya// dran par snang bar byud yod na// dran med yin pas dpyad du med// dpyad du med par snang ba rnams// sems
267a6(rnying rgyud): kyis sems la blta ba yin// sems nyid skye ba med par shes// dpyad du yod med gnyis myed pas// de nyid blo las 'das pa ni// zung 'dug bde ba chen por gnas// dbyer med dpyod yul bral bar rtogs// yod med rtog pa'i rlo mi gnas/
267a7(rnying rgyud): sdang stong ngo mnyam dpyod yul thal// 'dzin mod gzung bag la srid// dri ma 'o gcig kun ngobo// rnam pa kun ldan stong par gnas// zhes gsungs mo// glang po rab 'bog gi rgyud las/ gtad tshigs kyi gzhid byung du song me tharje bcurgyan
267b1(rnying rgyud): denas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdu kyisangs sa la 'do sa yin panugs nas/ 'du shes pa rgya du 'a da du 'dzang // smyon pa sa bya ba 'bar bas// gang ngas gas bdud pas nal// rnal 'a mas ma
267b2(rnying rgyud): gsal ba// ji ltar 'dod pa gnyen la 'brebs// gcig gas gzhan la dbab pa ni// labang 'das byang chub sems su gcig/ ngan 'i sems nyi rtogs par bya// chos kyis bzhes pad+ma wAr// gnyis kyis gtan la 'bebs 'ad dan/
267b3(rnying rgyud): dang mngan 'das pa'i chos// mngon sumadzes dpag ngag gi sartogs// 'khor ba mngon su mdzes dpa' 'dam// pa na du ma drab 'i brtan nas// rjes dpagra ma nyid 'dod gyur ba// mtshan nyid tshu las rgol bya dzam s+ya// stod pa'i dam
267b4(rnying rgyud): rnam gnyis te// lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid do// mngon sum lung la rjes dpag tsigs// 'bras zla las kyis rdol pa 'joms// mdzod rten rtags kyis ma mtho'i rtogs// gsum gyis chos rnams rtogs 'dod pas// bde ga shes
267b5(rnying rgyud): bka' lung tshad ma dang // bla ma'i san gcod ma dang // rang gi rig pa tshad ma dang // yid ches don rigatogs pa 'anar// bzhi yis gang zhig gtan la 'bebs// bka' yaM lung las sdang ba dang // bstan pa'i don dang mi 'gal zhing /
267b6(rnying rgyud): la ni 'thad pa dang // gtan tshigs rnams kyi sra baglan pa'i// sde sdod chos rnams gtan la 'bebs// dran mong ma yin pa ni bskor smras// 'bras bu 'grub par bstan pa ni// cir yang sdang du bdub pa dang // ci yang sa cing bslab
267b7(rnying rgyud): cing yang bsgrub pas gang yang 'grub// lnga yis chos rnams gtan 'di bas ni// ni nyid chos can dag pa gnas// / ngas blangs pa la dam bcas nas// gtan tshig sa rnams kyis gtan yi dpa'// mtshon pa'i dpe yis mitshon byang nas//
268a1(rnying rgyud): mtha'i don rnams mthar phyin no// drug gis 'khor 'das gtan 'bebs pa// gzhi las thams cad snang ba yin// rgyu las thams cad skye ba yin// rkyen gyis ma lus bskyed par byed// las dang mthun par srid pa
268a2(rnying rgyud): yin// bag chags dag la spyod pa yin// brtags na mi rnying stong par tsam// kun la de ltar 'byor par bya// gzhi don martogs 'khor bde snang // ma rig pa yi rgyu las skyes// las dang nyon mongs rkyen gyis 'gyod// dug gsum khams gsum
268a3(rnying rgyud): mthun par sdang // gzung 'dzin la spyod rnam shes snang // brtags na ma rnyed chos nyid thim// 'khor ba ma lus gtan la 'bebs// khams gsum stong gsum srid gsum gsal// gzhi yi don rtogs mya ngan 'das// tshogs gnyis rgyu las skye ba
268a4(rnying rgyud): yin// blta bsgom spyod pa'i rkyen gyis bskyed// sku dang ye shes mthun par snang // sku gsung thugs rjes 'gro don spyod// brtags na 'bras bu chos srur thim// phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams// thams cad ma lus rtogs
268a5(rnying rgyud): par bya// 'khor 'das dbyer med gzhi las sdang // sems kyi rgyu las thams cad skyes// rig dang mjig rkyen gyis bskyed// dge sdig tshogs gnyis mthun pas srid// 'khor 'das bag chags dron la myod// brtags na chos nyid chol srung bam/
268a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad dbyer med gcig tu srud// de bzhin gtan 'bebs gtan tshigs ni// kun rdzob sdang ba 'khor ba'i chos// don dam sdang ba mya ngan 'das// kun rdzob don dam dbyer med gcig/ dbyer med tsam 'dzin spyod yul bral// zhes gsungs /
268a7(rnying rgyud): glang po rab 'bog gi chung las/ chos thams cad gtan la 'bebs pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid chen pos bdag nyid chen po rang spang ba 'di gsungs so// yul dang thabs dang
268b1(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu dang // mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid mtshan 'bras can// shes pa'i mtshan nyid lha brgya// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid bsgom pa rkyen// mngon 'gyur mdzad nyid 'bras bur bzung // b+ha byed rdul 'byor rgyulam 'bras// lta ba'i mtshan nyid
268b2(rnying rgyud): rab shes pa// gser blta gser bstan gser bzhin du// bdag phyir bya byed ma dmigs pas// rtog dpyod dmigs 'dzin mi 'tshol bar// de brjod nyid kyis de nyid mthong // sus kyang ma bcos bcing med do// bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin//
268b3(rnying rgyud): bcing med rnam par grol med par// grol bar mi 'dod bcing dang bral// dpyad du med par rtog pas dpyad// dpyad pas go bar bya ba yang // don dang mi mthun mtshon bya na// chos kun mtha' las 'das pa la// mtha' rnams gang yang dor med pas//
268b4(rnying rgyud): ltar 'di'o zhes bstan med// rang bzhin ngo bo bstan par dka'// 'on kyang yin min 'dzin grol phyir// mdor na ji ltar brtags bsam bzhin// 'gyur bas kun gyi ngo bor snang // de mtshon ci yang yin pa'i phyir// sems chos ci yang ma yin no// de phyi
268b5(rnying rgyud): ma yin kun yin pas// cir yang yin no lhun gyis grub// mtha' kun phyogs su ma chad phyir// mtha' dang bral phyir ma bral ba'o// gang yang ma spangs mi ldan pas// ma bral phyir na bral zhes bya// ngo bo phebs pas rgyas par 'gyur// phyogs
268b6(rnying rgyud): bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // dus bzhir gshegs pa'i rgyal ba rnams// sems gnas sems rtogs sangs rgyas nyid// de las gzhan du mi btsal lo// lam gyi mtshan nyid rab shes nas/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi nyi zla la// rdo rje sems
268b7(rnying rgyud): dpa' yab yum bsgom// sangs rgyas ma lus bsgom par 'gyur// oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ sems can lus la rtsa gnas pa// dkyil 'khor bzhi dang srog shing gsum// g.yo ba rlung dang bskyod pa'i mes// nam mkha'i ba bzhos bdud rtsi 'bebs/
269a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f// bde can tal longs spyod // mos la ba d+hi da sprul pa // Al rnam ga shing gsum// yi gas gsum gra nas gnas// rdzas kyi 'ams dgra'adus pa so// byang grub sams bdu nyid// lugs tu
269a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba skyed byed pas// lugs las bzlog pas na 'das// nam mkha'i rlung gis srog 'dzin cing // su mu se rlung rdzol bar rgyu// rtswa ba yan lag bcas pa yis// phung po dbang yul las rnams kyang // 'bras bu'i mtshan nid rab shes pa// rig pa
269a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i sar gnas pa// rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin ni// brkos phor nA ge 'dag pa 'dra// che la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin ni// nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra// phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin ni// 'jig rten mes po tshangs pa 'dra// lhun gyis grub pa'i rig
269a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin ni// 'byung chen gtos kyi nam mkha' 'dra// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra// zhes gsungs so// glang po rab 'bog gi rgyud las/ chos thams cad don rnam par bsdus nas sgod bye ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad
269a5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // de nas sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po sa chos thams cad ye shes dang dbyings su ye nas sangs rgyas po 'di gsungs so// stong gsum srid gsum khams gsum rnams// yo nas chos kyi dbyings nyid la// ma rtogs 'byung ba lnga ru 'dzin// 'dzin
269a6(rnying rgyud): pa de nyid dang grol phyir// 'gyur med ma dang sangs rgyas spyan// rgyud chad med pa thugs rje'i rgyun// mA ma kI yi b+ha ga na// skyon bral me dbyings gos dkar ma// thogs med rlung dbyings dam tshig sgrol// nam mkha' kun tu bzang mo nyid// gnas dang skye dang
269a7(rnying rgyud): spyod gyur pa// rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la// phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams// yum dang 'du 'bral med par bzhugs// snod kyi 'jig rten ma lus kun// ye nas zhing khams rnam dag la// mjig de nyid shes bya la// shang phyogs mngon
269b1(rnying rgyud): nas na// zlum sa smras// nga na rgyu d+ha// na dug// stsas brdzun sa s+ho// na ga // dag gas /
269b2(rnying rgyud): du / byas sa / gas /
269b3(rnying rgyud): bad na rgyam pasas// dgra dzi gas myo// sa dan ma nanas / badrug yo tug dag// dz+nyAn pa pa thogs pabargyad pas// band kyus 'dog tu btus babyung du med paman//
269b4(rnying rgyud): dan sa 'i na sa mings
269b5(rnying rgyud): par snang ba // g.yas pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// pi yi dkyil 'khor snang mtha mas// khe dag dbang po nyid byar// son nam gas ma ge steng po chung // da ga pa gsegs la d+hatho pa dang // gnyis dkar da la ts+tshar+g+ha rlung dkang/
269b6(rnying rgyud): nga byung sa mas ba// ga sa ThA rlabs byung ba/ byung banas pa dag gnas// rkyed da ma / pa tu nga // rnam du 'dzim nga gags/ ting 'ag ga gsas gcig la/ ci
269b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs stong drug brgya// de nyid brnas pardzog sa 'gyu ga// rtsab mi nyid srog tug nas// rlung rnams tha'i'i ga dru pa kyi na// shes dang ming dag dris 'byung // dbang po lam la byung rnas su// yul rnams can la 'jug par byad// snang 'a ma
270a1(rnying rgyud): thob pa'ang gsum// lnga gsum bco lnga'i bdag nyid can// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro na mad// rtag bcas brgya bcu'i 'khor lo bskor// yig 'bru gsum gyis byin gyis pa rlabs// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang rnams
270a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// mi ba rgyan gyi 'khor lo yis// sku gsung thugs ni dbyer med las// 'bras bu chos rnams spyan gyis grub// blta ba rtogs pas grub mabya' rtogs// zhes gsungs so// glang po raba'i bog gi rgyud las/ dbang po rab la rang bzhin rtog
270a3(rnying rgyud): paste le'u bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sdang srid dkyil 'khor chen por gtan la 'bebs pa 'di 'gro ba'i tshad du gsungs so// dag pa gsum dang dag pa bzhis// sdang ba mi phang 'bras bur byed// snod brgyad chung rnams dang
270a4(rnying rgyud): gas paso// byung bache po rnam pa// dkyil ma byas // zung gil ba rgyad// sangs rgya zigs pa kyi'i kho / shes pa d+hA ni ma shes rnams// rgang sus kyil lathong //
270a5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rtogs// rgyu 'bras kun rdzob don dam dag/ 'khor rgyu nyon mongs rnam pa lnga// ye shes chen po lnga ru dag/ 'bras bu sbyin pa'i phung po wa// dam rdzas rgyal ba rigs lngar dag/ kun rdzob snang ba'i dngos po rnams// ye shes lha ma'i dkyil 'jo
270a6(rnying rgyud): dgra/ chu b+hU'i snang ba ji bzhin no// don dam snang ba gzugs kyi sgra// tshig le chen po chos skur dag/ mnyam pa bzhi yi gtan tshigs ni// mnyam pas mnyam byed bdag nyid che// rgyu las skyes nas mthun par snang // brtags na dben pa kyang rdzo
270a7(rnying rgyud): yin// don dpe spros pa mtha' dag bral// rnam rtog blo yi spyod yul min// sdang ba thams cad rkyen bzhis bsdus// sku matsam du sdang bar mnyam// sdang zhing brtags pa'i chos 'di rnams// ma skyes par ni kun mnyam mo// lhag pa phun rdzob don da
270b1(rnying rgyud): sa sa las byas// gas rnags pa bye kyis bzung// da kyang su sa spyad// bdags da / da nganaldan pa pad dus// shes pa gas na par pyod// shes ba sa pa du/
270b2(rnying rgyud): yin pas// rtogag pa yi srid yul min// de rtog sa yon tan zad med 'gyur// ye shes mdzod can chom gyi dbyings// sgra dang ye shes pas ma mi khyab// nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod mdzad// rtogs pa gzhi yi gtun phyogs kyis// mi zad can te/ yo
270b3(rnying rgyud): long byed// 'khor 'das rgya yi byang chub sems// de btsal yi ge 'bru gsum shar// byin brlabs lus ngag yid gsum rtogs// de mthu sa gus ma rnam par snang // thams cad mnya ma nyid chos kyi sgra// bde chen kha sbyor longs spyod pa// gar dbang kyi snru
270b4(rnying rgyud): sprul ba'i sku// thugs kyi gsang ba bsam ni khyab// thams cad thugs de kun du kyang // sku gsung gsang ba thams cad sku// gsung bas ma mi khyab kun tu grags// bden pa dbyer med gtan tshogs kyis// bden pa dbyed med zung ngu dra// rje 'dzir
270b5(rnying rgyud): ba snang gyur pa// don dam mya ngan 'das pa nyid// dbyer med zung du badrug bya ba// don dam gyi med spros dang bral// snang ba ngo bo nyid rgyar shar// gan rdzob rig pa sgyum nyid// rang rgyang phyogs gcig grub pa med// snang ba thams cad gzugs sur shA
270b6(rnying rgyud): bcas phrag rgya chen po yin// stong nyid thams cad rgyas m+b+ha rA shang // mtshan nyid phyus rkyechen pa yir// rdzing grong ngo mig+sas rlu 'jug/ gaN+DIs med phyag rgya chen por shed// zung 'jug dbyer med spyod yul thal// yid la khyab bur tshul ba/ dbya
270b7(rnying rgyud): med phyag kyi chen por gnas// lde ma dgengs man ngag gtan tshogs kyis// skabs kyi ni gnyis mthong bar byed // ldem por dgongs pa rnam pa pani// gtsug dang mtshan nyid gnyen po bsgyur// sngags la skrag pa'i lag zhen la// de nyid don po
271a1(rnying rgyud): sa da// su sa// A ba byus smras su dun/ nan
271a2(rnying rgyud): sogs bstan pas don la bzung // yon tan phyogs kyi 'a dregs pa dag/ zil gyis mnan te drang ba ni// theg pa grong 'og mi dang lce// gtsug gi gnyen po gcig brjod drung // sngags la mos kyang sa bzhin stod// du byid babs gyis 'dul bya m+b+hi
271a3(rnying rgyud): ga kyis// ra ma 'dzin lagazug par na// gong sa par bku la brtan pate// na ma la // bzung ba seMn+da thod nan dang // bde snga ba das zung m-i dang // yi sa del ldanan
271a4(rnying rgyud): grol dgongs// mos dang sems bskyed la sgrogs kyis// 'bras bu thob par gsungs pa yang // rgyud nas thob dgongs sgyid lug don// chos la chog shes sna 'gas khengs// rtogs na 'dis chog zer rnams la// bskal pa rdul snyed sbrengs pa
271a5(rnying rgyud): yis// 'jug cing 'dir yang brtson 'bad dgos// zhes pas zhen bsal don la dgongs// bsam pa chu rgud rgyabaskyed phyir// gang 'dod de la skyon brjod nas// zab mo'i sa lam don bstan dgongs// nges par gnyis nyid gcig la bci// tshig ldem phug
271a6(rnying rgyud): bzhed dgongs pa ste// grul lho zan khung dpe kun khyab// gsang don mkhas pas rtogs par bya// dngos po'i lo rgyas gtan tshigs kyis// bdag nyid chen po spos ci dgos// yongs 'brel gtan 'bebs re dogs med// sna tshogs kun dbang bskur
271a7(rnying rgyud): 'bebs// chos can dang ni chos nyid 'brel// de bzhin sems can sangs rgyas dang // lung dang rigs pa dpe dang don// snang ba dngos dang yang dag sogs// thams cad 'brel bar gnas pas na// yongs su 'brel par gtan la 'bebs// zhi ga nang
271a8(rnying rgyud): 'a sngo zan kyang yang 'dug sa ra ya
271b1(rnying rgyud): nyams drod gtan la 'bebs// de bzhin lhag mthong shes rab kyis// lung dang rigs pas rig pa thob// thos pa ma yengs pa dang ni// lta bas chos nyid gtan la 'bebs// chos nyid nyams drod de bsgom pa// de spyod de 'bras thob par 'gyur// de dag
271b2(rnying rgyud): gtan 'bebs gtan tshigs kyis// rang gnas sems kyi chos nyid 'di// gang nas kyang ni btsal mi dgos// de nyid gar yang mi 'gyur la// bsam bsgrub mi dgos re dogs bral// sna tshogs dbang bskur brtan par bya// rig pa skye med rdzas ma grub//
271b3(rnying rgyud): las dngos med smra ba dang // rang rgyang gzugs med nas mkha'i 'ja'// gang snang mgrub smig tu nyid// snang ba dngos med mu zla dang // mi mthun grub pa me long gzugs// rtag par ma grub 'gyur bcin// chad par ma grub med rgya sdang // yod pa
271b4(rnying rgyud): na pa sa sa sa
271b5(rnying rgyud): pa// gtan tshigs ma yin gcig kyang med// rab 'byams kun la dbang bsgyur ba// bdag nyid chen po yin par nges// rang bzhin lhun grub gtan tshigs ni// til dang til mar lhun grub pas// sa la sra zhing tshul gsher// me la tsha zhing rlung gis
271b6(rnying rgyud): g.yo// gang yang rung ba'i chos can la// chos nyid lhun gyis grub par gnas// sems la sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub// 'di rtogs sems can sangs rgyas yin// sgra mthun don dpag gtan tshigs ni// chos kun rang dang spyi'i 'phags pas// ma skyes
271b7(rnying rgyud): cad 'khyed pa'i don// rnam pa kun ldan stong par snang // de phyir sku gsung thugs su snang // dngos kun gcig dang du ma bral// mtha' gsum dang ni bzhi bral lugs// khyad par can gyis de nyid mthong // de yang ma spangs bral bar brjod// rmongs
272a1(rnying rgyud): bye pa tu smra la// san sa ni ldang // ma du 'ongs pa snang rgyal pa// bya pa gangab da gas pan// gzhan pa slong bas tha gcos nyid// yang mardzogs pas stong bdag med// da pa dres dngas
272a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid khon// gti mug mi rtog ge lhung gisal// tu rgyal chos la sran tshugs shing // 'dod chags bdeb chen ma nyid// phrag dog ltang na mi shong ba// dug lnga lam du shes par bya// gnyid log rje lam sangs rgyab 'gyung /
272a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i N+Dal ting 'dzin bsgom// 'dod rdzogs gsad dbang rtsa ba nyid// lha ngan 'joms pa'i thag dogs// gsang sngags sangs rgyas rigs las 'gru'o/ nyin mongasan 'dres ye skyes wa// rang byung ye shes gtsug tu rdzogs// kun la de ltar /
272a4(rnying rgyud): par rtogs// rnam par dbye bar bya ba ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par byed// gling grangs rgyas pa stong gsum dang // gling gcig da'u zhabs khams gsum dang // srid pa gsum dang po mo dang // ma ning skye dang na dang 'chi// snod ni 'jig chags stongs
272a5(rnying rgyud): dang gnas// bcud ni sde zhes na dang 'chi// 'das pa dus gsum sangs rgyas dang // su gsum la phyogs rim par dpe// mtshon par bya ba'i dpe rnams ni// thams cad stong po nam mkha'i dpe// dgos 'dod 'byung ba yid bzhin nor// gting dpag dgang
272a6(rnying rgyud): nyid// ngo bo mi 'gyur rin chen gser// gsal la ma 'dres nam mkha'i mtha'// 'byung gzhi med pa na maM mkha'i sprin// tshun chad med pa nam mkha'i rtsa// thams cad dpos mtshon gtan la dbab// gtan tshigs mang por gsungs pa kun// 'on kyang de la ba
272a7(rnying rgyud): dang med// kun nas gtan la phebs pa'i dus// de bden nyid du 'a chom med// lta bar bya ba'i rngam ni// bsla ba bden pa dbyer med la// rig pa spong yul bral ba nyid// dkor brdu ngo po nyid rgyur gnas// ye shes rnam lha ye shes dbyings//
272b1(rnying rgyud): med rang rig mngon snum pa// bden pa dbyer med don mthong bas// rang rig mngon sum gsal byas pas// yul med rang gsal nyams rnyed pa// mthong zhes blta ba'i nge mtshig 'grub// dang pa don rtogs mthar mi gtong // rin chen mu min khar chud
272b2(rnying rgyud): 'dra// rtogs pa'i don goms mthar phyin pas// sangs rgyas de nas 'khor mi srid// ces gsungs so// glang po rab 'phog gi rgyud las/ blo 'bring gi rnal 'byor bsgrub par 'dod pa la gtan tshigs bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas
272b3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen pos theg pa thams cad ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'di gsungs so// shin tu rnal 'byor mchog gi mchog/ 'phags pa las kyang 'phags pa'i don// gser gling rin chen lta bu'i mchog
272b4(rnying rgyud): 'dod la sgrib byed chu spang dang // chu srin nya mig lta bu'i dgra// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rgyur zhugs pa'i// theg pa che chung rim pa dang // yo ga bzhi stsogs gol sle ba rnams// so so'i khyab par rtogs chud nas// mi gnas mi spang theg pa'i mchog/ lhun po bzhin
272b5(rnying rgyud): 'phags rtsa brgyad nyid// che ba rtogs phyir khyad par 'byed// sprul pa'i gsung rab rgyu yi don// 'dul dbang blo bzhin grags pa dag/ bsdu ba'ang che chung gnyis kyis so// chung bsdus nyan thos rang rgyal gnyis// nyan thos bye brag smra ba ni// rang gi shes rab lta ba'i
272b6(rnying rgyud): dngos// spyir na yang dag lta btid// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// mi rtag la stsogs dngos su 'dzin// kun rdzob bye brag 'dod gzhung nyid// snod kyi rdzas rnams dngos po 'di// rdul phran sil bu phan tshun pas// ma 'dis ne'u sing lta bu ste// mthungs
272b7(rnying rgyud): stobs kyis 'dus par 'dod// don dam shes pa skad cig ma// re re yod par 'dod pa'o// mdo sde kun rdzob phra rab rnams// 'dus pa'i rnam pa gcig tu 'dod// don dam shes pa mthun par 'dod// spyod pa rang don 'ba' zhig pa'o// rang rgyal don dam
273a1(rnying rgyud): nyan thos mthun// kun rdzob snang ba'i khyad par ni// gzugs kyi bsdus pa'i chos rnams kun// rten 'bral rgya rkyen dbang gyur pas// rmi lam tshul te logs na med// de ni kun rdzob khyad par 'phags// spyod pa lus
273a2(rnying rgyud): rdzu 'phrul gyis// gzhan don shes 'ga' spyod pa'o// theg pa chen po dbu ma pa'i// theg pa phyi nang rnam pa gnyis// phyi ba rnam par rig pa la// kun kyang rang rig yul med 'dod// de yang rnam bcas rnam med gnyis// rnam bcas pa yi lta ba ni//
273a3(rnying rgyud): la ltar snang ba 'di dag kun// rab re ba slob mthong rmi gzugs lhur// shes pa 'khrul pa gzugs brdzun phyir// de yang de yi ngo bor 'dod// rnam med pa ye lha gzhung gis// rang ga gnyis med shil ltar dag/ de nyid dam par yod pas/
273a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor dbu ma ni// kun rdzob sgyu ma rdzun tsam du// yul sems gnyis med yul snang sems// kun rdzob rnam rig ji lta ba// don dam me skyes stong par blta// de kun byang chub spyod pa'i mchog/ rgya cher gzhan don spyod par byed// gzhan la dmi
273a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshan mo'i me// smras pa lte bur bdag don 'byung // longs spyod rtogs pa'i bka' lung rgyud// yo ga phyi ba'i rig pa gsum// bu byed rgyud dang gnyis ka'i rgyud// rnal 'byor rgyud dang rnam pa gsum// gdul bya'i shes rab dbang pos phye// de dag blta
273a6(rnying rgyud): spyod khyad par 'gyur// bya byed kri yas don dam du// kun kyang dag pa'i chos nyid la// mtha' yi dri ma ye nas med// kun rdzob rang bzhin rigs gsum sku// kun kyang dag phyir drug gsum gsum// lha yi dkyil 'khor yin par 'dod// ma kru ba tshul gnas
273a7(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten chos// mthun par lha phyir rje khol blta// da mchog tshig rdzogs byas nas// gshegs dang mchod bstong drug ldan pa'i// bzlas pas sdig sdeb dag pa'i sems// hudadra lta bur grub shar ba// lha mdzod du dkyir nong co la sba// / bus dang gcod sgra
273b1(rnying rgyud): mchod pa 'bad// gnyis ka rgyud kyi 'dod pa ni// spyod pa bya ba'i rjes mthun yang // lta ba rnal 'byor rjem 'jug phyir// rigs dang lta bas khyad par 'phags// rnal 'byor pa yi 'dod pa nyid// rang rig dngos stong mtshan ma gnyis// dbyer med dbyings dag/
273b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes las// byin brlab rdo rje dbyings kyi skur// shar bltar grogs po'i tshul du mchod// ma grub tshul gnas 'jig rten dag/ grogs la brten nas nor tshol mtshungam// spyod pas ting 'dzin gtsor byed pa'o// lun sgrub bka' lung bskyed rdzogs gsum//
273b3(rnying rgyud): thog mar bstan pa'i rnal 'byor che// lus kyi dngos po gnyis bsus nas// rang rig nyid phyir snang ba kun// ye nas ye shes skur gsal ba// dkyil 'khor gnyis drug la sogs shar// snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med// des na rang bzhin skyon dang bral//
273b4(rnying rgyud): snang stong bral ba'i de bzhin nyid// ngang las rig pa lhar bskyed pas// tha ma rtog tshogs ma spangs dag/ gser 'gyur mun snang ji lta ba'o// cir sdang rang gi rig pa'i phyir// lha dang blta ba yongs kyis med// ting 'dzin ye shes sur shar ba// sus kyang ma
273b5(rnying rgyud): byas byed med ste// ngo bos gzhan nas 'ong ba 'ang med// des nu bdag nyid chen por blta// spyod pa bzang ngan gtsang sde sogs// gang la yang chags sdang bang dor med// bde myong mi 'gog mi 'dzin phyir// tshogs gnyis rgyun du rdzogs par byed// rjes su rnal
273b6(rnying rgyud): 'byor 'dod pa nyid// snang srid zab mo'i mkha' klong ni// ma skyes dkyil 'khor kun la shwar// shar ba nyid na shar ba med// pha ba yum sras bcas pade chen po// spyan rdzogs dang las skang cig gis// snying po dran brjod skur shar ba// 'di la ris pa'i rtsom po
273b7(rnying rgyud): med// rgya mthor ni zla sha rib 'dra// don gnyis ma btsal rdzogs par byed// spyod pa blang ngor med par spod// de ltar nus na nyem ming // rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor ba// gza' gtad med pa'i sgra mchog la// de nyid pal ba lbu ba med// gal te 'dod na dmig
274a1(rnying rgyud): mod// thams cad mabyen na lta ba'i mchog/ nga ba nyid ni dmigs su med// ces gsungs so// glang po rab 'bog gi rgyud las/ theg pa thams cad kyi lha stong yam bral bar bstan pa ste le'u nye shu rtsa gcig pa'o//
274a2(rnying rgyud): de nas rdo rje 'chang gis dbang po za ma'i rnal 'byor bas lha'i skus rtogs par bya ba 'di gsungs so// stong pa nyid du gsal bsgoms pas// snying rje snrums kun la khyab// hUM las byung ba rdo rje sems// mthing nag rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu bsgom/
274a3(rnying rgyud): sangs kyis thams cad bsgom par // yum+b+ha yang ba 'thal med par lac-i ga/ rgyu gas pa ba sa panas// da sa/ sregs sa rnaM sa d+h+wes/ rna 'du gas // dgi dang mar bdang /
274a4(rnying rgyud): lja dang ngang la dang // zab pa'i mdog dang sprin mdog brgyad// phyag ni bcu drug gnas pa nyid// g.yas pa rdo rdo rje le bu gzhon// g.yas kau maun gis cig yang gad ni// tshangs pa'i pags pa brgyad nas 'dzin// rtse gsum mdung thung dag ste dang // ram gri rbang te/
274a5(rnying rgyud): gyi grag dang // lcags kyag yas na 'dzin pa la// bod pa kharnam na pa dang // zhags pa pa po sdigs mdzub ni yon// sum 'gyes pani bdas parnams// dmam pached lha mnan du zod nas// pA ni rje ni man la 'jigs// mr-in+danI g-i dug bur dmar// ga
274a6(rnying rgyud): A bas gas sa byed ma// byang du ba las stag gdong ma// thub kyang las mkha'a'as ma// rdo rje ga las ma mo ting// dmar dang rdzob ldang ba shar// sdang ga dang snga da s+ho// sdesangs dmar dang dkar banub// dkar dang ldang cu rdzob byang // dang po'i phyag na
274a7(rnying rgyud): mda'ad gza// b.ran zhags pa lugs kyu dang // tha mthod pa 'acug/ ma la phyogs sreg pa te// bdun thal phyogs su gsus 'byung ma// rlung gi tso gas drug bla me// dbang ldan phyogs ni mngon 'asrung ma// sher spong ma sa gro nga blo
274a8(rnying rgyud): 'di rnam pa 'og gi dag sbyong dang mtshan dang so sa mi mthar bas dbyang
274b1(rnying rgyud): byang sngo sangs byang shar ser// dkar dang ser ba'i zhal dang ni// ser dang dmar dang dmar dang ldang // dmar dang dkar ba'i zhal gsum pa// dang po thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ bar ba gyi gug cang te'u dang // tha ma rdo rje lcags mdung ngo // shar skor baM las dam tshig ma// sngo
274b2(rnying rgyud): dang dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// phyag na lcags klu cang te'u dang // bar ma thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ tha ma mgo dang sdigs mdzub can// lho sgor ra las ro gtum ma// dkar dang sngo dang ldang ba dang // dang po zhags pa cang te'u nyid// bar gnyis thod pa kha TI ga/ tha gnyis
274b3(rnying rgyud): sdigs mdzub gri gug mgo// nub sgor sgra las 'bar ma mchog/ dmar dang sngo dang ljang gu ste// dang po lcags klog gri gug dang // bar gnyis thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ tha ma mgo dang sdigs mdzub rnams// byang sgor hUM las phreng rgyal ma// ljang gu dkar ser dmar
274b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i mdog/ dril bu gri gug dang po gnyis// kha T+wAM cang te'u bar ma gnyis// mgo dang sngag mdzub tha mar bsnams// bcu gsum lha yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// gsal nas spyan drang pa stim pa dang // mchod pa bdud rtse gtor ma dang // ra lta dbul zhing
274b5(rnying rgyud): bstod pa bya// gsang sngags yi ge'i phreng ba bzlas// rlung dang sngags dang yid kyis brdeg/ oM shrI badz+ra hi he ru ru kaM hUM/ d+hA kI ni dz+wa la shaM bar hU~M baT swA hA/ zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad// bcu drug stong pa bcu drug ni// phyogs bzhir sa sor yang dang
274b6(rnying rgyud): rigs// mtshams ni mi 'jigs rnam pa bzhi// sgo yi tshad med bzhi dang ldan// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// gzugs rnams blta ba'i stong pa dang // nang dang phyi rol gzug rnams blta// sdug dang mi sdug blta ba dang // nam mkha' mtha' yas skye ma med palnga/
274b7(rnying rgyud): rnam shes mtha' yas blta bas stong // ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang // 'du shes med min skye mched dang // 'du shes tshor ba 'gog par blta// zhal gyis rnam par thar brgyad rtogs/ stong pa bcu drug mtshon pa'i phyag/ dang po nang gi stong pa
275a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa gyi yi stong pa nyid// gsum pa phyi nang stong pa snyed// bzhi pa stong nyid stong pa nyid// lnga pa chen po stong pa nyid// drug pa don dram stong panyid// bdun pa 'dus byas stong pa nyid// brgyad pa 'dus ma byas stong panyid//
275a2(rnying rgyud): dku ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid// bcu pa thog ma tha ma med// bcu gcig dor ba med pas stong // bcu gnyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid// bcu gsum chos rnams stong pa nyid// bcu bzhi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid// bco lnga mi dmigs stong pa nyid// bcu drug dngos po
275a3(rnying rgyud): med stong pa// bcu bdun dbyer med ngo bo nyid// yum ni gzugs med nam mkha' nyid// chags pas mdog dmar kha T+wAM thod// chos brgyad pa spras pas phyag mtshan gnyis// so so yang dag phyogs bzhi ni// phyag byed ma yi mkha' 'gro ni// don ni so sor
275a4(rnying rgyud): yang dag rig/ stag gdong ma yi mkha' 'gro ma// chos ni so so yang dag rig/ mkha' 'gro rdo rje drag mo ni// nges tshig so so yang dag rig/ mkha' 'gro ma ni gser mdog can// spobs pa so so yang dag rig/ dkyil 'khor skyong byed phyogs padir gnas//
275a5(rnying rgyud): mtshams kyi lha mo mi 'jigs bzhi// shar lho lha mo dngos 'byung ma// bcom ldan 'das la 'jug mi 'jigs// lho nub dran pa mchog ma yin// chos rnams nye bar ston mi 'jigs// nub byang na ni gsus 'phyang ma// mya ngan 'das pa ma 'jug mi 'jigs//
275a6(rnying rgyud): byang shar phreng ba rnam rgyal ma// zag pa med la yodra mi 'jigs// sgo ba bzhi yi lha mo ni// rnam par gtsigs ma byams pa shar// rol gtum ma ni snying rje lho// 'bar 'bog ma ni dga' ba nub// rnam par rgyal mchog btang snyoms byang // kun gzhi nyon mongs
275a7(rnying rgyud): yid gsum ni// ting 'dzin gsum las rnam par skyes// zhal gsum dkar dang sngo dang ldang // rnam thar gsum dang ldan pa la// stong nyid mtshan med smon pa med// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'i sku// phyag drug rdo dril bu dang // bar gnas med pa
275b1(rnying rgyud): bsor bzhag
275b2(rnying rgyud): mgo bo dang ni gri gug rnams// sbyin pa tshul khrims brtson 'grus dang // bzod pa bsam gtan shes rab yin// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yi dwags gdan// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// shes rab stong pa nyid dang ni// thabs ni snying rje chen po
275b3(rnying rgyud): lu zhe yul rnam par 'khril// dmar mthod pa kha T+wAM ga/ ye shes spyan drang bstim mchod nas// gsang sngags srog dang ldan par bzlas// yid kyis gsal ba'i 'gro 'dus sbyangs// hU~M shrI hi dr-i ka ya big ma he snyed der rtol rjes te rten no// bi
275b4(rnying rgyud): ar+g+haM/ stong phrag gsum gyis thun mong gi// dngos grib thams cad 'thob par byed// dus gsum don ni rtag tu smra// zhi rgyas dbang drug las bzhi 'grub// dus min 'chi las thar bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// glang po rab 'bog gi rgyud las/ dbang po tham
275b5(rnying rgyud): sgras mtshon pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chad chen pos nor ba'i dmigs bsal nas ma nor ba'i don nyams su blang ba 'di gsungs so// skye bo 'khor ba tha mal pa// dug lnga 'byol tog spyod cing 'khor// lha dang mi yi zag pa
275b6(rnying rgyud): ni// dge ba bcu la chung 'ded byed// nyan thos pa yi theg pa yis// bden pa bzhi la sreng len byed// rang sangs rgyas pa'i theg pa ni// rten 'brel rgyu dang 'bras bur 'dzin// dbu mtheg pa chen po la// bden pa gnyis la spang len byed// kri yA da ma tshig ye shes lnga/
275b7(rnying rgyud): rje dang khol po lta bur blta// cha gnyis 'dzin pa'i theg pa ni// lta ba spod pa ya char 'gyur// rnal 'byor phyi grub pa 'gyud// ldan gyis grub pa'i don ma rtogs// theg pa'i chos dang 'khor ba'i chos// thams cad gsang sngags rdo ma yini// chos rnams cir yang sra
275b8(rnying rgyud): snang // gser la drim bral ma thal// thams cad gser dru gcig pa star// kun kyang gsang sngags ngo bor gnas// rdul 'byo rgyas bu chen po yis// lte ba de ltar rtogs par bya// lam ni rim par bgrod pa rnams// lha mi mtshan nyid theg pa rnams// gsang
276a1(rnying rgyud): sngags las kyi stegs byed pa// phral dang the dang khal ltar ni// lta ba mnor lam blangs pas// thams cad sngags kyipa ma stegs so// de ra gsang sngags mjug ga lam// khyad par 'phags pa shes par bya// da /
276a2(rnying rgyud): gol sgrib gcod pa'i phyir// theg kun sngags kyi cha rkyen yin// cha yod do shes zas kyi dug/ dug yod spongs la dug med za// lta ngan dri ma spangs byas nas// lta ba bzang po dang du len// theg pa ma lus thams cad kun// gsang sngags che ba 'byin phyir
276a3(rnying rgyud): da// nga ba na byu bani / 'a rji 'as pa pa gyu // 'i byed pa sa da// dec-i ga nga dge hA// ra na nga
276a4(rnying rgyud): ngag gnad du bsnun// sgra 'dogs yongs gcod bla ma yis// bum pas rig pa'i dbang lnga paskur// lus gnas dbyibs kyi rtsa rnams nyid// bskyed pa'i rim pa lha yi sku// lus kyi dri ma dag par byed// sa drug rdzogs nas sbrul sku 'thob// bla ma dang byang ye
276a5(rnying rgyud): shes ston// gsang ba'i dbang ni bskur ba yis// gtum mo'i lam du dngar 'dzag pas// ngag gi dri ma dag par byed// sa bzhi rdzogs nas longs su 'grub// rdo rje 'chang sar 'gro ba'o// bla mas lhan skyes ye shes ston// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur bas/
276a6(rnying rgyud): dga' ba mchog dga' dga' bral dang // lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba yis// yid kyi dri ma dag byas nas// sa ni phyed dang gnyis rdzogs pas// rnal 'byor ming srid 'bras thob pa// chos kyi sku la sbyor bar byed// bla mas chos rnams rnam dag ston// khams
276a7(rnying rgyud): gsum 'das pa'i dngas ma rnams// srog shing gsum las drangs pa yis// rdo rje na rlangs lam spangs te// lus ngag yid gsum sgri ba dag pas// snying po'i rlung rnams rang grol cing // sa ched ngo bo nyid smra thob// bkra 'di rdo chen gnas pa/
276b1(rnying rgyud): 'ching ba'i las spyad pas// gru bzhi 'thob pa thabs kyi las// dbang po dan na pas sngags bsrub skyed// rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs pa yin// phyi rabs sngags 'chang rdal 'byor pas// nyams su blangs na sangs rgyas 'grub// rang lus gas
276b2(rnying rgyud): sngags rgyud de rtogs// shes rab las ni blta ba rtogs// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor 'jug pa yin// da pyir thos pas sa be sgom gsum gyis// shes rab stan dang ldan par bya// thabs las grol lam bdod na// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa med/ #
276b3(rnying rgyud): kyilam li gcong byed la// grol lam lta ba med gyur na// 'jig rten thabs dang khyad par med// ma hA de ba'i bde bar 'gyur// grol lam chung bar bsgrub byed na// thabs dang bral zhing dbu mar gyur// dbang ma thob par 'jug 'gyur zhing // rang gangar
276b4(rnying rgyud): thabs la nges shes med// rtsa sngags thig po rlung dang bral// thabs kyi lam dang shes rab las// gang rung gcig la yongs rdzogs 'dod// zag bcas lam pa'i shes hud la// las gnyis dus gcig skye mi srid// rtse gnyis gcig tu mtshon pa 'dra/
276b5(rnying rgyud): nges par gcig gam tha dad pa// blo dman rnams la thabs la mA ny-id// dbang po mchog la grol ba'i lam// dbyibs dang kha dog lta bu nyid// kun rdzob mtshon par tha dad kyang // nges don gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur// grol ba'i lam ni 'bras bu dang //
276b6(rnying rgyud): la mtshon byed mya rkyen mtshungs// skyab gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir// grol lam thos bsam bsgom pas spangs// yang dag/ skab mi gol bas// rang lus thabs kyi gnang du bstan// rtsa rnams dbyibs su gtan la dbab// lul khams
276b7(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi bde ba ste// grub pa sngags ni bzlas pa nyid// nying po rlung gi 'phro 'dur 'gyur// grol lam bska bcig char rtogs// thabs lam dbang gis rim gyis ljin// de phyir gas sregs lam 'dod pas// thabs kyi lam dang grol ba'i
277a1(rnying rgyud): lam// gsang sngags rgyud bzhin rtogs par bya// de skad ston pa rigs lngas gsungs// dad ldan brtson 'grus rab 'bad na// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' 'thob// ces gsungs so// glang po rab 'bog gi rgyud las/ gsang
277a2(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi lam gyi rtsa ba ma nor bar gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos lam gyi cha rkyen yongs su rdzogs pa gtan la phab pa 'di gsungs so// lta ba bden pa dbyer med pas// rang rig mngon sum rtogs pa
277a3(rnying rgyud): yis// lta ba rang gi mtshan nyid mthong // de la lam gyi rim pa mthong // dang po gsal ba'i spyod yul la// gzugs mthong rgyang nas mthong gyur kyang // drung nas gsal bar 'gyur bzhin rtogs// de phyir rim dang cig char blta// lam gyi spyod yul gzhi
277a4(rnying rgyud): gcig la// so so tha dang spyod pa yang // kun tu chud nga khyim gnas dang // glang chen stobs kyi tsho chung ltar// rang bzhin ting 'dzin mngon phyung ba'o// sgrol spor la sogs rim par spyod// mnyam par gzhag pa'i don nyid la// rjes kyi sred pa de bzhin sbyong
277a5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor ngo bo kun gcig kyang // lam gyi byed lugs mi 'dra bas// ting 'don bsgom dang gzugs brnyan bri// tshad kyi bye brag che chung sogs// gdul bya lam dang mthun pa ru// rgyal bas gsungs bzhin rtogs par byos// dbang bskur chu lam 'das kun rdzogs
277a6(rnying rgyud): rdzas la brten nas bskur ba dang // ltabs bsrung dang ting 'dzin dbang // bla ma thob pa'i rim dgongs shes// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig rnams// bsung mtshams bcas pa'i dam tshig dang // don la mi 'da' gnas pa ste// dam tshig khyad par rtogs pa
277a7(rnying rgyud): zag bcas zag med la sogs lam// zhi rgyas dbang drag lhun grub pa'i// phrin las kun gyis skyed 'gyur yang // ro gcig nus mthu khyad par che// ma bsgrubs bsgrub chen bsgrub dgos pa// mngon sum rtsol bas sogs pa'i rdzas// ting 'dzin yid kyis song
277b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdzas// ting 'dzin yid kyis dmigs pa'i rdzas// rim pas gang gtso shes pas bsrub// mya ngan 'das pa mchod byed na// 'khor ba mchod pa'i rdzas yin pas// zag bcas yo byad sngags rgyas mchod// zag med blta ba'i ting 'dzin mchog/ gsang snga
277b2(rnying rgyud): bzlas shing phyag rgya bca'// sngags kyi skyon spang sgra brten bzlas// yid lco'i rdo rje'i bzlas pas 'gro// phyag rgya bzhi la mos pas bslab// dngos su zhi khro'i rgyal tshab byed// rnal 'byor rim pas rtogs par 'gyur// kun kyang zhi lo'i ting 'dzin bsgom//
277b3(rnying rgyud): bcas mtshan nyid so sor bsgom// zag med ting 'dzin yongs rdzogs bsgom// mtshan bcas mtshan med kun bsgoms kyang // rtsol ba yod med khyad par las// lam gyis bye brag rtogs par bya// zhes gsungs so// glang bor rab 'bog gi rgyud las/ lam gyi markyen
277b4(rnying rgyud): gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi lam 'di dag 'gro ba'i ched du brjod do// gsang sngags lam ni bgrod 'gyur ba// rim skyes pa dang cig char pa// mos slob dang ni smin slob dang /
277b5(rnying rgyud): ra chags pa dang thod gal ba// zag bcas lam dang zag med lam// gang zhig rim gyis bgrod gyur pa// dang por gzhi nas bzung byas nas// za mar 'bras bu'i gnas su 'gro// bar gyi lam rnams rim pas slob// rim smin srid pa mdal skyes 'dra// cig char ba yi
277b6(rnying rgyud): lam bgrod na// lta sgom dbyer med 'bras bur gcig/ mtsho la gza' skar shar ba ltar// srid pa brdzus te skyes smin 'dra// mos slob lam ni bzang po'i dus// nya stong tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la// mtshams nas rdzogs rim bar du bsgom// srid pa sgong skyes smin pa
277b7(rnying rgyud): 'dra// srin slob lam ni dang po ru// de bzhin nyid la mthar phyin bsgom// de nas kun snang rgyu dang ni// tshom bu tshogs sgrub spros pa dang // rig 'dzin sangs rgyas sar 'gro ba// snga ma smin nas phyi ma'i lam// rang sa'i drod tshad rtags ldan pa// bzo bo mkhas pa'i lde sa 'dra/
278a1(rnying rgyud): brar chags pa yi lam bsgos pa// tshogs kyi lam ldan la 'byor ba'i// blang ba'i lam la bsnyen pasgrub pa'o// mthong sa ma rnam sngon tshad bang dang // bgam las phyag sa rna la 'byor dang // mthang byon spyan grub ga 'dzin 'an/
278a2(rnying rgyud): skyong ba chen po'i rnal 'byor ni// rnam pa kun ldan stong pa ste// dpon yid bzhin nor bu 'dra// snying rje chen po'i dral 'byor ni// yongs la khyab pa'i sgyum ste// dben nyi sa'i snying pos// thag tu chen po'i rnal 'byor ni// mning sgrib tshangs pa'adra// rlu
278a3(rnying rgyud): wa ba srin phug tshul// dpe ni rgya las ha ldang 'dra// spros pa'i rdul 'byor bsgom pa ni// rang gnas tha las dpral 'khor smos// sngags ky-i yi ge tsho ma du ts+tshas// khams hU~M bdud rtsin la phyag sa// snying po drang las rnam grangs spos// bsnyen pa zhing 'u
278a4(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa ste// nye bsnyen zhi ba'i sgrub par gsungs// srub pakhro bo'i bsnyen pa nyid// grub chen khro bo'i sgrub pa yin// rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin ni// yid ni ting 'dzin lha srung srin// khyud phrug sgo nga'i nang gnas bzhin// bgacags lus nang b+ha'i sku//
278a5(rnying rgyud): dbang pa'i dag 'dzin ni// rang gi tshel dbang thob pas// 'khor bar bzhugs sam sangs rgyas 'gro// byA shi rang dbang thob pa yin// bsgom las phyag rgyar yi dam lha// rigs lnga gang bsgom che lpags 'dzin// sa brgyad non pa'i byang chub sems// @
278a6(rnying rgyud): lam 'dzin yod par bzhugs// mthar lams dkyus badz+wal// rtswa lnga sun grus ma lugs cid// rgyal chub mdzad pas sangs thas dang // mnyam par gzhag pa srid gangs mnyam 'gyur// thod na la lus la gyur ba'i// ba ngas lamapo nas /
278a7(rnying rgyud): rgyagacig pa'i mnas ni// mang lam ma par thug spong ba dang // spo'i par rin 'dzinam thar jug byer// tshogs bcu ba drug rgya mthar thug rgyad// ma dbang las ni su lder srung // thig bcas lam gyi thod rgal gnyis// tsha bang phyag chu na/
278b1(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang // bden pa phyogs re bsgoms pas na// thod rgal ba la 'ongs med// tshogs bsgrub rnam smin rig 'dzin dang // kun gyis grub 'thod na la med// khrung lugs nges pa med pa ste// bang dus la mangs med 'dod// thod nal dzung /
278b2(rnying rgyud): bar 'byung ba ni// lta ba gnyis med la long dang // rtogs pa bcon thabs skyes pa dang // lam la dor bya yod pa dang // sal spangs pa yod na 'byung // rim spangs lam la bar chad 'byung // thod rgal lam la 'gro bas na// 'dang ga ma yi man ngag bsgom//
278b3(rnying rgyud): de phyir thod rgal shin tu gces// zag bcas lam ni rnal 'byor bzhi// lus ngag yid gsum 'bad nas bsgrub// yul khams phung po skye gnas kyis// 'bras bu bzang la dmigs nas 'grub// zag med rig 'dzin rnam pa gsum// ston pa sku gsum zhal
278b4(rnying rgyud): gzigs pas// yul khams phung po skye gnas dang // bsgrub pa zag pa med shes bsgrub// lam gyi rnam pa gang bsgrubs kyang // shes pa'i rgyu ni blta babs// blta bas gtan la phab nas bsgrub// gang zhig/ lta bas ma zin na// 'dus byas rdzas la zad pa
278b5(rnying rgyud): yod// 'dus ma byas kyi lta ba yis// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa shes// 'khor 'das gnyis med rtogs gyur pa// de lta nyid nus 'grub pa yin// sangs rgyas sa la the tshom med// rang sems sangs rgyas ma shes na// lam gyi rim pa gang bgrod kyang /
278b6(rnying rgyud): mngon par byang chub ga la srid// sems nyid sangs rgyas yin shes na// theg pa ma lus thams cad kun// ma sbyangs rgyal ba'i dgongs par shes// kun du 'od kyis non nas// pad+ma can gyis la gyin// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen 'grub// theg pa lasum
278b7(rnying rgyud): kyi nges 'byung las// theg pa gcig gi nang du 'jug/ theg pa bzhilas nges par 'byung // rmad byung theg gcig nang du gnas// theg pa thams cad bgrod pas na// mthar thug theg pa'i thugs yin// zhes gsungs so// glang po rab 'bog gi hud las/ lam
279a1(rnying rgyud): gyi rim pa lta bas bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsang ba'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa 'di gsungs so// chos dbyings 'gyur ba med pas na// de bzhin nyid
279a2(rnying rgyud): bsgom par bya// don dum ldan pa smos dang bral// mya ngan 'das pa'i dgongs pa bsgom// chos chu dri ma med pas na// 'bras bungs ma rdzogs bral bar bskos// kun tu 'od kyis gnas pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i dgongs pa bzhom// kun ga ni tha'
279a3(rnying rgyud): dang bral bsan// skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin bsgom// lam la bar chad blang bas na// 'khor 'das stong pa'i ngang las 'pho// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du bsgom// kun rdzob bden pa brdzun pas na// 'khor
279a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i chos la snying rje bsgom// longs su ye shes sgyu ma'i sku// dngos po gnyis la longs spong bsgom// pad+ma can gyis la gnas// smin pa rgya mtsho'i dgongs pa bsgom// nyon mongs yid kyis kun la khyab// 'od phung dam sdug 'bang bar bsgom// las
279a5(rnying rgyud): du glo bun bar chad 'byung // longs spyod rdzogs su'i zhing du 'gro// chos kun rtsub byang chub sems// thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu ru bsgos// bden pa gnyis su dbyer med pas// kun rdzo ba don nam zung 'jug bzhom// grul bu cing yang sdang bas na//
279a6(rnying rgyud): so'i chu gnyis bsgom// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen sa// zhi khro sprul pa'i 'gro ba bsgom// yid kyi rnam shes kun tu rgyu// byed pa kun gyi rtsa bar bsgom// ma 'byongs lam la bar chad 'byung / lha yi sku yi thugs kar 'gro// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ma
279a7(rnying rgyud): yi tshang // sor bzhi pa dang mdzub gang bya// gzugs brtan dkyil 'khor khru gang ngam// lus gang ba yi zad du bya// lum do dang ni lus gsum dang // dpag tshad kyang grags nam mkha'i mnyam// spyi mgrin snying ga lte ba'i rtsa// dkyil 'khor la gnas
279b1(rnying rgyud): dbyer 'dzur 'tho// rdeb lab sus gnyis bsgoms pa// thub las ni 'kho rnams zung // zhags thang bkrugar ba'o// swa \u0f88\u0f90 tsam tha bskam par bya// khro bo lab yul ba sgoms byas nas// lan cag sur bas 'khor bcang 'byung// phyogs ma rnams pa la/
279b2(rnying rgyud): 'gros bkar byas pa'i// skad du 'tsham bu bzhom par bya// rdul ba na brgyang ga zug da pa// lhagrangs bcu gsum tsham du bahU~Ms// rangag mig 'phru las byung bas// sa son 'bu dag las brjid// zhal gcig pa dang drug brnyes pa// zhal gsum
279b3(rnying rgyud): dang phyag drug pa// zhal bcud btu drug phyag las ne// bcoM brgyad nyi tha mang po ba rkom// lus kyi bdud ci bde bar ldan// rlung gi byed pa du ma las// dam grangs pas ma las spro ba bya// 'ang+ga ban bkragan med bsgreng bsten// ngan song sa ma sbyang neb ste/
279b4(rnying rgyud): badzus mchod sgrub pa la// semam nyid gnas par smra ba chen po// yus badz+wal chas kyis sgeg pas bzhin// rdo rje ba du snyom sa ti// bsrubs shing gar byed sgrub pa la// kun gyig skyes dga' slab chen po// byang chu sems bskyed shes da //
279b5(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa zhi ba da// 'khor rnams bskyed pa sgrub pa yin// rdung bsgripa mchod 'gras thub ched// 'byor ba zhi bsgom bsnyen pa nyid// bzhin skang pan po ba la// rig 'dzin rdzob pa sleb pa 'i// sangs rgyas mar badz+ra chub can rdzogs// brten pa'
279b6(rnying rgyud): ber dkar por po// 'gro ba'i sgrib spang 'phags pa mchod// sde bsnyen dkar por spos byas nas// dmar pa tshwar la bsdu bar bya// sgrub pa me spyod mar pe bsdu// sgrub chen dngos grub len par byed// zhi ba bsnyen pa rgyas par te// dbang ni sgrub pa srub chen rgyag// dang
279b7(rnying rgyud): pa na thab yang // kya pa 'ab la// bya ba mig pa// rlung ba da med lta sa// sgra yong dgas pa byung nas ni// 'dra pa na pa'i grong bye cing // sangs cas rnams la mtshad pa bral// ni rnam par cing mdzadzod/
280a1(rnying rgyud): dran don chen 'byung ldan la// ran dang ba mtha' gas nyid// sman don yod thub pa ste// reg na na 'i sems dpar mchod// gnyis pa nye bar bskrun pa yang // hUM zhes bya ma la ge la// rgyal pod rnam snar mdzang la 'ja/
280a2(rnying rgyud): li dwags rin 'byung yul 'dus// mi ni snang ba mtha' yas 'das// lha dang lha medan don krub nyid// dmyal ba rdo rje sems dpar 'dus// sgrib sbyangs dngos grub ye shes ni// rgya ba'i thun lhor lnga brag nas// nang du 'dus nas thim par bya// gzums/
280a3(rnying rgyud): bgrub pa tha ban+de// tsAH skyes rgya ma ga nyid// kun ga'i rje mched gnas cung ba/ hU~Ms sku'i nga nang gzugs zla cha// kyi med ma dzes yi gau laH// rdul 'byor khong gnas chos ci ste// bzhi pa grub pa chen po'o// gzugs kyi phung po las b+ha
280a4(rnying rgyud): ba// bdag nyid skang mdzad 'khor lo 'chang // ti ni dza~Mka las srog 'dzin drung // 'grang mid mthing gang dang lAs rdzogs// tshong ba'i phung po las byung ba// sa rlung ser podon 'byung nyid// ra hU~Mg las nong bu 'chang // lce 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gnas//
280a5(rnying rgyud): nam shes phung po gnas gyur pa// badz+ra dz+rag las mi bskyod dkar// chu lirba ma mdzod char// ting rtsam ci kyil 'khor bzhugs/ 'dun sa phung ba las snang ba// mA ro la ka zhes so/ dpa'i sgo// rang sngags rlung las skyes pa ni// snang ba mtha'
280a6(rnying rgyud): brda 'chang // dmar bra ma yi rlung las byung // longs spyong dkyil bong gnas na bzhugs// 'du byed phung po gnas kyang pa// don yong grub pa ljang ser ni// sh-ig las rlung gi drung // lA wi \u0f7fsa ma dza de// skye bo bde rje dkyil 'khor /
280a7(rnying rgyud): zhugs nas tshangs pa'i bug brgyang // dkyil 'khor 'byung lnga yum du ldang // zhugs pa'i drung lnga yob tu sdang // g.yas kyi srog shing yum du sdang // g.yon gyi srog shing yab tu snang // de gnyis dbus kyi srog shing zil// mad+ma'i rtsa lam pra
280b1(rnying rgyud): srid pa gsum po bcings gyur pa// til gyi sgron mes sun sel ba// rgya skyegs me tog 'dra ba yi// snying rje chags pa chen po yis// 'gro ba rnams kyis don mdzad pa// lha ni a dkar srog tu 'dus// lha ma yin gyi su ser po// mi li Sh+kaM yig sngon po dang // byol
280b2(rnying rgyud): song du ni dud ka dang // yi drags bre dmar gnas pa dang // dmyal ba'i yi ge tri nag po// gzugs khams bsam gtan IM dang bcas/ de dag gzugs med AHla 'dus// sku gsung thugs kyi 'bru gsum nyid// zung 'jug hUM gis drangs nas ni// ru
280b3(rnying rgyud): snying po ltar drang ba'i// spyi gtsug tshangs pa'i gtsug tor du// rtsa ni dung gi dbyibs su grub// yi ge hUM du rnam par snang // bdud rtsi dngas ma byang chub sems// 'gros bzhi thim pas gsang ba'i sku// phyi yi lus ni rig 'dzin nyid// tshe ni nyizla dag dang mnyam/
280b4(rnying rgyud): nang gi dgongs pa sangs rgyas thugs// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// longs sbrul chos ni gsang ba nyid// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo gnas// zhes gsungs so// glang po rab 'bog gi rgyud las/ lam mchog yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa
280b5(rnying rgyud): drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi 'bras bu mthar phyin pa 'di 'gro ba'i ched du gsungs so// rnam par brjid pa snang bas sku// smra brjod 'byung bar skabs gsung // thams cad mkhyen par gsal bas thugs// 'dod dgur 'byung
280b6(rnying rgyud): bas yon tan la// bya ba byed pas phrin las so// 'di dag ma 'dres yongs rdzogs bzhugs// spros dang bral bas chos kyi dbyings// gzung 'dzin bral bar rig pas rtogs// dbying sa dang ye shes gnyis med pas// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung sku// chos sku'i
280b7(rnying rgyud): ma med pa nyid// sku rnams kun gyi rtsa bar gnas// chos sku'i ngang las ma g.yos bzhin// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// bde skyid longs spyod sna tshogs la// ma 'gags sku nyams ltar byas shing // ji ltar 'dod bzhin dbang bskur ba// zad mi shes/
281a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i gteng du gyur// kun gyi bde baspyad pas na// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgra du bzhugs// dbang bskur yang sa spyang tsam nyid na// sems can lta bur chags zhan med// ye shes lnga pa rang bzhin du// mchags sa
281a2(rnying rgyud): gos rtogs pa ni// thams cad dbyer med sa rnam pa'i mu// mngon par byang chub su bzhugs// ma g.yos bzhin du 'gro rnams la// sprul pa tshogs rna ldan// 'gro ba ji bzhin 'dul do mdzad// sdebs 'dul la gyi bar spyod// shi ba 'dum
281a3(rnying rgyud): namya ngang 'das// thams cad mkhyed pa'i ye shes bya// nyon mongs gan gyi zhing druganas// sprul ba ched po'i srung byachags// don mdzad pa la dus nyings// sme shi ga bsngal sags te// rdo rje ltar gnas 'gyur ba med// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rdzu/
281a4(rnying rgyud): gzhan 'dzems rang la gnod med pas// rdo rje/ dru sgor bzhugs// chos sku gcig gang po las// thugs rdo'i mdzad tshul gru bzhir snang // sku gsum sku bzhi su la rigs// gdul ba dag dang mthun par snang // yi ge med pa chos bu'i gsung // rdo
281a5(rnying rgyud): gsung ste skye ba med// sgra dang ming chog kun las 'das// ma gsung don gyi sde med go// rig pa'i gsung ni longs su'i gsung // dgongs pas 'khor lago bar byed// das kyi rtse me ma byung yang // yi ge med pas rig pa'i gsung // tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni
281a6(rnying rgyud): mngon byang gsung // de nyid med par 'gro kun gyi// gozhing yid du 'ong ba ni// brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra// kun la grags shing so sor 'jal// yan lag dbyangs nyan sprul pa'i gsung // gsung gi srul pas 'gro don mdzod// bsam gyis mi khyab can
281a7(rnying rgyud): tu khyab// sgo dang ming tshig sa mar grags// gnod pas mi tshugs rdo rdo gsung // par la 'joms zhing tshung mi gnod// bde ldan gsung gdon byung bas// thams can pa yi dang du gyur// nges par gsung mchog gcig pas med// bla dang med tshig
281b1(rnying rgyud): sa sa// sam mnapas lathung dang // chags parnams gsal bar nga / gcag tu nga pa gag zung // dang da sa gas dang // spang na/ gsung gcis bamags pa la// gdus byam pa du gsan/ nyam dang /

281b3(rnying rgyud): byang 'das pa'i chos// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor ma long ltar// tu 'brum mi mangs ying mkhyend// mngon bya cwo 'asgrol ba'i thugs// 'dod cigs brel bas 'grib sa// slal pa'i thugs kyi dgo sa pa'i/ mnyas pachen pa chog gzugs// 'did chags tha
281b4(rnying rgyud): bdang / 'ang blag sa su ga pa ga/ na pa ma nyas yar bdag paran// sems can pa dang mnyam par gyumed// sregs bgyur med pa// 'thob sgrol ba'i rnam ston// bskal ba med pa zhes pa'i// thams cad 'dam pa sa gas/

283b7(rnying rgyud): rgyad kyi ba gang brtanas// spyan cigag rgya dris lan gyis// sbyin gru ka dag do rnams rtags// theg pa bka gingosas po yas// 'kho 'das mA tsal bathal// skal ldan rang bzhin bye sa pa yis// gsal las gzhan la
284a1(rnying rgyud): byed// sku lnga dgongs pa bstan pa yis// dngos lngas gtan tshigs gzhi shes byed// rigs 'dzin chos kyi byung tshul gyis// tshul lnga'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur// sgra lnga 'chog la rtogs pa yis// dpyad du yod med shes

284a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin 'bras bu rab bshad pas// sku lnga lhun grub su gsum shes// de bzhin nyid dang ji bzhin pa// stong pa nyid dang gang ma thub// skabs ma 'das dang brjod du med// chos dbyings skye med 'dzin med dang // blo 'das spros bral ba kho// / mnor ma ba

284b1(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// rgyas pas mig phye dka' ba khrol// de dag ji ltar shes 'gyur ba// glang po rab 'bog bshad pa'i rgyud// rab gsung khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces ni 'khor gyis brjod gsan nas// de nas bde gshegs rdo rje 'chang // dgongs pas rab tu
284b2(rnying rgyud): gsal bar bya// snang phyogs stong phyogs gnyis med 'brel// snang phyogs ji bzhin bshad tshul ni// de la'ang gong 'og khyad par yod// 'khrul snang glo bur sdang dgag sbyang // rig pa sgyu ma'i rtsal rang snang // stong phyogs sdang du rung mi rdung // gnyis med
