284b4(rnying rgyud): mkha' bzhin// khyad bshad tshig gcig ngo bo la// don ni du ma 'byung bar shes// mtshan rnams thun mong gsungs pa ni// 'og ma drang phyir nges tshig 'grub// de do ni cho ga gcig don la yang // blo dpag dka' bar khong du chud// dgongs pa bzhi dang ldem po
284b5(rnying rgyud): bzhi// brgyad kyis gtan la phab ste bshad// glang po rab 'bog bshad pa'i rgyud// me shel shin tu dag gyur cing // nyi ma smin dang bral gyur pas// spab rlan med reg pas ni// de la me ni 'byung bar 'gyur// bla ma chos kyi sdong po nyid// rab
284b6(rnying rgyud): 'byams bka' yi nyi ma shar// slob ma bla ma'i thugs la reg/ sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur// thos pas ma bsgom la brtson byas nas// glo nyid sbyangs par ma gyur kyang // bla ma'i gang ma ngag stobs kyis ni// thabs kyi man ngag 'char gyur pas//
284b7(rnying rgyud): sngon du dbang rnams rdzogs byas la// rtsa sngags thig le rlung la spangs// dbang po shin tu dmin pa dang // shes rab chung ba dang brtson gyis// 'grub 'gyur thabs kyi lam la spangs// glang po rab 'bog bshad pa'i rgyud// chu shel dri ma med pa dang // zla ba
285a1(rnying rgyud): // sbyin pa'i tshigs da pral// dbang gzhong dag pa'i nang bzhag na// chu'i rgyu rnams srung bar 'gyur// grang to byung lung skabs 'chings// bstan pa rgyal mo chu'i spyan// slobacud 'khar gzhod nang du rabab// thos pa'i shes rab skal dmigs// na ba'i dbang pos nyan par bya// bsam pa'i shes rab sgra nos
285a2(rnying rgyud): 'dres// skye yis phyung la yid la brtags// sgom pa'i shes rab yid la gnas// don gyi rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs// grol lam rgyud la lta ba kye// rang gi shes pa nyams su myong // mtsho gram d+ha'i sdong bo bab// nags kyi bung bas bar spang len// rang gi lus dang bun mas gso// chu yi sbal ba pa pra yis/
285a3(rnying rgyud): brug ti ma bsi la phreng bskyed// gyon du bltas nas 'byar mi nus// blam 'bring mo rtog byas// snod ldan thag ring gdam pa ga btud// blangs nas dang bsgom gro rnams 'dral// chos kyi sgron mes mun pa sel// rjod ngan skal bcang gnas pas// yon tun mi shes byon rnams mthong // gshe nga
285a4(rnying rgyud): sgos spang bya 'debs// chos mi bdud kyim ba par 'gyur/ dasang gnas su gnas par byed// mig pa tu 'i mas / smin dgaphung po tu 'ashis// bra ni skams po pa mgyu // tha da ngoms shing yus dalang phrag mun babasas pa'i ma/ zu nga
285a5(rnying rgyud): pas gsos gyung bab/ 'dzinams pazang btung dun su mcho sa// ldan gas slo yo pa// sbrul 'tha~M rjod pa'i sa sa/ nas sgrub pa pang rang su cwa blangs// zla pa'i ga jig// ngo bung po tha~Md tho ba'i gleg// pa da nga sa rdu du // yula'as sa /
285a6(rnying rgyud): shis nga rgyad sbras// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub rtol// zag me nom gyi bdapya 'tshogs ni// bde rkyen zas kyis yi drags bral// dngos bu bang gzhan ba dol bkod// bye mtshon sa 'dibag nA// bu bos blangs nas migatsang 'dzud// me meng bzhin shang dri mi med/ byad kyi bzag medangs ras bye /
285a7(rnying rgyud): gyis srid spangs de la 'khor// de dang mi 'bral 'phrogs par ljon// sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i rgya mtshonas// bla mas dbang gi chu bo rdzogs// rig ma bu mo mtshan ldan la// mi gtsang 'grubs bu la sbyin// snod ldan bu la bde ba rgyas// tha ma la 'dod chags dri ma dag/ chags pa nyid kyis grol gyu // kun tu lus
285b1(rnying rgyud): smra/ tu smra kun sa sa su/ sa sa rma// / su na// /
285b2(rnying rgyud): ma / gnas shes / sa gas sa la
285b3(rnying rgyud): mdzod du kyi ma // jug pa na la ga d+hA'i byed// bdud yin mdas log / ma ldan kyis bdun ces// lu tho pa das thab rnyes// mtshotsho na stu/ thobad+ha pa gyi gsos bya nas// blon na tshad pa'i gsu ma tha'o// sa sbyid rna ma nyid kyig
285b4(rnying rgyud): chos dbyings rgya mtsho ye shes ni// 'gro ba'i lus dag yid bzlas nas// drag lnga rgyal ba rigs lngang zin// drug gsum mu gsum thong 'gyur // chos kyi byings kyi dngan bzhugs// glang por ba 'bog bshad pa'i rgyud// gro ba'i don du byed rnams cung // deg ston pas gtad byar bas// de nas 'khong mi chogs rnams kyis//
285b5(rnying rgyud): sags sa/ pa sa sa / sa ban
285b6(rnying rgyud): tshol dpa pa'i dang dzin gyis// rnam yo rgyad brgyanas// 'a gas ma la/ sbrul ba rnam par byas/ ma tshan ma/ ma na pa la/ drwa 'dzi ya gA/ mam par tshul gas / rgyams pa rjod
285b7(rnying rgyud): rgyud mchog gsungs pa rjes mi rang // zhes gsungs sa// glang por nga 'bog gi chud las/ rjes su la rang ba sti ba bye bcad pa'o// / glang por ba 'bog bshad pa'i dud chen po nis bya brdzogs so// sagang ci btiti pa bra mi dang // lorje pa 'ding dgas pa 'bar gyis bsgrub lo//
286a1(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo'i phreng zhes bya ba/ dbu la rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng gi don bsdus pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun rig rnam par snang mdzod la bcom ldan 'das dpa'
286a2(rnying rgyud): sems dpas rig pa'i byin brlabs las byung ba'i mchod pa rgya yongs su ma chad pa'i gzhal yas khang dang / bla dang / rgyal mtshon dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa nang gi ma chod pa bzhi dang / bdun spos la sogs pa'i phyi'i mchod pa bzhis mchod
286a3(rnying rgyud): de// ldan gsum du bskor ba byas nas so so ma yin pa'i rig pa'i 'dud pas phyag 'tshal te spyan lngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
286a4(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi spyod yul nyan thos dang thun mong ma lpags pa thabs gang gis sogs pa de tshe 'di nyid la thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang thob pa'i don du bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / cang mi gsung bar 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems
286a5(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen po nyon cig/ don 'di dang phyi nang gi chos thams cad 'dra ste bden pa gnyis su 'dus so// bden pa gnyis la yang tshul 'di ltar shes par bya'o// bden gnyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul// de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas na// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag/ byed
286a6(rnying rgyud): spyod thams cad tshogs gnyis 'gyur// pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs pa ste// sa bcu rim gyis bgrod pa la// mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis// sa rnams mnyam po nyid du sbyor// rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyis// chos kun sgyu mar rig pa'i phyir// dngos dang dngos med bag chags
286a7(rnying rgyud): baphrigs// yang na ye shes me de pa bye// spya dang 'bras bu'i rnam smin no// sed man skya 'bras mthun pas 'grub// de bzhin mnam nyid la zhes kyis// rig pas tshogs su 'gyur ba po// lam gyi nang na nye lo mngar rdzogs pa// rngams kyi nang namanar dam pa
286b1(rnying rgyud): bsgrubs nas 'dis sangs rgyas che ba yang // nga der med pa'i sngags mardo rjes 'thob// 'dugs pa thabs kyi 'gas pa 'ad+mo nang las bden paganyis bstan pa'i le'u ste dang mal// thams dpa 'a rtan pa dmachog 'di dag ni bdag dang gzhan la phan
286b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir ngas pa shad do// gtesag k+She sdang rgyal dang // 'dud chags theg dog chen po ni// bzung ba med pa'i rnam ba can// rdo mchog rdo rje par// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa bad+mo phreng las dmachog bstan pa'i 'a'u gyi gnyim pa'o// ma
286b3(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen po dbang 'di dag ni// rang rig pa'i rtsal gyis 'thob bo// thabs dang shes rab dbang chen te// rdo rdorje dril bu rig pas 'dzin// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yi// chos la 'dod bzhin dbang byed do// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dang
286b4(rnying rgyud): gi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // sems dpa' chen po mchod pa'i mchog ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o// bdag mchod kun mnyes thams cad 'drangs// kun la phan pa'i spyan yin te// rnal 'byor bdag nyid chen po yis// thams cad bza' zhing brlan par bya// phags
286b5(rnying rgyud): pathabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // kun du 'od kyis lus 'das// bad+ma'i spyan du gyur pa na// rig pa'i byin brlabs chen po lis// rang 'byung dkyil 'du 'phro la tshul// yi ge 'khor la tshogs chen te// mtshan dang
286b6(rnying rgyud): byad kun las grol// rngam zhing gtum pa'i gzugs can dang // mgyogs ma mgyogs ma'i pho nyar ldan// de ni thig lerje d+ha yin// 'di zhes gang zag bdag med par// rtogs par bya phyir ngas bshad de// mkhas pas de la 'byor par gyis// 'phags
286b7(rnying rgyud): pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de na sems dpa' chen po spyod yul thams cad ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o// chen po lnga yang de bzhin gshegs// gcig la'ang lnga lngar rig par gyis/
287a1(rnying rgyud): bzlas gsus bdag nyid yin pa ste/ mugasus zhes gang de labu// smye shes sna dang 'thob pa// mnyam pasam pa dbang med // sngags dang thug tu byung byu na// grod sum can dusanas// 'phags pa zangs kyi gags papa rjo nga las
287a2(rnying rgyud): zugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / sems dpa' chen po zhes rdo rje sems dpa' thos nas bshad do// rgyal ba'i rgyal ba rnams kyi sku// sna tshogs cir yang sdang mod kyi// kun du rin chen lta bu ste// don dang las yin bsgoms pas 'bru
287a3(rnying rgyud): dbu mig rna ba sme s+ye la// oM zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste// gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga// sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya// lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo la// hU~M zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste// sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga// sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya// lag pa g.yon pa'i
287a4(rnying rgyud): la// hUM zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste// sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga// sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya// rkang pa g.yon pa'i sor mo la// hrIHzhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste// sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga// spong ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya// rkang pa g.yas pa'i songs
287a5(rnying rgyud): la// AHzhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste// sems dpa' lha dang sems ma lnga// sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhugs pa badz+rI thang lus lha'i mtshan nyid dang dkyil 'khor dgon pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / sems dpa' chen po
287a6(rnying rgyud): nyon cig ces rdo rje sems dpa' la bos nas bshad do// rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas// lnga zhing lnga dang 'byor pa yi// chom bu lnga yi lha bsgoms na// thams cad bdag nyid chen por 'gyur// rin chen pad+ma'i dkyil 'jam 'di// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul
287a7(rnying rgyud): gas kyis/ dgyes pa'i rdo rje rab gsor nas// byang chub sems smin dbab par gas so// rdo rje gser ba'i dga' mchog 'di// 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i gnas su gsor// ri dmigs pad dang 'gro ba ni/ rdo rje 'dzi mar ldan las byung // ral 'byong rig 'dzin
287b1(rnying rgyud): par ldan pas// na bza' dang ni zhal zas rnams// grub pa'i rdzas su dbang bskur nas// gsol na dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas// grwa dang tshig gi sgra rnams yin// gsung gi ngo bor byin brlabs te// bsgrags nas dngos grub mchog
287b2(rnying rgyud): tu 'gyur// rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas// bro dang gar gyis bskyod byas te// 'od kyi 'du 'phro byin gyis brlab// dngos grub mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dngos grub srub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom
287b3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das de dag gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lus 'di byung ngo // oM badz+ra bair tsan+da ya~M/ oM sat+ma badz+rar+tha/ oM rat+na badz+ra trA~M/ oM d+hi ma badz+ra hrIH/ oM kaH badz+ra AH/ oM badz+ra Ats+tsha b+h+yaHtrAM/ oM bAdz+nyA sata trAM/ oM badz+nyA d+hAdz+nyA dz+dza/ oM bad+yA rA ga trA~M/ oM badz+ra pA d+hA d+h+waM/ oM badz+ra rAt+ta su d+ha ba ta~M
287b4(rnying rgyud): badz+ra rat+na tAM/ oM badz+ra sUr+ya trAM/ oM badz+ra d+hA dza trAM/ oM badz+ra hA sa trAM/ oM badz+ra a mi tA b+ha hrIH/ oM badz+ra tISh+Tha hrIH/ oM badz+ra tsakra d+hIH/ oM badz+ra bA sha hrIH/ oM badz+ra a me g+ha sid+d+hi hA/ oM badz+ra karma hA/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha hA/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha hA/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti hA/ hoHbadz+rI shwa ra d+ha tu oM/ oM badz+ra puH
287b5(rnying rgyud): oM tsAn+da trA~M/ A~M hrI hU~M traM/ oM badz+ra ba ba sminIH/ oM badz+ra pam+b+ha ya t+t+wa rmA/ oM dz+dza dzAlpAts+tsha hU~M/ oM badz+ra d+hAd+hU ba~MSh+kaM/ oMb+h+yaHAt+ma shwA hU~M/ oM badz+ra thA b+h+yohU~M/ oM badz+ra mA Shi t+te/ oM badz+ra ts+tshi d+he/ oM badz+ra g+hA na ti/ oM badz+ra dzA ra ti trAM/ oM badz+ra ga tuhrI/ oM ba
287b6(rnying rgyud): lo ke hrIH/ oM badz+ra s+pho& hrIH/ oM badz+ra nr-i d+ha hrA/ oM bidz+ra gar+b+he hA/ oM badz+ra g+hir+t+ti hrI/ oM badz+ra r-i ti thA/ oM badz+ra mr-idz+haiM k+Shu~M/ oM badz+ra mr-iSh+T+rir+b+hu/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti hrIH/ oM badz+ra mush+mi hA/ 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las sngags kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // sems
287b7(rnying rgyud): chen po nyon cig ces rdo rje sems dpa' la bos nas bshad do// lha dang lha mo'i ngang nyid du// yan lag lngal 'byor bas na// bskyod pa thams cad phyag rgya yin// de skad dpa' bos bka' stsal to// de la phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni// thabs dang shes rab dang nyid du// lag gi/
288a1(rnying rgyud): 'a na s+ho// sa dus sa / da ga // ra na ga/ nga sa// tud byung ca nga// da 'gan gnas babyu sa ga/
288a2(rnying rgyud): gapag kyis g.yon pa mnan// lag ma thil g.yas kyis ga skyon du minan// myethe bo ci snyed bang du zang // rnam par snang mad tsa ljin yin// do T+Ta bcangs palas// galas kyi mdzub mogasan thos bdud // tshogs pas gcig la gcig babyung \u0f7f// 'dan
288a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgya mchog go// mthe bo gnyis dang mtheb chung gnyis// so sor rtse sbrad zlum po ste// lhag ma 'od 'gro ting phye ba// mi bskyod pa yi phyag rgya yin// ting skad gung mo rtse sbyar te// mdzub mo chags bcag gung la sbyar// smin mtheb rtse spyad mthe chung ste// rin chen 'byung ba
288a4(rnying rgyud): phrag rgya yin// gung mdzub sminI lag rje sprad de// mthe chung ngos la sbyar bar bya// mthe bo rtsa skad zlum po ste// snang ba mtha' yas phyag rgya yin// thal mo sbyang nas so sor bgrad// bskyod nas 'khor lo ltar byas te// glog gi phreng bas 'khor bar bya// don yod thub pa'i phyag rgya
288a5(rnying rgyud): yin// phyag rgya'i rgyal po 'di dag ni// thugs kar bcing rnying ny-id du mas// 'du 'dra m+b+hal nga mkha' la dgrol// mam drang chu mong nyid du bshad// rdo rje dril bu bathung nas ni// thugs kur rang ni dkur brten nas// ga cu thabs bud kyis lba ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i rtsa
288a6(rnying rgyud): chen yin// lag pa bsnol nas khu tshur bcang // gung mo gnyis ni brkyang bar bya// mdzub mo skyugs kyu ltar byas pa// rdo rje rgyal po rgya chen yin// lag pa khu tshur bcangs pa las// g.yon gyi mthob mdzub rtse sprad de// g.yas kyi gung mo brkyang nas gdeng //
288a7(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i rgya chen yin// lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams// so so'i gung mo tshogs dang por// ngos bzhi nas ni rtse mo gzugs// rdo rje legs pa'i rgya chen yin// ting sbyar gung mo'i rtsa sprad de// mtheb mdzub srin lag chags bcag ste// drug char rtse sprid/
288b1(rnying rgyud): mthe chung sbas// rdo rje rin chen rgya chen yin// mthe bo mthe chung rtse sprad nas// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bar bya// lhag ma 'od ltar byas na ni// rdo rje nyi ma'i rgya chen yin// lag ngar g.yon pa bsgreng nas ni// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las// g.yas pa gru mor
288b2(rnying rgyud): gzung bar bya// rdo rje rgyal mtshan rgya chen yin// g.yon gyi steng du g.yas bzhag nas// sor mo'i tshigs bcag sprad byas te// kha yi thad kar gzung bar bya// rdo rje bzhad pa'i rgya chen yin// g.yon gyi sor mo'i rtse rnams yin// ma phrad tsam du bsdus
288b3(rnying rgyud): pa las// g.yas kyis 'byed pa ltar byas pa// rdo rje chos kyi rgya chen yin// g.yas kyi lag ngar sgreng ba la// mthe bo many+dzu rlung rtse sprad de// lhag ma gsum yang bsgreng bar bya// g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa// rdo rje rnon po'i rgya chen yin// lag pa
288b4(rnying rgyud): rgya gram rtse bsnol nas// mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse sprad de// bskor ba lta bur byas pa ni// rdo rje 'khor lo'i rgya chen yin// sor mo nang du bsnol ba las// gung mo rtse sprad mdzub sbyar te// mthe bos gung mo mnan pa ni// rdo rje smra ba'i rgya chen yin//
288b5(rnying rgyud): lag pa'i mkhrig ma bsnol ba las// gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang por// ngos bzhir sa yi sor mo brten// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya yin// lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams// phan tshun thags su btags pa las// mthe bo gnyis ni bsgreng bar
288b6(rnying rgyud): bya// rdo rje bsrung ba'i phyag rgya yin// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las// mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng nas kyang // kha 'gram gnyis su gzung bar bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin rgya chen yin// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las// bsnol te kha ni sbyar nas kyang // /
288b7(rnying rgyud): thugs kar dam du gzung bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur rgya chen yin// rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgom nas ni// lag gi 'du shes 'di dag gis// 'du 'phro mos pa bskyed nas ni// bcing zhing mkha' la dgrol bar bya// mthe bo mthe chung nang du spang //
289a1(rnying rgyud): grangam mthar bzhi yang bzlag// na 'drin sbyar teng blang ba// don 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya yis// tad kyad ma tha ba myung ba rgya sbyar te// mdzumam thamag tu mab cung drung // lhag sartse gsus ltar byas pa// dzarje na ci phyug tu
289a2(rnying rgyud): yin// lag ngar g.yon pa bsgreng nas kyang // sor mo ut+pal ltar byas pa// g.yas kyi sor lo gzung bar bya// rdo rje sgrol ma'i phyag rgya yin// nang pa gnyis kyi pus mo dang // lag pa gnyis kyi gru mo rnams// sbed nas lag pa
289a3(rnying rgyud): gdengs pa ni// kun du bzang mo'i phyag rgya yin// rdo rje khu tshur dkur brten nas// ldan pa g.yas su skyo ba las// chags pa'i mig gis lta ba ni// rdo rje sgeg mo'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa skod skong po byas te// g.yas pas kyu
289a4(rnying rgyud): mo bzung nas kyang // bskor zhing sor mo 'phro ba ni// rdo rje bdug pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa gnyis ni rgyab sbyar nas// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las// mthe chung spel nas mdzub mo bsgreng // rdo rje lcags kyu ma yi rgya// mthe chung
289a5(rnying rgyud): lu gu rgyud du sbrel// sor mo rnams ni so sor bsgreng // thal mo bkan te lta ba ni// rdo rje sgrol ma'i phyag rgya yin// srin lag dang ni mthe bo gnyis// so sor rtse mo sprad pa las// 'phral ba'i thad kar drangs pa yi// rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya yin//
289a6(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang lha mo rnams la phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad dang 'khor phal mo ches dbyangs mthun par bstod pa/
289a7(rnying rgyud): oM phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'byam na// rgyal ba gang bzhugs 'khor dang bcas// bla yid lha dang lha mo yi// thub pa'i byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// sems dpa' bcu drug rigs kyi gtso// sems ma bcu drug rigs kyi yum// madru
289b1(rnying rgyud): nu khro bo khro mo dang // pho ny+dzar 'jig rten skyong bar ldan// oM sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni// 'jig rten ma lus thams cad kun// rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor bas na// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ oM dpa' bo chen po mthu ldan rnams// thugs rje chen
289b2(rnying rgyud): po'i byin brlabs kyis// bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams// grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol// oM khams gsum zhing du sbyor la phyag 'tshal lo// dmigs med chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i spu la phyag 'tshal lo// cir yang sprul pa'i
289b3(rnying rgyud): sku la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod nas nyid kyi thugs kar zhugs te// rol par khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te khro bo'i rtog pa bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsor/
289b4(rnying rgyud): to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gcer bu pa dang kun du rgya la sogs pas so so'i rig sngags kyi las kyis ma hA dre ba la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi lha dang / gnod sbyin mthu bo che dang / phra men ma thams cad bskul
289b5(rnying rgyud): nas sems can rnams kyi srog gi bar chad bgyid/ 'tshe bar bgyid/ shin tu sdug bsngal bar bgyid// de la thabs gang gis bzlog par bgyi/ sbyor ba gcad par bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig/ 'di ni de bzhin
289b6(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdagra pos sngon chad bshad de/ lag na rdo rje khyod nyid kyis byas pa'i gsang sngags dang / srid pa zad par byas pa'i gsang sngags thams cad kyang zlog par byed do// gnon par byed
289b7(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba gcod par byed pa kun du chu la sogs pa gzhan lta ci spos// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje mtshon cha'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsang sngags klog cing gnon pa dang // sbyor ba
290a1(rnying rgyud): da pa zhes byab dogs / pa ma na na na sa sas sa ma
290a2(rnying rgyud): khas srub tu 'gyel nas khrag skyug par gyur to// lha dang gnod sbyin thams cad kyang brgyal ti lus dum bu dum ngur chad par gyuro to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi spong ba chad par rig nas slar bslangs/ oM badz+ra sa twa dza d+he/
290a3(rnying rgyud): na nga bye lag la dge 'phrul pa gni me 'angs nga ma bdang lapa 'dang ba byed thams cad pa ma ra 'gyur // dbazhinas pa
290a4(rnying rgyud): kyis cang lha dang gnod sbyin thams cad la bsgo shig/ de nas lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'drin srid pa gsum thams cad 'dul bar bgyid pa/ mdzu bo cha thams cad 'dul bar bzhi ba/ mthu ba rtsa thams cad kyi nga rgyal gas
290a5(rnying rgyud): pa bdag lags te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i slad du bdag gi ming yang lag na rdo rje zhes btags na 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sngags 'di smras pas bdag
290a6(rnying rgyud): kyang khrag tu skrag cing 'grel bar gyur na gzhan lta ci spos// 'di ni 'da' bar dka'o// de bzhin du lha dang gnod sbyin rnams la yang bsgo'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gsang sngags 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad de/
290a7(rnying rgyud): me las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// dpal chen khrag 'thung spyan drang ngo // sma ni dud ka chen po la// dbu sgra kha ma nag ral pa can// dbu gsum pa la phyag drug ste// dmar dang dung ka gnag pa yin// g.yas kyi gsum na thogs pa ni//
290b1(rnying rgyud): ra'i dbyug pa chen po dang // dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba la// rdo rjes dkrug cig 'thung bar brtag/ g.yon gyi gsum na thogs pa ni// sti ra'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang // khyung gi khrag chen thogs pa dang // sti ra phra mo'i gsus pa nas//
290b2(rnying rgyud): glo steng nang grol 'dren cing za// gtsug tu rnam par snang mdzad nyid// oM phrag g.yas la ak+Sha b+h+yaHhUM// g.yon rat+na sam+b+ha ba tAM// rkang g.yas a mo g+ha sid+d+hi AH// g.yon na a mi tA b+ha ste// hrIHb+h+rUM las rdo rje 'khor lo la// rdo rje rnams
290b3(rnying rgyud): ni rig sngags brtag/ kau ri dang ni tse ri dang // pra mo ha dang baiSh+TA li// gzhan yang byA g+h+r-i mu khA dang // sid+ha la sogs mgyogs ma rnams// sti ra la ni 'bri tshugs su// blta zhing rtod pa'i tshul bzhin gnas// ha ha de nas skad
290b4(rnying rgyud): cig la// rig sngags nyid dang sbod gtong bcas// dgug pa'i pho nyar brtag par bya// ras sam gro ga 'am rtsa rnams la// khro bo'i gzugs su bris pa 'am// yang na sdud pa nag pos bcing // ha ha gad mo chen po dang // rdo rje
290b5(rnying rgyud): sprul ba'i glu blangs te// pho nya rnams la mngag par bya// de nas rig sngags bzung nas kyang // rtsa yi gzugs la gnas pa dang // 'khor lo la sogs mtshon cha yis// de dag phye mar brlag par bya// badz+ra tsa ka hI/ phye mar
290b6(rnying rgyud): de dag gnyubs nas ni// thod pa gzhu dang bcas pa yis// hom khung gru gsum sgro can du// raM zhes bya ba'i me sbar te// drang srong 'khor bcas g.yab mos bod// de nas rig sngags bsreg par b+ha// de ltar lha dang bdag sbyar na//
290b7(rnying rgyud): rnam lnga'i chas dang ldan par bya// ma mo chen mo sha la spyon// 'byung po'i sha ni zan pas zhim// 'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim// ma mo chen mo khrag la spyon// klu dang gar dang gad myangs kyis// so ser mchod de bsgrub par/
291a1(rnying rgyud): zin pa'i sems can gang yang rung // de dag skud pa nag pas bcing // de yang dum thung bcad par byar// den pa mde sngam bzhin// tshe gnas byam+b+hi 'bru lnga yos// gnas lha dag tuHsa bka ra/
291a2(rnying rgyud): 'i sems can bsrung bar bya// tshwa zhing rtsub pa'i shing dang ni// sha dang chang dang yo byad nams// gnag cing tsha bar rnam sbyar te// lha chen rnams la mchod par bya// de nas las rnams grub pa dang // ha ha la sogs gang ma
291a3(rnying rgyud): nga// grwa dang rdo rje dbyug pa yis// lha rnams bdag la thim par bya// 'di ni bdag nyid bsrung ba dang // las rnams thams cad grub par byed// shar phyogs na phra min ma ko ri kha dog ston mo phyag gnyis pa ste// g.yon b+han
291a4(rnying rgyud): n+dan dmar gyis bkang ba thogs pa// g.yas na zhing chung ngu'i dbyug pa thogs pa/ oM badz+ra ga rI dzaHdzaHhU~M zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na sangs rgyas kyang dgug nus na gzhan lta ci sa/ che ge mo zhig khu ga cig ces btsal
291a5(rnying rgyud): sa gtor ma dang tsan+dan dmar chen ar+g+ha la oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo zhes brjod cing ar+g+ha lan gsum du bsgreng ngo // lho phyogs na tsau ri kha dog ster mo phyag na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa/ oM badz+ra tsau rI hUM dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bcol na phyag na rdo
291a6(rnying rgyud): 'i mthu yang rdul tsam yang med par rku nus na gzhan lta ci smos/ nub phyogs na pra mo ha dmar mo phyag na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa// oM badz+ra pra mo ha hUM dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na phyag na rdo rje yang rang gi mad bzhag nas dbang
291a7(rnying rgyud): na gzhan lta ci smos// byang phyogs na bit+taM li kha dog nag mo phyag g.yon zhing chung ngu 'dzin cing za ba/ g.yas na rdo rje 'phyar ba/ oM badz+ra be t+ta li hUM dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad
291b1(rnying rgyud): kyang 'grub na 'jig rten gyi bsgrub ba phran tshogs lha tsA smos/ shar lho'i mtshams na pak+ka se kha dog dmar ser phyag gnyis zhing chung ngu'i ba sut+ta 'dren cing za ba/ oM badz+ra prak+ka sa r+b+ba dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na phyag na rdo rje yang 'ching zhing
291b2(rnying rgyud): 'dren par nus na gzhan bcing zhing za ba lta ci smos/ lho nub kyi mtshams na g+hasma ri kha dog ljang gu phyag g.yon na b+han d+ha tsin+dan dmar pos bkang ba rdo rjes dkrug cing gsol ba/ oM badz+ra g+ham+ba ri hUM dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na phyag na
291b3(rnying rgyud): rdorje yang myos par nus na gzhan lha smos kyang ci dgos/ nub byang gi mtshams na badz+ra karma kha dog ljang gu zhing chung ngu lag pa gnyis kyis bzung ste snying ga nas za ba/ oM badz+ra karma hUM dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na las gang bya ba thams cad
291b4(rnying rgyud): 'grub bo// byang shar gyi mtshams na tsaN+Da li kha dog ser skya phyag g.yas na zhing chung ngu'i b+han+d+ha 'dzin pa/ g.yon gyis zhing dbyug 'dzin pa/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da li hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na za ma dang ma ning yang rgyud 'phel bar byed na dbang po
291b5(rnying rgyud): tshang zhing nyams pa med pa la rgyud 'phel zhing tshe dang dbang thang 'phel bar bya ba lta ci smos te/ phra men ma 'di rnams phrin las skul ba'i tshe ar+g+ha dang gtor ma dbul ba ni gong du smos pa bzhin du bgyi'o// khros na thams cad phrag na tri shU la 'bar ba/ g.yon
291b6(rnying rgyud): ze'u chung bsnams pa/ gdan me smug nag// sku'i kha dog nag mo la khrag dang zhag dang thal ba'i thig les tshom bur byas shing ba su tas rked pa bcings pa/ gser gyi pags pa go zur bgos pa srod ta a dza nas lus brgyan te gtsor bu'i tshogs sgrub/
291b7(rnying rgyud): gnag 'bar ba/ g.yon rnge'u chung bsnams pa/ g.yas me skrag kun ka kha dog nag mo la 'jig rten gyi khams bsregs shing / zad par byas nas slar dpal chen po'i sku la thim par bya'o// de ni phyi rim bshad par bya'o// shar phyogs su sid+ha mu kha kha
292a1(rnying rgyud): dog ser mo zhing chung kha na thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol ba/ seng ge'i mgo can/ lho phyogs na b+hA g+h+ri mu kha kha dog dmar mo lag pa gnyis bsnol te mdun na zhing gnas pa la lta ba/ stag gi mgo can nub
292a2(rnying rgyud): phyogs su srin gla mu kha kha dog nag mo lag pa gnyis zhing chung ngu 'dzin cing lces ldag pa wa mgo can/ byang phyogs na shA na mu kha kha dog mthing ga zhing lag pa gnyis kyis khong dral te lta ba khyi mgo can/ shar lho'i mtshams su kr-i D+ha mu kha kha
292a3(rnying rgyud): dog dmar gnag zhing chung ngu'i ba su ta kha na thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas b+ha na d+hi g.yon gri thogs pa bya rgod kyi mgo can/ lho nub mtshams na kang+ka mu kha kha dog dkar dmar phrag pa g.yon pa la zhing khe la zhing rkang pa nas bzung ba/ g.yas pa
292a4(rnying rgyud): mgo 'dzin pa/ bya kang+ka'i mgo can mchu ring thor to gug ze ba dmar mo// nub byang mtshams na kA ka mA kha kha dog nag mo// bya rog gi mgo can mchus zhing thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pas pad+ma b+han d+ha 'dzin pa/ byang shAr mtshams su UlpA ka
292a5(rnying rgyud): mu kha kha dog sna tshogs lag pa g.yon pa dung chen khrag gis bkang ba la 'thung ba la g.yas pa rdo rje ljags kyu 'dzin pa/ 'ug pa'i mgo can/ nang rim 'ug pa'i 'khor gyis bskor/ de'i phyi rim bya rog gi 'khor gyis bskor/ de'i phyi rim bya kang ka ma chu

292a7(rnying rgyud): kun 'bru re re yang lan bzhi bzhi brjod do// hU~M gis gtso bo bskyed/ ha sa nang gi lha mo bskyed/ nyes phyi'i lha mo bskyed/ phaT kyis thams cad khros par bsgral/ hU~M gis thams cad kyi ye shes kyi 'od zer 'bar bas phyogs bcur khyab par bgyi'o// lha mo zla
292b1(rnying rgyud): ldan tshogs kyi bdag/ he ru dpal la phyag 'tshal la// slob dpon la ni brnyas byad dang / rnal 'byor bar du gcod pa dang // dam tshig gnyen po dal ba dang // rdo rje spyan la lakhu byed rnams// khyed kyis rdul dra brlags nas ni// gnod sams ma lus gtan nas/
292b2(rnying rgyud): sbreng // dpal chen po stan dang ga na'i gnas su tshogs chen po la gshegs pa'i rtse sku gsung thugs kyi khro bo'i gzi byin gyis gdug pa thams cad gtan nas 'byin cing longs spyod chen po 'bring zhing 'bring ba'i bla ngas te thams cad dgyes par mdzad par dbu
292b3(rnying rgyud): 'dis dgyes par mdzad do// rdo rje pang+gA'i thag rgya dpral bar bcings te/ phyar nas mchong zhing 'khor thams cad gcer bur byung nas sla pra shig cing brgyags te/ sngags 'di gsungs so// oM oM A ra'i hoH( dza hriM/ de nas tshogs su gshegs nas 'a
292b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad la spyan bgrang pas gzigs shing 'dzum pa'i brda ha ha sau sau sgra phyung ste/ 'khor thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu dbyangs 'dis gtso bo la bstod do// e ma'o chos kyi don byung ba// chos don dag pa bdag med pa// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i
292b5(rnying rgyud): gnas// rdo rje rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod pas gtso bo mnyes nas 'khor thams cad la gzigs shing dam stsal ba'i dbyangs 'di gsungs so// kha gA l+ya sha ta bka/ a laM la hoH/ ma hA bany+tsa a mr-i ta/ kha r-i yo gi ni/ kha ra~M nA ki ni/ a la la hoH/
292b6(rnying rgyud): b+ha ga bAn kha kha khA/ lha mo rnams rngu rdung / dbyangs ldan/ rgyud gsum gyi tshig/ rta skr-i te s+t+wa~M/ te s+t+wa~M/ d+hi g+h+raM/ tau g+ho ta s+t+wa~M/ g+ha~M g+ho g+hi/ 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rig sngags gcod pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / sems
292b7(rnying rgyud): chen po nyon cig/ bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba yi// 'od zer 'du 'phro'i klong dkyil na// khro bo chen po rnams bzhugs pa// brkyang bskum tshal gyis gnas pa ste// dbus kyi khrag 'thung chen po ni// dbu dgu phyag kyang bcwa brgyad de// gshog brdo rje gtams
293a1(rnying rgyud): bgra ngas// zhabs kyang brgyad du rnam par bstan// dpe dkyil la khor khro ba 'o// dbugs ma phyag dag gshog pa rgya// zlabs byung d+ha brag spyadan// 'dag tan kyang ba 'drang tshul na// du' byAt+ta na// rdo rje ma sa pa
293a2(rnying rgyud): can// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can lang po ste// de dag cing yang 'grub par byed// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // rdo rje srin mo chen mo ni// 'jigs byed chen mor snang

293a4(rnying rgyud): brtson par mi rba ste// mnyam nyid rig pa'i klung zhugs nas// ci ga thogs pa med par spyod// rdo rje dbyug pa blangs nas swa// gsab po lnga yang gA yab par b+ha// de nas dkyil 'khor bzhugs par brtag/ mchod pa chen po dpral bar bya// se gol gtos

294b1(rnying rgyud): 'byam kun// thos pas yud tsam rlag mdzad de// brtag par ma g+har gang yang med// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+ma phreng las las kyi le'u sku bcu bdun pa'o// // rdo rje phra men skor ba yiyas// yud tsam gyis ni dengakra kra nas// skrod pa'i tshab ngar ba

294b3(rnying rgyud): skye 'khrug par bsgom byas na// skab gnyams shing 'bye bar 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa padz+ra phreng las drag po'i las tshe le'u ste brda barbang pa'o// // to ma khung zur gsum gdengs pa la// rdo rje mda' gzhu ldan byas te// thod pa dag gis rnam par

294b5(rnying rgyud): ga ni shin tu nam// 'byung po'i rus bzhis pa ste// gsog te thams cad dkris par mdzod// 'phags pa thabs kyi dgas pa pad+mo byung las drug po hom gyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // lcags sa ma nag po'i shing rnams la// mgo ba rgya mdung rtsi blar gsum// 9/
294b6(rnying rgyud): ba khro mo rnams bsgoms te// btab na wA yang brtag par 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhugs pa pa d+ma phreng las drug po'i grwar pa'i le skr-i nyi shu pa'o// lcags bye drug dang rdo rgya dang // khrag las sbas te bsres pa dang // myang ga'i tshan deng sbyor bdag/
294b7(rnying rgyud): bas gtar na de brnya 'gyur// bapags pa bas kyi dgas pa pad+mo grang pas drug pa'i gtar ba'i ma gyi skye nyi shu gcig gro/ me dkyil 'a khor gdun lung du// khre po'i thakhris brdungs pa'o// rdo rjes na thugs pazhis thasas// spyi ming nga chu hU~M/
295a1(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las drag po'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // drag po'i las kyis bslabs pa'i rnams// 'khor ba'i lam lha sgro bcad nas// rnam shes hUM gis bsdus gtums te// rdzog
295a2(rnying rgyud): rna med gnas mchog na// gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga// sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang // khro bo dang ni khro mo rnams// sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phang // 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las gnas bsgrubs pa'i li ru Te nyi shu gsum pa'o//
295a3(rnying rgyud): gas dkyil 'a da pa// thug ma me pa te/ rnas rnam da/ sa par // rmugs pa kyil bar bangs pa// nga gnas pa 'di su sa/ zhugs pas zad pa dang ma da /
295a4(rnying rgyud): dus gyung gang yang med// rdo k+Sha men mang gas nas sa// bkrug nas/ ba rdzun pa yis// chags pa'i tshul g+hI sa de lus las// dpa' drungag rji brji bsus nas 'grub// phra men rnam pa ni yang gas nas su// de yi mas rba swA dang lce// lus gi sems bsgyur rnams
295a5(rnying rgyud): bsgoms na// kun la mdzes shing dga' bar 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dbang gi las bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// // hom khung zla gam gdengs pa la// rdo rje zhags pas brgyan par bya// de nas lha rnams spyan drangs te// mi
295a6(rnying rgyud): pan rnam rtog bsregs na 'grub// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dbang gi hom gyi le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// // zangs sam kha dog dmar po'i shing // mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zla gam// mgo la khro bo'i 'khor bsgoms te// btab na nges par de dbang
295a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dbang gi phur pa'i las bshad pa'i le'u lce nyi shu drug pa'o// // zangs phye dang ni bu ram dang // dmar po'i 'bras can la sogs pa// sbyar bas gtor ma gtang bar bya// mthong bas
295b1(rnying rgyud): nges par de dbang 'gyur// 'phags pa zabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dbang gi gtor ma'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// / khro mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms byas na// lha yang ra ste dbang du 'gyur// de ni bad
295b2(rnying rgyud): ba chen po yin// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dbang gi sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// // gru bzhi dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad par// lha rnams 'khor bcas spyan drangs te// mchod pa glu la sogs pas mchod// de nas las
295b3(rnying rgyud): rnams brtsam par bya// nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun// dpal dang gzi brjid chen po rnams// yud tsam gyis ni rgyas par mdzod// khro bo khro mo 'khor bcas dang // rdo rje phra men 'khor bcas pas// dpal
295b4(rnying rgyud): dang gzi brjid 'phel bsgoms na// bdag nyid chen por de 'gyur ro// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rgyas pa'i las kyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// // ho ma khung glu bzhi gdengs pa la// rdo rje 'khor los brgyan par bya// de nas lha
295b5(rnying rgyud): rnams spyan drangs te// bsregs pas mchod cing dpal 'phel bsgom// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rgyas pa'i hom gyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o// // gser ram ser po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgya mdung rtse zur bzhi// lha rnams bsgoms
295b6(rnying rgyud): te gdab par bya// 'di ni rgyas pa'i las la shis// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rgyas pa'i phur pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// // gser phye 'bras chen ser po rnams// 'o ma sbrang rtse gtor ma ni// rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gtor mu s+ye/
295b7(rnying rgyud): mkhas pas rgyas par bsgom zhing sbyin// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rgyas pa'i gtor ma'i le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o// / lha mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du// lha yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgom// byang chub sems ni 'phra
296a1(rnying rgyud): bsgoms na// 'di ni rgyas pa'i las 'grub bo// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhugs pa pad+mo phreng las rgyas pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u skye sum cu gsum pa'o// / thul po'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad par// lha rnams 'khor bca
296a2(rnying rgyud): spyan drangs che// dkar po'i yon gyis mchod pa bya// de nas las rnams brtsam par bya// gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams nI rab 'byam kun// yud tsam nyid la zhi mdzad de// zhi bar grub la phyag 'tshal lo// lha rnams 'khor bcas thams da
296a3(rnying rgyud): kyis// 'aldag pa thams cad 'i mdzad par// bsgoms na thams cad yud tsam gyis// zhi bar 'gyur te the tshom med// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las zhi ba'i las kyi le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'o// // hom khung zlum po gdengs pa pa// rdo rje bac+doMm brtan par
296a4(rnying rgyud): phur pa dkar po drug btab ste// spyan dngas rdul phyi sogs pas mchod// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las zhi ba'i hom gyi le'u ste sum cu lnga pa'o// // phur pa kha dog dkar po la// mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zlum por// lha rnams bsgoms la gdab par bya// 2nga
296a5(rnying rgyud): ni zhi ba'i las la shis// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las zhi ba'i phur pa'i le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o// // dngul dang 'bras chen dkar po rnams// 'o mar sbyar ba'i gtor ma ni// zhi bar 'gyur ba'i gtor ma ste// mkhas pas zhi bar bsgoms shing
296a6(rnying rgyud): gtor// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las zhi ba'i gtor ma'i le'u ste sum du bdun pa'o// / lha mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du// lha yi sgrub pa bsgom par bya// byin gyis thams cad gi bsgoms na// lha rnams kun kyang zhi bar 'gyur// 'phags
296a7(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las zhi ba'i spyod pa las kyi le'u ste sum cu brgyang pa'o// / mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang // de las dngos byung phyag rgya rnams// nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad// mkhas pas ci dgar bsgyur na 'gud//
296b1(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las las bsdus pa'i le'u ste sum cu dgra pa'o// // drag pos thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur// dbang gis 'byor pa mchog kyang 'grub// rgyas pas gzi brjid rnam par 'phel// zhi bas bde ba'i mchog kyang
296b2(rnying rgyud): 'grub// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las las sgrub pa'i phan yon gyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// // dkyil 'khor 'di'i mtshan ni dbang chen bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor te/ de la dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi zlum por bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings spros pa med/
296b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dod no// 'khor lo rtsi pas zur can du bya ba gi ni zlum po'i nang ni gnas pa ni chos kyi dbyings spros pa med bzhin du byin gyis brlabs kyi lha dang / lha mo dang / khro bo dang / khro mo dang / pho nya la sogs pa de nyid kyis 'gro ba'i don no// rnam pa gcig tu chos kyi dbyings rnam par
296b4(rnying rgyud): rtog pa med bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ci yang mkhyen pa lhun gyis grub pa'i don no// mtha' gru bzhi bya ba ni/ phyogs bcu'i snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad la dbang bsgyur bas bde ba chen po rgyas pa'i don/ dkyil nas lha mo lnga phyir lta ba/ lha mo ni dbyings
296b5(rnying rgyud): nyid nye ba'i byin brlabs te/ sems dpas dbyings nyid dang nye ba mthong ba'i don no// sems dpa' lnga nang du lta ba ni dbyings nyid nye ba la lta ba'i don no// sems dpa' gzhan phyir lta ba ni/ dbyings nyid thams cad dus rdo lta bu bems po ma yin gyi mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang
296b6(rnying rgyud): ldan zhing sems dpa' nyid dbyings las mi gzhan pa'i tha tshig go// sems ma gzhan nang du lta ba ni mkhyen pa'i ye shes dngos po la sogs pa thams cad du rnam par rtog pa ma yin gyi dbyings nyid dang ldan zhing dbyings nyid kyang mkhyen pa'i ye shes las mi
296b7(rnying rgyud): gzhan pa'i tha tshig go// rnam gcig tu sems dpa' phyir lta ba ni snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dbang bsgyur ba'i don/ sems ma nang du lta ba ni snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'dus pa'i don/ sems dpa' dang sems ma gyi nang
297a1(rnying rgyud): drugacig la gcig ga gas pa na mnyes par byed pa'i'achogs// nab dang zlas la na ngan skye dngas pa dang nal bu lpa sags pa'ang sa gang 'dul bu 'dan/ drung bya sa dkyis la // zugags rlon jim na
297a2(rnying rgyud): nyi ma'i 'od snang zhing gsal pa lta bu'o// de'i byin brlabs ni dro zhing 'jam pa lta bu'o// phyi'i dngos po la sogs pa 'joms shing 'dul ba ni rtsi shing bskams pa dang tshig pa lta bu ste// lha mo dang sems ma ni chos kyi dbyings rig pa'i don sems la snang ba'o// b+ha dang sem
297a3(rnying rgyud): dpa' ni dad+hi ngas la snang ba'i don mthong ba'o// dbyings nyid lnga sdang ba dang mthong ba'i byin brlabs kyi rang gis dngos po dang rgol ba'i rang bzhin lhun gyis 'joms shing dbyings su sbyor bar 'dul ba ni// khro bo dang khro mo las rnam bzhi rang bzhin du mdzad cing thugs rjes 'jig
297a4(rnying rgyud): rten stong ba'i don no// 'jig rten stong ba la sogs pa ni byin gyis brlabs las pro ta lcer gnas pa yin/ rnam gcig tu 'jig rten rdzi lha mA thu bo che 'khor du 'dus par bstan pa'i don no// bkra shrIs brgyad ni thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing 'khor ba la spyod kyang nyon mongs
297a5(rnying rgyud): cing bar 'i 'gyur ba dang / d+han dus la stod byu thos kyi brtsigs gcig par mi 'byer // gleng gi nga byes gyis mdan pa'i byu shes so// de 'i dpe la byeng ni 'byed pa'i ye shes dang ldan g+sa ga shis so// mam man thams da
297a6(rnying rgyud): lha dbang ba myur bya dang / myos kyi 'khor lo basbyor ba'i bkra shis sa// rin po rkyen zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa'i bkra shis so// bad+mo ni 'khor bas ma zin pa'i bag+sa shes so// gdugs smin ni mongs pas ma gdudus pa'i bkri shis s+ho// tham pa ni bdud rtsi ma ka dpya/ na
297a7(rnying rgyud): shos so/ ni thobams cang su rung bar rgyags pa gyis so/ khyi'i labargyang lnga'i ba'i sa pa byo pa bya ming ming byas / khyong ba gas 'i byed pa gyi yi ba ga/ yang rgyad kyi sa pa 'a gzhi sa bzhin ma /
297b1(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'am/ thugs rjes de dag gi don mdzad pa'i batshig go// rnam gcig tu thams cad dbang du 'dus pa'i don/ de lag tsa mo 'khor lnga lnga dang bcas pa ni ci yang mi mdzad do// sems dpa' sems ma nyi shu nI kun la p+la gcig bzhin no// de ltar byas pa'i shugs kyis khro bo dang /
297b2(rnying rgyud): khro mo 'khor dang bcas pa ni gyi nang thams cad kyi dngos po la rngon pas ri dgas mthong ba bzhin no// de ltar zhe sdang gi shugs kyis thams cad dbyings nyid la sbyar ro// 'byor na 'khor ba'i chos la spyod kyang longs spyod chen po ste/ nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas
297b3(rnying rgyud): de ltar sgrub pa ni 'dod chags so// chos kyi dbyings ngang gis gsang ba phrag dog go// chos nyid spros pa med pas gti mug go// chos nyid de lta bu khams gsum las rgyal bas nga rgyal lo// de la gtso bo ni 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs ni thams cad la khyab mod kyi nye
297b4(rnying rgyud): de sbyi / yang du// pa / du/ sa / sa pa ma sa gas pa gyi sugasus so// kyin 'ju ldan pa 'i byin pa grus de byug pad kyi ba mi gas gas no// de ben na
297b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor lci'i byin pa rlabs ni/ zhabs g.yon nas rnyed pa g.yon mni med do// don yang rngub pa la khor lnga'i byin brlabs ni zhabs g.yas rnyed pa g.yen man zad do// khro bo dang khro mo thams cad ni rigs so so'i byin brlangs bzhin no// de ltar 'khor la pogacig la yang lnga wA 'gyur te/
297b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i b+ha ba byed pa thams cad ni rdo rje'i rigs so// dro ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni rin po che'i rigs so// gsher ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni pad+ma'i rigs so// bskyod pa'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni las kyi rigs so// de rnams cha mnyam pa las spyir grub pa ni dngos su bzhugs pa/ de bzhin
297b7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs so// thams cad bdag nyid ma'i 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs ni dbus su gyur pa thams cad do// sra ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni yangs pa'i spyan 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs so// dro ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni mA ma kI 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs so// gsher ba'i rang bzhin med pa/
298a1(rnying rgyud): ni gos dkar mo khor lnga'i byin brlabs so// bskyod pa'i rang bzhin med pa ni sgrol ma'i 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs so// don du bya ba byed nus pa sems dpa'o// de bzhin du rang bzhin med pa ni sems ma'o// de ltar rig pa ni khro bo dang khra mo'o// de la bsu ShA
298a2(rnying rgyud): slob yang thams cad de ltar bya'o// phyi nang gi chos thams cad la yang de ltar blta'o// de skad ces dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa la rdo rje gzhon nu sde 'bum phrag du ma yI rangs te 'di skad ces bstod do// hU~M/ bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba yi// 'od zer 'dre 'gro
298a3(rnying rgyud): rmong dkyil na// khro bo khro mo rnams bzhugs pa// sku ni cir yang sbyar pa'i gzugs// hU~M/ dbu skra kham gnag ral pa can// gyen du 'khyil ba srid rtseng 'bar// mi mnyam khro gnyer sdang mig ni// log par lta ba 'dul ba'i mtshan// haM/ mche bzang yag gtsigs pas ni// skye shi r+b+hu pa
298a4(rnying rgyud): gcod pa'i tshul// sku gsung thugs kyi phrin brlabs ni// phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang ldang // hU~M/ thugs rje'i byin brlabs sbyin ltar 'khrigs// blams pa'i 'od zer glog bzhin 'gyu// rnam pa'i sgra skad 'brug ltar sgrogs// sprul pa'i thog thog char bzhin 'bebs/ dz+dza/ sngon gyi
298a5(rnying rgyud): sa sa ci pa ni ga cin pasna macol la na pa gagasal mang da tshig can la sa slob thugs tshon pa byin pa na samyo/ ba sil gyin cig rgyo ma ci // bdeg gis kyig pa'i bas ma parnams grub sa kyid kyis parna'o /
298a6(rnying rgyud): gsol// 'khyil cing rgyan yang 'khyil pa la// sems kyi chos pas sgyu mi mngar// sgra las 'das pa'i sbyor ba ste// bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes lags// hU~M/ srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam nyid ngang gis khro la phyag 'tshal lo//
298a7(rnying rgyud): khros pas longs spyod mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'du 'phro khro la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod de/ nyid kyi thugs kar zhugs nas mi snang bar gyur to// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng rdzogs s+ho//
